[ Testament 2 Heading ] <milestone type="x-importer" subType="x-osis2mod" n="$Rev$"/>
Matthew 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Matt" sID="gen2" type="book"/>   <milestone n="MATEWU" type="x-usfm-h"/>
Matthew 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Matt.1" sID="Matt.1"/>
Matthew 1:1 Bhuku redzinza raJesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waDhavhidhi, mwanakomana waAbhurahama.
Matthew 1:2 Abhurahama wakabereka Isaka; Isaka ndokubereka Jakobho; Jakobho ndokubereka Judha nevanakomana vababa vake;
Matthew 1:3 Judha ndokubereka Faresi naZara kuna Tamari; Faresi ndokubereka Esiromi; Esiromi ndokubereka Arami;
Matthew 1:4 Arami ndokubereka Aminadhabhi; Aminadhabhi ndokubereka Naashoni; Naashoni ndokubereka Sarimoni;
Matthew 1:5 Sarimoni ndokubereka Bhowazi kuna Rahabhi; Bhowazi ndokubereka Obhedhi kuna Rute; Obhedhi ndokubereka Jese;
Matthew 1:6 Jese ndokubereka Dhavhidhi mambo; Dhavhidhi mambo ndokubereka Soromoni ku<transChange type="added">mukadzi</transChange><transChange type="added">waiva</transChange> waUria;
Matthew 1:7 Soromoni ndokubereka Robhoami; Robhoami ndokubereka Abhiya; Abhiya ndokubereka Asa;
Matthew 1:8 Asa ndokubereka Josafati; Josafati ndokubereka Joramu; Joramu ndokubereka Oziasi;
Matthew 1:9 Oziasi ndokubereka Jotamu; Jotamu ndokubereka Akazi; Akazi ndokubereka Hezekia;
Matthew 1:10 Hezekia ndokubereka Manase; Manase ndokubereka Amoni; Amoni ndokubereka Josiyasi;
Matthew 1:11 Josiyasi ndokubereka Jekoniasi nevanakomana vamai vake nenguva yekutapirwa kuBhabhironi.
Matthew 1:12 Zvino shure kwekutapirwa kuBhabhironi, Jekoniasi wakabereka Saratieri; Saratieri ndokubereka Zerubhabheri;
Matthew 1:13 Zerubhabheri ndokubereka Abhiudhi; Abhiudhi ndokubereka Eriakimi; Eriakimi ndokubereka Azori;
Matthew 1:14 Azori ndokubereka Sadhoki; Sadhoki ndokubereka Akimi; Akimi ndokubereka Eriyudhi;
Matthew 1:15 Eriyudhi ndokubereka Eriazari; Eriazari ndokubereka Matani; Matani ndokubereka Jakobho;
Matthew 1:16 Jakobho ndokubereka Josefa murume waMaria, kwakazvarwa kwaari Jesu, anonzi Kristu. <div eID="gen4" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 1:17 Naizvozvo mazera ese kubva kuna Abhurahama kusvikira kuna Dhavhidhi mazera gumi nemana; nekubva kuna Dhavhidhi kusvikira pakutapirwa kuBhabhironi mazera gumi nemana; nekubva pakutapirwa kuBhabhironi kusvikira kuna Kristu mazera gumi nemana. <div eID="gen5" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen3" type="section"/>
Matthew 1:18 Zvino kuberekwa kwaJesu Kristu kwaiva kwakadai: Nokuti mai vake Maria vakati vatsidzirwa kuroorwa naJosefa, vasati vasangana vakaonekwa vava nemimba kubva kuMweya Mutsvene.
Matthew 1:19 Zvino Josefa murume wavo zvaakange ari wakarurama, asingadi kuvafumura, waida kuvaramba muchivande.
Matthew 1:20 Asi zvino wakati acharangarira zvinhu izvozvi, tarira, mutumwa waIshe wakaonekwa kwaari muchiroto achiti: Josefa, mwanakomana waDhavhidhi, usatya kuzvitorera Maria mukadzi wako; nokuti icho chakaumbwa maari ndecheMweya Mutsvene.
Matthew 1:21 Uye achabereka Mwanakomana, uye uchatumidza zita rake Jesu, nokuti iye achaponesa vanhu vake pazvivi zvavo.
Matthew 1:22 Zvino zvese izvozvi zvakaitwa kuti zvizadziswe zvakarehwa naIshe kubudikidza nemuporofita achiti:
Matthew 1:23 Tarira, mhandara ichava nemimba, igobereka Mwanakomana, uye vachatumidza zita rake Emanueri, ndokuti kana zvichishandurwa, Mwari anesu.
Matthew 1:24 Zvino Josefa amuka pahope akaita sezvakaraira mutumwa waIshe kwaari, akazvitorera mukadzi wake;
Matthew 1:25 uye haana kumuziva kusvikira azvara Mwanakomana wake wedangwe; akatumidza zita rake JESU. <chapter eID="Matt.1"/><div eID="gen7" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen6" type="section"/>
Matthew 2:0 <div sID="gen8" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="Matt.2" sID="Matt.2"/>  <div sID="gen9" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 2:1 Zvino Jesu wakati aberekwa muBhetirehemu reJudhiya, pamazuva aHerodhe mambo, tarira, kwakauya vachenjeri vachibva kumabvazuva kuJerusarema,
Matthew 2:2 vachiti: Uripi iye wakazvarwa Mambo weVaJudha? Nokuti taona nyeredzi yake kumabvazuva, tauya kuzomunamata.
Matthew 2:3 Zvino Herodhe mambo wakati anzwa, akashushikana, neJerusarema rese naye.
Matthew 2:4 Zvino wakati aunganidza vapristi vakuru vese nevanyori vevanhu, akabvunza kwavari <transChange type="added">kuti </transChange>Kristu uchazvarirwa kupi.
Matthew 2:5 Zvino vakati kwaari: MuBhetirehemu reJudhiya; nokuti zvakanyorwa saizvozvi nemuporofita <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>:
Matthew 2:6 Newe Bhetirehemu nyika yaJudha, hausi mudikisa kuvatongi vaJudha; nokuti kwauri kuchabuda mutungamiriri, achafudza vanhu vangu Israeri. <div eID="gen9" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 2:7 Zvino Herodhe, wakati adana vachenjeri muchivande, akabvunzisisa kwavari nguva yakaonekwa nyeredzi.
Matthew 2:8 Akavatuma kuBhetirehemu, akati: Endai munobvunzisisa zvemucheche; kana ma<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>wana mundisume, kuti ini ndiuyewo ndimunamate. <div eID="gen10" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 2:9 Vakati vanzwa mambo, vakabva; zvino tarira, nyeredzi yavakaona kumabvazuva yakavatungamirira, kusvikira yasvika ikamira pamusoro pepakange pane mucheche.
Matthew 2:10 Vakati vaona nyeredzi vakafara nemufaro mukuru kwazvo.
Matthew 2:11 Vakati vapinda mumba, vakaona mucheche naMaria mai vake, vakawira pasi vakamunamata; zvino vakati vazarura fuma yavo, vakamupemberera nezvipo, goridhe, nezvipfungaidzo zvinonhuhwira, nemura*.
Matthew 2:12 Vakati vanyeverwa naMwari muchiroto, kuti varege kudzokera kuna Herodhe, vakabva vakaenda kunyika yavo neimwe nzira. <div eID="gen11" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen8" type="section"/>
Matthew 2:13 Vakati vaenda, tarira, mutumwa waIshe anoonekwa kuna Josefa muchiroto, achiti: Muka utore mucheche namai vake, utizire kuEgipita, uveko kusvikira ndichikuudza; nokuti Herodhe achatsvaka mucheche kuti amuparadze.
Matthew 2:14 Zvino amuka wakatora mucheche namai vake usiku, akabva akaenda kuEgipita,
Matthew 2:15 uye wakavako kusvikira pakufa kwaHerodhe; kuti zvizadziswe zvakarehwa naIshe nemuporofita, achiti: Ndakadana mwanakomana wangu abude muEgipita. <div eID="gen13" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen12" type="section"/>
Matthew 2:16 Zvino Herodhe, wakati aona kuti anyengerwa nevachenjeri, akatsamwa zvikuru, akatuma, akauraya vana vese vaiva muBhetirehemu nemumigumo yaro yese, kubvira pamakore maviri <transChange type="added">neari </transChange>pasi, zvichienderana nenguva yaakange abvunzisisa kuvachenjeri.
Matthew 2:17 Zvino zvakazadziswa zvakarehwa naJeremiya muporofita achiti:
Matthew 2:18 MuRama rakanzwika inzwi, kuungudza nekuchema nekurira kukuru, Rakeri achichema vana vake asingadi kunyaradzwa, nokuti hava<transChange type="added">chi</transChange>po. <div eID="gen15" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen14" type="section"/>
Matthew 2:19 Asi Herodhe wakati afa, tarira, mutumwa waIshe wakaonekwa muchiroto kuna Josefa muEgipita,
Matthew 2:20 achiti: Muka, utore mucheche namai vake, uende kunyika yaIsraeri; nokuti vakafa avo vaitsvaka mweya wemucheche.
Matthew 2:21 Akasimuka ndokutora mucheche namai vake akasvika kunyika yaIsraeri.
Matthew 2:22 Asi wakati achinzwa kuti Arikerawo anotonga muJudhiya panzvimbo yababa vake Herodhe, akatya kuendako; asi wakati anyeverwa naMwari muchiroto, akabva akaenda kumativi eGarirea.
Matthew 2:23 Akasvika akagara muguta rinonzi Nazareta; kuti zvizadziswe zvakarehwa nevaporofita, kuti: Achanzi muNazareta. <chapter eID="Matt.2"/><div eID="gen17" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen16" type="section"/>
Matthew 3:0 <div sID="gen18" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="Matt.3" sID="Matt.3"/>  <div sID="gen19" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 3:1 Pamazuva iwayo kwakauya Johwani Mubhabhatidzi, achiparidza murenje reJudhiya,
Matthew 3:2 uye achiti: Tendeukai; nokuti ushe hwematenga hwaswedera.
Matthew 3:3 Nokuti uyu ndiye wakarehwa nezvake naIsaya muporofita, achiti: Inzwi reanodanidzira murenje: Gadzirirai mugwagwa waIshe, ruramisai nzira dzake.
Matthew 3:4 Uyuwo Johwani waiva nechipfeko chake chemakushe ekamera nebhanhire rechikumba rakapoteredza chiuno chake; nekudya kwake kwaiva mhashu neuchi hwedondo.
Matthew 3:5 Zvino kwakabudira kwaari Jerusarema neJudhiya rese nedunhu rese rakapoteredza Joridhani;
Matthew 3:6 ndokubhabhatidzwa naye muna Joridhani vachireurura zvivi zvavo. <div eID="gen19" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 3:7 Asi wakati achiona vazhinji veVaFarisi neVaSadhusi vachiuya kurubhabhatidzo rwake akati kwavari: Zvizvarwa zvenyoka, ndiani wakakuratidzirai kuti mutize hasha dzinouya?
Matthew 3:8 Naizvozvo berekai zvibereko zvakafanira kutendeuka.
Matthew 3:9 Uye musafunga kutaura mukati menyu <transChange type="added">muchiti</transChange>: Tina Abhurahama anova baba; nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Mwari anokwanisa kubva pamabwe aya kumutsira Abhurahama vana.
Matthew 3:10 Uye ikozvinowo sanhu ratoiswa pamudzi wemiti, naizvozvo muti umwe neumwe usingaiti chibereko chakanaka unotemwa ugokandirwa mumoto.
Matthew 3:11 Ini zvirokwazvo ndinokubhabhatidzai nemvura <transChange type="added">mupinde</transChange> mukutendeuka; asi uyo anouya shure kwangu ane simba kupfuura ini, wandisina kufanira kutakura shangu dzake; iye achakubhabhatidzai neMweya Mutsvene nemoto.
Matthew 3:12 Ane rusero rwuri muruoko rwake, uye achachenesa buriro rake kwazvo, ndokuunganidzira zviyo zvake mudura, asi hundi achaipisa nemoto usingadzimiki. <div eID="gen20" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen18" type="section"/>
Matthew 3:13 Ipapo Jesu wakabva Garirea akasvika paJoridhani kuna Johwani, kuti abhabhatidzwe naye.
Matthew 3:14 Asi Johwani wakamurambidza achiti: Ini kunodikanwa <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> ndibhabhatidzwe nemwi, asi imwi mouya kwandiri?
Matthew 3:15 Asi Jesu achipindura wakati kwaari: Tenda ikozvino, nokuti saizvozvo zvakatifanira kuti tizadzise kururama kwese. Ipapo akamutendera.
Matthew 3:16 Asi Jesu, wakati abhabhatidzwa, akakwira pakarepo <transChange type="added">achibva</transChange> mumvura; zvino tarira, matenga akamuzarukira, ndokuona Mweya waMwari achiburuka senjiva, achiuya pamusoro pake.
Matthew 3:17 Zvino tarira, inzwi richibva kumatenga richiti: Uyu ndiye Mwanakomana wangu anodikanwa, wandinofara maari kwazvo.  <chapter eID="Matt.3"/><div eID="gen22" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen21" type="section"/>
Matthew 4:0 <div sID="gen23" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="Matt.4" sID="Matt.4"/>  <div sID="gen24" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 4:1 Zvino Jesu wakatungamirirwa neMweya kurenje kuti anoidzwa nadhiabhorosi.
Matthew 4:2 Zvino wakati atsanya mazuva makumi mana neusiku makumi mana, akazonzwa nzara.
Matthew 4:3 Zvino muidzi wakati auya kwaari, akati: Kana uri Mwanakomana waMwari, raira kuti mabwe awa aite zvingwa.
Matthew 4:4 Asi iye wakapindura akati: Kwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Munhu haangararami nechingwa chega, asi neshoko rimwe nerimwe rinobuda mumuromo maMwari. <div eID="gen24" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 4:5 Zvino dhiabhorosi wakamutora akamuisa muguta dzvene, akamumisa pachiruvu chetembere,
Matthew 4:6 ndokuti kwaari: Kana uri Mwanakomana waMwari, zvikandire pasi; nokuti kwakanyorwa kuti: Iye acharaira vatumwa vake pamusoro pako, uye pamaoko vachakugamha, zvimwe ungagumbusa rutsoka rwako pabwe.
Matthew 4:7 Jesu akati kwaari: Kwakanyorwa zvekare: Usaidza Ishe Mwari wako. <div eID="gen25" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 4:8 Dhiabhorosi akamuisazve pagomo refusa, akamuratidza ushe hwese hwenyika nekubwinya kwahwo.
Matthew 4:9 Akati kwaari: Zvese zvinhu izvi ndichapa kwauri kana ukawira pasi ukandinamata.
Matthew 4:10 Ipapo Jesu akati kwaari: Ibva, Satani, nokuti kwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Uchanamata Ishe Mwari wako, uchashumira iye oga.
Matthew 4:11 Ipapo dhiabhorosi akamusiya; zvino tarira, vatumwa vakauya vakamushandira. <div eID="gen26" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen23" type="section"/>
Matthew 4:12 Zvino Jesu wakati anzwa kuti Johwani wakumikidzwa <transChange type="added">mutirongo</transChange>, akabva akaenda Garirea.
Matthew 4:13 Zvino wakabva Nazareta, akauya akagara muKapenaume riri pagungwa, mumiganhu yeZebhuruni neNafitarimi;
Matthew 4:14 kuti zvizadziswe zvakarehwa naIsaya muporofita, achiti:
Matthew 4:15 Nyika yeZebhuruni nenyika yeNefitarimi, <transChange type="added">pa</transChange>nzira yegungwa, mhiri kwaJoridhani, Garirea revahedheni;
Matthew 4:16 vanhu vakange vagere murima vakaona chiedza chikuru; nevakange vagere panharaunda nemumumvuri werufu, chiedza chakabudira kwavari. <div eID="gen28" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen27" type="section"/>
Matthew 4:17 Kubvira panguva iyo Jesu wakatanga kuparidza nokuti: Tendeukai, nokuti ushe hwekumatenga hwaswedera. <div eID="gen30" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen29" type="section"/>
Matthew 4:18 Zvino Jesu wakati achifamba-famba parutivi rwegungwa reGarirea akaona vanakomana vemunhu umwe vaviri, Simoni anonzi Petro, naAndiriya munin'ina wake, vachikandira mumbure mugungwa; nokuti vakange vari varedzi.
Matthew 4:19 Akati kwavari: Nditeverei, ndigokuitai varedzi vevanhu.
Matthew 4:20 Pakarepo vakasiya mimbure vakamutevera.
Matthew 4:21 Zvino wakati apfuurira kubva ipapo akaona vamwe vaviri vanakomana vemunhu umwe, Jakobho waZebhedhi naJohwani munin'ina wake muchikepe pamwe naZebhedhi baba vavo, vachigadzira mimbure yavo, akavadana.
Matthew 4:22 Pakarepo vakasiya chikepe nababa vavo vakamutevera. <div eID="gen32" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen31" type="section"/>
Matthew 4:23 Jesu akapota neGarirea rese achidzidzisa mumasinagoge avo, nekuparidza evhangeri yeushe, achiporesa denda rega-rega neurwere hwega-hwega pavanhu.
Matthew 4:24 Shoko rake rikabudira kuSiriya yese; vakauisa kwaari varwere vese, vakabatwa nehosha dzakasiyana-siyana, nemarwadzo, nevakange vane madhimoni, nevaiva nezvipusha, nevakange vakafa mitezo; akavaporesa.
Matthew 4:25 Zvino zvaunga zvikuru zvakamutevera, vaibva Garirea, neDhekapori, neJerusarema, neJudhiya, nemhiri kwaJoridhani. <chapter eID="Matt.4"/><div eID="gen34" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen33" type="section"/>
Matthew 5:0 <div sID="gen35" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="Matt.5" sID="Matt.5"/>  <div sID="gen36" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 5:1 Zvino wakati achiona zvaunga akakwira mugomo, zvino wakati agara pasi vadzidzi vake vakauya kwaari;
Matthew 5:2 akashamisa muromo wake, akavadzidzisa achiti:
Matthew 5:3 Vakaropafadzwa varombo pamweya; nokuti ushe hwekumatenga ndehwavo.
Matthew 5:4 Vakaropafadzwa vanochema; nokuti ivo vachanyaradzwa.
Matthew 5:5 Vakaropafadzwa vanyoro; nokuti ivo vachagara nhaka yenyika.
Matthew 5:6 Vakaropafadzwa vane nzara nenyota yekururama; nokuti ivo vachagutiswa.
Matthew 5:7 Vakaropafadzwa vane tsitsi; nokuti ivo vachaitirwa tsitsi.
Matthew 5:8 Vakaropafadzwa vakachena pamoyo; nokuti ivo vachaona Mwari.
Matthew 5:9 Vakaropafadzwa vanoyananisa; nokuti ivo vachanzi vana vaMwari.
Matthew 5:10 Vakaropafadzwa vanoshushwa nekuda kwekururama; nokuti ushe hwekumatenga ndehwavo.
Matthew 5:11 Makaropafadzwa imwi, kana vachikutukai, vachi<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>shusha<transChange type="added">i</transChange>, vachikutaurirai zvakaipa zvese vachireva nhema nekuda kwangu.
Matthew 5:12 Farai mupembere kwazvo, nokuti mubairo wenyu mukuru mumatenga; nokuti vakashusha saizvozvo vaporofita vakakutangirai. <div eID="gen36" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen35" type="section"/>
Matthew 5:13 Imwi muri munyu wenyika; asi kana munyu warasa kuvava, ucharungwa nei? Hauchabatsiri chinhu, asi kurasirwa kunze, utsikwe-tsikwe nevanhu.
Matthew 5:14 Imwi muri chiedza chenyika; guta rakamiswa pamusoro pegomo haringavanziki;
Matthew 5:15 uye mwenje havautungidzi vakauisa pasi pedengu, asi pachigadziko chemwenje, uvhenekere vese vari mumba.
Matthew 5:16 Saizvozvo chiedza chenyu ngachivhenekere pamberi pevanhu, kuti vaone mabasa enyu akanaka, vagokudza Baba venyu vari kumatenga. <div eID="gen38" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen37" type="section"/>
Matthew 5:17 Musafunga kuti ndauya kuzoparadza murairo kana vaporofita; handina kuuya kuzoparadza, asi kuzozadzisa.
Matthew 5:18 Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Kusvikira denga nenyika zvichipfuura, vara diki rimwe kana chidodzi chimwe kubva pamurairo hazvingatongopfuuri, kusvikira zvese zvaitika.
Matthew 5:19 Naizvozvo ani nani anotyora umwe wemirairo midikisa iyi, akadzidzisa vanhu saizvozvo, achanzi mudikisa muushe hwekumatenga; asi ani nani anoita akaidzidzisa, iye achanzi mukuru muushe hwekumatenga.
Matthew 5:20 Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Kunze kwekuti kururama kwenyu kukapfuura kwevanyori nekweVaFarisi, hamungatongopindi muushe hwekumatenga. <div eID="gen40" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 5:21 Makanzwa kuti zvakanzi kune vekare: Usauraya; uye ani nani anouraya achava nemhosva yemutongo;
Matthew 5:22 asi ini ndinoti kwamuri: Ani nani anotsamwira umwe wake pasina chikonzero, achava nemhosva yemutongo; neanoti kune umwe wake: Dununu! achava nemhosva yedare remakurukota; uye anoti: Benzi! achava nemhosva yegehena remoto.
Matthew 5:23 Naizvozvo kana uchiuisa chipo chako kuaritari, ipapo ukarangarira kuti umwe wako ane chekupikisana newe,
Matthew 5:24 siya ipapo chipo chako pamberi pearitari, uende umbonotanga wayanana neumwe wako, ugouya wopira chipo chako.
Matthew 5:25 Tenderana nemudzivisi wako nekukurumidza, uchiri munzira naye, zvimwe mudzivisi angakukumikidza kumutongi, mutongi akukumikidze kumupurisa, ukakandirwa mutirongo.
Matthew 5:26 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri: Haungatongobudimo, kusvikira waripa kamari kekupedzisira. <div eID="gen41" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 5:27 Makanzwa kuti zvakanzi kune vekare: Usaita upombwe;
Matthew 5:28 asi ini ndinoti kwamuri: Wese anotarisa mukadzi kuti amuchive, watoita upombwe naye mumoyo make.
Matthew 5:29 Uye kana ziso rako rerudyi richikugumbusa, uridzure urase kubva kwauri; nokuti zviri nani kwauri kuti umwe wemitezo yako uparare, kwete kuti muviri wako wese ukandirwe mugehena.
Matthew 5:30 Zvino kana ruoko rwako rwerudyi ruchikugumbusa, urugure urasire kure newe; nokuti zviri nani kwauri kuti umwe wemitezo yako uparare, kwete kuti muviri wako wese ukandirwe mugehena.
Matthew 5:31 Zvakanziwo: Ani nani anoramba mukadzi wake, ngaamupe rugwaro rwekurambana;
Matthew 5:32 asi ini ndinoti kwamuri: Ani nani anoramba mukadzi wake, kunze kwemhosva yeupombwe, anomuitisa upombwe; uye ani nani anowana wakarambwa anoita upombwe. <div eID="gen42" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 5:33 Zvekare makanzwa kuti zvakanzi kune vekare: Usapika nhema, asi uripire Ishe mhiko dzako;
Matthew 5:34 asi ini ndinoti kwamuri: Musatongopika; kana nedenga, nokuti chigaro chaMwari cheushe;
Matthew 5:35 kana nenyika, nokuti chitsiko chetsoka dzake; kana neJerusarema, nokuti iguta raMambo mukuru;
Matthew 5:36 uye usapika nemusoro wako, nokuti haugoni kuita ruvhudzi rumwe ruchena kana rutema.
Matthew 5:37 Asi shoko renyu ngarive: Hongu, hongu; kwete, kwete; chinopfuura izvi chinobva kune wakaipa. <div eID="gen43" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen39" type="section"/>
Matthew 5:38 Makanzwa kuti zvakanzi: Ziso neziso, uye zino nezino;
Matthew 5:39 asi ini ndinoti kwamuri: Musapikisa wakaipa; asi ani nani anokurova padama rako rerudyi, umutendeusire rimwewo.
Matthew 5:40 Neanoda kukusungisa, nekutora shati yako, umutendere nguvo <transChange type="added">yako</transChange>wo.
Matthew 5:41 Ani nani anokumanikidza kuenda maira imwe uende naye mbiri.
Matthew 5:42 Ipa anokumbira kwauri, usafuratira anoda kukwereta kwauri. <div eID="gen45" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 5:43 Makanzwa kuti zvakanzi: Ude umwe wako, uvenge muvengi wako.
Matthew 5:44 Asi ini ndinoti kwamuri: Idai vavengi venyu, ropafadzai vanokutukai, batai zvakanaka vanokuvengai, munyengeterere vanokubatai zvakaipa vachikushushai.
Matthew 5:45 Kuti muve vana vaBaba venyu vari kumatenga, nokuti vanobudisira zuva ravo kune vakaipa nevakanaka, nemvura vanoinaisira vakarurama nevasakarurama.
Matthew 5:46 Nokuti kana muchida vanokudai, mune mubairo wei? Ko, vateresiwo havaiti izvozvo here?
Matthew 5:47 Uye kana muchikwazisa vamwe venyu chete, munoita zvikuru kupfuura <transChange type="added">vamwe</transChange> nei? Ko, vateresiwo havaiti saizvozvo here?
Matthew 5:48 Naizvozvo imwi muve vakakwana, saBaba venyu vari kumatenga vakakwana.  <chapter eID="Matt.5"/><div eID="gen46" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen44" type="section"/>
Matthew 6:0 <div sID="gen47" type="section"/> <chapter n="6" osisID="Matt.6" sID="Matt.6"/>  <div sID="gen48" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 6:1 Chenjerai kuti basa renyu rerudo musariita pamberi pevanhu kuti muonekwe navo; kana zvisakadaro hamuna mubairo kuna Baba venyu vari kumatenga.
Matthew 6:2 Naizvozvo kana uchiita basa rerudo, rega kuridza hwamanda pamberi pako sezvinoita vanyepedzeri mumasinagoge nemunzira dzemumaguta kuti vakudzwe nevanhu. Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Vagamuchira mubairo wavo.
Matthew 6:3 Asi iwe kana uchiita basa rerudo, ruboshwe rwako ngarurege kuziva zvinoita rudyi rwako.
Matthew 6:4 Kuti kuita kwako basa rerudo kuve pakavanda; uye Baba vako vanoona pakavanda, ivo vachakuripira pachena. <div eID="gen48" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen47" type="section"/>
Matthew 6:5 Zvino kana uchinyengetera, usava sevanyepedzeri; nokuti vanoda kunyengetera vamire mumasinagoge nepamharadzano dzenzira dzemumaguta kuti vaonekwe nevanhu. Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Vagamuchira mubairo wavo.
Matthew 6:6 Asi iwe kana uchinyengetera, pinda muimba yako yemukati, ugovhara mukova wako, unyengetere kuna Baba vako vari pakavanda; zvino Baba vako vanoona pakavanda vachakuripira pachena.
Matthew 6:7 Asi kana muchinyengetera, musapamhidzira-pamhidzira zvisina maturo sevahedheni; nokuti vanofunga kuti vachanzwikwa nekutaura kwavo kuzhinji.
Matthew 6:8 Naizvozvo musafanana navo; nokuti Baba venyu vanoziva chamunoshaiwa musati mavakumbira. <div eID="gen50" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen49" type="section"/>
Matthew 6:9 Naizvozvo imwi nyengeterai seizvi: Baba vedu vari kumatenga, zita renyu ngariitwe dzvene;
Matthew 6:10 ushe hwenyu ngahuuye; chido chenyu ngachiitwe panyikawo se<transChange type="added">zvachinoitwa</transChange> kudenga;
Matthew 6:11 mutipei nhasi kudya kwedu kwemisi yese;
Matthew 6:12 uye mutikanganwire mangava edu, isu sezvatinokanganwirawo vane ngava nesu;
Matthew 6:13 uye musatipinza pakuedzwa, asi mutisunungure pakuipa. Nokuti ushe ndehwenyu nesimba nekubwinya kusvikira rinhi narinhi. Ameni.
Matthew 6:14 Nokuti kana muchikanganwira vanhu kudarika kwavo, Baba venyu vari kudenga vachakukanganwiraiwo.
Matthew 6:15 Asi kana musingakanganwiri vanhu kudarika kwavo, Baba venyu havangakanganwiriwo kudarika kwenyu. <div eID="gen52" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen51" type="section"/>
Matthew 6:16 Uyezve kana muchitsanya, musava nezviso zvinopunyaira sevanyepedzeri; nokuti vanounyanisa zviso zvavo, kuti vaonekwe nevanhu kuti vanotsanya. Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Vagamuchira mubairo wavo.
Matthew 6:17 Asi iwe kana uchitsanya, zodza musoro wako, ugeze chiso chako,
Matthew 6:18 kuti urege kuonekwa kuvanhu kuti unotsanya, asi kuna Baba vako vari pakavanda; zvino Baba vako vanoona pakavanda vachakuripira pachena. <div eID="gen54" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen53" type="section"/>
Matthew 6:19 Regai kuzviunganidzira fuma panyika, pane chifusi nengura zvinoodza, nepane mbavha dzinopaza dzichiba;
Matthew 6:20 asi muzviunganidzire fuma kudenga, uko kusina chifusi kana ngura zvinoodza, naapo mbavha padzisingapazi kana kuba.
Matthew 6:21 Nokuti pane fuma yenyu, ndipo pachavawo nemoyo yenyu. <div eID="gen56" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 6:22 Mwenje wemuviri iziso; naizvozvo kana ziso rako riri benyu, muviri wako wese uchazara nechiedza.
Matthew 6:23 Asi kana ziso rako rakaipa, muviri wako wese uchazara nerima. Naizvozvo kana chiedza chiri mauri chiri rima, rima iro iguru sei! <div eID="gen57" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 6:24 Hapana angashumira vatenzi vaviri; nokuti achavenga umwe, akada umwe; kana achanamatira umwe, akazvidza umwe. Hamungashumiri Mwari naMamona*. <div eID="gen58" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen55" type="section"/>
Matthew 6:25 Naizvozvo ndinoti kwamuri: Musafunganya pamusoro peupenyu hwenyu, zvamuchadya kana zvamuchanwa, kana pamusoro pemuviri wenyu, zvamuchapfeka. Upenyu hahupfuuri kudya here, nemuviri chipfeko?
Matthew 6:26 Tarirai shiri dzedenga, nokuti hadzidzvari kana kukohwa kana kuunganidza mumatura, asi Baba venyu vekudenga vanodzirurira. Imwi hamudzipfuuri zvikuru here?
Matthew 6:27 Ndiani kwamuri nekufunganya angawedzera mbimbi imwe paurefu hwake?
Matthew 6:28 Nepamusoro pezvipfeko munofunganyirei? Nyatsorangarirai midovatova yenyika, inokura sei; haishingairi, hairuki;
Matthew 6:29 asi ndinoti kwamuri: Kunyange Soromoni pakubwinya kwake kwese haana kupfekedzwa seimwe yeiyi.
Matthew 6:30 Zvino kana Mwari achifukidza saizvozvo uswa hwenyika, huripo nhasi, hunokandirwa muchoto mangwana, haanga<transChange type="added">kufukidziyi</transChange> nekupfuurisa here imwi verutendo rudiki?
Matthew 6:31 Naizvozvo musafunganya, muchiti: Tichadyei? Kana: Tichanwei? Kana: Tichafukei?
Matthew 6:32 Nokuti izvozvi zvese vahedheni vanozvitsvaka, nokuti Baba venyu vekudenga vanoziva kuti munoshaiwa izvozvi zvese.
Matthew 6:33 Asi tangai kutsvaka ushe hwaMwari, nekururama kwake, zvino izvozvi zvese zvichawedzerwa kwamuri.
Matthew 6:34 Naizvozvo musafunganyira mangwana, nokuti mangwana achazvifunganyira zvinhu zvawo. Zuva rakakwanirwa nezvakaipa zvaro.  <chapter eID="Matt.6"/><div eID="gen60" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen59" type="section"/>
Matthew 7:0 <div sID="gen61" type="section"/> <chapter n="7" osisID="Matt.7" sID="Matt.7"/>  <div sID="gen62" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 7:1 Musatonga, kuti murege kutongwa,
Matthew 7:2 nokuti muchatongwa nekutonga kwamunotonga nako; uye muchayerwa zvekare nechiyero chamunoyera nacho.
Matthew 7:3 Unotarisirei rubanzu rwuri muziso reumwe wako, asi usingananzereri danda riri muziso rako?
Matthew 7:4 Kana ungataura sei kune umwe wako <transChange type="added">uchiti</transChange>: Rega ndivhomore rubanzu muziso rako, asi tarira, danda riri muziso rako?
Matthew 7:5 Munyepedzeri, tanga kuvhomora danda muziso rako, ugoona kwazvo kuvhomora rubanzu muziso reumwe wako. <div eID="gen62" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 7:6 Musapa chitsvene kuimbwa, kana kukandira maparera* enyu pamberi penguruve, zvimwe dzingaatsika netsoka dzadzo, dzikatendeuka dzikakubvamburai. <div eID="gen63" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen61" type="section"/>
Matthew 7:7 Kumbirai, uye muchapiwa; tsvakai, uye muchawana; gogodzai, uye muchazarurirwa.
Matthew 7:8 Nokuti umwe neumwe anokumbira anogamuchira, neanotsvaka anowana, neanogogodza anozarurirwa.
Matthew 7:9 Kana ndeupi munhu kwamuri, iye kana mwanakomana wake akakumbira chingwa, achamupa ibwe?
Matthew 7:10 Kana kuti akakumbira hove, achamupa nyoka?
Matthew 7:11 Zvino kana imwi makaipa muchiziva kupa vana venyu zvipo zvakanaka, Baba venyu vari kumatenga vachapfuurisa sei kupa zvinhu zvakanaka ivo vanovakumbira?
Matthew 7:12 Naizvozvo zvinhu zvese zvamunoda kuti vanhu vakuitirei, imwi muvaitirewo saizvozvo; nokuti uyu ndiwo murairo nevaporofita. <div eID="gen65" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen64" type="section"/>
Matthew 7:13 Pindai nesuwo rakamanikana; nokuti suwo rakafara nenzira yakapamhamha inoenda kukuparadzwa, uye vazhinji varipo vanopinda naro.
Matthew 7:14 Nokuti suwo rakamanikana nenzira nhete inoenda kuupenyu, uye vashoma vanoiwana. <div eID="gen67" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen66" type="section"/>
Matthew 7:15 Asi chenjerai vaporofita venhema, vanouya kwamuri nezvipfeko zvemakwai, asi mukati mapumhi anoparadza.
Matthew 7:16 Muchavaziva nezvibereko zvavo; vanhu vanotanha mazambiringa paminzwa here, kana maonde parubayambeva?
Matthew 7:17 Saizvozvo muti umwe neumwe wakanaka unobereka zvibereko zvakanaka, asi muti wakaipa unobereka zvibereko zvakaipa.
Matthew 7:18 Muti wakanaka haugoni kubereka zvibereko zvakaipa, nemuti wakaipa haubereki zvibereko zvakanaka.
Matthew 7:19 Muti umwe neumwe usingaiti chibereko chakanaka unotemwa wokandirwa mumoto.
Matthew 7:20 Naizvozvo kubva pazvibereko zvavo muchavaziva. <div eID="gen69" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen68" type="section"/>
Matthew 7:21 Haasi wese anoti kwandiri: Ishe, Ishe, achapinda muushe hwekumatenga; asi anoita kuda kwaBaba vangu vari kumatenga.
Matthew 7:22 Vazhinji vachati kwandiri pazuva iro: Ishe, Ishe, hatina kuporofita muzita renyu here, tikabudisa madhimoni muzita renyu, tikaita mabasa esimba mazhinji muzita renyu?
Matthew 7:23 Zvino ipapo ndichareva kwavari pachena ndichiti: Handina kukuzivai chero nguva; ibvai kwandiri imwi vaiti vezvakaipa. <div eID="gen71" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen70" type="section"/>
Matthew 7:24 Naizvozvo umwe neumwe anonzwa mashoko angu awa uye akaaita, ndichamufananidza nemurume wakachenjera, wakavaka imba yake paruware.
Matthew 7:25 Zvino mvura ikaturuka, mafashame akauya, mitutu ikavhuvhuta, ikarova paimba iyo, ikasawa; nokuti yakange yakateyiwa paruware.
Matthew 7:26 Zvino umwe neumwe anonzwa mashoko angu awa, akasaaita, uchafananidzwa nemurume benzi, wakavaka imba yake pajecha;
Matthew 7:27 zvino mvura ikaturuka, mafashame ndokuuya, mitutu ndokuvhuvhuta, ndokurova paimba iyo, ndokuwa; uye kuwa kwayo kukava kukuru. <div eID="gen73" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 7:28 Zvino zvakaitika kuti Jesu apedza mashoko iwawa, zvaunga zvakashamiswa nedzidziso yake.
Matthew 7:29 Nokuti wakavadzidzisa seune simba, kwete sevanyori. <chapter eID="Matt.7"/><div eID="gen74" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen72" type="section"/>
Matthew 8:0 <div sID="gen75" type="section"/> <chapter n="8" osisID="Matt.8" sID="Matt.8"/>  <div sID="gen76" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 8:1 Wakati aburuka mugomo, zvaunga zvikuru zvakamutevera.
Matthew 8:2 Zvino tarira, kwakauya ane maperembudzi, akamunamata achiti: Ishe, kana muchida, munogona kundinatsa.
Matthew 8:3 Jesu akatandavadza ruoko, akamubata, achiti: Ndinoda, natswa. Pakarepo maperembudzi ake akanatswa.
Matthew 8:4 Zvino Jesu akati kwaari: Ona kuti usaudza munhu, asi enda unozviratidza kumupristi, ubaire chipo Mozisi chaakaraira, chive uchapupu kwavari. <div eID="gen76" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen75" type="section"/>
Matthew 8:5 Zvino Jesu wakati apinda muKapenaume, kwakauya kwaari mukuru wezana, achimukumbirisa,
Matthew 8:6 achiti: Ishe, muranda wangu arere kumba wakafa mitezo, anotambudzika kwazvo.
Matthew 8:7 Zvino Jesu akati kwaari: Ini ndichauya ndimuporese.
Matthew 8:8 Mukuru wezana akapindura akati: Ishe, handina kufanira kuti mupinde pasi pedenga rangu remba; asi taurai shoko chete, zvino muranda wangu achaporeswa.
Matthew 8:9 Nokuti neniwo ndiri munhu ari pasi pesimba, ndine mauto pasi pangu; zvino ndinoti kune uyu: Enda; anoenda; nekune umwe: Uya; anouya; nekumuranda wangu: Ita ichi; anoita.
Matthew 8:10 Jesu wakati achi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa akashamisika, akati kune vai<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>tevera: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Handina kuwana rutendo rukuru rwakadai kunyange pakati paIsraeri.
Matthew 8:11 Zvino ndinoti kwamuri: Vazhinji vachauya vachibva kumabvazuva nemavirira, vachagara pakudya naAbhurahama, naIsaka, naJakobho, muushe hwekumatenga;
Matthew 8:12 asi vana veushe vachakandirwa kunze kurima rekunze kwekupedzisira; ikoko kuchava nekuchema nekugeda-geda kwemeno.
Matthew 8:13 Zvino Jesu akati kumukuru wezana: Enda, zviitirwe kwauri sezvawakatenda. Muranda wake akapora nenguva iyoyo. <div eID="gen78" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen77" type="section"/>
Matthew 8:14 Jesu wakati apinda mumba maPetro, akaona mai vemukadzi wake vakaradzikwa vane fivhiri.
Matthew 8:15 Akabata ruoko rwavo, fivhiri ikabva kwavari; vakasimuka vakavashandira. <div eID="gen80" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 8:16 Zvino ava madekwani vakauisa kwaari vazhinji vaiva vakagarwa nemadhimoni; akabudisa mweya neshoko, akaporesa vese vairwara;
Matthew 8:17 kuti zvizadziswe zvakataurwa naIsaya muporofita achiti: Iye wakatora utera hwedu, akatakura matenda <transChange type="added">edu</transChange>. <div eID="gen81" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen79" type="section"/>
Matthew 8:18 Jesu wakati achiona zvaunga zvikuru zvakamukomba, akaraira kuti vabve vaende mhiri.
Matthew 8:19 Umwe munyori ndokuswedera akati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, ndichakuteverai kwese kwamunoenda.
Matthew 8:20 Zvino Jesu akati kwaari: Makava ane mwena, neshiri dzedenga matendere; asi Mwanakomana wemunhu haana paangatsamhidza musoro.
Matthew 8:21 Umwe wevadzidzi vake akati kwaari: Ishe, ndiregei nditange ndaenda ndinoviga baba vangu.
Matthew 8:22 Asi Jesu wakati kwaari: Nditevere, urege vakafa vavige vakafa vavo. <div eID="gen83" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen82" type="section"/>
Matthew 8:23 Zvino wakati apinda muchikepe, vadzidzi vake vakamutevera.
Matthew 8:24 Zvino tarira, dutu guru remhepo rakamuka mugungwa, zvekuti igwa rakange rofukidzwa nemafungu; asi iye wakange arere.
Matthew 8:25 Zvino vadzidzi vake vakaswedera vakamumutsa vachiti: Ishe, tiponesei, toparara!
Matthew 8:26 Zvino akati kwavari: Munotyirei, imwi verutendo rudiki? Ndokusimuka, akatsiura mitutu negungwa; kudzikama kukuru kukavapo.
Matthew 8:27 Asi vanhu vakashamisika vachiti: Uyu <transChange type="added">munhu</transChange> rudzii kuti kunyange mitutu negungwa zvinomuteerera? <div eID="gen85" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen84" type="section"/>
Matthew 8:28 Wakati asvika kune rimwe divi kunyika yeVaGerigesi, vakamuchingamidza vaviri vaiva vakagarwa nemadhimoni, vachibuda kumarinda, vane hasha kwazvo-kwazvo, zvekuti kwakange kusina munhu waigona kupfuura nenzira iyo.
Matthew 8:29 Zvino tarira, vakadanidzira vachiti: Tinei nemwi, Jesu, Mwanakomana waMwari? Mauya pano kuzotirwadzisa nguva isati yasvika here?
Matthew 8:30 Zvino kure navo kwakange kune boka renguruve zhinji richifura.
Matthew 8:31 Madhimoni akamugombetedza achiti: Kana muchitibudisa, titenderei kuti tiende tinopinda muboka renguruve.
Matthew 8:32 Zvino akati kwaari: Endai. Zvino akati abuda, akapinda muboka renguruve; zvino tarira, boka rese renguruve rakapitirikira kumateru kugungwa, dzikafira mumvura.
Matthew 8:33 Zvino vaidzifudza vakatiza, vakaenda kuguta, vakapira zvese uye zvevakange vane madhimoni.
Matthew 8:34 Zvino tarira, guta rese rakabuda kunochingamidza Jesu; zvino vakati vamuona, vakagombetedza kuti abve pamiganhu yavo. <chapter eID="Matt.8"/><div eID="gen87" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen86" type="section"/>
Matthew 9:0 <div sID="gen88" type="section"/> <chapter n="9" osisID="Matt.9" sID="Matt.9"/>  <div sID="gen89" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 9:1 Akabva apinda mugwa, akayambuka ndokusvika muguta rake pachake. <div eID="gen89" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 9:2 Zvino tarira, vakauisa kwaari wakafa mitezo, arere pahwanyanza; zvino Jesu achiona rutendo rwavo akati kune wakafa mitezo: Tsunga moyo, mwana, wakanganwirwa zvivi zvako.
Matthew 9:3 Zvino tarira, vamwe vevanyori vakati mukati mavo: Uyu unonyomba.
Matthew 9:4 Asi Jesu achiona mifungo yavo wakati: Imwi munofungirei zvakaipa mumoyo yenyu?
Matthew 9:5 Nokuti ndechipi chakareruka, kuti: Wakanganwirwa zvivi; kana kuti: Simuka ufambe?
Matthew 9:6 Asi kuti muzive kuti Mwanakomana wemunhu ane simba panyika rekukanganwira zvivi (wakabva ati kune wakange akafa mitezo): Simuka, tora hwanyanza hwako, uende kumba kwako.
Matthew 9:7 Akasimuka, akaenda kumba kwake.
Matthew 9:8 Zvaunga zvakati zvichi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ona zvikashamisika, zvikarumbidza Mwari wakapa simba rakadai kuvanhu. <div eID="gen90" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen88" type="section"/>
Matthew 9:9 Zvino Jesu wakati achipfuurapo akaona munhu anonzi Matewu agere pahofisi yemutero, akati kwaari: Nditevere! Ndokusimuka, akamutevera. <div eID="gen92" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 9:10 Uye zvakaitika agere pakudya mumba, zvino tarira, vateresi vazhinji nevatadzi vakauya vakagara pakudya naJesu nevadzidzi vake.
Matthew 9:11 Zvino VaFarisi vakati vachi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ona, vakati kuvadzidzi vake: Nemhaka yei Mudzidzisi wenyu achidya nevateresi nevatadzi?
Matthew 9:12 Asi Jesu wakati anzwa, akati kwavari: Vatano havadi murapi asi vanorwara.
Matthew 9:13 Asi endai mudzidze kuti zvinorevei <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Ndinoda tsitsi uye kwete chibairo; nokuti handina kuuya kuzodana vakarurama, asi vatadzi vauye mukutendeuka. <div eID="gen93" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen91" type="section"/>
Matthew 9:14 Ipapo kwakasvika kwaari vadzidzi vaJohwani, vachiti: Nemhaka yei isu neVaFarisi tichitsanya kazhinji, asi vadzidzi venyu vasingatsanyi?
Matthew 9:15 Jesu ndokuti kwavari: Vana veimba yemuchato vanogona kuchema here apo muwani anavo? Asi mazuva achasvika pachabviswa muwani kwavari, ipapo vachatsanya.
Matthew 9:16 Hakuna anoisa chigamba chemucheka usakaunyana panguvo sharu, nokuti icho chinonamirwa pairi chinobvarura panguvo, buri rikanyanya.
Matthew 9:17 Uye havadiri waini itsva muhombodo tsaru; zvikasadaro hombodo dzinoputika, waini ikateuka, nehombodo dzikaparara; asi vanodira waini itsva muhombodo itsva, zvichengeteke zviri zviviri. <div eID="gen95" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen94" type="section"/>
Matthew 9:18 Wakati achitaura zvinhu izvozvi kwavari, tarira, kwakasvika umwe mutungamiriri akamunamata, akati: Mukunda wangu achangofa; asi uyai muise ruoko rwenyu pamusoro pake, uye achararama.
Matthew 9:19 Jesu ndokusimuka akamutevera, nevadzidzi vake. <div eID="gen97" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 9:20 Zvino, tarira, mukadzi waiva nekubuda ropa makore gumi nemaviri, wakaswedera shure <transChange type="added">kwake</transChange>, akabata mupendero wenguvo yake.
Matthew 9:21 Nokuti wakati mukati make: Kana ndikangobata nguvo yake, ndichaporeswa.
Matthew 9:22 Asi Jesu wakatendeuka akati amuona, akati: Mukunda, tsunga moyo; rutendo rwako rwakuponesa. Mukadzi ndokuponeswa kubva panguva iyo. <div eID="gen98" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 9:23 Jesu ndokusvika mumba memutungamiriri akaona varidzi venyere nechaunga chichiita mhere-mhere,
Matthew 9:24 akati kwavari: Ibvai; nokuti musikana haana kufa, asi arere. Ndokumuseka vachimusvavaidza.
Matthew 9:25 Asi chaunga chakati chabudiswa, akapinda, ndokubata ruoko rwake, musikana ndokumuka.
Matthew 9:26 Mukurumbira uyu ukabudira kunyika iyo yese. <div eID="gen99" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen96" type="section"/>
Matthew 9:27 Zvino Jesu wakati opfuurapo, mapofu maviri akamutevera, achidanidzira achiti: Tinzwirei tsitsi, Mwanakomana waDhavhidhi!
Matthew 9:28 Zvino wakati apinda mumba, mapofu akauya kwaari; Jesu akati kwaari: Munotenda kuti ndinogona kuita izvozvi here? Akati kwaari: Hongu, Ishe.
Matthew 9:29 Ipapo wakabata meso avo achiti: Ngazviitike kwamuri maererano nerutendo rwenyu.
Matthew 9:30 Zvino meso avo akasvinudzwa; Jesu akavarairisa achiti: Onai kuti hakuna anozviziva.
Matthew 9:31 Asi vakati vabuda, vakaparidzira mukurumbira wake munyika iyo yese. <div eID="gen101" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 9:32 Zvino vakati vachibuda, tarira, vakauisa kwaari munhu chimumumu waiva akagarwa nedhimoni.
Matthew 9:33 Zvino dhimoni rakati rabudiswa, chimumumu chikataura; zvaunga zvikashamisika zvikati: Hakuna kumboonekwa zvakadai muna Israeri.
Matthew 9:34 Asi VaFarisi vakati: Anobudisa madhimoni nemukuru wemadhimoni. <div eID="gen102" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 9:35 Zvino Jesu wakapota nemaguta ese nemisha, achidzidzisa mumasinagoge avo, nekuparidza evhangeri yeushe, nekuporesa denda rese neurwere hwese pakati pevanhu.
Matthew 9:36 Asi wakati achiona zvaunga, akavanzwira tsitsi, nokuti vakange vaneta, vakapararira semakwai asina mufudzi.
Matthew 9:37 Ipapo akati kuvadzidzi vake: Zvirokwazvo goho iguru, asi vashandi vashoma;
Matthew 9:38 naizvozvo kumbirisai kuna Ishe wegoho, kuti atumire vashandi pagoho rake. <chapter eID="Matt.9"/><div eID="gen103" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen100" type="section"/>
Matthew 10:0 <div sID="gen104" type="section"/> <chapter n="10" osisID="Matt.10" sID="Matt.10"/>  <div sID="gen105" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 10:1 Zvino wakadanira kwaari vadzidzi vake gumi nevaviri, akavapa simba pamusoro pemweya yetsvina, kuti vaibudise nekuporesa denda rese neurwere hwese. <div eID="gen105" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 10:2 Zvino mazita evaapositori gumi nevaviri ndiwawa: Wekutanga, Simoni, anonzi Petro, naAndiriya munin'ina wake; Jakobho waZebhedhi, naJohwani munin'ina wake;
Matthew 10:3 Firipi, naBhatoromeo; Tomasi, naMatewu muteresi; Jakobho waArifiyo, naRebheu wainziwo Tadhiyo;
Matthew 10:4 Simoni muKenani, naJudhasi Isikariyoti iyewo wakamutengesa. <div eID="gen106" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 10:5 Ava gumi nevaviri Jesu akavatuma, akavaraira, achiti: Musaenda munzira yevahedheni, musapinda muguta reVaSamaria;
Matthew 10:6 asi zvikuru muende kumakwai akarasika eimba yaIsraeri.
Matthew 10:7 Zvino pakufamba, muparidze muchiti: Ushe hwekumatenga hwaswedera.
Matthew 10:8 Poresai vanorwara, natsai vane maperembudzi, mutsai vakafa, budisai madhimoni. Makagamuchira pachena, ipai pachena.
Matthew 10:9 Musawana goridhe, kana sirivheri, kana ndarira mumabhanhire enyu,
Matthew 10:10 kana homwe yerwendo, kana nguvo refu mbiri, kana manyatera, kana tsvimbo; nokuti mushandi wakafanira kudya kwake.
Matthew 10:11 Muguta ripi neripi kana mumusha wamunopinda, bvunzai kuti ndiani mauri wakafanira, mugarepo, kusvikira muchibva.
Matthew 10:12 Zvino kana muchipinda muimba, muikwazise.
Matthew 10:13 Uye kana imba yakafanira, rugare rwenyu ngaruuye pamusoro payo; asi kana isingafaniri, rugare rwenyu ngarudzokere kwamuri.
Matthew 10:14 Uye ani nani usingakugamuchiriyi, kana kuteerera mashoko enyu, kana muchibuda paimba iyo kana paguta iro, zuzai guruva retsoka dzenyu.
Matthew 10:15 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Zvichava nani kunyika yeSodhoma neyeGomora nezuva rekutongwa kupfuura guta iro. <div eID="gen107" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 10:16 Tarirai, ini ndinokutumai semakwai pakati pemapumhi; naizvozvo chenjerai senyoka, mururame senjiva.
Matthew 10:17 Asi svinurirai vanhu; nokuti vachakukumikidzai kumatare emakurukota, uye vachakurovai netyava mumasinagoge avo;
Matthew 10:18 zvino muchauiswawo pamberi pevatungamiriri nemadzimambo nekuda kwangu, huve uchapupu kwavari nekuvahedheni.
Matthew 10:19 Asi kana vachikukumikidzai, musafunganya kuti muchataura sei kana chii; nokuti muchapiwa nenguva iyo chamuchataura.
Matthew 10:20 Nokuti hamusi imwi munotaura, asi Mweya waBaba venyu anotaura mamuri.
Matthew 10:21 Mwanakomana wamai achakumikidza mwanakomana wamai kurufu, nababa mwana; uye vana vachamukira vabereki nekuvauraya.
Matthew 10:22 Uye muchavengwa nevese nekuda kwezita rangu; asi anotsungirira kusvika pakuguma, ndiye achaponeswa.
Matthew 10:23 Asi kana vachikushushai muguta iri, tizirai kune rimwe; nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Hamungatongopedzi maguta aIsraeri, kusvikira Mwanakomana wemunhu asvika.
Matthew 10:24 Mudzidzi haasi pamusoro pemudzidzisi, kana muranda pamusoro paishe wake.
Matthew 10:25 Zvakaringanira mudzidzi kuti ave semudzidzisi wake, nemuranda saishe wake. Kana vaidza Ishe weimba <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> Bheerizebhuri, <transChange type="added">vachadaro </transChange>zvikuru sei veimba yake! <div eID="gen108" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen104" type="section"/>
Matthew 10:26 Naizvozvo musavatya; nokuti hakuna chakafukidzwa chisingazobvundunurwi, kana chakavanzika chisingazozikanwi.
Matthew 10:27 Zvandinokuudzai murima, taurai pachiedza, nezvamunonzwa munzeve, paridzirai pamusoro pematenga edzimba.
Matthew 10:28 Uye musatya vanouraya muviri, asi havagoni kuuraya mweya; asi mutye zvikuru uyo anogona kuparadza zvese mweya nemuviri mugehena. <div eID="gen110" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 10:29 Ko tushiri tuviri hatutengeswi nekobiri here? Asi kamwe kadzo hakangawiri pasi kunze <transChange type="added">kwekuda</transChange> kwaBaba venyu.
Matthew 10:30 Asi nevhudzi remusoro wenyu rakaverengwa rese.
Matthew 10:31 Naizvozvo musatya, imwi munopfuura tushiri tuzhinji. <div eID="gen111" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 10:32 Naizvozvo umwe neumwe achandibvuma pamberi pevanhu, ini ndichamubvumawo pamberi paBaba vangu vari kumatenga.
Matthew 10:33 Asi ani nani anondiramba pamberi pevanhu, neni ndichamuramba pamberi paBaba vangu vari kumatenga. <div eID="gen112" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen109" type="section"/>
Matthew 10:34 Musafunga kuti ndakauya kuzoisa rugare panyika; handina kuuya kuzoisa rugare, asi munondo.
Matthew 10:35 Nokuti ndakauya kuzopesanisa munhu nababa vake, nemukunda namai vake, nemuroora navamwene vake;
Matthew 10:36 nevavengi vemunhu ndeveimba yake.
Matthew 10:37 Anoda baba kana mai kupfuura ini haana kufanira ini; neanoda mwanakomana kana mukunda kupfuura ini haana kufanira ini;
Matthew 10:38 uye asingatori muchinjikwa wake akanditevera, haana kufanira ini.
Matthew 10:39 Anowana mweya wake acharasikirwa nawo; asi anorasikirwa nemweya wake nekuda kwangu achauwana.
Matthew 10:40 Uyo anogamuchira imwi anogamuchira ini; neanogamuchira ini anogamuchira iye wakandituma. <div eID="gen114" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 10:41 Anogamuchira muporofita muzita remuporofita achawana mubairo wemuporofita; neanogamuchira wakarurama muzita rewakarurama achawana mubairo wewakarurama.
Matthew 10:42 Uye ani nani anonwisa umwe wevadiki ava mukombe chete <transChange type="added">wemvura</transChange> inotonhorera muzita remudzidzi, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Haangatongorasikirwi nemubairo wake.  <chapter eID="Matt.10"/><div eID="gen115" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 11:0 <div sID="gen116" type="x-p"/><chapter n="11" osisID="Matt.11" sID="Matt.11"/>
Matthew 11:1 Zvino zvakaitika apo Jesu apedza kuraira vadzidzi vake gumi nevaviri, akabvira ipapo kudzidzisa nekuparidza pamaguta avo. <div eID="gen116" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen113" type="section"/>
Matthew 11:2 Zvino Johwani wakati anzwa <transChange type="added">ari</transChange> mutirongo mabasa aKristu, akatuma vaviri vevadzidzi vake,
Matthew 11:3 akati kwaari: Imwi ndimwi anouya here, kana titarisire umwe?
Matthew 11:4 Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Endai munoudza Johwani zvinhu zvamunonzwa nezvamunoona:
Matthew 11:5 Mapofu anoonazve, uye mhetamakumbo dzinofamba, vane maperembudzi vanonatswa, nevematsi vanonzwa, vakafa vanomutswa, nevarombo vanoparidzirwa evhangeri;
Matthew 11:6 wakaropafadzwa ani nani asingagumbuswi neni. <div eID="gen118" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 11:7 Ava vakati vachienda, Jesu akatanga kuudza zvaunga pamusoro paJohwani <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Makange mabuda kurenje kunoonei? Rutsanga rwunozungunuswa nemhepo here?
Matthew 11:8 Asi makange mabuda kunoonei? Munhu wakapfeka nguvo dzakapfava here? Tarirai, vanopfeka zvakapfava vari mudzimba dzemadzimambo.
Matthew 11:9 Asi makange mabuda kunoonei? Muporofita here? Hongu, ndinoti kwamuri: Kunyange anopfuura kwazvo muporofita;
Matthew 11:10 nokuti uyu ndiye wakanyorwa pamusoro pake <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Tarira, ini ndinotuma mutumwa wangu pamberi pechiso chako, achagadzira nzira yako pamberi pako.
Matthew 11:11 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Hakuna kumuka pakati pevakaberekwa nevakadzi mukuru kuna Johwani Mubhabhatidzi. Asi mudikisa muushe hwekumatenga mukuru kwaari.
Matthew 11:12 Uye kubva pamazuva aJohwani Mubhabhatidzi kusvikira zvino, ushe hwekumatenga hunopambiwa, nevapambi vanohutora nesimba.
Matthew 11:13 Nokuti vaporofita vese nemurairo vakaporofita kusvikira kuna Johwani;
Matthew 11:14 zvino kana muchida ku<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>gamuchira, uyu ndiye Eria wakange achizouya.
Matthew 11:15 Une nzeve dzekunzwa, ngaanzwe. <div eID="gen119" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 11:16 Asi ndicharifananidza nei zera iri? Rakafanana nevana vagere pamisika, vachidanidzira kushamwari dzavo,
Matthew 11:17 vachiti: Takakuridzirai nyere, asi hamuna kutamba; takakuririrai, asi hamuna kuchema.
Matthew 11:18 Nokuti Johwani wakauya asingadyi kana kunwa, asi vanoti: Ane dhimoni.
Matthew 11:19 Mwanakomana wemunhu wakauya achidya, achinwa, zvino vanoti: Tarirai munhu anokara uye munwi wewaini, shamwari yevateresi nevatadzi. Asi njere dzinonzi dzakarurama nevana vadzo. <div eID="gen120" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen117" type="section"/>
Matthew 11:20 Ipapo akatanga kutsiura maguta makange maitwa mabasa ake esimba mazhinji, nokuti haana kutendeuka, <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>:
Matthew 11:21 Une nhamo, Korazini! Une nhamo, Bhetisaidha! Nokuti dai akaitwa muTire neSidhoni mabasa esimba akaitwa mamuri, vangadai vakatendeuka kare vakapfeka masaga nedota.
Matthew 11:22 Asi ndinoti kwamuri: Zvichava nani kuTire neSidhoni nezuva rekutongwa kupfuura imwi.
Matthew 11:23 Newe Kapenaume, wakasimudzirwa kudenga, uchawisirwa pasi muhadhesi; nokuti dai akaitwa muSodhoma mabasa esimba akaitwa mauri, vangadai vachipo kusvikira zuva rino.
Matthew 11:24 Asi ndinoti kwamuri: Zvichava nani kunyika yeSodhoma nezuva rekutongwa kupfuura iwe. <div eID="gen122" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen121" type="section"/>
Matthew 11:25 Nenguva iyo Jesu akapindura akati: Ndinokutendai, Baba, Ishe wedenga nenyika, nokuti makavanzira zvinhu izvi vakachenjera nevakangwara, mukazvizarurira vacheche.
Matthew 11:26 Hongu Baba, nokuti zvakadaro zvakava zvakanaka pamberi penyu.
Matthew 11:27 Zvinhu zvese zvakakumikidzwa kwandiri naBaba vangu; uye hakuna anoziva Mwanakomana kunze kwaBaba; hakunazve anoziva Baba kunze kweMwanakomana, uye ani nani Mwanakomana waanenge achida kuzarurira. <div eID="gen124" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen123" type="section"/>
Matthew 11:28 Uyai kwandiri mese makaneta makaremerwa, uye ini ndichakupai zororo.
Matthew 11:29 Torai joko rangu <transChange type="added">muise</transChange> pamusoro penyu, mudzidze kwandiri, nokuti ndiri munyoro, ndakaderera mumoyo; uye muchawana zororo pamweya yenyu;
Matthew 11:30 nokuti joko rangu rakanakisa, nemutoro wangu wakareruka.  <chapter eID="Matt.11"/><div eID="gen126" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen125" type="section"/>
Matthew 12:0 <div sID="gen127" type="section"/> <chapter n="12" osisID="Matt.12" sID="Matt.12"/>  <div sID="gen128" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 12:1 Nenguva iyo Jesu wakagura nemumunda wezviyo nesabata; zvino vadzidzi vake vakange vane nzara, vakatanga kutanha hura ndokudya.
Matthew 12:2 Asi VaFarisi vakati vachiona vakati kwaari: Tarira, vadzidzi vako vanoita zvisingatenderwi kuitwa nesabata.
Matthew 12:3 Asi wakati kwavari: Hamuna kuverenga here Dhavhidhi zvaakaita paakange ava nenzara, iye nevakange vanaye;
Matthew 12:4 kuti wakapinda sei mumba maMwari, akadya zvingwa zvekuratidza, zvaakange asingatenderwi kuzvidya <transChange type="added">iye</transChange> kunyange nevaiva naye, kunze kwevapristi chete?
Matthew 12:5 Kana hamuna kuverenga here pamurairo, kuti nemasabata vapristi vanosvibisa masabata mutembere asi vasina chavangapomerwa?
Matthew 12:6 Asi ndinoti kwamuri: Pano pane mukuru kutembere.
Matthew 12:7 Asi dai maiziva kuti zvinorevei <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Ndinoda tsitsi kwete chibairo, mungadai musina kupa mhosva vasina mhosva.
Matthew 12:8 Nokuti Mwanakomana wemunhu ndiIshe kunyange wesabata. <div eID="gen128" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen127" type="section"/>
Matthew 12:9 Zvino wakati abvapo akapinda musinagoge ravo.
Matthew 12:10 Zvino tarira, kwakange kune munhu akange ane ruoko rwakawonyana. Vakamubvunza vachiti: Zvakatenderwa kuporesa nemasabata here? kuti vamupe mhosva.
Matthew 12:11 Asi wakati kwavari: Ndeupi munhu pakati penyu achava negwai rimwe, iro kana rikawira mugomba nemasabata, angarega kuribata akasimudza?
Matthew 12:12 Naizvozvo munhu anopfuura gwai zvikuru sei! Naizvozvo zvakatenderwa kuita zvakanaka nemasabata.
Matthew 12:13 Zvino akati kumunhu: Tandavadza ruoko rwako. Akarutandavadza, rwukaporeswa rwukagwinya serumwe. <div eID="gen130" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen129" type="section"/>
Matthew 12:14 Zvino VaFarisi vakabuda, vakaita dare pamusoro pake kuti vangamuparadza sei.
Matthew 12:15 Asi Jesu wakati aziva, akabvapo; zvaunga zvikuru zvikamutevera, akavaporesa vese.
Matthew 12:16 Akavarairisa kuti varege kumubudisa pachena.
Matthew 12:17 Kuti zvizadziswe zvakarehwa naIsaya muporofita, achiti:
Matthew 12:18 Tarira muranda wangu wandakasanangura, mudikanwi wangu, mweya wangu maunofara maari kwazvo. Ndichaisa Mweya wangu pamusoro pake, uye achazivisa vahedheni kutonga.
Matthew 12:19 Haangarwisi kana kudanidzira, uye hakuna achanzwa inzwi rake munzira dzemumaguta.
Matthew 12:20 Rutsanga rwakapwanyika haangaruvhuni, netambo yemwenje inopfungaira haangadzimi; kusvikira achituma kutonga mukukunda.
Matthew 12:21 Uye vahedheni vachavimba muzita rake. <div eID="gen132" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen131" type="section"/>
Matthew 12:22 Zvino kwakauyiswa kwaari wakagarwa nedhimoni, bofu uye mbeveve; akamuporesa, zvekuti bofu mbeveve rakati kutaura rikati kuona.
Matthew 12:23 Zvaunga zvese zvikashamisika zvikati: Ko uyu haasi Mwanakomana waDhavhidhi here?
Matthew 12:24 Asi VaFarisi vakati vachinzwa vakati: Uyu haabudisi madhimoni, kunze naBheerizebhuri mukuru wemadhimoni.
Matthew 12:25 Zvino Jesu wakaziva ndangariro dzavo, akati kwavari: Ushe humwe nehumwe hwakapesana huchizvipikisa hunoparadzwa, neguta rimwe nerimwe kana imba yakapesana ichizvipikisa haingamiri.
Matthew 12:26 Uye kana Satani achibudisa Satani, anopesana achizvipikisa; zvino ushe hwake huchamira sei?
Matthew 12:27 Uye kana ini ndichibudisa madhimoni naBheerizebhuri, vanakomana venyu vano<transChange type="added">a</transChange>budisa nani? Naizvozvo ivo vachava vatongi venyu.
Matthew 12:28 Asi kana ini ndichibudisa madhimoni neMweya waMwari, saka ushe hwaMwari hwasvika kwamuri.
Matthew 12:29 Kana munhu angapinda sei mumba mechikakarara akapamba nhumbi dzacho kunze kwekuti atanga kusunga chikakarara? Ipapo achapamba imba yake.
Matthew 12:30 Uyo asina ini, anopikisana neni, neasingaunganidzi neni, anoparadzira. <div eID="gen134" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 12:31 Naizvozvo ndinoti kwamuri: Vanhu vachakanganwirwa chivi chese nekunyomba, asi kunyomba Mweya hakungakanganwirwi vanhu.
Matthew 12:32 Uye ani nani anotaura shoko rinopikisa Mwanakomana wemunhu achakanganwirwa; asi ani nani anotaura achipikisa Mweya Mutsvene haangakanganwirwi, kana panguva ino kana kune inouya. <div eID="gen135" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 12:33 Kana itai muti uve wakanaka nechibereko chawo chakanaka, kana itai muti uve wakaipa nechibereko chawo chakaipa, nokuti muti unozikanwa nechibereko.
Matthew 12:34 Vana venyoka, mungagona sei kutaura zvinhu zvakanaka makaipa? Nokuti muromo unotaura kubva pazvizere mumoyo.
Matthew 12:35 Munhu wakanaka anobudisa zvinhu zvakanaka pafuma yakanaka yemoyo; nemunhu wakaipa anobudisa zvinhu zvakaipa pafuma yakaipa.
Matthew 12:36 Asi ndinoti kwamuri: Shoko rimwe nerimwe risina maturo vanhu ravanoreva, vachazvidavirira pamusoro paro nezuva rekutongwa.
Matthew 12:37 Nokuti nemashoko ako uchanzi wakarurama, uye nemashoko ako uchapiwa mhosva. <div eID="gen136" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen133" type="section"/>
Matthew 12:38 Zvino vamwe vevanyori neveVaFarisi vakapindura vakati: Mudzidzisi, tinoda kuona chiratidzo kubva kwamuri.
Matthew 12:39 Asi wakapindura akati kwavari: Zera rakaipa rinofeva rinotsvaka chiratidzo; asi hakuna chiratidzo chingapiwa kwariri, kunze kwechiratidzo chaJona muporofita.
Matthew 12:40 Nokuti Jona sezvaakava mudumbu rehove huru mazuva matatu neusiku utatu, saizvozvo Mwanakomana wemunhu achava mumoyo wenyika mazuva matatu neusiku utatu.
Matthew 12:41 Varume veNinivhi vachasimuka mukutongwa nezera iri, vacharipa mhosva; nokuti vakatendeuka nemharidzo yaJona; zvino tarirai, mukuru kuna Jona ari pano.
Matthew 12:42 Mambokadzi wechamhembe achasimuka mukutongwa nezera iri, agoripa mhosva; nokuti wakabva pamagumisiro enyika kuzonzwa uchenjeri hwaSoromoni; zvino tarirai, mukuru kuna Soromoni ari pano. <div eID="gen138" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen137" type="section"/>
Matthew 12:43 Zvino kana mweya wetsvina wabuda kumunhu, unofamba uchigura nzvimbo dzakawoma, uchitsvaka zororo, asi uchishaiwa.
Matthew 12:44 Zvino unoti: Ndichadzokera kumba kwangu kwandakabuda; uye uchisvika unoiwana isina chinhu, yakatsvairwa yakarongedzwa.
Matthew 12:45 Ipapo unoenda ndokutora pamwe naye mimwe mweya minomwe yakaipa kumupfuura pachake, ndokupinda ikagaramo; kugumawo kwemunhu uyu kwakaipa kupfuura kutanga. Zvichava saizvozvowo kuzera iri rakaipa. <div eID="gen140" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen139" type="section"/>
Matthew 12:46 Wakati achataura nezvaunga, tarira, mai nevanin'ina vake vakamira panze, vachitsvaka kutaura naye.
Matthew 12:47 Umwe ndokuti kwaari: Tarirai, mai venyu nevanin'ina venyu vamire panze, vachitsvaka kutaura nemwi.
Matthew 12:48 Asi wakapindura akati kuna iye wakamuudza: Mai vangu ndiani? Nevanin'ina vangu ndivana ani?
Matthew 12:49 Zvino wakatandavadzira ruoko rwake kuvadzidzi vake, akati: Tarirai, mai vangu nevanin'ina vangu.
Matthew 12:50 Nokuti ani nani unoita kuda kwaBaba vangu vari kumatenga, ndiye munin'ina wangu nehanzvadzi namai. <chapter eID="Matt.12"/><div eID="gen142" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen141" type="section"/>
Matthew 13:0 <div sID="gen143" type="section"/> <chapter n="13" osisID="Matt.13" sID="Matt.13"/>  <div sID="gen144" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 13:1 Nezuva iro, Jesu wakabuda mumba akagara pasi parutivi rwegungwa.
Matthew 13:2 Uye zvaunga zvikuru zvakaungana kwaari, kusvikira apinda muchikepe akagara pasi; nechaunga chese chakamira pamahombekombe. <div eID="gen144" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 13:3 Ndokutaura zvinhu zvizhinji kwavari nemifananidzo, achiti: Tarirai, mukushi wakabuda kunokusha.
Matthew 13:4 Zvino pakukusha kwake, imwe <transChange type="added">mbeu</transChange> yakawira kurutivi rwenzira; shiri dzikasvika dzikaidya.
Matthew 13:5 Imwe ikawira panzvimbo dzine mabwe, payakange isina ivhu zhinji; ikamera pakarepo, nokuti pakange pasina udziku hwevhu.
Matthew 13:6 Kuzoti zuva rabuda, yakapiswa, uye nokuti yakange isina mudzi, yakasvava.
Matthew 13:7 Asi imwe yakawira paminzwa; minzwa ikakura, ikaivhunga.
Matthew 13:8 Asi imwe yakawira muvhu rakanaka, ikabereka chibereko, imwe zana, neimwe makumi matanhatu, neimwe makumi matatu.
Matthew 13:9 Ane nzeve dzekunzwa, ngaanzwe. <div eID="gen145" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen143" type="section"/>
Matthew 13:10 Zvino vadzidzi vakasvika, vakati kwaari: Munotaurirei kwavari nemifananidzo?
Matthew 13:11 Akapindura akati kwavari: Nokuti kwakapiwa kwamuri kuziva zvakavanzika zveushe hwekumatenga, asi kwavari hakuna kupiwa.
Matthew 13:12 Nokuti ani nani anazvo achapiwa, uye achava nezvakawanda; asi ani nani asina achatorerwa kunyange nezvaanazvo.
Matthew 13:13 Naizvozvo ndinotaura kwavari nemifananidzo, kuti vachiona havaoni; uye vachinzwa havanzwi, uye havanzwisisi.
Matthew 13:14 Uye kwavari kwakazadziswa chiporofita chaIsaya chinoti: Nekunzwa muchanzwa, asi hamungatongonzwisisi; nekuona muchaona, asi hamungatongoonesesi.
Matthew 13:15 Nokuti moyo wevanhu ava wava mukukutu, uye vanonzwa nenzeve nemutsutsururu, nemeso avo vakaatsinzina; zvimwe varege kuona nemeso, uye vanzwe nenzeve, uye vanzwisise nemoyo, vatendeukewo, ndigovaporesa.
Matthew 13:16 Asi akaropafadzwa meso enyu, nokuti anoona; nenzeve dzenyu, nokuti dzinonzwa.
Matthew 13:17 Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Vaporofita nevakarurama vazhinji vakange vachishuva kuona zvamunoona, asi havana ku<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ona; nekunzwa zvamunonzwa, asi havana kunzwa. <div eID="gen147" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen146" type="section"/>
Matthew 13:18 Naizvozvo imwi inzwai mufananidzo wemukushi.
Matthew 13:19 Umwe neumwe anonzwa shoko reushe asi asinganzwisisi, wakaipa anosvika ndokubvuta chakakushwa mumoyo make. Uyu ndiye wakakushwa kurutivi rwenzira.
Matthew 13:20 Asi wakakushwa panzvimbo dzine mabwe, ndiye anonzwa shoko ndokurigamuchira pakarepo nemufaro;
Matthew 13:21 asi haana mudzi maari, asi anogara kwenguva, uye kana dambudziko kana kushushwa zvichiuya nekuda kweshoko, pakarepo anogumburwa.
Matthew 13:22 Uye wakakushwa paminzwa, ndiye anonzwa shoko, asi kufunganya kwenyika ino nekunyengera kwefuma zvinovhunga shoko, rova risingabereki.
Matthew 13:23 Asi wakakushwa muvhu rakanaka, ndiye anonzwa shoko akanzwisisa, anoberekawo zvibereko, achiita, umwe zana, neumwe makumi matanhatu, neumwe makumi matatu. <div eID="gen149" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen148" type="section"/>
Matthew 13:24 Wakaisa pamberi pavo umwe mufananidzo, achiti: Ushe hwekumatenga hunofananidzwa nemunhu wakakusha mbeu yakanaka mumunda make.
Matthew 13:25 Asi vanhu vakati varere, muvengi wake wakauya, akakusha mashawi pakati pezviyo, akaenda.
Matthew 13:26 Asi chipande chakati chamera nekubereka chibereko, zvino mashawi akaonekwawo.
Matthew 13:27 Zvino varanda vemwene weimba vakaswedera vakati kwaari: Ishe, hamuna kukusha mbeu yakanaka mumunda wenyu here? Zvino wawanepi mashawi?
Matthew 13:28 Akati kwavari: Muvengi waita izvi. Varanda vakati kwaari: Saka munoda kuti tinoaunganidza here?
Matthew 13:29 Asi wakati: Kwete, zvimwe kana muchiunganidza mashawi, mungadzura zviyo nawo.
Matthew 13:30 Regai zvikure pamwe zviri zviviri kusvikira pakukohwa; zvino nenguva yekukohwa ndichati kuvakohwi: Unganidzai pakutanga mashawi, muasunge mwanda kuti muapise; asi muunganidze zviyo mudura rangu. <div eID="gen151" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen150" type="section"/>
Matthew 13:31 Wakaisa pamberi pavo umwe mufananidzo achiti: Ushe hwekumatenga hwakafanana netsanga yemasitadha*, munhu yaanotora akaidzvara mumunda make.
Matthew 13:32 Iyo idiki zvirokwazvo pambeu dzese, asi kana yakura ihuru pamiriwo, inova muti, zvekuti shiri dzekudenga dzinouya dzichivaka matendere pamatavi awo. <div eID="gen153" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 13:33 Akataura umwe mufananidzo kwavari <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ushe hwekumatenga hwakafanana nembiriso, mukadzi yaakatora, akaiisa muzviyero zvitatu zveupfu kusvikira hwese hwaviriswa. <div eID="gen154" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 13:34 Izvi zvinhu zvese Jesu wakaudza zvaunga nemifananidzo, uye pasina mufananidzo haana kutaura kwavari;
Matthew 13:35 kuti chizadziswe chakarehwa nemuporofita, achiti: Ndichazarura muromo wangu nemifananidzo; ndichataura zvinhu zvakange zvakavanzika kubva pamavambo enyika. <div eID="gen155" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen152" type="section"/>
Matthew 13:36 Zvino Jesu wakati arega zvaunga zvichienda, akapinda mumba; vadzidzi vake vakaswedera kwaari, vachiti: Tidudzirei mufananidzo wemashawi emunda.
Matthew 13:37 Akapindura akati kwavari: Anokusha mbeu yakanaka Mwanakomana wemunhu;
Matthew 13:38 uye munda inyika; nembeu yakanaka ndivo vana veushe; asi mashawi vana vewakaipa.
Matthew 13:39 Uye muvengi wakaakusha ndidhiabhorosi; uye kukohwa kuguma kwenyika; nevakohwi vatumwa.
Matthew 13:40 Naizvozvo mashawi sezvaanounganidzwa achipiswa mumoto, zvichava saizvozvo pakuguma kwenyika ino.
Matthew 13:41 Mwanakomana wemunhu achatuma vatumwa vake, vagounganidza kubva muushe hwake zvigumbuso zvese nevanoita zvakaipa;
Matthew 13:42 zvino vachavakandira muvira remoto; ipapo pachava nekuchema nekugeda-geda kwemeno.
Matthew 13:43 Ipapo vakarurama vachapenya sezuva muushe hwaBaba vavo. Ane nzeve dzekunzwa, ngaanzwe. <div eID="gen157" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen156" type="section"/>
Matthew 13:44 Zvekare ushe hwekumatenga hwakafanana nefuma yakavigwa mumunda, inoti kana munhu aiwana, ano<transChange type="added">i</transChange>viga; zvino nemufaro wake anoenda akanotengesa zvese zvaanazvo akatenga munda uyo. <div eID="gen159" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen158" type="section"/>
Matthew 13:45 Zvekare ushe hwekumatenga hwakafanana nemushambadzi anotsvaka maparera* akanaka;
Matthew 13:46 akati awana parera rimwe rine mutengo mukuru, akaenda akanotengesa zvese zvaakange anazvo, akaritenga. <div eID="gen161" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen160" type="section"/>
Matthew 13:47 Zvekare ushe hwekumatenga hwakafanana nemumbure wakakandirwa mugungwa, ukaunganidza marudzi ese <transChange type="added">ehove</transChange>.
Matthew 13:48 Iwo kana wazara, vano<transChange type="added">u</transChange>kwevera pamahombekombe, ndokugara pasi, vakaunganidzira dzakanaka mumidziyo, asi dzakaipa vakadzirasira kunze.
Matthew 13:49 Zvichava saizvozvo pakuguma kwenguva; vatumwa vachabuda, vachaparadzanisa vakaipa kubva pakati pevakarurama,
Matthew 13:50 uye vachavakandira muvira remoto; ipapo pachava nekuchema nekugeda-geda kwemeno. <div eID="gen163" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 13:51 Jesu akati kwavari: Manzwisisa izvi zvese here? Vakati kwaari: Hongu Ishe.
Matthew 13:52 Zvino akati kwavari: Naizvozvo munyori umwe neumwe wakadzidziswa zveushe hwekumatenga wakafanana nemunhu, mwene weimba, anobudisa zvinhu zvitsva nezvisharu pafuma yake. <div eID="gen164" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen162" type="section"/>
Matthew 13:53 Zvino zvakaitika kuti Jesu apedza mifananidzo iyi wakabvapo.
Matthew 13:54 Uye wakati asvika kunyika yekwake akavadzidzisa musinagoge ravo, kusvikira vashamisika vakati: Kunobvepi kune uyu kuchenjera uku nemabasa esimba?
Matthew 13:55 Uyu haasi mwanakomana wemuvezi here? Ko mai vake havanzi Maria here, nevanin'ina vake Jakobho naJose naSimoni naJudhasi here?
Matthew 13:56 Nehanzvadzi dzake hadzisi nesu dzese here? Ko zvinobvepi kune uyu zvinhu izvozvi zvese?
Matthew 13:57 Vakagumbuswa naye. Asi Jesu akati kwavari: Muporofita haavi asina kukudzwa kunze kwemunyika yekwake nemumba make.
Matthew 13:58 Uye haana kuita mabasa esimba mazhinji ipapo nekuda kwekusatenda kwavo. <chapter eID="Matt.13"/><div eID="gen166" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen165" type="section"/>
Matthew 14:0 <div sID="gen167" type="section"/> <chapter n="14" osisID="Matt.14" sID="Matt.14"/>  <div sID="gen168" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 14:1 Panguva iyo Herodhe umwe wevatongi vana wakanzwa mukurumbira waJesu,
Matthew 14:2 akati kuvaranda vake: Uyu ndiJohwani Mubhabhatidzi; iye wakamuka kuvakafa, naizvozvowo mabasa esimba awa anobata maari.
Matthew 14:3 Nokuti Herodhe wakange abata Johwani akamusunga aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>isa mutirongo nekuda kwaHerodhiasi mukadzi waFiripi munin'ina wake.
Matthew 14:4 Nokuti Johwani wakange ati kwaari: Hazvitenderwi kwauri kuti uve naye.
Matthew 14:5 Zvino achida kumuuraya, akatya chaunga, nokuti vaimutora semuporofita.
Matthew 14:6 Asi kwakati kuchichengetedzwa zuva rekuberekwa kwaHerodhe, mukunda waHerodhiasi akatamba pakati <transChange type="added">pavo</transChange>, akafadza Herodhe.
Matthew 14:7 Naizvozvo wakavimbisa nemhiko kuti achamupa chipi nechipi chaaizokumbira.
Matthew 14:8 Zvino iye, wakati amborairwa namai vake, akati: Ndipei pano mundiro musoro waJohwani Mubhabhatidzi.
Matthew 14:9 Mambo akashungurudzika, asi nekuda kwemhiko, uye kwevakange vagere na<transChange type="added">ye</transChange> pakudya, wakaraira kuti <transChange type="added">a</transChange>piwe.
Matthew 14:10 Akatuma <transChange type="added">vanhu,</transChange> akagura Johwani musoro mutirongo.
Matthew 14:11 Musoro wake ukauyiswa mundiro, ukapiwa kumusikana, aka<transChange type="added">u</transChange>isa kuna mai vake.
Matthew 14:12 Vadzidzi vake vakauya vakatora mutumbi vakauviga, vakaenda ndokuudza Jesu. <div eID="gen168" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen167" type="section"/>
Matthew 14:13 Jesu wakati a<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa, akabvapo nechikepe, akaenda kunzvimbo yerenje ari ega; asi zvaunga zvakati zvichi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa zvikamutevera netsoka zvichibva mumaguta.
Matthew 14:14 Zvino Jesu wakati abuda akaona chaunga chikuru, akavanzwira tsitsi, akaporesa varwere vavo. <div eID="gen170" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 14:15 Zvino ava madekwani, vadzidzi vake vakauya kwaari vachiti: Iyi inzvimbo yerenje, uye ikozvino nguva dzaenda; regai zvaunga zviende, kuti vaende kumisha vanozvitengera kudya.
Matthew 14:16 Asi Jesu wakati kwavari: Havafaniri kuenda; vapei imwi kuti vadye.
Matthew 14:17 Asi vakati kwaari: Hatina pano kunze kwezvingwa zvishanu nehove mbiri.
Matthew 14:18 Iye akati: Uyai nazvo pano pandiri.
Matthew 14:19 Akaraira zvaunga kuti zvigare pasi pauswa, zvino akatora zvingwa zvishanu nehove mbiri, akatarira kumusoro kudenga, aka<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ropafadza, ndokumedura akapa zvingwa kuvadzidzi, vadzidzi ndoku<transChange type="added">pa</transChange> kuzvaunga.
Matthew 14:20 Vakadya vese, vakaguta; vakanonga zvimedu zvakasara, matengu gumi nemaviri azere.
Matthew 14:21 Uye vakange vadya vaiva varume vanenge zvuru zvishanu pasina vakadzi nevana. <div eID="gen171" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen169" type="section"/>
Matthew 14:22 Pakarepo Jesu wakamanikidza vadzidzi vake kupinda muchikepe, vamutungamirire mhiri, iye acharega zvaunga zvichienda.
Matthew 14:23 Zvino wakati arega zvaunga zvichienda, akakwira mugomo ari ega kunonyengetera; akati ava madekwani, wakange ari ega ipapo.
Matthew 14:24 Asi chikepe zvino chakange chava pakati pegungwa chichitambudzwa nemafungu; nokuti mhepo yakange ichipikisa.
Matthew 14:25 Nenguva yechina yemurindiro yeusiku Jesu akaenda kwavari achifamba pamusoro pegungwa.
Matthew 14:26 Zvino vadzidzi vakati vachimuona achifamba pamusoro pegungwa, vakavhunduka vachiti: Chipoko; ndokudanidzira nekutya.
Matthew 14:27 Asi pakarepo Jesu wakataura navo akati: Tsungai moyo; ndini; musatya.
Matthew 14:28 Petro ndokumupindura akati: Ishe, kana muri imwi, ndirairei ndiuye kwamuri pamusoro pemvura.
Matthew 14:29 Ndokubva ati: Uya. Petro ndokuburuka muchikepe akafamba pamusoro pemvura, kuenda kuna Jesu.
Matthew 14:30 Asi wakati achiona mhepo ine simba, akatya; zvino otanga kunyura, akadanidzira, achiti: Ishe, ndiponesei!
Matthew 14:31 Pakarepo Jesu wakatandavadza ruoko, akamubata, akati kwaari: Iwe werutendo rudiki, unokononei?
Matthew 14:32 Vakati vapinda muchikepe, mhepo ikanyarara.
Matthew 14:33 Vakange vari muchikepe ndokuuya vakamunamata vachiti: Zvirokwazvo muri Mwanakomana waMwari. <div eID="gen173" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen172" type="section"/>
Matthew 14:34 Vakati vayambuka, vakasvika panyika yeGenesareti.
Matthew 14:35 Varume venzvimbo iyo vakati vamuziva vakatuma <transChange type="added">shoko</transChange> panyika yese iyo yakapoteredza, vakauisa kwaari vese vairwara.
Matthew 14:36 Vakakumbirisa kwaari kuti vabate chete mupendero wenguvo yake; uye vese vakabata vakaporeswa.  <chapter eID="Matt.14"/><div eID="gen175" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen174" type="section"/>
Matthew 15:0 <div sID="gen176" type="section"/> <chapter n="15" osisID="Matt.15" sID="Matt.15"/>  <div sID="gen177" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 15:1 Ipapo kwakauya kuna Jesu vanyori neVaFarisi vachibva kuJerusarema vachiti:
Matthew 15:2 Sei vadzidzi venyu vachidarika tsika yevakuru? Nokuti havashambi maoko avo kana vachidya chingwa.
Matthew 15:3 Asi akapindura akati kwavari: Nemhaka yei imwiwo muchidarika murairo waMwari nekuda kwetsika yenyu?
Matthew 15:4 Nokuti Mwari wakaraira achiti: Kudza baba namai vako; uye <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Anotuka baba kana mai, anofanira kufa rufu.
Matthew 15:5 Asi imwi munoti: Ani nani anoti kuna baba kana kuna mai: Chipi nechipi chaungabatsirwa neni chibairo,
Matthew 15:6 naizvozvo haatongokudzi baba vake kana mai vake; naizvozvo mashayisa murairo waMwari maturo netsika yenyu.
Matthew 15:7 Vanyepedzeri, Isaya wakaporofita zvakanaka pamusoro penyu achiti:
Matthew 15:8 Vanhu ava vanoswedera kwandiri nemuromo wavo, vachindikudza nemiromo; asi moyo wavo uri kure neni.
Matthew 15:9 Asi vanondinamata pasina, vachidzidzisa dzidziso dziri mirairo yevanhu.
Matthew 15:10 Zvino akadanira chaunga kwaari, akati kwavari: Teererai munzwisise.
Matthew 15:11 Hazvisi zvinopinda mumuromo zvinosvibisa munhu; asi izvo zvinobuda mumuromo, ndizvo zvinosvibisa munhu. <div eID="gen177" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 15:12 Zvino vadzidzi vake vakaswedera vakati kwaari: Munoziva kuti VaFarisi vakati vachinzwa shoko iri vakagumbuka here?
Matthew 15:13 Asi wakapindura akati: Chinomera chimwe nechimwe Baba vangu vekudenga chavasina kudzvara chichadzurwa.
Matthew 15:14 Varegei; vatungamiriri vakapofumara vemapofu. Zvino kana bofu richitungamirira bofu, achawira mugomba ari maviri. <div eID="gen178" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 15:15 Petro akapindura akati kwaari: Tidudzirei mufananidzo uyu.
Matthew 15:16 Zvino Jesu akati: Imwiwo muchiri vasinganzwisisi nhai?
Matthew 15:17 Nazvino hamunzwisisi here, kuti zvese zvinopinda mumuromo zvinoenda mudumbu, uye zvinoraswa kunze?
Matthew 15:18 Asi zvinhu zvinobuda mumuromo zvinobva mumoyo; izvo zvinosvibisa munhu.
Matthew 15:19 Nokuti mumoyo munobuda ndangariro dzakaipa, umhondi, ufeve, upombwe, umbavha, uchapupu hwenhema, kunyomba.
Matthew 15:20 Izvi ndizvo zvinosvibisa munhu; asi kudya nemaoko asina kushambwa hazvisvibisi munhu. <div eID="gen179" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen176" type="section"/>
Matthew 15:21 Zvino Jesu wakabvapo akaenda kumiganhu yeTire neSidhoni.
Matthew 15:22 Zvino tarira, mukadzi muKenani wakabva kumiganhu iyo akadanidzira kwaari achiti: Ndinzwirei tsitsi, Ishe, Mwanakomana waDhavhidhi; mukunda wangu wakabatwa zvakaipa nedhimoni.
Matthew 15:23 Asi haana kumupindura shoko. Vadzidzi vake ndokuuya kwaari vakamukumbirisa vachiti: Muindisei, nokuti anodanidzira shure kwedu.
Matthew 15:24 Asi wakapindura akati: Handina kutumwa <transChange type="added">zvimwe</transChange>, kunze kwekumakwai akarasika eimba yaIsraeri.
Matthew 15:25 Zvino akauya akamunamata achiti: Ishe, ndibatsirei.
Matthew 15:26 Asi wakapindura akati: Hazvina kunaka kutora chingwa chevana ndokukandira imbwanana.
Matthew 15:27 Asi iye akati: Hongu, Ishe, asi nembwanana dzinodya zvezvimedu zvinowa patafura yavatenzi vadzo.
Matthew 15:28 Zvino Jesu akapindura akati kwaari: Haiwa mukadzi, rutendo rwako rukuru! Ngazvive kwauri sezvaunoda. Mukunda wake akaporeswa kubva panguva iyo. <div eID="gen181" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen180" type="section"/>
Matthew 15:29 Jesu ndokubva ipapo akauya parutivi rwegungwa reGarirea; akakwira mugomo, akagara ipapo.
Matthew 15:30 Zvino zvaunga zvikuru zvakauya kwaari zvine mhetamakumbo, mapofu, zvimumumu, zvirema, nevamwe vazhinji, vakavakanda patsoka dzaJesu; akavaporesa;
Matthew 15:31 zvekuti zvaunga zvakashamisika zvichiona zvimumumu zvichitaura, zvirema zvakagwinya, vanokamhina vachifamba, nemapofu achiona; vakarumbidza Mwari waIsraeri. <div eID="gen183" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen182" type="section"/>
Matthew 15:32 Jesu ndokudanira vadzidzi vake kwaari akati: Ndinonzwa tsitsi nechaunga, nokuti vakagara neni zvino mazuva matatu vasina chinhu chekudya, uye handidi kuvaindisa vasina kudya, zvimwe vangaziya panzira.
Matthew 15:33 Vadzidzi vake ndokuti kwaari: Ticha<transChange type="added">wane</transChange>pi zvingwa zvakawanda zvakadaro murenje, kuti tigutise chaunga chikuru chakadai?
Matthew 15:34 Jesu ndokuti kwavari: Mune zvingwa zvingani? Vakati: Zvinomwe, nehove diki shomanene.
Matthew 15:35 Ndokuraira zvaunga kuti zvigare pasi pavhu.
Matthew 15:36 Akatora zvingwa zvinomwe nehove, akavonga, akamedura, ndokupa vadzidzi vake, vadzidzi <transChange type="added">vakapa</transChange> chaunga.
Matthew 15:37 Vakadya vese vakaguta; vakanonga zvimedu zvakasara, matengu manomwe azere.
Matthew 15:38 Zvino avo vakadya vakange vari varume zvuru zvina pasina vakadzi nevana.
Matthew 15:39 Zvino wakati aregera zvaunga zvichienda, akapinda muchikepe, akasvika kumiganhu yeMagidhara.  <chapter eID="Matt.15"/><div eID="gen185" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen184" type="section"/>
Matthew 16:0 <div sID="gen186" type="section"/> <chapter n="16" osisID="Matt.16" sID="Matt.16"/>  <div sID="gen187" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 16:1 VaFarisi neVaSadhusi ndokuuya vachi<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>idza, vakamukumbira kuti avaratidze chiratidzo chinobva kudenga.
Matthew 16:2 Asi wakapindura akati kwavari: Kana ava madekwani munoti: Kunze kwakanaka; nokuti denga rakatsvuka.
Matthew 16:3 Uye mangwanani <transChange type="added">munoti</transChange>: Nhasi kunze kwakaipa; nokuti denga rakatsvuka richikwidibira. Vanyepedzeri, munoziva kuparadzanisa mamiriro edenga, asi hamugoni <transChange type="added">kuparadzanisa</transChange> zviratidzo zvenguva here?
Matthew 16:4 Zera rakaipa uye rinofeva richitsvaka chiratidzo; asi haripiwi chiratidzo, kunze kwechiratidzo chaJona muporofita. Ndokuvasiya, akaenda. <div eID="gen187" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen186" type="section"/>
Matthew 16:5 Zvino vadzidzi vakati vasvika mhiri, vakakanganwa kutora zvingwa.
Matthew 16:6 Zvino Jesu akati kwavari: Onai mungwarire mbiriso yeVaFarisi neVaSadhusi.
Matthew 16:7 Vakarangana pakati pavo vachiti: <transChange type="added">Unodaro</transChange> nokuti hatina kutora zvingwa.
Matthew 16:8 Zvino Jesu azviziva akati kwavari: Imwi verutendo rudiki, nemhaka yei muchirangana pakati penyu kuti hamuna kutora zvingwa?
Matthew 16:9 Muchigere kunzwisisa here, kana kurangarira zvingwa zvishanu zvevanezvuru zvishanu, uye matengu mangani amakanonga?
Matthew 16:10 Kana zvingwa zvinomwe zvevanezvuru zvina, uye matengu mangani amakanonga?
Matthew 16:11 Hamunzwisisi sei, kuti handina kutaura kwamuri pamusoro pezvingwa kuti mungwarire mbiriso yeVaFarisi neVaSadhusi?
Matthew 16:12 Zvino vakanzwisisa kuti haana kutaura kuti vachenjere mbiriso yechingwa, asi dzidziso yeVaFarisi neVaSadhusi. <div eID="gen189" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen188" type="section"/>
Matthew 16:13 Jesu wakati asvika kumativi eKesariya yeFiripi, akabvunza vadzidzi vake, achiti: Vanhu vanoti ini Mwanakomana wemunhu ndini ani?
Matthew 16:14 Ndokubva vati: Vamwe <transChange type="added">vanoti</transChange> Johwani Mubhabhatidzi, uye vamwe Eria, vamwewo Jeremiya, kana umwe wevaporofita.
Matthew 16:15 Akati kwavari: Ko imwi munoti ndini ani?
Matthew 16:16 Zvino Simoni Petro akapindura akati: Ndimwi Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu.
Matthew 16:17 Jesu akapindura akati kwaari: Wakaropafadzwa, Simoni mwanakomana waJona, nokuti nyama neropa hazvina kukuzarurira <transChange type="added">izvozvo</transChange>, asi Baba vangu vari kumatenga.
Matthew 16:18 Neni ndinoti kwauri: Ndiwe Petro, uye pamusoro peruware urwu ndichavaka kereke yangu, nemasuwo egehena* haangaikundi.
Matthew 16:19 Uye ndichapa kwauri kiyi dzeushe hwekumatenga; uye chipi nechipi chauchasunga panyika, chichasungwa kumatenga; nechipi nechipi chauchasunungura panyika, chichasunungurwa kumatenga.
Matthew 16:20 Ipapo akarairisa vadzidzi vake kuti varege kuudza munhu kuti ndiye Jesu iye Kristu. <div eID="gen191" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen190" type="section"/>
Matthew 16:21 Kubva panguva iyo Jesu wakatanga kuratidza kuvadzidzi vake kuti anofanira kuenda kuJerusarema, uye kutambudzika zvizhinji zvichibva kuvakuru nevapristi vakuru nevanyori, nekuurawa, nekumutswa nezuva retatu.
Matthew 16:22 Petro akamutora parutivi, akatanga kumutsiura akati: Ngazvirege kutongoitika kwamuri, Ishe; izvi hazvingatongoitiki kwamuri.
Matthew 16:23 Asi iye wakatendeuka akati kuna Petro: Ibva shure kwangu, Satani! Uri chigumbuso kwandiri; nokuti haurangariri zvinhu zvaMwari, asi zvinhu zvevanhu. <div eID="gen193" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen192" type="section"/>
Matthew 16:24 Zvino Jesu akati kuvadzidzi vake: Kana ani nani achida kuuya shure kwangu, ngaazvirambe, atakure muchinjikwa wake, anditevere.
Matthew 16:25 Nokuti ani nani anoda kuponesa upenyu hwake acharasikirwa nahwo; asi ani nani anorasikirwa neupenyu hwake nekuda kwangu achahuwana.
Matthew 16:26 Nokuti munhu anobatsirwei kana akawana nyika yese, akarasikirwa nemweya wake? Kana munhu achapei chive muripo wemweya wake?
Matthew 16:27 Nokuti Mwanakomana wemunhu achauya mukubwinya kwaBaba vake nevatumwa vake, ipapo achapa mubairo umwe neumwe zvichienderana nebasa rake.
Matthew 16:28 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Vamwe varipo kune vamire pano, vasingatongoraviri rufu kusvikira vaona Mwanakomana wemunhu achiuya muushe hwake. <chapter eID="Matt.16"/><div eID="gen195" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen194" type="section"/>
Matthew 17:0 <div sID="gen196" type="section"/> <chapter n="17" osisID="Matt.17" sID="Matt.17"/>  <div sID="gen197" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 17:1 Zvino shure kwemazuva matanhatu Jesu wakatora Petro naJakobho naJohwani munin'ina wake, akavakwidza mugomo refu vari vega.
Matthew 17:2 Zvino akashandurwa chimiro pamberi pavo, uye chiso chake chikapenya sezuva, nenguvo dzake dzikachena sechiedza.
Matthew 17:3 Zvino tarira, kwakaonekwa kwavari Mozisi naEria vachitaura naye.
Matthew 17:4 Zvino Petro akapindura akati kuna Jesu: Ishe, zvakatinakira kuva pano; kana muchida, ngatiite pano matumba matatu, rimwe renyu, nerimwe raMozisi, nerimwe raEria.
Matthew 17:5 Wakati achataura, tarira, gore rinopenya rakavadzikatira; uye tarira, inzwi rikabva mugore, richiti: Uyu Mwanakomana wangu anodikanwa, wandinofara maari kwazvo; inzwai iye.
Matthew 17:6 Vadzidzi vakati vachi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa, vakawa nechiso chavo, vakatya zvikuru.
Matthew 17:7 Asi Jesu akaswedera akavabata, akati: Simukai, musatya.
Matthew 17:8 Vakati vachisimudza meso avo, havana kuona munhu, kunze kwaJesu chete.
Matthew 17:9 Zvino vakati vachiburuka mugomo, Jesu akavaraira, achiti: Musaudza munhu chiratidzo ichi, kusvikira Mwanakomana wemunhu amuka kubva kuvakafa.
