Matthew 17:10 Vadzidzi vake vakamubvunza vachiti: Vanyori vanogotaurirei vachiti Eria anofanira kutanga kuuya?
Matthew 17:11 Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Eria achatanga kusvika zvirokwazvo, achavandudza zvinhu zvese.
Matthew 17:12 Asi ndinotaura kwamuri kuti Eria wakatosvika, asi havana kumuziva, asi vakamuitira zvese zvavakada; saizvozvowo Mwanakomana wemunhu achatambura navo.
Matthew 17:13 Zvino vadzidzi vakanzwisisa kuti wakataura kwavari zvaJohwani Mubhabhatidzi. <div eID="gen197" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen196" type="section"/>
Matthew 17:14 Vakati vasvika kuchaunga, kwakauya kwaari munhu, akamufugamira, achiti:
Matthew 17:15 Ishe, <transChange type="added">do</transChange>nzwirai mwanakomana wangu tsitsi, nokuti ane zvipusha, anotambudzika kwazvo; nokuti kazhinji anowira mumoto, kazhinji mumvura.
Matthew 17:16 Uye ndakamuuisa kuvadzidzi venyu, asi havana kugona kumuporesa.
Matthew 17:17 Jesu akapindura akati: Haiwa zera risina rutendo nerakakombama, ndichava nemwi kusvikira rinhi? Ndichakuitirai moyo murefu kusvikira rinhi? Muuisei pano pandiri.
Matthew 17:18 Zvino Jesu akaritsiura, dhimoni rikabuda kwaari, mwana akaporeswa kubva panguva iyo.
Matthew 17:19 Zvino vadzidzi vakauya kuna Jesu vari vega, vakati: Isu takange tisingagoni nei kuribudisa?
Matthew 17:20 Jesu akati kwavari: Nemhaka yekusatenda kwenyu. Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Kana mune rutendo <transChange type="added">rwakaita</transChange> setsanga yemasitadha, mungati kugomo iri: Ibva pano, enda koko; uye richabva; uye hakuna chinhu chingakukonai.
Matthew 17:21 Asi zera iri haribudi kunze chete nekunyengetera nekutsanya. <div eID="gen199" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen198" type="section"/>
Matthew 17:22 Zvino vachakagara muGarirea, Jesu wakati kwavari: Mwanakomana wemunhu obva okumikidzwa mumaoko evanhu,
Matthew 17:23 uye vachamuuraya, asi nezuva retatu achamutswa. Uye vakashurukirwa zvikuru. <div eID="gen201" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen200" type="section"/>
Matthew 17:24 Zvino vakati vachisvika Kapenaume, vaigamuchira mutero vakauya kuna Petro, vakati: Mudzidzisi wenyu haateri here?
Matthew 17:25 Akati: Hongu. Zvino wakati achipinda mumba, Jesu akamutangira achiti: Unofungei Simoni? Madzimambo enyika anotora muripo kana mutero kuna vana ani? Kuvanakomana vavo kana kuvatorwa?
Matthew 17:26 Petro akati kwaari: Kuvatorwa. Jesu akati kwaari: Saka vanakomana vakasununguka.
Matthew 17:27 Asi kuti tirege kuvagumbusa, enda kugungwa ukande chiredzo; ubate hove inotanga kubuda; kana washamisa muromo wayo, uchawana mari; uitore uvape, <transChange type="added">ive</transChange> yangu neyako.  <chapter eID="Matt.17"/><div eID="gen203" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen202" type="section"/>
Matthew 18:0 <div sID="gen204" type="section"/> <chapter n="18" osisID="Matt.18" sID="Matt.18"/>  <div sID="gen205" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 18:1 Nenguva iyo vadzidzi vakauya kuna Jesu vachiti: Ko ndiani mukurusa paushe hwekumatenga?
Matthew 18:2 Jesu akadanira kwaari mucheche akamumisa pakati pavo.
Matthew 18:3 Akati: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Kana musingashandurwi mukava sevacheche, hamungatongopindi muushe hwekumatenga.
Matthew 18:4 Naizvozvo ani nani anozvininipisa semucheche uyu ndiye mukurusa muushe hwekumatenga.
Matthew 18:5 Zvino ani nani anogamuchira mucheche umwe wakadai muzita rangu anogamuchira ini. <div eID="gen205" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 18:6 Asi ani nani anogumbusa umwe wevacheche ava vanotenda kwandiri, zvaiva nani kwaari kuti guyo guru risungirirwe kupoteredza pamutsipa wake, anyudzwe mukudzika kwegungwa.
Matthew 18:7 Ine nhamo nyika nemhaka yezvigumbuso! Nokuti kunodikanwa kuti zvigumbuso zviuye; asi une nhamo munhu uyo chigumbuso wachinouya naye!
Matthew 18:8 Zvino kana ruoko rwako kana rutsoka rwako zvichikugumbusa, uzvigure urase kubva kwauri; zviri nani kwauri kuti upinde muupenyu uri mhetamakumbo kana uri chirema pakuti une maoko maviri kana tsoka mbiri ukandirwe mumoto wekusingaperi.
Matthew 18:9 Kana ziso rako richikugumbusa, uridzure urase kubva kwauri; zviri nani kwauri kuti upinde muupenyu une ziso rimwe pakuti une meso maviri ukandirwe mugehena remoto. <div eID="gen206" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 18:10 Chenjerai musazvidza umwe wevadiki ava, nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Kumatenga vatumwa vavo vanogaroona chiso chaBaba vangu vari kumatenga.
Matthew 18:11 Nokuti Mwanakomana wemunhu wakauya kuzoponesa chakange chakarasika. <div eID="gen207" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen204" type="section"/>
Matthew 18:12 Munofunga sei? Kana umwe munhu ane makwai zana, rimwe rawo rikarasika, haangasii here makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe, akaenda kumakomo kunotsvaka rakarasika?
Matthew 18:13 Kana zvikaitika kuti ariwana, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Anorifarira kupfuura makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe asina kurasika.
Matthew 18:14 Saizvozvo hakusi kuda kwaBaba venyu vari kumatenga, kuti umwe wevadiki ava aparare. <div eID="gen209" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen208" type="section"/>
Matthew 18:15 Asi kana umwe wako akutadzira, enda umudzore pakati pako naye mega; kana akakunzwa, wawana umwe wako.
Matthew 18:16 Asi kana asinganzwi, tora umwe kana vamwe vaviri newe, kuti nemuromo wezvapupu zviviri kana zvitatu shoko rese risimbiswe.
Matthew 18:17 Kana asina hanya nekuvanzwa, uudze kereke; asi kana asina hanya nekunzwa kerekewo, ngaave kwauri semuhedheni nemuteresi.
Matthew 18:18 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Chipi nechipi chamuchasunga panyika, chichasungwa kudenga; uye chipi nechipi chamunosunungura panyika, chichasunungurwa kudenga. <div eID="gen211" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen210" type="section"/>
Matthew 18:19 Zvekare ndinoti kwamuri: Kana vaviri venyu vakatenderana panyika pamusoro pechinhu chipi nechipi chavanokumbira, chichaitwa kwavari naBaba vangu vari kumatenga.
Matthew 18:20 Nokuti apo vaviri kana vatatu vakaungana muzita rangu, ipapo ndiripo pakati pavo. <div eID="gen213" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen212" type="section"/>
Matthew 18:21 Zvino Petro wakauya kwaari akati: Ishe, umwe wangu uchanditadzira kangani, ndichimukanganwira? Kusvikira kanomwe here?
Matthew 18:22 Jesu akati kwaari: Handiti kwauri: Kusvikira kanomwe; asi: Kusvikira makumi manomwe akapamhidzirwa kanomwe. <div eID="gen215" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 18:23 Naizvozvo ushe hwekumatenga hunofananidzwa neumwe mambo, wakange achida kugadzirisa zvemari nevaranda vake.
Matthew 18:24 Zvino wakati achitanga kugadzirisa zvemari, umwe akauyiswa kwaari wakange ane chikwereti chematarenda* gumi rezvuru.
Matthew 18:25 Asi zvaakange asina chaangaripa nacho, ishe wake akaraira kuti atengeswe <transChange type="added">pamwe</transChange> nemukadzi wake nevana, nezvese zvaakange anazvo, kuti muripo uitwe.
Matthew 18:26 Naizvozvo muranda wakawira pasi, akamunamata, achiti: Ishe, ivai nemoyo murefu neni, ndichakuripirai zvese.
Matthew 18:27 Zvino ishe wemuranda uyo akamunzwira tsitsi, akamusunungura, akamukanganwira chikwereti.
Matthew 18:28 Asi muranda uyo wakati achibuda, akawana umwe wevaranda <transChange type="added">vaibata</transChange> pamwe naye, wakange ane ngava kwaari remadhenario* zana; akamubata, aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>dzipa, akati: Ndiripe zvaunofanira.
Matthew 18:29 Zvino muranda <transChange type="added">waibata</transChange> pamwe naye akawira pasi patsoka dzake akamugombetedza achiti: Uve nemoyo murefu neni, ndichakuripira zvese.
Matthew 18:30 Asi iye haana kuda, asi wakaenda, akamukanda mutirongo, kusvikira aripa chikwereti.
Matthew 18:31 Zvino varanda <transChange type="added">vaibata </transChange>pamwe naye vakati vachiona zvakange zvaitika, vakashungurudzika kwazvo, vakaenda vakaudza ishe wavo zvese zvakaitika.
Matthew 18:32 Zvino ishe wake wakati amudanira kwaari akati kwaari: Iwe muranda wakaipa, ndakakukanganwira chikwereti icho chose, nokuti wakandigombetedza.
Matthew 18:33 Ko newe hausaifanira kunzwira tsitsi here umwe muranda <transChange type="added">unobata</transChange> pamwe newe, seniwo ndakakunzwira tsitsi?
Matthew 18:34 Zvino ishe wake akatsamwa, akamukumikidza kuvarwadzisi, kusvikira aripa zvese zvakafanira kwaari.
Matthew 18:35 Saizvozvo Baba vangu vari kudenga vachakuitiraiwo, kana musingakanganwiri umwe neumwe umwe wake zvitadzo zvavo nemoyo yenyu <transChange type="added">yese</transChange>.  <chapter eID="Matt.18"/><div eID="gen216" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen214" type="section"/>
Matthew 19:0 <div sID="gen217" type="section"/> <chapter n="19" osisID="Matt.19" sID="Matt.19"/>  <div sID="gen218" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 19:1 Zvino zvakaitika apo Jesu apedza mashoko awa, akabva kuGarirea, akasvika kumiganhu yeJudhiya mhiri kweJoridhani.
Matthew 19:2 Zvaunga zvikuru zvikamutevera, akazviporesapo. <div eID="gen218" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 19:3 VaFarisi vakauyawo kwaari, vachimuidza vachiti kwaari: Zvinotenderwa here kumunhu kuramba mukadzi wake nemhaka ipi neipi?
Matthew 19:4 Akapindura, akati kwavari: Hamuna kurava here, kuti iye waka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>ita kubva pakutanga wakavaita murume nemukadzi?
Matthew 19:5 Akati: Nekuda kwaizvozvi munhu achasiya baba namai, uye achanamatira kumukadzi wake; avo vaviri vachava nyama imwe.
Matthew 19:6 Naizvozvo havachisiri vaviri, asi nyama imwe. Naizvozvo izvo Mwari zvaakabatanidza munhu ngaarege kuparadzanisa.
Matthew 19:7 Vakati kwaari: Mozisi wakagorairei kupa rugwaro rwekurambana, nekumuramba?
Matthew 19:8 Akati kwavari: Nekuda kweukukutu hwemoyo yenyu Mozisi wakakutenderai kuramba vakadzi venyu; asi kubva pakutanga zvakange zvisina kudaro.
Matthew 19:9 Asi ndinoti kwamuri: Ani nani anoramba mukadzi wake, kunze kwemhaka yeupombwe, akawana umwe, anopomba; neanowana wakarambwa anopomba. <div eID="gen219" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 19:10 Vadzidzi vake vakati kwaari: Kana nyaya yemunhu nemukadzi yakadaro, hazvibatsiri kuwana.
Matthew 19:11 Asi akati kwavari: Vese havagamuchiri shoko iri, kunze kwevakaripiwa.
Matthew 19:12 Nokuti kune vatenwa, vakaberekwa vakadaro kubva mudumbu ramai; uye kune vatenwa, vakaitwa vatenwa nevanhu; uye kune vatenwa vakazviita vatenwa nekuda kweushe hwekumatenga. Anogona kugamuchira <transChange type="added">izvi</transChange>, ngaagamuchire. <div eID="gen220" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen217" type="section"/>
Matthew 19:13 Zvino kwakauyiswa kwaari vana vadiki, kuti aise maoko pamusoro pavo, anyengetere; asi vadzidzi vakavatsiura.
Matthew 19:14 Asi Jesu wakati: Tenderai vana vadiki, musavadzivisa kuuya kwandiri; nokuti ushe hwekumatenga ndehwevakadai.
Matthew 19:15 Akaisa maoko pamusoro pavo, akabvapo. <div eID="gen222" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen221" type="section"/>
Matthew 19:16 Zvino tarira, kwakaswedera umwe akati kwaari: Mudzidzisi wakanaka, ndingaita chinhu chakanaka chipi kuti ndive neupenyu husingaperi?
Matthew 19:17 Akati kwaari: Unondiidzirei wakanaka? Hakuna wakanaka, kunze kweumwe, <transChange type="added">ndiye</transChange> Mwari. Asi kana uchida kupinda muupenyu, chengeta mirairo.
Matthew 19:18 Akati kwaari: Ipi? Jesu ndokuti: Usauraya, usapomba, usaba, usapupura nhema,
Matthew 19:19 kudza baba vako namai, uye, ude umwe wako se<transChange type="added">zvauno</transChange>zvi<transChange type="added">da</transChange> iwe.
Matthew 19:20 Jaya rikati kwaari: Izvozvi zvese ndakazvichengeta kubva paudiki hwangu; ndichiri kushaiwei?
Matthew 19:21 Jesu akati kwariri: Kana uchida kuva wakaperera, enda utengese zvaunazvo upe varombo, uye uchava nefuma kudenga; ugouya pano unditevere.
Matthew 19:22 Asi jaya rakati ranzwa shoko iro rikaenda richishungurudzika; nokuti rakange rine nhumbi zhinji. <div eID="gen224" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 19:23 Jesu akati kuvadzidzi vake: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Mufumi ucharemerwa kupinda muushe hwekumatenga.
Matthew 19:24 Ndinotizve kwamuri: Zvakarerukira kamera kudarika nemuburi retsono, kumufumi kupinda muushe hwaMwari.
Matthew 19:25 Vadzidzi vake vakati va<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa, vakashamisika kwazvo, vachiti: Saka ndiani angagona kuponeswa?
Matthew 19:26 Asi Jesu wakatarira akati kwavari: Kuvanhu izvi hazvibviri, asi kuna Mwari zvese zvinobvira. <div eID="gen225" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 19:27 Ipapo Petro akapindura, akati kwaari: Tarirai, isu takasiya zvese, tikakuteverai; zvino tichava nei?
Matthew 19:28 Jesu akati kwavari: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Imwi makanditevera, pakuberekwa kutsva kana Mwanakomana wemunhu agara pachigaro cheushe chekubwinya kwake, imwiwo muchagara pazvigaro zveushe gumi nezviviri, muchitonga marudzi gumi nemaviri aIsraeri.
Matthew 19:29 Uye umwe neumwe wakasiya dzimba, kana vanin'ina nemadzikoma, kana hanzvadzi, kana baba, kana mai, kana mukadzi, kana vana, kana minda, nekuda kwezita rangu, uchagamuchira zvine zana, akagara nhaka yeupenyu husingaperi.
Matthew 19:30 Asi vazhinji vekutanga vachava vekupedzisira, nevekupedzisira vekutanga. <chapter eID="Matt.19"/><div eID="gen226" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen223" type="section"/>
Matthew 20:0 <div sID="gen227" type="section"/> <chapter n="20" osisID="Matt.20" sID="Matt.20"/>  <div sID="gen228" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 20:1 Nokuti ushe hwekumatenga hwakafanana nemunhu, mwene weimba, wakabuda mangwanani-ngwanani kunopinza basa vashandi mumunda wake wemizambiringa.
Matthew 20:2 Wakati atenderana nevabati padhenario* pazuva, akavatuma kumunda wake wemizambiringa.
Matthew 20:3 Akabuda neawa rinenge rechitatu, akaona vamwe vamire pamusika, vasina chekuita;
Matthew 20:4 akati kwavari: Endai imwiwo mumunda wemizambiringa, ndigokupai chero zvakafanira. Vakaendawo.
Matthew 20:5 Akabudazve neawa rinenge rechitanhatu nerepfumbamwe, akaita saizvozvo.
Matthew 20:6 Zvino neawa rinenge regumi nerimwe wakabuda, akawana vamwe vamire vasina chekuita, akati kwavari: Makamirirei pano zuva rese musina chekuita?
Matthew 20:7 Vakati kwaari: Nokuti hapana munhu wakatipinza basa. Akati kwavari: Endai nemwiwo mumunda wemizambiringa, muchagamuchira chero zvakafanira.
Matthew 20:8 Kuzoti ava madekwani, mwene wemunda wemizambiringa wakati kumutariri wake: Dana vabati, uvape mubairo, uchitanga kune vekupedzisira, kusvikira kune vekutanga.
Matthew 20:9 Zvino vakati vachiuya veawa rinenge regumi nerimwe, vakagamuchira umwe neumwe dhenario.
Matthew 20:10 Asi vekutanga vakati vachiuya, vakafunga kuti vachagamuchira zvakapfuura; asi ivowo vakagamuchira umwe neumwe dhenario.
Matthew 20:11 Vakati vagamuchira vakagunun'unira mwene weimba,
Matthew 20:12 vachiti: Ava vekupedzisira vakabata awa rimwe chete, asi mavaenzanisa nesu takatakura mutoro wezuva nekupisa.
Matthew 20:13 Asi wakapindura akati kune umwe wavo: Shamwari, handikuitiri zvisakarurama; hauna kutenderana here neni padhenario?
Matthew 20:14 Tora zvako uende; ndinoda kupa kune uyu wekupedzisira sewewo.
Matthew 20:15 Ko handitenderwi kuita zvandinoda nezvangu here? Ziso rako rakaipa, nokuti ini ndakanaka here?
Matthew 20:16 Saizvozvo vekupedzisira vachava vekutanga, nevekutanga vekupedzisira; nokuti vazhinji vakadanwa, asi vashoma vachasarudzwa. <div eID="gen228" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen227" type="section"/>
Matthew 20:17 Jesu wakati achikwira kuJerusarema akatora vadzidzi gumi nevaviri vari vega munzira, akati kwavari:
Matthew 20:18 Tarira, tinokwira kuJerusarema, zvino Mwanakomana wemunhu achakumikidzwa kuvapristi vakuru nevanyori, vachamutongera rufu.
Matthew 20:19 Vachamukumikidza kuvahedheni, kuti vasveveredze, varove netyava, nekuroverera pamuchinjikwa; asi nezuva retatu achamuka. <div eID="gen230" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen229" type="section"/>
Matthew 20:20 Zvino kwakauya kwaari mai vevanakomana vaZebhedhi nevanakomana vavo, vakanamata vachikumbira chimwe chinhu kwaari.
Matthew 20:21 Akati kwavari: Munodei? Vakati kwaari: Taurai kuti vanakomana vangu ava vaviri vagare, umwe kuruoko rwenyu rwerudyi, umwe kuruboshwe, muushe hwenyu.
Matthew 20:22 Asi Jesu akapindura, akati: Hamuzivi chamunokumbira. Mungagona kunwa mukombe wandava kuzonwa ini here, uye kubhabhatidzwa nerubhabhatidzo rwandinobhabhatidzwa narwo ini? Vakati kwaari: Tinogona.
Matthew 20:23 Akati kwavari: Muchanwa zvirokwazvo mukombe wangu, nekubhabhatidzwa nerubhabhatidzo rwandinobhabhatidzwa narwo ini; asi kugara kuruoko rwangu rwerudyi, nekuruboshwe rwangu, hazvisi zvangu kuti ndipe, asi ndezvevakazvigadzirirwa naBaba vangu. <div eID="gen232" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 20:24 Vanegumi vakati vanzwa, vakatsamwira avo mukoma nemunin'ina vaviri.
Matthew 20:25 Asi Jesu akavadanira kwaari, akati: Munoziva kuti vatungamiriri vevahedheni vanovatsikirira, nevakuru vanoratidza simba pamusoro pavo.
Matthew 20:26 Asi hazvingazodaro pakati penyu; asi ani nani anoda kuva mukuru pakati penyu, ngaave mushandiri wenyu.
Matthew 20:27 Zvino ani nani anoda kuva wekutanga pakati penyu, ngaave muranda wenyu.
Matthew 20:28 SeMwanakomana wemunhu haana kuuya kuzoshandirwa, asi kuzoshandira, nekupa upenyu hwake huve rudzikunuro rwevazhinji. <div eID="gen233" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen231" type="section"/>
Matthew 20:29 Vakati vachibuda kubva Jeriko, chaunga chikuru chikamutevera.
Matthew 20:30 Zvino tarira, mapofu maviri agere parutivi rwenzira, akati achinzwa kuti Jesu wopfuura, akadanidzira, achiti: Tinzwirei tsitsi, Ishe, Mwanakomana waDhavhidhi!
Matthew 20:31 Chaunga chikaatsiura kuti anyarare; asi akanyanya kudanidzira, achiti: Tinzwirei tsitsi, Ishe, Mwanakomana waDhavhidhi!
Matthew 20:32 Jesu ndokumira, akaadana, akati: Munoda kuti ndikuitirei?
Matthew 20:33 Akati kwaari: Ishe, kuti meso edu asvinudzwe.
Matthew 20:34 Jesu akanzwa tsitsi, akabata meso awo; pakarepo meso awo akaonazve, akamutevera. <chapter eID="Matt.20"/><div eID="gen235" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen234" type="section"/>
Matthew 21:0 <div sID="gen236" type="section"/> <chapter n="21" osisID="Matt.21" sID="Matt.21"/>  <div sID="gen237" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 21:1 Vakati vachiswedera kuJerusarema, vasvika kuBhetifage pagomo reMiorivhi, ipapo Jesu akatuma vadzidzi vaviri,
Matthew 21:2 achiti kwavari: Endai kumusha wakatarisana nemwi, pakarepo muchawana mbongoro yakasungirwa, nedhongwana rinayo; sunungurai, muuyise kwandiri.
Matthew 21:3 Kana ani nani achitaura chinhu kwamuri, muchati: Ishe anozvida; pakarepo achazvitumira.
Matthew 21:4 Izvozvi zvese zvakaitika, kuti zvizadziswe zvakataurwa nemuporofita, achiti:
Matthew 21:5 Udzai mukunda weZiyoni: Tarira Mambo wako anouya kwauri, ari munyoro, akatasva mbongoro, nedhongwana, mwana wechipfuwo chemutoro. <div eID="gen237" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 21:6 Vadzidzi vakaenda, vakaita Jesu sezvaakavaraira,
Matthew 21:7 vakauisa mbongoro nedhongwana, vakaisa nguvo dzavo pamusoro pazvo; vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>gadza pamusoro pazvo.
Matthew 21:8 Chaunga chikuru kwazvo chikawarira nguvo dzacho munzira; vamwe vakatema matavi pamiti vakawarira munzira.
Matthew 21:9 Zvaunga zvakange zvakamutungamirira nevakange vachitevera vakadanidzira, vachiti: Hosana* kuMwanakomana waDavhidhi! Wakaropafadzwa iye anouya muzita raIshe! Hosana kumusoro-soro! <div eID="gen238" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 21:10 Wakati apinda muJerusarema, guta rese rikazungunuswa, richiti: Ndiani uyu?
Matthew 21:11 Zvaunga zvikati: Uyu ndiJesu muporofita weNazareta reGarirea. <div eID="gen239" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen236" type="section"/>
Matthew 21:12 Zvino Jesu wakapinda mutembere yaMwari, akadzingira vese vaitengesa nevaitenga mutembere, akapidigura matafura evaitsinhanha mari, nezvigaro zvevaitengesa njiva.
Matthew 21:13 Akati kwavari: Kwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Imba yangu ichanzi imba yemunyengetero; asi imwi munoiita bako remakororo.
Matthew 21:14 Zvino kwakauya kwaari mapofu nevaikamhina mutembere; akavaporesa.
Matthew 21:15 Asi vapristi vakuru nevanyori vakati vachiona zvinhu zvinoshamisa zvaakange achiita, nevana vachidanidzira mutembere vachiti: Hosana kuMwanakomana waDhavhidhi! vakatsamwa,
Matthew 21:16 vakati kwaari: Unonzwa zvavanotaura ivava here? Jesu akati kwavari: Hongu, hamuna kutongoverenga here, kuti: Mumuromo mavacheche nevanoyamwa makapedzeredza rumbidzo?
Matthew 21:17 Akavasiya, akabuda panze peguta, achienda Bhetaniya, ndokurarapo. <div eID="gen241" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen240" type="section"/>
Matthew 21:18 Kuzoti mangwanani-ngwanani wakati achidzokera kuguta, akanzwa nzara.
Matthew 21:19 Zvino wakati achiona umwe muonde panzira, akaenda kwauri, akasawana chinhu kwauri, asi mashizha chete; akati kwauri: Ngakurege kuva nezvibereko kwauri kusvikira narinhi. Pakarepo muonde ukasvava.
Matthew 21:20 Vadzidzi vakati vachiona, vakashamisika, vachiti: Muonde wasvava pakarepo sei?
Matthew 21:21 Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Dai maiva nerutendo, musiri vasina chokwadi, hamungaiti izvi kumuonde chete, asi kunyange kana mukati kugomo iri: Simudzwa ukandirwe mugungwa; zvichaitwa.
Matthew 21:22 Nezvese zvipi nezvipi zvamunokumbira mumunyengetero, kana muchitenda, muchazvigamuchira. <div eID="gen243" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen242" type="section"/>
Matthew 21:23 Wakati apinda mutembere, vapristi vakuru nevakuru vevanhu vakauya kwaari achidzidzisa, vakati: Munoita zvinhu izvozvi nesimba ripi? Ndiani akakupai simba iri?
Matthew 21:24 Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Neni ndichakubvunzai shoko rimwe; kana mukandiudza iro, neni ndichakuudzai kuti ndinoita izvi nesimba ripi.
Matthew 21:25 Rubhabhatidzo rwaJohwani rwakabvepi? Kudenga here kana kuvanhu? Zvino vakataurirana pakati pavo vachiti: Kana tikati: Kudenga; uchati kwatiri: Saka sei musina kumutenda?
Matthew 21:26 Asi kana tikati: Kuvanhu; tinotya chaunga; nokuti vese vakatora Johwani semuporofita.
Matthew 21:27 Vakapindura Jesu vakati: Hatizivi. Iye ndokuti kwavari: Neni handingakuudziyi simba randinoita naro izvi. <div eID="gen245" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen244" type="section"/>
Matthew 21:28 Zvino munofungei? Munhu waiva nevanakomana vaviri; akauya kune wekutanga, akati: Mwana, enda nhasi unobata mumunda wangu wemizambiringa.
Matthew 21:29 Iye akapindura akati: Handidi; asi pashure akatendeuka akaenda.
Matthew 21:30 Akaenda kune wechipiri akataura saizvozvo. Iye akapindura akati: Ndino<transChange type="added">enda</transChange>, ishe; akasaenda.
Matthew 21:31 Ndeupi pavaviri akaita kuda kwababa? Vakati kwaari: Wekutanga. Jesu akati kwavari: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Vateresi nezvifeve vanokutangirai kupinda muushe hwaMwari.
Matthew 21:32 Nokuti Johwani akauya kwamuri nenzira yekururama, mukasamutenda; asi vateresi nezvifeve vakamutenda, asi imwi makati muchiona, hamuna kutendeuka shure kwaizvozvi kuti mumutende. <div eID="gen247" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen246" type="section"/>
Matthew 21:33 Inzwai umwe mufananidzo. Kwaiva neumwe munhu, mwene weimba, wakasima munda wemizambiringa, akaisa ruzhowa rwakaukomberedza, akachera pekusvinira waini mauri, akavaka shongwe, akauhaisa* kuvarimi, akaenda kunze kwenyika.
Matthew 21:34 Kuzoti nguva yezvibereko yaswedera, akatuma varanda vake kuvarimi kuti vagamuchire zvibereko zvake.
Matthew 21:35 Asi varimi vakabata varanda vake, umwe vakarova, umwe vakauraya, umwe vakataka nemabwe.
Matthew 21:36 Akatumazve vamwe varanda vazhinji kune vekutanga; vakavaitira saizvozvo.
Matthew 21:37 Asi pakupedzisira akatuma mwanakomana wake kwavari, achiti: Vacharemekedza mwanakomana wangu.
Matthew 21:38 Asi varimi vakati vachiona mwanakomana, vakataurirana, <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Uyu ndiye mugari wenhaka; uyai, ngatimuurayeyi tibate nhaka yake.
Matthew 21:39 Zvino vakamubata vakaposhera panze kunze kwemunda wemizambiringa vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>uraya.
Matthew 21:40 Naizvozvo kana mwene wemunda wemizambiringa achisvika, uchaitei kuvarimi avo?
Matthew 21:41 Vakati kwaari: Achaparadza zvakaipa ava vakaipa, akahaisa vamwe varimi munda wemizambiringa, vachamupa zvibereko nenguva dzazvo. <div eID="gen249" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 21:42 Jesu akati kwavari: Hamuna kutongoverenga here pamagwaro <transChange type="added">panoti</transChange>: Ibwe vavaki ravakaramba, ndiro rakava musoro wekona; kubva kuna Ishe izvi zvaitika zvinoshamisa pameso edu? <div eID="gen250" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 21:43 Naizvozvo ndinoti kwamuri: Ushe hwaMwari huchatorwa kubva kwamuri, hukapiwa kurudzi rwunobereka zvibereko zvahwo.
Matthew 21:44 Uye anowira pamusoro pebwe iri, achavhunikanya; asi pane upi neupi warinowira richamukuya. <div eID="gen251" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 21:45 Vapristi vakuru neVaFarisi vakati vachinzwa mifananidzo yake, vakaziva kuti anotaura nezvavo.
Matthew 21:46 Zvino vakati vachitsvaka kumubata vakatya zvaunga nokuti vaimutora semuporofita. <chapter eID="Matt.21"/><div eID="gen252" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen248" type="section"/>
Matthew 22:0 <div sID="gen253" type="section"/> <chapter n="22" osisID="Matt.22" sID="Matt.22"/>  <div sID="gen254" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 22:1 Zvino Jesu wakapindura akataurazve kwavari nemifananidzo, achiti:
Matthew 22:2 Ushe hwekumatenga hwakafananidzwa neumwe mambo, wakaitira mwanakomana wake mutambo wemuchato;
Matthew 22:3 akatuma varanda vake kunodana vakange vakokwa kumuchato, asi havana kuda kuuya.
Matthew 22:4 Akatuma zvekare vamwe varanda, achiti: Udzai vakakokerwa <transChange type="added">muti</transChange>: Tarirai, ndagadzira chisvusvuro changu, nzombe dzangu nezvakakora zvabaiwa, uye zvinhu zvese zvagadzirwa; uyai kumuchato.
Matthew 22:5 Asi havana kuzvikoshesa, vakaenda, umwe kumunda wake pachake, umwe kukutengeserana kwake;
Matthew 22:6 vakasara <transChange type="added">vavo</transChange> vakabata varanda vake, vaka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>itira zvakaipa, vaka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>uraya.
Matthew 22:7 Zvino mambo wakati a<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa, wakatsamwa, akatuma hondo dzake, akaparadza mhondi idzo, akapisa guta ravo.
Matthew 22:8 Zvino akati kuvaranda vake: Muchato wagadzirwa, asi vakange vakokwa vakange vasina kufanira.
Matthew 22:9 Naizvozvo, endai kumharadzano dzenzira, mukokere kumuchato vese vamunowana.
Matthew 22:10 Varanda avo vakabudira kunzira, vakaunganidza vese nekuwanda kwevavakawana, zvese vakaipa nevakanaka; imba yemuchato ikazara nevagere pakudya.
Matthew 22:11 Zvino mambo wakati achipinda kuzoona vagere pakudya, akaona ipapo munhu asina kupfeka chipfeko chemuchato;
Matthew 22:12 akati kwaari: Shamwari, wapinda sei pano usina chipfeko chemuchato? Akashaya remuromo.
Matthew 22:13 Zvino mambo akati kuvaranda: Musungei makumbo nemaoko, mumubvise, mukandire kurima rekunze kwekupedzisira; apo pachava nekuchema nekugeda-geda kwemeno.
Matthew 22:14 Nokuti vazhinji vakadanwa, asi vashoma vanosanangurwa. <div eID="gen254" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen253" type="section"/>
Matthew 22:15 Zvino VaFarisi vakaenda vakanorangana kuti vangamuteya sei pakutaura.
Matthew 22:16 Vakatuma kwaari vadzidzi vavo vane VaHerodhe, vachiti: Mudzidzisi, tinoziva kuti ndimwi wechokwadi, uye munodzidzisa nzira yaMwari muchokwadi, musingarangariri zvemunhu, nokuti hamutariri chimiro chevanhu.
Matthew 22:17 Naizvozvo tiudzei: Munofungei? Zvinotenderwa kupa Kesari mutero here, kana kwete?
Matthew 22:18 Asi Jesu wakaziva kuipa kwavo, akati: Munondiidzirei, vanyepedzeri?
Matthew 22:19 Ndiratidzei mari yemutero. Vakamuvigira dhenario*.
Matthew 22:20 Zvino akati kwavari: Mufananidzo uyu nechinyorwa ndezvani?
Matthew 22:21 Vakati kwaari: ZvaKesari. Ipapo akati kwavari: Naizvozvo dzorerai kuna Kesari zvinhu zvaKesari, nekuna Mwari zvinhu zvaMwari.
Matthew 22:22 Vakati vanzwa vakashamisika, vakamusiya, vakaenda. <div eID="gen256" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen255" type="section"/>
Matthew 22:23 Nezuva iro kwakauya kwaari VaSadhusi, avo vanoti hakuna kumuka, vakamubvunza,
Matthew 22:24 vachiti: Mudzidzisi, Mozisi wakati: Kana munhu akafa asina vana, munin'ina wake achawana mukadzi wake, agomutsira mukoma wake mbeu.
Matthew 22:25 Paiva pakati pedu nevanakomana vemunhu umwe vanomwe; wekutanga akawana mukadzi, akafa; uye asina mbeu, akasiya mukadzi wake kumunin'ina wake.
Matthew 22:26 Saizvozvowo wechipiri, newechitatu, kusvikira kune wechinomwe.
Matthew 22:27 Pakupedzisira kwevese mukadzi akafawo.
Matthew 22:28 Zvino pakumuka, achava mukadzi waani pavanomwe? Nokuti vese vakava naye.
Matthew 22:29 Jesu ndokupindura, akati kwavari: Munorasika, musingazivi magwaro, kana simba raMwari;
Matthew 22:30 nokuti pakumuka havawanani, havawaniswi; asi vakaita sevatumwa vaMwari kudenga.
Matthew 22:31 Asi maererano nekumuka kwevakafa, hamuna kuverenga here zvakataurwa kwamuri naMwari, achiti:
Matthew 22:32 Ini ndiri Mwari waAbhurahama, naMwari waIsaka, naMwari waJakobho? Mwari haasi Mwari wevakafa, asi wevapenyu.
Matthew 22:33 Zvino zvaunga zvichi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa zvakashamisika nedzidziso yake. <div eID="gen258" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen257" type="section"/>
Matthew 22:34 VaFarisi vakati vachinzwa kuti washaisa VaSadhusi remuromo, vakaungana pamwe.
Matthew 22:35 Zvino umwe wavo, nyanzvi yemutemo, waka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>bvunza, achimuidza, ichiti:
Matthew 22:36 Mudzidzisi, ndeupi mutemo mukuru pamurairo?
Matthew 22:37 Jesu akati kwaari: Ida Ishe Mwari wako, nemoyo wako wese, uye nemweya wako wese, uye nemurangariro wako umwe neumwe.
Matthew 22:38 Ndiwo murairo wekutanga uye mukuru.
Matthew 22:39 Wechipiri unofanana nawo, <transChange type="added">ndiwoyu</transChange>: Ida umwe wako se<transChange type="added">zvauno</transChange>zvi<transChange type="added">da</transChange> iwe.
Matthew 22:40 Pamirairo iyi miviri, murairo wese nevaporofita zvakaremberedzwa. <div eID="gen260" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen259" type="section"/>
Matthew 22:41 Zvino VaFarisi vachakaungana, Jesu akavabvunza,
Matthew 22:42 achiti: Munofungei pamusoro paKristu? Mwanakomana waani? Vakati kwaari: WaDhavhidhi.
Matthew 22:43 Akati kwavari: Ko Dhavhidhi wakagomutumidza sei muMweya <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> Ishe, achiti:
Matthew 22:44 Ishe wakati kuna Ishe wangu: Gara kurudyi rwangu, kusvikira ndaita vavengi vako chitsiko chetsoka dzako?
Matthew 22:45 Zvino kana Dhavhidhi achimuti Ishe, anova mwanakomana wake sei?
Matthew 22:46 Zvino hakuna akagona kumupindura shoko; uye kwakange kusina munhu kubva pazuva iro wakatsunga kumubvunzazve.  <chapter eID="Matt.22"/><div eID="gen262" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen261" type="section"/>
Matthew 23:0 <div sID="gen263" type="section"/> <chapter n="23" osisID="Matt.23" sID="Matt.23"/>  <div sID="gen264" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 23:1 Ipapo Jesu wakataura kuzvaunga nekuvadzidzi vake,
Matthew 23:2 achiti: Vanyori neVaFarisi vagere pachigaro chaMozisi;
Matthew 23:3 saka zvese chero zvipi zvavanokuudzai kuti muzvichengete, chengetai nekuita; asi musaita semabasa avo; nokuti vanotaura, asi havaiti.
Matthew 23:4 Nokuti vanosunga mitoro inorema uye inorwadza kutakura, vachiisa pamafudzi evanhu, asi havadi kuisudurusa nemunwe wavo.
Matthew 23:5 Asi mabasa avo ese vanoaita kuti vaonekwe nevanhu; nokuti vanofarisa mafirakitera* avo, vanorebesa mipendero yenguvo dzavo;
Matthew 23:6 vanoda chinzvimbo chakakwirira pazvirairo, nezvigaro zvemberi mumasinagoge,
Matthew 23:7 nekwaziso pamisika, nekunzi nevanhu: Rabhi*, Rabhi. <div eID="gen264" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 23:8 Asi imwi musaidzwa Rabhi, nokuti umwe ndiye mudzidzisi wenyu, Kristu; imwi mese muri hama.
Matthew 23:9 Musaidza munhu panyika baba venyu; nokuti umwe ndiBaba venyu, ivo vari kumatenga.
Matthew 23:10 Musaidzwawo vadzidzisi; nokuti umwe ndiye Mudzidzisi wenyu, iye Kristu.
Matthew 23:11 Asi mukurusa pamuri achava muranda wenyu.
Matthew 23:12 Zvino ani nani anozvikwiridzira achaderedzwa; uye ani nani anozvideredza, achakwiridzirwa. <div eID="gen265" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 23:13 Asi mune nhamo, vanyori neVaFarisi, vanyepedzeri! Nokuti munopfigira vanhu ushe hwekumatenga; nokuti imwi hamupindi, zvekare hamutenderi vanopinda kupinda.
Matthew 23:14 Mune nhamo, vanyori neVaFarisi, vanyepedzeri, nokuti munodya dzimba dzechirikadzi, uye muchiita mano-mano eminyengetero mirefu; naizvozvo muchagamuchira kutongwa nekupfuurisa.
Matthew 23:15 Mune nhamo, vanyori neVaFarisi, vanyepedzeri, nokuti munopoteredza gungwa nenyika kuzoita umwe atendeuke kuva muJudha; kana ava <transChange type="added">saizvozvo</transChange>, munomuita mwanakomana wegehena kukunda imwi kaviri. <div eID="gen266" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 23:16 Mune nhamo, vatungamiriri vakapofumara, munoti: Ani nani anopika netembere, hachisi chinhu, asi ani nani anopika negoridhe yetembere, ane ngava.
Matthew 23:17 Mapenzi nemapofu! Nokuti chikuru ndechipi: Goridhe, kana tembere inoita goridhe rive dzvene?
Matthew 23:18 Uye: Ani nani anopika nearitari, hachisi chinhu; asi ani nani anopika nechipo chiri pamusoro payo, ane ngava.
Matthew 23:19 Mapenzi nemapofu! Nokuti chikuru ndechipi: Chipo, kana aritari inoita chipo chive chitsvene?
Matthew 23:20 Naizvozvo anopika nearitari, anopika nayo nezvese zviri pamusoro payo.
Matthew 23:21 Neanopika netembere, anopika nayo, neanogara mairi.
Matthew 23:22 Neanopika nedenga, anopika nechigaro cheushe chaMwari, neanogara pamusoro pacho. <div eID="gen267" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 23:23 Mune nhamo, vanyori neVaFarisi, vanyepedzeri, nokuti munopa chegumi cheminte* neadhiri* nekumini*, muchirega zvakakosha zvemurairo <transChange type="added">zvinoti</transChange>: Mutongo netsitsi nekutendeka; izvi zvakafanira kuita nekusarega zvimwe.
Matthew 23:24 Vatungamiriri vakapofumara, munomimina runyunyu, muchimedza kamera.
Matthew 23:25 Mune nhamo, vanyori neVaFarisi, vanyepedzeri! Nokuti munonatsa kunze kwemukombe nekwendiro, asi mukati muzere neupambi nekusazvidzora.
Matthew 23:26 MuFarisi wakapofumara, tanga kunatsa mukati memukombe nendiro, kuti kunze kwazvo kugochenawo. <div eID="gen268" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 23:27 Mune nhamo, vanyori neVaFarisi, vanyepedzeri! Nokuti makafanana nemarinda akadzudzurwa kuitwa machena, anoonekwa akanaka zvirokwazvo kunze, asi mukati muzere nemafupa evakafa netsvina yese.
Matthew 23:28 Saizvozvo nemwi munoonekwa kunze makarurama kuvanhu, asi mukati muzere neunyepedzeri neuipi. <div eID="gen269" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 23:29 Mune nhamo, vanyori neVaFarisi, vanyepedzeri! Nokuti munovaka marinda evaporofita, nekushongedza makuva evakarurama,
Matthew 23:30 muchiti: Dai taiva pamazuva emadzibaba edu, tingadai tisina kugoverana navo paropa revaporofita.
Matthew 23:31 Saka munopupura nezvenyu kuti muri vanakomana vevakauraya vaporofita.
Matthew 23:32 Nemwi chizadzisai chiyero chemadzibaba enyu!
Matthew 23:33 <transChange type="added">Imwi</transChange> nyoka, zvizvarwa zvezviva, muchatiza sei kutonga kwegehena? <div eID="gen270" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 23:34 Naizvozvo, tarirai, ini ndinotumira kwamuri vaporofita nevakachenjera nevanyori; <transChange type="added">vamwe</transChange> vavo vamuchauraya nekuvaroverera pamuchinjikwa; <transChange type="added">vamwe</transChange> vavo vamucharova netyava mumasinagoge enyu, nekushusha muguta nemuguta.
Matthew 23:35 Kuti kuuye pamusoro penyu ropa rese rakarurama, rakateurirwa panyika, kubva paropa raAberi wakarurama, kusvikira paropa raZakaria, mwanakonana waBharakia, wamakauraya pakati petembere nearitari.
Matthew 23:36 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Izvi zvese zvichauya pamusoro pezera iri. <div eID="gen271" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen263" type="section"/>
Matthew 23:37 Jerusarema! Jerusarema! Iwe unouraya vaporofita, nekutaka nemabwe avo vanotumwa kwauri! Ndakange ndichida kazhinji sei kuunganidza vana vako, semhambo inounganidza hukwana dzayo muzasi memapapiro, asi hamuna kuda.
Matthew 23:38 Tarirai, imba yenyu yasiiwa kwamuri riri dongo.
Matthew 23:39 Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Hamuchatongondioni kubva zvino, kusvikira muchiti: Wakaropafadzwa anouya muzita raIshe. <chapter eID="Matt.23"/><div eID="gen273" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen272" type="section"/>
Matthew 24:0 <div sID="gen274" type="section"/> <chapter n="24" osisID="Matt.24" sID="Matt.24"/>  <div sID="gen275" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 24:1 Zvino Jesu wakabuda akabva patembere; vadzidzi vake ndokuswedera kuzomuratidza zvivakwa zvetembere.
Matthew 24:2 Jesu akati kwavari: Hamuoni zvinhu izvi zvese here? Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Hakungatozongosiiwi pano ibwe pamusoro pebwe risingatongoputsirwi pasi. <div eID="gen275" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen274" type="section"/>
Matthew 24:3 Kuzoti agere pagomo reMiorivhi, vadzidzi vakauya kwaari vari vega vachiti: Tiudzei, zvinhu izvi zvichava rinhi? Nechiratidzo chekuuya kwenyu nechokuguma kwenyika <transChange type="added">chichava</transChange> chipi? <div eID="gen277" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 24:4 Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Chenjerai kuti kusava neanokutsausai;
Matthew 24:5 nokuti vazhinji vachauya muzita rangu, vachiti: Ndini Kristu; uye vachatsausa vazhinji.
Matthew 24:6 Zvino muchanzwa zvehondo nerunyerekupe rwehondo; chenjerai, musakanganiswa; nokuti zvese zvinofanira kuitika; asi kuguma kuchigere.
Matthew 24:7 Nokuti rudzi ruchamukira rudzi, neushe <transChange type="added">hucha</transChange>mukira ushe, uye kuchava nenzara nematenda nekudengenyeka kwenyika kunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana.
Matthew 24:8 Asi zvese izvi kutanga kwemarwadzo. <div eID="gen278" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 24:9 Ipapo vachakukumikidzai mukutambudzika, uye vachakuurayai; uye muchavengwa nemarudzi ese nekuda kwezita rangu.
Matthew 24:10 Zvino ipapo vazhinji vachagumbuswa, uye vachatengesana, nekuvengana.
Matthew 24:11 Uye vaporofita vazhinji venhema vachamuka, vatsause vazhinji.
Matthew 24:12 Uye nekuda kwekuti uipi huchawanda, rudo rwevazhinji rwuchatonhora.
Matthew 24:13 Asi anotsungirira kusvikira pakuguma, ndiye achaponeswa.
Matthew 24:14 Uye evhangeri iyi yeushe ichaparidzwa munyika yese chive uchapupu kumarudzi ese; ipapo kuguma kuchasvika. <div eID="gen279" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 24:15 Naizvozvo kana muchiona nyangadzi yekuparadza yakarehwa naDhanyeri muporofita, imire panzvimbo tsvene (anorava ngaanzwisise),
Matthew 24:16 zvino vari muJudhiya ngavatizire kumakomo;
Matthew 24:17 ari pamusoro pedenga reimba ngaarege kuburuka kuzotora chinhu kubva mumba make;
Matthew 24:18 neari kumunda ngaarege kudzokera shure ku<transChange type="added">no</transChange>tora nguvo dzake.
Matthew 24:19 Asi mune nhamo vane mimba nevanonwisa nemazuva iwayo! <div eID="gen280" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 24:20 Asi nyengeterai kuti kutiza kwenyu kurege kuva muchando, kana nesabata.
Matthew 24:21 Nokuti ipapo kuchavapo kutambudzika kukuru, kusati kwakavapo kwakadaro kubva pakutanga kwenyika kusvikira zvino, uye kusingazovipozve.
Matthew 24:22 Dai mazuva ayo asaipfupiswa, hakuna nyama zvachose yaiponeswa; asi nekuda kwevasanangurwa mazuva ayo achapfupiswa. <div eID="gen281" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 24:23 Zvino kana munhu akati kwamuri: Tarirai, Kristu pano, kana apo, musatenda.
Matthew 24:24 Nokuti kuchamuka vana kristu venhema nevaporofita venhema, vachaita zviratidzo zvikuru nezvishamiso, zvekuti kana zvichibvira, vatsause nevasanangurwa.
Matthew 24:25 Tarirai, ndagara ndakuudzai.
Matthew 24:26 Naizvozvo kana vakati kwamuri: Tarirai, ari murenje, musabuda; tarirai <transChange type="added">ari</transChange> mudzimba dzemukati, musatenda.
Matthew 24:27 Nokuti semheni inobuda kumabvazuva ichipenya kusvikira kumavirira, kuchava saizvozvo nekuuya kweMwanakomana wemunhu.
Matthew 24:28 Nokuti pese-pese pane chitunha, ndipo pachaunganidzwa magora. <div eID="gen282" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 24:29 Pakarepo shure kwekutambudzika kwemazuva ayo zuva richasvibiswa, nemwedzi hauzopi chiedza chawo, uye nyeredzi dzichawa kudenga, nemasimba ekumatenga achazungunuswa.
Matthew 24:30 Uye ipapo kuchaonekwa chiratidzo cheMwanakomana wemunhu kudenga; uye ipapo marudzi ese enyika achachema, uye achaona Mwanakomana wemunhu achiuya pamakore ekudenga nesimba nekubwinya kukuru.
Matthew 24:31 Uye achatuma vatumwa vake nekurira kukuru kwehwamanda, vachaunganidza vasanangurwa vake kubva kumhepo ina, kubva kumigumo yematenga kusvikira kumigumo yawo. <div eID="gen283" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen276" type="section"/>
Matthew 24:32 Asi dzidzai mufananidzo kubva pamuonde: Kana davi rawo rava ikozvino nyoro, richitunga mashizha, munoziva kuti zhizha rava pedo.
Matthew 24:33 Saizvozvo nemwi, kana moona izvozvi zvese, zivai kuti zvava pedo pamikova.
Matthew 24:34 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Zera iri haringatongopfuuri kusvikira izvozvi zvese zvaitika.
Matthew 24:35 Denga nenyika zvichapfuura, asi mashoko angu haangatongopfuuri. <div eID="gen285" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 24:36 Asi zvezuva iro neawa hakuna anozviziva, kwete kunyange vatumwa vekumatenga, asi Baba vangu chete. <div eID="gen286" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 24:37 Asi semazuva aNowa, kuchaita saizvozvowo kuuya kweMwanakomana wemunhu.
Matthew 24:38 Nokuti sepamazuva akatangira mafashame, vaidya nekunwa, vachiwana nekuwaniswa, kusvikira zuva Nowa raakapinda muareka,
Matthew 24:39 uye vakange vasingazivi, kusvikira kwasvika mafashame avabvisa vese, kuchaita saizvozvowo kuuya kweMwanakomana wemunhu.
Matthew 24:40 Ipapo vaviri vachava mumunda; umwe achatorwa, uye umwe achasiiwa.
Matthew 24:41 Vakadzi vaviri vachikuya paguyo; umwe achatorwa, neumwe achasiiwa. <div eID="gen287" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 24:42 Rindai naizvozvo, nokuti hamuzivi nguva Ishe wenyu yaachauya.
Matthew 24:43 Asi zivai izvi, kuti dai mwene weimba aiziva kuti inguva yekurinda ipi ichasvika mbavha, angadai airinda, akasatendera imba yake kuti ipazwe.
Matthew 24:44 Naizvozvo imwiwo ivai makagadzirira; nokuti neawa ramusingafungiri, Mwanakomana wemunhu anouya. <div eID="gen288" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 24:45 Ko ndiani muranda wakatendeka, wakangwara, ishe wake wakamugadza pamusoro pevaranda vake kuti avape kudya nenguva yakafanira?
Matthew 24:46 Wakaropafadzwa muranda uyo, unoti kana ishe wake achisvika anomuwana achiita saizvozvo.
Matthew 24:47 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Achamugadza pamusoro pezvese zvaanazvo.
Matthew 24:48 Asi kana muranda uyo wakaipa akati mumoyo make: Ishe wangu anonoka kuuya;
Matthew 24:49 ndokutanga kurova vamwe varanda <transChange type="added">vanobata</transChange> pamwe naye, nekudya nekunwa nevararadzi,
Matthew 24:50 ishe wemuranda uyo achasvika nezuva raasingatariri neawa raasingazivi,
Matthew 24:51 akamugura nepakati, agoisa mugove wake pamwe nevanyepedzeri; apo pachava nekuchema nekugeda-geda kwemeno.  <chapter eID="Matt.24"/><div eID="gen289" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen284" type="section"/>
Matthew 25:0 <div sID="gen290" type="section"/> <chapter n="25" osisID="Matt.25" sID="Matt.25"/>  <div sID="gen291" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 25:1 Panguva iyo ushe hwekumatenga huchava hwakafananidzwa nevasikana gumi vakatora marambi avo vakabuda kunochingamidza muwani.
Matthew 25:2 Zvino vashanu vavo vakange vakachenjera, uye vashanu <transChange type="added">vari</transChange> mapenzi.
Matthew 25:3 Avo vari mapenzi vakatora marambi avo, vakasatora mafuta pamwe navo.
Matthew 25:4 Asi vakachenjera vakatora mafuta mumidziyo yavo nemarambi avo.
Matthew 25:5 Zvino muwani wakati achinonoka, vese vakatsumwaira vakarara.
Matthew 25:6 Asi pakati peusiku kwakadanidzirwa: Tarirai, muwani ouya, budai munomuchingamidza!
Matthew 25:7 Zvino vasikana avo vese vakamuka, vakagadzira marambi avo.
Matthew 25:8 Mapenzi akati kune vakachenjera: Tipei pamafuta enyu nokuti marambi edu odzima.
Matthew 25:9 Asi vakachenjera vakapindura vachiti: Zvimwe haangakwaniri isu nemwi; asi zviri nani endai kune vanotengesa munozvitengera.
Matthew 25:10 Vakati vachienda kunotenga, muwani akasvika. Zvino vakange vakagadzirira vakapinda naye mumuchato, mukova ukapfigwa.
Matthew 25:11 Zvino pashure kwakauyawo vamwe vasikana, vachiti: Ishe, ishe, tizarurirei!
Matthew 25:12 Asi wakapindura akati: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Handikuziviyi imwi.
Matthew 25:13 Naizvozvo rindai, nokuti hamuzivi zuva kana awa Mwanakomana wemunhu raachauya mariri. <div eID="gen291" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen290" type="section"/>
Matthew 25:14 Nokuti <transChange type="added">zvakaita</transChange> semunhu wakafamba rwendo, akadana varanda vake, akavapa zvaaiva nazvo.
Matthew 25:15 Uye kune umwe wakapa matarenda* mashanu, umwe maviri, umwe rimwe, umwe neumwe zvakakwanirana nesimba rake; pakarepo akafamba rwendo.
Matthew 25:16 Uye wakagamuchira matarenda mashanu akaenda akaita mhindu nawo, akaita mamwe matarenda mashanu.
Matthew 25:17 Saizvozvowo wemaviri, iye akawanawo mamwe maviri.
Matthew 25:18 Asi wakagamuchira rimwe wakaenda akachera pasi, akaviga mari yaishe wake.
Matthew 25:19 Shure kwenguva refu, ishe wevaranda avo wakasvika, akagadzira zvemari navo.
Matthew 25:20 Kwakauya wakange agamuchira matarenda mashanu akauisa mamwe matarenda mashanu achiti: Ishe, makandikumikidza matarenda mashanu; tarirai, ndawana pamusoro pawo mamwe matarenda mashanu.
Matthew 25:21 Ishe wake akati kwaari: Zvakanaka, muranda wakanaka uye wakatendeka, wakange wakatendeka pazvishoma, ndichakuisa pamusoro pezvizhinji; pinda mumufaro waishe wako.
Matthew 25:22 Wakange agamuchira matarenda maviri akauyawo akati: Ishe, makandikumikidza matarenda maviri; tarirai, ndawana mamwe matarenda maviri pamusoro pawo.
Matthew 25:23 Ishe wake akati kwaari: Zvakanaka, muranda wakanaka uye wakatendeka, wakange wakatendeka pazvishoma, ndichakuisa pamusoro pezvizhinji; pinda mumufaro waishe wako.
Matthew 25:24 Asi wakange agamuchira tarenda rimwe naiye wakauya akati: Ishe, ndakange ndichikuzivai imwi kuti muri munhu wakawoma, munokohwa pamusina kudzvara, munounganidza pamusina kukusha;
Matthew 25:25 zvino ndakatya, ndikaenda ndikanoviga tarenda renyu muvhu; tarirai, mava nechenyu!
Matthew 25:26 Ishe wake akapindura akati kwaari: Muranda wakaipa une usimbe, wakange uchiziva kuti ndinokohwa pandisina kudzvara, ndichiunganidza pandisina kukusha.
Matthew 25:27 Saka waifanira kuisa mari yangu kuvatsinhanisi vemari, neni pakusvika ndingadai ndagamuchira zvangu nezvibereko.
Matthew 25:28 Naizvozvo mutorerei tarenda, mupe kune ane matarenda gumi.
Matthew 25:29 Nokuti wese anazvo achapiwa ave nezvakawandisa; asi kubva kune asina kuchatorwa nechaanacho.
Matthew 25:30 Uye muranda pasina murasirei kurima rekunze kwekupedzisira; ipapo pachava nekuchema nekugeda-geda kwemeno. <div eID="gen293" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen292" type="section"/>
Matthew 25:31 Zvino kana Mwanakomana wemunhu achiuya mukubwinya kwake, nevatumwa vatsvene vese vanaye, ipapo achagara pachigaro cheushe chekubwinya kwake.
Matthew 25:32 Zvino pamberi pake pachaunganidzwa ndudzi dzese; uye achadziparadzanisa vamwe kubva kune vamwe, semufudzi anoparadzanisa makwai kubva kumbudzi.
Matthew 25:33 Achamisa makwai kuruoko rwake rwerudyi, asi mbudzi kuruboshwe.
Matthew 25:34 Zvino Mambo achati kune vari kuruoko rwake rwerudyi: Uyai, imwi makaropafadzwa naBaba vangu, mugare nhaka yeushe hwakagadzirirwa imwi kubva pakuvamba kwenyika.
Matthew 25:35 Nokuti ndakange ndine nzara, mukandipa chekudya; ndakange ndine nyota, mukandipa chekunwa; ndakange ndiri mweni, mukandigamuchira;
Matthew 25:36 <transChange type="added">ndaka</transChange>shama, mukandipfekedza; ndakange ndichirwara, mukandishanyira; ndakange ndiri mutirongo, mukauya kwandiri.
Matthew 25:37 Ipapo vakarurama vachamupindura vachiti: Ishe, takakuonai rinhi mune nzara, tika<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>pai chekudya, kana mune nyota, tikapa chekunwa?
Matthew 25:38 Takakuonai rinhi muri mweni, tika<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>gamuchira<transChange type="added">i</transChange>, kana makashama, tikapfekedza?
Matthew 25:39 Takakuonai rinhi muchirwara, kana mutirongo, tikauya kwamuri?
Matthew 25:40 Uye Mambo achapindura ati kwavari: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Sezvamakaitira umwe wehama dzangu idzi mudikisa, makaitira ini.
Matthew 25:41 Ipapo uchatiwo kune vari kuruoko rweruboshwe: Ibvai kwandiri, imwi makatukwa, <transChange type="added">muende</transChange> kumoto usingaperi, wakagadzirirwa dhiabhorosi nevatumwa vake.
Matthew 25:42 Nokuti ndakange ndine nzara, mukasandipa chekudya; ndakange ndine nyota, mukasandipa chekunwa;
Matthew 25:43 ndakange ndiri mweni, mukasandigamuchira; <transChange type="added">ndaka</transChange>shama, mukasandipfekedza; <transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>chirwara, nemutirongo, mukasandishanyira.
Matthew 25:44 Ipapo avawo vachamupindura vachiti: Ishe, takakuonai rinhi mune nzara, kana mune nyota, kana muri mweni, kana makashama, kana muchirwara, kana muri mutirongo, tikasakushandirai?
Matthew 25:45 Zvino achavapindura achiti: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Pamusina kuitira umwe wevadikisa ava, hamuna kuitirawo ini.
Matthew 25:46 Ava vachaenda kukurangwa kusingaperi; asi vakarurama kuupenyu husingaperi.  <chapter eID="Matt.25"/><div eID="gen295" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen294" type="section"/>
Matthew 26:0 <div sID="gen296" type="section"/> <chapter n="26" osisID="Matt.26" sID="Matt.26"/>  <div sID="gen297" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 26:1 Zvakaitika Jesu apedza mashoko aya ese, akati kuvadzidzi vake:
Matthew 26:2 Munoziva kuti mushure memazuva maviri ichava pasika, uye Mwanakomana wemunhu achatengeswa kuti arovererwe pamuchinjikwa.
Matthew 26:3 Ipapo kwakaungana vapristi vakuru nevanyori nevakuru vevanhu muchivanze chemupristi mukuru wainzi Kayafasi.
Matthew 26:4 Vakarangana kuti vabate Jesu nemano, vago<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>uraya.
Matthew 26:5 Asi vakati: Kwete pamutambo, kuti kurege kuva nebongozozo pakati pevanhu. <div eID="gen297" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen296" type="section"/>
Matthew 26:6 Zvino Jesu wakati ari paBhetaniya mumba maSimoni wemaperembudzi,
Matthew 26:7 kwakasvika kwaari mukadzi nechinu chearibhasiteri* chechizoro chinokosha zvikuru, akadururira mumusoro wake agere pakudya.
Matthew 26:8 Asi vadzidzi vake vakati vachiona, vakatsamwa vachiti: Kutambisa uku ndokwei?
Matthew 26:9 Nokuti chizoro ichi chingadai chatengeswa <transChange type="added">nemari</transChange> zhinji, ikapiwa varombo.
Matthew 26:10 Asi Jesu aziva wakati kwavari: Munotambudzirei mukadzi? Nokuti aita basa rakanaka kwandiri.
Matthew 26:11 Nokuti varombo munavo nguva dzese, asi ini hamuneni nguva dzese.
Matthew 26:12 Nokuti pakundidira chizoro ichi pamuviri wangu, waitira kuvigwa kwangu.
Matthew 26:13 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Kwese kunozoparidzirwa evhangeri iyi panyika yese, izvi mukadzi zvaaitawo zvicharehwa, chive chirangaridzo chake. <div eID="gen299" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen298" type="section"/>
Matthew 26:14 Ipapo umwe wevanegumi nevaviri, wainzi Judhasi Isikariyoti, wakaenda kuvapristi vakuru,
Matthew 26:15 akati: Munoda kundipei, ini ndigomukumikidza kwamuri? Vakamutemera masirivheri makumi matatu.
Matthew 26:16 Uye kubva panguva iyo akatsvaka mukana wakafanira kuti amukumikidze. <div eID="gen301" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen300" type="section"/>
Matthew 26:17 Nerekutanga rezvingwa zvisina mbiriso vadzidzi vakauya kuna Jesu vachiti kwaari: Ndekupi kwamunoda kuti tikugadzirirei kudya pasika?
Matthew 26:18 Akati: Endai muguta kune umwe munhu, muti kwaari: Mudzidzisi anoti: Nguva yangu yava pedo; ndichaita pasika kwauri nevadzidzi vangu.
Matthew 26:19 Vadzidzi vakaita Jesu sezvaakavaraira; vakagadzirira pasika.
Matthew 26:20 Zvino ava madekwani akagara pakudya nevanegumi nevaviri.
Matthew 26:21 Vakati vachidya akati: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Umwe wenyu achanditengesa.
Matthew 26:22 Zvino vakashungurudzika zvikuru, vakatanga umwe neumwe wavo kuti kwaari: Ishe, zvirokwazvo handisi ini, ndizvo here?
Matthew 26:23 Ndokupindura akati: Anoseva ruoko neni mundiro ndiye achanditengesa.
Matthew 26:24 Mwanakomana wemunhu anoenda hake sezvazvakanyorwa pamusoro pake; asi ane nhamo munhu uyo Mwanakomana wemunhu waanotengeswa naye! Zvaiva nani kwaari kana munhu uyo aiva asina kuberekwa.
Matthew 26:25 Judhasi uyo wakamutengesa ndokupindura akati: Rabhi*, zvirokwazvo handisi ini, ndizvo here? Akati kwaari: Wataura iwe. <div eID="gen303" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 26:26 Zvino vakati vachidya, Jesu akatora chingwa akaropafadza, akamedura ndokupa vadzidzi akati: Torai, idyai, ichi ndiwo muviri wangu.
Matthew 26:27 Akatora mukombe, akavonga, akapa kwavari, achiti: Inwai mese pauri.
Matthew 26:28 Nokuti iri iropa rangu, iro resungano itsva, rinoteurirwa vazhinji rekukanganwirwa kwezvivi.
Matthew 26:29 Asi ndinoti kwamuri: Kubva zvino handichatongonwi zvechibereko ichi chemuzambiringa, kusvikira zuva iro randichazonwa naro nemwi chava chitsva muushe hwaBaba vangu.
Matthew 26:30 Zvino vakati vaimba rwiyo vakabuda vakaenda kugomo reMiorivhi. <div eID="gen304" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen302" type="section"/>
Matthew 26:31 Ipapo Jesu wakati kwavari: Imwi mese muchagumburwa nekuda kwangu usiku huno; nokuti kwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Ndicharova mufudzi, uye makwai eboka achaparadzirwa.
Matthew 26:32 Asi shure kwekunge ndamutswa, ndichakutungamirirai kuGarirea.
Matthew 26:33 Asi Petro wakapindura akati kwaari: Kunyange vese vakagumburwa nekuda kwenyu, ini handingatongogumburwi.
Matthew 26:34 Jesu akati kwaari: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri: Muusiku huno, jongwe risati rarira, uchandiramba katatu.
Matthew 26:35 Petro akati kwaari: Kunyange zvakandifanira kufa nemwi, handingatongokurambiyi. Vadzidziwo vese vakadaro. <div eID="gen306" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen305" type="section"/>
Matthew 26:36 Zvino Jesu wakasvika navo panzvimbo inonzi Getsemani, akati kuvadzidzi: Garai pano ndichamboenda ndinonyengetera uko.
Matthew 26:37 Akatora pamwe naye Petro nevanakomana vaviri vaZebhedhi, akatanga kusuruvara nekushungurudzika.
Matthew 26:38 Ipapo akati kwavari: Mweya wangu unosuruvara kwazvo kusvikira parufu; garai pano murinde neni.
Matthew 26:39 Akaenda mberi zvishoma, akawa nechiso chake, akanyengetera achiti: Baba vangu, kana zvichibvira, mukombe uyu ngaupfuure kwandiri. Asi kusava sezvandinoda ini asi se<transChange type="added">zvamunoda</transChange> imwi.
Matthew 26:40 Akauya kuvadzidzi, akavawana varere, akati kuna Petro: Saka hamuna kugona kurinda neni awa rimwe here?
Matthew 26:41 Rindai munyengetere, kuti musapinda mumuedzo; mweya unoda zvirokwazvo, asi nyama ine utera.
Matthew 26:42 Akaendazve rwechipiri akanyengetera, achiti: Baba vangu, kana mukombe uyu usingagoni kupfuura kubva kwandiri, kunze kwekuti ndaunwa, kuda kwenyu ngakuitwe.
Matthew 26:43 Akauya, akavawana vavatazve, nokuti meso avo akange orema.
Matthew 26:44 Akavasiya, akaendazve akanyengetera rwechitatu, achitaura mashoko iwawo.
Matthew 26:45 Ndokuuya kuvadzidzi vake ndokuti kwavari: Chirambai murere muzorore; tarirai, awa raswedera, Mwanakomana wemunhu wotengeswa mumaoko evatadzi.
Matthew 26:46 Simukai, ngatiende, tarirai, wonditengesa wava pedo. <div eID="gen308" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen307" type="section"/>
Matthew 26:47 Zvino achataura, tarira, Judhasi umwe wevanegumi nevaviri wakasvika, chaunga chikuru chinaye chine minondo netsvimbo chichibva kuvapristi vakuru nevakuru vevanhu.
Matthew 26:48 Zvino iye wakamutengesa wakavapa chiratidzo achiti: Uyo wandichatsvoda, ndiye, mumubate.
Matthew 26:49 Uye pakarepo akasvika kuna Jesu, akati: Hekanhi, Rabhi! Akamutsvoda.
Matthew 26:50 Jesu akati kwaari: Shamwari, wavingei? Ipapo vakaswedera vakaisa maoko pana Jesu, vakamubata.
Matthew 26:51 Uye tarira, umwe wevaiva naJesu akatandavadza ruoko, akavhomora munondo wake akatema muranda wemupristi mukuru, akagura nzeve yake.
Matthew 26:52 Ipapo Jesu akati kwaari: Dzosera munondo wako munzvimbo yawo, nokuti vese vanobata munondo vanoparara nemunondo.
Matthew 26:53 Kana unofunga here kuti handigoni ikozvino kukumbira kuna Baba vangu, vakandigadzikira mapoka emauto evatumwa anopfuura gumi nemaviri?
Matthew 26:54 Ko magwaro angazadziswa sei kuti zvinofanira kuva saizvozvo?
Matthew 26:55 Nenguva iyo Jesu wakati kuzvaunga: Mabuda semunovinga gororo neminondo netsvimbo kuzondibata here? Ndaigara nemwi zuva nezuva ndichidzidzisa mutembere, asi hamuna kundibata.
Matthew 26:56 Asi izvi zvese zvaitika, kuti magwaro evaporofita azadziswe. Ipapo vadzidzi vese vakamusiya, vakatiza. <div eID="gen310" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen309" type="section"/>
Matthew 26:57 Avo vakange vabata Jesu vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>endesa kuna Kayafasi mupristi mukuru, apo pakange paungana vanyori nevakuru.
Matthew 26:58 Asi Petro wakamutevera ari kure kusvikira pachivanze chemupristi mukuru, akapinda mukati, akagara nevaranda kuzoona mugumo. <div eID="gen312" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 26:59 Zvino vapristi vakuru nevakuru nedare remakurukota rese vakatsvaka uchapupu hwenhema hunopikisa Jesu kuti vamuuraye.
Matthew 26:60 Asi havana ku<transChange type="added">hu</transChange>wana, kunyange zvapupu zvenhema zvizhinji zvakauya, zvikasa<transChange type="added">hu</transChange>wana. Pakupedzisira kwakasvika zvapupu zvenhema zviviri,
Matthew 26:61 zvikati: Uyu wakati: Ndinogona kuputsa tembere yaMwari, nekuivaka nemazuva matatu.
Matthew 26:62 Zvino mupristi mukuru akasimuka akati kwaari: Haupinduri chinhu here? Ava vanopupurei zvinopikisana newe?
Matthew 26:63 Asi Jesu wakanyarara. Mupristi mukuru akapindura akati kwaari: Ndinokupikisa naMwari mupenyu kuti utiudze kana iwe uri Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari.
Matthew 26:64 Jesu akati kwaari: Wataura iwe; asi ndinoti kwamuri: Kubva zvino muchaona Mwanakomana wemunhu agere kuruoko rwerudyi rwesimba, achiuya pamakore edenga.
Matthew 26:65 Ipapo mupristi mukuru akabvarura nguvo dzake achiti: Wanyomba; tichiri kudirei zvapupu? Tarirai, ikozvino manzwa kunyomba kwake.
Matthew 26:66 Munofungei? Vakapindura vakati: Ane mhosva yerufu. <div eID="gen313" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 26:67 Zvino vakamupfira pachiso, vakamurova netsiva; vamwe vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>rova nembama,
Matthew 26:68 vachiti: Porofita kwatiri, Kristu, ndiani wakurova? <div eID="gen314" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen311" type="section"/>
Matthew 26:69 Petro wakange agere panze pachivanze; ndokuuya kwaari umwe murandakadzi achiti: Iwewo wakange una Jesu weGarirea.
Matthew 26:70 Asi iye wakaramba pamberi pevese achiti: Handizivi zvaunoreva.
Matthew 26:71 Zvino wakati abuda pasuwo, umwe <transChange type="added">mukadzi</transChange> akamuona, akati kune vaivapo: Uyuwo wakange ana Jesu weNazareta.
Matthew 26:72 Akarambazve nemhiko, kuti: Handizivi munhu uyu.
Matthew 26:73 Shure kwechinguva chidiki kwakauya vakange vamire<transChange type="added">po</transChange> vachiti kuna Petro: Zvirokwazvo iwewo uri wavo; nokuti kunyange kutaura kwako kunokuratidza.
Matthew 26:74 Zvino wakatanga kutuka nekupika kuti: Handizivi munhu uyu. Pakarepo jongwe rikarira.
Matthew 26:75 Petro ndokurangarira shoko raJesu raakati kwaari: Jongwe risati rarira, uchandiramba katatu. Ndokubuda panze akachema zvinorwadza.  <chapter eID="Matt.26"/><div eID="gen316" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen315" type="section"/>
Matthew 27:0 <div sID="gen317" type="section"/> <chapter n="27" osisID="Matt.27" sID="Matt.27"/>  <div sID="gen318" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 27:1 Kwakati kwaedza, vapristi vakuru vese nevakuru vevanhu vakarangana kupikisa Jesu kuti vamuuraye.
Matthew 27:2 Vakati vamusunga vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>tungamidza ndokunomukumikidza kuna Pondiyo Pirato mutungamiriri. <div eID="gen318" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen317" type="section"/>
Matthew 27:3 Zvino Judhasi wakange amutengesa aona kuti wapiwa mhosva, akazvidya moyo akadzosera makobiri esirivheri makumi matatu kuvapristi vakuru nevakuru,
Matthew 27:4 achiti: Ndatadza, ndatengesa ropa risina mhosva. Vakati: Zvinei nesu? Zvionere iwe.
Matthew 27:5 Akakanda makobiri esirivheri mutembere, akabva akaenda akanozvisungirira.
Matthew 27:6 Vapristi vakuru vakatora makobiri esirivheri vakati: Hazvitenderwi kuaisa muchivigiro chezvipo, nokuti mutengo weropa.
Matthew 27:7 Vakarangana, vakatenga nawo munda wemuumbi wehari, uve wekuviga vatorwa.
Matthew 27:8 Naizvozvo munda uyo wakanzi munda weropa kusvikira nhasi.
Matthew 27:9 Zvino zvakazadziswa zvakarehwa naJeremiya muporofita achiti: Vakabva vatora makobiri esirivheri makumi matatu, mutengo waiye wakatarirwa mutengo, iye vana vaIsraeri wavakatarira mutengo;
Matthew 27:10 vakaaripira munda wemuumbi wehari, saShe zvaakandiraira. <div eID="gen320" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen319" type="section"/>
Matthew 27:11 Zvino Jesu wakamira pamberi pemutungamiriri. Mutungamiriri akamubvunza achiti: Iwe uri mambo weVaJudha here? Jesu akati kwaari: Unoreva iwe.
Matthew 27:12 Asi wakati achipomerwa mhosva nevapristi vakuru nevakuru, haana kupindura chinhu.
Matthew 27:13 Pirato ndokuti kwaari: Haunzwi <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> zvinhu zvingani zvavanopupura kupokana newe here?
Matthew 27:14 Asi haana kumupindura kunyange pashoko rimwe chete, zvekuti mutungamiriri wakashamisika zvikuru. <div eID="gen322" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 27:15 Zvino pamutambo mutungamiriri aiva netsika <transChange type="added">ye</transChange>kusunungurira chaunga musungwa umwe wavanenge vada.
Matthew 27:16 Uye nenguva iyo vaiva nemusungwa wakakurumbira wainzi Bharabhasi.
Matthew 27:17 Naizvozvo vakati vaungana, Pirato akati kwavari: Ndeupi wamunoda kuti ndikusunungurirei: Bharabhasi kana Jesu anonzi Kristu?
Matthew 27:18 Nokuti wakange achiziva kuti vakange vamukumikidza negodo. <div eID="gen323" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 27:19 Zvino wakati agara pachigaro chekutonga, mukadzi wake akatumira kwaari, achiti: Usava nechokuita neuyo wakarurama, nokuti ndatambudzika zvinhu zvizhinji nhasi muchiroto pamusoro pake. <div eID="gen324" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 27:20 Asi vapristi vakuru nevakuru vakakumbirisa zvaunga kuti vakumbire Bharabhasi, vaparadze Jesu.
Matthew 27:21 Mutungamiriri akapindura akati kwavari: Ndeupi wevaviri wamunoda kuti ndikusunungurirei? Ivo vakati: Bharabhasi.
Matthew 27:22 Pirato akati kwavari: Ko ndichamuitei Jesu anonzi Kristu? Vese vakati kwaari: Ngaarovererwe pamuchinjikwa.
Matthew 27:23 Zvino mutungamiriri akati: Nokuti wakaita chii chakaipa? Asi vakanyanya kudanidzira vachiti: Ngaarovererwe pamuchinjikwa! <div eID="gen325" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 27:24 Pirato wakati achiona kuti hazvibatsiri chinhu asi kutoti poita bongozozo, wakatora mvura akageza maoko pamberi pechaunga achiti: Handina mhosva neropa reuyu wakarurama; muchazvionera imwi.
Matthew 27:25 Vanhu vese ndokupindura vakati: Ropa rake <transChange type="added">ngarive</transChange> pamusoro pedu nepamusoro pevana vedu.
Matthew 27:26 Zvino akavasunungurira Bharabhasi, asi wakati arova Jesu netyava, aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>kumikidza kuti arovererwe pamuchinjikwa. <div eID="gen326" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen321" type="section"/>
Matthew 27:27 Zvino mauto emutungamiriri akaisa Jesu mumba memutungamiriri, hondo yese ikaunganira kwaari.
Matthew 27:28 Vakamukurura, vakamupfekedza nguvo tsvuku.
Matthew 27:29 Vakati varuka korona yeminzwa, ndokupfekedza musoro wake, nerutsanga muruoko rwake rwerudyi. Vakafugama pamberi pake vakamuseka vachiti: Hekanhi, Mambo weVaJudha!
Matthew 27:30 Vakamupfira, ndokutora rutsanga vakamurova mumusoro wake.
Matthew 27:31 Vakati vamuseka, vakamukurura nguvo, vakamupfekedza nguvo dzake vakamuendesa kunoroverera pamuchinjikwa. <div eID="gen328" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen327" type="section"/>
Matthew 27:32 Vakati vachibuda, vakawana munhu weKurini, wainzi Simoni. Vakamumanikidza uyu kuti atakure muchinjikwa wake. <div eID="gen330" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 27:33 Vakati vasvika panzvimbo inonzi Gorogota, ndiko kuti, Nzvimbo yedehenya,
Matthew 27:34 vakamupa vhiniga yakavhenganiswa nenduru kuti anwe; asi wakati aravira akasada kunwa.
Matthew 27:35 Vakati vamuroverera pamuchinjikwa, vakagovana nguvo dzake vachikanda mujenya, kuti zvizadziswe zvakarehwa nemuporofita <transChange type="added">zvinoti</transChange>: Vakagovana nguvo dzangu pakati pavo, vakakanda mujenya pamusoro pechekupfeka changu.
Matthew 27:36 Uye vakagara pasi, vakamurindapo.
Matthew 27:37 Vakaisa pamusoro pemusoro wake <transChange type="added">rugwaro rwe</transChange>mhosva yake rwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: UYU NDIJESU MAMBO WEVAJUDHA. <div eID="gen331" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 27:38 Ndokurovererwa pamuchinjikwa makororo maviri pamwe naye, umwe kuruoko rwerudyi, umwe kuruboshwe.
Matthew 27:39 Vakange vachipfuura vakamunyomba, vachidzungudza misoro yavo,
Matthew 27:40 vachiti: Iwe unoputsa tembere neku<transChange type="added">i</transChange>vaka nemazuva matatu, zviponese; kana uri Mwanakomana waMwari, buruka pamuchinjikwa.
Matthew 27:41 Saizvozvowo vapristi vakuru vachimuseka nevanyori nevakuru vachiti:
Matthew 27:42 Wakaponesa vamwe, iye haagoni kuzviponesa. Kana ari Mambo waIsraeri, ngaaburuke ikozvino pamuchinjikwa, tigomutenda.
Matthew 27:43 Waivimba naMwari; ngaachimusunungura ikozvino kana achimuda. Nokuti wakati: Ndiri Mwanakomana waMwari. <div eID="gen332" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 27:44 Makororowo akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe naye, akamuseka saizvozvo. <div eID="gen333" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen329" type="section"/>
Matthew 27:45 Zvino kubva paawa rechitanhatu kwakava nerima panyika yese kusvikira paawa repfumbamwe.
Matthew 27:46 Neawa rinenge repfumbamwe Jesu wakadanidzira nenzwi guru achiti: "Eri, Eri rama sabakitani?" Ndiko kuti: Mwari wangu, Mwari wangu, mandisiyirei?
Matthew 27:47 Vamwe vevakange vamirepo vakati vanzwa vakati: Uyu anodana Eria.
Matthew 27:48 Pakarepo umwe wavo akamhanya, akatora chipanje, akazadza nevhiniga ndokuisa parutsanga, akamupa kuti anwe.
Matthew 27:49 Asi vamwe vakati: Regai tione kana Eria achiuya kuzomuponesa.
Matthew 27:50 Jesu ndokudanidzirazve nenzwi guru akapa mweya. <div eID="gen335" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 27:51 Zvino tarira, vheiri retembere rakabvaruka kuita <transChange type="added">mapandi</transChange> maviri, kubva kumusoro kusvikira pasi. Nyika ikadengenyeka, mabwe akatsemuka.
Matthew 27:52 Makuva akazarurwa; nemitumbi mizhinji yevatsvene vakange varere ikamutswa.
Matthew 27:53 Vakati vabuda pamakuva shure kwekumuka kwake vakapinda muguta dzvene, vakaonekwa kuvazhinji. <div eID="gen336" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 27:54 Zvino mukuru wezana nevaiva naye vakarinda Jesu vakati vachiona kudengenyeka kwenyika nezvinhu zvakaitika, vakatya zvikuru vachiti: Zvirokwazvo uyu wakange ari Mwanakomana waMwari. <div eID="gen337" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 27:55 Nevakadzi vazhinji vakange varipo, vakatarira vari kure, vakange vatevera Jesu vachibva Garirea vachimushandira.
Matthew 27:56 Pakati pavo paiva naMaria Magidharini, naMaria mai vaJakobho naJose, namai vevanakomana vaZebhedhi. <div eID="gen338" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen334" type="section"/>
Matthew 27:57 Zvino ava manheru kukasvika umwe mufumi achibva Arimatiya wainzi Josefa. Iyewo pachake waiva mudzidzi waJesu.
Matthew 27:58 Uyu wakaenda kuna Pirato akakumbira mutumbi waJesu. Ipapo Pirato akaraira kuti mutumbi aupiwe.
Matthew 27:59 Josefa wakati atora mutumbi, akauputira nemucheka werineni wakachena.
Matthew 27:60 Akauradzika muguva rake idzva, raakange achera muruware; akakungurusira ibwe guru pamukova weguva, akabva. <div eID="gen340" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 27:61 Uye ipapo paiva naMaria Magidharini neumwe Maria, vagere pakatarisana neguva. <div eID="gen341" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 27:62 Nezuva raitevera, raitevera zuva rekugadzirira, vapristi vakuru neVaFarisi vakaungana kuna Pirato,
Matthew 27:63 vachiti: Ishe, tinorangarira kuti munyepedzeri uyo wakati achiri mupenyu: Mushure memazuva matatu ndichamuka.
Matthew 27:64 Naizvozvo rairai kuti guva richengetwe kusvikira zuva retatu; zvimwe vadzidzi vake vangauya usiku vakamuba, vagoti kuvanhu: Wakamuka kuvakafa; kurasika kwekupedzisira kukazova kwakanyanya pane kwekutanga.
Matthew 27:65 Pirato akati kwavari: Mune varindi; endai murichengete sezvamunoziva.
Matthew 27:66 Vakaenda, vakanochengeta guva, vakaisa mucherechedzo pabwe, vane varindi. <chapter eID="Matt.27"/><div eID="gen342" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen339" type="section"/>
Matthew 28:0 <div sID="gen343" type="section"/> <chapter n="28" osisID="Matt.28" sID="Matt.28"/>  <div sID="gen344" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 28:1 Zvino pakupera kwesabata kotanga kuedza, koenda ku<transChange type="added">musi</transChange> wekutanga wevhiki, kwakasvika Maria Magidharini neumwe Maria kuzoona guva.
Matthew 28:2 Zvino tarira, kwakaitika kudengenyeka kwenyika kukuru, nokuti mutumwa waIshe wakaburuka kubva kudenga, akaswedera, akakungurusa ibwe kubva pamukova, akagara pamusoro paro.
Matthew 28:3 Kuonekwa kwake kwakange kwakaita semheni, nechipfeko chake chaiva chichena semagada echando.
Matthew 28:4 Zvino varindi vakadedera nekumutya, vakava sevakafa.
Matthew 28:5 Asi mutumwa akapindura akati kuvakadzi: Musatya imwi; nokuti ndinoziva kuti munotsvaka Jesu wakange arovererwa pamuchinjikwa.
Matthew 28:6 Haasi pano; nokuti wamuka sezvaakareva. Uyai muone nzvimbo Ishe paakange arere.
Matthew 28:7 Kurumidzai kuenda munoudza vadzidzi vake kuti wamuka kuvakafa; uye tarirai anokutungamirirai kuGarirea, ikoko muchanomuona; tarirai, ndakuudzai. <div eID="gen344" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 28:8 Ndokubva vakakurumidza kubuda paguva vane kutya nemufaro mukuru, vakamhanyira kunoudza vadzidzi vake.
Matthew 28:9 Zvino vakati vachienda kunoudza vadzidzi vake, tarira, Jesu wakavachingamidza, achiti: Hekanhi! Vakaswedera vakabata tsoka dzake vakamunamata.
Matthew 28:10 Zvino Jesu akati kwavari: Musatya; endai, munoudza hama dzangu kuti vaende kuGarirea, uye vachanondionako. <div eID="gen345" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 28:11 Vakati vachifamba, tarira, vamwe vevarindi vakaenda muguta vakapira vapristi vakuru zvese zvakaitika.
Matthew 28:12 Vakati vaungana nevakuru, vakarangana, vakapa mari zhinji kumauto,
Matthew 28:13 vachiti: Itii: Vadzidzi vake vakauya usiku vakamuba isu tirere.
Matthew 28:14 Kana izvi zvikazikanwa kumutungamiriri, isu tichamunyengerera, tikuitei musava mukushungurudzika.
Matthew 28:15 Ndokubva vatora mari vakaita sezvavakadzidziswa. Shoko iri rikaparadzirwa pakati peVaJudha kusvikira nhasi. <div eID="gen346" type="x-p"/>
Matthew 28:16 Zvino vadzidzi gumi neumwe vakaenda kuGarirea, kugomo Jesu raakavaraira.
Matthew 28:17 Vakati vachimuona, vakamunamata; asi vamwe vakakonona.
Matthew 28:18 Jesu ndokuswedera akataura kwavari, achiti: Simba rese rakapiwa kwandiri kudenga nepanyika.
Matthew 28:19 Endai naizvozvo muite marudzi ese vadzidzi, muchivabhabhatidza muzita raBaba nereMwanakomana nereMweya Mutsvene;
Matthew 28:20 muchivadzidzisa kuchengeta zvese zvandakakurairai; zvino tarirai, ini ndinemwi mazuva ese kusvikira pakuguma kwenyika. Ameni. <div eID="gen347" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen343" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Matt.28"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen2" osisID="Matt" type="book"/>
Mark 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Mark" sID="gen348" type="book"/>   <milestone n="MARKO" type="x-usfm-h"/>
Mark 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Mark.1" sID="Mark.1"/>
Mark 1:1 Kutanga kweevhangeri yaJesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari;
Mark 1:2 sezvazvakanyorwa muvaporofita <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Tarira, ini ndinotuma mutumwa wangu pamberi pechiso chako, achagadzira nzira yako pamberi pako.
Mark 1:3 Inzwi reanodanidzira murenje, <transChange type="added">richiti</transChange>: Gadzirai mugwagwa waIshe; ruramisai nzira dzake.
Mark 1:4 Johwani wakati achibhabhatidza murenje, achiparidza rubhabhatidzo rwekutendeukira kukanganwiro yezvivi;
Mark 1:5 zvino kwakabudira kwaari nyika yese yeJudhiya, naivo veJerusarema, ndokubhabhatidzwa vese naye murwizi rweJoridhani vachireurura zvivi zvavo.
Mark 1:6 Uye Johwani wakange akapfeka makushe ekamera, nebhanhire rechikumba rakapoteredza chiuno chake, waidya mhashu neuchi hwedondo. <div eID="gen350" type="x-p"/>
Mark 1:7 Akaparidza, achiti: Kunouya ane simba kupfuura ini shure kwangu, wandisina kufanira kukotama kuti ndisunungure tambo yeshangu dzake.
Mark 1:8 Ini zvirokwazvo ndakubhabhatidzai nemvura; asi iye achakubhabhatidzai neMweya Mutsvene. <div eID="gen351" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen349" type="section"/>
Mark 1:9 Zvino zvakaitika nemazuva ayo <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> Jesu wakabva Nazareta yeGarirea, akabhabhatidzwa naJohwani muna Joridhani.
Mark 1:10 Pakarepo achibuda mumvura, wakaona matenga akazarurwa, neMweya senjiva achiburukira pamusoro pake.
Mark 1:11 Zvino kwakaitika inzwi richibva kumatenga <transChange type="added">richiti</transChange>: Iwe uri Mwanakomana wangu anodikanwa, wandinofara maari kwazvo. <div eID="gen353" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen352" type="section"/>
Mark 1:12 Zvino pakarepo Mweya wakamutinhira kurenje.
Mark 1:13 Akavako murenje mazuva makumi mana achiidzwa naSatani, uye wakange ane mhuka dzesango, vatumwa vachimushandira. <div eID="gen355" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen354" type="section"/>
Mark 1:14 Zvino shure kwekukumikidzwa kwaJohwani, Jesu wakasvika muGarirea, achiparidza evhangeri yeushe hwaMwari,
Mark 1:15 achiti: Nguva yazadziswa, uye ushe hwaMwari hwaswedera; tendeukai, mutende evhangeri. <div eID="gen357" type="x-p"/>
Mark 1:16 Wakati achifamba-famba parutivi rwegungwa reGarirea, akaona Simoni naAndiriya munin'ina wake vachikandira mumbure mugungwa; nokuti vakange vari varedzi.
Mark 1:17 Jesu akati kwavari: Nditeverei, ndichakuitai muve varedzi vevanhu.
Mark 1:18 Pakarepo vakasiya mimbure yavo, ndokumutevera.
Mark 1:19 Wakati apfuura zvishoma ipapo, akaona Jakobho waZebhedhi naJohwani munin'ina wake, naivo vari muchikepe vachigadzira mimbure.
Mark 1:20 Pakarepo akavadana; ndokusiya baba vavo Zebhedhi muchikepe nevarikichi, vakamutevera. <div eID="gen358" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen356" type="section"/>
Mark 1:21 Zvino vakapinda muKapenaume; zvino pakarepo nesabata wakapinda musinagoge, akadzidzisa.
Mark 1:22 Vakashamisika nedzidziso yake; nokuti wakavadzidzisa seane simba, kwete sevanyori. <div eID="gen360" type="x-p"/>
Mark 1:23 Zvino kwaiva musinagoge ravo nemunhu wakange ane mweya wetsvina, akadanidzira,
Mark 1:24 achiti: Regai, tinei nemwi, Jesu weNazareta? Mauya kuzotiparadza here? Ndinokuzivai kuti ndimwi ani: Mutsvene waMwari.
Mark 1:25 Jesu ndokumutsiura achiti: Nyarara, ubude maari!
Mark 1:26 Zvino mweya wetsvina wakati amugwinhisa, ndokudanidzira nenzwi guru, akabuda kwaari.
Mark 1:27 Vakashamisika vese, kusvikira vabvunzana, vachiti: Chii ichi? Idzidziso itsva yei iyi? Nokuti nesimba anoraira kunyange mweya yetsvina, uye inomuteerera.
Mark 1:28 Zvino pakarepo shoko rake rikabudira panyika yese yakapoteredza Garirea. <div eID="gen361" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen359" type="section"/>
Mark 1:29 Zvino pakarepo vakati vachibuda musinagoge, vakapinda mumba maSimoni naAndiriya vana Jakobho naJohwani.
Mark 1:30 Asi mai vemukadzi waSimoni vakange varere vane fivhiri, pakarepo vakamuudza nezvavo;
Mark 1:31 akaswedera, akavabata ruoko, akavamutsa; fivhiri ikavarega pakarepo, vakavashandira. <div eID="gen363" type="x-p"/>
Mark 1:32 Zvino ava madekwani, zuva rovira, vakauisa kwaari vese vakange vachirwara nevakange vane madhimoni.
Mark 1:33 Zvino guta rese rakange rakaungana pamukova.
Mark 1:34 Akaporesa vazhinji vakange vachirwara nezvirwere zvakasiyana-siyana, nekubudisa madhimoni mazhinji; uye haana kutendera madhimoni kutaura, nokuti aimuziva. <div eID="gen364" type="x-p"/>
Mark 1:35 Zvino mangwanani kuchine rima guru, wakasimuka, akabuda, akaenda kunzvimbo murenje, akanonyengeterapo.
Mark 1:36 Simoni nevakange vanaye vakamutsvakisisa.
Mark 1:37 Zvino vakati vamuwana vakati kwaari: Vese vanokutsvakai.
Mark 1:38 Ndokubva ati kwavari: Ngatiende kumisha iri pedo, kuti ndinoparidzawo ikoko, nokuti ndizvo zvandakabudira.
Mark 1:39 Akabva aparidza mumasinagoge avo paGarirea rese, achibudisa madhimoni. <div eID="gen365" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen362" type="section"/>
Mark 1:40 Zvino kwakauya kwaari ane maperembudzi, achimukumbirisa, ndokumufugamira achiti kwaari: Kana muchida munogona kundinatsa.
Mark 1:41 Jesu akanzwa tsitsi, akatandavadza ruoko, akamubata akati kwaari: Ndinoda, natswa;
Mark 1:42 achangotaura, maperembudzi akabva kwaari pakarepo, akanatswa.
Mark 1:43 Zvino akamuraira zvikuru, akamurega achienda pakarepo,
Mark 1:44 akati kwaari: Ona kuti urege kuudza munhu chinhu; asi enda, uzviratidze kumupristi, ubaire pamusoro pekunatswa kwako Mozisi zvaakaraira, chive chapupu kwavari.
Mark 1:45 Asi iye wakabuda akatanga kuparidza zvikuru nekuvavaza kunze shoko <transChange type="added">iro</transChange>, zvekuti wakange asingachagoni kupinda muguta pachena, asi wakange ari kunze kunzvimbo dzerenje. Vakauya kwaari vachibva kumativi ese. <chapter eID="Mark.1"/><div eID="gen367" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen366" type="section"/>
Mark 2:0 <div sID="gen368" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="Mark.2" sID="Mark.2"/>  <div sID="gen369" type="x-p"/>
Mark 2:1 Zvino wakapindazve muKapenaume pashure pemazuva; zvikanzwikwa kuti ari mumba.
Mark 2:2 Zvino pakarepo vazhinji vakaungana zvekuti pakange pasisina nzvimbo, kunyange pamukova; akataura shoko kwavari.
Mark 2:3 Vakauya kwaari, vakauisa wakange akafa mitezo, akatakurwa ne<transChange type="added">vanhu</transChange> vana.
Mark 2:4 Zvino vakati vasingagoni kusvika pedo naye nekuda kwechaunga, vakapfurunyura denga paakange ari, vakati va<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>dzura vakaburusira hwanyanza hwaakange arere pahuri iye wakange akafa mitezo.
Mark 2:5 Jesu wakati aona rutendo rwavo akati kune wakange akafa mitezo: Mwana, zvivi zvako zvakanganwirwa kwauri.
Mark 2:6 Zvino vamwe vevanyori vakange vagerepo, vakafunga mumoyo yavo <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>:
Mark 2:7 Uyu anotaurirei kunyomba sezvizvi? Ndiani anogona kukanganwira zvivi kunze kweumwe chete, Mwari?
Mark 2:8 Zvino pakarepo Jesu achiziva mumweya wake kuti vanofunga saizvozvo mukati mavo wakati kwavari: Munofungirei zvinhu izvi mumoyo yenyu?
Mark 2:9 Chii chakareruka zvikuru, kuti kune wakafa mitezo: Zvivi <transChange type="added">zvako</transChange> zvakanganwirwa kwauri; kana kuti: Simuka, utore hwanyanza hwako, ufambe?
Mark 2:10 Asi kuti muzive kuti Mwanakomana wemunhu ane simba panyika rekukanganwira zvivi (akati kune wakange akafa mitezo):
Mark 2:11 Ndinoti kwauri: Simuka utore hwanyanza hwako, uende kumba kwako.
Mark 2:12 Zvino pakarepo wakasimuka, akatora hwanyanza, ndokubuda pamberi pavo vese; zvekuti vese vakashamisika, vakarumbidza Mwari, vachiti: Hatina kumbozviona zvakadai. <div eID="gen369" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen368" type="section"/>
Mark 2:13 Wakabudazve parutivi rwegungwa, chaunga chese chikauya kwaari, akavadzidzisa.
Mark 2:14 Wakati achipfuura, akaona Revhi waArifiyosi agere paimba yemutero, akati kwaari: Nditevere. Akasimuka akamutevera. <div eID="gen371" type="x-p"/>
Mark 2:15 Zvino zvakaitika agere pakudya mumba make, kuti vateresi vazhinji nevatadzi vakagarawo pamwe naJesu nevadzidzi vake; nokuti vakange vari vazhinji vakamutevera.
Mark 2:16 Zvino vanyori neVaFarisi vakati vamuona achidya nevateresi nevatadzi, vakati kuvadzidzi vake: Nemhaka yei achidya nekunwa nevateresi nevatadzi?
Mark 2:17 Jesu wakati achi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa akati kwavari: Vatano havadi chiremba, asi vanorwara. Handina kuuya kuzodana vakarurama, asi vatadzi mukutendeuka. <div eID="gen372" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen370" type="section"/>
Mark 2:18 Uye vadzidzi vaJohwani neveVaFarisi vaitsanya; vakauya vakati kwaari: Nemhaka yeyi vadzidzi vaJohwani neveVaFarisi vachitsanya asi vadzidzi venyu havatsanyi?
Mark 2:19 Jesu akati kwavari: Vana veimba yemuchato vanogona kutsanya muwani achiri kwavari here? Kana vachingova nemuwani kwavari, havagoni kutsanya;
Mark 2:20 asi mazuva achasvika apo muwani achabviswa kwavari, ipapo mumazuva ayo vachatsanya.
Mark 2:21 Uye hakuna anosonera chigamba chemucheka usakaunyana panguvo sharu; kana zvikasadaro chinoiswa chinobvaruka kubva pachiri, chitsva kubva pane chakasakara, buri rikanyanya.
Mark 2:22 Uye hakuna anodira waini itsva muhombodo sharu; kana zvikasadaro waini itsva inoparusa hombodo, waini ikateuka nehombodo ikaparara; asi waini itsva inofanira kudirwa muhombodo itsva. <div eID="gen374" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen373" type="section"/>
Mark 2:23 Zvino zvakaitika kuti achigura nemuminda yezviyo nesabata, vadzidzi vake ndokutanga kutanha hura vachifamba.
Mark 2:24 VaFarisi ndokuti kwaari: Tarira, vanoitirei nesabata izvo zvisiri pamutemo?
Mark 2:25 Iye akati kwavari: Hamuna kutomboverenga here Dhavhidhi zvaakaita, paakange ashaiwa, ava nenzara, iye nevakange vanaye?
Mark 2:26 Kuti wakapinda sei mumba maMwari nenguva yaAbhiatari mupristi mukuru, akadya zvingwa zvekuratidza zvakange zvisiri pamutemo kudyiwa, kunze nevapristi, akapawo kwavari vaiva naye?
Mark 2:27 Akati kwavari: Sabata rakaitirwa munhu, kwete munhu <transChange type="added">kuitirwa</transChange> sabata.
Mark 2:28 Naizvozvo Mwanakomana wemunhu ndiIshe kunyange wesabata.  <chapter eID="Mark.2"/><div eID="gen376" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen375" type="section"/>
