Mark 3:0 <div sID="gen377" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="Mark.3" sID="Mark.3"/>  <div sID="gen378" type="x-p"/>
Mark 3:1 Zvino wakapindazve musinagoge, zvino kwakange kune munhuko wakange ane ruoko rwakawonyana.
Mark 3:2 Zvino vakamutarisisa <transChange type="added">kuona</transChange> kana angamuporesa nesabata, kuti vamupomere.
Mark 3:3 Zvino akati kumunhu waiva neruoko rwakawonyana: Simuka uende pakati.
Mark 3:4 Akati kwavari: Zviri pamutemo here kuita zvakanaka nemasabata, kana kuita zvakaipa? Kuponesa upenyu, kana kuuraya? Asi vakanyarara.
Mark 3:5 Zvino wakati aringa-ringa kwavari, nekutsamwa, ane shungu nekuda kwekuoma kwemoyo wavo, akati kumunhu: Tandavadza ruoko rwako, ndokutandavadza, ruoko rwake ndokuporeswa rwukagwinya serumwe.
Mark 3:6 VaFarisi vakabuda pakarepo vakarangana neVaHerodhe vachimupikisa kuti vangamuparadza sei. <div eID="gen378" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen377" type="section"/>
Mark 3:7 Zvino Jesu akabva nevadzidzi vake <transChange type="added">vakaenda</transChange> kugungwa; chaunga chikuru chikamutevera chichibva kuGarirea, nekuJudhiya,
Mark 3:8 nekuJerusarema, nekuIdhumeya, nemhiri kwaJoridhani, nevakapoteredza Tire neSidhoni, chaunga chikuru, vakati vanzwa makuriro ezvinhu zvaanoita vakauya kwaari.
Mark 3:9 Akataura kuvadzidzi vake kuti igwa diki rimugarire nekuda kwechaunga, kuti varege kumutsikirira.
Mark 3:10 Nokuti wakange aporesa vazhinji zvekuti vaiwira pamusoro pake kuti vamubate vese vakange vane zvirwere.
Mark 3:11 Nemweya yetsvina, payakamuona yakawira pasi pamberi pake, ikadanidzira ichiti: Imwi muri Mwanakomana waMwari.
Mark 3:12 Akairairisa zvikuru kuti irege kumubudisa pachena. <div eID="gen380" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen379" type="section"/>
Mark 3:13 Zvino wakakwira mugomo, akadanira kwaari vaakange achida iye; vakauya kwaari.
Mark 3:14 Akagadza gumi nevaviri, kuti vave naye, nokuti avatume kunoparidza,
Mark 3:15 uye vave nesimba rekuporesa zvirwere nekubudisa madhimoni.
Mark 3:16 NaSimoni akamutumidza zita <transChange type="added">rinonzi</transChange> Petro,
Mark 3:17 naJakobho waZebhedhi, naJohwani munin'ina waJakobho; akavatumidza mazita <transChange type="added">anonzi</transChange> Bowanegesi, ndokuti, vanakomana vekutinhira;
Mark 3:18 naAndiriya, naFiripi, naBhatoromiyo, naMatewu, naTomasi, naJakobho waArifiyosi, naTadhiyo, naSimoni muKenani,
Mark 3:19 naJudhasi Isikariyoti, iye wakamutengesawo. Ndokubva vapinda mumba. <div eID="gen382" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen381" type="section"/>
Mark 3:20 Chaunga chikaunganazve zvekuti vakange vasingagoni kunyange kudya chingwa.
Mark 3:21 Vekwake vakati vachi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa vakabuda kunomubata; nokuti vakati: Anopenga.
Mark 3:22 Nevanyori vakaburuka vachibva kuJerusarema vakati: Ana Bheerizebhuri, uye kuti: Anobudisa madhimoni nemutungamiriri wemadhimoni.
Mark 3:23 Zvino akavadanira kwaari, akati kwavari nemifananidzo: Satani angagona kubudisa Satani sei?
Mark 3:24 Kana ushe hwakapesana huchizvipikisa, ushe uhwo hahungagoni kumira.
Mark 3:25 Kana imba yakapesana ichizvipikisa, imba iyo haigoni kumira.
Mark 3:26 Uye kana Satani achizvimukira, akapesana, haangagoni kumira, asi anoguma.
Mark 3:27 Hakuna angagona kupinda mumba mechikakarara, akapamba nhumbi dzacho, kunze kwekuti atanga kusunga chikakarara, ndokuzopamba imba yacho. <div eID="gen384" type="x-p"/>
Mark 3:28 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Zvivi zvese zvichakanganwirwa kuvanakomana vevanhu, nekunyomba kwese kwavanonyomba nako;
Mark 3:29 asi ani nani anonyomba achipikisa Mweya Mutsvene haana kanganwiro kusvikira narinhi asi ane mhosva yekutongwa kusingaperi.
Mark 3:30 Nokuti vakati: Ane mweya wetsvina. <div eID="gen385" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen383" type="section"/>
Mark 3:31 Zvino kwakauya vanin'ina namai vake, vakamira kunze, vakatumira <transChange type="added">nhume</transChange> kwaari vachimudana.
Mark 3:32 Chaunga chakange chigere chakamukomba; vakati kwaari: Tarirai, mai venyu nevanin'ina venyu <transChange type="added">vari</transChange> panze vanokutsvakai.
Mark 3:33 Akavapindura achiti: Mai vangu ndiani kana vanin'ina vangu?
Mark 3:34 Zvino akaringa-ringa kupoteredza avo vakange vagere vakamukomba akati: Tarirai mai vangu nevanin'ina vangu.
Mark 3:35 Nokuti ani nani anoita kuda kwaMwari, ndiye munin'ina wangu nehanzvadzi yangu namai.  <chapter eID="Mark.3"/><div eID="gen387" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen386" type="section"/>
Mark 4:0 <div sID="gen388" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="Mark.4" sID="Mark.4"/>  <div sID="gen389" type="x-p"/>
Mark 4:1 Zvino wakatangazve kudzidzisa parutivi rwegungwa; kukaungana kwaari chaunga chikuru zvekuti wakapinda muchikepe akagara mugungwa; uye chaunga chese chakange chiri pagungwa panyika. <div eID="gen389" type="x-p"/>
Mark 4:2 Akavadzidzisa zvinhu zvizhinji nemifananidzo, akati kwavari padzidziso yake:
Mark 4:3 Inzwai; tarirai, mukushi wakabuda kunokusha.
Mark 4:4 Zvino zvakaitika pakukusha, imwe yakawira parutivi rwenzira; shiri dzekudenga dzikauya dzikaidya dzikaipedza.
Mark 4:5 Asi imwe yakawira panzvimbo dzine mabwe, payakange isina ivhu zhinji; pakarepo ikamera, nokuti yakange isina udziku hwevhu;
Mark 4:6 asi zuva rakati rabuda, yakapiswa, uye nokuti yakange isina mudzi, yakasvava.
Mark 4:7 Uye imwe yakawira paminzwa, minzwa ikakura ikaivhunga, ikasabereka chibereko.
Mark 4:8 Uye imwe yakawira muvhu rakanaka; ikabereka chibereko chakakura ikawedzera, ikabereka, imwe makumi matatu, neimwe makumi matanhatu, neimwe zana.
Mark 4:9 Ndokuti kwavari: Ane nzeve dzekunzwa, ngaanzwe.
Mark 4:10 Zvino wakati ava ega, vakange vakamukomba nevanegumi nevaviri vakamubvunza zvemufananidzo.
Mark 4:11 Uye akati kwavari: Kwamuri kwakapiwa kuziva chakavanzika cheushe hwaMwari; asi kune avo vari kunze, zvese zvinoitwa nemifananidzo;
Mark 4:12 kuti vachiona vaone asi varege kuonesesa, vachinzwa vanzwe asi vasinganzwisisi, zvimwe chero nguva varege kutendeuka, vakanganwirwe zvivi. <div eID="gen390" type="x-p"/>
Mark 4:13 Zvino akati kwavari: Hamuzivi mufananidzo uyu here? Zvino muchaziva sei mifananidzo yese?
Mark 4:14 Mukushi unokusha shoko.
Mark 4:15 Zvino ava ndivo veparutivi rwenzira, apo panokushwa shoko, uye kana vachirinzwa, pakarepo Satani anouya ndokubvisa shoko rakakushwa mumoyo yavo.
Mark 4:16 Uye saizvozvo ava ndivo vakakushwa panzvimbo dzine mabwe, ivo kana vanzwa shoko, pakarepo vanorigamuchira nemufaro,
Mark 4:17 asi havana mudzi mavari, asi ndevenguva; pashure kana matambudziko kana kushushwa zvichiuya nekuda kweshoko, pakarepo vanogumburwa.
Mark 4:18 Zvino ava ndivo vanokushwa muminzwa, vanonzwa shoko,
Mark 4:19 asi kufunganya kwenyika ino nekunyengera kwefuma neruchiva pamusoro pezvimwe zvinhu zvichipinda, zvichivhunga shoko, rova risingabereki.
Mark 4:20 Naava ndivo vakakushwa muvhu rakanaka, ndivo vanonzwa shoko, ndokugamuchira, vagobereka chibereko, umwe makumi matatu, uye umwe makumi matanhatu, uye umwe zana. <div eID="gen391" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen388" type="section"/>
Mark 4:21 Zvino wakati kwavari: Mwenje unouiswa kuti uiswe pasi pedengu kana pasi pemubhedha here? Kwete kuti uiswe pachigadziko chemwenje here?
Mark 4:22 Nokuti hapana chakavigwa chisingazovhundunurwi, kana chakachengetwa chakavanda, asi kuti zvibude pachena.
Mark 4:23 Kana munhu ane nzeve dzekunzwa, ngaanzwe.
Mark 4:24 Zvino wakati kwavari: Chenjererai zvamunonzwa; nechiyero chamunoyera nacho chichayerwa kwamuri, nekwamuri imwi munonzwa, chichawedzerwa.
Mark 4:25 Nokuti ani nani anacho achapiwa; asi asina achatorerwa kunyange nechaanacho. <div eID="gen393" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen392" type="section"/>
Mark 4:26 Zvino akati: Hwakadaro ushe hwaMwari, sezvinonzi munhu anokusha mbeu muvhu.
Mark 4:27 Zvino orara nekumuka usiku nemasikati, mbeu inomera ichikura iye asingazivi kuti sei.
Mark 4:28 Nokuti ivhu rinozviberekera chibereko pacharo, pakutanga chipande, pashure hura, pashure zviyo zvakakora pahura.
Mark 4:29 Asi kana chibereko chaibva, pakarepo anotuma jeko nokuti kukohwa kwasvika. <div eID="gen395" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen394" type="section"/>
Mark 4:30 Zvino wakati: Tichafananidza nei ushe hwaMwari? Kana tingahuenzanisa nemuenzaniso upi?
Mark 4:31 Setsanga yemasitadha*, iyo kana ichidzvarwa muvhu, idikisa kumbeu dzese dzepanyika;
Mark 4:32 asi kana yadzvarwa, inokura ichiva huru kumiriwo yese, ichiita matavi makuru zvekuti shiri dzekudenga dzinogona kuvakira pasi pemumvuri wawo. <div eID="gen397" type="x-p"/>
Mark 4:33 Zvino nemifananidzo mizhinji yakadaro wakataura shoko kwavari, sepavaigona kunzwa napo.
Mark 4:34 Asi kunze kwemufananidzo haana kutaura kwavari; asi vava vega, wakadudzira vadzidzi vake zvese. <div eID="gen398" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen396" type="section"/>
Mark 4:35 Zvino nezuva iro ava madekwani, wakati kwavari: Ngatiyambukire mhiri.
Mark 4:36 Vakarega chaunga chichienda, vakaenda naye akangodaro muchikepe. Zvino kwaivawo nemamwe magwa naye.
Mark 4:37 Zvino kwakamuka dutu guru remhepo, mafungu akazvirovera muchikepe, zvekuti chakange zvino chozadzwa.
Mark 4:38 Asi iye wakange ari shure muchikepe arere pamutsago; vakamumutsa, vakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, hamuna hanya kuti toparara here?
Mark 4:39 Akamuka akatsiura mhepo, akati kugungwa: Nyarara, gadzikana! Mhepo ikamira, kukava nekudzikama kukuru.
Mark 4:40 Ndokuti kwavari: Munotyirei zvakadaro? Hamuna rutendo sei?
Mark 4:41 Vakatya nekutya kukuru, vakati umwe kune umwe: Zvino ndiani uyu, kuti kunyange mhepo negungwa zvinomuteerera? <chapter eID="Mark.4"/><div eID="gen400" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen399" type="section"/>
Mark 5:0 <div sID="gen401" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="Mark.5" sID="Mark.5"/>  <div sID="gen402" type="x-p"/>
Mark 5:1 Vakasvika mhiri kwegungwa, kunyika yeVaGadharini.
Mark 5:2 Zvino wakati abuda muchikepe, pakarepo munhu akamuchingamidza achibva kumarinda ane mweya wetsvina,
Mark 5:3 uyo wakange ane ugaro kumarinda, uye kwakange kusina wakange achigona kumusunga kunyange nemaketani,
Mark 5:4 nokuti kazhinji waisungwa nezvisungo zvemakumbo nemaketani, asi maketani aigurwa nepakati naye, nezvisungo zvemakumbo zvaigurwa kuita zvidimbu; uye kwakange kusina waigona kumupingudza.
Mark 5:5 Zvino nguva dzese, usiku nemasikati, waiva mumakomo nemumarinda achidanidzira, achizvicheka nemabwe.
Mark 5:6 Zvino wakati achiona Jesu ari kure, akamhanya ndokumunamata;
Mark 5:7 akadanidzira nenzwi guru akati: Ndinei nemwi Jesu, Mwanakomana waMwari Wekumusoro-soro? Ndinokupikirai naMwari, murege kundirwadzisa.
Mark 5:8 Nokuti wakati kwaari: Buda mumunhu, mweya wetsvina.
Mark 5:9 Ndokumubvunza <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Zita rako ndiani? Akapindura achiti: Zita rangu <transChange type="added">rinonzi</transChange> Regiyoni, nokuti tiri vazhinji.
Mark 5:10 Akamukumbirisa zvikuru kuti arege kuvaendesa kunze kwenyika.
Mark 5:11 Zvino kwakange kuripo pedo nemakomo boka guru renguruve dzichifura.
Mark 5:12 Nemadhimoni ese akamukumbira zvikuru achiti: Titumirei kunguruve kuti tipinde madziri.
Mark 5:13 Pakarepo Jesu akaatendera. Mweya yetsvina ikabuda ikapinda munguruve; boka rikapitirikira kumawere kuenda kugungwa, dzinenge dzaiva zvuru zviviri, dzikabitirirwa mugungwa. <div eID="gen402" type="x-p"/>
Mark 5:14 Zvino vaifudza nguruve vakatiza, vakanoreva muguta neparuwa. Vakabuda kuzoona kuti chii chainge chaitwa.
Mark 5:15 Vakasvika kuna Jesu, vakaona wakange ane madhimoni, iye waiva neRegiyoni agere, akapfeka ari munhu kwaye; vakatya.
Mark 5:16 Uye avo vakange va<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ona, vakavarondedzera kuti zvakaitika sei kune wakange ane madhimoni nepamusoro penguruve.
Mark 5:17 Vakatanga kumukumbirisa kuti abve mudunhu mavo. <div eID="gen403" type="x-p"/>
Mark 5:18 Zvino wakati achipinda muchikepe, iye waiva nemadhimoni akamukumbirisa kuti ave naye.
Mark 5:19 Asi Jesu haana kumutendera, asi wakati kwaari: Enda kumba kwako, kune vekwako, unovaudza kuti zvikuru sei Ishe zvaakuitira, nekukuitira tsitsi.
Mark 5:20 Akabva ndokuenda akatanga kuparidza muDhekapori kukura kwezvinhu Jesu zvaakamuitira; vese vakashamisika. <div eID="gen404" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen401" type="section"/>
Mark 5:21 Jesu wakati ayambukazve nechikepe kune rimwe divi, chaunga chikuru chikaunganira kwaari, uye wakange ava parutivi rwegungwa.
Mark 5:22 Zvino tarira, kwakasvika umwe wevakuru vesinagoge, wainzi Jairosi; zvino wakati amuona, akawira patsoka dzake.
Mark 5:23 Akamukumbirisa zvikuru achiti: Mukunda wangu mudiki wotandadza, dai mauya muise maoko pamusoro pake kuti aponeswe uye achararama.
Mark 5:24 Akaenda naye; chaunga chikuru chikamutevera, chikamutsimbirira. <div eID="gen406" type="x-p"/>
Mark 5:25 Zvino umwe mukadzi waiva nekubuda ropa makore gumi nemaviri,
Mark 5:26 wakange atambura zvikuru kuvarapi vazhinji, wakange apedza zvese zvaakange anazvo, asina kutongobatsirika, asi pachinhambo cheizvi ainyanyisa,
Mark 5:27 wakati anzwa zvaJesu, akauya nepakati pechaunga neshure, akabata nguvo yake.
Mark 5:28 Nokuti wakati: Kana ndikabata nguvo dzake chete, ndichaponeswa.
Mark 5:29 Zvino pakarepo chitubu cheropa rake chikapwa, akanzwa mumuviri kuti waporeswa pachifo.
Mark 5:30 Zvino pakarepo Jesu achiziva mukati make kuti simba rabuda maari, akatendeuka pachaunga akati: Ndiani wabata nguvo dzangu?
Mark 5:31 Vadzidzi vake vakati kwaari: Munoona chaunga chinokutsimbirirai, zvino moti: Ndiani wandibata?
Mark 5:32 Zvino wakaringa-ringa kuona uyo wakange aita ichi.
Mark 5:33 Asi mukadzi achitya, nekubvunda, achiziva zvakange zvaitika maari, akauya ndokuwira pamberi pake, ndokumuudza chokwadi chese.
Mark 5:34 Ndokuti kwaari: Mukunda, rutendo rwako rwakuponesa, enda nerugare, poreswa pachifo chako. <div eID="gen407" type="x-p"/>
Mark 5:35 Wakati achataura, kwakasvika <transChange type="added">vamwe</transChange> vemukuru wesinagoge vakati: Mukunda wenyu wafa, muchiri kutambudzirei Mudzidzisi?
Mark 5:36 Pakarepo Jesu achinzwa shoko rakataurwa akati kumukuru wesinagoge: Usatya, tenda chete.
Mark 5:37 Akasatendera munhu kumutevera, kunze kwaPetro, naJakobho, naJohwani munin'ina waJakobho.
Mark 5:38 Zvino wakasvika mumba memukuru wesinagoge, akaona mhere-mhere nevaichema nekurira zvikuru.
Mark 5:39 Zvino wakati apinda akati kwavari: Munoitirei mhere-mhere muchichema? Mwana haana kufa, asi arere.
Mark 5:40 Vakamuseka. Asi iye wakati avabudisa vese panze, akatora baba vemwana namai nevakange vanaye, akapinda makange murere mwana.
Mark 5:41 Akabata ruoko rwemwana, akati kwaari: "Tarita kumi"; ndokuti kana zvichishandurwa: Musikana mudiki, ndinoti kwauri, muka.
Mark 5:42 Pakarepo musikana wakasimuka, akafamba; nokuti waiva wemakore gumi nemaviri; vakashamisika nekushamisika kukuru.
Mark 5:43 Akavaraira zvikuru kuti kusava nemunhu anoziva izvi; akati apiwe kudya.  <chapter eID="Mark.5"/><div eID="gen408" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen405" type="section"/>
Mark 6:0 <div sID="gen409" type="section"/> <chapter n="6" osisID="Mark.6" sID="Mark.6"/>  <div sID="gen410" type="x-p"/>
Mark 6:1 Zvino wakabvapo, akasvika kunyika yekwake; vadzidzi vake vakamutevera.
Mark 6:2 Zvino rava sabata, akatanga kudzidzisa musinagoge; vazhinji vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>nzwa, vakashamisika vachiti: Izvi zvinobvepi kwaari? Injere dzipi dzakapiwa kwaari, kuti nemabasa esimba akadai anoitwa nemaoko ake?
Mark 6:3 Uyu haasi muvezi here, mwanakomana waMaria, nemukoma waJakobho, naJose, naJudha, naSimoni? Nehanzvadzi dzake hadzisi pano nesu here? Vakagumburwa naye.
Mark 6:4 Asi Jesu akati kwavari: Muporofita haangashaiwi kukudzwa, kunze kwemunyika yekwake, nepakati pehama, nemumba make.
Mark 6:5 Akasagona kubata chero basa resimba ipapo, kunze kwekuti wakaisa maoko pamusoro pevairwara vashoma, akaporesa.
Mark 6:6 Akashamisika nekusatenda kwavo. Uye akapota-pota nemisha achidzidzisa. <div eID="gen410" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen409" type="section"/>
Mark 6:7 Zvino wakadanira kwaari vanegumi nevaviri, akatanga kuvatuma vaviri-vaviri, akavapa simba pamusoro pemweya yetsvina.
Mark 6:8 Akavaraira kuti varege kutora chinhu cherwendo kunze kwemudonzvo chete; kwete chikwama, kwete chingwa, kwete mari mubhanhire.
Mark 6:9 Asi vapfeke manyatera, varege kupfeka nguvo refu mbiri.
Mark 6:10 Zvino akati kwavari: Pese pamunopinda mumba, mugaremo kusvikira muchibvapo.
Mark 6:11 Asi vese vasingakugamuchiriyi kana kukunzwai, kana muchibvapo, zuzai guruva riri pasi petsoka dzenyu, chive chapupu kwavari. Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Zvichava nani kuSodhoma kana Gomora nezuva rekutongwa kupfuura guta iro.
Mark 6:12 Vakati vabuda, vakaparidza kuti vatendeuke;
Mark 6:13 zvino vakabudisa madhimoni mazhinji, vakazodza nemafuta vazhinji vairwara, vachiporesa. <div eID="gen412" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen411" type="section"/>
Mark 6:14 Mambo Herodhe ndoku<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa, nokuti zita rake rakava pachena, akati: Johwani anobhabhatidza akamutswa kubva kuvakafa, naizvozvo masimba anobata maari.
Mark 6:15 Vamwe vakati: NdiEria; nevamwe vakati: Muporofita, kana <transChange type="added">wakaita</transChange> seumwe wevaporofita.
Mark 6:16 Asi Herodhe wakati anzwa, akati: Uyu ndiJohwani uya wandakagura ini musoro; iye wamuka kubva kuvakafa. <div eID="gen414" type="x-p"/>
Mark 6:17 Nokuti Herodhe pachake wakange atuma <transChange type="added">vanhu</transChange> akabata Johwani, akamusunga mutirongo nekuda kwaHerodhiasi, mukadzi waFiripi, munin'ina wake; nokuti <transChange type="added">Herodhe</transChange> wakange amuwana.
Mark 6:18 Nokuti Johwani wakange ati kuna Herodhe: Hauna kutenderwa kuti uve nemukadzi wemunin'ina wako.
Mark 6:19 Herodhiasi akamuvenga nechemumoyo, akada kumuuraya, asi wakakonewa;
Mark 6:20 nokuti Herodhe aitya Johwani, achiziva kuti murume wakarurama, mutsvene, akamuchengetedza. Zvino paakamunzwa akaita zvinhu zvakawanda, akamunzwa nemufaro. <div eID="gen415" type="x-p"/>
Mark 6:21 Asi zuva rakafanira rakati rasvika, Herodhe nezuva rekuberekwa kwake akaitira chirairo madzishe ake nevatungamiriri vezvuru nevatungamiriri veGarirea,
Mark 6:22 zvino mukunda waHerodhiasi uyo paakapinda akatamba, akafadza Herodhe nevakange vagere pakudya naye; mambo akati kumusikana: Kumbira kwandiri chipi zvacho chaunoda ndigokupa.
Mark 6:23 Zvino akamupikira <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Chero chipi chaunokumbira kwandiri ndichakupa, kusvikira pahafu yeushe hwangu.
Mark 6:24 Akabuda akati kuna mai vake: Ndichakumbirei? Vakati: Musoro waJohwani Mubhabhatidzi.
Mark 6:25 Pakarepo akakurumidza kupinda kuna mambo, akakumbira achiti: Ndinoda kuti mundipe mundiro ikozvino musoro waJohwani Mubhabhatidzi.
Mark 6:26 Mambo akashungurudzika zvikuru, <transChange type="added">asi </transChange>nekuda kwemhiko, nekwevakange vagere naye pakudya, wakange asingadi kumurambira.
Mark 6:27 Pakarepo mambo akatuma muurai, akaraira kuti musoro wake uuyiswe. Akaenda, akamugura musoro mutirongo,
Mark 6:28 akauya nemusoro wake mundiro, akaupa kumusikana, musikana ndokuupa mai vake.
Mark 6:29 Vadzidzi vake vakati vachi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa, vakauya vakatora chitunha chake, vakachiisa muguva. <div eID="gen416" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen413" type="section"/>
Mark 6:30 Zvino vaapositori vakaunganira kuna Jesu, vakamuudza zvese, nezvavakange vaita, nezvavakange vadzidzisa.
Mark 6:31 Akati kwavari: Uyai imwi pachenyu mega kunzvimbo yerenje, muzorore zvishoma. Nokuti vaiva vazhinji vaiuya nekuenda, vakasava nemukana kunyange wekudya.
Mark 6:32 Vakaenda nechikepe kunzvimbo yerenje vari vega.
Mark 6:33 Zvaunga zvikavaona vachienda, uye vazhinji vakamuziva, vakamhanyirako pamwe chete netsoka vachibva pamaguta ese, vakavatangira, vakasangana kwaari. <div eID="gen418" type="x-p"/>
Mark 6:34 Zvino Jesu wakati achibuda, akaona chaunga chikuru, ndokuvanzwira tsitsi, nokuti vakange vakaita semakwai asina mufudzi; akatanga kuvadzidzisa zvinhu zvizhinji. <div eID="gen419" type="x-p"/>
Mark 6:35 Zvino nguva yakati yaenda zvikuru, vadzidzi vake vakauya kwaari vakati: Iyi inzvimbo yerenje, uye nguva yatoenda;
Mark 6:36 varegei, kuti vaende kuruwa rwakapoteredza nemisha vanozvitengera zvingwa; nokuti havana chavangadya.
Mark 6:37 Akapindura akati kwavari: Vapei imwi kuti vadye. Vakati kwaari: Tingaenda here tinotenga zvingwa zvemadhenario* mazana maviri, tivape vadye?
Mark 6:38 Akati kwavari: Mune zvingwa zvingani? Endai munoona. Vakati vaziva vakati: Zvishanu, nehove mbiri.
Mark 6:39 Zvino akavaraira kuti vavagarise vese pasi nemapoka-mapoka pauswa unyoro.
Mark 6:40 Zvino vakagara pasi nemapoka-mapoka nemazana uye nemakumi mashanu.
Mark 6:41 Zvino wakati atora zvingwa zvishanu nehove mbiri, akatarira kumusoro kudenga, akavonga, akamedura zvingwa, akapa kuvadzidzi vake, kuti vazvigadzike pamberi pavo; nehove mbiri akavagovera vese.
Mark 6:42 Zvino vakadya vese, vakaguta.
Mark 6:43 Vakanunga matengu gumi nemaviri azere nezvimedu, nezvehove.
Mark 6:44 Zvino avo vakadya zvingwa vaiva varume vanenge zvuru zvishanu. <div eID="gen420" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen417" type="section"/>
Mark 6:45 Pakarepo akamanikidza vadzidzi vake kupinda muchikepe, vatungamire kuenda mhiri kuBhetisaidha, iye achirega chaunga chichienda.
Mark 6:46 Akati avaoneka, akabva akaenda mugomo kunonyengetera.
Mark 6:47 Zvino ava madekwani chikepe chakange chiri pakati pegungwa, iye ari ega panyika.
Mark 6:48 Zvino wakavaona vachirwadziwa nekukwasva, nokuti mhepo yakange ichipesana navo; akauya kwavari nenguva inenge seyechina yekurinda yeusiku, achifamba pamusoro pegungwa; ndokuda kuvapfuura.
Mark 6:49 Zvino vakati vachimuona achifamba pamusoro pegungwa, vakafunga kuti chipoko, vakaridza mhere.
Mark 6:50 Nokuti vese vakamuona, vakavhunduka; asi pakarepo akataura navo, akati kwavari: Tsungai moyo, ndini, musatya.
Mark 6:51 Akakwira kwavari muchikepe, mhepo ikanyarara; vakakatyamara zvikuru mukati mavo zvisingaverengeki, vakashamisika.
Mark 6:52 Nokuti vakange vasina kunzwisisa zvezvingwa, nokuti moyo wavo wakange uri mukukutu. <div eID="gen422" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen421" type="section"/>
Mark 6:53 Vakati vayambuka, vakasvika kunyika yeGenesareti, vakasungira chikepe pamahombekombe.
Mark 6:54 Vakati vabuda muchikepe, pakarepo vakamuziva,
Mark 6:55 vakamhanyira munharaunda iyo yese yakapoteredza, vakatanga kutenderera vakatakura vairwara pahwanyanza, kwavainzwa kuti ndiko kwaari.
Mark 6:56 Zvino pese paakapinda pamisha kana pamaguta kana paruwa, vakaradzika varwere pamisika, vakamukumbira zvikuru kuti vabate mupendero wenguvo yake chete; uye vese vakamubata vakaponeswa. <chapter eID="Mark.6"/><div eID="gen424" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen423" type="section"/>
Mark 7:0 <div sID="gen425" type="section"/> <chapter n="7" osisID="Mark.7" sID="Mark.7"/>  <div sID="gen426" type="x-p"/>
Mark 7:1 Zvino kwakaunganira kwaari VaFarisi nevamwe vevanyori vaibva kuJerusarema;
Mark 7:2 vakati vaona vamwe vevadzidzi vake vachidya zvingwa nemaoko ane tsvina, ndiko kuti asina kushambwa, vakasvora.
Mark 7:3 Nokuti VaFarisi, neVaJudha vese, havadyi kunze kwekuti vashamba maoko kwazvo, vachibatirira tsika dzevakuru.
Mark 7:4 Kana vachibva pamusika, kunze kwekuti vashamba, havadyi; nezvimwe zvinhu zvizhinji zviripo zvavakange vagamuchira kuti vazvichengete, <transChange type="added">zvinoti</transChange>: Kusuka mikombe, nehari, nemidziyo yendarira, nenhovo.
Mark 7:5 Ipapo VaFarisi nevanyori vakamubvunza, <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Nemhaka yei vadzidzi venyu vasingafambi netsika yevakuru, asi vanodya chingwa nemaoko asina kushambwa? <div eID="gen426" type="x-p"/>
Mark 7:6 Asi wakapindura akati kwavari: Isaya wakaporofita zvakanaka pamusoro penyu imwi vanyepedzeri, sezvazvakanyorwa, <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Rudzi urwu rwunondikudza nemiromo, asi moyo wavo uri kure neni.
Mark 7:7 Asi vanondinamata pasina, vachidzidzisa dzidziso, <transChange type="added">dziri</transChange> mirairo yevanhu.
Mark 7:8 Nokuti munosiya murairo waMwari, muchibatirira tsika yevanhu, <transChange type="added">se</transChange>kusuka hari nemikombe, nezvimwe zvizhinji zvakadaro munozviita.
Mark 7:9 Zvino akati kwavari: Munoramba nemazvo murairo waMwari, kuti muchengete tsika yenyu.
Mark 7:10 Nokuti Mozisi wakati: Kudza baba vako namai vako; uye: Anotuka baba kana mai, anofanira kufa rufu.
Mark 7:11 Asi imwi munoti: Kana munhu achiti kuna baba kana mai: Chinhu chipi nechipi chamunobatsirwa nacho neni "iKorbani*", ndokuti chipo <transChange type="added">kuna Mwari;</transChange>
Mark 7:12 hamuchamutenderi kuitira baba vake kana mai vake chinhu,
Mark 7:13 muchishayisa shoko raMwari maturo netsika yenyu yamunogamuchidzana; nezvinhu zvizhinji zvakadaro munozviita. <div eID="gen427" type="x-p"/>
Mark 7:14 Zvino wakati adanira kwaari chaunga chese akati kwavari: Nditeererei mese, munzwisise.
Mark 7:15 Hapana chinhu chinobva kunze kwemunhu chinopinda maari chingamusvibisa; asi zvinhu zvinobuda maari, ndizvo zvinosvibisa munhu.
Mark 7:16 Kana aripo ane nzeve dzekunzwa, ngaanzwe. <div eID="gen428" type="x-p"/>
Mark 7:17 Zvino wakati apinda mumba achibva kuchaunga, vadzidzi vake vakamubvunza pamusoro pemufananidzo.
Mark 7:18 Akati kwavari: Saizvozvo nemwi muri vasina kunzwisisa here? Hamunzwisisi here kuti chese chinobva kunze chichipinda mumunhu hachigoni kumusvibisa?
Mark 7:19 Nokuti hachipindi mumoyo make, asi mudumbu; chichibuda kunze, achinatsa kudya kwese.
Mark 7:20 Ndokubva ati: Icho chinobuda mumunhu, ndicho chinosvibisa munhu.
Mark 7:21 Nokuti kubva mukati mumoyo wevanhu inobuda mifungo yakaipa, upombwe, ufeve, umhondi,
Mark 7:22 umbavha, ruchiva, kuipa, kunyengera, meso-meso, ziso rakaipa, kunyomba, kuzvikudza, upenzi;
Mark 7:23 zvese zvinhu izvi zvakaipa zvinobva mukati, zvichisvibisa munhu. <div eID="gen429" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen425" type="section"/>
Mark 7:24 Zvino kubva ipapo wakasimuka akaenda kumiganhu yeTire neSidhoni; akapinda mumba, asingadi kuti pave neanozviziva, asi akakoniwa kuvanzika.
Mark 7:25 Nokuti mukadzi waiva nemukunda mudiki akange ane mweya wetsvina, akanzwa nezvake, akauya akawira patsoka dzake.
Mark 7:26 Uye mukadzi waiva muGiriki, muSirofenike pachizvarwa; akamukumbirisa kuti abudise dhimoni pamukunda wake.
Mark 7:27 Asi Jesu akati kwaari: Regai vana vatange kuguta, nokuti hazvina kunaka kutora chingwa chevana, ndokukandira kuimbwanana.
Mark 7:28 Akapindura akati kwaari: Hongu, Ishe; nokuti kunyange imbwanana <transChange type="added">dziri </transChange>pasi petafura dzinodya zvezvimedu zvevana.
Mark 7:29 Akati kwaari: Nekuda kweshoko iri, enda; dhimoni rabuda pamukunda wako.
Mark 7:30 Akabva akaenda kumba kwake, akawana dhimoni rabuda, mukunda arere panhovo. <div eID="gen431" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen430" type="section"/>
Mark 7:31 Zvino wakatizve achibva kumiganhu yeTire neSidhoni, akauya kugungwa reGarirea, nepakati pemiganhu yeDhekapori.
Mark 7:32 Zvino vakauisa kwaari matsi yaikakamira, vakamukumbirisa kuti aise ruoko pamusoro pake.
Mark 7:33 Akamutora ari ega kubva pachaunga, akapinza mimwe yake munzeve dzake, akapfira, ndokubata rurimi rwake.
Mark 7:34 Atarira kumusoro kudenga, akatura befu, akati kwaari: "Efata"; ndiko kuti: Zarurwa!
Mark 7:35 Pakarepo nzeve dzake dzakazarurwa, chisungo cherurimi rwake chikasunungurwa, akataura zvakarurama.
Mark 7:36 Ndokuvaraira, kuti varege kuudza munhu; asi paainyanya kuvaraira, vakanyanya zvikuru kuparidza <transChange type="added">izvozvo</transChange>.
Mark 7:37 Vakashamisika zvikuru kwazvo, vachiti: Wakaita zvese zvakanaka; wakaita matsi kuti dzinzwe, nezvimumumu kuti zvitaure. <chapter eID="Mark.7"/><div eID="gen433" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen432" type="section"/>
Mark 8:0 <div sID="gen434" type="section"/> <chapter n="8" osisID="Mark.8" sID="Mark.8"/>  <div sID="gen435" type="x-p"/>
Mark 8:1 Nemazuva iwayo zvakwakange kune chaunga chikuru kwazvo, vasina chavangadya, Jesu akadanira vadzidzi vake kwaari, akati kwavari:
Mark 8:2 Ndine tsitsi nechaunga; nokuti chadogara neni mazuva matatu vasina zvavangadya.
Mark 8:3 Kana ndikavarega vaende kumba kwavo nenzara, vachaziya panzira; nokuti vamwe vavo vanobva kure.
Mark 8:4 Vadzidzi vake vakamupindura, <transChange type="added">vakati</transChange>: Zvingabvepi zvingwa munhu zvaangagutsa nazvo ava murenje muno?
Mark 8:5 Akavabvunza, <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Mune zvingwa zvingani? Vakati: Zvinomwe.
Mark 8:6 Zvino akaraira chaunga kuti chigare pasi pavhu; akatora zvingwa zvinomwe, akavonga, aka<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>medura, ndokupa vadzidzi vake, kuti vaise pamberi <transChange type="added">pavo</transChange>; vakazviisa pamberi pechaunga.
Mark 8:7 Uye vakange vane hove diki shoma; zvino aka<transChange type="added">dzi</transChange>ropafadza, akati vadziisewo pamberi <transChange type="added">pavo</transChange>.
Mark 8:8 Vakadya, vakaguta; ndokununga zvimedu zvakasara, matengu manomwe.
Mark 8:9 Avo vakange vadya vainge vaiva zvuru zvina; akavarega vachienda. <div eID="gen435" type="x-p"/>
Mark 8:10 Pakarepo akapinda muchikepe nevadzidzi vake, akauya kumativi eDharimanuta. <div eID="gen436" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen434" type="section"/>
Mark 8:11 Zvino VaFarisi vakabuda, vakatanga kupikisana naye, vachitsvaka kwaari chiratidzo chinobva kudenga, vachimuidza.
Mark 8:12 Akagomera zvikuru pamweya wake akati: Zera iri rinotsvakirei chiratidzo? Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Hakuna chiratidzo chichapiwa kuzera iri.
Mark 8:13 Ndokubva avasiya, akapindazve muchikepe, akabva akayambukira kumhiri. <div eID="gen438" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen437" type="section"/>
Mark 8:14 Zvino vadzidzi vakange vakanganwa kutora zvingwa; uye vakange vasina navo <transChange type="added">chinhu</transChange> muchikepe kunze kwechingwa chimwe chete.
Mark 8:15 Zvino akavaraira, achiti: Ngwarirai, muchenjere mbiriso yeVaFarisi nembiriso yaHerodhe.
Mark 8:16 Vakarangana pakati pavo vachiti: Nokuti hatina zvingwa.
Mark 8:17 Zvino Jesu wakati achi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ziva akati kwavari: Munorangana sei kuti hamuna zvingwa? Hamusati maziva, kana kunzwisisa here? Muchine moyo mukukutu here?
Mark 8:18 Mune meso hamuoni here? Uye mune nzeve, hamunzwi here? Uye hamurangariri here?
Mark 8:19 Pandakamedurira vanezvuru zvishanu zvingwa zvishanu, matengu mangani azere nezvimedu amakanonga? Vakati kwaari: Gumi nemaviri.
Mark 8:20 Uye pazvinomwe pavanezvuru zvina, matengu mangani azere nezvimedu amakanonga? Ivo ndokuti: Manomwe.
Mark 8:21 Ndokubva ati kwavari: Sei musinganzwisisi? <div eID="gen440" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen439" type="section"/>
Mark 8:22 Zvino wakasvika kuBhetisaidha; vakauisa bofu kwaari, vakamukumbirisa kuti aribate.
Mark 8:23 Akabata ruoko rwebofu, akaribudisira kunze kwemusha; akati apfira meso aro, akaisa maoko pamusoro paro, akaribvunza kana richiona chinhu.
Mark 8:24 Ndokutarira kumusoro rikati: Ndinoona vanhu vakaita semiti vachifamba.
Mark 8:25 Mushure maizvozvo akaisazve maoko pamusoro pameso aro akaritaridza kumusoro, rikaporeswa, rikaona vese zvakajeka.
Mark 8:26 Akariendesa kumba kwaro, achiti: Usapinda mumusha uye usaudza ani nani mumusha. <div eID="gen442" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen441" type="section"/>
Mark 8:27 Zvino Jesu akabuda nevadzidzi vake vakaenda kumisha yeKesariya yeFiripi; vari munzira akabvunza vadzidzi vake achiti kwavari: Vanhu vanoti ndini ani?
Mark 8:28 Vakapindura <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Johwani Mubhabhatidzi; asi vamwe: Eria; vamwezve: Umwe wevaporofita.
Mark 8:29 Iye akati kwavari: Ko imwi munoti ndini ani? Petro akapindura akati kwaari: Imwi muri Kristu.
Mark 8:30 Akavaraira zvikuru kuti varege kuudza munhu pamusoro pake. <div eID="gen444" type="x-p"/>
Mark 8:31 Zvino akatanga kuvadzidzisa kuti Mwanakomana wemunhu anofanira kutambudzika zvinhu zvizhinji nekurambwa nevakuru, nevapristi vakuru, nevanyori, agourawa, uye mushure memazuva matatu amukezve.
Mark 8:32 Akataura shoko iro pachena. Zvino Petro akamutorera parutivi, akatanga kumutsiura.
Mark 8:33 Asi iye atendeuka, ndokutarira vadzidzi vake, akatsiura Petro achiti: Ibva shure kwangu, Satani; nokuti haurangariri zvinhu zvaMwari, asi zvinhu zvevanhu. <div eID="gen445" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen443" type="section"/>
Mark 8:34 Zvino wakati adanira kwaari chaunga pamwe nevadzidzi vake, akati kwavari: Ani nani anoda kuuya shure kwangu, ngaazvirambe, atakure muchinjikwa wake, anditevere.
Mark 8:35 Nokuti ani nani anoda kuponesa upenyu hwake, acharasikirwa nahwo, asi ani nani acharasikirwa neupenyu hwake nekuda kwangu nekweevhangeri, uyu achahuponesa.
Mark 8:36 Nokuti zvinobatsirei munhu, kana akawana nyika yese akarasikirwa nemweya wake?
Mark 8:37 Kana kuti munhu achapei kuti chive muripo wemweya wake?
Mark 8:38 Nokuti ani nani anonyara pamusoro pangu nepamashoko angu pazera iri reupombwe nekutadza, Mwanakomana wemhunhu achanyarawo pamusoro pake, paanouya mukubwinya kwaBaba vake ane vatumwa vatsvene. <chapter eID="Mark.8"/><div eID="gen447" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen446" type="section"/>
Mark 9:0 <div sID="gen448" type="section"/> <chapter n="9" osisID="Mark.9" sID="Mark.9"/>  <div sID="gen449" type="x-p"/>
Mark 9:1 Zvino wakati kwavari: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Vamwe varipo kune vamire pano, vasingazoraviri rufu, kusvikira vaona ushe hwaMwari huchiuya nesimba. <div eID="gen449" type="x-p"/>
Mark 9:2 Zvino shure kwemazuva matanhatu, Jesu akatora Petro, naJakobho, naJohwani, akavatungamidza mugomo refu, pachavo vari vega; akashandurwa chimiro pamberi pavo.
Mark 9:3 Zvipfeko zvake zvikapenya, zvikachenesesa zvikuru semagada echando; hakuna musuki panyika, angagona kuzvichenesa zvikadaro.
Mark 9:4 Zvino kwakaonekwa kwavari Eria naMozisi, uye vaitaurirana naJesu.
Mark 9:5 Petro akapindura akati kuna Jesu: Rabhi*, zvakanaka kuti tiri pano; ngativake matende matatu, rimwe renyu, uye rimwe raMozisi, uye rimwe raEria.
Mark 9:6 Nokuti wakange asingazivi chekutaura; nokuti vaitya zvikuru.
Mark 9:7 Zvino kwakava negore rakavadzikatira, inzwi rikabuda mugore, richiti: Uyu Mwanakomana wangu anodikanwa, inzwai iye.
Mark 9:8 Kamwe-kamwe, vakati varinga-ringa, havana kuzochaona munhu, asi Jesu chete anavo. <div eID="gen450" type="x-p"/>
Mark 9:9 Zvino vakati vachiburuka mugomo, akavaraira kuti varege kuudza munhu zvavakange vaona kusvikira Mwanakomana wemunhu amuka kubva kuvakafa. <div eID="gen451" type="x-p"/>
Mark 9:10 Vakachengeta shoko iro mukati mavo, vachibvunzana kuti kumuka kwevakafa chii. <div eID="gen452" type="x-p"/>
Mark 9:11 Vakamubvunza, vachiti: Vanyori vanoreverei kuti Eria anofanira kutanga kuuya?
Mark 9:12 Akapindura, akati kwavari: Eria zvirokwazvo anotanga kuuya, avandudze zvinhu zvese; kwakagonyorwa sei zveMwanakomana wemunhu, kuti achatambudzika zvinhu zvizhinji nekuzvidzwa?
Mark 9:13 Asi ndinoreva kwamuri kuti Eriawo wakasvika, vakamuitira zvese zvavaida, sezvazvakanyorwa pamusoro pake. <div eID="gen453" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen448" type="section"/>
Mark 9:14 Zvino wakati asvika kuvadzidzi, akaona chaunga chikuru chakavakomba, nevanyori vachipikisana navo.
Mark 9:15 Pakarepo chaunga chese chakati chichimuona chikashamisika zvikuru, ndoku<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>mhanyira, chikamukwazisa.
Mark 9:16 Akabvunza vanyori <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Munopikisanei navo?
Mark 9:17 Umwe wechaunga akapindura akati: Mudzidzisi, ndauisa kwamuri mwanakomana wangu, ane mweya wechimumumu;
Mark 9:18 pangava papi paunomubata, unomubvambura; opupuma furo, nekugeda-geda meno ake, uye anooma; zvino ndakataura nevadzidzi venyu kuti vaubudise, vakasagona.
Mark 9:19 Akamupindura akati: Haiwa zera risina rutendo, ndichava nemwi kusvikira rinhi? Ndichakuitirai moyo murefu kusvikira rinhi? Muuyisei kwandiri.
Mark 9:20 Vakamuuisa kwaari; wakati achimuona, pakarepo mweya ukamubvambura; akawira pasi, akaumburuka achipupuma furo.
Mark 9:21 Ndokubva abvunza baba vake <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Yava nguva yakadini kubvira izvozvi zvichiitika kwaari? Akati: Kubva paupwere.
Mark 9:22 Kazhinji wakamuwisira nemumoto nemumvura, kuti umuparadze; asi kana muchigona kuita chinhu, mutinzwire tsitsi, mutibatsire.
Mark 9:23 Jesu ndokuti kwaari: Kana uchigona kutenda, zvinhu zvese zvinogoneka kune anotenda.
Mark 9:24 Uye pakarepo baba vemwana vakadanidzira nemisodzi vakati: Ndinotenda, Ishe, batsirai pakusatenda kwangu.
Mark 9:25 Jesu wakati achiona kuti chaunga chinouya chichimhanyirana, akatsiura mweya wetsina, akati kwauri: <transChange type="added">Iwe</transChange>, mweya wechimumumu nematsi, ini ndinokuraira: Buda maari, urege kupindazve maari.
Mark 9:26 Zvino <transChange type="added">mweya</transChange> ukadanidzira, ukamubvundisa zvikuru ukabuda; akaita sewakafa, nokudaro vazhinji vakati: Wafa.
Mark 9:27 Asi Jesu wakabata ruoko rwake akamusimudza; akasimuka. <div eID="gen455" type="x-p"/>
Mark 9:28 Zvino wakati apinda mumba, vadzidzi vake vakamubvunza vari vega <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Sei isu takange tisingagoni kuubudisa?
Mark 9:29 Ndokubva ati kwavari: Zera iri harigoni kubuda nechinhu, kunze nekunyengetera nekutsanya. <div eID="gen456" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen454" type="section"/>
Mark 9:30 Vakabva ipapo, vakagura neGarirea, akange asingadi kuti chero ani azvizive.
Mark 9:31 Nokuti aidzidzisa vadzidzi vake, achiti kwavari: Mwanakomana wemunhu achakumikidzwa mumaoko evanhu, uye vachamuuraya; kana aurawa achamuka nezuva retatu.
Mark 9:32 Asi havana kunzwisisa shoko iro, vachitya kumubvunza. <div eID="gen458" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen457" type="section"/>
Mark 9:33 Zvino wakasvika muKapenaume; akati ava mumba, akavabvunza, <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Manga muchikakavadzana chii munzira?
Mark 9:34 Asi vakanyarara, nokuti munzira vakange vakakavadzana <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> mukurusa ndiani.
Mark 9:35 Zvino akagara pasi, akadana vanegumi nevaviri, akati kwavari: Kana munhu achida kuva wekutanga, achava wekupedzisira kune vese nemushandi wevese.
Mark 9:36 Ndokutora mucheche, akamumisa pakati pavo; akati amugumbatira, akati kwavari:
Mark 9:37 Ani nani anogamuchira umwe wevacheche vakadai muzita rangu, anogamuchira ini; uye ani nani anogamuchira ini, haagamuchiri ini, asi uyo wakandituma. <div eID="gen460" type="x-p"/>
Mark 9:38 Zvino Johwani akamupindura, achiti: Mudzidzisi, takaona umwe asingatiteveri achibudisa madhimoni muzita renyu; tikamudzivisa, nokuti haana kutitevera.
Mark 9:39 Asi Jesu wakati: Musamudzivisa, nokuti hakuna munhu angaita basa resimba muzita rangu, anogona kukurumidza kutaura zvakaipa pamusoro pangu.
Mark 9:40 Nokuti asingapikisani nesu, ndewedu. <div eID="gen461" type="x-p"/>
Mark 9:41 Nokuti ani nani anokupai mukombe wemvura kuti munwe muzita rangu, nokuti muri vaKristu, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Haangamborasikirwi nemubairo wake. <div eID="gen462" type="x-p"/>
Mark 9:42 Uye ani nani anogumbusa umwe wevadiki ava vanotenda kwandiri, zviri nani kwaari kuti guyo guru risungirirwe kupoteredza pamutsipa wake, akandirwe mugungwa.
Mark 9:43 Uye kana ruoko rwako ruchikugumbusa, rugure; zviri nani kwauri kupinda muupenyu uri chirema, pane kuti une maoko maviri uende mugehena, mumoto usingadzimiki,
Mark 9:44 apo pasingafi honye yavo, nemoto usingadzimi.
Mark 9:45 Uye kana rutsoka rwako ruchikugumbusa, rugure; zviri nani kwauri kupinda muupenyu uchikamhina, pane kuti une tsoka mbiri ukandirwe mugehena, mumoto usingadzimiki,
Mark 9:46 apo pasingafi honye yavo, nemoto usingadzimi.
Mark 9:47 Zvino kana ziso rako richikugumbusa, ridzure; zviri nani kwauri kupinda muushe hwaMwari une ziso rimwe, pakuti une maziso maviri, ukandirwe mugehena remoto,
Mark 9:48 apo pasingafi honye yavo, nemoto usingadzimi. <div eID="gen463" type="x-p"/>
Mark 9:49 Nokuti wese acharungwa nemoto uye chibairo chese chicharungwa nemunyu.
Mark 9:50 Munyu wakanaka; asi kana munyu warasa kuvava, mungaurunga nei? Ivai nemunyu mamuri, mugarisane nerugare. <chapter eID="Mark.9"/><div eID="gen464" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen459" type="section"/>
Mark 10:0 <div sID="gen465" type="section"/> <chapter n="10" osisID="Mark.10" sID="Mark.10"/>  <div sID="gen466" type="x-p"/>
Mark 10:1 Zvino wakati asimukapo, akauya kumiganhu yeJudhiya, achigura nemhiri kwaJoridhani; zvaunga ndokuunganirazve kwaari; zvino sezvaakange ajaira, akavadzidzisa zvekare. <div eID="gen466" type="x-p"/>
Mark 10:2 VaFarisi vakauya kwaari, vakamubvunza <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Zvinotenderwa here kuti murume arambe mukadzi? vachimuidza.
Mark 10:3 Akapindura, akati kwavari: Mozisi wakakurairai chii?
Mark 10:4 Zvino vakati: Mozisi wakatendera kunyora rugwaro rwerambano, neku<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>ramba.
Mark 10:5 Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Nekuda kweukukutu hwemoyo wenyu, wakakunyorerai murairo uyu.
Mark 10:6 Asi kubva pakutanga kwezvisikwa, Mwari wakavaita murume nemukadzi.
Mark 10:7 Nekuda kweizvozvo munhu achasiya baba namai vake, anamatire mukadzi wake;
Mark 10:8 zvino ava vaviri vachava nyama imwe. Naizvozvo havasichiri vaviri, asi nyama imwe.
Mark 10:9 Naizvozvo Mwari zvaakabatanidza, ngapasava nemunhu anoparadzanisa. <div eID="gen467" type="x-p"/>
Mark 10:10 Mumba vadzidzi vake vakapamha kumubvunza pamusoro pazvo.
Mark 10:11 Zvino akati kwavari: Ani nani anoramba mukadzi wake, akawana umwe, anoita upombwe kwaari.
Mark 10:12 Uye kana mukadzi achiramba murume wake, achiwanikwa neumwe, anoita upombwe. <div eID="gen468" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen465" type="section"/>
Mark 10:13 Zvino vakauya nevana vadiki kwaari, kuti avabate; asi vadzidzi vakatsiura avo vaiuya na<transChange type="added">vo.</transChange>
Mark 10:14 Zvino Jesu wakati achi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ona, akatsamwa zvikuru, akati kwavari: Tenderai vana vadiki kuuya kwandiri, uye musavadzivisa, nokuti ushe hwaMwari ndohwevakadai.
Mark 10:15 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Ani nani asingagamuchiri ushe hwaMwari semucheche, haangatongopindi mahuri.
Mark 10:16 Uye akavagumbatira, achiisa maoko pamusoro pavo, akavaropafadza. <div eID="gen470" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen469" type="section"/>
Mark 10:17 Zvino wakati achibudira kunzira, umwe wakamumhanyira, akamufugamira akamubvunza, <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Mudzidzisi wakanaka, ndingaitei kuti ndigare nhaka yeupenyu husingaperi?
Mark 10:18 Jesu akati kwaari: Unondiidzirei wakanaka? Hakuna wakanaka, kunze kweumwe, <transChange type="added">iye</transChange> Mwari.
Mark 10:19 Unoiziva mirairo <transChange type="added">inoti</transChange>: Usaita upombwe, usauraya, usaba, usapupura nhema, usabiridzira, kudza baba namai vako.
Mark 10:20 Zvino akapindura akati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, izvi zvese ndakazvichengeta kubva paudiki hwangu.
Mark 10:21 Jesu ndokumutarira akamuda, akati kwaari: Chinhu chimwe chaunoshaiwa; enda, utengese zvese zvaunazvo, upe varombo, zvino uchava nefuma kudenga; ugouya utakure muchinjikwa, unditevere.
Mark 10:22 Asi asuwa neshoko iro, wakaenda neshungu, nokuti wakange ane nhumbi zhinji. <div eID="gen472" type="x-p"/>
Mark 10:23 Ipapo Jesu akaringa-ringa, akati kuvadzidzi vake: Vacharemerwa sei vane fuma kupinda muushe hwaMwari!
Mark 10:24 Vadzidzi vakashamisika nemashoko ake. Asi Jesu wakapindurazve, akati kwavari: Vana, zvinorema sei kune vanovimba nefuma kupinda muushe hwaMwari;
Mark 10:25 zvingarerukira kamera kudarika nemuburi retsono, pane kuti mufumi apinde muushe hwaMwari.
Mark 10:26 Ipapo vakashamisika zvisingaverengeki, vachitaurirana <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Ndiani zvino angagoponeswa?
Mark 10:27 Zvino Jesu wakati achivatarira, akati: Kuvanhu hazvibviri, asi kwete kuna Mwari; nokuti kuna Mwari zvinhu zvese zvinobvira. <div eID="gen473" type="x-p"/>
Mark 10:28 Petro akatanga kuti kwaari: Tarirai, isu takasiya zvese tikakuteverai.
Mark 10:29 Jesu akapindura akati: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Hakuna munhu wakasiya imba, kana vanin'ina nemadzikoma, kana hanzvadzi, kana baba, kana mai, kana mukadzi, kana vana, kana minda, nekuda kwangu nekweevhangeri,
Mark 10:30 asingazogamuchiri kane zana ikozvino nenguva ino, dzimba, nevanin'ina nemadzikoma, nehanzvadzi, nanamai, nevana, neminda, pamwe nekushushwa, neupenyu husingaperi munguva inouya.
Mark 10:31 Asi vazhinji vekutanga vachava vekupedzisira, nevekupedzisira vekutanga. <div eID="gen474" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen471" type="section"/>
Mark 10:32 Zvino vachiri munzira vachikwira kuJerusarema; Jesu akavatungamirira; vakashamisika; zvino pavaitevera, vaitya. Akatorazve vanegumi nevaviri, akatanga kuvaudza zvinhu zvakange zvichizoitika kwaari,
Mark 10:33 achiti: Tarirai, tinokwira kuJerusarema, uye Mwanakomana wemunhu achakumikidzwa kuvapristi vakuru nekuvanyori, uye vachamutongera rufu, nekumukumikidza kuvahedheni,
Mark 10:34 vachamusveveredza, vachamurova netyava, nekumupfira, nekumuuraya; zvino nezuva retatu achamukazve. <div eID="gen476" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen475" type="section"/>
Mark 10:35 Zvino Jakobho naJohwani, vanakomana vaZebhedhi, vakauya kwaari vachiti: Mudzidzisi, tinoda kuti mutiitire chero chatichakumbira.
Mark 10:36 Akati kwavari: Chii chamunoda kuti ndikuitirei?
Mark 10:37 Vakati kwaari: Tipei kuti tigare, umwe kuruoko rwenyu rwerudyi, uye umwe kuruboshwe rwenyu mukubwinya kwenyu.
Mark 10:38 Asi Jesu wakati kwavari: Hamuzivi chamunokumbira. Mungagona kunwa mukombe wandinonwa ini here, nekubhabhatidzwa norubhabhatidzo rwandinobhabhatidzwa narwo ini here?
Mark 10:39 Vakati kwaari: Tingagona. Jesu akati kwavari: Muchanwa zvirokwazvo mukombe wandinonwa ini, nekubhabhatidzwa norubhabhatidzo rwandinobhabhatidzwa narwo ini;
Mark 10:40 asi kugara kuruoko rwangu rwerudyi nekuruboshwe rwangu, hazvisi zvangu kupa, asi zvevakazvigadzirirwa. <div eID="gen478" type="x-p"/>
Mark 10:41 Vanegumi vakati vachi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa, vakatanga kutsamwira zvikuru Jakobho naJohwani.
Mark 10:42 Asi Jesu akavadanira kwaari akati kwavari: Munoziva kuti avo vanonzi machinda evahedheni anovadzvinyirira, nevakuru vavo vanoshandisa simba pamusoro pavo.
Mark 10:43 Zvino hazvingadaro pakati penyu; asi ani nani anoda kuva mukuru pakati penyu, achava mushandiri wenyu;
Mark 10:44 ani nani wenyu anoda kuva wekutanga, achava mushandi wevese.
Mark 10:45 Nokuti kunyange Mwanakomana wemunhu haana kuuya kuzoshumirwa, asi kushumira, nekupa upenyu hwake <transChange type="added">ruve</transChange> rudzikunuro rwevazhinji. <div eID="gen479" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen477" type="section"/>
Mark 10:46 Vakasvika kuJeriko; zvino wakati achibuda Jeriko nevadzidzi vake nechaunga chikuru, Bhatimio bofu, mwanakomana waTimio, akange agere padivi penzira achipemha.
Mark 10:47 Wakati anzwa kuti ndiJesu weNazareta, akatanga kudanidzira, nekuti: Jesu Mwanakomana waDhavhidhi, ndinzwirei tsitsi!
Mark 10:48 Vazhinji vakamutsiura kuti anyarare; asi iye wakanyanya kudanidzira kwazvo, <transChange type="added">achiti:</transChange> Mwanakomana waDhavhidhi, ndinzwirei tsitsi!
Mark 10:49 Jesu ndokumira, akati adanwe; vakadana bofu vachiti kwariri: Tsunga moyo; simuka, anokudana.
Mark 10:50 Ipapo rikarasa nguvo yaro rikasimuka, rikauya kuna Jesu.
Mark 10:51 Jesu akapindura, akati kwariri: Unoda kuti ndikuitirei? Bofu rikati kwaari: Rabhoni*, kuti ndionezve.
Mark 10:52 Jesu akati kwariri: Enda; rutendo rwako rwakuponesa. Pakarepo rikaonazve, rikatevera Jesu munzira.  <chapter eID="Mark.10"/><div eID="gen481" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen480" type="section"/>
Mark 11:0 <div sID="gen482" type="section"/> <chapter n="11" osisID="Mark.11" sID="Mark.11"/>  <div sID="gen483" type="x-p"/>
Mark 11:1 Vakati vasvika pedo neJerusarema, paBhetifage neBhetaniya, pagomo reMiorivhi, akatuma vaviri vevadzidzi vake,
Mark 11:2 akati kwavari: Fambai muende kumusha wakatarisana nemwi; pakarepo kana muchipinda mauri, muchawana dhongwana rakasungirwa, risina munhu wakamborigara; murisunugure, mugouya <transChange type="added">naro</transChange>.
Mark 11:3 Kana munhu akati kwamuri: Munoitirei izvi? Muti: Ishe anorida. Pakarepo acharitumira pano.
Mark 11:4 Vakaenda, vakanowana dhongwana rakasungirwa pamukova kunze, panzira yemumusha; vakarisunungura.
Mark 11:5 Vamwe vevakange vamirepo vakati kwavari: Munoitei muchisunungura dhongwana?
Mark 11:6 Vakavaudza Jesu sezvaakaraira; vakavarega vachienda.
Mark 11:7 Zvino vakauya nedhongwana kuna Jesu, vakakandira nguvo dzavo pamusoro paro, akagara pamusoro paro.
Mark 11:8 Nevazhinji vakawarira nguvo dzavo munzira, nevamwe vakatema masanzu kubva pamiti vakawarira munzira.
Mark 11:9 Zvino avo vakange vachitungamira nevakange vachitevera vakadanidzira, vachiti: Hosana*! Wakaropafadzwa anouya muzita raIshe;
Mark 11:10 hwakaropafadzwa ushe hwababa vedu Dhavhidhi, hunouya muzita raIshe! Hosana kumusoro-soro! <div eID="gen483" type="x-p"/>
Mark 11:11 Jesu ndokupinda muJerusarema, nemutembere; akati aringa-ringa zvinhu zvese, yava nguva yemadekwani, akabuda, akaenda kuBhetaniya nevanegumi nevaviri. <div eID="gen484" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen482" type="section"/>
Mark 11:12 Uye mangwana vachibuda kubva Bhetaniya, akanzwa nzara.
Mark 11:13 Wakati achiona muonde uri kure, une mashizha, akaenda<transChange type="added">ko</transChange> achiti zvimwe angawana chinhu pauri; asi asvika pauri haana kuwana chinhu kunze kwemashizha; nokuti yakange isiri nguva yemaonde.
Mark 11:14 Zvino Jesu akapindura, akati kwauri: Kusava nemunhu anozodyazve zvibereko pauri kusvika kusingaperi. Vadzidzi vake vaka<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa. <div eID="gen486" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen485" type="section"/>
Mark 11:15 Vakasvika kuJerusarema; Jesu akapinda mutembere, akatanga kudzingira panze avo vaitengesa nevaitenga mutembere; akapidigura matafura evaitsinhanisa mari, nezvigaro zvaivo vaitengesa njiva.
Mark 11:16 Zvino akasatendera kuti munhu atakure nhumbi achipfuura nemutembere. <div eID="gen488" type="x-p"/>
Mark 11:17 Akadzidzisa, achiti kwavari: Hakuna kunyorwa here kuchinzi: Imba yangu ichanzi imba yekunyengetera nemarudzi ese? Asi imwi makaiita bako remakororo. <div eID="gen489" type="x-p"/>
Mark 11:18 Zvino vanyori nevapristi vakuru vaka<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa, vakatsvaka kuti vangamuparadza sei; nokuti vakange vachimutya, nokuti chaunga chese chakashamisika nedzidziso yake. <div eID="gen490" type="x-p"/>
Mark 11:19 Zvino ava madekwani, wakabuda kunze kweguta. <div eID="gen491" type="x-p"/>
Mark 11:20 Zvino mangwanani-ngwanani vakati vachipfuura, vakaona muonde waoma kubva pamidzi.
Mark 11:21 Petro akarangarira akati kwaari: Rabhi*, tarirai muonde wamakatuka waoma.
Mark 11:22 Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Ivai nerutendo kuna Mwari.
Mark 11:23 Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Ani nani anoti kugomo iri: Simudzwa, ukandwe mugungwa, uye asiri asina chokwadi mumoyo make, asi achitenda kuti zvinhu zvaanoreva zvichaitika, zvichaitika kwaari chero zvaanoreva.
Mark 11:24 Naizvozvo ndinoti kwamuri: Zvinhu zvese chero zvamunokumbira muchinyengetera, tendai kuti muchagamuchira, uye zvichava zvenyu.
Mark 11:25 Kana mumire muchinyengetera, kanganwirai kana mune chakanangana neumwe; kuti Baba venyuwo vari kumatenga vakukanganwirei kudarika kwenyu.
Mark 11:26 Asi kana imwi musingakanganwiri, Baba venyu vari kumatenga havakanganwiriwo kudarika kwenyu. <div eID="gen492" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen487" type="section"/>
Mark 11:27 Vakasvikazve kuJerusarema; zvino wakati achifamba mutembere, vapristi vakuru nevanyori nevakuru vakauya kwaari,
Mark 11:28 zvino vakati kwaari: Unoita zvinhu izvozvi nesimba ripi; ndiani wakakupa simba iri, kuti unoita zvinhu izvi?
Mark 11:29 Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Iniwo ndichakubvunzai mubvunzo umwe, mundipindure, neni ndichakuudzai kuti ndinoita zvinhu izvozvi nesimba ripi.
Mark 11:30 Rubhabhatidzo rwaJohwani rwakabva kudenga, kana kuvanhu? Ndipindurei.
Mark 11:31 Vakaonesana, vachiti: Kana tikati: Kudenga, achati: Makagoregerei kumutenda?
Mark 11:32 Asi kana tikati: Kuvanhu; vakange vachitya vanhu; nokuti vese vakange vachiverenga Johwani kuti muporofita zvirokwazvo.
Mark 11:33 Vakapindura vachiti kuna Jesu: Hatizivi. Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Ini handingakuudziyiwo kuti ndinoita zvinhu izvi nesimba ripi. <chapter eID="Mark.11"/><div eID="gen494" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen493" type="section"/>
Mark 12:0 <div sID="gen495" type="section"/> <chapter n="12" osisID="Mark.12" sID="Mark.12"/>  <div sID="gen496" type="x-p"/>
Mark 12:1 Zvino wakatanga kutaura kwavari nemifananidzo, <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Munhu wakasima munda wemizambiringa, akaisa ruzhowa rwakaukomberedza, akachera pekusvinira waini, akavaka shongwe, akauhaisa* kuvarimi, ndokuenda parwendo.
Mark 12:2 Nenguva yakafanira, wakatumira muranda kuvarimi, kuti agamuchire kubva kuvarimi zvechibereko chemunda wemizambiringa.
Mark 12:3 Vakamubata vakarova, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>endesa asina chinhu.
Mark 12:4 Akatumazve kwavari umwe muranda; uyu vakamuposhera mabwe, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>kuvadza mumusoro, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>endesa <transChange type="added">a</transChange>nyadziswa.
Mark 12:5 Zvino wakatumazve umwe; uyu vakamuurayawo; nevamwe vazhinji, vachirova vamwe, nekuuraya vamwe.
Mark 12:6 Naizvozvo wakange achine mwanakomana umwe mudikanwi wake, akamutumirawo kwavari pakupedzisira, achiti: Vachakudza mwanakomana wangu.
Mark 12:7 Asi varimi ivavo vakataurirana, vachiti: Uyu ndiye mugari wenhaka; uyai ngatimuurayei, nhaka ichava yedu.
Mark 12:8 Vakamutora vakauraya, vakaposhera kunze kwemunda wemizambiringa.
Mark 12:9 Naizvozvo mwene wemunda wemizambiringa achaitei? Achauya akaparadza varimi, akapa munda wemizambiringa kune vamwe.
Mark 12:10 Ko hamuna kuverenga here rugwaro urwu <transChange type="added">rwunoti</transChange>: Ibwe vavaki ravakarasa, ndiro rava musoro wekona;
Mark 12:11 izvi zvakaitwa naIshe, uye zvinoshamisa pameso edu?
Mark 12:12 Zvino vakatsvaka kumubata, asi vakatya chaunga; nokuti vaiziva kuti wakange ataura mufananidzo uyu akanangana navo. Vakamusiya vakaenda. <div eID="gen496" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen495" type="section"/>
Mark 12:13 Vakati vatuma kwaari vamwe veVaFarisi neveVaHerodhe, kuti vamubate pakutaura.
Mark 12:14 Zvino vakati vauya, vakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, tinoziva kuti ndimwi wechokwadi, hamuna hanya nemunhu; nokuti hamutariri chimiro chemunhu, asi munodzidzisa nzira yaMwari muchokwadi: Zviri pamutemo kupa Kesari mutero here, kana kwete?
Mark 12:15 Tipe here, kana tirege kupa? Asi iye wakaziva unyepedzeri hwavo, akati kwavari: Munondiidzirei? Ndivigirei dhenario*, kuti ndione.
Mark 12:16 Vaka<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>uisa. Akati kwavari: Mufananidzo uyu nerunyoro urwu ndezvani? Vakati kwaari: ZvaKesari.
Mark 12:17 Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Dzoserai kuna Kesari zvinhu zvaKesari, nekuna Mwari zvinhu zvaMwari. Vakashamisika naye. <div eID="gen498" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen497" type="section"/>
Mark 12:18 Zvino kwakauya kwaari VaSadhusi, vanoti hakuna kumuka, vakamubvunza vachiti:
Mark 12:19 Mudzidzisi, Mozisi wakatinyorera kuti: Kana mukoma wemunhu akafa, akasiya mukadzi, akasasiya vana, kuti munin'ina wake atore mukadzi wake, amutsire mukoma wake mbeu.
Mark 12:20 Zvino kwakange kune vanakomana vanomwe vemunhu umwe; wekutanga akawana mukadzi, akafa akasasiya mbeu.
Mark 12:21 Wechipiri akamutora, akafa, iyewo akasasiya mbeu; newechitatu saizvozvo.
Mark 12:22 Nevanomwe vakamutora, vakasasiya mbeu; shure kwevese mukadzi akafawo.
Mark 12:23 Naizvozvo pakumuka, kana vachimuka, achava mukadzi wani kwavari? Nokuti vanomwe vakava naye <transChange type="added">kuita</transChange> mukadzi.
Mark 12:24 Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Hamuna kurasika here neizvozvi, nokuti hamuzivi magwaro kana simba raMwari?
Mark 12:25 Nokuti kana vachimuka kubva kuvakafa, havawanani, kana kuwaniswa, asi vakaita sevatumwa vari kumatenga.
Mark 12:26 Zvino maererano nevakafa, kuti vanomutswa, hamuna kurava here mubhuku raMozisi, <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> Mwari wakataura naye sei mugwenzi reminzwa, achiti: Ndiri Mwari waAbhurahama, naMwari waIsaka, naMwari waJakobho?
Mark 12:27 Haasi Mwari wevakafa, asi Mwari wevapenyu; imwi naizvozvo marasika kwazvo. <div eID="gen500" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen499" type="section"/>
Mark 12:28 Zvino umwe wevanyori wakasvika, wakati anzwa vachirangana, achiziva kuti wakange avapindura zvakanaka, akamubvunza <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Ndeupi murairo wekutanga kune yese?
Mark 12:29 Jesu akamupindura, achiti: Wekutanga kumirairo yese <transChange type="added">ndiwoyu</transChange>: Inzwa Israeri, Ishe Mwari wedu, ndiIshe umwe chete!
Mark 12:30 Uye ida Ishe Mwari wako nemoyo wako wese, uye nemweya wako wese, uye nefungwa dzako dzese, uye nesimba rako rese. Uyu murairo wekutanga.
Mark 12:31 Newechipiri wakadai ndeuyu: Ida umwe wako sezvauno<transChange type="added">zvida</transChange>. Hakuna umwe murairo mukuru kune iyi.
Mark 12:32 Zvino munyori akati kwaari: Zvakanaka, Mudzidzisi, mareva zvirokwazvo kuti kuna Mwari umwe chete, uye hakuna umwe kunze kwake;
Mark 12:33 nekumuda nemoyo wese, uye nefungwa dzese, uye nemweya wese, uye nesimba rese, nekuda wekwako sezvauno<transChange type="added">zvida</transChange>, zvinopfuura zvipiriso zvese zvinopiswa nezvibairo.
Mark 12:34 Zvino Jesu wakati achimuona kuti wapindura nenjere, akati kwaari: Hausi kure neushe hwaMwari. Kukasazova nemunhu wakatsunga kumubvunza. <div eID="gen502" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen501" type="section"/>
Mark 12:35 Zvino Jesu wakati achidzidzisa mutembere, akapindura akati: Vanyori vanoreva sei kuti Kristu Mwanakomana waDhavhidhi?
Mark 12:36 Nokuti Dhavhidhi amene wakati neMweya Mutsvene: Ishe wakati kuna Ishe wangu: Gara kuruoko rwangu rwerudyi, kusvikira ndaita vavengi vako chitsiko chetsoka dzako.
Mark 12:37 Naizvozvo Dhavhidhi amene anomuidza Ishe, ko Mwanakomana wake papi? Chaunga chikuru chikamunzwa nemufaro. <div eID="gen504" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen503" type="section"/>
Mark 12:38 Zvino wakati kwavari padzidziso yake: Chenjerai vanyori, vanoda kufamba nenguvo refu, nekwaziso pamisika,
Mark 12:39 nezvigaro zvemberi mumasinagoge, nezvinzvimbo zvakakwirira pazvirairo;
Mark 12:40 vanodya dzimba dzechirikadzi, uye nekunyepedzera vachiita minyengetero mirefu; ivava vachagamuchira kuraswa kukuru kwazvo. <div eID="gen506" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen505" type="section"/>
Mark 12:41 Jesu akagara pasi akatarisana nechivigiro chezvipo, akatarira kuti chaunga chinokanda sei mari muchivigiro; zvino vafumi vazhinji vakange vachikanda zvizhinji.
Mark 12:42 Zvino kwakasvika imwe chirikadzi murombo, ikakanda tumari twemhangura tuviri, ndiro kobiri.
Mark 12:43 Akadanira vadzidzi vake kwaari, akati kwavari: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Chirikadzi iyi murombo yakanda zvizhinji kupfuura vese vakanda muchivigiro chezvipo;
Mark 12:44 nokuti vese vakanda pamuraudziro wavo; asi iye paurombo hwake wakanda zvese zvaanazvo, zvese zveupenyu hwake. <chapter eID="Mark.12"/><div eID="gen508" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen507" type="section"/>
Mark 13:0 <div sID="gen509" type="section"/> <chapter n="13" osisID="Mark.13" sID="Mark.13"/>  <div sID="gen510" type="x-p"/>
Mark 13:1 Zvino wakati achibuda mutembere, umwe wevadzidzi vake wakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, tarirai mabwe rudzii, nezvivakwa rudzii!
Mark 13:2 Jesu achipindura akati kwaari: Unoona zvivakwa izvi zvikuru here? Hakungatongosiiwi ibwe pamusoro pebwe, risingatongoputsirwi pasi. <div eID="gen510" type="x-p"/>
Mark 13:3 Zvino wakati agara pagomo reMiorivhi, pakatarisana netembere, Petro, naJakobho, naJohwani, naAndiriya vakamubvunza vari vega, <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>:
Mark 13:4 Tiudzei, izvozvi zvichava rinhi? Nechiratidzo chii kana izvozvi zvese zvozadziswa?
Mark 13:5 Zvino Jesu achivapindura akatanga kuti: Chenjerai kusava neanokutsausai.
Mark 13:6 Nokuti vazhinji vachauya muzita rangu, vachiti: Ndini <transChange type="added">Kristu</transChange>, vachatsausa vazhinji.
Mark 13:7 Asi kana muchinzwa zvehondo, nerunyerekupe rwehondo, musakanganiswa; nokuti zvinofanira kuitika; asi kuguma kuchigere.
Mark 13:8 Nokuti rudzi ruchamukira rudzi; neushe <transChange type="added">huchamukira</transChange> ushe; uye kuchava nekudengenyeka kwenyika kunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana, uye kuchava nenzara, nematambudziko; izvi kutanga kwekurwadziwa. <div eID="gen511" type="x-p"/>
Mark 13:9 Zvichenjererei imwi, nokuti vachakukumikidzai kumatare emakurukota, uye mumasinagoge mucharohwa, uye muchauyiswa pamberi pevatongi nemadzimambo nekuda kwangu, chive chapupu kwavari.
Mark 13:10 Uye evhangeri inofanira kutanga kuparidzirwa kumarudzi ese.
Mark 13:11 Asi kana vachi<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>uisai vachikutengesai, musafunganya pakutanga zvamuchataura, uye musafanorangarira, asi chero zvamunenge mapiwa nenguva iyo taurai izvozvo; nokuti hamusi imwi munotaura, asi Mweya Mutsvene.
Mark 13:12 Zvino mukoma achatengesera munin'ina kurufu, nababa mwanakomana; nevana vachamukira vabereki nekuvauraya;
Mark 13:13 uye muchavengwa nevese nekuda kwezita rangu; asi anotsungirira kusvikira pakuguma, ndiye achaponeswa. <div eID="gen512" type="x-p"/>
Mark 13:14 Zvino kana muchiona nyangadzi yekuparadza yakataurwa naDhanyeri muporofita, imire paisingafaniri (anorava ngaanzwisise), zvino vari muJudhiya ngavatizire kumakomo;
Mark 13:15 neari pamusoro pedenga reimba ngaarege kuburukira mumba, kana kupinda kunotora chinhu mumba make.
Mark 13:16 Neari mumunda ngaarege kutendeukira shure kunotora nguvo yake.
Mark 13:17 Asi vane nhamo avo vane mimba neavo vanonwisa nemazuva iwayo! <div eID="gen513" type="x-p"/>
Mark 13:18 Asi nyengeterai kuti kutiza kwenyu kurege kuva muchando.
Mark 13:19 Nokuti <transChange type="added">mu</transChange>mazuva iwayo kuchavapo kutambudzika, kwakadaro kusati kwakavapo kubva pakutanga kwezvisikwa Mwari zvaakasika kusvikira zvino, uye hakuchatongovipo.
Mark 13:20 Dai Ishe asina kuatapudza mazuva, hakuna chero nyama yaiponeswa; asi nekuda kwevasanangurwa, vaakasanangura, wakaatapudza mazuva. <div eID="gen514" type="x-p"/>
Mark 13:21 Uye ipapo kana munhu achiti kwamuri: Tarirai, Kristu pano; kana: Tarirai apo; musatenda;
Mark 13:22 nokuti vana Kristu venhema nevaporofita venhema vachamuka, vagoratidza zviratidzo nezvishamiso, kuti vatsause, kana zvichibvira, kunyange vasanangurwa.
Mark 13:23 Asi chenjerai imwi; tarirai, ndagara ndakuudzai zvinhu zvese. <div eID="gen515" type="x-p"/>
Mark 13:24 Asi nemazuva iwayo, shure kwekutambudzika ikoko, zuva richasvibiswa, nemwedzi hauchazopi chiedza chawo,
Mark 13:25 nenyeredzi dzekudenga dzichawa, nemasimba ari kumatenga achazungunuswa.
Mark 13:26 Ipapo vachaona Mwanakomana wemunhu achiuya mumakore ane simba guru nekubwinya,
Mark 13:27 ipapo achatuma vatumwa vake, vagounganidza pamwe vasanangurwa vake kubva kumhepo ina, kubva kumugumo wenyika kusvikira kumugumo wedenga. <div eID="gen516" type="x-p"/>
Mark 13:28 Zvino dzidzai mufananidzo kubva pamuonde; kana davi rawo rava ikozvino nyoro, richitunga mashizha, munoziva kuti zhizha raswedera.
Mark 13:29 Saizvozvo imwiwo, kana muchiona zvinhu izvi zvichiitika, zivai kuti zvava pedo wava pamukova. <div eID="gen517" type="x-p"/>
Mark 13:30 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Zera iri haringatongopfuuri, kusvikira zvinhu izvi zvese zvaitika.
Mark 13:31 Denga nenyika zvichapfuura; asi mashoko angu haangatongopfuuri. <div eID="gen518" type="x-p"/>
Mark 13:32 Asi zvezuva iro neawa, hakuna anoziva, kunyange vatumwa vari kudenga, kunyange Mwanakomana, kunze kwaBaba.
Mark 13:33 Chenjerai, murinde, munyengetere; nokuti hamuzivi kuti nguva ndeyarinhi.
Mark 13:34 Semunhu wakafamba rwendo, akasiya imba yake, akapa simba kuvaranda vake, kune umwe neumwe basa rake, akarairawo murindi wemukova kuti arinde.
Mark 13:35 Naizvozvo rindai; nokuti hamuzivi kuti mwene weimba anouya rinhi, manheru, kana pakati peusiku, kana pakurira kwejongwe, kana mangwanani;
Mark 13:36 kuti arege kuuya kamwe kamwe, akakuwanai murere.
Mark 13:37 Nezvandinotaura kwamuri, ndinotaurira vese: Rindai. <chapter eID="Mark.13"/><div eID="gen519" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen509" type="section"/>
Mark 14:0 <div sID="gen520" type="section"/> <chapter n="14" osisID="Mark.14" sID="Mark.14"/>  <div sID="gen521" type="x-p"/>
Mark 14:1 Shure kwemazuva maviri kwaiva nepasika n<transChange type="added">emutambo </transChange>wechingwa chisina mbiriso; vapristi vakuru nevanyori ndokutsvaka kuti vangamubata sei nekunyengera va<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>uraye.
Mark 14:2 Asi vakati: Kwete pamutambo, zvimwe kungava nebongozozo revanhu. <div eID="gen521" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen520" type="section"/>
Mark 14:3 Zvino wakati ari paBhetaniya, mumba maSimoni wemaperembudzi, agere pakudya, kwakauya mukadzi, ane chinu chearibhasiteri* chechizoro chenaridho* chaiyo chakakosha zvikuru; akaputsa chinu chearibhasiteri, akachidurura pamusoro wake.
Mark 14:4 Asi kwaiva nevamwe vakatsamwa mukati mavo, vakati: Kutambisa ikoku kwechizoro kwaitirwei?
Mark 14:5 Nokuti ichi chingadai chatengeswa nemadhenario* anopfuura mazana matatu, akapiwa varombo. Vakamutsiura nehasha.
Mark 14:6 Asi Jesu wakati: Musiyei; munomutambudzirei? Waitira ini basa rakanaka.
Mark 14:7 Nokuti varombo munavo nguva dzese, uye nguva ipi neipi yamunoda, munogona kuvaitira zvakanaka; asi ini hamuneni nguva dzese.
Mark 14:8 Waita zvaanogona; wakagara azodzera muviri wangu kuvigwa.
Mark 14:9 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Kwese-kwese kuchaparidzirwa evhangeri iyi panyika yese, zvaakaitawo zvicharehwa, chive chirangaridzo chake. <div eID="gen523" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen522" type="section"/>
Mark 14:10 Zvino Judhasi Isikariyoti, umwe wevanegumi nevaviri, wakaenda kuvapristi vakuru, kuti amutengese kwavari.
Mark 14:11 Uye vakati vachi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa, vakafara, vakavimbisa kumupa mari. Akatsvaka kuti angamutengesa sei panguva yakafanira. <div eID="gen525" type="x-p"/>
Mark 14:12 Nezuva rekutanga rechingwa chisina mbiriso, pavaibaya pasika, vadzidzi vake vakati kwaari: Ndekupi kwamunoda kuti tiende kunogadzirira kuti mudye pasika?
Mark 14:13 Akatuma vaviri vevadzidzi vake, akati kwavari: Endai muguta, zvino munhu achasangana nemwi akatakura chirongo chemvura; mumutevere,
Mark 14:14 uye chero paanenge apinda, muti kumwene weimba: Mudzidzisi wati: Imba yevaeni iripi, pandichadyira pasika nevadzidzi vangu?
Mark 14:15 Uye iye achakutaridzai imba huru yekumusoro yakarongedzwa, yakagadzirwa; tigadzirirei ipapo.
Mark 14:16 Vadzidzi vake vakabuda, vakasvika muguta, vakawana sezvaakange areva kwavari; vakagadzirira pasika. <div eID="gen526" type="x-p"/>
Mark 14:17 Kuzoti ava madekwani wakasvika nevanegumi nevaviri.
Mark 14:18 Zvino vakati vagara vachidya, Jesu akati: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Umwe wenyu anodya neni achanditengesa.
Mark 14:19 Ndokubva vatanga kushungurudzika, umwe neumwe akati kwaari: Zvirokwazvo handisi ini, ndizvo here? Neumwe: Zvirokwazvo handisi ini, ndizvo here?
Mark 14:20 Asi wakapindura akati kwavari: Umwe wevanegumi nevaviri, anoseva neni mundiro.
Mark 14:21 Mwanakomana wemunhu anoenda zvirokwazvo, sezvazvakanyorwa pamusoro pake; asi ane nhamo munhu uyo, Mwanakomana wemunhu waanotengeswa naye! Zvaiva nani kwaari kana munhu uyo aiva asina kuzvarwa. <div eID="gen527" type="x-p"/>
Mark 14:22 Zvino vakati vachidya, Jesu akatora chingwa, akaropafadza, akamedura, ndokupa kwavari, akati: Torai, idyai, ichi ndicho muviri wangu.
Mark 14:23 Akatora mukombe, akati avonga akapa kwavari, vakanwa vese pauri.
Mark 14:24 Zvino akati kwavari: Iri iropa rangu, iro resungano itsva, rinoteurirwa vazhinji.
Mark 14:25 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Handichazotongonwi zvechibereko chemuzambiringa, kusvikira zuva iro randichazochinwa naro chava chitsva muushe hwaMwari.
Mark 14:26 Zvino vakati vaimba rwiyo rwekurumbidza vakabuda vakaenda kugomo reMiorivhi. <div eID="gen528" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen524" type="section"/>
Mark 14:27 Zvino Jesu akati kwavari: Mese muchagumburwa nekuda kwangu usiku huno, nokuti kwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Ndicharova mufudzi, makwai agopararira.
Mark 14:28 Asi shure kwekumutswa kwangu, ndichakutungamirirai kuenda kuGarirea.
Mark 14:29 Asi Petro wakati kwaari: Kunyange vese vakagumburwa, asi kwete ini.
Mark 14:30 Jesu ndokuti kwaari: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri: Nhasi, neusiku huno, jongwe risati rarira kaviri, uchandiramba katatu.
Mark 14:31 Asi iye wakareva zvakanyanya kusimba, <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Kunyange ndikatofanira kufa nemwi, handingatongokurambiyi. Nevesewo vakadaro. <div eID="gen530" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen529" type="section"/>
Mark 14:32 Zvino vakasvika panzvimbo yainzi Getsemani; akati kuvadzidzi vake: Garai pano, ndichi<transChange type="added">no</transChange>nyengetera.
Mark 14:33 Akatora pamwe naye Petro naJakobho naJohwani, akatanga kuvhunduka nekunetseka zvikuru.
Mark 14:34 Akati kwavari: Mweya wangu unoshungurudzika kwazvo kusvikira pakufa; garai pano murinde.
Mark 14:35 Akapfuura zvishoma, akawira pasi, akanyengetera, kuti kana zvaibvira, nguva ipfuure kwaari.
Mark 14:36 Zvino akati: Abha*, Baba, zvinhu zvese zvinogoneka kwamuri. Bvisai mukombe uyu kwandiri, asi kwete zvandinoda ini, asi zva<transChange type="added">munoda</transChange> imwi.
Mark 14:37 Zvino akasvika, akavawana varere; akati kuna Petro: Simoni, urere here? Wakonewa kurinda awa rimwe here?
Mark 14:38 Rindai munyengetere, kuti murege kupinda mumuedzo. Mweya unoda hawo, asi nyama ine utera.
Mark 14:39 Akaendazve, akanyengetera achireva mashoko mamwechete.
Mark 14:40 Zvino paakadzoka, akavawana vararazve, nokuti meso avo akange orema; vakasaziva zvavangamupindura.
Mark 14:41 Akauya rwechitatu, akati kwavari: Chirambai murere zvino muzorore. Zvaringana; nguva yasvika; tarirai, Mwanakomana wemunhu wokumikidzwa mumaoko avatadzi.
Mark 14:42 Simukai, tiende; tarirai, wonditengesa wava pedo. <div eID="gen532" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen531" type="section"/>
Mark 14:43 Pakarepo achataura, Judhasi wakasvika, umwe wevanegumi nevaviri, chaunga chikuru chinaye chine minondo netsvimbo, chichibva kuvapristi vakuru nevanyori nevakuru.
Mark 14:44 Zvino iye wakamutengesa wakange avapa chiratidzo, achiti: Uyo wandinongotsvoda ndiye; mumutore muende naye maka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>chengetedza.
Mark 14:45 Zvino wakati asvika, pakarepo akaswedera kwaari akati: Rabhi*! Rabhi! Akamutsvoda.
Mark 14:46 Vakabva vaisa maoko avo kwaari, vakamubata.
Mark 14:47 Zvino umwe wevakange vamirepo wakavhomora munondo akatema muranda wemupristi mukuru, akagura nzeve yake. <div eID="gen534" type="x-p"/>
Mark 14:48 Zvino Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Mabuda semakanangana negororo neminondo netsvimbo kuzondibata here?
Mark 14:49 Ndakange ndinemwi mutembere zuva nezuva ndichidzidzisa, asi hamuna kundibata, asi <transChange type="added">izvi zvaitwa</transChange> kuti magwaro azadziswe.
Mark 14:50 Vese ndokumusiya vakatiza.
Mark 14:51 Zvino rimwe jaya rakamutevera, rakamonera mucheka werineni rakashama. Majaya akaribata;
Mark 14:52 ndokubva rasiya mucheka werineni, rikavatiza rakashama. <div eID="gen535" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen533" type="section"/>
Mark 14:53 Zvino vakaendesa Jesu kumupristi mukuru; vakaunganira kwaari vapristi vakuru vese nevakuru nevanyori.
Mark 14:54 Petro akamutevera ari kure kusvikira mukati mechivanze chemupristi mukuru; akange agere pamwe nevaranda, achidziya moto. <div eID="gen537" type="x-p"/>
Mark 14:55 Zvino vapristi vakuru nedare rese remakurukota vakatsvaka uchapupu hwakanangana naJesu, kuti vamuuraye; asi havana kuhuwana.
Mark 14:56 Nokuti vazhinji vaimupupurira nhema, asi uchapupu hauna kupindirana.
Mark 14:57 Ndokubva kwasimuka vamwe vakamupupurira nhema vachiti:
Mark 14:58 Isu takamunzwa achiti: Ini ndichaputsa tembere iyi yakaitwa nemaoko, uye mumazuva matatu ndichavaka imwe isina kuitwa nemaoko.
Mark 14:59 Asi kunyange zvakadaro uchapupu hwavo hauna kupindirana.
Mark 14:60 Zvino mupristi mukuru wakasimuka pakati <transChange type="added">pavo</transChange>, akabvunza Jesu, achiti: Haupinduri chinhu here? Vanopupurei ava chakanangana newe?
Mark 14:61 Asi wakanyarara, akasapindura chinhu. Mupristi mukuru akamubvunzazve, akati kwaari: Iwe uri Kristu, Mwanakomana weWakaropafadzwa here?
Mark 14:62 Jesu akati: Ndini iye. Uye muchaona Mwanakomana wemunhu agere kuruoko rwerudyi rwesimba, achiuya nemakore ekudenga.
Mark 14:63 Mupristi mukuru ndokubvarura nguvo dzake akati: Tichiri kudirei zvapupu?
Mark 14:64 Manzwa kunyomba; munofungei? Zvino vese vakamurasa kuti ave nemhosva yerufu. <div eID="gen538" type="x-p"/>
Mark 14:65 Vamwe vakatanga kumupfira, nekufukidza chiso chake, nekumurova netsiva, nokuti kwaari: Porofita! Varanda vakamurova nembama dzamaoko. <div eID="gen539" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen536" type="section"/>
Mark 14:66 Zvino Petro achiri pachivanze pasi, kwakasvika umwe wevarandakadzi vemupristi mukuru;
Mark 14:67 achiona Petro achidziya <transChange type="added">moto</transChange>, akamutarira akati: Iwewo wakange una Jesu weNazareta.
Mark 14:68 Asi wakaramba, achiti: Handizivi kana kunzwisisa zvaunoreva. Akabuda panze akaenda kumusuwo; jongwe rikarira. <div eID="gen541" type="x-p"/>
Mark 14:69 Zvino murandakadzi akamuonazve, akatanga kuti kuna vakange vamirepo: Uyu ndewavo.
Mark 14:70 Asi wakarambazve. Zvino shure kwechinguvana, vakange vamirepo vakatizve kuna Petro: Zvirokwazvo, uri wavo, nokuti newe uri muGarirea nemutauro wako unotenderana <transChange type="added">nazvo</transChange>.
Mark 14:71 Akatanga kutuka nekupika, achiti: Handimuzivi munhu uyu wamunoreva.
Mark 14:72 Zvino jongwe rikarira rwechipiri. Petro ndokurangarira shoko Jesu raakange areva kwaari rekuti: Jongwe risati rarira kaviri, uchandiramba katatu. Zvino wakati achifunga izvozvo akachema. <chapter eID="Mark.14"/><div eID="gen542" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen540" type="section"/>
Mark 15:0 <div sID="gen543" type="section"/> <chapter n="15" osisID="Mark.15" sID="Mark.15"/>  <div sID="gen544" type="x-p"/>
Mark 15:1 Zvino pakarepo mangwanani-ngwanani vapristi vakuru vakaita zano nevakuru nevanyori nedare remakurukota rese, vakasunga Jesu, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>takura, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>kumikidza kuna Pirato.
Mark 15:2 Pirato ndokumubvunza <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Iwe uri Mambo weVaJudha here? Akapindura, akati kwaari: Unoreva iwe.
Mark 15:3 Vapristi vakuru vakamupomera zvinhu zvizhinji, asi iye haana kupindura chinhu.
Mark 15:4 Pirato akamubvunzazve achiti: Haupinduri chinhu here? Tarira, zvinhu zvingani zvavanokupupurira!
Mark 15:5 Asi Jesu haana kuzopindurazve chinhu, zvekuti Pirato wakashamisika. <div eID="gen544" type="x-p"/>
Mark 15:6 Zvino pamabiko waivasunungurira musungwa umwe, chero upi wavanenge vakumbira.
Mark 15:7 Zvino kwakange kune wainzi Bharabhasi, akasungwa <transChange type="added">pamwe</transChange> nevakange vamutsa mhirizhonga naye, vakange vaita umhondi pamhirizhonga iyoyo.
Mark 15:8 Zvino chaunga chakadanidzira, vakatanga kukumbira kuti <transChange type="added">aite</transChange> sezvaaigarovaitira.
Mark 15:9 Asi Pirato akavapindura, achiti: Munoda kuti ndikusunungurirei Mambo weVaJudha here?
Mark 15:10 Nokuti wakange achiziva kuti vapristi vakuru vakange vamutengesa negodo.
Mark 15:11 Asi vapristi vakuru vakamutsa chaunga, kuti zviri nani avasunungurire Bharabhasi.
Mark 15:12 Pirato akapindura akatizve kwavari: Naizvozvo munoda kuti ndi<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>itirei, wamunoti ndiMambo weVaJudha?
Mark 15:13 Vakadanidzirazve <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Murovere pamuchinjikwa!
Mark 15:14 Asi Pirato akati kwavari: Nemhaka yei? Wakaita chakaipa chei? Vakanyanyisa kudanidzira <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Muroverere pamuchinjikwa! <div eID="gen545" type="x-p"/>
Mark 15:15 Zvino Pirato, achida kuti agutse chaunga, akavasunungurira Bharabhasi; ndokukumikidza Jesu <transChange type="added">kwavari</transChange>, a<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>rova netyava, kuti arovererwe pamuchinjikwa. <div eID="gen546" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen543" type="section"/>
Mark 15:16 Zvino mauto akamuisa mukati mechivanze, chinova imba yemutungamiriri, akadanira hondo yese pamwe;
Mark 15:17 vakamupfekedza zvine ruvara rwehute, vakaruka korona yeminzwa, vakaisa paari.
Mark 15:18 Vakatanga kumukwazisa, <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Hekanhi, Mambo weVaJudha!
Mark 15:19 Vakamurova musoro nerutsanga, vakamupfira, vakafugama mabvi, vakamunamata.
Mark 15:20 Zvino vakati vamuseka, vakamubvisa zveruvara rwehute, ndokumupfekedza nguvo dzake pachake, vakabuda naye kunomuroverera pamuchinjikwa. <div eID="gen548" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen547" type="section"/>
Mark 15:21 Vakamanikidza umwe waipfuura <transChange type="added">wainzi</transChange> Simoni muKurini, achibva kuruwa, baba vaArekizandiro naRufo, kuti atakure muchinjikwa wake. <div eID="gen550" type="x-p"/>
Mark 15:22 Vakamuisa kunzvimbo <transChange type="added">yainzi</transChange> Gorogota, ndokuti kana zvichishandurwa: Nzvimbo yedehenya.
Mark 15:23 Vakamupa waini yakavhenganiswa nemura kuti anwe, asi haana kugamuchira.
Mark 15:24 Zvino vakati vamuroverera pamuchinjikwa, vakagovana nguvo dzake, vachikanda mujenya pamusoro padzo, kuti umwe neumwe achatorei.
Mark 15:25 Rakange rava awa rechitatu, vakabva vamuroverera pamuchinjikwa.
Mark 15:26 Nerugwaro rwemhosva yake rwakange rwakanyorwa pamusoro, <transChange type="added">rwuchiti</transChange>: MAMBO WEVAJUDHA. <div eID="gen551" type="x-p"/>
Mark 15:27 Pamwe naye vakaroverera pamuchinjikwa makororo maviri, umwe kuruoko rwerudyi, neumwe kuruboshwe rwake.
Mark 15:28 Rugwaro rukazadzisika, rwunoti: Wakaverengwa pamwe nevasina murairo. <div eID="gen552" type="x-p"/>
Mark 15:29 Nevaipfuura vakamutuka, vachidzungudza misoro yavo, vachiti: Ehe-e, iwe unoputsa tembere, neku<transChange type="added">i</transChange>vaka nemazuva matatu,
Mark 15:30 zviponese, uburuke pamuchinjikwa!
Mark 15:31 Saizvozvo vapristiwo vakuru vakamuseka pamwe nevanyori pakati pavo, vachiti: Wakaponesa vamwe, haagoni kuzviponesa.
Mark 15:32 Kristu Mambo waIsraeri ngaaburuke ikozvino pamuchinjikwa, kuti tione titende. Nevakange varovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe naye vakamunyomba.
Mark 15:33 Zvino awa rechitanhatu rakati rasvika, rima rikavapo panyika yese kusvikira paawa repfumbamwe.
Mark 15:34 Zvino neawa repfumbamwe, Jesu akadana nenzwi guru, achiti: "Eroi, Eroi, rama sabhakitani!" Ndokuti, kana zvichishandurwa: Mwari wangu, Mwari wangu, mandisiirei?
Mark 15:35 Vamwe vevakange vamirepo vakati vachi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa, vakati: Tarirai, anodana Eria.
Mark 15:36 Ipapo umwe wakamhanya, akazadza chipanje nevhiniga, akaisa parutsanga, akamupa kuti anwe, achiti: Regai, tione kana Eria achiuya kumuburusa.
Mark 15:37 Ipapo Jesu akadanidzira nenzwi guru akapa mweya. <div eID="gen553" type="x-p"/>
Mark 15:38 Vheiri retembere rikabvaruka kuita <transChange type="added">mapandi</transChange> maviri, kubva kumusoro kusvikira pasi.
Mark 15:39 Zvino mukuru wezana wakange amirepo pakatarisana naye, wakati achiona kuti wadanidzira zvakadaro akapa mweya, akati: Zvirokwazvo, munhu uyu wanga ari Mwanakomana waMwari. <div eID="gen554" type="x-p"/>
Mark 15:40 Uye kwakange kune vakadziwo vakatarira vari kure, pakati pavo pakange pana Maria Magidhariniwo, naMaria mai vaJakobho mudiki naJose, naSarome,
Mark 15:41 (avowo vaimutevera achiri muGarirea, vachimushandira), nevamwe vakadzi vazhinji vakange vakwira kuJerusarema naye. <div eID="gen555" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen549" type="section"/>
Mark 15:42 Zvino atova manheru, zvarakange riri gadziriro, ndokuti zuva rinotangira sabata,
Mark 15:43 Josefa waiva weArimatia, nhengo yedare yairemekedzwa, wakange akamirirawo pachake ushe hwaMwari; wakauya akapinda kuna Pirato akatsunga, akakumbira chitunha chaJesu.
Mark 15:44 Pirato akashamisika nokuti wakange atofa; akadanira kwaari mukuru wezana, akamubvunza kana akange ava nenguva afa.
Mark 15:45 Zvino wakati a<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa nemukuru wezana, akapa Josefa chitunha.
Mark 15:46 Akatenga mucheka wakaisvonaka, akamuburusa, akamuputira nemucheka wakapfava, ndokumuradzika muguva rakange rakacherwa muruware, ndokukungurusira ibwe pamukova weguva.
