Mark 15:47 Zvino Maria Magidharini, naMaria <transChange type="added">mai</transChange> vaJose, vakaona paakaradzikwa.  <chapter eID="Mark.15"/><div eID="gen557" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen556" type="section"/>
Mark 16:0 <div sID="gen558" type="section"/> <chapter n="16" osisID="Mark.16" sID="Mark.16"/>  <div sID="gen559" type="x-p"/>
Mark 16:1 Sabata rakati rapfuura, Maria Magidharini, naMaria <transChange type="added">mai</transChange> vaJakobho, naSarome vakatenga zvinonhuhwira, kuti vauye kunomuzodza.
Mark 16:2 Mangwanani-ngwanani kwazvo no<transChange type="added">musi</transChange> wekutanga wevhiki vakauya kuguva, zuva robuda.
Mark 16:3 Vakati pakati pavo: Ndiani achatikungurusira ibwe kubva pamukova weguva?
Mark 16:4 Zvino vakati vachitarira, vakaona kuti ibwe rakange rakunguruswa, nokuti raiva guru-guru. <div eID="gen559" type="x-p"/>
Mark 16:5 Zvino vakati vachipinda muguva, vakaona jaya rakange rigere kurudyi, rakapfeka nguvo refu chena; vakavhunduka;
Mark 16:6 asi rakati kwavari: Musavhunduka; munotsvaka Jesu muNazareta wakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa; wamuka, haasi pano; tarirai panzvimbo pavakange vamuradzika.
Mark 16:7 Asi endai, munoudza vadzidzi vake naPetro kuti anokutungamirirai kuGarirea, muchanomuonako sezvaakakuudzai. <div eID="gen560" type="x-p"/>
Mark 16:8 Zvino vakabuda nekukurumidza vakatiza paguva; uyezve kudedera nekuvhunduka kwakavabata; vakasataura chinhu kuna ani zvake, nokuti vakange vachitya.
Mark 16:9 Zvino <transChange type="added">Jesu</transChange> wakati amuka mangwanani-ngwanani newekutanga wevhiki, wakaonekwa pakutanga kuna Maria Magidharini, waakabudisa kwaari madhimoni manomwe.
Mark 16:10 Uyo akaenda akaudza avo vaiva naye, pavaichema vachirira.
Mark 16:11 Neava vanzwa kuti mupenyu, uye kuti wakange aonekwa naye, havana kutenda. <div eID="gen561" type="x-p"/>
Mark 16:12 Shure kweizvozvo wakazviratidza nechimwe chimiro kuvaviri vavo vachifamba, vachienda muruwa.
Mark 16:13 Zvino avawo vakaenda vakaudza vakange vasara; naavo vakasavatenda. <div eID="gen562" type="x-p"/>
Mark 16:14 Pashure wakazviratidza kune vanegumi neumwe vagere pakudya, akatsiura kusatenda kwavo neukukutu hwemoyo, nokuti havana kutenda vaya vakange vamuona amuka.
Mark 16:15 Akati kwavari: Endai munyika yese muparidze evhangeri kuchisikwa chega-chega.
Mark 16:16 Uyo anotenda akabhabhatidzwa achaponeswa; asi asingatendi achapiwa mhosva.
Mark 16:17 Zviratidzo izvi zvichavatevera vanotenda: Muzita rangu vachabudisa madhimoni, vachataura nendimi itsva;
Mark 16:18 vachanonga nyoka; kunyange vakanwa chero chinhu chinouraya, hachingatongovakuvadzi; vachaisa maoko pavarwere, vakapora. <div eID="gen563" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen558" type="section"/>
Mark 16:19 Naizvozvo Ishe shure kwekunge ataura kwavari, akagamuchirwa kumusoro kudenga, akagara kuruoko rwerudyi rwaMwari.
Mark 16:20 Avo vakabuda, vakaparidza kwese-kwese, Ishe achibata <transChange type="added">navo</transChange>, achisimbisa shoko nezviratidzo zvaitevera. Amen. <div eID="gen565" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen564" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Mark.16"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen348" osisID="Mark" type="book"/>
Luke 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Luke" sID="gen566" type="book"/>   <milestone n="RUKA" type="x-usfm-h"/>
Luke 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Luke.1" sID="Luke.1"/>
Luke 1:1 Sezvo vazhinji vakabata kuronga nhoroondo yezvinhu zvakavimbika zvizere pakati pedu,
Luke 1:2 sezvavakapa kwatiri ivo kubva pakutanga vakazvionera, uye vari varanda veshoko,
Luke 1:3 zvakaonekwa zvakanaka kwandiriwo, ndanyatsoongorora zvinhu zvese kubva pakutanga, kuti ndikunyorerei nekutevedzanisa, imwi Teofiro changamire,
Luke 1:4 kuti muzive chokwadi chezvinhu zvamakadzidziswa. <div eID="gen568" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen567" type="section"/>
Luke 1:5 Kwaivapo nemazuva aHerodhe mambo weJudhiya umwe mupristi wainzi Zakaria, weboka raAbhiya; nemukadzi wake waibva kuvanasikana vaAroni, nezita rake riri Erizabheti.
Luke 1:6 Uye vari vaviri vakange vakarurama pamberi paMwari, vachifamba nemirairo yese nezviga zvaIshe, vasina chavangapomerwa.
Luke 1:7 Uye vakange vasina mwana, nokuti Erizabheti wakange ari mhanje, uye vakange vaenda pamakore vari vaviri. <div eID="gen570" type="x-p"/>
Luke 1:8 Zvino zvakaitika kuti wakati achiita ushumiri hweupristi pamberi paMwari, pachidanho cheboka rake,
Luke 1:9 maererano netsika yeushumiri hweupristi, wakabatwa nemujenya kuti apise zvipfungaidzo zvinonhuhwira apinda mutembere yaIshe.
Luke 1:10 Zvino chaunga chese chevanhu chakange chichinyengetera kunze nenguva yezvipfungaidzo zvinonhuhwira.
Luke 1:11 Zvino kwakaonekwa kwaari mutumwa waIshe, amire kurutivi rwerudyi rwearitari yezvipfungaidzo zvinonhuhwira.
Luke 1:12 Zvino Zakaria wakati achi<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>ona akanetseka, kutya kukamuwira.
Luke 1:13 Asi mutumwa wakati kwaari: Usatya Zakaria; nokuti munyengetero wako wanzwikwa, nemukadzi wako Erizabheti achakuberekera mwanakomana, ugotumidza zita rake Johwani.
Luke 1:14 Uye uchava nemufaro nekupembera, nevazhinji vachafarira kuberekwa kwake.
Luke 1:15 Nokuti achava mukuru pamberi paIshe, haangatongonwi waini kana zvinodhaka; uye achazadzwa neMweya Mutsvene kunyange kubva padumbu ramai vake.
Luke 1:16 Nevazhinji vevana vaIsraeri achatendeusira kuna Ishe Mwari wavo;
Luke 1:17 uye iye achafamba pamberi pake mumweya nesimba raEria, kutendeusira moyo yemadzibaba kuvana, nevasingateereri kuuchenjeri hwevakarurama, kugadzirira Ishe vanhu vakagadzirwa.
Luke 1:18 Zakaria akati kumutumwa: Izvozvi ndichazviziva nei? Nokuti ini ndava mukweguru, nemukadzi wangu waenda pamazuva ake.
Luke 1:19 Mutumwa achipindura akati kwaari: Ini ndini Gabhirieri, anomira pamberi paMwari; ndatumwa kuti nditaure kwauri, ndikuparidzire mashoko awa akanaka.
Luke 1:20 Zvino tarira, uchava chimumumu, usingagoni kutaura, kusvikira zuva rinoitika zvinhu izvi, nokuti hauna kutenda mashoko angu, achazadziswa nenguva yawo. <div eID="gen571" type="x-p"/>
Luke 1:21 Vanhu vakange vakamirira Zakaria, vakashamisika nekunonoka kwake mutembere.
Luke 1:22 Zvino wakati abuda, akakonewa kutaura kwavari; vakaziva kuti akange aona chiratidzo mutembere; iye akavaninira nemaoko, akaramba ari chimumumu.
Luke 1:23 Zvino zvakaitika kuti mazuva okushumira kwake akati achangopera, akaenda kumba kwake. <div eID="gen572" type="x-p"/>
Luke 1:24 Zvino shure kwemazuva iwayo, mukadzi wake Erizabheti akatora mimba, akazvivanza mwedzi mishanu, achiti:
Luke 1:25 Ishe wandiitira saizvozvi nemazuva aaka<transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>tarira, kuti abvise ruzvidzo rwangu pakati pevanhu. <div eID="gen573" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen569" type="section"/>
Luke 1:26 Zvino nemwedzi wechitanhatu mutumwa Gabhirieri wakatumwa naMwari kuguta reGarirea rinonzi Nazareta,
Luke 1:27 kumhandara, yakange yatsidza kuwanikwa nemurume zita rake raiva Josefa, weimba yaDhavhidhi; uye zita remhandara riri Maria.
Luke 1:28 Mutumwa akapinda kwaari akati: Hekanhi, iwe une nyasha! Ishe anewe, wakaropafadzwa iwe pakati pevakadzi.
Luke 1:29 Iye wakati achi<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>ona akanetseka neshoko rake, akafunganya <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> uku kukwazisa rudzii kwakadai.
Luke 1:30 Zvino mutumwa akati kwaari: Usatya Maria; nokuti wawana nyasha kuna Mwari.
Luke 1:31 Zvino tarira, uchava nemimba, ugozvara mwanakomana, uchatumidza zita rake <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> Jesu.
Luke 1:32 Iye achava mukuru, achanzi Mwanakomana weWekumusoro-soro; Ishe Mwari achapa kwaari chigaro cheushe chababa vake Dhavhidhi.
Luke 1:33 Achatonga pamusoro peimba yaJakobho kusvikira narinhi, neushe hwake hahungavi nemugumo.
Luke 1:34 Maria ndokuti kumutumwa: Izvi zvingava sei, nokuti handizivi murume?
Luke 1:35 Mutumwa akapindura akati kwaari: Mweya Mutsvene uchauya pamusoro pako, nesimba reWekumusoro-soro richakudzikatira; naizvozvo icho chitsvene chichaberekwa newe chichanzi Mwanakomana waMwari.
Luke 1:36 Uye tarira, Erizabheti hama yako, iyewo wava nemimba yemwanakomana pakuchembera kwake; nemwedzi uno wava wechitanhatu kuna iye wainzi mhanje.
Luke 1:37 Nokuti naMwari hakuna chinhu chisingazogoneki.
Luke 1:38 Maria ndokuti: Tarirai, murandakadzi waIshe; ngazvive kwandiri seshoko renyu. Mutumwa ndokubva kwaari. <div eID="gen575" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen574" type="section"/>
Luke 1:39 Zvino Maria akasimuka nemazuva iwayo akaenda kunyika yezvikomo nekukurumidza, kuguta raJudha;
Luke 1:40 akapinda mumba maZakaria, akakwazisa Erizabheti.
Luke 1:41 Zvino zvakaitika kuti Erizabheti wakati achinzwa kukwazisa kwaMaria, mwana akatamba mudumbu rake; naErizabheti akazadzwa neMweya Mutsvene,
Luke 1:42 akadanidzira nenzwi guru, akati: Wakaropafadzwa iwe pakati pevakadzi, uye chakaropafadzwa chibereko chedumbu rako!
Luke 1:43 Ko zvandibvira nepi, kuti mai vaIshe wangu vauye kwandiri?
Luke 1:44 Nokuti tarira, inzwi rekukwazisa kwako rangoti richisvika munzeve dzangu, mwana watamba mudumbu rangu nemufaro.
Luke 1:45 Uye wakaropafadzwa anotenda, nokuti zvakataurwa naIshe kwaari zvichazadziswa. <div eID="gen577" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen576" type="section"/>
Luke 1:46 Maria akati: Moyo wangu unokudza Ishe,
Luke 1:47 nemweya wangu unofara muna Mwari Muponesi wangu;
Luke 1:48 nokuti wakatarira kuninipiswa kwemurandakadzi wake; nokuti tarira, kubva zvino mazera ese achati ndakaropafadzwa.
Luke 1:49 Nokuti ane masimba wakandiitira zvinhu zvikuru; nezita rake idzvene.
Luke 1:50 Netsitsi dzake dziri kuna avo vanomutya kubva kumazera kusvika kumazera.
Luke 1:51 Wakaita zvine simba neruoko rwake; wakaparadzira vanozvikudza mundangariro dzemoyo yavo.
Luke 1:52 Wakaburusa vane masimba pazvigaro zvoushe, akasimudza vakaderera.
Luke 1:53 Vane nzara wakavagutsa nezvinhu zvakanaka, asi vafumi wakavaendesa vasina chinhu.
Luke 1:54 Wakabatsira Israeri muranda wake kuti arangarire tsitsi,
Luke 1:55 sezvaakataura kumadzibaba edu, kuna Abhurahama nekumbeu yake kusvikira rinhi narinhi.
Luke 1:56 Maria akagara naye mwedzi inenge mitatu, akadzokera kumba kwake. <div eID="gen579" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen578" type="section"/>
Luke 1:57 Zvino nguva yaErizabheti yekusununguka kwake yakazara; akabereka mwanakomana.
Luke 1:58 Zvino vavakidzani nehama dzake vakati vanzwa kuti Ishe wakange amuitira tsitsi dzake huru, vakafara naye.
Luke 1:59 Zvino zvakaitika kuti nezuva rerusere vakauya kuzodzingisa mucheche, vakamutumidza maererano nezita rababa vake Zakaria.
Luke 1:60 Asi mai vake vakapindura vakati: Kwete, asi achanzi Johwani.
Luke 1:61 Vakati kwaari: Hakuna munhu kuhama dzako anodaidzwa nezita iri.
Luke 1:62 Vakataura nemaoko kuna baba vake, kuti vanoda kuti anzi ani.
Luke 1:63 Vakakumbira chinyorero, vakanyora vachiti: NdiJohwani zita rake; vakashamisika vese.
Luke 1:64 Muromo wake ukazarurwa pakarepo, nerurimi rwake <transChange type="added">rukasununguka</transChange>, akataura, achirumbidza Mwari.
Luke 1:65 Kutya kukawira vese vaigara vakavakomba; nemashoko awa ese akataurwa kunyika yese yezvikomo yeJudhiya.
Luke 1:66 Zvino vese vakanzwa, vaka<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>isa mumoyo mavo, vachiti: Mucheche uyu achazova ani? Uye ruoko rwaIshe rwakava naye. <div eID="gen581" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen580" type="section"/>
Luke 1:67 Zvino Zakaria baba vake vakazadzwa neMweya Mutsvene, vakaporofita, vachiti:
Luke 1:68 Ngaarumbidzwe Ishe Mwari waIsraeri, nokuti wakashanyira nekuita rudzikunuro kuvanhu vake;
Luke 1:69 akatisimudzira runyanga rweruponeso mumba maDhavhidhi muranda wake;
Luke 1:70 sezvaakataura nemuromo wevaporofita vake vatsvene, vakange varipo kubva pasichigare;
Luke 1:71 ruponeso pamhandu dzedu, neparuoko rwavese vanotivenga;
Luke 1:72 kuitira madzibaba edu tsitsi, nekurangarira sungano yake tsvene,
Luke 1:73 mhiko yaakapika kuna Abhurahama baba vedu;
Luke 1:74 kutipa, kuti tasunungurwa muruoko rwevavengi vedu, timushumire tisingatyi;
Luke 1:75 muutsvene nekururama pamberi pake mazuva ese eupenyu hwedu.
Luke 1:76 Newe mucheche, uchanzi muporofita weWekumusoro-soro, nokuti uchatungamira pamberi pechiso chaIshe, kugadzirira nzira dzake;
Luke 1:77 kupa ruzivo rweruponeso kuvanhu vake mukanganwiro yezvivi zvavo;
Luke 1:78 netsitsi dzemoyo dzaMwari wedu, mauri mambakwedza anobva kumusoro anotishanyira;
Luke 1:79 kuvhenekera vagere murima nemumvuri worufu, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>kururamisa tsoka dzedu munzira yerugare. <div eID="gen583" type="x-p"/>
Luke 1:80 Mucheche akakura, akasimba mumweya, akava mumarenje, kusvikira zuva rekuratidzwa kwake kuna Israeri. <chapter eID="Luke.1"/><div eID="gen584" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen582" type="section"/>
Luke 2:0 <div sID="gen585" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="Luke.2" sID="Luke.2"/>  <div sID="gen586" type="x-p"/>
Luke 2:1 Zvino zvakaitika nemazuva iwayo, chisungo chakabuda kubva kuna Kesari Agasto, kuti nyika yese inyorwe.
Luke 2:2 Kunyorwa uku kwaiva kwekutanga kwakaitwa Kuriniosi ari mutungamiriri weSiriya.
Luke 2:3 Vese ndokuenda kunonyorwa, umwe neumwe kuguta rekwake.
Luke 2:4 NaJosefawo akakwira achibva Garirea muguta Nazareta, akaenda Judhiya kuguta raDhavhidhi, rinonzi Bhetirehemu, nokuti waiva weimba nedzinza raDhavhidhi,
Luke 2:5 ku<transChange type="added">no</transChange>nyorwa naMaria mukadzi wakange atsidzira kuwanikwa naye, ava nemimba.
Luke 2:6 Zvakaitika kuti vachipo, mazuva ekusununguka kwake akazadzisika;
Luke 2:7 ndokuzvara mwanakomana wake wedangwe, akamuputira nemicheka, akamuvanzarika muchidyiro, nokuti makange musina nzvimbo yavo muimba yevaeni. <div eID="gen586" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen585" type="section"/>
Luke 2:8 Zvino kwakange kune vafudzi munyika iyoyo vaigara kuuragu vachichengetedza nguva dzekurinda boka ravo usiku.
Luke 2:9 Zvino tarira, mutumwa waIshe akamira pedo navo, nekubwinya kwaIshe kukapenya kwakavakomba; vakatya nekutya kukuru.
Luke 2:10 Zvino mutumwa akati kwavari: Musatya; nokuti tarirai, ndinokuparidzirai mashoko akanaka emufaro mukuru, uchava kuvanhu vese;
Luke 2:11 nokuti mazvarirwa nhasi Muponesi, anova Kristu Ishe, muguta raDhavhidhi.
Luke 2:12 Zvino ichi chiratidzo kwamuri: Muchawana mucheche akaputirwa nemicheka, arere muchidyiro.
Luke 2:13 Uye pakarepo kukavapo pamwe nemutumwa chaunga chehondo yekudenga vachirumbidza Mwari, vachiti:
Luke 2:14 Rumbidzo kuna Mwari kumusoro-soro, nerugare panyika; chishuwo chakanaka kuvanhu. <div eID="gen588" type="x-p"/>
Luke 2:15 Zvino kwakaitika kuti vatumwa vabva kwavari vaenda kudenga, vanhu vafudzi vakataurirana, <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Ngatiende ikozvino Bhetirehemu, tinoona chinhu ichi chakaitika, Ishe chaatizivisa.
Luke 2:16 Zvino vakakurumidza kusvika, vakawana vese Maria naJosefa, nemucheche arere muchidyiro.
Luke 2:17 Vakati vaona, vakazivisa kwese shoko ravakange vaudzwa maererano nemucheche uyu.
Luke 2:18 Zvino vese vakanzwa vakashamisika nezvinhu zvakange zvataurwa kwavari nevafudzi.
Luke 2:19 Asi Maria wakachengeta zvinhu izvi zvese, achifungisisa mumoyo make.
Luke 2:20 Zvino vafudzi vakadzokera, vachikudza nekurumbidza Mwari pamusoro pezvinhu zvese zvavakange vanzwa nekuona, sezvakange zvataurwa kwavari. <div eID="gen589" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen587" type="section"/>
Luke 2:21 Mazuva masere akati apera kuti mucheche adzingiswe, zita rake ndokunzi Jesu, raakange atumidzwa nemutumwa asati agamuchirwa mudumbu. <div eID="gen591" type="x-p"/>
Luke 2:22 Zvino mazuva ekunatswa kwake nemurairo waMozisi akati apera, vakauya naye kuJerusarema, kuti va<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>kumikidze kuna Ishe,
Luke 2:23 (sezvazvakanyorwa pamurairo waIshe kuti: Chirume chese chinozarura chizvaro, chichanzi chitsvene kuna Ishe),
Luke 2:24 uye vabaire chibairo sezvazvakarehwa pamurairo waIshe, njiva mbiri, kana vana vaviri vehangaiwa. <div eID="gen592" type="x-p"/>
Luke 2:25 Zvino tarira, kwakange kune munhu muJerusarema, zita rake raiva Simioni, ndiyewo munhu waiva akarurama akazvipira kushumira Mwari, akamirira kunyaradzwa kwaIsraeri, neMweya Mutsvene wakange uri pamusoro pake.
Luke 2:26 Zvino zvakange zvaratidzwa kwaari neMweya Mutsvene, kuti haangaoni rufu asati aona Kristu waIshe.
Luke 2:27 Wakapinda mutembere neMweya; zvino vabereki vakati vachiuisa mucheche Jesu mukati, kuti vaite pamusoro pake netsika yemurairo,
Luke 2:28 iye akamutora mumaoko ake, akarumbidza Mwari, achiti:
Luke 2:29 Tenzi, ikozvino regai muranda wenyu aende nerugare, seshoko renyu;
Luke 2:30 nokuti meso angu aona ruponeso rwenyu,
Luke 2:31 rwamakagadzirira pamberi pezviso zvevanhu vese;
Luke 2:32 chiedza chekuzarurira vahedheni, nekubwinya kwerudzi rwenyu Israeri.
Luke 2:33 Josefa namai vake vakashamisika nezvinhu zvakarehwa pamusoro pake.
Luke 2:34 Zvino Simioni akavaropafadza, akati kuna Maria mai vake: Tarira, uyu wakaisirwa kuwa nekumuka kwevazhinji muna Israeri, nekuva chiratidzo chichapikiswa;
Luke 2:35 uye newe, munondo uchagura nemumweya wako pachako; kuti ndangariro dzemoyo mizhinji dzifukurwe. <div eID="gen593" type="x-p"/>
Luke 2:36 Zvino kwakange kuna Ana muporofitakadzi, mukunda waFanueri, wedzinza raAsheri; wakange akwegura kwazvo, wakararama nemurume makore manomwe kubvira paumhandara hwake.
Luke 2:37 Uye ari chirikadzi yemakore angava makumi masere nemana, wakange asingabvi mutembere, achishumira nemitsanyo neminyengetero usiku nemasikati.
Luke 2:38 Naiye wakati achisvika nenguva iyoyo akatenda Mwari, akataura pamusoro pake kuna vese vakange vachitarisira kusunungurwa muJerusarema. <div eID="gen594" type="x-p"/>
Luke 2:39 Zvino vakati vapedza zvinhu zvese zvaienderana nemurairo waIshe, vakadzokera Garirea kuguta ravo Nazareta.
Luke 2:40 Mucheche akakura, akasimba mumweya, akazara nenjere; nenyasha dzaMwari dzakange dziri pamusoro pake. <div eID="gen595" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen590" type="section"/>
Luke 2:41 Zvino vabereki vake vaienda kuJerusarema makore ese pamutambo wepasika.
Luke 2:42 Zvino wakati ava nemakore gumi nemaviri, vakakwira kuJerusarema zvichienderana netsika yemutambo,
Luke 2:43 vakati vapedza mazuva, pakudzoka kwavo, mwana Jesu akasara kuJerusarema, asi Josefa namai vake vasingazvizivi,
Luke 2:44 asi vaimufungira kuva mune vamwe vevakange vachifamba navo, vakafamba mufambo wezuva, vakazomutsvaka pakati pehama nekuvazikanwi.
Luke 2:45 Asi vakati vasingamuwani, vakadzokera kuJerusarema vachimutsvaka.
Luke 2:46 Zvino zvakaitika shure kwemazuva matatu, vakamuwana mutembere, agere pakati pevadzidzisi, achivateerera, achivabvunza.
Luke 2:47 Vese vakange vachimunzwa vakashamiswa nekunzwisisa nemhinduro dzake.
Luke 2:48 Zvino vakati vamuona vakakatyamara; mai vake vakati kwaari: Mwana, waitirei zvakadai kwatiri? Tarira, baba vako neni tanga tichikutsvaka tichirwadziwa.
Luke 2:49 Akati kwavari: Mainditsvakirei? Manga musingazivi kuti ndinofanira kuva pazvinhu zvaBaba vangu here?
Luke 2:50 Asi ivo havana kunzwisisa shoko raakataura kwavari.
Luke 2:51 Zvino akaburuka navo, akasvika Nazareta; akazviisa pasi pavo. Asi mai vake vakachengeta mashoko awa ese mumoyo mavo.
Luke 2:52 Jesu akawedzera panjere nekukura, nepakudiwa naMwari nevanhu. <chapter eID="Luke.2"/><div eID="gen597" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen596" type="section"/>
Luke 3:0 <div sID="gen598" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="Luke.3" sID="Luke.3"/>  <div sID="gen599" type="x-p"/>
Luke 3:1 Zvino negore regumi nemashanu rekutonga kwaTibherio Kesari, Pondiyo Pirato ari mutungamiriri weJudhiya, Herodhe ari umwe wevatongi vana weGarirea, Firipi munin'ina wake ari umwe wevatongi vana weIturea nedunhu reTrakoniti, Risanio ari umwe wevatongi vana weAbhirene,
Luke 3:2 Anasi naKayafasi vari vapristi vakuru, shoko raMwari rakasvika kuna Johwani mwanakomana waZakaria murenje.
Luke 3:3 Akasvika munyika yese yakapoteredza yaJoridhani, achiparidza rubhabhatidzo rwekutendeuka kuve kukanganwirwa kwezvivi;
Luke 3:4 sezvazvakanyorwa mubhuku remashoko aIsaya muporofita zvichinzi: Inzwi reanodana murenje <transChange type="added">richiti</transChange>: Gadzirai nzira yaIshe; ruramisai migwagwa yake.
Luke 3:5 Mupata wese uchafusirwa, negomo rega-rega nechikomo zvichaderedzwa; zvakakombama zvicharuramiswa, uye makwiringwindi ave nzira dzakaenzana;
Luke 3:6 uye nyama yese ichaona ruponeso rwaMwari. <div eID="gen599" type="x-p"/>
Luke 3:7 Naizvozvo wakati kuzvaunga zvaibudira kuzobhabhatidzwa naye: Imwi zvizvarwa zvenyoka, ndiani wakakutaridzirai kutiza hasha dzinouya?
Luke 3:8 Naizvozvo berekai zvibereko zvakafanira kutendeuka; uye musatanga kuti mukati menyu: Tina Abhurahama anova baba; nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Mwari anogona kubva pamabwe awa kumutsira Abhurahama vana.
Luke 3:9 Ikozvino sanhuwo ratoiswa pamudzi wemiti; naizvozvo muti umwe neumwe usingabereki chibereko chakanaka unotemerwa pasi, ugokandirwa mumoto. <div eID="gen600" type="x-p"/>
Luke 3:10 Zvaunga zvikamubvunza, zvichiti: Zvino tichaitei?
Luke 3:11 Akapindura akati kwavari: Ane nguvo refu mbiri, ngaagovane neasina; neane kudya ngaaite saizvozvo.
Luke 3:12 Zvino kwakauyawo vateresi kuzobhabhatidzwa, vakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, tichaitei?
Luke 3:13 Akati kwavari: Musateresa kupfuura pamakatemerwa napo.
Luke 3:14 Nemautowo akamubvunza, achiti: Ko isu tichaitei? Akati kwaari: Musatyityidzira munhu kana kupomera nhema; uye mugutsikane nemibairo yenyu. <div eID="gen601" type="x-p"/>
Luke 3:15 Zvino vanhu vakati vachatarisira, vese vachirangarira mumoyo mavo pamusoro paJohwani, kuti zvimwe iye angava Kristu,
Luke 3:16 Johwani akapindura kune vese achiti: Ini zvirokwazvo ndinokubhabhatidzai nemvura; asi ane simba kupfuura ini anouya, wandisina kufanira kusunungura rukanda rweshangu dzake; iye achakubhabhatidzai neMweya Mutsvene nemoto;
Luke 3:17 werusero rwake rwuri muruoko rwake; achachenesa kwazvo buriro rake; uye achaunganidza zviyo mudura rake, asi hundi achaipisa nemoto usingadzimiki. <div eID="gen602" type="x-p"/>
Luke 3:18 Naizvozvo achikurudzira nezvimwe zvinhu zvizhinji, akaparidzira vanhu evhangeri.
Luke 3:19 Asi Herodhe umwe wevatongi vana, wakati atsiurwa naye pamusoro paHerodhiasi, mukadzi waFiripi munin'ina wake, nezvakaipa zvese Herodhe zvaakange aita,
Luke 3:20 wakawedzerazve ichi pamusoro pazvo zvese, kuti wakapfigira Johwani mutirongo. <div eID="gen603" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen598" type="section"/>
Luke 3:21 Zvino zvakaitika kuti vanhu vese vabhabhatidzwa, Jesuwo abhabhatidzwa, achinyengetera, denga rakazarurwa.
Luke 3:22 Mweya Mutsvene ndokuburukira pamusoro pake nechimiro chemuviri sewenjiva, inzwi ndokubva kudenga, richiti: Iwe uri Mwanakomana wangu anodikanwa, ndinofara mauri kwazvo. <div eID="gen605" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen604" type="section"/>
Luke 3:23 Zvino iye Jesu wakange achitanga kuva <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>makore anenge makumi matatu, ari (sezvaifungidzirwa) mwanakomana waJosefa, waHeri,
Luke 3:24 waMatati, waRevhi, waMeriki, waJanai, waJosefa,
Luke 3:25 waMatatiasi, waAmosi, waNaumi, waEsiri, waNagai,
Luke 3:26 waMaati, waMatatiasi, waSimeyi, waJosefa, waJudha,
Luke 3:27 waJohwana, waResa, waZerubhabheri, waSaratieri, waNeri,
Luke 3:28 waMeriki, waAdhi, waKosamu, waErimodhamu, waEri,
Luke 3:29 waJose, waEriezeri, waJorimu, waMatati, waRevhi,
Luke 3:30 waSimioni, waJudha, waJosefa, waJonanu, waEriakimu,
Luke 3:31 waMerea, waMenani, waMatata, waNatani, waDhavhidhi,
Luke 3:32 waJese, waObhedhi, waBhowazi, waSarimoni, waNaashoni,
Luke 3:33 waAminadhabhi, waAramu, waEsiromi, waFaresi, waJudha,
Luke 3:34 waJakobho, waIsaka, waAbhurahama, waTera, waNahori,
Luke 3:35 waSerugi, waRagau, waFareki, waEberi, waSara,
Luke 3:36 waKainani, waArifakisadhi, waSemu, waNowa, waRameki,
Luke 3:37 waMatusara, waEnoki, waJaredhi, waMarereeri, waKainani,
Luke 3:38 waEnosi, waSeti, waAdhamu, waMwari. <chapter eID="Luke.3"/><div eID="gen607" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen606" type="section"/>
Luke 4:0 <div sID="gen608" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="Luke.4" sID="Luke.4"/>  <div sID="gen609" type="x-p"/>
Luke 4:1 Zvino Jesu azere neMweya Mutsvene wakadzoka achibva paJoridhani, akatungamirirwa neMweya kurenje,
Luke 4:2 achiidzwa nadhiabhorosi mazuva makumi mana. Uye wakange asingadyi chinhu nemazuva iwayo; zvino akati apera pakupedzisira akazonzwa nzara.
Luke 4:3 Zvino dhiabhorosi akati kwaari: Kana uri Mwanakomana waMwari, udza ibwe iri kuti rive chingwa.
Luke 4:4 Jesu akamupindura, achiti: Kwakanyorwa kuti: Munhu haangararami nechingwa chete, asi neshoko rimwe nerimwe raMwari. <div eID="gen609" type="x-p"/>
Luke 4:5 Dhiabhorosi ndokumutungamidza pagomo refu, akamuratidza ushe hwese hwenyika nenguva diki-diki.
Luke 4:6 Dhiabhorosi ndokuti kwaari: Simba iri rese ndichakupa nekukudzwa kwahwo, nokuti ndakaripiwa ini, uye ndinoripa ani nani wandinoda.
Luke 4:7 Naizvozvo iwe kana uka<transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>namata pamberi pangu, zvese zvichava zvako.
Luke 4:8 Jesu akapindura akati kwaari: Ibva shure kwangu, Satani; nokuti kwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Uchanamata Ishe, Mwari wako, uye umushumire iye ega. <div eID="gen610" type="x-p"/>
Luke 4:9 Akamutungamirira kuJerusarema, akamuisa pachiruvu chetembere, akati kwaari: Kana uri Mwanakomana waMwari, zviwisire pasi uchibva pano;
Luke 4:10 nokuti kwakanyorwa kuchinzi: Acharaira vatumwa vake pamusoro pako, kuti vakuchengete;
Luke 4:11 uye: Pamaoko vachakugamha, zvimwe ungagumbusa rutsoka rwako pabwe.
Luke 4:12 Jesu achipindura, akati kwaari: Kwakanzi: Usaidza Ishe Mwari wako. <div eID="gen611" type="x-p"/>
Luke 4:13 Dhiabhorosi akati apedza muedzo wese, akabva kwaari kusvikira pane <transChange type="added">imwe</transChange> nguva. <div eID="gen612" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen608" type="section"/>
Luke 4:14 Zvino Jesu wakadzokera kuGarirea nesimba reMweya; mukurumbira maererano naye ukabudira kudunhu rese rakapoteredza.
Luke 4:15 Iye ndokudzidzisa mumasinagoge avo, achikudzwa nevese. <div eID="gen614" type="x-p"/>
Luke 4:16 Akasvika paNazareta, paakange arerwa; netsika yake wakapinda musinagoge nemusi wesabata, akasimuka kuti averenge.
Luke 4:17 Akapiwa rugwaro rwemuporofita Isaya. Zvino wakati azarura rugwaro, akawana nzvimbo pakange pakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>:
Luke 4:18 Mweya waIshe uri pamusoro pangu, naizvozvo wakandizodza, kuti ndiparidzire evhangeri kuvarombo; wakandituma kuti ndiporese vakaputsika pamoyo, kuparidza kusunungurwa kuna vakatapwa, nekuona kumapofu, ndisunungure vakatsikirirwa,
Luke 4:19 kudanidzira gore rakanaka raIshe.
Luke 4:20 Akapeta rugwaro, akadzosera kumuranda, akagara pasi; meso avese vaiva musinagoge akamutarisisa.
Luke 4:21 Zvino akatanga kuti kwavari: Nhasi rugwaro urwu rwazadziswa munzeve dzenyu. <div eID="gen615" type="x-p"/>
Luke 4:22 Vese vakamupupurira, vakashamisika nemashoko enyasha akabuda mumuromo make, vakati: Uyu haasi mwanakomana waJosefa here?
Luke 4:23 Akati kwavari: Zvirokwazvo muchataura kwandiri dimikira iri: Murapi, zvirape iwe; zvese zvatakanzwa zvakaitwa paKapenaume, zviitewo muno munyika yekwako.
Luke 4:24 Iye ndokuti: Zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Hakuna muporofita anogamuchirwa munyika yekwake.
Luke 4:25 Asi chokwadi ndinoti kwamuri: Chirikadzi zhinji dzaivako kuna Israeri pamazuva aEria, apo denga rakavharwa kwemakore matatu nemwedzi mitanhatu, zvekuti kwakava nenzara huru panyika yese;
Luke 4:26 asi Eria haana kutumwa kune umwe wavo, kunze kwekuSarepita yeSidhoni, kumukadzi chirikadzi.
Luke 4:27 Uye vane maperembudzi vazhinji vaivako kuna Israeri panguva yemuporofita Erisha; asi hakuna umwe wavo wakanatswa, kunze kwaNaamani muSiriya.
Luke 4:28 Ipapo vese vakange vari musinagoge vakazara nehasha, vachinzwa zvinhu izvi.
Luke 4:29 Ndokusimuka, vakamusundidzira kunze kweguta, vakauya naye kusvika pamawere pegomo, pakange pakavakwa guta ravo, kuti vamuposhere pasi.
Luke 4:30 Asi iye wakapfuura nepakati pavo akaenda. <div eID="gen616" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen613" type="section"/>
Luke 4:31 Wakabva aburukira Kapenaume, guta reGarirea; uye aivadzidzisa nemasabata.
Luke 4:32 Vakashamisika nedzidziso yake, nokuti shoko rake rakange rine simba. <div eID="gen618" type="x-p"/>
Luke 4:33 Zvino musinagoge makange mune munhu aiva ane mweya wedhimoni retsvina; ukadanidzira nenzwi guru,
Luke 4:34 ukati: Regai! Tinei nemwi Jesu muNazareta? Mauya kuzotiparadza here? Ndinokuzivai kuti ndimwi ani: Mutsvene waMwari.
Luke 4:35 Zvino Jesu akautsiura, achiti: Nyarara, ubude kwaari! Dhimoni rakati ramuwisira pakati, rikabuda kwaari, risina kumukuvadza.
Luke 4:36 Kushamisika kukavasvikira vese, vakataurirana pachavo, vachiti: Ishoko ripi iri? Nokuti nesimba nechikuriri anoraira mweya yetsvina, ikabuda.
Luke 4:37 Mukurumbira maererano naye ukabuda kunzvimbo dzese dzedunhu rakapoteredza. <div eID="gen619" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen617" type="section"/>
Luke 4:38 Zvino wakasimuka akabuda musinagoge, akapinda mumba maSimoni; zvino mai vemukadzi waSimoni vakange vakabatwa nefivhiri huru; vakamukumbirira kwaari.
Luke 4:39 Zvino akakotamira pamusoro pavo, akatsiura fivhiri, ikavarega; uye pakarepo vakasimuka vakavashandira. <div eID="gen621" type="x-p"/>
Luke 4:40 Zvino zuva rakati rovira, vese vaiva nevarwere vezvirwere zvakasiyana-siyana vakavauisa kwaari; akaisa maoko pamusoro peumwe neumwe wavo akavaporesa.
Luke 4:41 Nemadhimoni akabuda kuvazhinji, achidanidzira achiti: Imwi muri Kristu Mwanakomana waMwari. Aka<transChange type="added">a</transChange>tsiura akasaatendera kutaura, nokuti akange achiziva kuti ndiKristu. <div eID="gen622" type="x-p"/>
Luke 4:42 Zvino kwakati kwaedza, akabuda, akaenda kunzvimbo yerenje, zvaunga zvikamutsvaka, zvikauya kwaari, zvikamudzivirira kuti arege kubva kwazviri.
Luke 4:43 Asi wakati kwavari: Ndinofanira kuparidzira evhangeri yeushe hwaMwari kumamwe magutawo; nokuti ndizvo zvandakatumirwa.
Luke 4:44 Akasiparidza mumasinagoge eGarirea. <chapter eID="Luke.4"/><div eID="gen623" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen620" type="section"/>
Luke 5:0 <div sID="gen624" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="Luke.5" sID="Luke.5"/>  <div sID="gen625" type="x-p"/>
Luke 5:1 Zvino zvakaitika kuti chaunga chakati chichimumbandidzira kuti vanzwe shoko raMwari, iye akamira parutivi rwegungwa reGenesareti;
Luke 5:2 akaona zvikepe zviviri zvimire parutivi rwegungwa; asi varedzi vakange vabuda mazviri vachisuka mimbure.
Luke 5:3 Akapinda mune chimwe chezvikepe chaiva chaSimoni, akakumbira kwaari kuti abve pavhu zvishoma. Ndokubva agara pasi, akadzidzisa zvaunga ari muchikepe. <div eID="gen625" type="x-p"/>
Luke 5:4 Zvino wakati amira kutaura, akati kuna Simoni: Pinda kwakadzika udzikise mimbure yenyu kuti ubate.
Luke 5:5 Simoni akapindura, akati kwaari: Tenzi, tafondoka usiku hwese, tikasabata chinhu, asi zvamadaro, ndichadzikisa mumbure.
Luke 5:6 Vakati vaita izvozvi, vakakomba dutu rehove zhinji; mumbure wavo ukange wobvaruka.
Luke 5:7 Vakaninira vamwe vavo vakange vari mune chimwe chikepe, kuti vauye vazovabatsira; vakauya vakazadza zvikepe zviri zviviri, zvekuti zvakatanga kunyura.
Luke 5:8 Zvino Simoni Petro wakati achiona, akawira pasi pamabvi aJesu, achiti: Ibvai kwandiri, Ishe, nokuti ndiri munhu mutadzi.
Luke 5:9 Nokuti kushamisika kwakange kwamubata, nevese vakange vanaye, nekubatwa kwehove dzavakange vabata;
Luke 5:10 saizvozvowo Jakobho naJohwani, vanakomana vaZebhedhi, vaiva vadyidzani naSimoni. Jesu ndokuti kuna Simoni: Usatya, kubva zvino ucharedza vanhu.
Luke 5:11 Zvino, vakati vaisa zvikepe kunyika, vakasiya zvese vakamutevera. <div eID="gen626" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen624" type="section"/>
Luke 5:12 Zvino zvakaitika, ari kune rimwe remaguta, tarira, murume azere maperembudzi; wakati achiona Jesu akawa nechiso, ndokumugombetedza, achiti: Ishe, kana muchida, munogona kundinatsa.
Luke 5:13 Ndokubva atandavadza ruoko, akamubata, achiti: Ndinoda, chinatswa. Pakarepo maperembudzi akabva kwaari.
Luke 5:14 Iye akamuraira kuti asaudza munhu; <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Asi enda unozviratidza kumupristi, ubaire pakunatswa kwako, Mozisi sezvaakaraira, chive chapupu kwavari.
Luke 5:15 Asi shoko pamusoro pake rakanyanya kupararira; zvaunga zvikuru zvikaungana kuzonzwa, nekuporeswa naye pazvifo zvavo.
Luke 5:16 Asi iye waienda kumarenje achinonyengetera. <div eID="gen628" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen627" type="section"/>
Luke 5:17 Zvino zvakaitika nerimwe remazuva, iye paakange achidzidzisa; zvino VaFarisi nevadzidzisi vemurairo vakange vagere<transChange type="added">po</transChange>, vaibva kumisha yese yeGarirea neJudhiya neJerusarema; nesimba raIshe rakange riri<transChange type="added">po</transChange> kuvaporesa.
Luke 5:18 Uye tarira, varume vakange vakatakura munhu pahwanyanza wakange akafa mitezo; vakatsvaka kumupinza vaise pamberi pake.
Luke 5:19 Zvino, vakati vachishaiwa pavangamupinza napo nekuda kwechaunga, vakakwira padenga peimba, vakamuburusira pasi nemumapfuriro pamwe nehwanyanza <transChange type="added">hwake</transChange>, pakati pamberi paJesu.
Luke 5:20 Iye wakati aona rutendo rwavo, akati kwaari: Munhu, zvivi zvako wazvikanganwirwa.
Luke 5:21 Zvino vanyori neVaFarisi vakatanga kufunga, vachiti: Ndiani uyu anotaura kunyomba? Ndiani anogona kukanganwira zvivi, kunze kwaMwari ega?
Luke 5:22 Zvino Jesu paakaziva mifungo yavo, akapindura, akati kwavari: Munofungei mumoyo yenyu?
Luke 5:23 Chii chakareruka, kuti: Zvivi zvako wazviregererwa; kana kuti: Simuka, ufambe?
Luke 5:24 Asi kuti muzive kuti Mwanakomana wemunhu ane simba panyika rekuregerera zvivi (akati kune wakange akafa mitezo): Ndinoti kwauri: Simuka, utore hwanyanza hwako, uende kumba kwako.
Luke 5:25 Pakarepo akasimuka pamberi pavo, akatora chaakange arere pachiri, akaenda kumba kwake, achirumbidza Mwari.
Luke 5:26 Kuvhiringidzika kukabata vese, vakarumbidza Mwari, vakazadzwa nekutya, vachiti: Taona chisionekwe nhasi. <div eID="gen630" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen629" type="section"/>
Luke 5:27 Zvino shure kwezvinhu izvi wakabuda, akaona muteresi, wainzi Revhi, agere paimba yemutero, akati kwaari: Nditevere.
Luke 5:28 Ndokubva asiya zvese, akasimuka akamutevera.
Luke 5:29 Revhi ndokumuitira mabiko makuru mumba make; kukavapo chaunga chikuru chevateresi nevamwe vakange vagere navo pakudya.
Luke 5:30 Asi vanyori vavo neVaFarisi vakanyunyutira vadzidzi vake, vachiti: Nemhaka yei muchidya nekunwa nevateresi nevatadzi?
Luke 5:31 Jesu achipindura akati kwavari: Vatano havadi murapi, asi avo vanorwara.
Luke 5:32 Handina kuuya kuzodana vakarurama, asi vatadzi vauye mukutendeuka. <div eID="gen632" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen631" type="section"/>
Luke 5:33 Zvino vakati kwaari: Nemhaka yei vadzidzi vaJohwani vachitsanya kazhinji, vachiita minyengetero, uye saizvozvo veVaFarisi, asi venyu vanodya nekunwa?
Luke 5:34 Asi wakati kwavari: Munogona kutsanyisa vana veimba yemuchato muwani achiri kwavari here?
Luke 5:35 Asi mazuva achasvika, apo muwani achabviswa kwavari, ipapo vachatsanya nemazuva iwayo. <div eID="gen634" type="x-p"/>
Luke 5:36 Akataurawo mufananidzo kwavari, akati: Hakuna munhu anoisa chigamba chemucheka mutsva panguvo sharu; kana zvikasadaro naichowo chitsva chinobvarura, nechigamba che<transChange type="added">mucheka</transChange> mutsva hachipindirani nesharu.
Luke 5:37 Uye hakuna munhu anodira waini itsva muhombodo sharu; kana zvikasadaro, waini itsva ichaparusa hombodo iyo ikateuka, uye hombodo dzikaparara.
Luke 5:38 Asi waini itsva inofanira kuiswa muhombodo itsva, zvichengetedzeke zviri zviviri.
Luke 5:39 Uye hakuna munhu anoti anwa <transChange type="added">waini</transChange> sharu pakarepo akashuva itsva; nokuti anoti: Sharu iri nani.  <chapter eID="Luke.5"/><div eID="gen635" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen633" type="section"/>
Luke 6:0 <div sID="gen636" type="section"/> <chapter n="6" osisID="Luke.6" sID="Luke.6"/>  <div sID="gen637" type="x-p"/>
Luke 6:1 Zvino zvakaitika nesabata rechipiri shure kwerekutanga, achigura nemuminda yezviyo, vadzidzi vake vatanha hura, vakadya, vachi<transChange type="added">dzi</transChange>pukuta nemaoko.
Luke 6:2 Asi vamwe veVaFarisi vakati kwavari: Munoitirei zvisiri pamutemo kuita nemasabata?
Luke 6:3 Zvino Jesu achivapindura, wakati: Hamuna kuverenga izvo kunyange Dhavhidhi zvaakaita, paakange ava nenzara iye nevakange vanaye,
Luke 6:4 kuti wakapinda sei mumba maMwari, akatora akadya zvingwa zvekuratidza, akapa nevakange vanaye; izvo zvisiri pamutemo kudyiwa asi nevapristi vega?
Luke 6:5 Ndokuti kwavari: Mwanakomana wemunhu ndiIshe wesabatawo. <div eID="gen637" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen636" type="section"/>
Luke 6:6 Zvino zvakaitikawo nerimwe sabata kuti wakapinda musinagoge, akadzidzisa; zvino kwakange kune munhu ipapo uye ruoko rwake rwerudyi rwakange rwakawonyana.
Luke 6:7 Vanyori neVaFarisi vakamutarisisa, <transChange type="added">kuona</transChange> kana angaporesa nesabata, kuti vawane mhosva yavangamupomera.
Luke 6:8 Asi iye wakaziva mifungo yavo, akati kumunhu wakange ane ruoko rwakawonyana: Simuka, uende unomira pakati. Akasimuka akamira.
Luke 6:9 Zvino Jesu akati kwavari: Ndichakubvunzai <transChange type="added">chimwe</transChange> chinhu: Zviri pamutemo here nemasabata kuita zvakanaka kana kuita zvakaipa? Kuponesa upenyu kana kuparadza?
Luke 6:10 Zvino akaringa-ringa kwavari vese, akati kumunhu: Tandavadza ruoko rwako. Akaita saizvozvo. Ruoko rwake rwukaporeswa ndokugwinya serumwe.
Luke 6:11 Ivo vakazara neupengo; vakataurirana umwe neumwe, kuti vangamuitei Jesu. <div eID="gen639" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen638" type="section"/>
Luke 6:12 Zvino zvakaitika nemazuva iwayo kuti wakabuda akaenda kugomo kunonyengetera; agara usiku hwese mukunyengetera kuna Mwari.
Luke 6:13 Zvino kwakati kwaedza, akadanira vadzidzi vake kwaari; akasanangura kwavari gumi nevaviri, vaakatumidzawo <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> vaapositori;
Luke 6:14 Simoni, waakatumidzawo Petro, naAndiriya munin'ina wake, Jakobho naJohwani, Firipi naBhatoromiyo,
Luke 6:15 Matewu naTomasi, Jakobho waArifiyosi, naSimoni wainzi Ziroti;
Luke 6:16 Judhasi waJakobho, naJudhasi Isikariyoti, wakavawo mutengesi. <div eID="gen641" type="x-p"/>
Luke 6:17 Akaburuka navo, akamira panzvimbo pakaenzana, nechaunga chevadzidzi vake, nechaunga chikuru chevanhu vaibva Judhiya rese neJerusarema, nepagungwa reTire neSidhoni, vakauya kuzomunzwa, nekuporeswa pazvifo zvavo;
Luke 6:18 nevakange vachitambudziwa nemweya yetsvina, vakaporeswa.
Luke 6:19 Chaunga chese chikatsvaka kumubata; nokuti kwakabuda simba kwaari rikaporesa vese. <div eID="gen642" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen640" type="section"/>
Luke 6:20 Ndokusimudzira meso ake kuvadzidzi vake, akati: Makaropafadzwa varombo, nokuti ushe hwaMwari ndohwenyu.
Luke 6:21 Makaropafadzwa imwi mune nzara zvino, nokuti muchagutiswa. Makaropafadzwa imwi munochema ikozvino, nokuti muchaseka.
Luke 6:22 Makaropafadzwa, kana vanhu vachikuvengai, uye kana vachikusarurai, vachikunyombai, vachirasa zita renyu serakashata, nekuda kweMwanakomana wemunhu.
Luke 6:23 Farai nezuva iro, muuruke nemufaro; nokuti tarirai, mubairo wenyu mukuru kudenga; nokuti zvakaita madzibaba avo saizvozvo kuvaporofita.
Luke 6:24 Asi mune nhamo imwi vakafuma! Nokuti magamuchira nyaradzo yenyu.
Luke 6:25 Mune nhamo imwi munoguta! Nokuti muchanzwa nzara. Mune nhamo imwi munoseka zvino! Nokuti muchachema nekuwungudza.
Luke 6:26 Mune nhamo kana vanhu vese vachitaura zvakanaka pamusoro penyu! Nokuti madzibaba avo akaita saizvozvo kuvaporofita venhema.
Luke 6:27 Asi ndinoti kwamuri munonzwa: Idai mhandu dzenyu, itai zvakanaka kune vanokuvengai,
Luke 6:28 ropafadzai vanokutukai, munyengeterere vanokubatai zvakaipa.
Luke 6:29 Kune anokurova padama, umupe rimwewo; anokutorera nguvo, usarambidza neshati.
Luke 6:30 Asi upe umwe neumwe anokumbira kwauri; neanokutorera zvako, usazvirevazve.
Luke 6:31 Uye sezvamunoda kuti vanhu vaite kwamuri, imwi muvaitirewo saizvozvo.
Luke 6:32 Uye kana muchida avo vanokudai, mune kuvongwa kwakadini? Nokuti vatadziwo vanoda vanovada.
Luke 6:33 Uye kana muchiitira zvakanaka kune avo vanokuitirai zvakanaka, mune kuvongwa kwakadini? Nokuti vatadzi vanoitawo izvozvo.
Luke 6:34 Uye kana muchikweretesa vamunotarisira kugamuchira kwavari, mune kuvongwa kwakadini? Nokuti vatadzi vanokweretesawo vatadzi, kuti vagamuchirezve zvakaenzana nazvo.
Luke 6:35 Asi idai vavengi venyu, muite zvakanaka, mukweretese musingatarisirizve chinhu; zvino mubairo wenyu uchava mukuru, mugova vana veWekumusoro-soro; nokuti iye ane moyo munyoro kune vasingavongi nevakaipa.
Luke 6:36 Naizvozvo ivai netsitsi, sababa venyuwo vane tsitsi.
Luke 6:37 Musatonga, uye hamungazotongwi; musapa mhosva, uye hamungazopiwi mhosva; regererai, mugoregererwawo.
Luke 6:38 Ipai, nemwi muchapiwa; chiyero chakanaka, chakatsikirirwa, nekuzunguzirwa, chinopfachukira vachakupai pachifuva chenyu. Nokuti nechiyero ichocho chamunoyera nacho muchayerwa nacho zvekare. <div eID="gen644" type="x-p"/>
Luke 6:39 Akataura mufananidzo kwavari <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ko bofu ringatungamirira bofu here? Ko haangawiri mugomba ari maviri here?
Luke 6:40 Mudzidzi haasi pamusoro pemudzidzisi wake; asi umwe neumwe kana apedzeredzwa achava semudzidzisi wake. <div eID="gen645" type="x-p"/>
Luke 6:41 Uye unotarirei rubanzu rwuri muziso reumwe wako, asi danda riri muziso rako pachako haurinanzereri?
Luke 6:42 Kana unogona kureva sei kune umwe wako, <transChange type="added">uchiti</transChange>: Umwe wangu, rega ndibudise rubanzu rwuri muziso rako, iwe pachako usingaoni danda riri muziso rako? Iwe munyepedzeri, budisa pakutanga danda kubva muziso rako, zvino ipapo uchaona zvakanaka kubudisa rubanzu rwuri muziso reumwe wako. <div eID="gen646" type="x-p"/>
Luke 6:43 Nokuti hausi muti wakanaka unobereka chibereko chakaipa; kana muti wakaipa unobereka chibereko chakanaka.
Luke 6:44 Nokuti muti umwe neumwe unozikanwa nechibereko chawo pachawo. Nokuti paminzwa, havatanhi maonde, kana parukato kutanha mazambiringa.
Luke 6:45 Munhu wakanaka kubva pafuma yakanaka yemoyo wake anobudisa zvakanaka, nemunhu wakaipa kubva pafuma yakaipa yemoyo wake anobudisa zvakaipa; nokuti kubva pazvizere mumoyo muromo wake anotaura. <div eID="gen647" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen643" type="section"/>
Luke 6:46 Zvino munondiidzirei Ishe, Ishe, musingaiti zvinhu zvandinoreva?
Luke 6:47 Ani nani anouya kwandiri akanzwa mashoko angu akaaita, ndichakuratidzai kuti wakafanana nani;
Luke 6:48 wakafanana nemunhu wakavaka imba, akachera akadzikisa, akateya nheyo paruware; zvino mafashame akati auya, rukova rukarova zvine simba paimba iyo, rukasagona kuizunungusa; nokuti yakange yakateyiwa paruware.
Luke 6:49 Asi anonzwa asingaiti, wakafanana nemunhu wakavaka imba pavhu isina nheyo; ipo rukova rwakarova nesimba, pakarepo ikawa, kuwa kweimba iyo kukava kukuru. <chapter eID="Luke.6"/><div eID="gen649" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen648" type="section"/>
Luke 7:0 <div sID="gen650" type="section"/> <chapter n="7" osisID="Luke.7" sID="Luke.7"/>  <div sID="gen651" type="x-p"/>
Luke 7:1 Zvino wakati apedza mashoko ake ese munzeve dzevanhu, akapinda muKapenaume.
Luke 7:2 Zvino muranda weumwe mukuru wezana, waiva akakosha kwaari, wakange achirwara, achitandadza.
Luke 7:3 Zvino wakati anzwa zvaJesu, akatuma kwaari vakuru veVaJudha, achikumbira kuti auye aporese muranda wake.
Luke 7:4 Zvino ivo vakati vachisvika kuna Jesu, vakamukumbirisa zvikuru, vachiti: Wakafanira kuti mumuitire izvozvi;
Luke 7:5 nokuti anoda rudzi rwedu, uye ndiye wakativakira sinagoge.
Luke 7:6 Zvino Jesu akaenda navo. Zvino apo akange asisiri kure neimba, mukuru wezana akatuma shamwari kwaari, achiti kwaari: Ishe, musazvitambudza; nokuti handina kufanira kuti mupinde pasi pedenga reimba yangu;
Luke 7:7 naizvozvo handina kutongofunga ini pachangu ndakafanira kuuya kwamuri; asi taurai neshoko, muranda wangu achaporeswa.
Luke 7:8 Nokuti iniwo ndiri munhu wakaiswa pasi pesimba, ndine mauto pasi pangu; ndinoti kune uyu: Enda, anoenda; uye kune umwe: Uya, anouya; nekumuranda wangu: Ita ichi, achiita.
Luke 7:9 Jesu wakati anzwa zvinhu izvi, akashamisika naye, akatendeuka, akati kuchaunga chaimutevera: Ndinoti kwamuri: Handina kuwana rutendo rukuru rwakadai kunyange pakati paIsraeri.
Luke 7:10 Zvino avo vakange vatumwa vodzokera kumba vakawana muranda airwara ava mutano. <div eID="gen651" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen650" type="section"/>
Luke 7:11 Zvino zvakaitika <transChange type="added">zuva</transChange> raitevera, kuti wakaenda kuguta rainzi Naini; zvino vazhinji vevadzidzi vake nechaunga chikuru vakaenda naye.
Luke 7:12 Zvino, wakati achiswedera pasuwo reguta, zvino tarira, mushakabvu achibudiswa kunze, mwanakomana umwe wega wamai vake, uye ivo vaiva chirikadzi; nechaunga chikuru cheguta chakange chinaye.
Luke 7:13 Zvino Ishe wakati amuona, akamunzwira tsitsi, akati kwaari: Usachema.
Luke 7:14 Zvino akaswedera akabata hwanyanza; zvino vatakuri vakamira; akati: Jaya, ndinoti kwauri: Muka!
Luke 7:15 Mushakabvu akamuka ndokugara, akatanga kutaura; akamupa kuna mai vake.
Luke 7:16 Kutya ndokubata vese; vakarumbidza Mwari, vachiti: Muporofita mukuru wamuka pakati pedu; nekuti: Mwari washanyira vanhu vake.
Luke 7:17 Zvino iri shoko maererano naye rikabudira muJudhiya rese nenharaunda yese yakapoteredza. <div eID="gen653" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen652" type="section"/>
Luke 7:18 Vadzidzi vaJohwani ndokumupira zvezvinhu izvozvi zvese.
Luke 7:19 Johwani akadanira kwaari vamwe vaviri vevadzidzi vake, aka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>tuma kuna Jesu achiti: Imwi ndimwi anouya here, kana tichakataririra umwe?
Luke 7:20 Zvino varume vakati vasvika kwaari, vakati: Johwani Mubhabhatidzi watituma kwamuri achiti: Imwi ndimwi anouya here, kana titaririre umwe?
Luke 7:21 Zvino munguva iyoyo akaporesa vazhinji pazvifo neurwere, nepamweya yakaipa; nekumapofu mazhinji akapa kuona.
Luke 7:22 Zvino Jesu achipindura akati kwavari: Endai munoudza Johwani zvamakaona nezvamakanzwa; zvekuti, mapofu anoonazve, vanokamhina vanofamba, vane maperembudzi vanonatsva, matsi dzinonzwa, vakafa vanomutswa, varombo vanoparidzirwa evhangeri.
Luke 7:23 Uye wakaropafadzwa ani nani asingagumbuswi neni. <div eID="gen655" type="x-p"/>
Luke 7:24 Zvino vatumwa vaJohwani vakati vabva, wakatanga kutaura kuzvaunga pamusoro paJohwani, <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Makabudira kurenje kunoonei? Rutsanga rwunozununguswa nemhepo here?
Luke 7:25 Asi makange mabuda kunoonei? Munhu wakapfeka nguvo dzakapfava here? Tarirai, vari munguvo dzinobwinya, vachirarama zvakanaka, vari mudzimba dzemadzimambo.
Luke 7:26 Asi makange mabuda kunoonei? Muporofita here? Hongu, ndinoti kwamuri: Kunyange anopfuura zvikuru muporofita.
Luke 7:27 Uyu ndiye wakanyorwa pamusoro pake, <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Tarira, ini ndinotuma mutumwa wangu pamberi pechiso chako, achagadzira nzira yako pamberi pako. <div eID="gen656" type="x-p"/>
Luke 7:28 Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Pakati pevakaberekwa nevakadzi, hakuna muporofita mukuru kuna Johwani Mubhabhatidzi; asi mudikisa muushe hwaMwari mukuru kwaari. <div eID="gen657" type="x-p"/>
Luke 7:29 Zvino vanhu vese nevateresi vakati vachizvinzwa vakati Mwari wakarurama, zvavakange vabhabhatidzwa nerubhabhatidzo rwaJohwani.
Luke 7:30 Asi VaFarisi nenyanzvi dzemutemo vakaramba zano raMwari vachizvipikisa, vakasabhabhatidzwa naye. <div eID="gen658" type="x-p"/>
Luke 7:31 Asi Ishe akati: Zvino vanhu vezera iri ndichavafananidza nei? Vakafanana nei?
Luke 7:32 Vakafanana nevana vadiki vagere pamisika vachidanidzirana vachiti: Takakuridzirai nyere asi hamuna kutamba, takakuririrai asi hamuna kuchema.
Luke 7:33 Nokuti Johwani Mubhabhatidzi akauya asingadyi chingwa kana kunwa waini, zvino moti: Ane dhimoni;
Luke 7:34 Mwanakomana wemunhu wauya achidya, achinwa, zvino moti: Tarirai munhu wemakaro nemunwi wewaini, shamwari yevateresi nevatadzi.
Luke 7:35 Asi uchenjeri hunonzi hwakarurama nevana vahwo vese. <div eID="gen659" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen654" type="section"/>
Luke 7:36 Zvino umwe weVaFarisi wakamukumbira kuti adye naye; akapinda mumba memuFarisi, akagara pakudya.
Luke 7:37 Zvino tarira, mukadzi muguta iro, waiva mutadzi, wakati aziva kuti agere pakudya mumba memuFarisi, akauya nechinu chearibhasiteri* chechizoro.
Luke 7:38 Akamira patsoka dzake mushure <transChange type="added">make</transChange> achichema, akatanga kunyorovesa tsoka dzake nemisodzi, akapukuta nevhudzi remusoro wake, ndokutsvoda tsoka dzake ndoku<transChange type="added">dzi</transChange>zodza nechizoro.
Luke 7:39 Zvino muFarisi wakange amudana wakati achi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ona, akataura mukati make, achiti: Uyu dai aiva muporofita, angadai aiziva kuti ndiani, uye ndewakadini mukadzi anomubata, nokuti mutadzi.
Luke 7:40 Jesu ndokupindura akati kwaari: Simoni, ndine chekutaura kwauri. Iye ndokuti: Mudzidzisi, revai.
Luke 7:41 Kwakange kune vakwereti vaviri kune umwe mukweretesi; umwe wakange ane chikwereti chamadhenario* mazana mashanu, uye umwe makumi mashanu.
Luke 7:42 Vakati vasina chekuripisa, akavakanganwira vari vaviri. Naizvozvo ndeupi wavo, taura, achamuda kupfuura <transChange type="added">umwe</transChange>?
Luke 7:43 Simoni akapindura akati: Ndinofunga ndouyo waakakanganwira kupfuura <transChange type="added">umwe</transChange>. Akati kwaari: Watonga zvakarurama.
Luke 7:44 Zvino akatendeukira kumukadzi, akati kuna Simoni: Unoona mukadzi uyu here? Ndapinda mumba mako, mvura yetsoka dzangu hauna kundipa; asi uyu wanyorevesa tsoka dzangu nemisodzi, akapusika nevhudzi remusoro wake.
Luke 7:45 Hauna kunditsvoda, asi iye chinguri chandapinda, haana kumira kutsvoda tsoka dzangu.
Luke 7:46 Nemafuta musoro wangu hauna kuuzodza; asi iye wazodza tsoka dzangu nechizoro.
Luke 7:47 Naizvozvo, ndinoti kwauri: Zvivi zvake zvizhinji zvakanganwirwa, nokuti wada zvikuru; asi anokanganwirwa zvishoma, anoda zvishoma.
Luke 7:48 Zvino akati kwaari: Zvivi zvako zvakanganwirwa.
Luke 7:49 Zvino avo vakange vagere pakudya naye vakatanga kureva mukati mavo, <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Ndiani uyu anokanganwirawo zvivi?
Luke 7:50 Akati kumukadzi: Rutendo rwako rwakuponesa; enda nerugare.  <chapter eID="Luke.7"/><div eID="gen661" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen660" type="section"/>
Luke 8:0 <div sID="gen662" type="section"/> <chapter n="8" osisID="Luke.8" sID="Luke.8"/>  <div sID="gen663" type="x-p"/>
Luke 8:1 Zvino zvakaitika shure kweizvozvo, kuti iye wakagura nemuguta nemusha umwe neumwe, achidanidzira nekuparidza mashoko akanaka eushe hwaMwari; nevanegumi nevaviri vanaye,
Luke 8:2 nevamwe vakadzi vakange vaporeswa pamweya yakaipa neurwere, Maria anonzi Magidharini, maari makabuda madhimoni manomwe,
Luke 8:3 naJohwana mukadzi waKuza mutariri waHerodhe, naSusana, nevamwe vazhinji, vaimubatsira nenhumbi dzavo. <div eID="gen663" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen662" type="section"/>
Luke 8:4 Zvino chaunga chikuru chakati chaungana, uye vaibva kuguta ripi neripi vachiuya kwaari, akataura nemufananidzo <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>:
Luke 8:5 Mukushi wakabuda kunokusha mbeu yake; zvino pakukusha kwake, imwe yakawira kurutivi rwenzira, ndokutsikwa netsoka, shiri dzekudenga dzikaidya dzikaipedza.
Luke 8:6 Uye imwe ikawira paruware; zvino yakamera, ikawoma, nokuti yakashaiwa unyoro.
Luke 8:7 Neimwe ikawira pakati peminzwa, minzwa ikakura nayo, ikaivhunga.
Luke 8:8 Uye imwe yakawira muvhu rakanaka, ikamera, ikabereka zvibereko zvinezana. Wakati ataura zvinhu izvi, akadanidzira <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Ane nzeve dzekunzwa, ngaanzwe. <div eID="gen665" type="x-p"/>
Luke 8:9 Vadzidzi vake ndokumubvunza vachiti: Mufananidzo uyu ungavei?
Luke 8:10 Ndokubva ati: Kwamuri kwakapiwa kuziva zvakavanzika zveushe hwaMwari; asi kune vamwe <transChange type="added">zviri</transChange> mumifananidzo, kuti vachiona vasaona; uye vachinzwa vasanzwisisa. <div eID="gen666" type="x-p"/>
Luke 8:11 Zvino mufananidzo ndiwoyu: Mbeu ishoko raMwari.
Luke 8:12 Avo vaparutivi rwenzira ndivo vanonzwa, ipapo dhiabhorosi anouya ndokubvisa shoko pamoyo wavo, kuti varege kutenda, vaponeswe.
Luke 8:13 Nevaparuware ndevaya, vanoti kana vanzwa, vanogamuchira shoko nemufaro; asi ava havana mudzi, vanotenda kwenguva, asi nenguva yemuedzo vanowa.
Luke 8:14 Neyakawira paminzwa, ndevaya kana vanzwa, zvino vanoenda ndokuvhungwa nekufunganya nefuma nemafaro eupenyu, vakasasvitsa zvibereko.
Luke 8:15 Asi iri muvhu rakanaka, ndevaya vanoti vanzwa shoko, vano<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>chengeta mumoyo wakarurama nowakanaka, vachibereka zvibereko nekutsungirira. <div eID="gen667" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen664" type="section"/>
Luke 8:16 Hakuna munhu anoti kana atungidza mwenje, anoufukidzira nemudziyo, kana kuisa pasi pemubhedha; asi anouisa pachigadziko chemwenje, kuti avo vanopinda vaone chiedza.
Luke 8:17 Nokuti hakuna chakavanzika, chisingazovi pachena, kana chakavigwa, chisingazozikanwi nekubuda pachena. <div eID="gen669" type="x-p"/>
Luke 8:18 Naizvozvo chenjerai, kuti munonzwa sei; nokuti ani nani anazvo, achapiwa; asi ani nani asina, achatorerwa kunyange icho chaanofunga kuti anacho. <div eID="gen670" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen668" type="section"/>
Luke 8:19 Zvino kwakauya kwaari mai nevanin'ina vake, vakasagona kusvika kwaari nekuda kwechaunga.
Luke 8:20 Akaudzwa <transChange type="added">nevamwe</transChange> vakati: Mai venyu nevanin'ina venyu vamire panze, vanoda kukuonai.
Luke 8:21 Asi wakapindura akati kwavari: Mai vangu nevanin'ina vangu ndeava vanonzwa shoko raMwari vachiriita. <div eID="gen672" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen671" type="section"/>
Luke 8:22 Zvino zvakaitika nerimwe remazuva kuti wakapinda muchikepe iye nevadzidzi vake, akati kwavari: Ngatiyambukire kune rumwe rutivi rwegungwa; vakasimuka nechikepe.
Luke 8:23 Zvino vakati vachienda nechikepe, akarara hope; kukauya dutu guru remhepo padziva; vakazarirwa <transChange type="added">nemvura</transChange>, vakava munjodzi.
Luke 8:24 Vakaswedera vakamumutsa, vachiti: Tenzi, tenzi, toparara! Ipapo akamuka, akatsiura mhepo nemafungu emvura; zvikaguma, kukava nekudzikama.
Luke 8:25 Ndokubva ati kwavari: Rutendo rwenyu rwuripi? Asi vachitya vakashamisika, vakataurirana <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Ko ndeupi uyu, kuti anoraira kunyange nemhepo nemvura, zvichimuteerera? <div eID="gen674" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen673" type="section"/>
Luke 8:26 Zvino vakaenda nechikepe kunyika yeVaGadharini, yakatarisana neGarirea.
Luke 8:27 Wakati achibudira panyika, akamuchingamidza umwe murume achibva muguta, wakange ane madhimoni kwenguva refu, uye asingapfeki nguvo, asingagari mumba, asi kumarinda.
Luke 8:28 Wakati achiona Jesu, akadanidzira ndokuwira pasi pamberi pake, akati nenzwi guru: Ndinei nemwi, Jesu, Mwanakomana waMwari Wekumusoro-soro? Ndinokukumbirisai, musanditambudza.
Luke 8:29 Nokuti wakange araira mweya wetsvina kuti ubude kumunhu; nokuti wakange wamubata nguva zhinji uye waichengetwa akasungwa nemaketani nemabote; asi akadambura zvisungo, achitinhirwa kumarenje nedhimoni.
Luke 8:30 Jesu ndokumubvunza achiti: Zita rako ndiani? Akati: Regiyoni; nokuti madhimoni mazhinji akange apinda maari.
Luke 8:31 Akamukumbirisa kuti arege kumaraira kuti aende kugomba risina chigadziko.
Luke 8:32 Zvino kwakange kuripo ipapo boka renguruve zhinji dzaifura mugomo; akamukumbirisa kuti amatendere kupinda madziri. Akamatendera.
Luke 8:33 Zvino madhimoni akabuda kumunhu, akapinda munguruve; boka ndokupitirikira kumawere richienda kudziva, rikabitirirwa.
Luke 8:34 Zvino vai<transChange type="added">dzi</transChange>fudza vachiona zvaitika, vakatiza, vakaenda kunotaura muguta nemumaruwa.
Luke 8:35 Zvino vakabuda kunoona zvaitika; vakasvika kuna Jesu, vakawana munhu, wakange abuda madhimoni maari agere patsoka dzaJesu, akapfeka uye akakwana mupfungwa; vakatya.
Luke 8:36 Vakange va<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>onawo vakavaudza kuti akaponeswa sei aiva nemadhimoni.
Luke 8:37 Zvino chaunga chese chedunhu rakapoteredza VaGadharini chakakumbirisa kwaari kuti abve kwavari, nokuti vabatwa nekutya kukuru; akapinda muchikepe, akadzokera.
Luke 8:38 Asi murume wakange abuda madhimoni maari, wakakumbirisa kwaari kuti ave naye. Asi Jesu wakamurega achienda, achiti:
Luke 8:39 Dzokera kumba kwako, unotaura kuti zvikuru sei Mwari zvaaita kwauri. Akaenda, akaparidza muguta rese kuti zvikuru sei Jesu zvaakamuitira. <div eID="gen676" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen675" type="section"/>
Luke 8:40 Zvino zvakaitika kuti pakudzoka kwaJesu, chaunga chakamugamuchira; nokuti vese vakange vakamurindira.
Luke 8:41 Zvino tarira, kwakasvika murume, zita rake <transChange type="added">rainzi</transChange> Jairosi, iye wakange ari mukuru wesinagoge, ndokuwira patsoka dzaJesu, akamukumbirisa kuti apinde mumba make;
Luke 8:42 nokuti wakange ane mukunda wakaberekwa umwe wega wemakore anenge gumi nemaviri, uye iye wakange achitandadza. Zvino wakati achaenda, zvaunga zvikamumbandidzira.
Luke 8:43 Uye mukadzi, waiva nekubuda ropa kwemakore gumi nemaviri, wakange apedzera zvese zveupenyu hwake kuvarapi, asingagoni kurapwa kwete neumwe.
Luke 8:44 Akauya mushure make, akabata mupendero wenguvo yake; pakarepo kubuda kweropa kwake kukaguma.
Luke 8:45 Jesu ndokuti: Ndiani wandibata? Zvino vese vakati vachiramba, Petro nevaiva naye vakati: Tenzi, zvaunga zvinokumbandidzirai neku<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>tsikirira<transChange type="added">i</transChange> zvino moti: Ndiani wandibata?
Luke 8:46 Asi Jesu wakati: Aripo wandibata; nokuti ini ndaziva kuti simba rabuda kwandiri.
Luke 8:47 Zvino mukadzi wakati achiona kuti haana kuvanzika, akauya achibvunda, akawira pasi pamberi pake, akarondedzera kwaari pamberi pevanhu vese kuti wakamubata nechikonzero chipi, uye kuti wakaporeswa pakarepo sei.
Luke 8:48 Zvino akati kwaari: Mukunda, tsunga moyo, rutendo rwako rwakuponesa; enda nerugare.
Luke 8:49 Wakati achataura, kwakauya umwe achibva <transChange type="added">kumba</transChange> kwemukuru wesinagoge, achiti kwaari: Mukunda wenyu wafa; musatambudza Mudzidzisi.
Luke 8:50 Asi Jesu wakati achinzwa, akamupindura, achiti: Usatya, tenda chete, uye achaponeswa.
Luke 8:51 Zvino wakati apinda mumba, haana kutendera munhu kupinda, kunze kwaPetro, naJakobho, naJohwani, nababa vemusikana, namai.
Luke 8:52 Uye vese vakachema, vachimuririra. Asi wakati: Musachema, haana kufa, asi arere.
Luke 8:53 Vakamuseka nekumhura, vachiziva kuti wafa.
Luke 8:54 Asi wakavabudisira vese panze, akamubata ruoko, akadanidzira, achiti: Musikana, muka!
Luke 8:55 Mweya wake ukadzoka, akamuka pakarepo; akaraira kuti apiwe kudya.
Luke 8:56 Zvino vabereki vake vakavhiringidzika; asi wakavaraira kuti varege kuudza munhu zvakaitika.  <chapter eID="Luke.8"/><div eID="gen678" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen677" type="section"/>
Luke 9:0 <div sID="gen679" type="section"/> <chapter n="9" osisID="Luke.9" sID="Luke.9"/>  <div sID="gen680" type="x-p"/>
Luke 9:1 Zvino wakadanira pamwe vadzidzi vake gumi nevaviri, akavapa simba nechikuriri pamusoro pemadhimoni ese, nekuporesa zvirwere.
Luke 9:2 Akavatuma kuparidza ushe hwaMwari nekuporesa varwere.
Luke 9:3 Zvino akati kwavari: Musatakura chinhu cherwendo, kana mudonzvo, kana nhava, kana chingwa, kana mari; uye musava nenguvo refu mbiri umwe neumwe.
Luke 9:4 Uye imba ipi neipi yamunopinda mairi, garaimo, mugobvamo.
Luke 9:5 Uye ani nani asingakugamuchirii, kana mobuda paguta iro, zuzai kunyange guruva patsoka dzenyu, huve uchapupu hunopikisana navo.
Luke 9:6 Zvino vakabva vakaenda vachigura nemumisha yese, vachiparidza evhangeri, nekuporesa pese-pese. <div eID="gen680" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen679" type="section"/>
Luke 9:7 Zvino Herodhe, umwe wevatongi vana, wakanzwa zvese zvakaitwa naye; akakanganisika, nokuti zvairehwa nevamwe kuti Johwani wakange amuka kubva kuvakafa;
Luke 9:8 nevamwe kuti Eria waonekwa; nevamwe kuti umwe muporofita wevekare wamuka.
Luke 9:9 Asi Herodhe wakati: Johwani ndakagura musoro ini; asi ndiani uyu, ini wandinonzwa zvinhu zvakadai pamusoro pake? Akatsvaka kumuona. <div eID="gen682" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen681" type="section"/>
Luke 9:10 Zvino vaapositori vakati vadzoka, vakamurondedzera zvese zvavakange vaita. Akavatora, akaenda navo vari vega kunzvimbo yerenje reguta rinonzi Bhetisaidha.
Luke 9:11 Zvino zvaunga zvakati zva<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ziva, zvikamutevera; akavagamuchira, akataura kwavari zveushe hwaMwari, akaporesa vakange vachida kuporeswa. <div eID="gen684" type="x-p"/>
Luke 9:12 Zuva raiva rotanga kuvira; vanegumi nevaviri vakaswedera vakati kwaari: Regai chaunga chiende, kuti vaende kumisha nekuruwa rwakapoteredza, vagare, vawane kudya; nokuti pano patiri panzvimbo yerenje.
Luke 9:13 Asi wakati kwavari: Vapei imwi ivo kuti vadye. Vakati: Hatina zvinopfuura zvingwa zvishanu, nehove mbiri, kunze kwekuti isu taenda kunotengera vanhu ava vese kudya.
Luke 9:14 Nokuti vaiva varume vanenge zvuru zvishanu. Akati kuvadzidzi vake: Vagarisei pasi mumapoka, rimwe nerimwe makumi mashanu.
Luke 9:15 Vakaita saizvozvo, vakavagarisa vese pasi.
Luke 9:16 Zvino akatora zvingwa zvishanu nehove mbiri, akatarira kumusoro kudenga, akazviropafadza, aka<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>medura, ndokupa vadzidzi kuti vagadzike pamberi pechaunga.
Luke 9:17 Vakadya, vakaguta vese; kukanongwa zvimedu zvakasara kwavari, matengu gumi nemaviri. <div eID="gen685" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen683" type="section"/>
Luke 9:18 Zvino zvakaitika ari ega achinyengetera, vadzidzi vakange vanaye; akavabvunza, achiti: Zvaunga zvinoti ndini ani?
Luke 9:19 Ivo vakapindura vakati: Johwani Mubhabhatidzi; asi vamwe: Eria; nevamwe vakati: Umwe muporofita wevekare wamuka.
Luke 9:20 Akati kwavari: Ko imwi munoti ndini ani? Petro akapindura akati: Kristu waMwari.
Luke 9:21 Akavayambirisa, akaraira kuti varege kuudza munhu izvi;
Luke 9:22 achiti: Mwanakomana wemunhu anofanira kutambudzika zvikuru, nekurambwa nevakuru nevapristi vakuru nevanyori, nekuurawa, nekumutswa zuva retatu. <div eID="gen687" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen686" type="section"/>
Luke 9:23 Zvino wakati kune vese: Kana munhu achida kuuya shure kwangu, ngaazvirambe, atakure muchinjikwa wake zuva rimwe nerimwe, anditevere.
Luke 9:24 Nokuti ani nani anoda kuponesa upenyu hwake, acharasikirwa nahwo; asi ani nani anorasikirwa neupenyu hwake nekuda kwangu, iye achahuponesa.
Luke 9:25 Nokuti munhu angabatsirwa nei, kana akawana nyika yese, asi iye pachake azvitadzire kana kurasikirwa?
Luke 9:26 Nokuti ani nani anonyara pamusoro pangu nepamashoko angu, Mwanakomana wemunhu achanyara pamusoro pake paanouya mukubwinya kwake nekwaBaba nekwevatumwa vatsvene.
Luke 9:27 Asi ndinokuudzai zvechokwadi: Varipo vamwe vevamire pano vasingazoraviri rufu, kusvikira vaona ushe hwaMwari. <div eID="gen689" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen688" type="section"/>
Luke 9:28 Zvino zvakaitika mazuva anenge masere mushure memashoko awa, kuti wakatora Petro naJohwani naJakobho, akakwira mugomo kunonyengetera.
Luke 9:29 Zvino zvakaitika mukunyengetera kwake, chimiro chechiso chake chikashanduka, uye nguvo yake <transChange type="added">ika</transChange>chena, <transChange type="added">ika</transChange>penya.
Luke 9:30 Zvino tarira, varume vaviri vakataura naye, vaiva Mozisi naEria.
Luke 9:31 Vakaonekwa mukubwinya, vakataura zvekubva kwake kwaakange achinopedzisa paJerusarema.
Luke 9:32 Asi Petro nevaiva naye vakange varemerwa nehope; asi vakati vapepuka, vakaona kubwinya kwake, nevarume vaviri vaiva vamire naye.
Luke 9:33 Zvino zvakaitika pakubva kwavo paari, Petro akati kuna Jesu: Tenzi, zvakanaka kuti tive pano; zvino ngatiite matende matatu, rimwe renyu, nerimwe raMozisi, nerimwe raEria, asingazivi zvaanoreva.
Luke 9:34 Wakati achitaura izvi, kwakauya gore rikavadzikatira; vakatya pakupinda kwavo mugore.
Luke 9:35 Zvino kwakabuda inzwi mugore, richiti: Uyu Mwanakomana wangu anodikanwa; inzwai iye.
Luke 9:36 Zvino inzwi rakati raitika, Jesu akawanikwa ari ega. Asi ivo vakanyarara, vakasaudza munhu mumazuva iwayo chimwe chezvinhu zvavakange vaona. <div eID="gen691" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen690" type="section"/>
Luke 9:37 Zvino zvakaitika kuti nezuva raitevera, vaburuka mugomo, chaunga chikuru chikamuchingamidza.
Luke 9:38 Zvino tarira, murume muchaunga wakadanidzira, achiti: Mudzidzisi, ndinokukumbirisai, tarirai mwanakomana wangu nokuti <transChange type="added">ndiye</transChange> wakaberekwa umwe wega wangu;
Luke 9:39 zvino tarirai, mweya unomubata, pakarepo woridza mhere, uye unomugwinhisa achipupuma furo, unorema kubva paari, asi uchimusvuura.
Luke 9:40 Zvino ndakakumbirisa vadzidzi venyu kuti vaubudise, asi vakasagona.
Luke 9:41 Jesu achipindura akati: Haiwa zera risina rutendo rakatsauka, ndichava nemwi kusvikira rinhi, ndichikuitirai moyo murefu? Uisa mwanakomana wako pano.
Luke 9:42 Zvino wakati achaswedera, dhimoni rikamudambura, rikamugwinhisa zvikuru; asi Jesu akatsiura mweya wetsvina, akaporesa mwana, akamudzosera kuna baba vake. <div eID="gen693" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen692" type="section"/>
Luke 9:43 Vese ndokushamiswa zvikuru neukuru hwaMwari. Zvino vese va<transChange type="added">cha</transChange>kashamisika nezvese Jesu zvaakaita, akati kuvadzidzi vake:
Luke 9:44 Imwi isai mashoko awa munzeve dzenyu: Nokuti Mwanakomana wemunhu achakumikidzwa mumaoko evanhu.
Luke 9:45 Asi havana kuziva chirevo ichi, uye chakange chakavanzika kwavari, kuti vasachinzwisisa; vakatya kumubvunza pamusoro pechirevo ichi. <div eID="gen695" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen694" type="section"/>
Luke 9:46 Zvino kwakamuka nharo pakati pavo, kuti ndiani angava mukurusa kwavari.
Luke 9:47 Asi Jesu wakati achiona kufunga kwemoyo wavo, akatora mucheche, akamuisa parutivi rwake,
Luke 9:48 akati kwavari: Ani nani anogamuchira mucheche uyu muzita rangu, anogamuchira ini, uye ani nani anogamuchira ini anogamuchira wakandituma; nokuti mudikisa pakati penyu mese, ndiye achava mukuru. <div eID="gen697" type="x-p"/>
Luke 9:49 Johwani akapindura akati: Tenzi, taona umwe achibudisa madhimoni muzita renyu, tikamudzivisa, nokuti haateverani nesu.
Luke 9:50 Asi Jesu akati kwaari: Musa<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>dzivisa, nokuti uyo asingatipikisi, ndewedu. <div eID="gen698" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen696" type="section"/>
Luke 9:51 Zvino zvakaitika pakupera kwemazuva ekukwidzwa kwake, kuti iye akarinzira chiso chake kuenda kuJerusarema,
Luke 9:52 akatuma vatumwa pamberi pechiso chake; vakaenda, vakapinda mumusha weVaSamaria, kunomugadzirira.
Luke 9:53 Asi havana kumugamuchira, nokuti chiso chake chaienda kuJerusarema.
Luke 9:54 Zvino vadzidzi vake, Jakobho naJohwani, vakati vachi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ona vakati: Ishe, munoda kuti tiraire moto uburuke kubva kudenga, uvapedze, Eria sezvaakaitawo here?
Luke 9:55 Asi wakatendeuka akavatsiura akati: Hamuzivi kuti imwi muri vemweya wakadii.
Luke 9:56 Nokuti Mwanakomana wemunhu haana kuuya kuzoparadza upenyu hwevanhu asi ku<transChange type="added">hu</transChange>ponesa. Ndokuenda kune umwe musha. <div eID="gen700" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen699" type="section"/>
Luke 9:57 Zvino zvakaitika vachifamba munzira, umwe wakati kwaari: Ishe, ndichakuteverai kupi zvako kwamunoenda.
Luke 9:58 Jesu akati kwaari: Makava ane mwena, neshiri dzedenga matendere; asi Mwanakomana wemunhu haana paanotsamhidza musoro.
Luke 9:59 Akati kune umwe: Nditevere. Asi iye akati: Ishe, nditenderei ndiende kunoviga baba vangu pakutanga.
Luke 9:60 Asi Jesu wakati kwaari: Rega vakafa vavige vakafa vavo; asi iwe enda unoparidza ushe hwaMwari.
Luke 9:61 Umwezve akati: Ndichakuteverai Ishe, asi nditenderei kutanga kuti ndinovawoneka ivo vari mumba mangu.
Luke 9:62 Asi Jesu akati kwaari: Hakuna ungati kana aisa ruoko rwake pagejo, akacheukira kuzvinhu zviri shure, wakafanira ushe hwaMwari. <chapter eID="Luke.9"/><div eID="gen702" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen701" type="section"/>
Luke 10:0 <div sID="gen703" type="section"/> <chapter n="10" osisID="Luke.10" sID="Luke.10"/>  <div sID="gen704" type="x-p"/>
Luke 10:1 Shure kwezvinhu izvi, Ishe akagadza vamwe makumi manomwewo, akavatuma vaviri vaviri pamberi pechiso chake muguta rimwe nerimwe nenzvimbo <transChange type="added">imwe neimwe</transChange> iye kwaakange achizoenda.
Luke 10:2 Naizvozvo wakati kwavari: Goho zvirokwazvo iguru, asi vashandi vashoma. Naizvozvo kumbirai Ishe wegoho kuti abudisire vashandi pagoho rake.
Luke 10:3 Endai; tarirai, ini ndinokutumai semakwayana pakati pemapumhi.
Luke 10:4 Musatakura chikwama, kana nhava, kana manyatera; uye musakwazisa munhu panzira.
Luke 10:5 Zvino paimba ipi neipi yamunopinda, tangai kuti: Rugare kuimba ino.
Luke 10:6 Uye kana mwanakomana werugare ari ipapo, rugare rwenyu ruchazorora pamusoro payo; kana zvisakadaro, ruchadzokera kwamuri.
Luke 10:7 Garai muimba iyo, muchidya nekunwa zvinobva kwavari; nokuti mushandi wakafanirwa nemubairo wake; musapota-pota nedzimba.
Luke 10:8 Muguta ripi neripi mamunopinda vakakugamuchirai, idyai zvinoiswa mberi kwenyu,
Luke 10:9 muporese varwere varimo, muchiti kwavari: Ushe hwaMwari hwaswedera kwamuri.
Luke 10:10 Asi muguta ripi neripi ramunopinda, vakasakugamuchirayi, budirai munzira dzaro, muti:
Luke 10:11 Kunyange guruva reguta renyu rakatinamatira, tinorikuhumurira kwamuri; asi muzive chinhu ichi, kuti ushe hwaMwari hwaswedera kwamuri.
Luke 10:12 Asi ndinoti kwamuri: Zvichava nani kuSodhoma nezuva iro, kupfuura guta iro. <div eID="gen704" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen703" type="section"/>
Luke 10:13 Une nhamo, Korazini! Une nhamo, Bhetisaidha! Nokuti dai akaitwa muTire neSidhoni mabasa esimba akaitwa mamuri, vangadai vatendeuka kare, vakagara vakapfeka masaga nedota.
Luke 10:14 Asi zvichava nani kuTire neSidhoni pakutongwa, kupfuura imwi.
Luke 10:15 Newe Kapenaume, wakasimudzirwa kudenga, uchawisirwa pasi kuhadhesi*. <div eID="gen706" type="x-p"/>
Luke 10:16 Anokunzwai imwi anondinzwa ini; neanokurambai imwi anondiramba ini; neanondiramba ini anomuramba wakandituma. <div eID="gen707" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen705" type="section"/>
Luke 10:17 Vanemakumi manomwe vakadzoka nemufaro, vachiti: Ishe, nemadhimoni anozviisa pasi pedu muzita renyu.
Luke 10:18 Zvino akati kwavari: Ndakaona Satani semheni achiwa achibva kudenga.
Luke 10:19 Tarirai, ndinopa kwamuri simba rekutsika pamusoro penyoka nezvinyavada, nepamusoro pesimba rese remuvengi; hakuna chinhu chingatongokukuvadzai.
Luke 10:20 Asi musafara nechinhu ichi kuti mweya inozviisa pasi penyu; asi zvikuru mufare kuti mazita enyu akanyorwa kumatenga. <div eID="gen709" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen708" type="section"/>
Luke 10:21 Neawa iro Jesu wakafara mumweya, akati: Ndinokuvongai, Baba, Ishe wekudenga nenyika, kuti makavanza zvinhu izvi kune vakachenjera nevanonzwisisa, mukazvizarurira vacheche; hongu, Baba, nokuti saizvozvo zvakava zvakanaka pamberi penyu.
Luke 10:22 Zvese zvakakumikidzwa kwandiri naBaba vangu; uye hakuna anoziva kuti Mwanakomana ndiani, kunze kwaBaba, uye kuti Baba ndiani, kunze kweMwanakomana, uye ani nani Mwanakomana waanoda kuzarurira. <div eID="gen711" type="x-p"/>
Luke 10:23 Zvino akatendeukira kuvadzidzi vari vega akati: Akaropafadzwa meso anoona zvamunoona.
Luke 10:24 Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Vaporofita vazhinji nemadzimambo vaishuva kuona zvinhu zvamunoona imwi, asi havana ku<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ona, nekunzwa zvinhu zvamunonzwa, asi havana ku<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa. <div eID="gen712" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen710" type="section"/>
Luke 10:25 Zvino tarira, imwe nyanzvi yemutemo yakasimuka, ichimuidza, ichiti: Mudzidzisi, ndingaitei kuti ndigare nhaka yeupenyu husingaperi?
Luke 10:26 Ndokuti kwaari: Pamurairo pakanyorwei? Unoverenga sei?
Luke 10:27 Uye achipindura, akati: Ude Ishe Mwari wako, nemoyo wako wese, uye nemweya wako wese, uye nesimba rako rese, uye nefungwa dzako dzese; neumwe wako sezvaunozvi<transChange type="added">da iwe</transChange>.
Luke 10:28 Akati kwaari: Wapindura zvakarurama; ita izvi, ugorarama. <div eID="gen714" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen713" type="section"/>
Luke 10:29 Iye, achida kuzviruramisa, wakati kuna Jesu: Zvino ndiani umwe wangu?
Luke 10:30 Jesu akapindura akati: Umwe munhu wakaburuka kubva kuJerusarema achienda kuJeriko; akawira pakati pemakororo, akamukururawo akamupa mavanga akaenda, ndokusiya oda kufa.
Luke 10:31 Zvakangoitikawo kuti umwe mupristi wakange achiburuka nenzira iyo; akati achimuona, akapfuura neparutivi rwakapesa.
Luke 10:32 Saizvozvowo muRevhi asvika panzvimbo iyo, aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>ona, akapfuura neparutivi rwakapesa.
Luke 10:33 Zvino umwe muSamaria, wakange achifamba wakasvika paaiva, akati achimuona akanzwa tsitsi,
Luke 10:34 akaswedera ndokupomba mavanga ake, achidira mafuta newaini; akamugadza pachipfuwo chake pachake, ndokumuisa kuimba yevafambi, ndokumuchengeta.
Luke 10:35 Zvino pamangwana oenda, wakabudisa madhenario* maviri akapa kumwene weimba, akati kwaari: Muchengete; uye zvese zvaunoshandisa kupfuura <transChange type="added">izvi</transChange>, ini ndichakupazve, kana ndichidzoka.
Luke 10:36 Naizvozvo ndeupi wevatatu ava waunofunga kuti waiva umwe waiye wakawira pakati pemakororo?
Luke 10:37 Akati: Ndiye wakamuitira tsitsi. Ipapo Jesu akati kwaari: Enda, newe unoita saizvozvo. <div eID="gen716" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen715" type="section"/>
Luke 10:38 Zvino zvakaitika pakufamba kwavo, kuti iye wakapinda mune umwe musha; umwe mukadzi wainzi Marita akamugamuchira mumba make.
Luke 10:39 Uye iye wakange ane munin'inawo wainzi Maria, wakagarawo pamakumbo aJesu, akanzwa shoko rake.
Luke 10:40 Asi Marita wakange akabatikana kwazvo nekushanda kukuru, akaswedera akati: Ishe, hamuna hanya here nokuti munin'ina wangu wandisiya ndega ndichishanda? Naizvozvo muudzei kuti andibatsire.
Luke 10:41 Jesu akapindura akati kwaari: Marita, Marita, unozvidya moyo nekutambudzika nezvinhu zvizhinji;
Luke 10:42 asi chinhu chimwe chinodikanwa; asi Maria wasanangura mugove wakanaka, waasingazotorerwi. <chapter eID="Luke.10"/><div eID="gen718" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen717" type="section"/>
Luke 11:0 <div sID="gen719" type="section"/> <chapter n="11" osisID="Luke.11" sID="Luke.11"/>  <div sID="gen720" type="x-p"/>
Luke 11:1 Zvino zvakaitika achinyengetera pane imwe nzvimbo, apo amira, umwe wevadzidzi vake akati kwaari: Ishe, tidzidzisei kunyengetera, Johwani sezvaakadzidzisawo vadzidzi vake.
Luke 11:2 Ndokuti kwavari: Kana muchinyengetera, muti: Baba vedu vari kumatenga, zita renyu ngariitwe dzvene. Ushe hwenyu ngahuuye. Chido chenyu ngachiitwe, panyikawo se<transChange type="added">zvachinoitwa</transChange> kudenga.
Luke 11:3 Mutipei zuva rimwe nerimwe kudya kwedu kwemazuva ese.
Luke 11:4 Uye mutikanganwire zvivi zvedu, nokuti isuwo tinokanganwira ani nani ane ngava kwatiri. Uye musatipinza pakuedzwa, asi mutisunungure pakuipa. <div eID="gen720" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen719" type="section"/>
Luke 11:5 Akati kwavari: Ndeupi wenyu ane shamwari, uye anoenda kwaari pakati peusiku, akati kwaari: Shamwari, ndikwerete zvingwa zvitatu,
Luke 11:6 nokuti shamwari yangu yasvika kwandiri ichibva parwendo, asi handina chinhu chandingamuperekera;
Luke 11:7 uye uyo ari mukati akapindura akati: Usandinetsa; ikozvino mukova wapfigwa, nevana vangu vadiki vaneni pamubhedha; handigoni kumuka ndikakupa.
Luke 11:8 Ndinoti kwamuri: Kunyange akasamuka akamupa, nekuda kwekuva shamwari yake, asi nekuda kwekutsungirira kwake achamuka akamupa zvese zvaanoshaiwa.
Luke 11:9 Zvino ini ndinoti kwamuri: Kumbirai, muchapiwa; tsvakai, muchawana; gogodzai, muchazarurirwa.
Luke 11:10 Nokuti wese anokumbira anogamuchira; neanotsvaka anowana; neanogogodza anozarurirwa.
Luke 11:11 Kuti ndeupi wenyu ari baba, kana mwanakomana achikumbira chingwa, angazomupa ibwe? Kanawo hove, angazomupa nyoka panzvimbo yehove here?
Luke 11:12 Kanawo kuti akakumbira zai, angazomupa chinyavada here?
Luke 11:13 Naizvozvo kana imwi makaipa muchiziva kupa zvipo zvakanaka vana venyu, Baba vari kudenga vachapa zvikuru sei Mweya Mutsvene vanovakumbira. <div eID="gen722" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen721" type="section"/>
Luke 11:14 Zvino wakange achibudisa dhimoni iro raiva chimumumu. Zvino zvakaitika kuti dhimoni rabuda, chimumumu chikataura; zvaunga zvikashamisika.
Luke 11:15 Asi vamwe vavo vakati: Anobudisa madhimoni naBheerizebhuri mukuru wemadhimoni.
Luke 11:16 Uye vamwe vachiidza, vakatsvaka kwaari chiratidzo chinobva kudenga.
Luke 11:17 Asi iye achiziva mifungo yavo wakati kwavari: Ushe hwese hunopesana huchizvipikisa hunoparadzwa; neimba inopikisana neimba inowa.
Luke 11:18 Kana Sataniwo achipesana achizvipikisa, ushe hwake hungazomira sei? Nokuti munoti, ndinobudisa madhimoni naBheerizebhuri.
Luke 11:19 Asi kana ini ndichibudisa madhimoni naBheerizebhuri, vanakomana venyu vanobudisa nani? Naizvozvo ivo vachava vatongi venyu.
Luke 11:20 Asi kana ndichibudisa madhimoni nemunwe waMwari, naizvozvo ushe hwaMwari hwasvika kwamuri.
Luke 11:21 Kana chikakarara chashonga zvombo chichirinda chivanze chacho, nhumbi dzacho dziri murugare;
Luke 11:22 asi kana wakasimba kuchipfuura aka<transChange type="added">chi</transChange>rwisa, akachikunda, anotora nhumbi dzacho dzese dzekurwa dzachange chichivimba nadzo, ndokugovera zvaapamba zvacho.
Luke 11:23 Asina ini anopesana neni; neasingaunganidzi neni anoparadzira. <div eID="gen724" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen723" type="section"/>
Luke 11:24 Kana mweya wetsvina wabuda mumunhu, unofamba uchigura nemunzvimbo dzakawoma, uchitsvaka zororo; asi uchishaiwa unoti: Ndichadzokera kuimba yangu kwandakabuda.
Luke 11:25 Zvino kana wasvika unowana yatsvairwa nekurongedzwa.
Luke 11:26 Ipapo unoenda ndokutora pamwe naye imwe mweya minomwe yakaipa kuupfuura, ndokupinda ndokugaramo; uye kuguma kwemunhu uyo kwakaipa kupfuura kutanga. <div eID="gen726" type="x-p"/>
Luke 11:27 Zvino zvakaitika pakutaura kwake zvinhu izvozvi, umwe mukadzi pakati pechaunga akasimudza inzwi, akati kwaari: Rakaropafadzwa dumbu rakakutakurai, nemazamu amakayamwa.
Luke 11:28 Asi iye akati: Hongu, asi zvikuru vakaropafadzwa vanonzwa shoko raMwari vachirichengeta. <div eID="gen727" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen725" type="section"/>
Luke 11:29 Zvino kwakati kwaungana zvaunga zvakatsikirirana, akatanga kuti: Zera iri rakaipa; rinotsvaka chiratidzo, asi hakuna chiratidzo chichapiwa kwariri, kunze kwechiratidzo chaJona muporofita.
Luke 11:30 Nokuti Jona sezvaakava chiratidzo kuVaNinivhi, saizvozvowo zvichaita Mwanakomana wemunhu kuzera iri.
Luke 11:31 Mambokadzi wechamhembe achasimuka pakutongwa pamwe nevarume vezera iri akavapa mhosva; nokuti wakabva pamigumo yenyika kuzonzwa uchenjeri hwaSoromoni, zvino tarirai, mukuru kuna Soromoni ari pano.
Luke 11:32 Varume veNinivhi vachasimuka pakutonga nezera iri, vakaripa mhosva, nokuti vakatendeuka pakuparidza kwaJona; zvino tarira, mukuru kuna Jona ari pano. <div eID="gen729" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen728" type="section"/>
Luke 11:33 Hakuna munhu anoti kana atungidza mwenje anoisa pakavanda, kana pasi pedengu, asi pachigadziko chemwenje, kuti avo vanopinda vaone chiedza. <div eID="gen731" type="x-p"/>
Luke 11:34 Mwenje wemuviri iziso; naizvozvo kana ziso rako riri benyu, muviri wakowo wese uzere nechiedza; asi kana rakaipa, muviri wakowo une rima.
Luke 11:35 Naizvozvo chenjera kuti chiedza chiri mukati mako chisava rima.
Luke 11:36 Naizvozvo kana muviri wako wese uzere nechiedza, pasina rumwe rutivi rwune rima, uchazara nechiedza wese, sepaya mwenje uchikuvhenekera nekupenya. <div eID="gen732" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen730" type="section"/>
Luke 11:37 Wakati achitaura, umwe muFarisi akamukumbira kuti adye naye; akapinda, akagara pakudya.
Luke 11:38 Zvino muFarisi wakati achiona, akashamisika kuti wakange asina kutanga ashamba asati <transChange type="added">adya </transChange>chisvusvuro.
Luke 11:39 Ishe ndokuti kwaari: Ikozvino imwi VaFarisi munonatsa kunze kwemukombe nekwendiro, asi mukati menyu muzere neupambi neuipi.
Luke 11:40 Imwi mapenzi, heya wakaita kunze, haana kuita mukatiwo?
Luke 11:41 Asi ipai sechipo kuvarombo izvo zvinhu zvemukati; zvino tarirai, zvese zvichava zvakachena kwamuri. <div eID="gen734" type="x-p"/>
Luke 11:42 Asi mune nhamo VaFarisi! Nokuti munopa chegumi cheminte* neruyi* nemiriwo yese, uye muchidarika mutongo nerudo rwaMwari; maifanira kuita izvi, nekusarega zvimwe. <div eID="gen735" type="x-p"/>
Luke 11:43 Mune nhamo VaFarisi! Nokuti munoda zvigaro zvepamusoro mumasinagoge, nekwaziso pamisika. <div eID="gen736" type="x-p"/>
Luke 11:44 Mune nhamo, vanyori neVaFarisi, vanyepedzeri! Nokuti makafanana nemarinda asingaonekwi, uye vanhu vanofamba pamusoro pawo vasingazivi.
