Luke 11:45 Zvino umwe wenyanzvi dzemutemo wakapindura akati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, kana muchitaura izvi munotuka isuwo.
Luke 11:46 Asi akati: Mune nhamowo imwi nyanzvi dzemutemo! Nokuti munoremedza vanhu nemitoro inorema kutakurwa, asi imwi momene hamubati mitoro <transChange type="added">iyi</transChange> neumwe weminwe yenyu. <div eID="gen737" type="x-p"/>
Luke 11:47 Mune nhamo! Nokuti munovaka marinda evaporofita, uye madzibaba enyu akavauraya.
Luke 11:48 Naizvozvo munopupura kuti munotenderana nemabasa emadzibaba enyu; nokuti ivo vakavauraya zvirokwazvo, imwiwo munovaka marinda avo.
Luke 11:49 Naizvozvo uchenjeri hwaMwari hunotiwo: Ndichavatumira vaporofita nevaapositori, <transChange type="added">vamwe</transChange> vavo vachauraya nekushusha;
Luke 11:50 kuti ropa revaporofita vese rakateurwa kubva pakuvambwa kwenyika ritsvakwe pazera iri,
Luke 11:51 kubva paropa raAberi kusvikira paropa raZakaria wakaparara pakati pearitari neimba <transChange type="added">yaMwari</transChange>; hongu, ndinoti kwamuri: Richatsvakwa pazera iri. <div eID="gen738" type="x-p"/>
Luke 11:52 Mune nhamo, nyanzvi dzemutemo! Nokuti makabvisa kiyi yeruzivo; hamuna kupinda momene, nevaipinda makavadzivirira.
Luke 11:53 Wakati achitaura zvinhu izvi kwavari, vanyori neVaFarisi vakatanga kuita daka naye zvikurusa, nekumubvunzisisa pamusoro pezvizhinji,
Luke 11:54 vachimuteya, nekutsvaka kubata chinhu chinobuda mumuromo make, vagomupa mhosva. <chapter eID="Luke.11"/><div eID="gen739" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen733" type="section"/>
Luke 12:0 <div sID="gen740" type="section"/> <chapter n="12" osisID="Luke.12" sID="Luke.12"/>  <div sID="gen741" type="x-p"/>
Luke 12:1 Zvichakadaro makumi ezvuru zvechaunga akati aungana, zvekuti vaitsikana, akatanga kutaura kuvadzidzi vake pakutanga <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Imwi chenjerai mbiriso yeVaFarisi, inova unyepedzeri. <div eID="gen741" type="x-p"/>
Luke 12:2 Uye hakuna chinhu chakafukidzwa, chisingazopenengurwi, nechakavigwa, chisingazozikanwi.
Luke 12:3 Naizvozvo zvese zvamakataura murima zvichanzwikwa muchiedza; neizvo zvamakataura munzeve mudzimba dzemukati zvichaparidzwa pamusoro pematenga edzimba. <div eID="gen742" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen740" type="section"/>
Luke 12:4 Uye ndinoti kwamuri shamwari dzangu: Musatya vanouraya muviri, asi shure kweizvozvo vasingazogoni kuita chimwe chinhu.
Luke 12:5 Asi ndichakuratidzai wamunofanira kutya: Ityai iye anoti shure kwekuuraya ane simba rekukanda mugehena; hongu, ndinoti kwamuri: Ityai iye.
Luke 12:6 Ko tushiri tushanu hatutengeswi nemakobiri maviri here? Hakuna kamwe kadzo kanokanganikwa pamberi paMwari.
Luke 12:7 Asi kunyange nevhudzi remusoro wenyu rakaverengwa rese. Musatya naizvozvo, munopfuura tushiri tuzhinji. <div eID="gen744" type="x-p"/>
Luke 12:8 Ndinotiwo kwamuri: Umwe neumwe anondibvuma pamberi pevanhu, Mwanakomana wemunhu achamubvumawo pamberi pevatumwa vaMwari;
Luke 12:9 asi anondiramba pamberi pevanhu, acharambwa pamberi pevatumwa vaMwari. <div eID="gen745" type="x-p"/>
Luke 12:10 Uye umwe neumwe anoreva shoko achipikisa Mwanakomana wemunhu, achakanganwirwa; asi uyo anonyomba Mweya Mutsvene haazokanganwirwi. <div eID="gen746" type="x-p"/>
Luke 12:11 Kana vachikuisai kumasinagoge nevatongi nevane simba, musafunganya kuti muchapindura sei kana chii, kana muchataurei;
Luke 12:12 nokuti Mweya Mutsvene achakudzidzisai neawa iro zva<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>nofanira kutaura. <div eID="gen747" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen743" type="section"/>
Luke 12:13 Zvino umwe wechaunga wakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, udzai mwanakomana wamai vangu agovane nhaka neni.
Luke 12:14 Asi wakati kwaari: Iwe munhu, ndiani wakandigadza <transChange type="added">kuva</transChange> mutongi kana mugoveri pamusoro penyu?
Luke 12:15 Akati kwavari: Ngwarirai muchenjerere ruchiva, nokuti upenyu hwemunhu hahusi mukuwanda kwezvinhu zvaanazvo. <div eID="gen749" type="x-p"/>
Luke 12:16 Akataura mufananidzo kwavari, achiti: Munda weumwe munhu mufumi wakabereka kwazvo;
Luke 12:17 akafunga mukati make, achiti: Ndichaitei? Nokuti handina nzvimbo pandingaunganidzira zvibereko zvangu.
Luke 12:18 Ndokuti: Ndichaita izvi: Ndichaputsa matura angu, ndivake makuru, ndiunganidzire zvirimwa zvangu zvese ipapo, nenhumbi dzangu,
Luke 12:19 ndigoti kumweya wangu: Mweya, une zvinhu zvakawanda zvakanaka, zvakachengeterwa makore mazhinji; zorora, idya, inwa, fara.
Luke 12:20 Asi Mwari akati kwaari: Dununu, usiku huno mweya wako uchadikanwa kubva kwauri; ko izvo zvawagadzirira, zvichava zvaani?
Luke 12:21 Zvakadaro <transChange type="added">kune</transChange> anozviunganidzira fuma, asi asina kufuma kuna Mwari. <div eID="gen750" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen748" type="section"/>
Luke 12:22 Zvino wakati kuvadzidzi vake: Naizvozvo ndinoti kwamuri: Musafunganya pamusoro peupenyu hwenyu, kuti muchadyei; kana muviri, kuti muchapfekei.
Luke 12:23 Upenyu hunopfuura kudya, nemuviri zvipfeko.
Luke 12:24 Fungai makunguvo, kuti haadzvari, kana kukohwa, haana tsapi kana dura; asi Mwari anoafunda. Imwi munokunda zvikuru sei shiri?
Luke 12:25 Ndiani kwamuri nekufunganya angagona kuwedzera mbimbi imwe paurefu hwake?
Luke 12:26 Naizvozvo kana musingagoni kuita chinhu chidikisa, munofunganyirei pamusoro pezvimwe?
Luke 12:27 Fungai midovatova, <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> inokura sei; haishingairi, hairuki; asi ndinoti kwamuri: NaSoromoni mukubwinya kwake kwese, haana kupfekedzwa seumwe wayo.
Luke 12:28 Zvino kana Mwari achipfekedza saizvozvo uswa huri panyika nhasi, mangwana hwokandirwa muchoto, <transChange type="added">ucha</transChange>ku<transChange type="added">pfekedza</transChange>i nekupfuurisa sei, imwi verutendo rudiki?
Luke 12:29 Zvino imwi musatsvaka zvamuchadya kana zvamuchamwa; uye musazvidya moyo.
Luke 12:30 Nokuti zvinhu izvi zvese marudzi enyika anozvitsvaka; asi Baba venyu vanoziva kuti munoshaiwa izvozvi.
Luke 12:31 Asi tsvakai ushe hwaMwari, naizvozvi zvese zvichawedzerwa kwamuri.
Luke 12:32 Musatya boka diki; nokuti Baba venyu vanofara kukupai ushe. <div eID="gen752" type="x-p"/>
Luke 12:33 Tengesai izvo zvamunazvo mupe varombo zvipo. Muzviitire zvikwama zvisingashakari, fuma kumatenga isingaperi, pasina mbavha ingasvika kana zvifusi zvingaodza.
Luke 12:34 Nokuti pane fuma yenyu, ndipo pachavawo nemoyo wenyu. <div eID="gen753" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen751" type="section"/>
Luke 12:35 Zviuno zvenyu ngazvigare zvakasungwa, nemwenje ichipfuta.
Luke 12:36 Nemwi muve sevanhu vakarindira ishe wavo, pakudzoka kwake kumuchato, kuti kana achisvika akagogodza, vangamuzarurira pakarepo.
Luke 12:37 Vakaropafadzwa varanda avo, vanoti kana ishe achisvika anovawana vakarindira; zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Achazvisunga, akavagarisa pakudya, akaswedera akavashandira.
Luke 12:38 Kana akasvika nenguva yekurindira yechipiri, kana kusvika nenguva yekurindira yechitatu, akawana <transChange type="added">va</transChange>kadaro, vakaropafadzwa varanda ivavo.
Luke 12:39 Asi muzive izvi, kuti dai mwene weimba aiziva nderipi awa mbavha rainouya, angadai akarinda, akasatendera imba yake kuti ipazwe.
Luke 12:40 Naizvozvo imwiwo ivai makazvigadzirira; nokuti neawa ramusingafungiri Mwanakomana wemunhu anouya. <div eID="gen755" type="x-p"/>
Luke 12:41 Petro ndokuti kwaari: Ishe, munoutaura mufananidzo uyu kwatiri, kana kune vesewo?
Luke 12:42 Ishe ndokuti: Ko ndiani zvino mutariri wakatendeka uye wakachenjera, ishe waachagadza pamusoro pevaranda vake, kuti ape mugove wekudya nenguva yakafanira?
Luke 12:43 Wakaropafadzwa muranda uyo, unoti kana ishe wake achisvika, amuwane achiita saizvozvo.
Luke 12:44 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Achamugadza pamusoro pezvese zvaanazvo.
Luke 12:45 Asi kana muranda uyo akati mumoyo make: Ishe wangu wanonoka kuuya; akatanga kurova varandarume nevarandakadzi, nekudya, nekunwa, nekuraradza;
Luke 12:46 ishe wemuranda uyo achasvika pazuva raasingatarisiri, uye paawa raasingazivi, akamugura nepakati, akagura mugove wake pamwe nevasakatendeka. <div eID="gen756" type="x-p"/>
Luke 12:47 Muranda uyo waiziva chido chaishe wake, akasagadzirira, kana kuita zvinoenderana nechido chake, acharohwa ne<transChange type="added">shamhu</transChange> zhinji.
Luke 12:48 Asi wakange asingazivi, akaita zvakafanira kurohwa, acharohwa ne<transChange type="added">shamhu</transChange> shoma. Uye wese wakapiwa zvizhinji, zvizhinji zvichatsvakwa kwaari; neanobatiswa zvizhinji, vachareva zvinopfuurisa kwaari. <div eID="gen757" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen754" type="section"/>
Luke 12:49 Ndakauya kuzokanda moto panyika, zvino ndichadei kana watobatidzwa?
Luke 12:50 Asi ndine rubhabhatidzo rwandichabhabhatidzwa narwo, zvino ndinomanikidzwa sei kusvikira rwuchipedziswa.
Luke 12:51 Munofunga kuti ndakauya kuzopa rugare panyika here? Kwete, ndinoti kwamuri, asi kutozopesanisa.
Luke 12:52 Nokuti kubva zvino vashanu muimba imwe vachapesana, vatatu vachipikisana nevaviri, uye vaviri vachipikisana nevatatu,
Luke 12:53 vachapesana, baba vachipikisana nemwanakomana, nemwanakomana achipikisana nababa; mai vachipikisana nemukunda, nemukunda achipikisana namai; vamwene vachipikisana nemuroora wavo, nemuroora achipikisana navamwene vake. <div eID="gen759" type="x-p"/>
Luke 12:54 Akatiwo kuzvaunga: Kana muchiona gore richisimuka kubva kumavirira, pakarepo munoti: Mvura inouya; zvodaro.
Luke 12:55 Uye kana <transChange type="added">muchiona</transChange> mhepo yechamhembe ichivhuvhuta munoti: Kuchapisa; zvoitika.
Luke 12:56 Vanyepedzeri! Munoziva kuongorora zvimiro zvekudenga nezvenyika, asi hamuongorori sei nguva ino? <div eID="gen760" type="x-p"/>
Luke 12:57 Ko asi munoregerei nemwi kuzvitongera momene zvakarurama?
Luke 12:58 Nokuti kana uchienda kumutungamiriri nemudzivisi wako, ita zvakanaka kuti usunungurwe kubva kwaari muri munzira; kuti arege kukukwevera kumutongi, mutongi akukumikidze kumupurisa, mupurisa akukande mutirongo.
Luke 12:59 Ndinoti kwauri: Haungatongobudimo, kusvikira waripa kunyange kamari kekupedzisira. <chapter eID="Luke.12"/><div eID="gen761" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen758" type="section"/>
Luke 13:0 <div sID="gen762" type="section"/> <chapter n="13" osisID="Luke.13" sID="Luke.13"/>  <div sID="gen763" type="x-p"/>
Luke 13:1 Zvino panguva iyo kwakange kune vamwe vakamuudza zveVaGarirea, ropa ravo Pirato raakange avhenganisa nezvibairo zvavo.
Luke 13:2 Zvino Jesu achipindura wakati kwavari: Munofunga kuti VaGarirea ava vaiva vatadzi kupfuura VaGarirea vese here, nokuti vakatambudzika zvinhu zvakadai?
Luke 13:3 Ndinoti kwamuri: Kwete, asi kana musingatendeuki, mese muchaparara saizvozvo.
Luke 13:4 Kana vaya gumi nevasere, shongwe payakawira pamusoro pavo muSiroami ikavauraya, munofunga kuti ivo vakange vane ngava kukunda vanhu vese vaigara muJerusarema here?
Luke 13:5 Ndinoti kwamuri: Kwete, asi kana musingatendeuki, mese muchaparara saizvozvo. <div eID="gen763" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen762" type="section"/>
Luke 13:6 Zvino wakataura mufananidzo uyu <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Umwe wakange ane muonde wakange wakasimwa mumunda wake wemizambiringa; akasvika achitsvaka chibereko kwauri, asi wakashaiwa.
Luke 13:7 Zvino wakati kumurimi wemunda wemizambiringa: Tarira, makore matatu ndichiuya ndichitsvaka chibereko pamuonde uyu, ndikashaiwa; uteme, unourayirei kunyange ivhu?
Luke 13:8 Iye achipindura wakati kwaari: Ishe, muregei gore rinowo, kusvikira nditimbe ndichiupoteredza, nekuuisa mupfudze;
Luke 13:9 zvino kana ukabereka chibereko, <transChange type="added">zvakanaka</transChange>; asi kana zvikasa<transChange type="added">daro</transChange>, shure kweizvozvo mungazoutema. <div eID="gen765" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen764" type="section"/>
Luke 13:10 Zvino waiva achidzidzisa mune rimwe remasinagoge nesabata;
Luke 13:11 zvino tarira, kwaiva kune mukadzi waiva nemweya weundonda makore gumi nemasere, wakange akakombama <transChange type="added">musana</transChange>, asingagoni kutasamuka zvizere.
Luke 13:12 Zvino Jesu wakati achimuona, aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>danira kwaari, akati kwaari: Mukadzi, wasunungurwa paundonda hwako.
Luke 13:13 Ndokuisa maoko pamusoro pake; pakarepo akatasanudzwa, akarumbidza Mwari.
Luke 13:14 Asi mutungamiriri wesinagoge wakapindura akatsamwa nokuti Jesu wakaporesa nesabata, akati kuchaunga: Pane mazuva matanhatu anofanira kubatwa nawo; naizvozvo uyai naiwayo muporeswe, asi kwete nemusi wesabata.
Luke 13:15 Naizvozvo Ishe wakamupindura, akati: Munyepedzeri, umwe neumwe wenyu haangasununguri nzombe yake kana mbongoro pachidyiro nesabata akaitungamidza kunoinwisa here?
Luke 13:16 Zvino uyu, ari mukunda waAbhurahama, Satani waakange akasunga, tarira, makore gumi nemasere, hazvina kufanira kuti asunungurwe pachisungo ichi nezuva resabata here?
Luke 13:17 Zvino achireva zvinhu izvi, vapikisi vake vese vakanyadziswa; asi chaunga chese chakafara nezvinhu zvese zvinorumbidzwa zvakaitwa naye. <div eID="gen767" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen766" type="section"/>
Luke 13:18 Zvino akati: Ushe hwaMwari hwakaita sei? Uye ndichahufananidza nei?
Luke 13:19 Hwakaita setsanga yemasitadha, munhu yaakatora akakanda mubindu rake; ikakura, ikaita muti mukuru, neshiri dzekudenga dzikavaka matendere pamatavi awo.
Luke 13:20 Akatizve: Ndichahufananidza nei ushe hwaMwari?
Luke 13:21 Hwakaita sembiriso, mukadzi yaakatora akaiisa muzviyero zvitatu zveupfu, kusvikira hwese hwaviriswa. <div eID="gen769" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen768" type="section"/>
Luke 13:22 Zvino wakafamba achipfuura mumaguta nemisha achidzidzisa, ari munzira kuenda kuJerusarema.
Luke 13:23 Umwe ndokuti kwaari: Ishe, vachaponeswa vashoma here? Akati kwavari:
Luke 13:24 Rwisai kupinda nesuwo rakamanikana; nokuti vazhinji, ndinoti kwamuri, vachatsvaka kupinda, asi havangagoni.
Luke 13:25 Shure kwekunge mwene weimba asimuka avhara mukova, zvino mukatanga kumira kunze nekugogodza pamukova, muchiti: Ishe, Ishe, tizarurirei; iye agopindura achiti kwamuri: Handikuziviyi kwamunobva.
Luke 13:26 Ipapo muchatanga kuti: Takadya nekunwa pamberi penyu, uye makadzidzisa panzira dzekwedu.
Luke 13:27 Asi achati: Ndinoti kwamuri: Handikuziviyi kwamunobva; ibvai kwandiri imwi mese vaiti vezvakaipa.
Luke 13:28 Apo pachava nekuchema nekugeda-geda kwemeno, kana moona Abhurahama naIsaka naJakobho nevaporofita vese muushe hwaMwari, asi imwi marasirwa kunze.
Luke 13:29 Uye vachabva kumabvazuva nemavirira, uye kubva kumaodzanyemba nechamhembe, vachagara pakudya muushe hwaMwari.
Luke 13:30 Zvino tarirai, varipo vekupedzisira vachava vekutanga, uye varipo vekutanga vachava vekupedzisira. <div eID="gen771" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen770" type="section"/>
Luke 13:31 Nezuva iroro kwakasvika vamwe VaFarisi, vachiti kwaari: Budai mubve pano, nokuti Herodhe anoda kukuurayai.
Luke 13:32 Akati kwavari: Endai, munoudza gava iro, <transChange type="added">muti</transChange>: Tarira, ndinobudisa madhimoni nekuita kuporesa nhasi namangwana, neretatu ndinopedzeredza.
Luke 13:33 Asi zvakafanira kuti ndifambe nhasi namangwana nerinotevera, nokuti hazvigoneki kuti muporofita apararire kunze kweJerusarema.
Luke 13:34 Jerusarema, Jerusarema, iwe anouraya vaporofita, nekutaka nemabwe avo vanotumwa kwauri! Ndakange ndichida kazhinji sei kuunganidza vana vako semhambo hukwana dzayo pasi pemapapiro, asi hamuna kuda.
Luke 13:35 Tarirai, imba yenyu yasiiwa kwamuri riri dongo; asi zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Hamuchatongondioni, kusvikira zvasvika kuti muti: Ngaarumbidzwe iye anouya nezita raIshe! <chapter eID="Luke.13"/><div eID="gen773" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen772" type="section"/>
Luke 14:0 <div sID="gen774" type="section"/> <chapter n="14" osisID="Luke.14" sID="Luke.14"/>  <div sID="gen775" type="x-p"/>
Luke 14:1 Zvino zvakaitika pakupinda kwake mumba meumwe wevakuru kuVaFarisi kuzodya chingwa nesabata, kuti ivo vakamucherekedza.
Luke 14:2 Zvino tarira, kwakange kune umwe munhu pamberi pake waiva nerukandwe.
Luke 14:3 Jesu ndokupindura akataura kunyanzvi dzemutemo neVaFarisi, achiti: Zviri pamutemo here kuporesa nesabata?
Luke 14:4 Asi vakanyarara. Zvino aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>bata akamuporesa ndokurega achienda.
Luke 14:5 Akavapindura achiti: Ndiani wenyu, ungati ane mbongoro kana nzombe ikawira mugomba, akasaisimudza pakarepo nezuva resabata?
Luke 14:6 Vakasagona kumupindurazve pamusoro pezvinhu izvi. <div eID="gen775" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen774" type="section"/>
Luke 14:7 Zvino wakataura mufananidzo kune vakakokwa, achiona kuti vanosarudza sei zvigaro zvepamusoro, akati kwavari:
Luke 14:8 Kana wakokwa neumwe munhu kumuchato, usagara pachigaro chepamusoro; zvimwe umwe anokudzwa kupfuura iwe wakokwa naye,
Luke 14:9 zvino wakakukoka iwe naiye asvike ati kwauri: Dziurira uyu; ipapo uchatanga kutora nzvimbo yepasisa nenyadzi.
Luke 14:10 Asi kana wakokwa, enda ugare panzvimbo yepasisa, kuti kana uyo wakakukoka achisvika, angati kwauri: Shamwari, kwira kumusoro; zvino uchava nerukudzo pamberi pevagere pakudya newe.
Luke 14:11 Nokuti ani nani anozvikwiridzira, achaninipiswa; neanozvininipisa achakwiridzirwa. <div eID="gen777" type="x-p"/>
Luke 14:12 Ipapo akatiwo kune wakamukoka: Kana waita chisvusvuro kana chirairo, usadana shamwari dzako, kana vanakomana vamai vako, kana hama dzako, kana vavakidzani vafumi, zvimwe ivowo vangazokukokazve, ugoripirwa.
Luke 14:13 Asi kana waita mabiko, dana varombo, vanokamhina, mhetamakumbo, mapofu;
Luke 14:14 uye ucharopafadzwa, nokuti havana zvokukuripira nazvo, nokuti ucharipirwa pakumuka kwevakarurama. <div eID="gen778" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen776" type="section"/>
Luke 14:15 Umwe wevakange vagere naye pakudya wakati achinzwa zvinhu izvi, akati kwaari: Wakaropafadzwa uyo achadya chingwa paushe hwaMwari. <div eID="gen780" type="x-p"/>
Luke 14:16 Asi akati kwaari: Umwe munhu wakaita chirairo chikuru, akakokera vazhinji.
Luke 14:17 Akatuma muranda wake nenguva yekuraira kuti ati kune vakange vakakokwa: Uyai, nokuti zvese zvagadzirwa zvino.
Luke 14:18 Zvino vese vakatanga umwe neumwe kuzvikumbirira ruregerero. Wekutanga akati kwaari: Ndatenga munda, ndinofanira kuenda ndinomuona; ndinokukumbira, ini undiregerere.
Luke 14:19 Uye umwe akati: Ndatenga zvipani zvishanu zvenzombe, ndinoenda kunodziidza; ndinokumbira, ini undiregerere.
Luke 14:20 Uye umwe akati: Ndawana mukadzi, naizvozvo handigoni kuuya.
Luke 14:21 Zvino muranda uyo wakauya akapira zvinhu izvi ishe wake. Ipapo mwene weimba akatsamwa, akati kumuranda wake: Buda nekukurumidza uende kumigwagwa nemunzira dzemuguta, upinze pano varombo, nevanokamhina, nemhetamakumbo, nemapofu.
Luke 14:22 Muranda ndokuti: Ishe, zvaitwa sezvamaraira, asi nzvimbo ichipo.
Luke 14:23 Ishe akati kumuranda: Buda kumigwagwa nekuuzhowa, ugombedzere vapinde, kuti imba yangu izadzwe.
Luke 14:24 Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Hakuna umwe kune varume avo vakakokwa acharavira chirairo changu. <div eID="gen781" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen779" type="section"/>
Luke 14:25 Zvino zvaunga zvikuru zvaifamba naye; akatendeuka akati kwavari:
Luke 14:26 Kana ani nani achiuya kwandiri, akasavenga baba vake namai, nemukadzi, nevana, nevanin'ina nemadzikoma, nehanzvadzi, hongu, kunyange neupenyu hwake, haagoni kuva mudzidzi wangu.
Luke 14:27 Zvino ani nani asingatakuri muchinjikwa wake akanditevera, haagoni kuva mudzidzi wangu. <div eID="gen783" type="x-p"/>
Luke 14:28 Nokuti ndiani wenyu, anoti achida kuvaka shongwe, asingatangi agara pasi, akaverenga madhuriro, kana ane zvekupedzesa?
Luke 14:29 Kuti zvimwe ateya nheyo akasagona kupedza, vese vanoona vanotanga kumuseka,
Luke 14:30 vachiti: Uyu munhu akatanga kuvaka, asi akakoniwa kupedzisa.
Luke 14:31 Kana ndeupi mambo, kana achienda kuhondo akamirisana neumwe mambo, asingatangi agara pasi, akafungisisa kuti angagona here nezvuru gumi kusangana neanouya akapikisana naye nezvuru makumi maviri?
Luke 14:32 Asi kana zvisa<transChange type="added">kadaro</transChange>, iye achiri kure, anotuma nhume, akumbire zverugare.
Luke 14:33 Saka saizvozvo, ani nani kwamuri asingasii zvese zvaanazvo, haagoni kuva mudzidzi wangu. <div eID="gen784" type="x-p"/>
Luke 14:34 Munyu wakanaka; asi kana munyu warasa kuvava, ucharungwa nei?
Luke 14:35 Hauchina kufanira kunyange pamunda, kana padutu remupfudze; vanourasira kunze. Ane nzeve dzekunzwa, ngaanzwe. <chapter eID="Luke.14"/><div eID="gen785" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen782" type="section"/>
Luke 15:0 <div sID="gen786" type="section"/> <chapter n="15" osisID="Luke.15" sID="Luke.15"/>  <div sID="gen787" type="x-p"/>
Luke 15:1 Zvino kwakaswedera kwaari vateresi nevatadzi vese, kuzomunzwa.
Luke 15:2 VaFarisi nevanyori vakatsutsumwa vachiti: Uyu anogamuchira vatadzi, achidya navo. <div eID="gen787" type="x-p"/>
Luke 15:3 Zvino wakavaudza mufananidzo uyu, achiti:
Luke 15:4 Ndeupi munhu kwamuri angati ane makwai zana, kana arasikirwa nerimwe rawo, asingasii makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe murenje, akatevera rakarasika kusvikira ariwana?
Luke 15:5 Uye kana a<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>wana, ano<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>isa pamafudzi ake achifara.
Luke 15:6 Zvino kana asvika kumusha, anodana pamwe shamwari nevavakidzani, achiti kwavari: Farai neni, nokuti ndawana gwai rangu rakange rarasika.
Luke 15:7 Ndinoti kwamuri: Saizvozvo mufaro uchava kudenga pamusoro pemutadzi umwe anotendeuka, kupfuura pamusoro pevakarurama makumi mapfumbamwe nevapfumbamwe, vasingatsvaki kutendeuka. <div eID="gen788" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen786" type="section"/>
Luke 15:8 Kana ndeupi mukadzi ane makobiri gumi, kana arasikirwa nekobiri rimwe, asingatungidzi mwenje, akatsvaira imba, akatsvakisisa kusvikira a<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>wana?
Luke 15:9 Uye kana a<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>wana, anodana shamwari nevavakidzani pamwe, achiti: Farai neni, nokuti ndawana kobiri randanga ndarasikirwa naro.
Luke 15:10 Saizvozvo, ndinokutaurirai, <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> mufaro uripo pamberi pevatumwa vaMwari pamusoro pemutadzi umwe anotendeuka. <div eID="gen790" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen789" type="section"/>
Luke 15:11 Zvino wakati: Umwe munhu aiva ane vanakomana vaviri;
Luke 15:12 mudiki wavo ndokuti kuna baba: Baba, ndipei mugove wenhumbi wakanangana <transChange type="added">neni</transChange>. Akavagovera nhumbi <transChange type="added">dzake</transChange>.
Luke 15:13 Pasina kupfuura mazuva mazhinji, mwanakomana mudiki wakaunganidza zvese pamwe, akasimuka akaenda kunyika iri kure; uye akaparadza ikoko nhaka yake, achirarama neunzenza.
Luke 15:14 Zvino wakati aparadza zvese, kwakauya nzara huru panyika iyo, iye akatanga kushaiwa.
Luke 15:15 Zvino wakaenda, akanozvibatanidza neumwe wezvizvarwa zvenyika iyo; akamutumira kuminda yake kunofudza nguruve.
Luke 15:16 Wakange achishuva kugutsa dumbu rake nemateko nguruve adzaidya; asi hakuna munhu waimupa.
Luke 15:17 Zvino wakati apengenuka, akati: Varikichi vazhinji sei vababa vangu vane zvingwa zvakawandisisa, asi ini ndofa nenzara.
Luke 15:18 Ndichasimuka ndiende kuna baba vangu, ndigoti kwavari: Baba, ndakatadzira kudenga, nepamberi penyu;
Luke 15:19 uye handichafaniri kunzi mwanakomana wenyu; ndiitei seumwe wevarikichi venyu.
Luke 15:20 Akasimuka akaenda kuna baba vake. Asi wakati achiri kure, baba vake vakamuona, vakanzwa tsitsi, vakamhanya ndokuwira pahuro pake, nekumutsvoda.
Luke 15:21 Zvino mwanakomana akati kwavari: Baba, ndakatadzira kudenga nepamberi penyu, uye handichafaniri kunzi mwanakomana wenyu.
Luke 15:22 Asi baba vakati kuvaranda vavo: Budai nenguvo refu yakanakisisa mumupfekedze, muise mhete paruoko rwake, nemanyatera patsoka;
Luke 15:23 muuye nemhuru yakakodzwa, mubaye, uye ngatidye tifare;
Luke 15:24 nokuti uyu mwanakomana wangu wakange afa, zvino wararamazve; wakange arasika, asi wawanikwa; zvino vakatanga kufara.
Luke 15:25 Zvino mwanakomana wake mukuru wakange ari kumunda; zvino wakati achisvika, oswedera paimba, akanzwa mumhanzi nekutamba.
Luke 15:26 Zvino wakadanira kwaari umwe wevaranda, akabvunza kuti izvi zvinorevei.
Luke 15:27 Zvino akati kwaari: Munin'ina wako wasvika; zvino baba vako vabaya mhuru yakakodzwa, nokuti vamugamuchira ari mutano.
Luke 15:28 Asi wakatsamwa, akasada kupinda; naizvozvo baba vake vakabuda, vakamukumbirisa.
Luke 15:29 Asi iye wakapindura akati kuna baba: Tarirai, makore mazhinji akadai ndakakubatirai, handina kutongodarika murairo wenyu, asi hamuna kutongondipa mbudzana, kuti ndifare neshamwari dzangu.
Luke 15:30 Asi mangoti mwanakomana wenyu uyu wakaparadza nhumbi dzenyu nezvifeve achisvika, mamubaira mhuru yakakodzwa.
Luke 15:31 Vakati kwaari: Mwana, iwe uneni nguva dzese, uye zvese zvangu ndezvako.
Luke 15:32 Asi kwaifanira kuti kupemberwe nekufarwa, nokuti munin'ina wako uyu wakange afa, wararamazve; wakange arasika, wawanikwa. <chapter eID="Luke.15"/><div eID="gen792" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen791" type="section"/>
Luke 16:0 <div sID="gen793" type="section"/> <chapter n="16" osisID="Luke.16" sID="Luke.16"/>  <div sID="gen794" type="x-p"/>
Luke 16:1 Zvino wakataurawo kuvadzidzi vake <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Kwakange kune umwe munhu mufumi, waiva nemutariri; iye wakapomerwa kwaari seanoparadza nhumbi dzake.
Luke 16:2 Zvino wakamudana akati kwaari: Chii ichi chandinonzwa nezvako? Rondedzera nezveutariri hwako; nokuti hauchazogoni kuva mutariri.
Luke 16:3 Zvino mutariri wakati mukati make: Ndichaitei, sezvo ishe wangu wonditorera utariri? Handigoni kuchera, kupemha ndinonyara.
Luke 16:4 Ndaziva zvandichaita, kuti kana ndabudiswa pautariri, vandigamuchire mudzimba dzavo.
Luke 16:5 Zvino wakadanira kwaari umwe neumwe wavakange vane chikwereti kuna ishe wake, akati kune wekutanga: Une chikwereti chakadini kuna ishe wangu?
Luke 16:6 Iye ndokuti: Zviyero zana zvemafuta. Ndokuti kwaari: Tora rugwaro rwako, ugare pasi nekukurumidza unyore makumi mashanu.
Luke 16:7 Ndokuti kune umwe: Newe, une chikwereti chakadini? Iye ndokuti: Zviyero zana zvezviyo. Akati kwaari: Tora rugwaro rwako, unyore makumi masere.
Luke 16:8 Zvino ishe wakarumbidza mutariri asakarurama, nokuti wakange aita nekuchenjera; nokuti vana venyika ino vakachenjera pazera ravo kukunda vana vechiedza.
Luke 16:9 Neni ndinoti kwamuri: Muzviitire shamwari nafuma wekusakarurama, kuti kana musingachagoni, vakugamuchirei mudzimba dzekusingaperi. <div eID="gen794" type="x-p"/>
Luke 16:10 Wakatendeka pachidikisa wakatendekawo pachikuru, neusakarurama pachidikisa haana kururamawo pachikuru.
Luke 16:11 Naizvozvo kana musina kutendeka pana fuma usakarurama, ndiani achakubatisai chinhu chechokwadi?
Luke 16:12 Uye kana musina kutendeka pane cheumwe, ndiani achakupai chenyu? <div eID="gen795" type="x-p"/>
Luke 16:13 Hakuna muranda anogona kubatira madzitenzi maviri; nokuti zvimwe achavenga umwe, ndokuda umwe; kana kuti achanamatira kune umwe, agozvidza umwe. Hamugoni kubatira Mwari nafuma. <div eID="gen796" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen793" type="section"/>
Luke 16:14 Zvino neVaFarisi vakange vari vadi vemari, vakanzwa zvinhu izvi zvese, vakamuseka.
Luke 16:15 Zvino wakati kwavari: Imwi ndimwi vanozviruramisa pamberi pevanhu, asi Mwari anoziva moyo yenyu; nokuti icho chinokwiridzirwa pakati pevanhu, chinyangadzo pamberi paMwari. <div eID="gen798" type="x-p"/>
Luke 16:16 Murairo nevaporofita <transChange type="added">zvaivapo</transChange> kusvikira kuna Johwani; kubva ipapo ushe hwaMwari hunoparidzwa, uye umwe neumwe anosenerera mahuri.
Luke 16:17 Asi zvakareruka kuti denga nenyika zvipfuure, pakuti chidodzi chimwe chemurairo chiwe. <div eID="gen799" type="x-p"/>
Luke 16:18 Ani nani anoramba mukadzi wake akawana umwe anoita upombwe; uye ani nani anowana wakarambwa kumurume anoita upombwe. <div eID="gen800" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen797" type="section"/>
Luke 16:19 Kwakange kune umwe munhu mufumi, waipfeka zvine ruvara rwehute nemicheka yakaisvonaka, nekufara paumbozha mazuva ese.
Luke 16:20 Zvino kwakange kune umwe mupemhi wainzi Razaro, wakange akaiswa pasuwo rake azere maronda,
Luke 16:21 uye waishuva kugutswa nezvimedu zvaiwa patafura yemufumi; asi kunyange imbwa dzaiuya dzichinanzva maronda ake.
Luke 16:22 Zvino zvakaitika kuti mupemhi wakafa, akatakurirwa nevatumwa kuchifuva chaAbhurahama; mufumi akafawo, akavigwa.
Luke 16:23 Zvino ari muhadhesi* wakasimudza meso ake, ari pamarwadzo, akaona Abhurahama ari kure, naRazaro ari pachifuva chake.
Luke 16:24 Iye ndokudanidzira akati: Baba Abhurahama, ndinzwirei tsitsi, mutume Razaro, kuti anyike muromo wemunwe wake mumvura, atonhodze rurimi rwangu; nokuti ndinorwadziswa mumurazvo uyu.
Luke 16:25 Asi Abhurahama wakati: Mwana, rangarira kuti iwe muupenyu hwako wakagamuchira zvakanaka zvako, saizvozvo naRazaro zvakaipa; asi zvino iye anonyaradzwa, uye iwe unorwadziwa.
Luke 16:26 Uye pamusoro peizvi zvese, pakati pedu nemwi pane mukaha mukuru wakaiswa, kuti vanoda kuyambuka kubva kuno vachiuya kwamuri vakonewe, neveko varege kuyambukira kwatiri.
Luke 16:27 Iye ndokuti: Naizvozvo ndinokukumbirisai, baba, kuti mumutumire kuimba yababa vangu,
Luke 16:28 nokuti ndine vanakomana vamai vangu vashanu, kuti anyatsovapupurira, zvimwe ivowo vangauya panzvimbo ino yemarwadzo.
Luke 16:29 Abhurahama akati kwaari: Mozisi nevaporofita vanavo; ngavanzwe ivo.
Luke 16:30 Iye ndokuti: Kwete, baba Abhurahama; asi kana umwe akaenda kwavari kubva kuvakafa, vachatendeuka.
Luke 16:31 Asi wakati kwaari: Kana vasingateereri Mozisi nevaporofita, havangatendiswi kunyange kana umwe akamuka kubva kuvakafa. <chapter eID="Luke.16"/><div eID="gen802" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen801" type="section"/>
Luke 17:0 <div sID="gen803" type="section"/> <chapter n="17" osisID="Luke.17" sID="Luke.17"/>  <div sID="gen804" type="x-p"/>
Luke 17:1 Zvino wakati kuvadzidzi: Hazvigoneki kuti zvigumbuso zvisauya; asi ane nhamo wazvinouya kubudikidza naye.
Luke 17:2 Zvaiva nani kwaari kuti guyo rinorema risungirirwe kupoteredza mutsipa wake, ndokukandirwa mugungwa, pakuti agumbuse umwe wevadiki ava.
Luke 17:3 Muzvichenjerere imwi. Zvino kana umwe wako akakutadzira, mutsiure; uye kana akatendeuka, mukanganwire.
Luke 17:4 Uye kana akutadzira kanomwe pazuva, akadzoka kwauri kanomwe pazuva, achiti: Ndatendeuka; uchamukanganwira. <div eID="gen804" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen803" type="section"/>
Luke 17:5 Zvino vaapositori vakati kuna Ishe: Wedzerai kwatiri rutendo.
Luke 17:6 Ishe ndokuti: Kana maiva nerutendo <transChange type="added">rwakaita</transChange> setsanga yemasitadha, maiti kumuhabhurosi uyu: Dzurwa, usimwe mugungwa; uye waikuteererai. <div eID="gen806" type="x-p"/>
Luke 17:7 Asi ndeupi kwamuri ane muranda anorima kana kufudza, achati pakarepo achipinda achibva kumunda: Swedera ugare pakudya?
Luke 17:8 Asi angarega here kuti kwaari: Gadzira zvandingaraira, uye uzvisunge chiuno, undishandire, kusvikira ndadya, ndikanwa; zvino mushure meizvozvi iwe udye nekunwa?
Luke 17:9 Anotenda muranda uyo nokuti wakaita zvarairwa here? Handifungi.
Luke 17:10 Saizvozvo nemwi, kana maita zvese zvamakarairwa, muti: Tiri varanda pasina, nokuti taita zvataifanira kuita. <div eID="gen807" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen805" type="section"/>
Luke 17:11 Zvino zvakaitika pakuenda kwake kuJerusarema, kuti iye wakapfuura nepakati peSamaria neGarirea. <div eID="gen809" type="x-p"/>
Luke 17:12 Zvino wakati achipinda mune umwe musha, varume gumi vaiva nemaperembudzi vakasangana naye, vamire kure.
Luke 17:13 Zvino ivo vakasimudza inzwi, vachiti: Jesu, Tenzi, tinzwirei tsitsi!
Luke 17:14 Zvino wakati achi<transChange type="added">va</transChange>ona, akati kwavari: Endai munozviratidza kuvapristi. Zvino zvakaitika kuti vachienda, vakanatswa.
Luke 17:15 Zvino umwe wavo paakaona kuti aporeswa, wakadzoka achikudza Mwari nenzwi guru;
Luke 17:16 ndokuwira pasi nechiso patsoka dzake, achimuvonga; zvino iye wakange ari muSamaria.
Luke 17:17 Asi Jesu wakapindura akati: Vanga vasiri gumi here vanatswa? Ko vapfumbamwe varipi?
Luke 17:18 Hapana kuwanikwa vadzokera kuzopa Mwari rukudzo, kunze kweuyu mutorwa.
Luke 17:19 Zvino akati kwaari: Simuka, enda; rutendo rwako rwakuponesa. <div eID="gen810" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen808" type="section"/>
Luke 17:20 Zvino wakati achibvunzwa neVaFarisi, kuti ushe hwaMwari hunosvika rinhi, akavapindura akati: Ushe hwaMwari hahuuyi nekuonekwa;
Luke 17:21 uye havangati: Tarirai pano; kana: Tarira uko. Nokuti tarirai, ushe hwaMwari huri mukati menyu. <div eID="gen812" type="x-p"/>
Luke 17:22 Zvino wakati kuvadzidzi: Mazuva achasvika amuchashuva kuona rimwe ramazuva eMwanakomana wemunhu, asi hamunga<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>oni.
Luke 17:23 Zvino vachati kwamuri: Tarirai pano; kana: Tarirai uko; regai kuenda, kana kutevera.
Luke 17:24 Nokuti semheni inopenya ichibva kune rumwe <transChange type="added">rutivi</transChange> pasi pedenga ichivhenekera kusvikira kune rumwe <transChange type="added">rutivi</transChange> pasi pedenga, saizvozvo zvichaitawo Mwanakomana wemunhu nezuva rake.
Luke 17:25 Asi kutanga anofanira kutambudzika zvinhu zvizhinji, nekurambwa nezera iri.
Luke 17:26 Uye sezvazvakange zvakaita mumazuva aNowa, ndizvo zvazvichavawo mumazuva eMwanakomana wemunhu.
Luke 17:27 Vaidya, vainwa, vaiwana, vachiwaniswa, kusvikira zuva iro Nowa raakapinda naro muareka, mafashame akasvika, ndokuvaparadza vese.
Luke 17:28 Saizvozvowo sezvazvakange zvakaita mumazuva aRoti; vaidya, vainwa, vaitenga, vaitengesa, vaidzvara, vaivaka;
Luke 17:29 asi nemusi Roti waakabuda muSodhoma, kwakanaya moto nesarufa zvichibva kudenga, zvikaparadza vese.
Luke 17:30 Zvichava seizvi nezuva Mwanakomana wemunhu raachabudiswa pachena naro.
Luke 17:31 Muzuva iro, uyo achava pamusoro pedenga reimba, nenhumbi dzake dziri mumba, ngaarege kuburuka ku<transChange type="added">ndo</transChange>dzitora; neari kumunda saizvozvo ngaarege kudzokera zvinhu zviri shure.
Luke 17:32 Yeukai mukadzi waRoti.
Luke 17:33 Ani nani anotsvaka kuponesa upenyu hwake acharasikirwa nahwo, uye ani nani anorasikirwa nahwo achahuraramisa.
Luke 17:34 Ndinoti kwamuri: Muusiku uhwo kuchava nevaviri pamubhedha umwe; umwe achatorwa, uye umwe achasiiwa.
Luke 17:35 Vaviri vachava vachikuya pamwe, umwe achatorwa, uye umwe achasiiwa.
Luke 17:36 Vaviri vachava mumunda; umwe achatorwa, uye umwe asiiwe.
Luke 17:37 Zvino vakapindura vakati kwaari: Kupi Ishe? Ndokuti kwavari: Pane mutumbi, ndipo pachaunganidzwa magora.  <chapter eID="Luke.17"/><div eID="gen813" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen811" type="section"/>
Luke 18:0 <div sID="gen814" type="section"/> <chapter n="18" osisID="Luke.18" sID="Luke.18"/>  <div sID="gen815" type="x-p"/>
Luke 18:1 Zvino wakavaudzawo mufananidzo kuti vanofanira kunyengetera nguva dzese, uye vasaora moyo,
Luke 18:2 achiti: Kwaiva mune rimwe guta neumwe mutongi, wakange asingatyi Mwari, uye asingaremekedzi munhu;
Luke 18:3 zvino kwakange kune chirikadzi muguta iro, yakange ichiuya kwaari, ichiti: Ndiruramisirei kumuvengi wangu.
Luke 18:4 Asi wakange asingadi kwenguva; asi pashure pezvinhu izvi wakati mukati make: Kunyange ndisingatyi Mwari, uye ndisingaremekedzi munhu;
Luke 18:5 asi nokuti chirikadzi iyi inonditambudza, ndichairuramisira, zvimwe pakupedzisira ingasvika pakunditsamwisa kwazvo.
Luke 18:6 Ishe ndokuti: Inzwai mutongi asakarurama zvaanoreva.
Luke 18:7 Ko Mwari haangaruramisiri here vakasanangurwa vake, vanodana kwaari masikati neusiku, kunyange achivanonokera?
Luke 18:8 Ndinoti kwamuri: Achakurumidza kuvaruramisira. Asi kana Mwanakomana wemunhu achisvika, achawana rutendo panyika here? <div eID="gen815" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen814" type="section"/>
Luke 18:9 Zvino wakareva mufananidzo uyu kune vamwewo vaizvivimba kuti vakarurama, vachizvidza vamwe, <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>:
Luke 18:10 Vanhu vaviri vakakwira kutembere kunonyengetera; umwe muFarisi, uye umwe muteresi.
Luke 18:11 MuFarisi wakamira akazvinyengeterera zvinhu izvi, <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Mwari, ndinokutendai kuti handina kufanana nevamwe vanhu, makororo, vasakarurama, mhombwe, kana kunyange semuteresi uyu.
Luke 18:12 Ndinotsanya kaviri pavhiki, ndinopa chegumi chezvese zvandinowana.
Luke 18:13 Asi muteresi amire kure wakasada kunyange kusimudzira meso kudenga, asi wakarova pachifuva chake, achiti: Mwari, ndinzwirei tsitsi ini mutadzi.
Luke 18:14 Ndinoti kwamuri: Uyu wakaburukira kumba kwake anzi wakarurama pane uya; nokuti umwe neumwe anozvikwiridzira achaninipiswa, uye anozvininipisa achakwiridzirwa. <div eID="gen817" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen816" type="section"/>
Luke 18:15 Zvino vakauisa kwaari vachechewo, kuti avabate; asi vadzidzi vakati vachi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ona, vakavatsiura.
Luke 18:16 Asi Jesu wakadanira ivo <transChange type="added">vacheche</transChange> kwaari akati: Tenderai vacheche vauye kwandiri, musavadzivisa, nokuti ushe hwaMwari ndehwevakadai.
Luke 18:17 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Ani nani asingagamuchiri ushe hwaMwari semucheche, haangatongopindi mahuri. <div eID="gen819" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen818" type="section"/>
Luke 18:18 Zvino umwe mutungamiriri wakamubvunza, achiti: Mudzidzisi wakanaka, ndiitei kuti ndigare nhaka yeupenyu husingaperi?
Luke 18:19 Jesu ndokuti kwaari: Unondiidzirei wakanaka? Hakuna wakanaka, kunze kweumwe, Mwari.
Luke 18:20 Mirairo unoiziva, <transChange type="added">inoti</transChange>: Usaita upombwe, usauraya, usaba, usapupura nhema, kudza baba vako namai vako.
Luke 18:21 Iye ndokuti: Izvi zvese ndakazvichengeta kubva paudiki hwangu.
Luke 18:22 Zvino Jesu wakati achinzwa zvinhu izvi akati kwaari: Uchiri kushaiwa chinhu chimwe; tengesa zvese zvaunazvo, ugovere varombo, uye uchava nefuma yakakosha kudenga; ugouya pano wonditevera.
Luke 18:23 Zvino wakati anzwa zvinhu izvi, akashungurudzika zvikuru; nokuti wakange akafuma zvikuru. <div eID="gen821" type="x-p"/>
Luke 18:24 Zvino Jesu wakati achiona kuti washungurudzika zvikuru akati: Zvicharemera sei vane fuma kupinda muushe hwaMwari.
Luke 18:25 Nokuti zvakareruka kuti kamera ripinde richidarika nemuburi retsono, kumufumi kupinda muushe hwaMwari.
Luke 18:26 Zvino avo vakanzwa, vakati: Zvino ndiani anogona kuponeswa?
Luke 18:27 Asi iye akati: Zvinhu zvisingagoneki nevanhu, zvinogoneka naMwari. <div eID="gen822" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen820" type="section"/>
Luke 18:28 Petro ndokuti: Tarirai, isu takasiya zvese, tikakuteverai.
Luke 18:29 Zvino akati kwavari: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Hakuna munhu wakasiya imba, kana vabereki, kana madzikoma nevanin'ina, kana mukadzi, kana vana, nekuda kweushe hwaMwari,
Luke 18:30 asingazogamuchiri zvakapetwa kazhinji nenguva ino, nemunguva inouya upenyu husingaperi. <div eID="gen824" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen823" type="section"/>
Luke 18:31 Zvino wakatora vanegumi nevaviri, akati kwavari: Tarirai, tinokwira kuJerusarema, uye zvinhu zvese zvakanyorwa nevaporofita maererano neMwanakomana wemunhu zvichazadziswa.
Luke 18:32 Nokuti achakumikidzwa kune vechirudzi, agosekwa, nekuitirwa zvakaipa, nekupfirwa,
Luke 18:33 uye vacha<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>rova netyava <transChange type="added">uye</transChange> vachamuuraya; uye pazuva retatu achamukazve.
Luke 18:34 Asi ivo havana kunzwisisa chinhu chimwe cheizvozvi, uye shoko iri rakange rakavanzwa kwavari, uye havana kunzwisisa zvinhu zvakarehwa. <div eID="gen826" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen825" type="section"/>
Luke 18:35 Zvino zvakaitika oswedera Jeriko, rimwe bofu raigara padivi penzira richipemha;
Luke 18:36 rakati richinzwa chaunga chichipfuura, rikabvunza kuti chinyi ichi.
Luke 18:37 Zvino vakariudza kuti: Jesu weNazareta anopfuura.
Luke 18:38 Zvino rakadanidzira richiti: Jesu Mwanakomana waDhavhidhi, ndinzwirei tsitsi!
Luke 18:39 Zvino vakange vakatungamira vakaritsiura kuti rinyarare; asi iro rakanyanyisa kudanidzira, <transChange type="added">richiti</transChange>: Mwanakomana waDhavidhi, ndinzwirei tsitsi!
Luke 18:40 Zvino Jesu wakamira, akaraira kuti riuyiswe kwaari; zvino rakati raswedera akaribvunza,
Luke 18:41 achiti: Unoda kuti ndikuitirei? Zvino rakati: Ishe, kuti ndionezve.
Luke 18:42 Jesu ndokuti kwaari: Chionazve! Rutendo rwako rwakuponesa.
Luke 18:43 Pakarepo rikaonazve, rikamutevera, richirumbidza Mwari; vanhu vese vakati vachi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ona vakarumbidza Mwari. <chapter eID="Luke.18"/><div eID="gen828" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen827" type="section"/>
Luke 19:0 <div sID="gen829" type="section"/> <chapter n="19" osisID="Luke.19" sID="Luke.19"/>  <div sID="gen830" type="x-p"/>
Luke 19:1 Zvino <transChange type="added">Jesu</transChange> wakapinda, akagura muJeriko.
Luke 19:2 Zvino tarira, murume wainzi Zakewu nezita; iye wakange ari mutungamiriri wevateresi, uye iye waiva mufumi;
Luke 19:3 uye wakatsvaka kuona Jesu kuti ndiani; asi wakange asingagoni nekuda kwechaunga, nokuti wakange ane chimiro chifupi.
Luke 19:4 Zvino wakamhanyira mberi, akakwira mumuonde wemusikamori kuti amuone; nokuti wakange achizopfuura ne<transChange type="added">nzira</transChange> iyo.
Luke 19:5 Zvino Jesu wakati achisvika panzvimbo iyo, wakatarira kumusoro, akamuona, akati kwaari: Zakewu, kurumidza uburuke; nokuti nhasi ndinofanira kugara mumba mako.
Luke 19:6 Zvino wakakurumidza kuburuka, akamugamuchira achifara.
Luke 19:7 Zvino vakati va<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ona vakan'un'una vese vachiti: Wapinda kunogara nemurume mutadzi.
Luke 19:8 Asi Zakewu wakamira, akati kuna Ishe: Tarirai, hafu yefuma yangu, Ishe, ndinopa kuvarombo, uye kana ndakatora chinhu kune umwe munhu nekunyengera, ndinodzosera runa.
Luke 19:9 Jesu akati kwaari: Nhasi ruponeso rwasvika mumba muno; nokuti iyewo mwanakomana waAbhurahama.
Luke 19:10 Nokuti Mwanakomana wemunhu wakauya kuzotsvaka nekuponesa chakarasika. <div eID="gen830" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen829" type="section"/>
Luke 19:11 Vakati vanzwa zvinhu izvi, wakawedzera akataura mufananidzo, nokuti wakange ava pedo neJerusarema, uye <transChange type="added">nekuti</transChange> vaifunga kuti ushe hwaMwari hwobva hwodoonekereswa.
Luke 19:12 Naizvozvo wakati: Umwe munhu ane mbiri wakaenda kunyika iri kure, kunozvigamuchirira ushe agodzoka.
Luke 19:13 Zvino wakadana varanda vake gumi, ndokuvapa pondo gumi, ndokuti kwavari: Bhindaukai <transChange type="added">nayo</transChange> kusvikira ndichiuya.
Luke 19:14 Asi vanhu venyika yake vakange vachimuvenga, vakatuma nhume shure kwake, vachiti: Hatidi uyu kuti atitonge.
Luke 19:15 Zvino zvakaitika kuti adzoka agamuchira ushe, wakaraira kuti vaya varanda vaakange apa mari, vadanirwe kwaari, kuti anzwe kuti umwe neumwe wakawana zvakadini nekutengeserana.
Luke 19:16 Wekutanga ndokusvika, achiti: Ishe, pondo yenyu yawana pondo gumi.
Luke 19:17 Zvino akati kwaari: Zvakanaka, muranda wakanaka; nokuti wakange wakatendeka pachidiki-diki, uve nesimba pamusoro pemaguta gumi.
Luke 19:18 Newechipiri wakasvika, achiti: Ishe, pondo yenyu yawana pondo shanu.
Luke 19:19 Akati kwaariwo: Newe, uve pamusoro pemaguta mashanu.
Luke 19:20 Zvino umwe wakasvika, achiti: Ishe, tarirai pondo yenyu, yandakange ndakachengeta mumucheka wekumeso;
Luke 19:21 nokuti ndakange ndichikutyai, nokuti muri munhu wakaoma; munotora zvamusina kuisa, muchikohwa izvo zvamusina kudzvara.
Luke 19:22 Zvino wakati kwaari: Ndichakutonga <transChange type="added">nezvino</transChange>buda mumuromo mako, muranda wakaipa; wakange uchiziva kuti ini ndiri munhu wakaoma, ndichitora zvandisakaisa, nekukohwa izvo zvandisina kudzvara;
Luke 19:23 naizvozvo sei usina kuisa mari yangu mubhanga, kuti kana ndouya ndigozoitora pamwe nezvibereko.
Luke 19:24 Ndokuti kune vakange vamirepo: Mutorerei pondo mupe kune ane pondo gumi.
Luke 19:25 Asi vakati kwaari: Ishe, ane pondo gumi.
Luke 19:26 Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Anazvo achapiwa; uye asina, kwaari kuchatorwa nezvaanazvo.
Luke 19:27 Asi vavengi vangu avo, vakange vasingadi kuti nditonge pamusoro pavo, uisai pano, mu<transChange type="added">va</transChange>uraye pamberi pangu.
Luke 19:28 Zvino wakati areva zvinhu izvi, akapfuurira mberi, achikwira kuJerusarema. <div eID="gen832" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen831" type="section"/>
Luke 19:29 Zvino zvakaitika oswedera kuBhetifage neBhetaniya pagomo rinonzi reMiorivhi, wakatuma vaviri vevadzidzi vake,
Luke 19:30 achiti: Fambai muende mumusha wakatarisana <transChange type="added">nemwi</transChange>; kana muchipinda mauri, muchawana dhongwana rakasungirwa, risina munhu wakamborigara; murisunungure, mugo<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>uisa.
Luke 19:31 Zvino kana chero munhu akakubvunzai <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Muno<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>sunungurirei? Muchataura kwaari kudai: Ishe anorida.
Luke 19:32 Avo vakatumwa vakaenda vakanowana sezvaakange ataura kwavari.
Luke 19:33 Zvino vakati vachisunungura dhongwana, varidzi varo vakati kwavari: Munosunungurirei dhongwana?
Luke 19:34 Ivo ndokuti: Ishe anorida.
Luke 19:35 Zvino vakariuisa kuna Jesu; ndokukanda nguvo dzavo pamusoro pedhongwana, vakatasvisa Jesu pariri.
Luke 19:36 Zvino achifamba, vakawarira nguvo dzavo munzira.
Luke 19:37 Zvino wakati oswedera ikozvino pamateru egomo reMiorivhi, chaunga chese chevadzidzi chikatanga kufara chichirumbidza Mwari nenzwi guru pamusoro pamabasa ese esimba avakange vaona,
Luke 19:38 vachiti: Wakaropafadzwa mambo anouya muzita raIshe; rugare kudenga, nekubwinya kumusoro-soro.
Luke 19:39 Uye vamwe veVaFarisi vari pakati pechaunga vakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, tsiurai vadzidzi venyu.
Luke 19:40 Zvino wakapindura akati kwavari: Ndinokuudzai kuti kana ava vakanyarara, mabwe achadanidzira. <div eID="gen834" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen833" type="section"/>
Luke 19:41 Zvino wakati aswedera, wakaona guta, akachema pamusoro paro,
Luke 19:42 achiti: Dai newe waiziva, kunyange pazuva rino rako zvinhu zverugare rwako; asi zvino zvakavanzirwa meso ako.
Luke 19:43 Nokuti mazuva achasvika pamusoro pako, apo vavengi vako vachakukandira muchinjiziri wakakupoteredza, vachakukomba, nekukudzvinyidzira pamativi ese,
Luke 19:44 uye vachakuputsira pasi iwe nevana vako mukati mako, havangasii mukati mako ibwe pamusoro pebwe; nokuti hauna kuziva nguva yekushanyirwa kwako. <div eID="gen836" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen835" type="section"/>
Luke 19:45 Zvino wakapinda mutembere, akatanga kudzingira panze vakange vachitengesamo nevaitenga,
Luke 19:46 achiti kwavari: Kwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Imba yangu imba yemunyengetero; asi imwi maiita bako remakororo. <div eID="gen838" type="x-p"/>
Luke 19:47 Zvino waidzidzisa zuva rimwe nerimwe mutembere; asi vapristi vakuru nevanyori nevakuru vevanhu vakatsvaka kumuparadza.
Luke 19:48 Asi havana kuwana zvavangaita, nokuti vanhu vese vakamunamatira vachi<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>nzwa. <chapter eID="Luke.19"/><div eID="gen839" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen837" type="section"/>
Luke 20:0 <div sID="gen840" type="section"/> <chapter n="20" osisID="Luke.20" sID="Luke.20"/>  <div sID="gen841" type="x-p"/>
Luke 20:1 Zvino zvakaitika parimwe remazuva iwayo, achidzidzisa vanhu mutembere nekuparidza evhangeri, vapristi vakuru nevanyori vakasvika nevakuru,
Luke 20:2 ndokutaura kwaari vachiti: Tiudzei, munoita zvinhu izvi nesimba ripi, kana ndiani iye wakakupai simba iri?
Luke 20:3 Zvino wakapindura akati kwavari: Ini ndichakubvunzaiwo shoko rimwe; uye mundiudze:
Luke 20:4 Rubhabhatidzo rwaJohwani rwakabva kudenga, kana kuvanhu?
Luke 20:5 Zvino vakarangana, vachiti: Kana tikati: Kudenga; achati: Naizvozvo makaregerei kumutenda?
Luke 20:6 Asi kana tikati: Kuvanhu; vanhu vese vachatitaka nemabwe; nokuti vaiva nechokwadi kuti Johwani waiva muporofita.
Luke 20:7 Vakapindura, <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange> havazivi kwa<transChange type="added">rwa</transChange>kabva.
Luke 20:8 Jesu ndokuti kwavari: Neni handikuudzii kuti ndinoita zvinhu izvi nesimba ripi. <div eID="gen841" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen840" type="section"/>
Luke 20:9 Zvino wakatanga kuudza vanhu mufananidzo uyu: Umwe munhu wakasima munda wemizambiringa, akauhaisa kuvarimi, akaenda parwendo nguva refu;
Luke 20:10 zvino nenguva yakafanira wakatuma muranda kuvarimi, kuti vamupe zvechibereko chemunda wemizambiringa; asi varimi vakamurova, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>endesa asina chinhu.
Luke 20:11 Zvino wakatumazve umwe muranda; naiye vakamurovawo vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>nyadzisa, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>endesa asina chinhu.
Luke 20:12 Zvino wakatumazve wechitatu; uyuwo ndokumukuvadza, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>kandira kunze.
Luke 20:13 Zvino mwene wemunda wemizambiringa wakati: Ndichaitei? Ndichatuma mwanakomana wangu anodikanwa, zvimwe vakaona iye vacha<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>kudza.
Luke 20:14 Asi varimi vakati vachimuona vakarangana, vachiti: Uyu ndiye mugari wenhaka; uyai, ngatimuuraye, kuti nhaka igova yedu.
Luke 20:15 Vakamukandira kunze kwemunda wemizambiringa, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>uraya. Naizvozvo mwene wemunda wemizambiringa achavaitirei?
Luke 20:16 Achauya, ndokuparadza varimi ivava, agopa munda wemizambiringa vamwe. Zvino vachinzwa, vakati: Zvisadaro!
Luke 20:17 Asi wakavatarisa, akati: Naizvozvo chii ichi chakanyorwa, <transChange type="added">chinoti</transChange>: Ibwe vavaki ravakaramba, ndiro rava musoro wekona?
Luke 20:18 Wese anowira pamusoro pebwe iro, achavhuniwa-vhuniwa; asi ani nani warinowira pamusoro richamukuya. <div eID="gen843" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen842" type="section"/>
Luke 20:19 Zvino vapristi vakuru nevanyori neawa iroro vakatsvaka kuisa maoko paari, asi vakatya vanhu; nokuti vakaziva kuti wakareva mufananidzo uyu akanangana navo. <div eID="gen845" type="x-p"/>
Luke 20:20 Vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>cherekedza, vakatumira vashori vakanyepedzera kuva vakarurama, kuti vamubate pakutaura, kuti vamukumikidze kuushe nesimba remutungamiriri.
Luke 20:21 Zvino vakamubvunza, vachiti: Mudzidzisi, tinoziva kuti munotaura nekudzidzisa zvakarurama, uye hamugamuchiri chiso, asi munodzidzisa nzira yaMwari muchokwadi.
Luke 20:22 Zviri pamutemo here kwatiri kupa mutero kuna Kesari, kana kwete?
Luke 20:23 Asi wakaziva unyengeri hwavo, akati kwavari: Munondiidzirei?
Luke 20:24 Ndiratidzei dhenario*; rine mufananidzo nerunyoro rwaani? Vakapindura vakati: ZvaKesari.
Luke 20:25 Ndokuti kwavari: Naizvozvo dzorerai kuna Kesari zvinhu zvaKesari, nekuna Mwari zvinhu zvaMwari.
Luke 20:26 Vakakoniwa kumubata neshoko <transChange type="added">rake</transChange> pamberi pevanhu; vakashamisika nemhinduro yake; vakanyarara. <div eID="gen846" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen844" type="section"/>
Luke 20:27 Zvino kwakaswedera vamwe veVaSadhusi, vanoramba kuti kune kumuka, ndokumubvunza,
Luke 20:28 vachiti: Mudzidzisi, Mozisi wakatinyorera <transChange type="added">kuti:</transChange> Kana mukoma wemunhu akafa ane mukadzi, asi iye akafa asina vana, munin'ina wake atore mukadzi, amutsire mukoma wake mbeu.
Luke 20:29 Naizvozvo kwakange kune vanakomana vemunhu umwe vanomwe; wekutanga ndokutora mukadzi, akafa asina mwana;
Luke 20:30 newechipiri akatora mukadzi uyo, neuyu akafa asina mwana;
Luke 20:31 newechitatu akamutora. Zvikadarowo nevanomwe, uye vakasasiya vana, vakafa.
Luke 20:32 Pakupedzisira kwavo vese mukadzi wakafawo.
Luke 20:33 Naizvozvo pakumuka, achava mukadzi waani kwavari? Nokuti vanomwe vakava naye semukadzi. <div eID="gen848" type="x-p"/>
Luke 20:34 Zvino Jesu wakapindura akati kwavari: Vana venyika ino vanowana, vanowaniswa;
Luke 20:35 asi avo vachanzi vakafanira kuwana nyika iyo nekumuka kubva kuvakafa havawani kana kuwaniswa;
Luke 20:36 nokuti havagoni kufazve; nokuti vakaita sevatumwa, uye vanakomana vaMwari, vari vanakomana vekumuka.
Luke 20:37 Asi kuti vakafa vanomutswa, kunyange Mozisi wakaratidza pagwenzi reminzwa, paakaidza Ishe Mwari waAbhurahama, naMwari waIsaka, naMwari waJakobho.
Luke 20:38 Nokuti haasi Mwari wevakafa, asi wevapenyu; nokuti vese vanoraramira iye. <div eID="gen849" type="x-p"/>
Luke 20:39 Zvino vamwe vevanyori vakapindura vakati: Mudzidzisi, mataura zvakanaka.
Luke 20:40 Uye havana kuzoshinga kumubvunzazve chinhu. <div eID="gen850" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen847" type="section"/>
Luke 20:41 Zvino wakati kwavari: Vanoreva sei kuti Kristu Mwanakomana waDavhidhi?
Luke 20:42 Nokuti Dhavhidhi pachake wakareva mubhuku reMapisarema <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Ishe wakati kuna Ishe wangu: Gara kuruoko rwangu rwerudyi,
Luke 20:43 kusvikira ndaita vavengi vako chitsiko chetsoka dzako.
Luke 20:44 Naizvozvo Dhavhidhi anomuidza Ishe, ko Mwanakomana wake sei? <div eID="gen852" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen851" type="section"/>
Luke 20:45 Zvino vanhu vese vachakateerera, wakati kuvadzidzi vake:
Luke 20:46 Chenjerai vanyori, vanoda kufamba nenguvo refu, uye vanoda kwaziso pamisika, nezvigaro zvepamusorosa mumasinagoge, nezvigaro zvemberi pazvirairo;
Luke 20:47 vanodya dzimba dzechirikadzi, vanonyepedzera nekuita minyengetero mirefu; ivavo vachagamuchira mutongo mukuru. <chapter eID="Luke.20"/><div eID="gen854" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen853" type="section"/>
Luke 21:0 <div sID="gen855" type="section"/> <chapter n="21" osisID="Luke.21" sID="Luke.21"/>  <div sID="gen856" type="x-p"/>
Luke 21:1 Zvino wakati atarira kumusoro akaona vafumi vachikanda zvipo zvavo muchivigiro chezvipo.
Luke 21:2 Uye wakaonawo imwe chirikadzi murombo ichikandamo tumari twemhangura tuviri.
Luke 21:3 Ndokuti: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Chirikadzi iyi murombo yakanda kupfuura vese;
Luke 21:4 nokuti avo vese vakanda muzvipo zvaMwari pamuraudziro wavo, asi iye, paurombo hwake wakanda chese chaaiva nacho chaairarama <transChange type="added">nacho</transChange>. <div eID="gen856" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen855" type="section"/>
Luke 21:5 Zvino vamwe vachiri kutaura pamusoro petembere, kuti yakange yakashongedzwa nemabwe akanaka nezvipo, wakati:
Luke 21:6 Zvinhu izvi zvamunoona, mazuva achasvika okuti ibwe harizosiiwi pamusoro pebwe, risingazoputsirwi pasi. <div eID="gen858" type="x-p"/>
Luke 21:7 Zvino vakamubvunza, vachiti: Mudzidzisi, ko zvinhu izvi zvichava rinhi? Nechiratidzo chii, kana izvozvi zvoitika?
Luke 21:8 Iye ndokuti: Chenjerai kuti musatsauswa; nokuti vazhinji vachauya muzita rangu, vachiti: Ndini <transChange type="added">Kristu</transChange>; uye: Nguva yaswedera. Naizvozvo musavatevera.
Luke 21:9 Zvino kana muchinzwa zvehondo nenyonga-nyonga, musavhunduswa; nokuti zvinhu izvi zvinofanira kutanga kuitika; asi kuguma hakuvi<transChange type="added">po</transChange> pakarepo. <div eID="gen859" type="x-p"/>
Luke 21:10 Ipapo wakati kwavari: Rudzi ruchamukira rudzi, neushe <transChange type="added">hucha</transChange>mukira ushe.
Luke 21:11 Uye kudengenyeka kwenyika kukuru kuchava kunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana, nenzara nematenda, uye zvinotyisa nezviratidzo zvikuru zvichabva kudenga zvichavapo. <div eID="gen860" type="x-p"/>
Luke 21:12 Asi mberi kwaizvozvi zvese vachaisa maoko avo pamuri, nekushusha, vachi<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>kumikidzai kumasinagoge nemumatirongo, muchiiswa pamberi pemadzimambo nevabati, nekuda kwezita rangu.
Luke 21:13 Uye <transChange type="added">izvi</transChange> zvichashandukira kwamuri kuva uchapupu.
Luke 21:14 Naizvozvo zviisei mumoyo menyu, kuti murege kufanofunganya <transChange type="added">zva</transChange>muchazvidavirira.
Luke 21:15 Nokuti ini ndichakupai muromo nenjere, vavengi venyu vese zvavachakonewa kupikisa kana kuramba.
Luke 21:16 Zvino muchatengeswa kunyange nevabereki, nevanakomana vamai venyu, nehama, neshamwari, uye vachauraya <transChange type="added">vamwe</transChange> venyu.
Luke 21:17 Uye muchavengwa nevese nekuda kwezita rangu.
Luke 21:18 Asi hakungatongoparari ruvhudzi rwemusoro wenyu.
Luke 21:19 Mukutsungirira kwenyu wanai mweya yenyu.
Luke 21:20 Zvino kana muchiona Jerusarema rakombwa nemauto, zivai ipapo kuti kuparadzwa kwaro kwaswedera.
Luke 21:21 Panguva iyo vari muJudhiya ngavatizire kumakomo; nevari mukati maro ngavabude; nevari kumaruwa ngavarege kupinda mariri.
Luke 21:22 Nokuti awa mazuva etsividzo, kuti zvinhu zvese zvakanyorwa zvizadziswe.
Luke 21:23 Asi vane nhamo vane mimba nevanonwisa mumazuva iwayo! Nokuti kuchavapo kutambudzika kukuru munyika, nehasha pamusoro perudzi urwu.
Luke 21:24 Uye vachawa nemuromo wemunondo, nekutapirwa kumarudzi ese; uye Jerusarema richatsikirwa pasi nevechirudzi, kusvikira nguva dzevechirudzi dzazadziswa. <div eID="gen861" type="x-p"/>
Luke 21:25 Zvino zviratidzo zvichavapo pazuva nepamwedzi nepanyeredzi; nepanyika kutambudzika kwemarudzi nekukanganiswa; gungwa nemafungu zvichitinhira,
Luke 21:26 vanhu vachapera simba nekutya nekutarisira zvinhu izvo zvinouya panyika; nokuti masimba ekumatenga achazungunuswa.
Luke 21:27 Zvino ipapo vachaona Mwanakomana wemunhu achiuya mugore ane simba nekubwinya kukuru.
Luke 21:28 Zvino kana zvinhu izvi zvichitanga kuitika, itii tasa, uye musimudze misoro yenyu, nokuti rudzikunuro rwenyu rwaswedera. <div eID="gen862" type="x-p"/>
Luke 21:29 Zvino wakavataurira mufananidzo <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Tarirai muonde nemiti yese;
Luke 21:30 kana ikozvino yotunga, munozvionera <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>kuziva kuti zhizha ikozvino rava pedo.
Luke 21:31 Saizvozvo imwiwo, kana moona zvinhu izvozvi zvichiitika, zivai kuti ushe hwaMwari hwava pedo.
Luke 21:32 Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri: Zera iri haringatongopfuuri, kusvikira zvese zvaitika.
Luke 21:33 Denga nenyika zvichapfuura, asi mashoko angu haangatongopfuuri. <div eID="gen863" type="x-p"/>
Luke 21:34 Zvino zvichenjererei, kuti moyo yenyu irege kuremedzwa nekudyisa nekuraradza nekufunganya zveupenyu huno, zuva iro rikusvikirei musingafungiri.
Luke 21:35 Nokuti seriva richasvika pamusoro pevese vagere pachiso chenyika yese.
Luke 21:36 Naizvozvo rindai panguva yese munyengetere kuti muverengwe makafanira kupukunyuka zvinhu izvi zvese zvichaitika, nekumira pamberi peMwanakomana wemunhu. <div eID="gen864" type="x-p"/>
Luke 21:37 Zvino waidzidzisa masikati mutembere; asi waibuda achipedzera usiku mugomo rinonzi reMiorivhi.
Luke 21:38 Vanhu vese ndokuuya kwaari mangwanani-ngwanani mutembere kuti vamunzwe. <chapter eID="Luke.21"/><div eID="gen865" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen857" type="section"/>
Luke 22:0 <div sID="gen866" type="section"/> <chapter n="22" osisID="Luke.22" sID="Luke.22"/>  <div sID="gen867" type="x-p"/>
Luke 22:1 Zvino mabiko ezvingwa zvisina mbiriso akaswedera, anonzi pasika.
Luke 22:2 Vapristi vakuru nevanyori ndokutsvaka kuti vangamuuraya sei; nokuti vaitya vanhu. <div eID="gen867" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen866" type="section"/>
Luke 22:3 Zvino wakapinda Satani kuna Judhasi anotumidzwa Isikariyoti, waiverengwa pavanegumi nevaviri.
Luke 22:4 Akaenda, akanotaura nevapristi vakuru nevatungamiriri, kuti angamutengesa sei kwavari.
Luke 22:5 Zvino vakafara, vakatenderana kumupa mari.
Luke 22:6 Zvino wakatenda, akatsvaka mukana wakafanira wekumutengesa kwavari pasina chaunga. <div eID="gen869" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen868" type="section"/>
Luke 22:7 Zvino zuva rezvingwa zvisina mbiriso rakasvika, paifanira kubaiwa pasika.
Luke 22:8 Zvino wakatuma Petro naJohwani, achiti: Endai munotigadzirira pasika, kuti tidye.
Luke 22:9 Zvino vakati kwaari: Ndekupi kwamunoda kuti tigadzirire?
Luke 22:10 Zvino wakati kwavari: Tarirai, kana mapinda muguta, munhu achasangana nemwi akatakura chirongo chemvura; mumutevere mumba maanopinda.
Luke 22:11 Uye muti kumwene weimba: Mudzidzisi anoti kwauri: Imba yevaeni iripi, mandingadyira pasika nevadzidzi vangu?
Luke 22:12 Uye iye achakuratidzai imba huru yekumusoro yakarongedzwa; gadzirirai ipapo.
Luke 22:13 Zvino vakaenda vakanowana sezvaakange avaudza; ndokugadzirira pasika. <div eID="gen871" type="x-p"/>
Luke 22:14 Zvino awa rakati rasvika, akagara pakudya, nevaapositori gumi nevaviri vanaye.
Luke 22:15 Ndokuti kwavari: Nechishuwo ndakashuva kudya pasika iyi nemwi ndisati ndatambudzika;
Luke 22:16 nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Handichazodyizve pairi, kusvikira yazadziswa muushe hwaMwari.
Luke 22:17 Zvino wakatora mukombe, avonga akati: Torai ichi, mugogovana.
Luke 22:18 Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Handichatongonwi zvechibereko chemuzambiringa, kusvikira ushe hwaMwari hwasvika.
Luke 22:19 Zvino wakatora chingwa, akavonga, akamedura, ndokuvapa, achiti: Uyu muviri wangu, unopiwa pachinzvimbo chenyu; izvi itai kundirangarira.
Luke 22:20 Saizvozvowo mukombe shure kwekurayira, achiti: Mukombe uyu isungano itsva muropa rangu, rinoteurirwa imwi. <div eID="gen872" type="x-p"/>
Luke 22:21 Asi tarirai, ruoko rweanonditengesa rwuneni patafura.
Luke 22:22 Zvino zvirokwazvo Mwanakomana wemunhu anoenda sezvazvakatemwa; asi ane nhamo munhu uyo waanotengeswa naye!
Luke 22:23 Zvino ivo vakatanga kubvunzana kuti ko ndiani pavari achaita chinhu ichi. <div eID="gen873" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen870" type="section"/>
Luke 22:24 Zvino gakava rakavapowo pakati pavo kuti ndiani kwavari anoverengwa semukurusa.
Luke 22:25 Zvino wakati kwavari: Madzimambo evechirudzi anotonga zvakaoma pamusoro pavo, nevatongi vavo vanonzi vabatsiri.
Luke 22:26 Asi imwi zvisadaro; asi mukurusa kwamuri ngaave semudiki, nemutungamiriri seanoshandira.
Luke 22:27 Nokuti ndiani mukuru, uyo agere pakudya kana anoshandira? Haasi iye agere pakudya here? Asi ini ndiri pakati penyu seanoshandira. <div eID="gen875" type="x-p"/>
Luke 22:28 Nemwi ndimwi makagara neni pamiedzo yangu;
Luke 22:29 zvino ini ndinogadza kwamuri ushe, saBaba vangu vakagadza kwandiri;
Luke 22:30 kuti mudye nekunwa patafura yangu muushe hwangu, nekugara pazvigaro zveushe, muchitonga marudzi gumi nemaviri aIsraeri. <div eID="gen876" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen874" type="section"/>
Luke 22:31 Ishe ndokuti: Simoni, Simoni, tarira, Satani wakukumbirai kuti a<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>zungurei segorosi;
Luke 22:32 asi ini ndakunyengeterera, kuti rutendo rwako rwurege kupera; newe kana watendeuka, usimbise hama dzako.
Luke 22:33 Asi wakati kwaari: Ishe, ndakagadzirira kuenda nemwi zvese mutirongo nemurufu.
Luke 22:34 Asi iye wakati: Ndinokuudza, Petro, jongwe haringatongoriri nhasi, usati waramba katatu kuti unondiziva. <div eID="gen878" type="x-p"/>
Luke 22:35 Zvino wakati kwavari: Pandakakutumai musina chikwama nehombodo neshangu, makashaiwa chinhu here? Vakati: Hapana.
Luke 22:36 Zvino akati kwavari: Asi ikozvino, ane chikwama ngaatore, saizvozvowo nehombodo; neasina, ngaatengese nguvo yake, atenge munondo.
Luke 22:37 Nokuti ndinoti kwamuri: Izvi zvakanyorwa zvichakafanira kuzadziswa mandiri, zvinoti: Wakaverengwa pamwe nevadariki; nokuti zvinhu izviwo zviri maererano neni zvine mugumo.
Luke 22:38 Zvino vakati: Ishe, tarirai, heyi minondo miviri. Akati kwavari: Zvaringana. <div eID="gen879" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen877" type="section"/>
Luke 22:39 Zvino wakabuda akaenda sezvaaisiita kugomo reMiorivhi; nevadzidziwo vake vakamutevera.
Luke 22:40 Zvino wakati asvika panzvimbo, akati kwavari: Nyengeterai kuti murege kupinda pamuedzo.
Luke 22:41 Zvino iye wakasuduruka kwavari, chingava <transChange type="added">chinhambwe</transChange> chingaposherwa ibwe; ndokufugama akanyengetera,
Luke 22:42 achiti: Baba, kana muchida, bvisai mukombe uyu kwandiri; asi chisava chido changu, asi chenyu ngachiitwe.
Luke 22:43 Zvino kwakaonekwa mutumwa kwaari wakabva kudenga achimusimbisa.
Luke 22:44 Zvino, ari pakurwadziwa kukuru, wakanyanya kunyengetera. Zvino ziya rake rikaita semazidomwe eropa achiwira pasi.
Luke 22:45 Zvino wakati asimuka pamunyengetero, akauya kuvadzidzi vake, akavawana varara neshungu.
Luke 22:46 Ndokuti kwavari: Mararirei? Mukai munyengetere, kuti murege kupinda pamuedzo. <div eID="gen881" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen880" type="section"/>
Luke 22:47 Zvino wakati achataura, tarira, chaunga, naiye wainzi Judhasi, umwe wevanegumi nevaviri, akavatungamirira, ndokuswedera kuna Jesu, kuti amutsvode.
Luke 22:48 Asi Jesu wakati kwaari: Judhasi, unotengesa Mwanakomana wemunhu netsvodo here?
Luke 22:49 Zvino avo vaiva vakamukomba pavakaona zvaizoitika vakati kwaari: Ishe, tichatema nemunondo here?
Luke 22:50 Zvino umwe wavo wakatema muranda wemupristi mukuru, akagura nzeve yake yerudyi.
Luke 22:51 Asi Jesu wakapindura akati: Regai zvisvike ipapa. Ndokubata nzeve yake, akamuporesa. <div eID="gen883" type="x-p"/>
Luke 22:52 Zvino Jesu wakati kuvapristi vakuru nevatungamiriri vetembere nevakuru vakange vauya kwaari: Mabuda semakanangana negororo neminondo netsvimbo here?
Luke 22:53 Ndaiva nemwi mutembere zuva nezuva mukasatandavadzira ruoko kwandiri; asi zvino iawa renyu, nesimba rerima. <div eID="gen884" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen882" type="section"/>
Luke 22:54 Zvino vakamutora, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>tungamidza, vakapinda naye mumba memupristi mukuru. Petro ndokutevera ari kure.
Luke 22:55 Zvino vakati vavesa moto pakati pechivanze, ndokugara pasi pamwe, Petro akagara pakati pavo.
Luke 22:56 Zvino umwe murandakadzi wakamuona agere pamoto, ndokumutarisisa, akati: Uyuwo wakange anaye.
Luke 22:57 Asi iye wakamurambira, achiti: Mukadzi, handimuzivi.
Luke 22:58 Uye shure kwechinguvana, umwe wakamuona akati: Iwewo uri umwe wavo. Petro ndokuti: <transChange type="added">Iwe</transChange> munhu, handisi.
Luke 22:59 Zvino nguva inenge awa rimwe yakati yapfuura, umwezve wakasimbisa ane chokwadi, achiti: Zvirokwazvo uyuwo wakange anaye; nokuti muGarireawo.
Luke 22:60 Zvino Petro wakati: <transChange type="added">Iwe </transChange>munhu, handizivi zvaunoreva. Pakarepo achataura jongwe rakarira.
Luke 22:61 Ishe ndokutendeuka akatarira Petro. Petro ndokurangarira shoko raIshe, kuti akamuudza sei, achiti: Jongwe risati rarira, uchandiramba katatu.
Luke 22:62 Zvino Petro wakabuda panze akachema zvinorwadza. <div eID="gen886" type="x-p"/>
Luke 22:63 Zvino varume vakange vakabata Jesu, vakamuseka, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>rova.
Luke 22:64 Uye vakati vamuvhara kumeso, vakamurova chiso, ndokumubvunza vachiti: Porofita! Ndiani wakurova?
Luke 22:65 Nezvimwe zvinhu zvizhinji vakareva kwaari, vachituka. <div eID="gen887" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen885" type="section"/>
Luke 22:66 Zvino kwakati kuchingoedza, dare revatariri vevanhu nevapristi vakuru nevanyori vakaungana, vakamuisa kudare ravo remakurukota vachiti:
Luke 22:67 Kana iwe uri Kristu, tiudze. Zvino akati kwavari: Kana ndikakuudzai, hamutongotendi;
Luke 22:68 uyewo kana ndikabvunza, hamumbondipinduri, kana ku<transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>sunungura.
Luke 22:69 Kubva ikozvino Mwanakomana wemunhu achagara kuruoko rwerudyi rwesimba rwaMwari.
Luke 22:70 Vese ndokuti: Naizvozvo iwe uri Mwanakomana waMwari kanhi? Iye ndokuti kwavari: Imwi mareva kuti ndini.
Luke 22:71 Zvino vakati: Tichadirei uchapupu? Nokuti tomene tanzwa pamuromo wake. <chapter eID="Luke.22"/><div eID="gen889" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen888" type="section"/>
Luke 23:0 <div sID="gen890" type="section"/> <chapter n="23" osisID="Luke.23" sID="Luke.23"/>  <div sID="gen891" type="x-p"/>
Luke 23:1 Zvino chaunga chavo chese chakasimuka, chikamutungamidza kuna Pirato. <div eID="gen891" type="x-p"/>
Luke 23:2 Zvino vakatanga kumupomera, vachiti: Tawana uyu achitsausa rudzi, nekudzivisa kupa mitero kuna Kesari, achiti iye pachake ndiKristu Mambo.
Luke 23:3 Zvino Pirato wakamubvunza achiti: Iwe uri Mambo weVaJudha here? Ndokumupindura, akati: Unoreva iwe.
Luke 23:4 Pirato ndokuti kuvapristi vakuru nezvaunga: Handiwani mhosva kumunhu uyu.
Luke 23:5 Asi vakasimbisa, vachiti: Unonyonganisa vanhu, achidzidzisa muJudhiya rese, kutanga paGarirea kusvikira pano. <div eID="gen892" type="x-p"/>
Luke 23:6 Pirato wakati anzwa zveGarirea, akabvunza kana munhu uyu ari muGarirea.
Luke 23:7 Zvino paakangoziva kuti ndeweushe hwaHerodhe, wakamutumira kuna Herodhe, iye waivawo muJerusarema pamazuva iwayo. <div eID="gen893" type="x-p"/>
Luke 23:8 Zvino Herodhe paakaona Jesu wakafara zvikurusa; nokuti waishuva kumuona kwe<transChange type="added">nguva</transChange> refu, nokuti wakange anzwa zvinhu zvizhinji pamusoro pake; uye wakatarisira kuona chimwe chiratidzo chichiitwa naye.
Luke 23:9 Ndokumubvunza nemashoko mazhinji; asi iye haana kumupindura chinhu.
Luke 23:10 Zvino vapristi vakuru nevanyori vakamira vakamupomera zvine simba.
Luke 23:11 NaHerodhe nemauto ake wakamuzvidza, nekuseka akamupfekedza nguvo refu inobwinya, akamudzosera kuna Pirato.
Luke 23:12 Nemusi iwoyo Pirato naHerodhe vakava shamwari neshamwari; nokuti paimbova neruvengo pakati pavo. <div eID="gen894" type="x-p"/>
Luke 23:13 Zvino Pirato wakati adanira pamwe vapristi vakuru nevatungamiriri nevanhu,
Luke 23:14 akati kwavari: Mauisa munhu uyu kwandiri seanotsausa vanhu; zvino tarirai ini ndaongorora pamberi penyu, handina kuwana mhosva kumunhu uyu yezvinhu zvamunomupomera;
Luke 23:15 kwete, kunyange Herodhe; nokuti ndinokutumai kwaari; zvino tarirai, hapana chakafanira rufu chakaitwa naye.
Luke 23:16 Naizvozvo ndichamurova ndigo<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>sunungura.
Luke 23:17 Nokuti zvaiva zvakafanira kuti avasunungurire umwe pamutambo. <div eID="gen895" type="x-p"/>
Luke 23:18 Asi vese vakadanidzira pamwe vachiti: Kure neuyu, asi mutisunungurire Bharabhasi.
Luke 23:19 Iye wakange akandirwa mutirongo nemhaka yerimwe bongozozo rakange raitika muguta uye neumhondi.
Luke 23:20 Naizvozvo Pirato achida kusunungura Jesu, wakataurazve kwa<transChange type="added">vari</transChange>.
Luke 23:21 Asi vakadanidzira, vachiti: Roverera pamuchinjikwa, muroverere pamuchinjikwa!
Luke 23:22 Akati kwavari rwechitatu: Nemhaka yei, iye waita chakaipa chipi? Handina kuwana mhosva yerufu maari; naizvozvo ndichamurova ndigo<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>sunungura.
Luke 23:23 Asi vakasimbisa nemanzwi makuru, vachikumbira kuti arovererwe pamuchinjikwa. Manzwi avo neevapristi vakuru akabudirira. <div eID="gen896" type="x-p"/>
Luke 23:24 Zvino Pirato wakatema kuti chikumbiro chavo chiitike.
Luke 23:25 Akavasunungurira uyo wavakakumbira, wakange akandwa mutirongo nekuda kwebongozozo neumhondi; asi akakumikidza Jesu kuchido chavo. <div eID="gen897" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen890" type="section"/>
Luke 23:26 Zvino vakati vachimutungamidza, vakabata umwe Simoni muKurini achibva kuruwa, vakamutakudza muchinjikwa, kuti atakure shure kwaJesu. <div eID="gen899" type="x-p"/>
Luke 23:27 Zvino kwakatevera kwaari chaunga chikuru chevanhu, nevakadzi vairirawo nekumuchema.
Luke 23:28 Asi Jesu wakatendeukira kwavari akati: Vakunda veJerusarema, musachemera ini, asi muzvichemere imwi nevana venyu;
Luke 23:29 nokuti tarirai, mazuva anouya avachati nawo: Dzakaropafadzwa mhanje, nezvizvaro zvisina kubereka, nemazamu asina kunwisa.
Luke 23:30 Ipapo vachatanga kuti kumakomo: Wirai pamusoro pedu; nekuzvikomo: Tifukidzei.
Luke 23:31 Nokuti kana vachiita zvinhu izvi kumuti munyoro, chii chichaitika kune wakawoma? <div eID="gen900" type="x-p"/>
Luke 23:32 Zvino kwakatungamidzwawo vamwe vaiti vezvakaipa vaviri, kuti vaurawe pamwe naye. <div eID="gen901" type="x-p"/>
Luke 23:33 Zvino vakati vasvika panzvimbo inonzi Dehenya, ipapo vakamuroverera pamuchinjikwa, nevaiti vezvakaipa, umwe kuruoko rwerudyi, neumwe kuruboshwe.
Luke 23:34 Jesu ndokuti: Baba, vakanganwirei; nokuti havazivi chavanoita. Zvino vakagovana nguvo dzake, vakakanda mujenya.
Luke 23:35 Vanhu ndokumira vakatarira. Nevatongiwo pamwe navo vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>seka, vachiti: Wakaponesa vamwe, ngaazviponese, kana iye ari Kristu, musanangurwa waMwari. <div eID="gen902" type="x-p"/>
Luke 23:36 Nemautowo akamuseka, achimuvigira vhiniga,
Luke 23:37 uye vachiti: Kana iwe uri Mambo weVaJudha, zviponese.
Luke 23:38 Zvino kwakange kune rugwarowo rwakanyorwa pamusoro pake nemavara echiGiriki nechiRoma nechiHebheru, <transChange type="added">rwaiti</transChange>: UYU NDIMAMBO WEVAJUDHA. <div eID="gen903" type="x-p"/>
Luke 23:39 Uye umwe wevaiti vezvakaipa vakange vakaremberedzwa wakamutuka achiti: Kana iwe uri Kristu, zviponese iwe nesu.
Luke 23:40 Asi umwe wakapindura achimutsiura, achiti: Iwe hautyi Mwari kanhi, zvauri pakutongwa kumwe?
Luke 23:41 Isu zvirokwazvo zvakarurama, nokuti tinogamuchira zvakafanira zvatakaita; asi uyu haana kuita chinhu chisakafanira.
Luke 23:42 Zvino akati kuna Jesu: Ishe mundirangarire kana masvika muushe hwenyu.
Luke 23:43 Jesu ndokuti kwaari: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri: Nhasi uchava neni muParadhiso. <div eID="gen904" type="x-p"/>
Luke 23:44 Zvino rakange rava awa rinenge rechitanhatu; kukavapo rima pamusoro penyika yese, kusvikira paawa repfumbamwe.
Luke 23:45 Nezuva rakadzikatirwa, uye vheiri retembere rakabvarurwa nepakati.
Luke 23:46 Zvino Jesu wakati adanidzira nenzwi guru achiti: Baba, mumaoko enyu ndinokumikidza mweya wangu; akati areva izvozvi, akapa mweya. <div eID="gen905" type="x-p"/>
Luke 23:47 Zvino mukuru wezana wakati aona zvakaitika, akarumbidza Mwari, achiti: Zvirokwazvo munhu uyu wakange akarurama.
Luke 23:48 Nezvaunga zvese zvakange zvakaungana kuzoona izvozvi, zvakati zvichiona zvakaitika, zvikadzokera zvichizvirova zvifuva.
Luke 23:49 Nevazikanwi vake vese, nevakadzi vaimutevera vachibva Garirea, vakamira kure, vachiona zvinhu izvi. <div eID="gen906" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen898" type="section"/>
Luke 23:50 Zvino tarira, murume wainzi Josefa, nhengo yedare, murume wakanaka uye wakarurama;
Luke 23:51 iye wakange asina kutenderana nezano nechiito chavo; <transChange type="added">waiva</transChange> weArimatia, guta reVaJudha, naiyewo wakange achimirira ushe hwaMwari.
Luke 23:52 Iye wakaenda kuna Pirato akakukumbira mutumbi waJesu.
Luke 23:53 Zvino wakauburusa, akauputira nemucheka werineni, ndokuuradzika muguva rakange rakacherwa pabwe, makange musina kumboradzikwa munhu.
Luke 23:54 Zvino waiva musi wegadziriro, uye sabata roswedera.
Luke 23:55 Nevakadziwo, vakange vauya naye vachibva Garirea, vakatevera mumashure, vakaona guva, nokuti mutumbi wake waradzikwa sei.
Luke 23:56 Uye vakadzokera, vakagadzirira zvinonhuhwira nezvizoro. Zvino vakazorora nesabata zvichienderana nemurairo.  <chapter eID="Luke.23"/><div eID="gen908" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen907" type="section"/>
Luke 24:0 <div sID="gen909" type="section"/> <chapter n="24" osisID="Luke.24" sID="Luke.24"/>  <div sID="gen910" type="x-p"/>
Luke 24:1 Zvino ne<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>si wekutanga wevhiki, mambakwedza, vakauya kuguva, vakatakura zvinonhuhwira zvavakange vagadzirira, nevamwe vanavo.
Luke 24:2 Zvino vakawana ibwe rakakunguruswa kubva paguva.
Luke 24:3 Vakabva vapinda vakasawana mutumbi waIshe Jesu.
Luke 24:4 Zvino vakati vakakanganiswa kwazvo nazvo, zvino tarira, varume vaviri vakamira navo vakapfeka nguvo dzinopenya;
Luke 24:5 zvino vachiri kutya, ndokukotamisa zviso pasi, <transChange type="added">varume</transChange> vakati kwavari: Munotsvakirei mupenyu pavakafa?
Luke 24:6 Haasi pano, asi wamuka; rangarirai kuti wakataura sei kwamuri achiri muGarirea,
Luke 24:7 achiti: Mwanakomana wemunhu anofanira kukumikidzwa mumaoko evanhu vezvivi, nekurovererwa pamuchinjikwa, uye pazuva retatu amukezve.
Luke 24:8 Zvino vakarangarira mashoko ake. <div eID="gen910" type="x-p"/>
Luke 24:9 Zvino vakadzoka vachibva kuguva, vakaudza zvinhu izvi zvese kuvanegumi neumwe nekune vamwe vese.
Luke 24:10 Vaiva Maria Magidharini naJohwana naMaria <transChange type="added">mai</transChange> vaJakobho, nevamwe vavaiva navo, vakaudza vaapositori zvinhu izvi.
Luke 24:11 Zvino mashoko avo akaonekera sekutaura kusina maturo pamberi pavo, uye havana kuvatenda.
Luke 24:12 Asi Petro wakasimuka akamhanyira kuguva; akakotama ndokutarira, akaona micheka yerineni yakaradzikwa yega; ndokuenda, ashamisika mukati make nezvakange zvaitika. <div eID="gen911" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen909" type="section"/>
Luke 24:13 Zvino tarira, pazuva iroro vaviri vavo vaifamba vachienda kumusha wainzi Emausi, wakange uri masitadhia* makumi matanhatu kubva kuJerusarema.
Luke 24:14 Zvino ivo vaitaurirana pamusoro pezvinhu izvi zvese zvakange zvaitika.
Luke 24:15 Zvino zvakaitika kuti vachitaurirana nekubvunzana, Jesu amene wakaswedera akafamba navo,
Luke 24:16 asi meso avo akange abatwa kuti vasamuziva.
Luke 24:17 Zvino wakati kwavari: Mashoko ei awa amunokurukurirana muchifamba, uye makasuruvara?
Luke 24:18 Umwe, wainzi Kiriyopasi, ndokupindura akati kwaari: Ndiwe wega mutorwa muJerusarema, uye hauziva zvakaitikamo mumazuva ano here?
Luke 24:19 Zvino akati kwavari: Zvinhui? Ivo vakati kwaari: Zviri maererano naJesu weNazareta, waiva murume muporofita ane simba pachiito nepashoko pamberi paMwari nevanhu vese;
Luke 24:20 uye kuti vapristi vakuru nevatongi vedu vakamukumikidza sei kuti atongerwe rufu, uye vakamuroverera pamuchinjikwa.
Luke 24:21 Asi isu taivimba kuti ndiye waizodzikunura Israeri. Asiwo kunze kweizvi zvese, nhasi izuva retatu kubva zvaitika zvinhu izvi.
Luke 24:22 Asi vamwewo vakadzi vekwedu vatishamisa, vanga vafumira kuguva;
Luke 24:23 zvino vati vasingawani mutumbi wake, vauya vachiti vaona chiratidzo chevatumwawo, vati mupenyu.
Luke 24:24 Uye vamwe vevaiva nesu vaenda kuguva, vakawanawo zvakadaro vakadziwo sezvavakange vareva; asi iye havana kumuona.
Luke 24:25 Zvino iye akati kwavari: Haiwa imwi vekusanzwisisa, uye mune moyo ine chinono kutenda zvese vaporofita zvavakataura!
Luke 24:26 Ko Kristu wakange asingafaniri kutambudzika <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>zvinhu izvi, ndokupinda pakubwinya kwake here?
Luke 24:27 Ndokutanga kuna Mozisi nekuvaporofita vese, akadudzira kwavari mumagwaro ese zvinhu zviri maererano naye. <div eID="gen913" type="x-p"/>
Luke 24:28 Zvino vakaswedera kumusha kwavakange vachienda; iye ndokuita sewopfuurira.
Luke 24:29 Asi vakamumanikidza, vachiti: Garai nesu, nokuti koda kuvira, uye zuva ranyura. Ndokupinda kunogara navo.
Luke 24:30 Zvino zvakaitika agere navo pakudya, wakatora chingwa akaropafadza, akamedura ndokupa kwavari.
Luke 24:31 Zvino meso avo ndokuzarurwa, ndokumuziva; iye ndokunyangarika kwavari.
Luke 24:32 Zvino vakataurirana <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Moyo wedu wanga usingapisi mukati medu here paanga achitaura nesu munzira, nepaanga achitizarurira magwaro? <div eID="gen914" type="x-p"/>
Luke 24:33 Zvino vakasimuka neawa iroro, vakadzokera kuJerusarema, vakawana vanegumi neumwe vakaungana nevaiva navo,
Luke 24:34 vachiti: Ishe wamuka zvirokwazvo, waonekwa naSimoni.
Luke 24:35 Ivo vakarondedzera zvinhu <transChange type="added">zvakaitika</transChange> munzira, uye kuti wakazikanwa navo sei pakumedura chingwa. <div eID="gen915" type="x-p"/>
Luke 24:36 Zvino vakati vachataura zvinhu izvozvi, Jesu amene wakamira pakati pavo, akati kwavari: Rugare kwamuri.
Luke 24:37 Asi vakavhunduswa, vakatya, vakafunga kuti vaona mweya.
Luke 24:38 Zvino akati kwavari: Munonetsekerei, uye mifungo inomukirei mumoyo yenyu?
Luke 24:39 Tarirai maoko angu netsoka dzangu, kuti ndini ndomene. Ndibatei, muone, nokuti mweya hauna nyama nemafupa, sezvamunoona ndinazvo.
Luke 24:40 Zvino wakati areva izvi akavaratidza maoko netsoka.
Luke 24:41 Zvino vakati vachigere kutenda nekuda kwekufara vachishamisika, akati kwavari: Mune chinodyika pano here?
Luke 24:42 Zvino vakamupa nhindi yehove yakagochwa neyezinga reuchi.
Luke 24:43 Iye ndokutora akadya pamberi pavo. <div eID="gen916" type="x-p"/>
Luke 24:44 Zvino wakati kwavari: Awa mashoko andakataura kwamuri ndichiri nemwi, kuti zvinhu zvese zvinofanira kuzadziswa, zvakanyorwa pamurairo waMozisi, ne<transChange type="added">pa</transChange>vaporofita ne<transChange type="added">pa</transChange>Mapisarema maererano neni.
Luke 24:45 Ipapo akazarura kunzwisisa kwavo, kuti vanzwisise magwaro.
Luke 24:46 Ndokuti kwavari: Zvakanyorwa saizvozvi, saizvozvowo zvakafanira Kristu kutambudzika, nekumuka kubva kuvakafa zuva retatu,
Luke 24:47 uye kuti kutendeuka nekanganwiro yezvivi zviparidzirwe marudzi ese muzita rake, kutanga paJerusarema.
Luke 24:48 Uye imwi muri zvapupu zvezvinhu izvi.
Luke 24:49 Zvino tarirai, ini ndinotuma chivimbiso chaBaba vangu pamusoro penyu; asi imwi garai muguta reJerusarema, kusvikira mafukidzwa nesimba rinobva kumusoro. <div eID="gen917" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen912" type="section"/>
Luke 24:50 Zvino akavatungamirira kunze kusvikira Bhetaniya, ndokusimudza maoko ake akavaropafadza.
Luke 24:51 Zvino zvakaitika achavaropafadza, akaparadzana navo, akakwidzwa kudenga.
Luke 24:52 Zvino vakamunamata, vakadzokera kuJerusarema vane mufaro mukuru;
Luke 24:53 uye vakagara nguva dzese mutembere, vachirumbidza nekutenda Mwari. Ameni. <div eID="gen919" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen918" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Luke.24"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen566" osisID="Luke" type="book"/>
