John 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="John" sID="gen920" type="book"/>   <milestone n="JOHWANI" type="x-usfm-h"/>
John 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="John.1" sID="John.1"/>
John 1:1 Pakutanga wakange aripo Shoko, uye Shoko wakange ana Mwari, uye Shoko wakange ari Mwari.
John 1:2 Iye uyu wakange ana Mwari pakutanga.
John 1:3 Zvinhu zvese zvakaitwa naye, uye kunze kwake hakuna kuitwa chinhu chimwe chakaitwa.
John 1:4 Maari maiva neupenyu, uye upenyu hwaiva chiedza chevanhu,
John 1:5 uye chiedza chinovhenekera murima, asi rima harina kuchigamuchira. <div eID="gen922" type="x-p"/>
John 1:6 Kwakauya munhu wakatumwa kubva kuna Mwari, zita rake riri Johwani.
John 1:7 Iye wakauyira uchapupu, kuti apupure zvechiedza, kuti vese vatende naye.
John 1:8 Iye wakange asiri icho chiedza, asi <transChange type="added">wakatumwa</transChange> kuti apupure pamusoro pechiedza. <div eID="gen923" type="x-p"/>
John 1:9 Chaiva chiedza chechokwadi, chinovhenekera munhu umwe neumwe anouya panyika.
John 1:10 Wakange ari munyika, nenyika yakaitwa naye, asi nyika haina kumuziva.
John 1:11 Wakauya kune zvake, asi vake havana kumugamuchira.
John 1:12 Asi vese vakamugamuchira, wakavapa kodzero kuti vave vana vaMwari, ivo vanotenda kuzita rake;
John 1:13 vakaberekwa kwete neropa, kana nechido chenyama, kana nechido chemurume, asi naMwari. <div eID="gen924" type="x-p"/>
John 1:14 Shoko ndokuzova nyama, akagara pakati pedu, uye takaona kubwinya kwake, kubwinya sekwewakaberekwa umwe ega waBaba, azere nenyasha nechokwadi.
John 1:15 Johwani wakapupura pamusoro pake, akadanidzira achiti: Uyu ndiye wandaireva <transChange type="added">ndichiti:</transChange> Uyu anouya shure kwangu wakanditangira; nokuti wakange aripo mberi kwangu.
John 1:16 Nepakuzara kwake isu tese takagamuchira, uye nyasha nenyasha.
John 1:17 Nokuti murairo wakapiwa naMozisi, nyasha nechokwadi zvakauya naJesu Kristu.
John 1:18 Hakuna wakatongoona Mwari; Mwanakomana wakaberekwa umwe ega, ari pachifuva chaBaba, ndiye waka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>zivisa. <div eID="gen925" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen921" type="section"/>
John 1:19 Uye uhu ndihwo uchapupu hwaJohwani, apo VaJudha vakatuma vapristi neVaRevhi kubva kuJerusarema kuti vanomubvunza <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Iwe ndiwe ani?
John 1:20 Akabvuma, uye haana kuramba; ndokubvuma achiti: Ini handisi Kristu.
John 1:21 Zvino vakamubvunza <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Saka kudini? Iwe uri Erija here? Akati: Handisi. Iwe uri uya muporofita here? Akapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Kwete.
John 1:22 Naizvozvo vakati kwaari: Ndiwe ani? Kuti tipe mhinduro vatituma; unoti kudini pamusoro pako?
John 1:23 Akati: Ini ndini inzwi reanodanidzira murenje: Ruramisai nzira yaIshe; sezvakareva Isaya muporofita. <div eID="gen927" type="x-p"/>
John 1:24 Ava vakange vatumwa vaibva kuVaFarisi.
John 1:25 Zvino vakamubvunza, vakati kwaari: Unogobhabhatidzirei, kana iwe usiri Kristu, kana Eria, kana muporofita uya?
John 1:26 Johwani akavapindura, achiti: Ini ndinobhabhatidza nemvura; asi pakati penyu pamire wamusingazivi imwi;
John 1:27 ndiye anouya shure kwangu, ari mberi kwangu, wandisina kufanira ini kuti ndisunungure rukanda rweshangu yake.
John 1:28 Izvozvi zvakaitika paBhetabhara, mhiri kwaJoridhani, kwaibhabhatidza Johwani. <div eID="gen928" type="x-p"/>
John 1:29 Ava mangwana Johwani wakaona Jesu achiuya kwaari, akati: Tarirai, Gwayana raMwari, rinobvisa rotakura chivi chenyika.
John 1:30 Uyu ndiye ini wandaitaura nezvake <transChange type="added">ndichiti</transChange>: Shure kwangu kunouya murume, wakanditangira, nokuti wakange ariko mberi kwangu.
John 1:31 Neni ndakange ndisingamuzivi; asi kuti aziviswe kuna Israeri, nekuda kweizvozvo ini ndakauya ndichibhabhatidza nemvura.
John 1:32 Johwani ndokupupura, achiti: Ndakaona Mweya achiburuka kudenga senjiva, akagara pamusoro pake.
John 1:33 Neni ndakange ndisingamuzivi; asi wakandituma kubhabhatidza nemvura, ndiye wakati kwandiri: Uyo waunoona Mweya achiburukira pamusoro pake nekugara pamusoro pake, ndiye anobhabhatidza neMweya Mutsvene.
John 1:34 Zvino ini ndakaona ndikapupura kuti uyu Mwanakomana waMwari. <div eID="gen929" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen926" type="section"/>
John 1:35 Ava mangwanazve Johwani wakange amire, nevaviri vevadzidzi vake;
John 1:36 zvino wakatarisa Jesu achifamba-famba, akati: Tarirai Gwayana raMwari.
John 1:37 Vadzidzi vaviri ndokumunzwa achitaura, ndokutevera Jesu.
John 1:38 Zvino Jesu atendeuka wakavaona vachitevera, akati kwavari: Munotsvakei? Vakati kwaari: Rabhi* (ndokuti kana zvichishandurwa, Mudzidzisi) munogarepi?
John 1:39 Akati kwavari: Uyai muone. Vakauya vakaona paaigara; ndokugara naye zuva iroro; rakange riri awa rinenge regumi.
John 1:40 Andiriya munin'ina waSimoni Petro waiva umwe wevaviri vakange va<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa naJohwani vakamutevera. <div eID="gen931" type="x-p"/>
John 1:41 Iye wakatanga kuwana mukoma wake chaiye Simoni, akati kwaari: Tamuwana Mesiasi; ndiko kuti kana zvichishandurwa, Kristu.
John 1:42 Zvino akamuisa kuna Jesu. Jesu ndokuti amutarira akati: Iwe uri Simoni mwanakomana waJona; iwe uchanzi Kefasi (zvinoshandurwa <transChange type="added">kunzi</transChange> Petro). <div eID="gen932" type="x-p"/>
John 1:43 Ava mangwana Jesu akada kubudira kuGarirea, ndokuwana Firipi, ndokuti kwaari: Nditevere.
John 1:44 Zvino Firipi wakange ari weBhetisaidha, muguta raAndiriya naPetro.
John 1:45 Firipi akawana Nataniyeri, ndokuti kwaari: Tamuwana Mozisi waakanyora nezvake pamurairo nevaporofita, Jesu weNazareta, mwanakomana waJosefa.
John 1:46 Nataniyeri ndokuti kwaari: Chinhu chakanaka chinogona kubva muNazareta here? Firipi akati kwaari: Uya uone.
John 1:47 Jesu wakaona Nataniyeri achiuya kwaari, ndokuti pamusoro pake: Tarira muIsraeri wechokwadi, musina kunyengera maari.
John 1:48 Nataniyeri akati kwaari: Mandizivirepi? Jesu akapindura, akati kwaari: Firipi asati akudana, pawanga uri munyasi memuonde, ndakuona.
John 1:49 Nataniyeri akapindura ndokuti kwaari: Rabhi, imwi muri Mwanakomana waMwari, imwi muri Mambo waIsraeri.
John 1:50 Jesu akapindura ndokuti kwaari: Unotenda nokuti ndati kwauri: Ndakuona munyasi memuonde. Uchaona zvinhu zvikuru kune izvi.
John 1:51 Zvino akati kwaari: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Kubva ikozvino muchaona denga razaruka, nevatumwa vaMwari vachikwira nekuburukira pamusoro peMwanakomana wemunhu. <chapter eID="John.1"/><div eID="gen933" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen930" type="section"/>
John 2:0 <div sID="gen934" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="John.2" sID="John.2"/>  <div sID="gen935" type="x-p"/>
John 2:1 Zvino nezuva retatu kwakava nemuchato muKana yeGarirea; namai vaJesu vakange varipo.
John 2:2 NaJesuwo wakange akokwa <transChange type="added">pamwe</transChange> nevadzidzi vake kumuchato.
John 2:3 Waini yakati ichishaikwa, mai vaJesu vakati kwaari: Havana waini.
John 2:4 Jesu akati kwavari: Mukadzi, ndinei newe? Nguva yangu haisati yasvika.
John 2:5 Mai vake vakati kuvaranda: Chipi nechipi chaanokuudzai, itai.
John 2:6 Zvino kwakange kwakaiswapo zvirongo zvitanhatu zvemabwe semachenuriro emaJudha, chimwe nechimwe chaipinda zviyero zviviri kana zvitatu.
John 2:7 Jesu akati kwavari: Zadzai zvirongo nemvura. Vakazvizadza kusvikira pamuromo.
John 2:8 Ndokubva ati kwavari: Cherai ikozvino, mutakurire kumubati wekudya. Vakazvitakura.
John 2:9 Mubati wekudya wakati aravira mvura ikava waini, asingazivi kwainobva (asi varanda vakange vachera mvura vaiziva), mubati wekudya akadana muwani,
John 2:10 ndokuti kwaari: Munhu umwe neumwe pakutanga anoisa waini yakanaka, kana vanyatsonwa, isina kunyatso<transChange type="added">naka</transChange>; iwe wachengeta waini yakanaka kusvikira zvino. <div eID="gen935" type="x-p"/>
John 2:11 Uku kutanga kwezviratidzo kwakaita Jesu paKana yeGarirea, akaratidza kubwinya kwake; vadzidzi vake vakatenda kwaari. <div eID="gen936" type="x-p"/>
John 2:12 Shure kweizvozvo wakaburukira kuKapenaume, iye, namai vake, nevanin'ina vake, nevadzidzi vake; vakagarako mazuva asiri mazvinji. <div eID="gen937" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen934" type="section"/>
John 2:13 Zvino pasika yeVaJudha yakange yaswedera, Jesu ndokukwira kuJerusarema. <div eID="gen939" type="x-p"/>
John 2:14 Akawanawo mutembere avo vanotengesa nzombe nemakwai nenjiva, nevatsinhanisi vemari vagere.
John 2:15 Zvino wakati aita tyava yerwonzi, akavadzinga vese mutembere, nemakwai nenzombe; akateura mari yevatsinhanisi, ndokupidigura matafura.
John 2:16 Akati kune vaitengesa njiva: Bvisai zvinhu izvi pano; musaita imba yaBaba vangu imba yekutengeserana.
John 2:17 Vadzidzi vake ndokurangarira kuti kwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Kushingairira imba yenyu kwandidya kukandipedza. <div eID="gen940" type="x-p"/>
John 2:18 Naizvozvo VaJudha vakapindura, vakati kwaari: Unotiratidza chiratidzo chei, chekuti unoita zvinhu izvi?
John 2:19 Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Pazai tembere iyi, uye mumazuva matatu ndichaimutsa.
John 2:20 Naizvozvo VaJudha vakati: Makore makumi mana nematanhatu tembere iyi ichivakwa, zvino iwe ungaimutsa nemazuva matatu here?
John 2:21 Asi iye waireva zvetembere yemuviri wake.
John 2:22 Naizvozvo wakati amuka kubva kuvakafa, vadzidzi vake vakarangarira kuti wakange areva izvi kwavari; ndokutenda rugwaro, neshoko Jesu raakange areva. <div eID="gen941" type="x-p"/>
John 2:23 Zvino wakati ava muJerusarema papasika, pamutambo, vazhinji vakatenda kuzita rake pavakaona zviratidzo zvaaiita.
John 2:24 Asi Jesu pachake haana kuzvikumikidza kwavari, nokuti wakange achivaziva vese.
John 2:25 Uye nokuti wakange asingatsvaki kuti ani nani apupure zvemunhu; nokuti wakange achiziva pachake zvakange zviri mumunhu. <chapter eID="John.2"/><div eID="gen942" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen938" type="section"/>
John 3:0 <div sID="gen943" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="John.3" sID="John.3"/>  <div sID="gen944" type="x-p"/>
John 3:1 Kwaiva nemunhu wekuVaFarisi, Nikodhimo riri zita rake, mutungamiriri weVaJudha.
John 3:2 Uyu wakauya kuna Jesu usiku, akati kwaari: Rabhi*, tinoziva kuti muri Mudzidzisi wakabva kuna Mwari; nokuti hakuna anogona kuita zviratidzo izvi zvamunoita imwi, kana Mwari asinaye.
John 3:3 Jesu akapindura ndokuti kwaari: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri: Kunze kwekuti munhu aberekwa kutsva, haagoni kuona ushe hwaMwari.
John 3:4 Nikodhimo akati kwaari: Munhu anogona kuberekwa sei ava mukuru? Anogona kupinda rwechipiri mudumbu ramai vake agoberekwa here?
John 3:5 Jesu akapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri: Kana munhu asina kuberekwa nemvura neMweya, haagoni kupinda muushe hwaMwari.
John 3:6 Icho chakaberekwa nenyama inyama; nechakaberekwa neMweya, mweya.
John 3:7 Usashamisika kuti ndati kwauri: Zvakafanira kuti muberekwe kutsva.
John 3:8 Mhepo inovhuvhuta painoda, uye unonzwa inzwi rayo, asi hauzivi painobva nepainoenda; wakadaro wese wakaberekwa neMweya.
John 3:9 Nikodhimo akapindura ndokuti kwaari: Zvinhu izvi zvinogona kuitika sei?
John 3:10 Jesu akapindura, ndokuti kwaari: Iwe uri mudzidzisi waIsraeri, asi haunzwisisi zvinhu izvi here?
John 3:11 Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri: Tinotaura zvatinoziva, tichipupura zvatakaona; asi hamugamuchiri uchapupu hwedu.
John 3:12 Kana ndakakuudzai zvinhu zvenyika uye mukasatenda, muchatenda sei kana ndichikuudzai zvinhu zvekudenga?
John 3:13 Uye hakuna munhu wakakwira kudenga, kunze kwewakaburuka kudenga, Mwanakomana wemunhu ari kudenga.
John 3:14 Uye Mozisi sezvaakasimudza nyoka murenje, saizvozvowo Mwanakomana wemunhu anofanira kusimudzwa;
John 3:15 kuti ani nani anotenda maari arege kuparara asi ave neupenyu husingaperi.
John 3:16 Nokuti Mwari wakada nyika zvakadai, kuti wakapa Mwanakomana wake wakaberekwa umwe ega, kuti ani nani anotenda kwaari arege kuparara, asi ave neupenyu husingaperi.
John 3:17 Nokuti Mwari haana kutuma Mwanakomana wake munyika kuti ape nyika mhosva, asi kuti nyika iponeswe naye.
John 3:18 Anotenda kwaari haapiwi mhosva; asi asingatendi watopiwa mhosva, nokuti haana kutenda kuzita reMwanakomana waMwari wakaberekwa umwe ega.
John 3:19 Uku ndiko kupiwa mhosva, kuti chiedza chakasvika panyika, asi vanhu vakada rima pane chiedza; nokuti mabasa avo akange akaipa.
John 3:20 Nokuti umwe neumwe anoita zvakaipa anovenga chiedza, uye haauyi pachiedza, kuti mabasa ake arege kutsiurwa.
John 3:21 Asi anoita chokwadi anouya pachiedza, kuti mabasa ake aratidzwe, kuti akaitwa muna Mwari. <div eID="gen944" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen943" type="section"/>
John 3:22 Shure kwezvinhu izvi wakauya Jesu nevadzidzi vake munyika yeJudhiya; zvino akagarako navo, uye akabhabhatidza. <div eID="gen946" type="x-p"/>
John 3:23 NaJohwaniwo wakange achibhabhatidza muAinoni pedo neSarimi, nokuti paiva nemvura zhinji ipapo; uye vaiuyapo vachibhabhatidzwa.
John 3:24 Nokuti Johwani wakange asati akandwa mutirongo. <div eID="gen947" type="x-p"/>
John 3:25 Zvino gakava rikamuka pakati pe<transChange type="added">vamwe</transChange> vevadzidzi vaJohwani neVaJudha pamusoro pekuchenura.
John 3:26 Zvino vakauya kuna Johwani vakati kwaari: Rabhi, uya waiva nemwi mhiri kwaJoridhani, wamaipupura nezvake, tarirai, iye anobhabhatidza, uye vanouya kwaari vese.
John 3:27 Johwani akapindura ndoti: Munhu haagoni kugamuchira chinhu, kunze kwekuti achipiwa kubva kudenga.
John 3:28 Imwi momene munopupura nezvangu kuti ndakati: Handisi Kristu ini, asi kuti ndakatumwa mberi kwake.
John 3:29 Uyo ane mwenga muwani; asi shamwari yemuwani, imire ichimunzwa, inofara nemufaro nekuda kwenzwi remuwani. Naizvozvo mufaro wangu uyu wazadziswa.
John 3:30 Iye anofanira kukura, asi ini kuderedzwa. <div eID="gen948" type="x-p"/>
John 3:31 Anobva kumusoro ari pamusoro pezvese. Anobva panyika anobva panyika, uye anotaura achibva panyika; anobva kudenga ari pamusoro pezvese.
John 3:32 Uye zvaakaona nezvaakanzwa, ndizvo zvaanopupura; asi hakuna munhu anogamuchira uchapupu hwake.
John 3:33 Anogamuchira uchapupu hwake anoisa mucherechedzo kuti Mwari ndewechokwadi.
John 3:34 Nokuti uyo Mwari waakatuma, anotaura mashoko aMwari; nokuti Mwari anopa Mweya kwete nechiyero.
John 3:35 Baba vanoda Mwanakomana, uye vakapa zvinhu zvese muruoko rwake.
John 3:36 Iye anotenda kuMwanakomana ane upenyu husingaperi; asi iye asingatendi kuMwanakomana, haazooni upenyu, asi kutsamwa kwaMwari kunogara pamusoro pake. <chapter eID="John.3"/><div eID="gen949" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen945" type="section"/>
John 4:0 <div sID="gen950" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="John.4" sID="John.4"/>  <div sID="gen951" type="x-p"/>
John 4:1 Naizvozvo Ishe paakaziva kuti VaFarisi vakange vanzwa kuti Jesu anoita nekubhabhatidza vadzidzi vakawanda kupfuura Johwani,
John 4:2 kunyange Jesu pachake wakange asingabhabhatidzi, asi vadzidzi vake,
John 4:3 akabva Judhiya, akaendazve muGarirea. <div eID="gen951" type="x-p"/>
John 4:4 Asi wakange achifanira kugura neSamaria.
John 4:5 Zvino wakasvika paguta reSamaria rinonzi Sikari, pedo nedunhu Jakobho raakange apa Josefa mwanakomana wake.
John 4:6 Zvino chitubu chaJakobho chakange chiripo. Naizvozvo Jesu aneta nerwendo wakagara saizvozvo pachitubu. Raiva awa rinenge rechitanhatu.
John 4:7 Kwakasvika mukadzi achibva muSamaria kuzochera mvura; Jesu akati kwaari: Ndipe ndinwe.
John 4:8 (Nokuti vadzidzi vake vakange vaenda muguta kunotenga kudya).
John 4:9 Naizvozvo mukadzi ari muSamaria wakati kwaari: Sei iwe uri muJudha uchikumbira kunwa kwandiri, mukadzi muSamaria? Nokuti VaJudha havadyidzani neVaSamaria.
John 4:10 Jesu akapindura akati kwaari: Dai waiziva chipo chaMwari, uye kuti ndiani anoti kwauri: Ndipe ndinwe; ungadai waikumbira kwaari, uye ungadai akupa mvura mhenyu.
John 4:11 Mukadzi akati kwaari: Ishe, hamuna chinhu chekucheresa, uye tsime rakadzika; zvino munoitora kupi mvura mhenyu?
John 4:12 Imwi muri mukuru kuna baba vedu Jakobho, vakatipa tsime, vakanwa pariri ivo, nevana vavo, nezvipfuwo zvavo here?
John 4:13 Jesu akapindura ndokuti kwaari: Ani nani anonwa pamvura iyi, achava nenyotazve;
John 4:14 asi ani nani anonwa pamvura yandichamupa ini, haachatongozovi nenyota nekusingaperi; asi mvura yandichamupa ichava maari chitubu chemvura, inodzutukira kuupenyu husingaperi.
John 4:15 Mukadzi akati kwaari: Ishe, ndipei mvura iyi, kuti ndirege kuva nenyota, kana kuuya pano kuzochera.
John 4:16 Jesu akati kwaari: Enda, unodana murume wako, ugouya pano.
John 4:17 Mukadzi akapindura ndokuti: Handina murume. Jesu akati kwaari: Wareva zvakanaka kuti: Handina murume.
John 4:18 Nokuti wakava nevarume vashanu, uyo waunaye ikozvino haasi murume wako; apa wareva chokwadi.
John 4:19 Mukadzi akati kwaari: Ishe, ndinoona kuti imwi muri muporofita.
John 4:20 Madzibaba edu ainamata mugomo iri; asi imwi munoti muJerusarema ndimo munzvimbo <transChange type="added">munhu</transChange> yaanofanira kunamatapo.
John 4:21 Jesu akati kwaari: Mukadzi, nditende, kuti awa rinouya, ramuchashumira Baba musiri mugomo iri, kana paJerusarema.
John 4:22 Imwi munonamata chamusingazivi; isu tinoshumira chatinoziva; nokuti ruponeso rwunobva kuVaJudha.
John 4:23 Asi awa rinouya, uye ratova iro, apo vanamati vechokwadi vachanamata Baba mumweya nemuchokwadi; nokutiwo Baba vanotsvaka vakadaro kuti vavanamate.
John 4:24 Mwari Mweya; neavo vanomunamata vanofanira kunamata mumweya nemuchokwadi.
John 4:25 Mukadzi akati kwaari: Ndinoziva kuti Mesiasi anouya anonzi Kristu; kana iye asvika, achatiudza zvinhu zvese.
John 4:26 Jesu akati kwaari: Ini ndinotaura kwauri, ndini. <div eID="gen952" type="x-p"/>
John 4:27 Zvino nenguva iyi vadzidzi vake vakasvika, vakashamisika kuti anotaura nemukadzi; asi hakuna umwe wakati: Munotsvakei? Kana: Munotaurirei naye?
John 4:28 Naizvozvo mukadzi akasiya chirongo chake, ndokubva oenda muguta, akati kuvanhu:
John 4:29 Uyai, muone munhu, wandiudza zvinhu zvese zvandakaita; ko uyu haasi iye Kristu here?
John 4:30 Naizvozvo vakabuda muguta, vakauya kwaari. <div eID="gen953" type="x-p"/>
John 4:31 Zvichakadaro vadzidzi vakamunyengetedza vachiti: Rabhi*, idyai.
John 4:32 Asi iye wakati kwavari: Ini ndine kudya kwekudya kwamusingazivi imwi.
John 4:33 Naizvozvo vadzidzi vakataurirana <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Kuti pane umwe wamuvigira zvekudya?
John 4:34 Jesu akati kwavari: Zvekudya zvangu ndizvo kuti ndiite chido chewakandituma, nekupedza basa rake.
John 4:35 Imwi hamutauri here kuti: Kuchine mwedzi mina, zvino kukohwa kunosvika? Tarirai, ndinoti kwamuri: Simudzai meso enyu, muone minda, kuti yatochenera kukohwa.
John 4:36 Zvino anokohwa anogamuchira mubairo, uye anounganidza zvibereko muupenyu husingaperi; kuti vaviri anokusha neanokohwa vafare pamwe.
John 4:37 Nokuti pane izvi shumo ndeyechokwadi inoti: Umwe anokusha, uye umwe anokohwa.
John 4:38 Ini ndakakutumai kukohwa zvamusakashandira; vamwe vakashanda, zvino imwi mapinda pabasa ravo. <div eID="gen954" type="x-p"/>
John 4:39 Zvino vazhinji veVaSamaria kubva muguta iro vakatenda kwaari nekuda kweshoko remukadzi, rakapupura richiti: Wandiudza zvese zvandakaita.
John 4:40 Zvino VaSamaria vakati vachisvika kwaari, vakamunyengetedza kuti agare navo; ndokugarapo mazuva maviri.
John 4:41 Vazhinji vakawedzerwa vakatenda nekuda kweshoko rake.
John 4:42 Zvino vakati kumukadzi: Hatichatendi nekuda kwekureva kwako; nokuti tazvinzwira, uye tinoziva kuti uyu ndiye zvirokwazvo Muponesi wenyika, Kristu.
John 4:43 Zvino shure kwemazuva maviri wakabvapo, ndokuenda kuGarirea;
John 4:44 nokuti Jesu amene wakapupura kuti muporofita haana rukudzo munyika yekwake.
John 4:45 Zvino wakati asvika kuGarirea, VaGarirea vakamugamuchira, vaona zvinhu zvese zvaakaita paJerusarema pamabiko, nokuti naivo vakange vaenda kumabiko. <div eID="gen955" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen950" type="section"/>
John 4:46 Zvino Jesu wakasvikazve paKana yeGarirea, paakange aita mvura <transChange type="added">ive</transChange> waini. Zvino pakange pane rimwe jinda, mwanakomana waro wakange achirwara paKapenaume.
John 4:47 Iro rakati richinzwa kuti Jesu wabva Judhiya akasvika kuGarirea, rikaenda kwaari, rikamugombedzera kuti aburukire aporese mwanakomana waro; nokuti wakange odofa.
John 4:48 Naizvozvo Jesu akati kwariri: Kunze kwekuti maona zviratidzo nezvishamiso, hamungatongotendi.
John 4:49 Jinda rikati kwaari: Ishe, burukai mwana wangu asati afa.
John 4:50 Jesu akati kwaari: Enda, mwanakomana wako anorarama. Munhu ndokutenda shoko Jesu raakareva kwaari, akaenda.
John 4:51 Zvino wakati oburuka, varanda vake vakamuchingamidza, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>udza vachiti: Mwana wenyu anorarama.
John 4:52 Zvino akavabvunza awa raakatanga kunaya. Zvino vakati kwaari: Zuro neawa rechinomwe fivhiri yakamuregedza.
John 4:53 Naizvozvo baba vakaziva kuti maiva imo muawa Jesu maakati kwaari: Mwanakomana wako anorarama; zvino akatenda iye neimba yake yese.
John 4:54 Ichizve chiratidzo chechipiri Jesu chaakaita, abva Judhiya asvika Garirea.  <chapter eID="John.4"/><div eID="gen957" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen956" type="section"/>
John 5:0 <div sID="gen958" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="John.5" sID="John.5"/>  <div sID="gen959" type="x-p"/>
John 5:1 Shure kwezvinhu izvi kwakava nemutambo weVaJudha; Jesu ndokukwira kuJerusarema. <div eID="gen959" type="x-p"/>
John 5:2 Zvino paJerusarema pedo <transChange type="added">nesuwo</transChange> regwai pane dziva rinonzi Bhetisaidha nechiHebheru, rine maberere mashanu.
John 5:3 Mukati mawo makange murere chaunga chikuru chevarwere, chemapofu, chezvirema, chevakawonyana, vakamirira kubvongodzwa kwemvura.
John 5:4 Nokuti mutumwa waiburukira pane imwe nguva mudziva iro, achibvongodza mvura; koti anotanga kupinda shure kwekubvongodzwa kwemvura, waiporeswa, pachirwere chipi zvacho chaainge akabatwa <transChange type="added">nacho</transChange>.
John 5:5 Zvino kwaivapo umwe munhu waiva nemakore makumi matatu nemasere ane chifo.
John 5:6 Jesu wakati amuona arere, achiziva kuti ikozvino wakange ava nenguva refu, akati kwaari: Unoda kuporeswa here?
John 5:7 Murwere akamupindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ishe, handina munhu anondikanda mudziva, kana mvura ichibvongodzwa; asi kana ini ndichiuya, umwe anoburukira mberi kwangu.
John 5:8 Jesu akati kwaari: Simuka, simudza nhovo yako, ufambe.
John 5:9 Zvino pakarepo munhu uyu akaporeswa, ndokusimudza nhovo yake akafamba. Zvino raiva sabata nemusi iwoyo.
John 5:10 Naizvozvo VaJudha vakati kune wakaporeswa: Isabata; hazvisi pamutemo kuti utakure nhovo.
John 5:11 Akavapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Uyo wandiporesa, ndiye wati kwandiri: Simudza nhovo yako ufambe.
John 5:12 Saka vakamubvunza <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Ndiani munhu uyo wati kwauri: Simudza nhovo yako ufambe?
John 5:13 Zvino wakange aporeswa wakange asingazivi kuti ndiani; nokuti Jesu wakange asvova, zvakwaiva nechaunga panzvimbo iyo.
John 5:14 Shure kwezvinhu izvi Jesu akamuwana mutembere, akati kwaari: Tarira waporeswa; usatadzazve, zvimwe chimwe chakanyanya kuipa chingaitika kwauri.
John 5:15 Munhu akabva, akaudza VaJudha kuti ndiJesu wakamuporesa.
John 5:16 Zvino nekuda kweizvozvo VaJudha vakashusha Jesu, ndokutsvaka kumuuraya, nokuti wakaita zvinhu izvi nesabata. <div eID="gen960" type="x-p"/>
John 5:17 Asi Jesu wakavapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Baba vangu vanoshanda kusvikira ikozvino, neni ndinoshanda.
John 5:18 Naizvozvo nekuda kweizvi VaJudha vakanyanya kutsvaka kumuuraya, nokuti wakange asingadariki sabata chete, asi wakatiwo Mwari ndiBaba vake vomene, achizvienzanisa naMwari. <div eID="gen961" type="x-p"/>
John 5:19 Zvino Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Mwanakomana haagoni kuita pachake, kunze kwezvaanoona Baba vachichiita; nokuti chero icho chavanoita, ndizvowo saizvozvo Mwanakomanawo zvaanoita.
John 5:20 Nokuti Baba vanoda Mwanakomana, uye vanomuratidza zvinhu zvese zvavanoita ivo; vachamuratidzawo mabasa makuru anopfuura awa, kuti imwi mushamisike.
John 5:21 Nokuti Baba sezvavanomutsa vakafa vachi<transChange type="added">va</transChange>raramisa, saizvozvo Mwanakomana anoraramisawo vaanoda.
John 5:22 Nokuti naBaba havatongi munhu, asi vakapa Mwanakomana kutonga kwese;
John 5:23 kuti vese vakudze Mwanakomana sezvavanokudza Baba. Asingakudzi Mwanakomana, haakudzi Baba vakamutuma. <div eID="gen962" type="x-p"/>
John 5:24 Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Anonzwa shoko rangu, nekutenda kune wakandituma, ane upenyu husingaperi; uye haasviki mukupiwa mhosva, asi wapfuura kubva murufu akaenda muupenyu.
John 5:25 Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Awa rinouya, nazvino ravapo, apo vakafa vachanzwa inzwi reMwanakomana waMwari, uye vanonzwa vachararama.
John 5:26 Nokuti Baba sezvavane upenyu mavari pachavo, saizvozvo vakapa kuMwanakomanawo kuti ave neupenyu maari pachake;
John 5:27 uye vakamupa simba rekutongawo, nokuti Mwanakomana wemunhu.
John 5:28 Musashamisika nezvizvi; nokuti awa rinouya, apo vese vari mumakuva vachanzwa inzwi rake,
John 5:29 zvino vachabuda, avo vakaita zvakanaka, mukumuka kweupenyu; neavo vakaita zvakaipa, mukumuka kwekupiwa mhosva. <div eID="gen963" type="x-p"/>
John 5:30 Ini handigoni kuita chinhu pachangu; sekunzwa kwangu, ndinotonga; uye kutonga kwangu kwakarurama, nokuti handitsvaki chido changu, asi chido chaBaba vakandituma. <div eID="gen964" type="x-p"/>
John 5:31 Kana ini ndichipupura nezvangu, uchapupu hwangu hahusi hwechokwadi.
John 5:32 Aripo umwe anopupura nezvangu; uye ndinoziva kuti uchapupu hwaanopupura nezvangu ndehwechokwadi.
John 5:33 Imwi makatumira kuna Johwani, uye akapupurira chokwadi.
John 5:34 Asi ini handigamuchiri uchapupu hunobva kumunhu, asi ndinoreva zvinhu izvi kuti imwi muponeswe.
John 5:35 Iye wakange ari mwenje unopfuta neunovhenekera, nemwi makange muchishuva kufara kwazvo kwechinguvana muchiedza chake. <div eID="gen965" type="x-p"/>
John 5:36 Asi ini ndine uchapupu ukuru kune hwaJohwani; nokuti mabasa Baba avakandipa kuti ndimapedze, mabasa pachawo ini andinoita, anopupura nezvangu kuti Baba vakandituma.
John 5:37 NaBaba vakandituma, ivo vakapupura nezvangu. Hamuna chero nguva kunzwa inzwi rake, kana kuona chimiro chake.
John 5:38 Uye hamuna shoko rake rinogara mamuri, nokuti iye waakatuma, uyu imwi hamuna kumutenda.
John 5:39 Nzverai magwaro, nokuti imwi munofunga kuti mune upenyu husingaperi maari, uye ndiwo anopupura nezvangu.
John 5:40 Asi hamudi kuuya kwandiri, kuti muve neupenyu. <div eID="gen966" type="x-p"/>
John 5:41 Handigamuchiri rukudzo kuvanhu;
John 5:42 asi ndinokuzivai imwi, kuti hamuna rudo rwaMwari mamuri.
John 5:43 Ini ndauya muzita raBaba vangu, asi hamuna kundigamuchira; kana umwe akauya muzita rake pachake, muchamugamuchira iye.
John 5:44 Munogona kutenda sei imwi munogamuchira rukudzo umwe kune umwe, asi musingatsvaki rukudzo rwunobva kuna Mwari ega? <div eID="gen967" type="x-p"/>
John 5:45 Musafunga kuti ini ndichakupai mhosva kuna Baba; ariko anokupai mhosva, <transChange type="added">ndiye</transChange> Mozisi wamunovimba naye imwi.
John 5:46 Nokuti dai maitenda Mozisi, maitenda ini; nokuti iye wakanyora nezvangu.
John 5:47 Asi kana musingatendi magwaro ake, muchatenda sei mashoko angu?  <chapter eID="John.5"/><div eID="gen968" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen958" type="section"/>
John 6:0 <div sID="gen969" type="section"/> <chapter n="6" osisID="John.6" sID="John.6"/>  <div sID="gen970" type="x-p"/>
John 6:1 Shure kwezvinhu izvi Jesu wakabva akaenda mhiri kwegungwa reGarirea, rinova reTibheriasi.
John 6:2 Zvino chaunga chikuru chikamutevera, nokuti vakaona zviratidzo zvake zvaaiita kune avo vairwara.
John 6:3 Jesu ndokukwira mugomo, akagarapo nevadzidzi vake.
John 6:4 Zvino pasika, mutambo weVaJudha, wakange waswedera. <div eID="gen970" type="x-p"/>
John 6:5 Zvino Jesu paakasimudza meso, ndokuona kuti chaunga chikuru chinouya kwaari, akati kuna Firipi: Tichatengepi zvingwa, kuti ava vadye?
John 6:6 Wakareva izvozvo achimuedza, nokuti iye waiziva zvaaizoita.
John 6:7 Firipi akamupindura <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Zvingwa zvemadhenario* mazana maviri hazvivakwani, kuti umwe neumwe wavo atore chidiki.
John 6:8 Umwe wevadzidzi vake, Andiriya munin'ina waSimoni Petro, akati kwaari:
John 6:9 Pane kamukomana pano kane zvingwa zvishanu zvebhari* nehove diki mbiri; asi zvii kuvazhinji vakadai?
John 6:10 Asi Jesu wakati: Garisai vanhu pasi. Zvino kwakange kune uswa uzhinji panzvimbo iyo. Naizvozvo varume vakagara pasi, muuwandu vachinge zvuru zvishanu.
John 6:11 Zvino Jesu wakatora zvingwa, avonga akagovera kuvadzidzi, vadzidzi <transChange type="added">vakagovera</transChange> avo vakange vagere pasi; saizvozvowo zvehove diki zvakawanda sezvavaida.
John 6:12 Zvino vakati vaguta, akati kuvadzidzi vake: Unganidzai zvimedu zvasara, kuti kurege kurasika chinhu.
John 6:13 Naizvozvo vakaunganidza, vakazadza matengu gumi nemaviri nezvimedu zvezvingwa zvishanu zvebhari, zvakasara kune avo vakadya.
John 6:14 Kuzoti vanhu avo vaona chiratidzo Jesu chaakaita, vakati: Zvirokwazvo uyu ndiye muporofita achauya panyika.
John 6:15 Naizvozvo Jesu aziva kuti voda kuuya nekumubata nesimba, kumuita mambo, akasuduruka akaendazve mugomo ari ega. <div eID="gen971" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen969" type="section"/>
John 6:16 Zvino ava madekwani, vadzidzi vake vakaburukira kugungwa,
John 6:17 zvino vapinda muchikepe, vakayambuka gungwa kuuya kuKapenaume. Zvino kwakange kwatosviba, asi Jesu wakange asati asvika kwavari.
John 6:18 Gungwa ndokumuka nokuti mhepo huru yaivhuvhuta.
John 6:19 Zvino vakati vakwasva masitadhiya* anenge makumi maviri nemashanu kana makumi matatu, vakaona Jesu achifamba pamusoro pegungwa, achiswedera pachikepe; zvino vakatya.
John 6:20 Asi wakati kwavari: Ndini, musatya.
John 6:21 Zvino vakada kumugamuchira muchikepe; pakarepo chikepe chikasvika kunyika kwavakange vachienda. <div eID="gen973" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen972" type="section"/>
John 6:22 Chifume chaunga chakange chimire kune rumwe rutivi rwegungwa, chichiona kuti pakange pasina rimwe igwa ipapo kunze kweriri rimwe makange mapinda vadzidzi vake mariri, uye kuti Jesu haana kupinda nevadzidzi vake mugwa, asi vadzidzi vake vakange vaenda vega,
John 6:23 (asi kwakasvika mamwe magwa aibva Tibheriyasi pedo nenzvimbo pavakadya chingwa, Ishe avonga);
John 6:24 naizvozvo chaunga chakati chaona kuti Jesu wakange asipo kana vadzidzi vake, ivo vakapindawo mumagwa, vakasvika kuKapenaume, vachitsvaka Jesu.
John 6:25 Zvino vamuwana mhiri kwegungwa, vakati kwaari: Rabhi*, masvika pano rinhi?
John 6:26 Jesu akavapindura akati: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Munonditsvaka, kwete nokuti makaona zviratidzo, asi nokuti makadya zvezvingwa mukaguta.
John 6:27 Musashandira kudya kunoparara, asi kudya kunogara kusvika kuupenyu husingaperi, Mwanakomana wemunhu kwaachakupai; nokuti Mwari Baba vakaisa pane uyu mucherechedzo.
John 6:28 Naizvozvo vakati kwaari: Tichaitei, kuti tishande mabasa aMwari?
John 6:29 Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Iri ndiro basa raMwari, kuti mutende kune waakatuma iye. <div eID="gen975" type="x-p"/>
John 6:30 Naizvozvo vakati kwaari: Ko imwi munoita chiratidzo chipi kuti tione tikutendei? Munoshandei?
John 6:31 Madzibaba edu akadya mana* murenje, sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Wakavapa chingwa chakabva kudenga kuti vadye.
John 6:32 Naizvozvo Jesu akati kwavari: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Mozisi haana kukupai chingwa chakabva kudenga; asi Baba vangu vanokupai chingwa chechokwadi chinobva kudenga.
John 6:33 Nokuti chingwa chaMwari ndiye anoburuka achibva kudenga achipa upenyu kunyika.
John 6:34 Zvino vakati kwaari: Ishe, tipei chingwa ichi nguva dzese.
John 6:35 Jesu ndokuti kwavari: Ndini chingwa cheupenyu; uyo anouya kwandiri, haangatongovi nenzara; neanotenda kwandiri haangatongovi nenyota. <div eID="gen976" type="x-p"/>
John 6:36 Asi ndakati kwamuri: Nemwi makandiona, asi hamuna kutenda.
John 6:37 Wese Baba wavanondipa achauya kwandiri; neanouya kwandiri, handingatongomurasiri kunze.
John 6:38 Nokuti ndakaburuka kudenga, kwete kuti ndiite chido changu, asi chido chaiye wakandituma.
John 6:39 Zvino ichi ndicho chido chaBaba vakandituma, kuti chese chavakandipa, ndisarasikirwa <transChange type="added">nechinhu</transChange> pachiri, asi ndichimutse nezuva rekupedzisira.
John 6:40 Uye ichi ndicho chido chewakandituma, kuti wese anoona Mwanakomana uye achitenda kwaari, ave neupenyu husingaperi, uye ini ndichamumutsa nezuva rekupedzisira. <div eID="gen977" type="x-p"/>
John 6:41 Zvino VaJudha vakagunun'una pamusoro pake, nokuti wakati: Ndini chingwa chakaburuka kubva kudenga.
John 6:42 Ndokuti: Uyu haasi Jesu Mwanakomana waJosefa, baba namai vake vatinoziva isu here? Zvino iye anogoti sei: Ndakaburuka kubva kudenga?
John 6:43 Naizvozvo Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Musagunun'una pakati penyu.
John 6:44 Hakuna munhu anogona kuuya kwandiri, kunze kwekuti Baba vakandituma vamukweva, uye ini ndichamumutsa nezuva rekupedzisira.
John 6:45 Zvakanyorwa muvaporofita <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Uye vachadzidziswa vese naMwari. Wese naizvozvo wakanzwa naBaba akadzidza, anouya kwandiri.
John 6:46 Kwete kuti kune wakaona Baba, kunze kweuyu anobva kuna Mwari, uyu wakaona Baba.
John 6:47 Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Anotenda kwandiri, ane upenyu husingaperi.
John 6:48 Ini ndiri chingwa cheupenyu.
John 6:49 Madzibaba enyu akadya mana* murenje, asi akafa.
John 6:50 Ichi chingwa chinoburuka kubva kudenga, kuti munhu adye pachiri agorega kufa.
John 6:51 Ini ndini chingwa chipenyu, chakaburuka kubva kudenga; kana munhu achidya zvechingwa ichi, achararama nekusingaperi. Uye chingwa ini chandichapa, inyama yangu, ini yandichapira upenyu hwenyika. <div eID="gen978" type="x-p"/>
John 6:52 Naizvozvo VaJudha vakakakavadzana vachiti: Uyu anogona kutipa sei nyama <transChange type="added">yake</transChange> tidye?
John 6:53 Naizvozvo Jesu wakati kwavari: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Kunze kwekuti mudye nyama yeMwanakomana wemunhu nekunwa ropa rake, hamuna upenyu mamuri.
John 6:54 Anodya nyama yangu nekunwa ropa rangu, ane upenyu husingaperi, uye ini ndichamumutsa nezuva rekupedzisira.
John 6:55 Nokuti nyama yangu kudya zvirokwazvo, neropa rangu chinwiwa zvirokwazvo.
John 6:56 Anodya nyama yangu nekunwa ropa rangu, anogara mandiri, neni maari.
John 6:57 Baba vapenyu sezvavakandituma, neni ndinorarama naBaba; naizvozvo anondidya, naiye achararama neni.
John 6:58 Ichi chingwa chakaburuka kubva kudenga; hazvina kuita semadzibaba enyu akadya mana* akafa; anodya chingwa ichi, achararama nekusingaperi. <div eID="gen979" type="x-p"/>
John 6:59 Zvinhu izvi wakazvireva musinagoge achidzidzisa paKapenaume. <div eID="gen980" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen974" type="section"/>
John 6:60 Naizvozvo vazhinji vevadzidzi vake vakati vachinzwa, vakati: Iri shoko igukutu; ndiani anogona kurinzwa?
John 6:61 Asi Jesu aziva mukati make kuti vadzidzi vake vanogunun'una neizvi, wakati kwavari: Izvi zvinokugumbusai kanhi?
John 6:62 Ko <transChange type="added">muchagodini</transChange> kana muchiona Mwanakomana wemunhu achikwira kwaaiva pakutanga?
John 6:63 Mweya ndiye anoraramisa, nyama haibatsiri chinhu; mashoko ini andinotaura kwamuri, mweya uye upenyu.
John 6:64 Asi variko vamwe venyu vasingatendi. Nokuti Jesu wakange achiziva kubva pakutanga, kuti ndivana ani vaisatenda, uye kuti ndiani waizomutengesa.
John 6:65 Akati: Nekuda kwaizvozvi ndati kwamuri: Hakuna munhu anogona kuuya kwandiri, kunze kwekuti azvipiwa naBaba vangu. <div eID="gen982" type="x-p"/>
John 6:66 Kubva ipapo vazhinji vevadzidzi vake vakadzokera shure, vakasazofambazve naye.
John 6:67 Naizvozvo Jesu wakati kune vanegumi nevaviri: Imwiwo hamudi kuenda here?
John 6:68 Zvino Simoni Petro akamupindura, <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ishe, tichaenda kuna ani? <transChange type="added">Imwi</transChange> mune mashoko eupenyu husingaperi,
John 6:69 uye isu tinotenda, uye tinoziva kuti ndimwi Kristu Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu.
John 6:70 Jesu akavapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ini handina kukusanangurai imwi vanegumi nevaviri here, asi umwe wenyu ndidhiabhorosi?
John 6:71 Waireva Judhasi Isikariyoti waSimoni; nokuti ndiye waizomutengesa, ari umwe wevanegumi nevaviri.  <chapter eID="John.6"/><div eID="gen983" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen981" type="section"/>
John 7:0 <div sID="gen984" type="section"/> <chapter n="7" osisID="John.7" sID="John.7"/>  <div sID="gen985" type="x-p"/>
John 7:1 Shure kwezvinhu izvi Jesu wakafamba-famba muGarirea; nokuti wakange asingadi kufamba-famba muJudhiya, nokuti VaJudha vakange vachitsvaka kumuuraya. <div eID="gen985" type="x-p"/>
John 7:2 Zvino mutambo weVaJudha, mutambo wematende wakange waswedera.
John 7:3 Naizvozvo vanin'ina vake vakati kwaari: Ibvai pano muende muJudhiya, kuti vadzidzi venyuwo vaone mabasa enyu amunoita.
John 7:4 Nokuti hakuna umwe anoita chinhu muchivande iye amene achitsvakawo kuva pachena. Kana uchiita zvinhu izvi, zviratidze kunyika.
John 7:5 Nokuti kunyange vanin'ina vake vaiva vasingatendi kwaari.
John 7:6 Naizvozvo Jesu akati kwavari: Nguva yangu haisati yasvika, asi nguva yenyu inogara yakagadzirwa.
John 7:7 Nyika haigoni kukuvengai; asi ini inondivenga, nokuti ini ndinopupura nezvayo, kuti mabasa ayo akaipa.
John 7:8 Kwirai imwi kumutambo uyu; ini handisati ndokwira kumutambo uyu, nokuti nguva yangu haisati yazadzisika.
John 7:9 Wakati areva zvinhu izvi kwavari, akagara muGarirea. <div eID="gen986" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen984" type="section"/>
John 7:10 Asi vanin'ina vake vakati vakwira, naiye akabva okwira kumutambo, kwete pachena, asi panenge sepachivande.
John 7:11 Zvino VaJudha vakamutsvaka pamutambo, vakati: Aripi uya?
John 7:12 Kwakavapo kun'un'una kwakawanda pakati pezvaunga pamusoro pake; vamwe vachiti: Wakanaka. Asi vamwe vachiti: Kwete, asi anotsausa chaunga.
John 7:13 Kunyange zvakadaro kwakange kusina munhu wakataura pachena pamusoro pake nekutya VaJudha. <div eID="gen988" type="x-p"/>
John 7:14 Zvino pava pakati pemutambo, Jesu akakwira kutembere, akadzidzisa.
John 7:15 Zvino VaJudha vakashamisika vachiti: Uyu anoziva sei magwaro asina kudzidza?
John 7:16 Jesu akavapindura akati: Dzidziso yangu haisi yangu, asi yake wakandituma.
John 7:17 Kana munhu achida kuita chido chake, achaziva zvedzidziso kana ichibva kuna Mwari, kana kuti ini ndinotaura zvangu.
John 7:18 Anozvitaurira zvake, anotsvaka rumbidzo yake pachake; asi anotsvaka rumbidzo yewakamutuma, ndiye wechokwadi, uye hapana kusarurama maari. <div eID="gen989" type="x-p"/>
John 7:19 Mozisi haana kukupai murairo here? Asi hakuna wenyu anoita murairo. Munotsvakirei kundiuraya?
John 7:20 Chaunga chikapindura chikati: Une dhimoni; ndiani anotsvaka kukuuraya?
John 7:21 Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Ndakaita basa rimwe, uye munoshamisika mese.
John 7:22 Naizvozvo Mozisi wakakupai dzingiso (kusiri kuti yakabva kuna Mozisi, asi kumadzibaba), zvino nesabata munodzingisa munhu.
John 7:23 Kana munhu nesabata achigamuchira dzingiso, kuti murairo waMozisi urege kutyorwa, munonditsamwira nokuti ndaporesa munhu zvakaperera nesabata here?
John 7:24 Musatonga nezvinoonekwa, asi tongai kutonga kwakarurama. <div eID="gen990" type="x-p"/>
John 7:25 Vamwe veveJerusarema ndokuti: Uyu haasiye wavanotsvaka kuuraya here?
John 7:26 Asi tarira, anotaura pachena, asi havarevi chinhu kwaari. Kuti vatungamiriri vanoziva zvechokwadi here kuti ndiye Kristu chaiye?
John 7:27 Asi uyu tinoziva kwaanobva; asi Kristu kana achisvika, hakuna angaziva kwaanobva.
John 7:28 Naizvozvo Jesu wakadanidzira mutembere achidzidzisa achiti: Nemwi munoziva ini, uye munoziva kwandakabva; uye handina kuzviuira, asi wakandituma ndewechokwadi, wamusingazivi imwi.
John 7:29 Asi ini ndinomuziva, nokuti ndinobva kwaari, uye iye wakandituma. <div eID="gen991" type="x-p"/>
John 7:30 Naizvozvo vakatsvaka kumubata, asi hakuna wakaisa ruoko paari, nokuti awa rake rakange risati rasvika. <div eID="gen992" type="x-p"/>
John 7:31 Asi vazhinji vechaunga vakatenda kwaari, vakati: Kana Kristu achisvika, achaita zviratidzo zvizhinji kune izvi uyu zvaaita here?
John 7:32 VaFarisi vakanzwa chaunga chichin'un'una zvinhu izvi pamusoro pake; VaFarisi nevapristi vakuru ndokutuma vabatsiri kuti vamubate.
John 7:33 Naizvozvo Jesu akati kwavari: Ndichinemwi chinguvana, ndoenda kune wakandituma.
John 7:34 Muchanditsvaka mukasa<transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>wana; uye apo pandiri ini, imwi hamugoni kuuya.
John 7:35 Naizvozvo VaJudha vakataurirana <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Uyu oda kuendepi kuti isu tisamuwana? Achaenda kune vakapararira veVaGiriki, adzidzise VaGiriki here?
John 7:36 Ishokoi iri raanoti: Muchanditsvaka, asi hamunga<transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>wani; nere<transChange type="added">kuti:</transChange> Pandiri ini, imwi hamugoni kuuya? <div eID="gen993" type="x-p"/>
John 7:37 Zvino nezuva rekupedzisira, iro guru remutambo Jesu wakasimuka akadanidzira achiti: Kana ani nani ane nyota, ngaauye kwandiri anwe.
John 7:38 Anotenda kwandiri, rugwaro sezvarwakareva, nzizi dzemvura mhenyu dzichaerera kubva mudumbu rake.
John 7:39 Asi izvi wakareva zveMweya wavaizogamuchira vanotenda kwaari; nokuti Mweya Mutsvene wakange asati <transChange type="added">avapo</transChange>, nokuti Jesu wakange asati akudzwa. <div eID="gen994" type="x-p"/>
John 7:40 Naizvozvo vazhinji vechaunga vakati vachinzwa shoko iri vakati: Zvirokwazvo uyu ndiye muporofita.
John 7:41 Vamwe vakati: Uyu ndiye Kristu. Asi vamwe vakati: Ko Kristu angabva Garirea here?
John 7:42 Rugwaro haruna kureva here kuti Kristu achabva kumbeu yaDhavhidhi, nepamusha weBhetirehemu paiva naDhavhidhi?
John 7:43 Naizvozvo pakava nekupesana pakati pechaunga pamusoro pake.
John 7:44 Zvino vamwe vavo vakada kumubata, asi hakuna wakaisa maoko kwaari. <div eID="gen995" type="x-p"/>
John 7:45 Zvino vabatsiri vakaenda kuvapristi vakuru neVaFarisi; ivo vakati kwavari: Nemhaka yei musina kumuuisa?
John 7:46 Vabatsiri vakapindura <transChange type="added">vakati</transChange>: Hakuna kumbotaura munhu seizvi, semunhu uyu.
John 7:47 Zvino VaFarisi vakavapindura <transChange type="added">vakati</transChange>: Nemwi matsauswa kanhi?
John 7:48 Aripo here wakatenda kwaari kuvatungamiriri kana kuVaFarisi?
John 7:49 Asi chaunga ichi chisingazivi murairo chakatukwa.
John 7:50 Nikodhimo, uya akauya kwaari usiku, ari umwe wavo, akati kwavari:
John 7:51 Murairo wedu unotonga munhu here, kunze kwekuti wambomunzwa nekuziva chaanoita?
John 7:52 Vakapindura vakati kwaari: Ko iwewo uri weGarirea here? Nzvera uone kuti hakuna kumuka muporofita kuGarirea.
John 7:53 Umwe neumwe ndokuenda kumba kwake. <chapter eID="John.7"/><div eID="gen996" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen987" type="section"/>
John 8:0 <div sID="gen997" type="section"/> <chapter n="8" osisID="John.8" sID="John.8"/>  <div sID="gen998" type="x-p"/>
John 8:1 Asi Jesu wakaenda kugomo reMiorivhi. <div eID="gen998" type="x-p"/>
John 8:2 Zvino mangwanani-ngwanani wakauyazve kutembere, vanhu vese ndokuuya kwaari; iye ndokugara pasi akavadzidzisa.
John 8:3 Zvino vanyori neVaFarisi vakauya kwaari nemukadzi wakabatwa mukufeva, vakati vamumisa pakati,
John 8:4 vakati kwaari: Mudzidzisi, mukadzi uyu wabatwa achifeva, pachiitiko chaipo;
John 8:5 zvino Mozisi pamurairo wakatiraira kuti vakadaro vatakwe nemabwe; naizvozvo imwi munoti kudini?
John 8:6 Asi izvozvi vakareva vachimuedza, kuti vave nechavangamupomera. Asi Jesu wakakotamira pasi, akanyora pasi nemunwe, seasina ku<transChange type="added">vanzwa</transChange>.
John 8:7 Zvino vakati vachiramba vachimubvunza, akatasamuka akati kwavari: Asina chivi pakati penyu, ngaatange kukanda ibwe kwaari.
John 8:8 Zvino akakotamirazve pasi, akanyora pasi.
John 8:9 Zvino ivo vanzwa, vachipiwa mhosva nehana <transChange type="added">yavo</transChange>, vakabuda umwe-umwe, kutanga kuvakuru kusvikira kune vekupedzisira; Jesu akasara ari ega, nemukadzi amire pakati.
John 8:10 Jesu wakati atasamuka, akasaona munhu asi mukadzi, akati kwaari: Mai, varipi vaya vapomeri vako? Hakuna wakupa mhosva here?
John 8:11 Iye ndokuti: Hakuna, Ishe. Jesu ndokuti kwaari: Neni handikupi mhosva. Enda, usachitadzazve. <div eID="gen999" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen997" type="section"/>
John 8:12 Naizvozvo Jesu wakataurazve kwavari, achiti: Ini ndiri chiedza chenyika; anonditevera haangatongofambi murima, asi achava nechiedza cheupenyu.
John 8:13 Naizvozvo VaFarisi vakati kwaari: Iwe unopupura nezvako; uchapupu hwako hahuna chokwadi.
John 8:14 Jesu akapindura akati kwavari: Kunyange ndichipupura nezvangu ini, uchapupu hwangu ndehwechokwadi; nokuti ndinoziva kwandakabva, uye kwandinoenda; asi imwi hamuzivi kwandakabva, uye kwandinoenda.
John 8:15 Imwi munotonga maererano nenyama; ini handitongi munhu.
John 8:16 Asi kunyange ini ndichitonga, kutonga kwangu ndekwechokwadi; nokuti handisi ndega, asi ini naBaba vakandituma.
John 8:17 Uye mumurairo wenyu makanyorwa kuti uchapupu hwevanhu vaviri ndehwechokwadi.
John 8:18 Ndini ndinopupura nezvangu, naBaba vakandituma vanopupura nezvangu.
John 8:19 Naizvozvo vakati kwaari: Baba vako varipi? Jesu akapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Hamuzivi ini, kana Baba vangu. Dai maindiziva ini, mungadai maiziva Baba vanguwo.
John 8:20 Jesu wakataura mashoko awa muchivigiro chezvipo, achidzidzisa mutembere; asi hakuna munhu wakamubata, nokuti awa rake rakange risati rasvika. <div eID="gen1001" type="x-p"/>
John 8:21 Naizvozvo Jesu wakatizve kwavari: Ini ndinoenda, uye muchanditsvaka, mukafira muzvivi zvenyu; ini pandinoenda, imwi hamugoni kuuyapo.
John 8:22 Naizvozvo VaJudha vakati: Achazviuraya kanhi? Nokuti anoti: Pandinoenda ini, imwi hamugoni kuuyapo?
John 8:23 Zvino akati kwavari: Imwi munobva pasi, ini ndinobva kumusoro; imwi munobva panyika ino, ini handibvi panyika ino.
John 8:24 Naizvozvo ndareva kwamuri kuti muchafira muzvivi zvenyu; nokuti kana musinganditendi kuti ndini <transChange type="added">iye</transChange>, muchafira muzvivi zvenyu.
John 8:25 Naizvozvo vakati kwaari: Ndiwe ani? Jesu ndokuti kwavari: Ndizvo zvandakuudzaiwo kubva pakutanga.
John 8:26 Ndine zvinhu zvizhinji zvekutaura nekutonga pamusoro penyu; asi wakandituma ndewechokwadi, uye izvo zvandakanzwa ini kwaari ndizvo zvandinotaura kunyika.
John 8:27 Havana kunzwisisa kuti anotaura kwavari zvaBaba.
John 8:28 Naizvozvo Jesu wakati kwavari: Kana masimudza Mwanakomana wemunhu, ipapo muchaziva kuti ndini <transChange type="added">iye</transChange>, uye handiiti chinhu pachangu, asi Baba vangu sezvavakandidzidzisa, ndinotaura zvinhu izvi.
John 8:29 Zvino iye wakandituma aneni; Baba havana kundisiya ndega, nokuti ini ndinoita nguva dzese zvinovafadza. <div eID="gen1002" type="x-p"/>
John 8:30 Achiri kutaura izvi vazhinji vakatenda kwaari.
John 8:31 Naizvozvo Jesu wakati kuVaJudha vakatenda kwaari: Kana imwi muchirambira mushoko rangu, muri vadzidzi vangu zvirokwazvo;
John 8:32 uye muchaziva chokwadi, uye chokwadi chichakusunungurai.
John 8:33 Vakamupindura <transChange type="added">vakati</transChange>: Tiri mbeu yaAbhurahama, uye hatina kutongova varanda vemunhu; iwe unoreva sei kuti: Muchava vakasunungurwa?
John 8:34 Jesu akavapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Ani nani anoita chivi muranda wechivi.
John 8:35 Uye muranda haagari mumba nekusingaperi; mwanakomana anogara nekusingaperi.
John 8:36 Naizvozvo kana Mwanakomana achikusunungurai, muchava vakasununguka zvirokwazvo. <div eID="gen1003" type="x-p"/>
John 8:37 Ndinoziva kuti muri mbeu yaAbhurahama; asi munotsvaka kundiuraya, nokuti shoko rangu harina nzvimbo mamuri.
John 8:38 Ini ndinotaura izvo zvandakaona kuna Baba vangu; naizvozvo nemwi munoita izvo zvamakaona kuna baba venyu.
John 8:39 Vakapindura vakati kwaari: Baba vedu ndiAbhurahama. Jesu akati kwavari: Dai maiva vana vaAbhurahama, maiita mabasa aAbhurahama.
John 8:40 Asi ikozvino munotsvaka kundiuraya, munhu wakakuudzai chokwadi, chandakanzwa kuna Mwari; izvo Abhurahama haana kuzviita.
John 8:41 Imwi munoita mabasa ababa venyu. Naizvozvo vakati kwaari: Hatina kuberekwa neupombwe isu; tina Baba vamwe, Mwari.
John 8:42 Jesu akati kwavari: Dai Mwari aiva Baba venyu, maindida; nokuti ini ndakabuda ndichibva kuna Mwari; nokuti handina kuzviuyira, asi iye wakandituma.
John 8:43 Sei musinganzwisisi nhaurwa yangu? Nokuti hamugoni kunzwa shoko rangu.
John 8:44 Imwi muri vababa <transChange type="added">venyu</transChange> dhiabhorosi, munoda kuita zvishuvo zvababa venyu. Iye wakange ari mhondi kubva pakutanga, asingagari muchokwadi, nokuti maari hamuna chokwadi. Kana achitaura nhema, anotaura pachake; nokuti mutauri wenhema uye baba vadzo.
John 8:45 Asi nokuti ini ndinoreva chokwadi, hamunditendi.
John 8:46 Ndiani kwamuri angandipomera pamusoro pechivi? Uye kana ndichireva chokwadi, imwi munoregerei kunditenda?
John 8:47 Uyo anobva kuna Mwari anonzwa mashoko aMwari; naizvozvo imwi hamunzwi, nokuti hamubvi kuna Mwari. <div eID="gen1004" type="x-p"/>
John 8:48 Naizvozvo VaJudha vakapindura vakati kwaari: Isu hatina kureva kwazvo here kuti iwe uri muSamaria, uye une dhimoni?
John 8:49 Jesu akapindura, <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ini handina dhimoni, asi ndinokudza Baba vangu; asi imwi munondizvidza.
John 8:50 Asi ini handitsvaki rumbidzo yangu; ariko anotsvaka nekutonga.
John 8:51 Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Kana munhu akachengeta shoko rangu, haangatongooni rufu nekusingaperi.
John 8:52 Naizvozvo VaJudha vakati kwaari: Ikozvino toziva kuti une dhimoni; Abhurahama wakafa, nevaporofita, asi iwe unoti: Kana munhu akachengeta shoko rangu, haangatongoraviri rufu nekusingaperi.
John 8:53 Iwe uri mukuru kuna baba vedu Abhurahama, vakafa? Nevaporofita vakafa; iwe unozviita ani?
John 8:54 Jesu akapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Kana ini ndichizvikudza, rukudzo rwangu harwusi chinhu; ndiBaba vangu vanondikudza, avo imwi vamunoti ndiMwari wenyu.
John 8:55 Uye hamuna kuvaziva; asi ini ndinovaziva, uye kana ndikati handivazivi, ndichava murevi wenhema semwi; asi ndinovaziva, ndinochengeta shoko ravo.
John 8:56 Baba venyu Abhurahama vakafara kuona zuva rangu, uye vaka<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>ona vakapembera.
John 8:57 Naizvozvo VaJudha vakati kwaari: Hausati wava nemakore makumi mashanu, zvino wakaona Abhurahama here?
John 8:58 Jesu akati kwavari: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Abhurahama asati avapo, ini ndiripo.
John 8:59 Ipapo vakanonga mabwe kuti vaposhere kwaari; asi Jesu wakazvivanza, akabuda mutembere, achigura nepakati pavo; akapfuura saizvozvo. <chapter eID="John.8"/><div eID="gen1005" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1000" type="section"/>
John 9:0 <div sID="gen1006" type="section"/> <chapter n="9" osisID="John.9" sID="John.9"/>  <div sID="gen1007" type="x-p"/>
John 9:1 Wakati achipfuura, akaona munhu bofu kubva pakuberekwa.
John 9:2 Vadzidzi vake ndokumubvunza, vachiti: Rabhi*, ndiani wakatadza, uyu kana vabereki vake, kuti aberekwe ari bofu?
John 9:3 Jesu akapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Uyu haana kutadza, kana vabereki vake; asi kuti mabasa aMwari aoneswe maari.
John 9:4 Ndinofanira kushanda mabasa ewakandituma achiri masikati; usiku hunouya, apo pasina munhu angagona kushanda.
John 9:5 Kana ndichiri panyika, ndiri chiedza chenyika.
John 9:6 Wakati areva izvi, akapfira pasi, akaita dope nemate, akazodza dope pameso ebofu,
John 9:7 akati kwaari: Enda <transChange type="added">uno</transChange>shamba mudziva reSiroami (zvinoshandurwa <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Wakatumwa). Naizvozvo wakaenda akashamba, akadzoka achiona. <div eID="gen1007" type="x-p"/>
John 9:8 Naizvozvo vavakidzani nevaimuona pakutanga kuti wakange ari bofu, vakati: Haasi iye uyu waigara achipemha here?
John 9:9 Vamwe vakati: Uyu ndiye; asi vamwe <transChange type="added">vakati</transChange>: Wakaita saiye. Iye akati: Ndini.
John 9:10 Naizvozvo vakati kwaari: Meso ako akazarurwa sei?
John 9:11 Akapindura izvo akati: Munhu anonzi Jesu wakaita dope, akazodza meso angu, akati kwandiri: Enda kudziva reSiroami unoshamba. Zvino ndikaenda ndikashamba, ndikaonazve.
John 9:12 Naizvozvo vakati kwaari: Iye aripi? Akati: Handizivi. <div eID="gen1008" type="x-p"/>
John 9:13 Vakamuisa kuVaFarisi, iye waimbova bofu.
John 9:14 Zvino raiva sabata apo Jesu akaita dope, akasvinudza meso ake.
John 9:15 Naizvozvo zvekare VaFarisi vakamubvunzawo, kuti wakaonazve sei. Akati kwavari: Waisa dope pameso angu ndikashamba, ndava kuona.
John 9:16 Naizvozvo vamwe veVaFarisi vakati: Munhu uyu haabvi kuna Mwari, nokuti haachengeti sabata. Vamwe vakati: Munhu ari mutadzi angaita sei zviratidzo zvakadai? Kukava nekupesana pakati pavo.
John 9:17 Vakatizve kubofu: Iwe unoti kudini pamusoro pake, sezvo asvinudza meso ako? Akati: Muporofita. <div eID="gen1009" type="x-p"/>
John 9:18 Zvino VaJudha havana kutenda pamusoro pake, kuti wakange ari bofu, akaonazve, kusvikira vadana vabereki vewakaonazve,
John 9:19 zvino vakavabvunza, vachiti: Uyu mwanakomana wenyu imwi wamunoti wakaberekwa ari bofu here? Naizvozvo ikozvino woona sei?
John 9:20 Vabereki vake vakavapindura vakati: Tinoziva kuti uyu mwanakomana wedu, uye kuti wakaberekwa ari bofu;
John 9:21 asi kuti ikozvino woona sei, hatizivi; kana ndiani wasvinudza meso ake, isu hatizivi; iye wayaruka, mubvunzei, iye pachake achazvitaurira.
John 9:22 Vabereki vake vakareva izvi, nokuti vaitya VaJudha; nokuti VaJudha vakange vatotenderana kuti kana ani nani anobvuma kuti ndiye Kristu, abudiswe musinagoge.
John 9:23 Naizvozvo vabereki vake vakati: Wayaruka, mubvunzei. <div eID="gen1010" type="x-p"/>
John 9:24 Naizvozvo vakadana rwechipiri uyo munhu wakange ari bofu, vakati kwaari: Ipa Mwari rumbidzo; isu tinoziva kuti munhu uyu mutadzi.
John 9:25 Naizvozvo iye akapindura achiti: Kana ari mutadzi handizivi; chinhu chimwe chandinoziva, kuti ndaiva bofu, ikozvino ndoona.
John 9:26 Zvino vakati kwaarizve: Wakaitei kwauri? Wakasvinudza meso ako sei?
John 9:27 Akavapindura, <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ndadokuudzai, asi hamuna kunzwa, munodirei kunzwa zvekare? Nemwi munoda kuva vadzidzi vake kanhi?
John 9:28 Naizvozvo vakamutuka, vakati: Ndiwe mudzidzi wake; asi isu tiri vadzidzi vaMozisi.
John 9:29 Isu tinoziva kuti Mwari wakataura kuna Mozisi; asi uyu hatizivi kwaanobva.
John 9:30 Munhu akapindura akati kwavari: Nokuti pachinhu ichi pane chinoshamisa, kuti imwi hamuzivi kwaanobva, asi wasvinudza meso angu.
John 9:31 Zvino tinoziva kuti Mwari haanzwi vatadzi; asi kana munhu ari mushumiri waMwari, achiita chido chake, uyu anomunzwa.
John 9:32 Kubvira rinhi hakuna ku<transChange type="added">mbo</transChange>nzwika kuti umwe wakasvinudza meso ewakaberekwa ari bofu.
John 9:33 Dai uyu anga asingabvi kuna Mwari, haasaigona kuita chinhu.
John 9:34 Vakapindura vakati kwaari: Iwe zvachese wakaberekerwa muzvivi, zvino iwe wotidzidzisa here? Vakamudzingira kunze. <div eID="gen1011" type="x-p"/>
John 9:35 Jesu akanzwa kuti vamudzingira kunze; akati amuwana, akati kwaari: Iwe unotenda kuMwanakomana waMwari here?
John 9:36 Iye akapindura akati: Ndiani, Ishe, kuti nditende kwaari?
John 9:37 Jesu ndokuti kwaari: Newe wamuona, uye anotaura newe, ndiye.
John 9:38 Zvino akati: Ishe ndinotenda; akamunamata. <div eID="gen1012" type="x-p"/>
John 9:39 Jesu ndokuti: Kutonga ndiko ini kwandakauira panyika ino, kuti vasingaoni vaone; nevanoona vave mapofu.
John 9:40 Uye avo veVaFarisi vaiva naye vakanzwa zvinhu izvi, vakati kwaari: Nesu tiri mapofu here?
John 9:41 Jesu akati kwavari: Dai maiva mapofu, mungadai musina chivi. Asi ikozvino munoti: Tinoona; naizvozvo chivi chenyu chinogara. <chapter eID="John.9"/><div eID="gen1013" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1006" type="section"/>
John 10:0 <div sID="gen1014" type="section"/> <chapter n="10" osisID="John.10" sID="John.10"/>  <div sID="gen1015" type="x-p"/>
John 10:1 Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Asingapindi napamukova mudanga remakwai, asi anokwira nekumwe, ndiye mbavha negororo.
John 10:2 Zvino anopinda nepamukova mufudzi wemakwai.
John 10:3 Murindi wemukova anomuzarurira, nemakwai anonzwa inzwi rake, uye anodana makwai ake nezita, nekuatungamirira kunze.
John 10:4 Uye kana abudisa makwai ake, anoatungamirira; nemakwai anomutevera, nokuti anoziva inzwi rake.
John 10:5 Asi mweni haangatongomuteveri, asi anomutiza; nokuti haazivi inzwi revaeni.
John 10:6 Jesu wakareva dimikira iri kwavari; asi ivo havana kunzwisisa, kuti zvinhui zvaakataura kwavari. <div eID="gen1015" type="x-p"/>
John 10:7 Zvino Jesu akati kwavarizve: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Ini ndiri mukova wemakwai;
John 10:8 vese vakanditangira kuuya imbavha nemakororo, asi makwai haana kuvanzwa.
John 10:9 Ini ndiri mukova; kana munhu achipinda neni, achaponeswa, achapinda nekubuda, nekuwana mafuro.
John 10:10 Mbavha haiui asi kungozoba nekuuraya nekuparadza; ini ndakauya, kuti vave neupenyu, uye vave ne<transChange type="added">hu</transChange>nopfachukira. <div eID="gen1016" type="x-p"/>
John 10:11 Ini ndiri mufudzi wakanaka. Mufudzi wakanaka anoradzikira pasi makwai upenyu hwake.
John 10:12 Asi muricho, asati ari mufudzi, makwai asati ari ake pachake, anoona bumhi richiuya, akasiya makwai, ndokutiza; bumhi rinoabata, nekuparadzira makwai.
John 10:13 Muricho anotiza nokuti muricho, uye haana hanya nemakwai. <div eID="gen1017" type="x-p"/>
John 10:14 Ini ndiri mufudzi wakanaka, uye ndinoziva angu, ndinozikanwa neangu.
John 10:15 Baba sezvavanondiziva, neni ndinoziva Baba; zvino ndinoradzikira pasi makwai upenyu hwangu.
John 10:16 Nemamwe makwai ndinawo, asati ari edanga rino. Naiwo ndinofanira kuuya nawo, achanzwa inzwi rangu; uye rive boka rimwe mufudzi umwe. <div eID="gen1018" type="x-p"/>
John 10:17 Nekuda kwaizvozvo Baba vanondida, nokuti ini ndinoradzika upenyu hwangu pasi, kuti ndihutorezve.
John 10:18 Hakuna angahutora kubva kwandiri, asi ini ndinohuradzika pasi pachangu. Simba ndinaro rekuhuradzika pasi, uye simba ndinaro rekuhutorazve. Uyu murairo ndakaugamuchira kuna Baba vangu. <div eID="gen1019" type="x-p"/>
John 10:19 Naizvozvo kukavapozve kupesana pakati peVaJudha nekuda kwemashoko awa.
John 10:20 Vazhinji vavo vakati: Ane dhimoni uye anopenga; munomuteererei?
John 10:21 Vamwe vakati: Mashoko awa haasi eane dhimoni; ko dhimoni ringagona kusvinudza meso emapofu here? <div eID="gen1020" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1014" type="section"/>
John 10:22 Zvino paiva nemutambo wekuvandudza paJerusarema, chaiva chando;
John 10:23 Jesu ndokufamba-famba mutembere muberere raSoromoni.
John 10:24 Zvino VaJudha vakamukomba, vakati kwaari: Kusvikira rinhi uchigara wakaremberedza mweya wedu? Kana uri Kristu iwe, tiudze pachena.
John 10:25 Jesu akavapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ndakakuudzai, asi hamuna kutenda; mabasa andinoita ini muzita raBaba vangu ndiwo anopupura nezvangu;
John 10:26 asi imwi hamutendi; nokuti hamusi vemakwai angu, sezvandakareva kwamuri.
John 10:27 Makwai angu anonzwa inzwi rangu, neni ndinoaziva, uye anonditevera;
John 10:28 uye ini ndinoapa upenyu husingaperi; uye haachatongoparari nekusingaperi, uye hakuna umwe achaabvuta muruoko rwangu.
John 10:29 Baba vangu vakandipa <transChange type="added">iwo</transChange> vakuru kune vese; uye hakuna anogona ku<transChange type="added">a</transChange>bvuta muruoko rwaBaba vangu.
John 10:30 Ini naBaba tiri umwe. <div eID="gen1022" type="x-p"/>
John 10:31 Naizvozvo VaJudha vakanongazve mabwe, kuti vamutake.
John 10:32 Jesu akavapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ndakakuratidzai mabasa mazhinji akanaka kubva kuna Baba vangu; nderipi remabasa awa ramunonditakira?
John 10:33 VaJudha vakamupindura vachiti: Hatikutakiri basa rakanaka, asi kunyomba; uye nokuti iwe uri munhu unozviita Mwari.
John 10:34 Jesu akavapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Hazvina kunyorwa here mumurairo wenyu, <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Ini ndakati: Muri vamwari?
John 10:35 Kana akavaidza vamwari, ivo shoko raMwari rakasvika kwavari, uye rugwaro harwugoni kuputswa;
John 10:36 imwi munoti kune uyo Baba vakamuita mutsvene vakamutuma panyika: Unonyomba, nokuti ndati: Ndiri Mwanakomana waMwari?
John 10:37 Kana ndisingaiti mabasa aBaba vangu, musanditenda.
John 10:38 Asi kana ndichi<transChange type="added">a</transChange>ita, kunyange musingatendi ini, tendai mabasa; kuti muzive nekutenda kuti Baba <transChange type="added">vari</transChange> mandiri, neni mavari.
John 10:39 Zvino vakatsvakazve kumubata; asi wakabuda paruoko rwavo. <div eID="gen1023" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1021" type="section"/>
John 10:40 Zvino akaendazve mhiri kwaJoridhani kunzvimbo Johwani kwaaibhabhatidza pakutanga; ndokugarapo.
John 10:41 Zvino vazhinji vakauya kwaari vakati: Johwani haana kuita chiratidzo, asi chese Johwani chaakareva pamusoro peuyu chaiva chokwadi.
John 10:42 Vazhinji ndokutenda kwaari ipapo. <chapter eID="John.10"/><div eID="gen1025" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1024" type="section"/>
John 11:0 <div sID="gen1026" type="section"/> <chapter n="11" osisID="John.11" sID="John.11"/>  <div sID="gen1027" type="x-p"/>
John 11:1 Kwaiva neumwe wairwara, <transChange type="added">wainzi</transChange> Razaro weBhetaniya, mumusha waMaria nemukoma wake Marita.
John 11:2 Waiva iye Maria wakazodza Ishe nemafuta, akapusika tsoka dzake nevhudzi rake, hanzvadzi yake Razaro wakange achirwara.
John 11:3 Naizvozvo hanzvadzi dzakatumira kwaari dzichiti: Ishe, tarirai uyo wamunoda anorwara.
John 11:4 Jesu wakati anzwa akati: Ukosha uhu hahusviki murufu, asi ndehwembiri yaMwari, kuti Mwanakomana waMwari arumbidzwe nahwo.
John 11:5 Zvino Jesu wakange achida Marita nemunin'ina wake naRazaro.
John 11:6 Naizvozvo wakati anzwa kuti anorwara, ipapo akagara mazuva maviri panzvimbo paakange ari.
John 11:7 Shure kweizvozvo wakati kuvadzidzi: Hendeizve kuJudhiya.
John 11:8 Vadzidzi vakati kwaari: Rabhi*, VaJudha vachangobva kutsvaka kukutakai nemabwe; zvino moendazve ikoko here?
John 11:9 Jesu akapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Hapana maawa gumi nemaviri masikati here? Kana munhu achifamba masikati, haagumburwi, nokuti anoona chiedza chenyika ino.
John 11:10 Asi kana munhu achifamba usiku, anogumburwa, nokuti hamuna chiedza maari. <div eID="gen1027" type="x-p"/>
John 11:11 Wakataura zvinhu izvi, shure kweizvozvo ndokuti kwavari: Shamwari yedu Razaro yarara; asi ndinoenda kuti ndimumutse.
John 11:12 Naizvozvo vadzidzi vake vakati: Ishe, kana arere, achanaya.
John 11:13 Asi Jesu wakareva zverufu rwake; asi ivo vakafunga kuti anoreva kuzorora kwehope.
John 11:14 Naizvozvo ipapo Jesu akavaudza pachena: Razaro wafa.
John 11:15 Zvino ndinofara nekuda kwenyu kuti ndakange ndisipo, kuti mugotenda; asi hendei kwaari.
John 11:16 Naizvozvo Tomasi, wainzi Dhidhimo, wakati kuvadzidzi pamwe naye: Hendei isuwo kuti tinofa naye. <div eID="gen1028" type="x-p"/>
John 11:17 Zvino Jesu wakati achisvika, akawana atova muguva mazuva mana.
John 11:18 Zvino Bhetaniya rakange riri pedo neJerusarema, masitadhiya* anenge gumi nemashanu kubva <transChange type="added">ipapo</transChange>;
John 11:19 nevazhinji veVaJudha vakange vauya kuna Marita naMaria, kuti vavanyaradze pamusoro pehanzvadzi yavo.
John 11:20 Zvino Marita wakati anzwa kuti Jesu wouya, akaenda kunomuchingamidza; asi Maria wakagara mumba.
John 11:21 Marita ndokuti kuna Jesu: Ishe, dai maiva pano, hanzvadzi yangu ingadai isina kufa.
John 11:22 Asi naikozvino ndinoziva kuti zvipi zvazvo zvamunokumbira kuna Mwari, Mwari achakupai.
John 11:23 Jesu akati kwaari: Hanzvadzi yako ichamukazve.
John 11:24 Marita akati kwaari: Ndinoziva kuti achamukazve pakumuka nezuva rekupedzisira.
John 11:25 Jesu akati kwaari: Ndini kumuka neupenyu; anotenda kwandiri, kunyange akafa, achararama;
John 11:26 uye umwe neumwe anorarama uye anotenda kwandiri, haangatongofi nekusingaperi. Unotenda izvi here?
John 11:27 Akati kwaari: Hongu, Ishe; ini ndinotenda kuti ndimwi Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari, waizouya panyika. <div eID="gen1029" type="x-p"/>
John 11:28 Zvino wakati areva izvi akaenda, akanodana Maria munin'ina wake pachivande, akati: Mudzidzisi wasvika, anokudana.
John 11:29 Iye wakati achingo<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa, akakurumidza kusimuka akaenda kwaari.
John 11:30 Zvino Jesu wakange asati asvika pamusha, asi wakange achiri panzvimbo Marita paakamuchingamidza.
John 11:31 Naizvozvo VaJudha vakange vanaye mumba vachimunyaradza, vakati vachiona Maria kuti wakasimuka nekukurumidza achibuda, vakamutevera vachiti: Anoenda kuguva kuti acheme ikoko. <div eID="gen1030" type="x-p"/>
John 11:32 Zvino Maria, wakati achisvika pakange pana Jesu, achimuona, akawira patsoka dzake, achiti kwaari: Ishe, dai maiva pano, hanzvadzi yangu ingadai isina kufa.
John 11:33 Naizvozvo Jesu wakati achimuona achichema, VaJudhawo vachichema vakange vauya naye, akagomera mumweya, akazvitambudza,
John 11:34 akati: Mamuradzikepi? Vakati kwaari: Ishe, uyai muone.
John 11:35 Jesu akachema misodzi.
John 11:36 Zvino VaJudha vakati: Tarirai kuti waimuda sei.
John 11:37 Asi vamwe vavo vakati: Uyu wakasvinudza meso ebofu, haagoni kuita here kuti uyuwo asafa? <div eID="gen1031" type="x-p"/>
John 11:38 Naizvozvo Jesu wakagomerazve mukati make asvika paguva. Zvino raiva bako, nebwe rakange rakaradzikwa pamusoro paro.
John 11:39 Jesu akati: Bvisai ibwe. Marita hanzvadzi yewakafa akati kwaari: Ishe, wotonhuhwa; nokuti ane mazuva mana.
John 11:40 Jesu akati kwaari: Handina kutaura here kwauri, kuti kana ukatenda, uchaona kubwinya kwaMwari?
John 11:41 Naizvozvo vakabvisa ibwe, pakange paradzikwa wakafa. Jesu ndokusimudzira meso kumusoro, ndokuti: Baba, ndinokuvongai nokuti mandinzwa.
John 11:42 Asi ini ndanga ndichiziva kuti munondinzwa nguva dzese; asi nekuda kwechaunga chakakomberedza ndareva, kuti vatende kuti imwi makandituma.
John 11:43 Zvino wakati areva izvozvi, akadanidzira nenzwi guru, <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Razaro, buda!
John 11:44 Uyo wakange afa ndokubuda, akasungwa makumbo nemaoko nemicheka yeguva, nechiso chake chakapombwa nemucheka wekumeso. Jesu akati kwavari: Musunungurei, mumurege aende. <div eID="gen1032" type="x-p"/>
John 11:45 Naizvozvo vazhinji veVaJudha, vakange vauya kuna Maria vakati vaona Jesu zvaakaita, vakatenda kwaari.
John 11:46 Asi vamwe vavo vakaenda kuVaFarisi, ndokuvaudza zvinhu Jesu zvaakange aita. <div eID="gen1033" type="x-p"/>
John 11:47 Naizvozvo vapristi vakuru neVaFarisi vakaunganidza dare remakurukota, vakati: Todini? Nokuti uyu munhu anoita zviratidzo zvizhinji.
John 11:48 Kana tikamurega akadaro, vese vachatenda kwaari; neVaRoma vachauya vakatora zviri zviviri nzvimbo nerudzi rwedu.
John 11:49 Asi umwe wavo, Kayafasi, wakange ari mupristi mukuru gore iroro, akati kwavari: Hamuzivi chinhu imwi,
John 11:50 uye hamurangariri kuti zvakatinakira kuti munhu umwe afire vanhu, uye rudzi rwese rurege kuparara.
John 11:51 Asi haana kureva izvi pachake, asi zvaakange ari mupristi mukuru gore iro, wakaporofita kuti Jesu waizofira rudzi urwo,
John 11:52 uye kwete rudzi urwo rwega, asi kutiwo aunganidze vana vaMwari vakapararira vave umwe.
John 11:53 Zvino kubva pazuva iro vakarangana kuti vamuuraye. <div eID="gen1034" type="x-p"/>
John 11:54 Naizvozvo Jesu haana kuzombofamba pachena pakati peVaJudha, asi wakabvapo akaenda kunyika iri pedo nerenje, kuguta rainzi Efuremu, ndokugarako nevadzidzi vake. <div eID="gen1035" type="x-p"/>
John 11:55 Zvino pasika yeVaJudha yakange yaswedera; vazhinji ndokubuda mumaruwa vakakwira kuJerusarema pasika isati yasvika, kuti vazvichenure.
John 11:56 Naizvozvo vakatsvaka Jesu, vakataurirana vamire mutembere, <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Munofungei? Kuti haangatongouyi kumutambo here?
John 11:57 Zvino vese vapristi vakuru neVaFarisi vakange vapa murairo kuti kana kune anoziva kwaari, azivise, kuti vamubate. <chapter eID="John.11"/><div eID="gen1036" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1026" type="section"/>
John 12:0 <div sID="gen1037" type="section"/> <chapter n="12" osisID="John.12" sID="John.12"/>  <div sID="gen1038" type="x-p"/>
John 12:1 Zvino mazuva matanhatu pasika isati <transChange type="added">yasvika</transChange> Jesu wakasvika Bhetaniya, paiva naRazaro wakange afa, waakamutsa kubva kuvakafa.
John 12:2 Naizvozvo vakamuitira chirairo ipapo, uye Marita waishandira; naRazaro wakange ari umwe wevakange vagere naye pakudya. <div eID="gen1038" type="x-p"/>
John 12:3 Zvino Maria akatora paundi* yemafuta enadhi* amene, ane mutengo mukuru, akazodza tsoka dzaJesu, akapusika tsoka dzake nevhudzi rake; imba ikazadzwa nekunhuhwira kwemafuta.
John 12:4 Naizvozvo umwe wevadzidzi vake, Judhasi Isikariyoti waSimoni wakange achazomutengesa, akati:
John 12:5 Mafuta awa aregerei kutengeswa nemadhenario* mazana matatu, akapiwa varombo?
John 12:6 Wakarevawo izvi, kwete kuti wakava nehanya nevarombo, asi nokuti waiva mbavha, uye waiva nechikwama, achitakura zvaiiswa<transChange type="added">mo</transChange>.
John 12:7 Naizvozvo Jesu wakati: Muregei; wamachengetedzera zuva rekuvigwa kwangu.
John 12:8 Nokuti varombo munavo nguva dzese, asi ini hamuneni nguva dzese. <div eID="gen1039" type="x-p"/>
John 12:9 Naizvozvo chaunga chikuru cheVaJudha chakaziva kuti aripo; ndokuuya kwete nekuda kwaJesu chete, asi kuti vaonewo Razaro, waakange amutsa kubva kuvakafa.
John 12:10 Asi vapristi vakuru vakarangana kuti vauraye Razarowo;
John 12:11 nokuti nekuda kwake vazhinji veVaJudha vaibva, vachitenda kuna Jesu. <div eID="gen1040" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1037" type="section"/>
John 12:12 Chifume chaunga chikuru chakange chauya kumutambo, chakati chanzwa kuti Jesu anouya kuJerusarema,
John 12:13 vakatora matavi emichindwe, vakabuda ku<transChange type="added">no</transChange>muchingamidza, vakadanidzira <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Hosana*! Wakaropafadzwa anouya muzita raIshe, Mambo waIsraeri.
John 12:14 Zvino Jesu awana dhongwana, akagara pamusoro paro, sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>:
John 12:15 Usatya, mukunda weZiyoni; tarira, Mambo wako anouya, agere pamusoro pedhongwana rembongoro.
John 12:16 Vadzidzi vake havana kunzwisisa zvinhu izvi pakutanga; asi Jesu wakati akudzwa, ipapo vakazorangarira kuti zvinhu izvi zvakange zvakanyorwa pamusoro pake, uye vakange vamuitira zvinhu izvi.
John 12:17 Naizvozvo chaunga chaiva naye paakadana Razaro kuti abude muguva, nekumumutsa kubva kuvakafa, chakapupura.
John 12:18 Saka chaunga chakamuchingamidzawo, nokuti vakange vanzwa kuti wakaita chiratidzo ichochi.
John 12:19 Naizvozvo VaFarisi vakataurirana, <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Munoona kuti hamubatsiri chinhu; tarirai nyika inomutevera. <div eID="gen1042" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1041" type="section"/>
John 12:20 Zvino kwaiva nevamwe VaGiriki pakati pevakange vakwira kuti vanonamata kumutambo;
John 12:21 ava ndokuuya kuna Firipi weBhetisaidha reGarirea, vakamukumbira vachiti: Ishe, tinoda kuona Jesu.
John 12:22 Firipi akasvika akaudza Andiriya; uye Andiriya naFiripi vakaudzazve Jesu.
John 12:23 Jesu ndokuvapindura achiti: Awa rasvika rekuti Mwanakomana wemunhu akudzwe.
John 12:24 Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Kunze kwekuti tsanga yegorosi yawira muvhu ikafa, iyo inogara iri yega; asi kana ikafa, inobereka chibereko chakawanda.
John 12:25 Anoda upenyu hwake acharasikirwa nahwo; neanovenga upenyu hwake panyika ino achahuchengetedza kusvikira kuupenyu husingaperi.
John 12:26 Kana munhu achindishandira, ngaanditevere; nepandiri ini, achavapowo muranda wangu. Uye kana munhu achindishandira, Baba vachamukudza. <div eID="gen1044" type="x-p"/>
John 12:27 Ikozvino mweya wangu unotambudzika; zvino ndichatii? Baba, ndiponesei paawa rino. Asi nekuda kweizvi ndasvika paawa rino.
John 12:28 Baba, kudzai zita renyu. Naizvozvo inzwi rakauya richibva kudenga, <transChange type="added">richiti</transChange>: Nda<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>kudzawo, uye ndicha<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>kudzazve.
John 12:29 Naizvozvo chaunga chakange chimire chichi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa chakati: Kwatinhira. Vamwe vakati: Mutumwa wataura naye.
John 12:30 Jesu akapindura akati: Inzwi iri harina kuuya nekuda kwangu, asi nekuda kwenyu.
John 12:31 Ikozvino pane mutongo wenyika ino; ikozvino mutungamiriri wenyika ino achadzingirwa panze.
John 12:32 Neni, kana ndasimudzwa panyika, ndichakwevera vese kwandiri.
John 12:33 Wakarevawo izvi achiratidza kuti waizofa nerufu rwakadini. <div eID="gen1045" type="x-p"/>
John 12:34 Chaunga chakamupindura <transChange type="added">chichiti</transChange>: Isu takanzwa pamurairo kuti Kristu achagara nekusingaperi; zvino imwi moreva sei kuti: Mwanakomana wemunhu anofanira kusimudzwa? Ndiani uyu Mwanakomana wemunhu?
John 12:35 Naizvozvo Jesu wakati kwavari: Pachine chinguvana chiedza chichinemwi. Fambai muchine chiedza, zvimwe rima ringakukundai; uye anofamba murima haazivi kwaanoenda.
John 12:36 Muchine chiedza, tendai kuchiedza, kuti muve vana vechiedza. Jesu wakareva zvinhu izvi, akabva, akazvivanza kwavari. <div eID="gen1046" type="x-p"/>
John 12:37 Kunyange akange aita zviratidzo zvizhinji kudai pamberi pavo, havana kutenda kwaari;
John 12:38 kuti shoko raIsaya muporofita rizadziswe, raakareva <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Ishe, ndiani wakatenda mharidzo yedu? Neruoko rwaIshe rwakazarurirwa kuna ani?
John 12:39 Naizvozvo vakange vasingagoni kutenda, nokuti Isaya wakatizve:
John 12:40 Wakapofumadza meso avo, akaomesa moyo wavo; kuti varege kuona nemeso kana kunzwisisa nemoyo, vagotendeuka, ndigovaporesa.
John 12:41 Isaya wakareva zvinhu izvi, paakaona kubwinya kwake, ndokutaura pamusoro pake.
John 12:42 Asi kunyange zvakadaro, vazhinji vevatongiwo vakatenda kwaari; asi nekuda kweVaFarisi vakange vasingabvumi, kuti varege kubudiswa musinagoge;
John 12:43 nokuti vakada rukudzo rwevanhu kupfuura rukudzo rwaMwari. <div eID="gen1047" type="x-p"/>
John 12:44 Zvino Jesu wakadanidzira akati: Anotenda kwandiri, haatendi kwandiri, asi kune wakandituma.
John 12:45 Neanoona ini, anoona wakandituma.
John 12:46 Ini ndakauya ndiri chiedza panyika, kuti ani nani anotenda kwandiri arege kugara murima.
John 12:47 Uye kana ani nani achinzwa mashoko angu akasatenda, handimutongi ini; nokuti handina kuuya kuti nditonge nyika, asi kuti ndiponese nyika.
John 12:48 Uyo anondiramba asingagamuchiri mashoko angu, ane anomutonga; shoko randakareva, ndiro richamutonga nezuva rekupedzisira.
John 12:49 Nokuti ini handina kureva zvemusoro wangu, asi Baba vakandituma, ndivo vakandipa murairo, zvandichareva nezvandichataura.
John 12:50 Uye ndinoziva kuti murairo wavo upenyu husingaperi; naizvozvo ini zvandinotaura, saBaba zvavakataura kwandiri, saizvozvo ndinotaura. <chapter eID="John.12"/><div eID="gen1048" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1043" type="section"/>
John 13:0 <div sID="gen1049" type="section"/> <chapter n="13" osisID="John.13" sID="John.13"/>  <div sID="gen1050" type="x-p"/>
John 13:1 Zvino mutambo wepasika usati wasvika, Jesu woziva kuti awa rake rasvika kuti abve munyika ino, aende kuna Baba, ada vake vari munyika, wakavada kusvikira pamagumo.
John 13:2 Zvino chirairo chakati chaitika, dhiabhorosi atoisa mumoyo maJudhasi Isikariyoti, waSimoni, kuti amutengese,
John 13:3 Jesu achiziva kuti Baba vakapa zvinhu zvese mumaoko, uye kuti wakabva kuna Mwari uye anoenda kuna Mwari,
John 13:4 akasimuka kubva pachirairo, akabvisa nguvo, akatora mucheka akazvimonera.
John 13:5 Shure kwaizvozvi wakadira mvura mundiro, ndokutanga kushambidza tsoka dzevadzidzi, nekupusika nemucheka waakange akamonerwa nawo.
John 13:6 Naizvozvo wakasvika kuna Simoni Petro; iye ndokuti kwaari: Ishe, imwi moshambidza tsoka dzangu here?
John 13:7 Jesu akapindura ndokuti kwaari: Chandinoita ini, iwe hauzivi ikozvino; asi uchaziva shure kweizvi.
John 13:8 Petro akati kwaari: Hamungatongoshambidzi tsoka dzangu nekusingaperi. Jesu akamupindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Kana ndisingakushambidzi, hauna mugove neni.
John 13:9 Simoni Petro akati kwaari: Ishe, kwete tsoka dzangu dzega, asi maokowo nemusoro.
John 13:10 Jesu akati kwaari: Wakashambidzwa haashaiwi <transChange type="added">chinhu</transChange> kunze kwekushamba tsoka, asi wakachena chose; uye imwi makachena asi kwete mese.
John 13:11 Nokuti wakange achiziva uyo waizomutengesa; nekuda kwaizvozvi wakati: Hamuna kuchena mese. <div eID="gen1050" type="x-p"/>
John 13:12 Naizvozvo ashambidza tsoka dzavo, wakatora nguvo dzake, agarazve pakudya, akati kwavari: Munoziva zvandaita kwamuri here?
John 13:13 Imwi munondidaidza <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> Mudzidzisi, uye Ishe; uye munoreva zvakanaka, nokuti ndini iye.
John 13:14 Zvino kana ini, Ishe neMudzidzisi, ndashambidza tsoka dzenyu, imwiwo munofanira kushambidzana tsoka dzenyu.
John 13:15 Nokuti ndakupai muenzaniso, kuti nemwi muite ini sezvandaita kwamuri.
John 13:16 Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Muranda haasi mukuru kuna ishe wake, uye wakatumwa haasi mukuru kune wakamutuma.
John 13:17 Kana muchiziva zvinhu izvi, makaropafadzwa kana muchizviita. <div eID="gen1051" type="x-p"/>
John 13:18 Handitauri maererano nemwi mese; ini ndinoziva vandakasarudza; asi kuti rugwaro ruzadziswe, <transChange type="added">rwunoti</transChange>: Anodya chingwa neni wakandisimudzira chitsitsinho chake.
John 13:19 Kubva ikozvino ndinokuudzai zvisati zvaitika, kuti, kana zvichiitika, mugotenda kuti ndini.
John 13:20 Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Anogamuchira ani nani wandinotuma, anogamuchira ini; neanogamuchira ini, anogamuchira wakandituma. <div eID="gen1052" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1049" type="section"/>
John 13:21 Jesu wakati areva izvi akatambudzika mumweya, akapupura akati: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Umwe wenyu achanditengesa.
John 13:22 Naizvozvo vadzidzi vakatarirana, vasina chokwadi kuti wataura pamusoro paani.
John 13:23 Zvino kwakange kugere pakudya pachifuva chaJesu umwe wevadzidzi vake, Jesu waaida;
John 13:24 naizvozvo Simoni Petro akamuninira, kubvunza kuti ndiani waanotaura pamusoro pake.
John 13:25 Iyewo achizendamira pachifuva chaJesu, akati kwaari: Ishe, ndiani?
John 13:26 Jesu akapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ndiye ini wandichapa chimedu kana ndaseva. Zvino aseva chimedu, akapa Judhasi Isikariyoti waSimoni.
John 13:27 Zvino shure kwechimedu, ipapo Satani akapinda maari. Jesu ndokuti kwaari: Zvaunoita, ita uchikurumidza.
John 13:28 Asi hakuna kune vakange vagere pakudya wakaziva kuti wakareverei izvi kwaari.
John 13:29 Nokuti vamwe vakafunga kuti, sezvo Judhasi aiva nechikwama, Jesu wakati kwaari: Tenga zvatinoda pamutambo; kana kuti ape varombo chimwe chinhu.
John 13:30 Naizvozvo iye akati agamuchira chimedu, akabuda pakarepo; zvino hwakange huri usiku. <div eID="gen1054" type="x-p"/>
John 13:31 Naizvozvo wakati abuda, Jesu akati: Ikozvino Mwanakomana wemunhu wakudzwa, naMwari wakudzwa maari.
John 13:32 Kana Mwari akudzwa maari, Mwari achamukudzawo maari pachake, zvino achamukudza pakarepo.
John 13:33 Vana vadiki, ndichinemwi chinguva chidiki. Muchanditsvaka, asi sezvandakareva kuVaJudha, kuti: Ini kwandinoenda, imwi hamugoni kuuyako, ndinorevawo kwamuri ikozvino.
John 13:34 Murairo mutsva ndinopa kwamuri, kuti mudanane; sezvandakakudai, kuti imwi mudananewo.
John 13:35 Pane izvi vese vachaziva kuti muri vadzidzi vangu, kana mune rudo umwe kune umwe. <div eID="gen1055" type="x-p"/>
John 13:36 Simoni Petro akati kwaari: Ishe, munoenda kupi? Jesu akamupindura, <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Kwandinoenda, haungagoni kunditevera ikozvino; asi uchanditevera pashure.
John 13:37 Petro akati kwaari: Ishe, handigoni kukuteverai ikozvino nei? Ndichakuradzikirai upenyu hwangu pasi.
John 13:38 Jesu akamupindura, <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ucharadzikira upenyu hwako pasi ini here? Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri: Jongwe haringatongoriri kusvikira wandiramba katatu. <chapter eID="John.13"/><div eID="gen1056" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1053" type="section"/>
