John 14:0 <div sID="gen1057" type="section"/> <chapter n="14" osisID="John.14" sID="John.14"/>  <div sID="gen1058" type="x-p"/>
John 14:1 Moyo wenyu ngaurege kutambudzika; munotenda kuna Mwari, tendaiwo kwandiri.
John 14:2 Mumusha maBaba vangu mune dzimba zhinji dzekugara; dai zvisina ku<transChange type="added">daro</transChange>, ndingadai ndakakuudzai. Ndinoenda kunokugadzirirai nzvimbo.
John 14:3 Zvino ndikanokugadzirirai nzvimbo, ndichauyazve ndikugamuchirei kwandiri; kuti apo ini pandiri, imwi muve<transChange type="added">po</transChange>wo.
John 14:4 Uye ini pandinoenda munoziva, nenzira munoziva. <div eID="gen1058" type="x-p"/>
John 14:5 Tomasi akati kwaari: Ishe, hatizivi kwamunoenda; ko tinogona kuziva sei nzira?
John 14:6 Jesu akati kwaari: Ini ndiri nzira, nechokwadi, neupenyu; hapana anouya kuna Baba, asi nekwandiri.
John 14:7 Dai maindiziva, maiziva Baba vanguwo; uye kubva ikozvino munovaziva, uye makavaona. <div eID="gen1059" type="x-p"/>
John 14:8 Firipi akati kwaari: Ishe, tiratidzei Baba, uye zvakatikwanira.
John 14:9 Jesu akati kwaari: Ndava nemwi nguva refu yakadai, hausati wandiziva here, Firipi? Waona ini, waona Baba; zvino unoreva sei <transChange type="added">uchiti</transChange>: Tiratidzei Baba?
John 14:10 Hautendi here kuti ini ndiri muna Baba, naBaba vari mandiri? Mashoko andinotaura kwamuri ini, handiatauri pachangu; asi Baba, vanogara mandiri, ndivo vanoita mabasa.
John 14:11 Nditendei kuti ndiri muna Baba, naBaba <transChange type="added">vari</transChange> mandiri; kana zvisa<transChange type="added">kadaro</transChange> nditendei nekuda kwemabasa amene. <div eID="gen1060" type="x-p"/>
John 14:12 Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Anotenda kwandiri, mabasa ini andinoita iye achaaitawo, uye makuru kune awa achaaita; nokuti ini ndinoenda kuna Baba vangu.
John 14:13 Uye chero chipi chamunokumbira muzita rangu, icho ndichachiita, kuti Baba varumbidzwe muMwanakomana.
John 14:14 Kana muchikumbira chero chipi muzita rangu, ini ndicha<transChange type="added">chi</transChange>ita.
John 14:15 Kana muchindida, chengetai mirairo yangu. <div eID="gen1061" type="x-p"/>
John 14:16 Neni ndichakumbira Baba, naivo vachakupai umwe Munyaradzi, kuti agare nemwi nekusingaperi,
John 14:17 Mweya wechokwadi, iyo nyika yausingagoni kugamuchira, nokuti haimuoni, kana kumuziva. Asi imwi munomuziva, nokuti ugere nemwi, uchava mukati menyu.
John 14:18 Handingakusii muri nherera; ndichauya kwamuri.
John 14:19 Kuchine chinguvana, nenyika haichazondioni; asi imwi muchandiona; nokuti ini ndinorarama, imwiwo muchararama.
John 14:20 Nezuva iro imwi muchaziva kuti ndiri muna Baba vangu, nemwi mandiri, neni mamuri.
John 14:21 Ane mirairo yangu achiichengeta, ndiye anondida; uye anondida achadikanwa naBaba vangu; neni ndichamuda, uye ndichazviratidza kwaari. <div eID="gen1062" type="x-p"/>
John 14:22 Judhasi, kwete Isikariyoti, akati kwaari: Ishe, chii kuti munozozviratidza kwatiri, asi kwete kunyika?
John 14:23 Jesu akapindura akati kwaari: Kana munhu achindida, achachengeta shoko rangu, naBaba vangu vachamuda, uye tichauya kwaari, tikaita ugaro naye.
John 14:24 Asingandidi, haachengeti mashoko angu; neshoko ramunonzwa harisi rangu, asi raBaba vakandituma. <div eID="gen1063" type="x-p"/>
John 14:25 Zvinhu izvozvi ndazvitaura kwamuri ndigere nemwi.
John 14:26 Asi Munyaradzi, Mweya Mutsvene, iwo Baba wavachatuma muzita rangu, iye achakudzidzisai zvinhu zvese, uye akuyeudzirei zvese zvandakataura kwamuri. <div eID="gen1064" type="x-p"/>
John 14:27 Rugare ndinosiya kwamuri; rugare rwangu ndinopa kwamuri; kwete nyika sezvainopa, ini ndinopa kwamuri. Moyo wenyu ngaurege kutambudzika, kana kutya.
John 14:28 Manzwa kuti ini ndati kwamuri: Ndinoenda, uye ndichauya kwamuri. Kana maindida, maifara, nokuti ndati: Ndinoenda kuna Baba; nokuti Baba vangu vakuru kwandiri.
John 14:29 Uye ikozvino ndakuudzai zvisati zvaitika; kuti kana zvoitika mungatenda.
John 14:30 Handichazotaurizve zvizhinji nemwi; nokuti mutongi wenyika ino anouya, asi haana chinhu kwandiri;
John 14:31 asi kuti nyika izive kuti ndinoda Baba, uye Baba sezvavakandiraira, ndinoita saizvozvo. Simukai, ngatibve pano. <chapter eID="John.14"/><div eID="gen1065" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1057" type="section"/>
John 15:0 <div sID="gen1066" type="section"/> <chapter n="15" osisID="John.15" sID="John.15"/>  <div sID="gen1067" type="x-p"/>
John 15:1 Ini ndiri muzambiringa wechokwadi, uye Baba vangu murimi.
John 15:2 Davi rimwe nerimwe <transChange type="added">riri</transChange> mandiri risingabereki chibereko, vanoribvisa; uye rimwe nerimwe rinobereka chibereko, vanorichekerera, kuti riwedzere kubereka chibereko.
John 15:3 Imwi matochena neshoko randataura kwamuri.
John 15:4 Garai mandiri, neni mamuri. Sedavi risingagoni kubereka chibereko pacharo, kana risingagari mumuzambiringa, saizvozvo nemwi kwete, kana musingagari mandiri.
John 15:5 Ini ndiri muzambiringa, imwi matavi. Anogara mandiri, neni maari, ndiye anobereka chibereko chakawanda; nokuti kunze kwangu hamugoni kuita chinhu.
John 15:6 Kana munhu asingagari mandiri, anoraswa kunze sedavi, ndokusvava, vanoaunganidza, ndokukandira mumoto, apiswe.
John 15:7 Kana muchigara mandiri, nemashoko angu achigara mamuri, muchakumbira chero zvamunoda, uye muchazviitirwa.
John 15:8 Baba vangu vanokudzwa neizvi, kuti mubereke chibereko chakawanda; uye muchava vadzidzi vangu. <div eID="gen1067" type="x-p"/>
John 15:9 Baba sezvavakandida, iniwo ndakakudai; garai murudo rwangu.
John 15:10 Kana muchichengeta mirairo yangu, muchagara murudo rwangu, seni ndakachengeta mirairo yaBaba vangu, ndinogara murudo rwavo.
John 15:11 Zvinhu izvi ndazvitaura kwamuri, kuti mufaro wangu ugare mamuri, uye mufaro wenyu uzare. <div eID="gen1068" type="x-p"/>
John 15:12 Uyu ndiwo murairo wangu, kuti mudanane, sezvandakakudai.
John 15:13 Hakuna ane rudo rukuru kune urwu, kuti munhu anoradzikira pasi shamwari dzake upenyu hwake.
John 15:14 Imwi muri shamwari dzangu, kana muchiita chipi nechipi ini chandinokurairai.
John 15:15 Handichakuidziizve varanda, nokuti muranda haazivi ishe wake chaanoita; asi ndakuidzai shamwari; nokuti zvese zvandakanzwa naBaba vangu, ndakakuzivisai.
John 15:16 Imwi hamuna kundisarudza, asi ini ndakakusarudzai, ndikakugadzai, kuti imwi muende mubereke chibereko, uye chibereko chenyu chigare; kuti chipi nechipi chamunokumbira kuna Baba muzita rangu, vakupei.
John 15:17 Izvi zvinhu ndinokurairai, kuti mudanane. <div eID="gen1069" type="x-p"/>
John 15:18 Kana nyika ichikuvengai, muzive kuti yavenga ini isati <transChange type="added">yakuvengai</transChange> imwi.
John 15:19 Dai maiva venyika, nyika yaida zvayo pachayo; asi nokuti hamusi venyika, asi ini ndakakusarudzai kubva panyika, naizvozvo nyika inokuvengai.
John 15:20 Rangarirai shoko ini randakareva kwamuri: Muranda haasi mukuru kuna ishe wake. Kana vakashusha ini, vachashusha imwiwo; kana vakachengeta shoko rangu vachachengeta renyuwo.
John 15:21 Asi izvi zvese vachakuitirai nekuda kwezita rangu, nokuti havamuzivi wakandituma.
John 15:22 Dai ndisina kuuya ndikataura kwavari, vangadai vasina chivi; asi ikozvino havana manzvengero pachivi chavo.
John 15:23 Anondivenga, anovenga Baba vanguwo.
John 15:24 Dai ndisina kuita pakati pavo mabasa asina umwe wakaaita, vangadai vasina chivi; asi ikozvino vakaona ndokuvenga zvese ini naBaba vangu.
John 15:25 Asi kuti shoko rizadziswe rakanyorwa pamurairo wavo, rinoti: Vakandivenga pasina chikonzero. <div eID="gen1070" type="x-p"/>
John 15:26 Asi kana Munyaradzi auya, ini wandichatumira kwamuri kubva kuna Baba, Mweya wechokwadi, unobuda kuna Baba, uyu achapupura nezvangu.
John 15:27 Nemwiwo muchapupura, nokuti maiva neni kubva pakutanga. <chapter eID="John.15"/><div eID="gen1071" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1066" type="section"/>
John 16:0 <div sID="gen1072" type="section"/> <chapter n="16" osisID="John.16" sID="John.16"/>  <div sID="gen1073" type="x-p"/>
John 16:1 Zvinhu izvi ndataura kwamuri, kuti murege kugumburwa.
John 16:2 Vachakubudisai mumasinagoge; hongu nguva inouya, apo umwe neumwe anokuurayai achafunga kuti anoitira Mwari basa.
John 16:3 Uye zvinhu izvi vachazviita kwamuri, nokuti havana kuziva Baba kana ini.
John 16:4 Asi zvinhu izvi ndataura kwamuri, kuti kana nguva yasvika, muzvirangarire kuti ini ndakakuudzai. Asi zvinhu izvi handina kuzvireva kwamuri kubva pakutanga, nokuti ndaiva nemwi. <div eID="gen1073" type="x-p"/>
John 16:5 Asi ikozvino ndinoenda kune wakandituma, uye hakuna umwe wenyu anondibvunza, <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Munoenda kupi?
John 16:6 Asi nokuti ndareva zvinhu izvi kwamuri, kusuruvara kwazadza moyo wenyu.
John 16:7 Asi ini ndinokuudzai chokwadi: Zvakanaka kwamuri kuti ini ndiende; nokuti kana ndisingaendi, Munyaradzi haazouyi kwamuri; asi kana ndikaenda, ndichamutumira kwamuri.
John 16:8 Zvino kana asvika, iye achapwisa nyika nezvechivi, uye nezvekururama, uye nezvemutongo;
John 16:9 zvechivi, nokuti havatendi kwandiri;
John 16:10 uye zvekururama, nokuti ndinoenda kuna Baba vangu, uye hamuchazondionizve;
John 16:11 uye zvemutongo, nokuti mutungamiriri wenyika ino watongwa. <div eID="gen1074" type="x-p"/>
John 16:12 Ndichine zvinhu zvizhinji zvekutaura kwamuri, asi hamugoni kuzvitakura ikozvino;
John 16:13 asi kana iye asvika, Mweya wechokwadi, achakutungamirirai kuchokwadi chese; nokuti haazozvitauriri pachake, asi chega chega chaanonzwa achataura, uye achakuzivisai zvinhu zvinouya.
John 16:14 Iye achandirumbidza, nokuti achatora pane zvangu, uye acha<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>zivisa kwamuri.
John 16:15 Zvese Baba zvavanazvo, ndezvangu; ndokusaka ndichiti achatora pane zvangu, agozivisa kwamuri. <div eID="gen1075" type="x-p"/>
John 16:16 Kwechinguvana uye hamuchandioni, uye <transChange type="added">kwe</transChange>chinguvanazve muchandiona, nokuti ini ndinoenda kuna Baba.
John 16:17 Zvino <transChange type="added">vamwe</transChange> vevadzidzi vake vakataurirana <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Chii ichi chaanoreva kwatiri: Kwechinguvana, hamuchandioni; uyezve kwechinguvana muchandiona; uye: Nokuti ini ndinoenda kuna Baba?
John 16:18 Naizvozvo vakati: Chii ichi chaanoreva: Chinguvana? Hatizivi chaanoreva. <div eID="gen1076" type="x-p"/>
John 16:19 Zvino Jesu waiziva kuti vakange vachishuva kumubvunza, akati kwavari: Munobvunzana pamusoro pezvizvi here kuti ndati: Kwechinguvana hamuchandioni, uyezve kwechinguvana muchandiona?
John 16:20 Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Imwi muchachema nekurira, asi nyika ichafara; uye imwi muchava nekusuruvara, asi kusuruvara kwenyu kuchava mufaro.
John 16:21 Mukadzi kana achisununguka ane marwadzo, nokuti awa rake rasvika; asi kana angopona mucheche, haacharangaririzve marwadzo, nekufara kuti munhu waponwa panyika.
John 16:22 Naizvozvo nemwi ikozvino mune kusuruvara; asi ndichazokuonaizve, nemoyo wenyu uchafara; uye hakuna munhu anokutorerai mufaro wenyu. <div eID="gen1077" type="x-p"/>
John 16:23 Zvino nezuva iro hamuchazondibvunzi chinhu. Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri: Chipi nechipi chamuchakumbira kuna Baba muzita rangu vachakupai.
John 16:24 Kusvikira ikozvino hamuna kukumbira chinhu muzita rangu; kumbirai, uye muchagamuchira, kuti mufaro wenyu uzadzwe.
John 16:25 Zvinhu izvi ndataura kwamuri mumadimikira; nguva inouya apo ndisingazotaurizve kwamuri nemadimikira, asi ndichakuudzai pachena nezvaBaba. <div eID="gen1078" type="x-p"/>
John 16:26 Pazuva iro muchakumbira muzita rangu; uye handirevi kwamuri kuti ini ndichakukumbirirai kuna Baba;
John 16:27 nokuti Baba pachavo vanokudai, nokuti imwi makandida, mukatenda kuti ini ndakabuda kuna Mwari.
John 16:28 Ndakabuda kuna Baba, uye ndakauya panyika; ndinobvazve panyika, uye ndinoenda kuna Baba. <div eID="gen1079" type="x-p"/>
John 16:29 Vadzidzi vake vakati kwaari: Tarirai ikozvino motaura pachena, uye munotaura pasina dimikira.
John 16:30 Zvino tinoziva kuti munoziva zvinhu zvese, uye hamutsvaki kuti munhu akubvunzei; neizvozvi tinotenda kuti makabuda kuna Mwari.
John 16:31 Jesu akavapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ikozvino munotenda here?
John 16:32 Tarirai, awa rinouya, hongu ikozvino rasvika, rekuti muchaparadzirwa, umwe neumwe kune zvake, uye mundisiye ndega; izvo handisi ndega, nokuti Baba vaneni.
John 16:33 Ndareva zvinhu izvi kwamuri, kuti muve nerugare mandiri. Munyika muchava nedambudziko; asi tsungai moyo, ini ndakakunda nyika. <chapter eID="John.16"/><div eID="gen1080" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1072" type="section"/>
John 17:0 <div sID="gen1081" type="section"/> <chapter n="17" osisID="John.17" sID="John.17"/>  <div sID="gen1082" type="x-p"/>
John 17:1 Jesu wakataura zvinhu izvi, ndokusimudzira meso ake kudenga, akati: Baba, awa rasvika; kudzai Mwanakomana wenyu, kuti Mwanakomana wenyuwo akukudzei;
John 17:2 sezvo makamupa simba pamusoro penyama yese, kuti vese vamakamupa, avape upenyu husingaperi.
John 17:3 Uye uhu upenyu husingaperi, kuti vakuzivei imwi Mwari wega wechokwadi, naJesu Kristu wamakatuma.
John 17:4 Ini ndakakukudzai panyika; ndapedza basa ramakandipa kuti ndiite;
John 17:5 uye ikozvino ndikudzei, imwi Baba, kwamuri pachenyu nerukudzo rwandaiva narwo <transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>nemwi nyika isati yavapo. <div eID="gen1082" type="x-p"/>
John 17:6 Ndaratidza zita renyu kuvanhu vamakandipa kubva munyika; vakange vari venyu, uye makavapa ini; uye vakachengeta shoko renyu.
John 17:7 Ikozvino voziva kuti zvese-zvese zvamakandipa, zvinobva kwamuri;
John 17:8 nokuti ndakapa kwavari mashoko amakandipa; uye ivo vakagamuchira, vakaziva zvirokwazvo kuti ndakabuda kwamuri, uye vakatenda kuti imwi makandituma. <div eID="gen1083" type="x-p"/>
John 17:9 Ini ndinokumbirira ivo; handikumbiriri nyika, asi avo vamakandipa, nokuti ndevenyu;
John 17:10 uye zvese zvangu ndezvenyu, nezvenyu ndezvangu; uye ndakakudzwa mavari.
John 17:11 Uye handichisiri munyika, asi ava vari munyika; uye ini ndinouya kwamuri. Baba vatsvene, vachengetei muzita renyu vamakandipa, kuti vave vamwe, sesu.
John 17:12 Pandaiva navo munyika, ini ndaivachengeta muzita renyu; avo vamakandipa, ndikachengetedza, uye hapana umwe wavo wakarasika, kunze kwemwanakomana wekuraswa, kuti rugwaro rwuzadziswe.
John 17:13 Asi ikozvino ndinouya kwamuri, uye zvinhu izvi ndinotaura munyika, kuti vave nemufaro wangu wakazadziswa mavari.
John 17:14 Ini ndakavapa shoko renyu, uye nyika yakavavenga, nokuti havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika.
John 17:15 Handikumbiri kuti muvabvise panyika, asi kuti muvachengete pane wakaipa.
John 17:16 Havasi venyika, seni ndisiri wenyika.
John 17:17 Vaitei vatsvene muchokwadi chenyu; shoko renyu ichokwadi.
John 17:18 Sezvamakandituma munyika, neniwo ndavatuma munyika.
John 17:19 Uye ini ndinozviita mutsvene nekuda kwavo, kuti ivowo vaitwe vatsvene muchokwadi. <div eID="gen1084" type="x-p"/>
John 17:20 Uye handikumbiriri ava chete, asi naivo vachatenda kwandiri neshoko ravo;
John 17:21 kuti vese vave umwe; semwi, Baba, mandiri, neni mamuri; kuti ivowo vave umwe matiri; kuti nyika itende kuti imwi makandituma.
John 17:22 Nekubwinya kwamakandipa, ini ndakavapa, kuti vave umwe, sesu tiri umwe.
John 17:23 Ini mavari, nemwi mandiri, kuti vapedzeredzwe vave umwe; uye kuti nyika izive kuti imwi makandituma, uye makavada, sezvamakandida. <div eID="gen1085" type="x-p"/>
John 17:24 Baba, ndinoda kuti ivowo vamakandipa, vave neni apo pandiri ini, kuti vaone kubwinya kwangu, kwamakandipa, nokuti makandida mavambo enyika asati avapo.
John 17:25 Baba vakarurama, nenyika haina kukuzivai, asi ini ndakakuzivai, neava vakaziva kuti imwi makandituma;
John 17:26 uye ndakazivisa kwavari zita renyu, uye ndicha<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>zivisa, kuti rudo rwamakandida narwo ruve mavari, neni mavari. <chapter eID="John.17"/><div eID="gen1086" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1081" type="section"/>
John 18:0 <div sID="gen1087" type="section"/> <chapter n="18" osisID="John.18" sID="John.18"/>  <div sID="gen1088" type="x-p"/>
John 18:1 Jesu areva zvinhu izvi wakabudira mhiri kwerukova Kedhironi nevadzidzi vake, paiva nebindu, maakapinda iye nevadzidzi vake. <div eID="gen1088" type="x-p"/>
John 18:2 NaJudhasiwo, wakamutengesa, wakange achiziva nzvimbo iyi; nokuti Jesu kazhinji waiunganapo nevadzidzi vake.
John 18:3 Naizvozvo Judhasi, atora boka remauto, nemapurisa kubva kuvapristi vakuru neVaFarisi, wakauyapo nemwenje nemarambi nezvombo.
John 18:4 Naizvozvo Jesu, achiziva zvinhu zvese zvaizomuwira, wakabuda akati kwavari: Ndiani wamunotsvaka?
John 18:5 Vakamupindura <transChange type="added">vakati</transChange>: Jesu muNazareta. Jesu akati kwavari: Ndini. NaJudhasiwo wakamutengesa wakange amire navo.
John 18:6 Zvino wakati achiti kwavari: Ndini; vakasudurukira shure, vakawira pasi.
John 18:7 Zvino akavabvunzazve <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Ndiani wamunotsvaka? Ivo vakati: Jesu muNazareta.
John 18:8 Jesu akapindura <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Ndakuudzai kuti ndini iye; naizvozvo kana muchitsvaka ini, regai ava vaende;
John 18:9 kuti shoko rizadziswe raakareva rekuti: Vamakapa kwandiri, handina kurasa umwe wavo.
John 18:10 Naizvozvo Simoni Petro ane munondo wakauvhomora ndokutema muranda wemupristi mukuru, ndokugura nzeve yake yerudyi. Uye zita remuranda uyo raiva Marikosi.
John 18:11 Naizvozvo Jesu wakati kuna Petro: Isa munondo wako mumuhara; mukombe Baba wavakandipa, handingatongounwi here? <div eID="gen1089" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1087" type="section"/>
John 18:12 Zvino boka remauto nemukuru wechuru nemapurisa eVaJudha vakabata Jesu, vakamusunga,
John 18:13 ndokutanga kumuendesa kuna Anasi; nokuti wakange ari mukarahwa waKayafasi, waiva mupristi mukuru gore iroro.
John 18:14 Zvino Kayafasi ndiye wakange araira VaJudha, kuti zvakanaka kuti munhu umwe afire rudzi. <div eID="gen1091" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1090" type="section"/>
John 18:15 Zvino Simoni Petro wakatevera Jesu, neumwe mudzidzi. Mudzidzi uyu waizikanwa nemupristi mukuru, akapinda naJesu muchivanze chemupristi mukuru;
John 18:16 asi Petro wakange amire pamukova panze. Naizvozvo kwakabuda umwe mudzidzi waizikanwa nemupristi mukuru, akataura nemurindikadzi wemukova, ndokupinza Petro.
John 18:17 Zvino murandakadzi murindi wemukova akati kuna Petro: Iwewo hausi umwe wevadzidzi vemunhu uyu here? Iye akati: Handisi.
John 18:18 Zvino varanda nemapurisa vakange vamire vavesa moto wemazimbe, nokuti kwaitonhora, uye vaidziya. Petrowo akamira navo achidziya. <div eID="gen1093" type="x-p"/>
John 18:19 Naizvozvo mupristi mukuru wakabvunza Jesu nezvevadzidzi vake, nezvedzidziso yake.
John 18:20 Jesu akamupindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ini ndakataura pachena kunyika; ini ndaidzidzisa nguva dzese musinagoge nemutembere, panoungana VaJudha nguva dzese, uye handina kureva chinhu pakavanda.
John 18:21 Unobvunzirei ini? Bvunza avo vainzwa, zvandaitaura kwavari; tarira, ndivo vanoziva ini zvandakareva.
John 18:22 Wakati areva zvinhu izvi, umwe wemapurisa wakange amirepo akarova Jesu nembama, achiti: Ko unopindura mupristi mukuru saizvozvo?
John 18:23 Jesu akamupindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Kana ndareva zvakaipa, pupura zvezvakaipa <transChange type="added">zvacho</transChange>; asi kana zvakanaka, wandiroverei?
John 18:24 Zvino Anasi akamutumira akasungwa kuna Kayafasi mupristi mukuru.
John 18:25 Zvino Simoni Petro wakange amire achidziya <transChange type="added">moto</transChange>; naizvozvo vakati kwaari: Hausi iwewo <transChange type="added">umwe</transChange> wevadzidzi vake here? Iye akaramba, akati: Handisi. <div eID="gen1094" type="x-p"/>
John 18:26 Umwe wevaranda vemupristi mukuru, ari hama yewenzeve Petro yaakagura akati: Ini handina kukuona mubindu unaye here?
John 18:27 Naizvozvo Petro akarambazve; zvino pakarepo jongwe rakarira. <div eID="gen1095" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1092" type="section"/>
John 18:28 Zvino vakabvisa Jesu kuna Kayafasi vakamuisa kuimba yemutungamiriri; uye aiva mambakwedza, asi ivo havana kupinda mumba memutungamiriri, kuti varege kusvibiswa, asi kuti vadye pasika.
John 18:29 Naizvozvo Pirato akabudira kwavari, akati: Imhosva yei yamunoisa pamunhu uyu?
John 18:30 Vakapindura vakati kwaari: Dai uyu asaiva anoita zvakaipa, tingadai tisina kumukumikidza kwamuri.
John 18:31 Naizvozvo Pirato wakati kwavari: Mutorei imwi, mumutonge zvinoenderana nemurairo wenyu. Naizvozvo VaJudha vakati kwaari: Hazvisi pamutemo kwatiri kuti tiuraye munhu;
John 18:32 kuti shoko raJesu rizadziswe raakareva, achiratidza <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> kufa rudzii kwaaifanira kufa nako. <div eID="gen1097" type="x-p"/>
John 18:33 Naizvozvo Pirato wakapindazve mumba memutungamiriri, akadana Jesu, akati kwaari: Ndiwe mambo weVaJudha here?
John 18:34 Jesu akamupindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Unozvireva izvi pachako here, kana vamwe vakuudza pamusoro pangu?
John 18:35 Pirato akapindura, <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ini ndiri muJudha here? Rudzi rwako nevapristi vakuru vakukumikidza kwandiri; waitei?
John 18:36 Jesu akapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ushe hwangu hahuzi hwenyika ino; kana ushe hwangu hwaiva hwenyika ino, varanda vangu vangadai vairwa, kuti ndirege kukumikidzwa kuVaJudha; asi zvino ushe hwangu hahusi hwepano.
John 18:37 Naizvozvo Pirato wakati kwaari: Saka uri iwe mambo here? Jesu akapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Unoreva iwe, kuti ini ndiri mambo. Ini ndakaberekerwa izvi, uye ndakauira izvi munyika kuti ndipupurire chokwadi. Umwe neumwe wechokwadi anonzwa inzwi rangu.
John 18:38 Pirato akati kwaari: Chokwadi chii? Zvino wakati areva izvi, akabudirazve kuVaJudha, akati kwavari: Ini handiwani mhosva kwaari.
John 18:39 Asi mune tsika, kuti ndikusunungurirei umwe papasika; naizvozvo munoda kuti ndikusunungurirei Mambo weVaJudha here?
John 18:40 Ipapo vakadanidzirazve vese, vachiti: Kwete uyu, asi Bharabhasi; zvino Bharabhasi wakange ari gororo. <chapter eID="John.18"/><div eID="gen1098" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1096" type="section"/>
John 19:0 <div sID="gen1099" type="section"/> <chapter n="19" osisID="John.19" sID="John.19"/>  <div sID="gen1100" type="x-p"/>
John 19:1 Naizvozvo ipapo Pirato wakatora Jesu, aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>rova netyava.
John 19:2 Zvino mauto akaruka korona yeminzwa akaisa pamusoro wake, ndokumupfekedza nguvo ine ruvara rwehute.
John 19:3 Vakati: Hekanhi, Mambo weVaJudha! Ndokumurova nembama.
John 19:4 Naizvozvo Pirato akabudazve panze, ndokuti kwavari: Tarirai, ndinomubudisira kwamuri, kuti muzive kuti handiwani mhosva maari.
John 19:5 Naizvozvo Jesu wakabuda panze, akapfeka korona yeminzwa, nenguvo ine ruvara rwehute. <transChange type="added">Pirato</transChange> ndokuti kwavari: Tarirai munhu uyu! <div eID="gen1100" type="x-p"/>
John 19:6 Naizvozvo vapristi vakuru nemapurisa pavakamuona, vakadanidzira vachiti: Roverera pamuchinjikwa, roverera pamuchinjikwa! Pirato akati kwavari: Mutorei imwi, muroverere pamuchinjikwa; nokuti ini handiwani mhosva kwaari.
John 19:7 VaJudha vakamupindura <transChange type="added">vakati</transChange>: Isu tine murairo, uye nemurairo wedu anofanira kufa, nokuti wakazviita Mwanakomana waMwari.
John 19:8 Naizvozvo Pirato paakanzwa shoko iri, wakanyanya kutya.
John 19:9 Akapindazve mumba memutungamiriri, ndokuti kuna Jesu: Unobvepi iwe? Asi Jesu haana kumupa mhinduro.
John 19:10 Pirato akati kwaari: Hautauri neni here? Hauzivi here kuti ndine simba rekukuroverera pamuchinjikwa uye ndine simba rekukusunungura?
John 19:11 Jesu akapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Haungatongovi nesimba pamusoro pangu, dai usina kuripiwa kubva kumusoro; naizvozvo anondikumikidza kwauri ane chivi chikuru.
John 19:12 Kubva ipapo Pirato akatsvaka kumusunungura. Asi VaJudha vakadanidzira, vachiti: Kana mukasunungura uyu, hamusi shamwari yaKesari; umwe neumwe anozviita mambo, anopikisana naKesari.
John 19:13 Naizvozvo Pirato anzwa shoko iri wakabudisa Jesu panze, akagara pachigaro chekutonga, panzvimbo inonzi Pakarongwa neMabwe, asi nechiHebheru Gabhata.
John 19:14 Zvino raiva gadziriro repasika, uye raiva awa rinenge rechitanhatu; ndokuti kuVaJudha: Tarirai Mambo wenyu!
John 19:15 Asi vakadanidzira <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Bvisai, bvisai, murovererei pamuchinjikwa! Pirato akati kwavari: Ndoroverera pamuchinjikwa Mambo wenyu here? Vapristi vakuru vakapindura <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Hatina mambo kunze kwaKesari.
John 19:16 Naizvozvo ipapo akamukumikidza kwavari, kuti arovererwe pamuchinjikwa. Zvino vakatora Jesu vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>tinha. <div eID="gen1101" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1099" type="section"/>
John 19:17 Zvino wakatakura muchinjikwa wake akabuda akaenda kunzvimbo yainzi yeDehenya, ichinzi nechiHebheru Gorogota,
John 19:18 pavakamuroverera pamuchinjikwa nevamwe vaviri naye, parutivi neparutivi, naJesu pakati.
John 19:19 Pirato ndokunyorawo chiziviso akaisa pamuchinjikwa; chakange chakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: JESU MUNAZARETA MAMBO WEVAJUDHA.
John 19:20 Naizvozvo vazhinji veVaJudha vakaverenga chiziviso ichi; nokuti nzvimbo pakange pakarovererwa Jesu pamuchinjikwa yaiva pedo neguta; uye pakange pakanyorwa nechiHebheru, nechiGiriki, nechiRoma.
John 19:21 Naizvozvo vapristi vakuru veVaJudha vakati kuna Pirato: Musanyora <transChange type="added">muchiti</transChange>: Mambo weVaJudha; asi kuti uyo wakati: Ndiri mambo weVaJudha.
John 19:22 Pirato akapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Zvandanyora, ndanyora. <div eID="gen1103" type="x-p"/>
John 19:23 Naizvozvo mauto akati aroverera Jesu pamuchinjikwa, akatora nguvo dzake, akaita migove mina, kumuuto umwe neumwe mugove; neshatiwo; asi shati iyi yakange isina musono, yakange yakarukwa yese kubva kumusoro.
John 19:24 Naizvozvo vakataurirana <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Ngatirege kuibvarura, asi tiikandire mijenya, <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> ichava yaani; kuti rugwaro ruzadziswe rwunoti: Vakagovana nguvo dzangu pakati pavo, vakakandawo mujenya pamusoro pechekupfeka changu. Naizvozvo mauto akaita zvinhu izvi. <div eID="gen1104" type="x-p"/>
John 19:25 Zvino pamuchinjikwa waJesu pakange pamire mai vake, nemunin'ina wamai vake, Maria <transChange type="added">mukadzi</transChange> waKiropasi, naMaria Magidharini.
John 19:26 Naizvozvo Jesu wakati achiona mai <transChange type="added">vake</transChange>, nemudzidzi waaida amirepo, akati kuna mai vake: Mukadzi, tarira mwanakomana wako.
John 19:27 Shure kweizvozvo wakati kumudzidzi: Tarira mai vako. Zvino kubva paawa iro mudzidzi wakavatora akavaisa <transChange type="added">kumba</transChange> kwake. <div eID="gen1105" type="x-p"/>
John 19:28 Shure kwaizvozvi, Jesu achiziva kuti zvinhu zvese zvatopedzwa, kuti rugwaro rwuzadziswe, akati: Ndine nyota.
John 19:29 Zvino pakange pakagadzikwa hari izere nevhiniga; zvino vakazadza chipanje nevhiniga vakaisa parutanda rwehisopi*, vakaisa kumuromo wake.
John 19:30 Naizvozvo Jesu agamuchira vhiniga, wakati: Zvapedzwa! Akakotamisa musoro, akapa mweya <transChange type="added">wake</transChange>. <div eID="gen1106" type="x-p"/>
John 19:31 Naizvozvo VaJudha nokuti rakange riri gadziriro, kuti mitumbi isagara pamuchinjikwa nesabata (nokuti zuva resabata iro raiva guru), vakakumbira Pirato kuti makumbo avo avhuniwe, uye vabviswe.
John 19:32 Naizvozvo mauto akauya, akavhuna makumbo ewekutanga, neeumwe wakange arovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe naye;
John 19:33 asi vasvika kuna Jesu, pavakaona kuti watofa, havana kuvhuna makumbo ake;
John 19:34 asi umwe wemauto wakabaya rutivi rwake nepfumo, pakarepo kukabuda ropa nemvura.
John 19:35 Uye iye wakaona wakapupura, uye kupupura kwake ichokwadi; uye iye anoziva kuti anoreva chokwadi, kuti imwi mutende.
John 19:36 Nokuti zvinhu izvi zvakaitwa kuti rugwaro rwuzadziswe <transChange type="added">rwunoti</transChange>: Fupa rake haringavhunwi.
John 19:37 Uyezve rumwe rugwaro rwunoti: Vachamutarira wavakabvovora. <div eID="gen1107" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1102" type="section"/>
John 19:38 Shure kweizvozvi Josefa weArimatia, ari mudzidzi waJesu, asi pachivande nekutya VaJudha, wakakumbira kuna Pirato kuti abvise mutumbi waJesu. Zvino Pirato aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>tendera. Naizvozvo akauya akabvisa mutumbi waJesu.
John 19:39 Kwakauyawo Nikodhimo, wakauya pakutanga kuna Jesu usiku, akatakura musanganiswa wemura* nearosi* mapaundi anenge zana.
John 19:40 Ipapo vakatora mutumbi waJesu, vakamuputira nemicheka yerineni nezvinonhuhwira, seyaiva tsika yeVaJudha yekuviga.
John 19:41 Zvino panzvimbo iyo paakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pakange pane bindu, uye mubindu mune guva idzva, makange musina kumboradzikwa munhu.
John 19:42 Naizvozvo vakaradzika Jesu ipapo nekuda kwegadziriro yeVaJudha, nokuti guva rakange riri pedo. <chapter eID="John.19"/><div eID="gen1109" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1108" type="section"/>
John 20:0 <div sID="gen1110" type="section"/> <chapter n="20" osisID="John.20" sID="John.20"/>  <div sID="gen1111" type="x-p"/>
John 20:1 Zvino newekutanga wevhiki Maria Magidharini wakasvika mangwanani-ngwanani paguva, kuchakasviba, akaona ibwe rabviswa kubva paguva.
John 20:2 Naizvozvo wakamhanya akauya kuna Simoni Petro nekune umwe mudzidzi Jesu waaida, ndokuti kwavari: Vabvisa Ishe muguva, uye hatizivi pavamuradzika.
John 20:3 Zvino Petro akabuda neumwe mudzidzi, vakasvika kuguva.
John 20:4 Zvino vakamhanya vari vaviri pamwe chete; zvino umwe mudzidzi akamhanya kusiya Petro, akatanga kusvika paguva.
John 20:5 Zvino akotama achidongorera, wakaona micheka yerineni yakawaridzwa, asi haana kupinda.
John 20:6 Zvino Simoni Petro akasvika achimutevera, akapinda muguva, akaona micheka yerineni yakawaridzwa,
John 20:7 nemucheka wekumeso wakange uri mumusoro make, usina kuwaridzwa nemicheka yerineni, asi wakapetwa uri pane imwe nzvimbo wega.
John 20:8 Naizvozvo ipapo umwe mudzidzi wakatanga kusvika paguva akapindawo, akaona, akatenda;
John 20:9 nokuti vakange vachigere kunzwisisisa rugwaro, kuti anofanira kumuka kubva kuvakafa.
John 20:10 Naizvozvo vadzidzi vakabva vakaendazve kwavo. <div eID="gen1111" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1110" type="section"/>
John 20:11 Asi Maria wakamira kunze paguva achichema; zvino wakati achichema akakotama akadongorera muguva,
John 20:12 akaona vatumwa vaviri vane <transChange type="added">nguvo</transChange> chena vagere, umwe kumusoro, neumwe kutsoka, ipapo paka<transChange type="added">mbe</transChange>nge parere mutumbi waJesu.
John 20:13 Ivo ndokuti kwaari: Mukadzi, unochemei? Akati kwavari: Nokuti vakabvisa Ishe wangu, zvino handizivi kwavakamuradzika.
John 20:14 Zvino wakati areva zvinhu izvi akatendeukira kumashure, akaona Jesu amire, asi haana kuziva kuti ndiJesu.
John 20:15 Jesu akati kwaari: Mukadzi, unochemei? Unotsvaka ani? Iye achifunga kuti ndiye murimi wemunda, akati kwaari: Ishe, kana imwi mamubvisa, ndiudzei pamamuradzika, uye ini ndichanomutora.
John 20:16 Jesu akati kwaari: Maria! Iye akatendeuka akati kwaari: Rabhoni! ndiko kuti: Mudzidzisi.
John 20:17 Jesu akati kwaari: Usandibata, nokuti ndichigere kukwira kuna Baba vangu; asi enda kuvanin'ina vangu, uti kwavari: Ndinokwira kuna Baba vangu naBaba venyu, naMwari wangu naMwari wenyu.
John 20:18 Maria Magidharini akauya ndokuudza vadzidzi kuti waona Ishe, uye wamuudza zvinhu izvi. <div eID="gen1113" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1112" type="section"/>
John 20:19 Zvino ava madekwani nezuva iroro rekutanga revhiki, mikova yapfigwa pakange pakaungana vadzidzi nekutya VaJudha, Jesu akauya akamira pakati, akati kwavari: Rugare kwamuri.
John 20:20 Zvino wakati ataura izvi akavaratidza zvanza nerutivi rwake. Naizvozvo vadzidzi vakafara vachiona Ishe.
John 20:21 Naizvozvo Jesu akatizve kwavari: Rugare kwamuri; Baba sezvavakandituma, neni ndinokutumai.
John 20:22 Zvino wakati areva izvi akafuridzira kwa<transChange type="added">vari</transChange>, ndokuti kwavari: Gamuchirai Mweya Mutsvene.
John 20:23 Ani nani wamunokanganwira zvivi, vazvikanganwirwa; vese vamunobata zvavo zvabatwa. <div eID="gen1115" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1114" type="section"/>
John 20:24 Asi Tomasi, umwe wevanegumi nevaviri, wainzi Dhidhimo, wakange asipo navo Jesu paakauya.
John 20:25 Naizvozvo vamwe vadzidzi vakati kwaari: Taona Ishe. Asi iye wakati kwavari: Kana ndisingaoni vanga rembambo muzvanza zvake, nekuisa munwe wangu muvanga rembambo, nekuisa ruoko rwangu murutivi rwake, handingatongotendi.
John 20:26 Zvino mushure memazuva masere vadzidzi vake vakange vari mukatizve, naTomasi anavo. Jesu akauya, mikova yakapfigwa, ndokumira pakati akati: Rugare kwamuri.
John 20:27 Ipapo akati kuna Tomasi: Uisa munwe wako pano uone zvanza zangu; uuise ruoko rwako uise murutivi rwangu, usava usingatendi, asi unotenda.
John 20:28 Zvino Tomasi akapindura, akati kwaari: Ishe wangu naMwari wangu!
John 20:29 Jesu akati kwaari: Nokuti wandiona, Tomasi, watenda; vakaropafadzwa vasina kuona asi vatenda.
John 20:30 Zvino zvirokwazvo Jesu wakaita zvimwe zviratidzo zvizhinji pamberi pevadzidzi vake, zvisina kunyorwa mubhuku iri.
John 20:31 Asi izvi zvakanyorwa, kuti mutende kuti Jesu ndiKristu, Mwanakomana waMwari, uye kuti muchitenda muve neupenyu muzita rake. <chapter eID="John.20"/><div eID="gen1117" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1116" type="section"/>
John 21:0 <div sID="gen1118" type="section"/> <chapter n="21" osisID="John.21" sID="John.21"/>  <div sID="gen1119" type="x-p"/>
John 21:1 Shure kwezvinhu izvi Jesu wakazviratidzazve kuvadzidzi pagungwa reTibheriasi; uye wakazviratidza sezvizvi:
John 21:2 Vaiva pamwe Simoni Petro, naTomasi anonzi Dhidhimo, naNatanieri waibva Kana yeGarirea, ne<transChange type="added">vanakomana</transChange> vaZebhedhi, nevamwe vaviri vevadzidzi vake.
John 21:3 Simoni Petro akati kwavari: Ndoenda kunobata hove. Vakati kwaari: Nesu toenda newe. Vakabuda ndokupinda muchikepe pakarepo, asi usiku uhwo havana kubata chinhu.
John 21:4 Zvino kwakati kwatova mambakwedza, Jesu akamira pamahombekombe, asi vadzidzi havana kuziva kuti ndiJesu.
John 21:5 Naizvozvo Jesu wakati kwavari: Vana vadiki, mune chero usavi here? Vakamupindura, <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Kwete.
John 21:6 Ndokuti kwavari: Kandai mumbure kurutivi rwerudyi rwechikepe, uye muchawana. Naizvozvo vakakanda, zvino vakasazogonazve kuukweva nekuwanda kwehove.
John 21:7 Naizvozvo mudzidzi uya Jesu waaida wakati kuna Petro: NdiIshe. Ipapo Simoni Petro anzwa kuti ndiIshe, wakamonera nguvo yake yekunze (nokuti wakange akashama), akazviwisira mugungwa.
John 21:8 Asi vamwe vadzidzi vakauya nechikepe chidiki, vachikweva mumbure une hove, nokuti vakange vasiri kure nenyika, asi mbimbi dzinenge mazana maviri.
John 21:9 Zvino vakati vachisvika panyika, vakaona moto wemazimbe wakaiswa<transChange type="added">po</transChange>, nehove yakaradzikwa pamusoro pawo, nechingwa.
John 21:10 Jesu akati kwavari: Uisai <transChange type="added">dzimwe</transChange> dzehove dzamabata ikozvino.
John 21:11 Simoni Petro akakwira, akakwevera mumbure panyika, uzere nehove huru, zana nemakumi mashanu nenhatu; uye kunyange dzaiva zhinji dzakadai, mumbure hauna kubvaruka.
John 21:12 Jesu akati kwavari: Uyai mudye. Asi hakuna kuvadzidzi wakatsunga kumubvunza <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Ndimwi ani imwi? vachiziva kuti ndiIshe.
John 21:13 Naizvozvo Jesu wakauya, ndokutora chingwa, akavapa, nehove saizvozvo.
John 21:14 Urwu rwatova rwechitatu Jesu achizviratidza kuvadzidzi vake, amutswa kubva kuvakafa.
John 21:15 Zvino vakati vadya, Jesu akati kuna Simoni Petro: Simoni waJona, unondida kupfuura ava here? Akati kwaari: Hongu Ishe; imwi munoziva kuti ndinokudai. Akati kwaari: Chedza makwayana angu.
John 21:16 Akati kwaarizve rwechipiri: Simoni waJona, unondida here? Akati kwaari: Hongu Ishe; imwi munoziva kuti ndinokudai. Akati kwaari: Fudza makwai angu.
John 21:17 Akati kwaari rwechitatu: Simoni waJona, unondida here? Petro akarwadziwa nokuti wakati kwaari rwechitatu: Unondida here? Akati kwaari: Ishe, imwi munoziva zvinhu zvese; imwi munoziva kuti ndinokudai. Jesu akati kwaari: Chedza makwai angu.
John 21:18 Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri: Pawaiva mudiki, waizvisunga bhande, uchifamba kwawaida; asi kana wakwegura, uchatandavadza maoko ako, uye umwe achakusunga bhande, achi<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>isa kwausingadi.
John 21:19 Wakareva izvi, achiratidza <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> mafiro rudzii aaizokudza Mwari nawo. Zvino wakati areva izvi, akati kwaari: Nditevere.
John 21:20 Petro achitendeuka wakaona mudzidzi Jesu waaida achitevera, ndiyewo wakazendamira pachifuva chake pachirairo, akati: Ishe, ndiani achakutengesai?
John 21:21 Petro wakati achimuona akati kuna Jesu: Ishe, ko uyu?
John 21:22 Jesu akati kwaari: Kana ndikada kuti agare kusvikira ndichiuya, unei nazvo? Nditevere iwe.
John 21:23 Zvino shoko iri rakabudira pakati pehama, kuti mudzidzi uyu haazofi; asi Jesu haana kureva kwaari, kuti haazofi; asi <transChange type="added">wakati</transChange>: Kana ndichida kuti agare kusvikira ndichiuya, unei nazvo?
John 21:24 Ndiyeyu mudzidzi anopupura zvezvinhu izvi, nekunyora zvinhu izvi; uye tinoziva kuti uchapupu hwake ichokwadi.
John 21:25 Uyewo zvimwe zvizhinji zviriko Jesu zvaakaita; kana zvainyorwa chimwe nechimwe, ndinofunga kuti kunyange nyika pachayo haizaiva nenzvimbo yemabhuku anganyorwa. Amen. <div eID="gen1119" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1118" type="section"/> <chapter eID="John.21"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen920" osisID="John" type="book"/>
Acts 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Acts" sID="gen1120" type="book"/>  <milestone n="MABASA AVAAPOSITORI" type="x-usfm-h"/>
Acts 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Acts.1" sID="Acts.1"/>
Acts 1:1 Rondedzero yekutanga ndakaiita, haiwa Teofiro, pamusoro pezvese Jesu zvaakatanga kuita uyewo kudzidzisa,
Acts 1:2 kusvikira zuva raakakwidzwa, amboraira neMweya Mutsvene kuvaapositori vaakange asarudza;
Acts 1:3 vaakazviratidzawo kwavari ari mupenyu shure kwekutambudzika kwake neuchapupu uzhinji hunopwisa, achionekwa navo kwemazuva makumi mana, achitaura zvinhu zveushe hwaMwari.
Acts 1:4 Zvino aungana navo, akavaraira kuti varege kubva muJerusarema asi vamirire chivimbiso chaBaba, chamakanzwa neni;
Acts 1:5 nokuti Johwani zvirokwazvo wakabhabhatidza nemvura, asi imwi muchabhabhatidzwa neMweya Mutsvene pasina mazuva mazhinji kubva ikozvino. <div eID="gen1122" type="x-p"/>
Acts 1:6 Naizvozvo ivo vakati vaungana vakamubvunza vachiti: Ishe, muchadzosera ushe kuna Israeri nenguva ino here?
Acts 1:7 Zvino akati kwavari: Hazvisi zvenyu kuziva nguva kana misi Baba yavakatara nesimba ravo pachavo;
Acts 1:8 asi muchagamuchira simba, Mweya Mutsvene asvika pamusoro penyu; uye muchava zvapupu zvangu zvese paJerusarema nemuJudhiya mese nemuSamaria, kusvikirawo kumugumo wenyika. <div eID="gen1123" type="x-p"/>
Acts 1:9 Zvino wakati areva zvinhu izvi, akakwidzwa vakatarira, negore rikamubvisa pameso avo.
Acts 1:10 Zvino vachakatarisisa kudenga, achikwira, zvino tarira, varume vaviri vakamira navo nenguvo chena;
Acts 1:11 ivowo vakati: Varume veGarirea, makamirirei makatarisisa kudenga? Iyeyu Jesu, anobviswa kwamuri achikwidzwa kudenga, achauya saizvozvo sezvamunomuona achienda kudenga. <div eID="gen1124" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1121" type="section"/>
Acts 1:12 Zvino vakadzokera kuJerusarema vachibva pagomo rinonzi reMiorivhi riri pedo neJerusarema, <transChange type="added">chinhambwe</transChange> cherwendo rwesabata.
Acts 1:13 Vakati vapinda, vakakwira mukamuri yepamusoro apo paigara vese Petro naJakobho naJohwani naAndiriya, Firipi naTomasi, Bhatironomiyo naMatewu, Jakobho waArifio naSimoni muZiroti, naJudhasi waJakobho.
Acts 1:14 Ava vese vakatsungirira nemoyo umwe mumunyengetero nemukumbiro, pamwe nevakadzi, naMaria mai vaJesu, uye nevanin'ina vake. <div eID="gen1126" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1125" type="section"/>
Acts 1:15 Zvino mumazuva iwayo Petro wakasimuka pakati pevadzidzi akati (kwaiva nechaunga nevanhu pamwe vanenge zana nemakumi maviri):
Acts 1:16 Varume hama, zvakafanira kuti rugwaro urwu rwuzadziswe, Mweya Mutsvene zvawakagara wataura nemuromo waDhavhidhi pamusoro paJudhasi, wakange ari mutungamiriri wevaya vakabata Jesu,
Acts 1:17 nokuti wakange achiverengwa pamwe nesu, akagamuchira mugove weushumiri uhu.
Acts 1:18 Zvino uyu wakawana munda nemubairo wezvakaipa, akawa nemusoro, akaparuka nepakati, ura hwake hwese hukabvajukira kunze.
Acts 1:19 Zvikanzwikwa kuvagari vese paJerusarema, zvekuti munda uyo watumidzwa nerurimi rwavo pachavo <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> Akeridhama, ndiko kuti: Munda weropa.
Acts 1:20 Nokuti zvakanyorwa mubhuku reMapisarema <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Musha wake ngauve dongo, uye kurege kuva neanogara mauri; uye: Utariri hwake, umwe ngaatore.
Acts 1:21 Naizvozvo zvakafanira pavarume ava vaifamba nesu munguva yese, apo Ishe Jesu aipinda nekubuda pakati pedu,
Acts 1:22 kutanga parubhabhatidzo rwaJohwani, kusvikira pazuva raakwidzwa kubva kwatiri, umwe wavo ngaave chapupu pamwe nesu chekumuka kwake.
Acts 1:23 Zvino vakamisa vaviri: Josefa wainzi Bharisabhasi, wakatumidzwawo Jusito, naMatiasi.
Acts 1:24 Vakanyengetera vachiti: Imwi Ishe, imwi muzivi wemoyo yevese, taridzai umwe pavaviri ava wamasarudza,
Acts 1:25 kugamuchira mugove paushumiri nevuapositori, Judhasi hwaakatsauka pahuri, kuti aende panzvimbo yake pachake.
Acts 1:26 Zvino vakavapa mijenya yavo, mujenya ukawira pana Matiasi; akaverengwa pamwe nevaapositori vanegumi neumwe.  <chapter eID="Acts.1"/><div eID="gen1128" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1127" type="section"/>
Acts 2:0 <div sID="gen1129" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="Acts.2" sID="Acts.2"/>  <div sID="gen1130" type="x-p"/>
Acts 2:1 Zvino zuva rePendekosita* rakati razadzisika, vese vakange vari pamwe nemoyo umwe.
Acts 2:2 Pakarepo kwakauya mutinhiro kubva kudenga sewemhepo inovhuvhuta nesimba, ndokuzadza imba yese mavakange vagere.
Acts 2:3 Zvino kwakaonekwa kwavari ndimi dzakaparadzaniswa sedzemoto, ndokugara pamusoro peumwe neumwe wavo.
Acts 2:4 Zvino vese vakazadzwa neMweya Mutsvene, ndokutanga kutaura nedzimwe ndimi, Mweya sezvaakavapa kududza. <div eID="gen1130" type="x-p"/>
Acts 2:5 Zvino kwaigara paJerusarema VaJudha, varume vaitya Mwari, vaibva kurudzi rwese rwevari pasi pedenga.
Acts 2:6 Zvino mutinhiro uyu wakati waitika, chaunga chikaungana chikavhiringidzwa, nokuti umwe neumwe wakavanzwa vachitaura nerurimi rwekwake.
Acts 2:7 Zvino vakakatyamara vese vakashamisika vakataurirana <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Tarirai, ava vese vanotaura havasi VaGarirea here?
Acts 2:8 Zvino isu tinonzwa sei umwe neumwe nerurimi rwekwedu, rwatakaberekwa narwo?
Acts 2:9 VaPatia neVaMedhia neVaEramu, nevagari veMesopotamia, neveJudhiya neveKapadhokiasi, vePonto neveAsia,
Acts 2:10 neveFrigia nevePamufiriya, veEgipita nevemativi eRibhia pedo neKurini, nevaeni veRoma, vese VaJudha nevakatendeukira kuVaJudha,
Acts 2:11 VaKrete neVaArabhiya, tinovanzwa vachitaura nendimi dzedu mabasa makuru aMwari.
Acts 2:12 Zvino vakakatyamara vese, vakashamiswa vachiti umwe kune umwe: Ichi chingava chii?
Acts 2:13 Asi vamwe vakatsvinya vachiti: Vararadza waini inotapira. <div eID="gen1131" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1129" type="section"/>
Acts 2:14 Zvino Petro amire nevanegumi neumwe, wakasimudza inzwi rake, ndokuti kwavari: Varume VaJudha, nevese vagere muJerusarema, chinhu ichi ngachizikanwe kwamuri, uye muteerere kumashoko angu.
Acts 2:15 Nokuti ava havana kuraradza sezvamunofunga imwi; nokuti iawa rechitatu rezuva;
Acts 2:16 asi ichi ndicho chakataurwa nemuporofita Joweri <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>:
Acts 2:17 Zvino zvichava mumazuva ekupedzisira, anodaro Mwari, ndichadurura zveMweya wangu pamusoro penyama yese; nevanakomana venyu nevanasikana venyu vachaporofita, uye majaya enyu achaona zviratidzo, nevatana venyu vacharota hope;
Acts 2:18 uye nepamusoro pevaranda vangu nepamusoro pevarandakadzi vangu, nemazuva iwayo ndichadurura zveMweya wangu, uye vachaporofita.
Acts 2:19 Zvino ndichaita zvishamiso kudenga kumusoro, nezviratidzo panyika pasi, ropa, nemoto, nemhute yeutsi.
Acts 2:20 Zuva richashandurwa kuva rima, nemwedzi kuva ropa, risati rasvika zuva raIshe guru uye rinobwinya;
Acts 2:21 zvino zvichava <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> ani nani anodana zita raIshe achaponeswa.
Acts 2:22 Varume VaIsraeri, inzwai mashoko awa: Jesu weNazareta, murume wakapupurirwa naMwari pakati penyu nemabasa esimba nezvishamiso nezviratidzo Mwari zvaakaita pakati penyu kubudikidza naye, sezvamunozivawo imwi momene,
Acts 2:23 iye wakakumikidzwa nezano rakamiswa nekuziva zviri mberi kwaMwari, mukamutora, nemaoko evasina murairo mukaroverera pamuchinjikwa mukauraya;
Acts 2:24 iye Mwari waakamutsa, asunungura marwadzo erufu, nokuti zvakange zvisingagoneki kuti abatwe narwo.
Acts 2:25 Nokuti Dhavhidhi wakataura maererano naye: Ndaiona Ishe pamberi pangu nguva dzese; nokuti ari kuruoko rwerudyi rwangu, kuti ndirege kuzununguswa.
Acts 2:26 Naizvozvo moyo wangu wakafara, nerurimi rwangu rwakafarisisa; uyezve nenyama yangu ichazorora mutariro.
Acts 2:27 Nokuti hamuzosii mweya wangu mugehena, kana kutendera Mutsvene wenyu kuti aone kuora.
Acts 2:28 Makandizivisa nzira dzeupenyu; muchandizadza nemufaro nechiso chenyu.
Acts 2:29 Varume hama, regai <transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>taure kwamuri pachena zvateteguru Dhavhidhi, kuti zvese vakafa uye vakavigwa, neguva ravo riri pakati pedu kusvikira zuva rino.
Acts 2:30 Naizvozvo ari muporofita, uye achiziva kuti Mwari wakapika nemhiko kwaari kuti kuchibereko chechiuno chake panyama achasimudza Kristu kuti agare pachigaro chake cheushe,
Acts 2:31 aona zviri mberi, wakareva zvekumuka kwaKristu, kuti mweya wake hauna kusiiwa mugehena, kana nyama yake kuona kuora.
Acts 2:32 Uyu Jesu Mwari wakamumutsa, watiri zvapupu zvazvo tese.
Acts 2:33 Naizvozvo asimudzirwa kuruoko rwerudyi rwaMwari, agamuchira kuna Baba chivimbiso cheMweya Mutsvene, wadurura izvi imwi zvamunoona nezvamunonzwa ikozvino.
Acts 2:34 Nokuti Dhavhidhi haana kukwira kumatenga, asi anoti amene: Ishe wakati kuna Ishe wangu: Gara kuruoko rwangu rwerudyi,
Acts 2:35 kusvikira ndichiita vavengi vako chitsiko chetsoka dzako.
Acts 2:36 Naizvozvo imba yese yaIsraeri ngaizive kwazvo, kuti Mwari wakamuita zvese Ishe naKristu, iyeyu Jesu wamakaroverera pamuchinjikwa imwi. <div eID="gen1133" type="x-p"/>
Acts 2:37 Zvino vakati vachinzwa <transChange type="added">izvi</transChange> vakabaiwa pamoyo, ndokuti kuna Petro nevamwe vaapositori: Varume hama, tichaitei?
Acts 2:38 Petro ndokuti kwavari: Tendeukai mubhabhatidzwe umwe neumwe wenyu muzita raJesu Kristu, kuitira kanganwiro yezvivi, uye muchagamuchira chipo cheMweya Mutsvene.
Acts 2:39 Nokuti chivimbiso ndechenyu, nechevana venyu, nechevese vari kure, uwandu Ishe Mwari wedu sehwevaanodana.
Acts 2:40 Uye nemamwe mashoko mazhinji, akapupura akakurudzira, achiti: Muzviponese pazera iri rakashonyoroka.
Acts 2:41 Zvino avo vakagamuchira nemufaro shoko rake vakabhabhatidzwa; uye nezuva iro vakawedzerwa mweya inenge zvuru zvitatu. <div eID="gen1134" type="x-p"/>
Acts 2:42 Vakarambira padzidziso yevaapositori nepakuwadzana, nepakumedura chingwa nepaminyengetero.
Acts 2:43 Uye kutya kukawira pamusoro pemweya wega-wega; uye zvishamiso zvizhinji nezviratidzo zvikaitwa nevaapositori.
Acts 2:44 Nevaitenda vese vaiva pamwe, uye vakava nezvinhu zvese panhu pamwe,
Acts 2:45 ndokutengesa zva<transChange type="added">va</transChange>iva nazvo nenhumbi, vakazvigovana vese, umwe neumwe paaishaiwa napo.
Acts 2:46 Zuva rimwe nerimwe vakange vachitsungirira mutembere nemoyo umwe, uye vaimedura chingwa paimba neimba, vachidya kudya nemufaro nemoyo wakachena,
Acts 2:47 vachirumbidza Mwari, vachifarirwa nevanhu vese. Ishe akawedzera kukereke zuva rimwe nerimwe avo vanoponeswa. <chapter eID="Acts.2"/><div eID="gen1135" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1132" type="section"/>
Acts 3:0 <div sID="gen1136" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="Acts.3" sID="Acts.3"/>  <div sID="gen1137" type="x-p"/>
Acts 3:1 Zvino Petro naJohwani vakakwira pamwe kuenda kutembere paawa rekunyengetera repfumbamwe.
Acts 3:2 Zvino kwaitakurwa umwe murume waiva chirema kubva mudumbu ramai vake; wavaiisa zuva rimwe nerimwe pamusuwo wetembere unonzi Wakanaka, kuti akumbire chipo kune vaipinda mutembere.
Acts 3:3 Iye wakati achiona Petro naJohwani voda kupinda mutembere, akakumbira chipo.
Acts 3:4 Zvino Petro akamudzvokora anaJohwani, akati: Titarire!
Acts 3:5 Akavacherekedza, achitarisira kugamuchira chinhu kwavari.
Acts 3:6 Petro ndokuti: Sirivheri negoridhe handina; asi icho chandinacho ndinokupa: Muzita raJesu Kristu muNazareta, simuka ufambe.
Acts 3:7 Akamubata ruoko rwerudyi aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>simudza; zvino pakarepo tsoka nezviziso zvetsoka dzake zvikasimbiswa.
Acts 3:8 Zvino akauruka akamira ndokufamba, ndokupinda navo mutembere, achifamba nekuuruka nekurumbidza Mwari.
Acts 3:9 Uye vanhu vese vakamuona achifamba, nekurumbidza Mwari.
Acts 3:10 Vakamuziva kuti ndiye waigarira chipo pamukova Wakanaka wetembere; vakazadzwa nekushamisika nekukatyamara nezvakange zvaitika kwaari. <div eID="gen1137" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1136" type="section"/>
Acts 3:11 Zvino waikamhina wakange aporeswa achakabatira Petro naJohwani, vanhu vese vakamhanyira pamwe kwavari paberere rinonzi raSoromoni, vachishamisika zvikuru.
Acts 3:12 Zvino Petro wakati a<transChange type="added">chizvi</transChange>ona akapindura kuvanhu <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Varume VaIsraeri, mashamisika sei pamusoro pezvizvi, kana munotidzvokora sei, sezvinonzi nesimba kana utsvene hwedu pachedu taita uyu kuti afambe?
Acts 3:13 Mwari waAbhurahama newaIsaka newaJakobho, Mwari wemadzibaba edu, wakudza Mwanakomana wake Jesu; wamakakumikidza imwi <transChange type="added">kuvatongi</transChange> nekumuramba pamberi pechiso chaPirato, iye agura ku<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>sunungura.
Acts 3:14 Asi imwi makaramba Mutsvene neWakarurama, mukakumbira murume mhondi kuti ipiwe kwamuri,
Acts 3:15 mukauraya Muvambi weupenyu; iye Mwari waakamutsa kubva kuvakafa; zvatiri zvapupu zvazvo isu.
Acts 3:16 Uye nerutendo kuzita rake, uyu wamunoona uye wamunoziva, zita rake ramusimbisa; nerutendo rwuri nemaari rwamupa kuporeswa uku kwakazara pamberi penyu mese.
Acts 3:17 Uye ikozvino, hama, ndinoziva kuti makaita nekusaziva, sevatongi venyuwo.
Acts 3:18 Asi Mwari zvaakagara areva nemuromo wevaporofita vake vese, kuti Kristu achatambudzika, wakazvizadzisa saizvozvi.
Acts 3:19 Naizvozvo tendeukai mudzoke, kuti zvivi zvenyu zvidzimwe, kuti nguva dzekufefeterwa dzinobva pachiso chaIshe dzisvike,
Acts 3:20 uye achatuma Jesu Kristu, wakagara aparidzirwa kwamuri;
Acts 3:21 wakafanira kuti denga rimugamuchire kusvikira nguva dzekuvandudzwa kwezvinhu zvese, Mwari dzaakareva nemuromo wevaporofita vake vatsvene vese kubva panguva dzakare.
Acts 3:22 Nokuti Mozisi zvirokwazvo wakati kumadzibaba: Ishe Mwari wenyu achakumutsirai muporofita pahama dzenyu, <transChange type="added">waka</transChange>ita seni; iye muchamuteerera pazvese zvaachataura kwamuri.
Acts 3:23 Uye zvichaitika, mweya umwe neumwe ucharega kuteerera muporofita uyo uchaparadzwa kubva pavanhu.
Acts 3:24 Uye nevaporofita vese kubva kuna Samueri nevakatevera, vese vakataura, vakagara vaparidzawo <transChange type="added">zve</transChange>mazuva awa.
Acts 3:25 Imwi muri vana vevaporofita, nevesungano Mwari yaakaita nemadzibaba edu, achiti kuna Abhurahama: Nemumbeu yako marudzi ese enyika acharopafadzwa.
Acts 3:26 Mwari amutsa Mwanakomana wake Jesu, wakamutuma kwamuri pakutanga kukuropafadzai, pakudzora umwe neumwe pazvakaipa zvenyu.  <chapter eID="Acts.3"/><div eID="gen1139" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1138" type="section"/>
Acts 4:0 <div sID="gen1140" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="Acts.4" sID="Acts.4"/>  <div sID="gen1141" type="x-p"/>
Acts 4:1 Zvino vakati vachataura kuvanhu, vapristi nemutungamiriri wetembere neVaSadhusi vakavasvikira,
Acts 4:2 vachishungurudzika nokuti vanodzidzisa vanhu, nekuparidza kumuka kubva kuvakafa munaJesu.
Acts 4:3 Zvino vakaisa maoko pavari ndokuisa muchitokisi kusvikira mangwana; nokuti akange atova madekwani.
Acts 4:4 Asi vazhinji vevakanzwa shoko vakatenda; neuwandu hwevarume hwaiva zvuru zvinenge zvishanu. <div eID="gen1141" type="x-p"/>
Acts 4:5 Zvino zvakaitika kuchiidza kuti kwakaungana vatungamiriri nevakuru nevanyori vavo paJerusarema,
Acts 4:6 naAnasi mupristi mukuru, naKayafasi, naJohwani, naArekizandira, nevese vaiva vehama dzemupristi mukuru.
Acts 4:7 Zvino vakati vavamisa pakati, vakabvunza <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Izvi imwi mazviita nesimba ripi kana nezita ripi?
Acts 4:8 Ipapo Petro azedzwe neMweya Mutsvene wakati kwavari: Vatongi vevanhu, nevakuru VaIsraeri;
Acts 4:9 kana isu tichibvunzurudzwa nhasi pamusoro pebasa rakanaka kumunhu asina simba, <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> iye waponeswa nei,
Acts 4:10 ngazvizikanwe kwamuri mese, nekuvanhu vese veIsraeri, kuti nezita raJesu Kristu muNazareta, wamakaroverera pamuchinjikwa imwi, Mwari waakamutsa kubva kuvakafa, naye munhu uyu amire pano pamberi penyu apora.
Acts 4:11 Uyu ndiye ibwe rakazvidzwa nemwi vavaki, razova musoro wekona.
Acts 4:12 Uye hakuna ruponeso kune umwezve; nokuti hakuna rimwe zita pasi pedenga rakapiwa pakati pevanhu, ratinofanira kuponeswa naro. <div eID="gen1142" type="x-p"/>
Acts 4:13 Zvino vakati vachiona kusatya kwaPetro naJohwani, uye vachinzwisisa kuti vaiva vanhu vasina kudzidza uye vasina ruzivo, vakashamisika; ndokuvaziva kuti vaiva naJesu.
Acts 4:14 Asi vachiona munhu wakange aporeswa amire navo, vakashaiwa chavangapikisa.
Acts 4:15 Zvino vakati vavaraira kuti vabude kunze kwedare remakurukota, vakarangana pakati pavo,
Acts 4:16 vachiti: Tichaitei kuvanhu ava? Nokuti zviri pachena kune vese vagere Jerusarema kuti chiratidzo chinozikanwa chaitwa navo, uye hatigoni ku<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ramba.
Acts 4:17 Asi kuti zvirege kunyanya kuparadzirwa pakati pevanhu, ngativayambirei zvikuru kuti varege kuchizotaura nemunhu upi neupi muzita iri.
Acts 4:18 Vakabva vavadana, vakavaraira kuti varege kutongotaura kana kudzidzisa muzita raJesu.
Acts 4:19 Asi Petro naJohwani vakapindura vakati kwavari: Gurai, kana zvakarurama pamberi paMwari kuteerera imwi kupfuura Mwari.
Acts 4:20 Nokuti isu hatigoni kusataura zvatakaona nekunzwa.
Acts 4:21 Zvino vakati vawedzera ku<transChange type="added">va</transChange>vhundudzira, vakavaregedza, vasingawani chinhu kuti vangavaranga sei nekuda kwevanhu; nokuti vese vairumbidza Mwari pamusoro pezvakaitika.
Acts 4:22 Nokuti munhu wakange apfuura makore makumi mana wakange aitirwa chiratidzo ichi chekuporesa. <div eID="gen1143" type="x-p"/>
Acts 4:23 Vakati varegedzwa vakaenda kune vekwavo, vakanopira zvese vapristi vakuru nevakuru zvavakange vataura kwavari.
Acts 4:24 Zvino ivo vakati vanzwa vakasimudzira inzwi kuna Mwari nemoyo umwe, vakati: Tenzi, imwi Mwari makaita denga nenyika negungwa nezvese zviri mazviri;
Acts 4:25 makareva nemuromo waDhavhidhi, muranda wenyu <transChange type="added">muchiti</transChange>: Nemhaka yei vahedheni vachiita bope, nevanhu vachifunga zvisina maturo?
Acts 4:26 Madzimambo enyika akasimuka, nevatungamiriri vakaungana pamwe chete kumirisana naIshe nekumirisana naKristu wake.
Acts 4:27 Nokuti zvirokwazvo vakaungana vakamirisana neMwanakomana wenyu mutsvene Jesu, wamakazodza, vese Herodhe naPondiyo Pirato pamwe nevahedheni, nevanhu vekwaIsraeri,
Acts 4:28 kuti vaite zvese ruoko rwenyu nezano renyu zvamakagara matema kuti zviitike.
Acts 4:29 Uye ikozvino Ishe, tarirai kuvhundudzira kwavo, mupe varanda venyu kuti vataure shoko renyu nekusatya kwese,
Acts 4:30 pakuti mutandavadze ruoko rwenyu pakuporesa, nezviratidzo nezvishamiso zviitwe nezita reMwanakomana wenyu mutsvene Jesu.
Acts 4:31 Zvino vakati vanyengetera nzvimbo yavakange vakaungana pairi yakazununguswa; zvino vakazadzwa vese neMweya Mutsvene, ndokutaura shoko raMwari nekusatya. <div eID="gen1144" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1140" type="section"/>
Acts 4:32 Zvino chaunga chevaitenda chaiva nemoyo nemweya umwe; uye kwakange kusina umwe waiti chimwe chezvaaiva nazvo ndechake, asi vakadyidzana zvinhu zvese.
Acts 4:33 Uye nesimba guru vaapositori vakapa uchapupu hwekumuka kwaIshe Jesu; nenyasha huru dzikava pamusoro pavo vese.
Acts 4:34 Nokuti pakange pasina umwe pakati pavo waishaiwa, nokuti vese vaiva vene veminda kana dzimba, vakazvitengesa, vakauisa mutengo wezvinhu zvakatengeswa,
Acts 4:35 vakaisa patsoka dzevaapositori; uye zvikagoverwa kune umwe neumwe zvichienderana nekushaiwa kwaaiva nako.
Acts 4:36 NaJose, wakatumidzwa nevaapositori Bhanabhasi, ndokuti kana zvichishandurwa, mwanakomana wenyaradzo, muRevhi weSaipuresi parudzi,
Acts 4:37 ane munda, wakatengesa, akauisa mari akaisa patsoka dzevaapositori. <chapter eID="Acts.4"/><div eID="gen1146" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1145" type="section"/>
Acts 5:0 <div sID="gen1147" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="Acts.5" sID="Acts.5"/>  <div sID="gen1148" type="x-p"/>
Acts 5:1 Asi umwe murume wainzi Ananiasi, naSafira mukadzi wake, wakatengesa nhumbi <transChange type="added">dzake</transChange>,
Acts 5:2 akazvisiira pamutengo, mukadzi wake achizivawo, akauya nechimwe chikamu, ndokuisa patsoka dzevaapositori.
Acts 5:3 Asi Petro wakati: Ananiasi, Satani wazadzirei moyo wako kuti ureve nhema kuMweya Mutsvene, nekuzvisiira pamutengo wemunda?
Acts 5:4 Uchiripo hauna kuramba uri wako here, watengeswa wakange usi musimba rako here? Sei waisa mumoyo mako chiito ichi? Hauna kureva nhema kuvanhu, asi kuna Mwari.
Acts 5:5 Zvino Ananiasi achinzwa mashoko awa, wakawira pasi, akapera; kutya kukuru ndokuwira pamusoro pevese vakanzwa zvinhu izvi.
Acts 5:6 Nemajaya akasimuka akamuputira ndokutakurira kunze vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>viga. <div eID="gen1148" type="x-p"/>
Acts 5:7 Zvino zvakaitika maawa anenge matatu apfuura, kuti mukadzi wake asingazivi zvaitika wakapinda.
Acts 5:8 Petro ndokumupindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ndiudze kana matengesa munda nezvakadai? Ndokuti: Hongu, nezvakadai.
Acts 5:9 Petro ndokuti kwaari: Sei matenderana kuedza Mweya waIshe? Tarira, tsoka dzevaviga murume wako pamukova, newe vachakutakurira kunze.
Acts 5:10 Ipapo akawira pasi pakarepo patsoka dzake, akapera; majaya akapinda akamuwana afa, aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>takurira kunze ndokuviga nechepamurume wake.
Acts 5:11 Kutya kukuru ndokuwira pamusoro pekereke yese nepamusoro pevese vakanzwa zvinhu izvi. <div eID="gen1149" type="x-p"/>
Acts 5:12 Uye nemaoko evaapositori kwakaitwa zviratidzo nezvishamiso zvizhinji pakati pevanhu; uye vese vaiva nemoyo umwe muberere raSoromoni.
Acts 5:13 Asi pavamwe kwakange kusina munhu wakashinga kuzvisanganisa kwavari; asi vanhu vaivakudza.
Acts 5:14 Uye vatendi vakanyanya kuwedzerwa kuna Ishe, zvaunga zvinoti zvevarume zvikati zvevakadzi.
Acts 5:15 Zvekuti vatakurira kunze varwere munzira dzemuguta, uye vakaradzika pamibhedha ne<transChange type="added">pa</transChange>nhovo, kuti kana Petro achiuya, kunyange mumvuri udzikatire umwe wavo.
Acts 5:16 Zvino kwakaunganawo chaunga chemaguta akapoteredza kuJerusarema, vachitakura varwere, nevaitambudzwa nemweya yetsvina, vakaporeswa vese. <div eID="gen1150" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1147" type="section"/>
Acts 5:17 Zvino mupristi mukuru akasimuka, nevese vaiva naye vari sangano reVaSadhusi, vakazara negodo,
Acts 5:18 vakaisa maoko avo pavaapositori vakavaisa mutirongo revanhu vese.
Acts 5:19 Asi mutumwa waIshe neusiku wakazarura mikova yetirongo akavabudisa akati:
Acts 5:20 Endai, mugomira muchitaura mutembere kuvanhu ese mashoko eupenyu uhu.
Acts 5:21 Zvino vakati vanzwa, vakapinda mutembere mangwanani-ngwanani vakadzidzisa. Asi mupristi mukuru wakasvika nevaiva naye, vakakokera dare remakurukota pamwe neungano yese yedare revakuru revana vaIsraeri, vakatumira <transChange type="added">mapurisa</transChange> kutirongo kuti vauiswe.
Acts 5:22 Asi mapurisa akati achisvika, akasavawana mutirongo; akadzoka akapira <transChange type="added">shoko</transChange>,
Acts 5:23 achiti: Tirongo zvirokwazvo takawana rakavharwa nekuchengetedzwa kwese, nevarindi vamire panze pamberi pemikova; asi tati tazarura, mukati hatina kuwana munhu.
Acts 5:24 Zvino mupristi nemutungamiriri wetembere nevapristi vakuru vakati vanzwa mashoko iwayo, vakasava nechokwadi pamusoro pavo, kuti izvi zvichazovei.
Acts 5:25 Zvino kwakasvika umwe akavaudza achiti: Tarirai, varume vamakaisa mutirongo vamire mutembere vachidzidzisa vanhu.
Acts 5:26 Zvino mutungamiriri nemapurisa vakaenda vakauya navo kwete nesimba, nokuti vaitya vanhu kuti vasatakwa nemabwe. <div eID="gen1152" type="x-p"/>
Acts 5:27 Vakati vavauisa vaka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>misa pamberi pedare remakurukota. Mupristi mukuru ndokuvabvunza,
Acts 5:28 achiti: Hatina kukurairisai kuti musadzidzisa nezita iri here? Zvino tarirai, mazadza Jerusarema nedzidziso yenyu, uye muchishuva kuuisa ropa remunhu uyu pamusoro pedu.
Acts 5:29 Zvino Petro nevaapositori vakapindura vakati: Zvakafanira kuteerera Mwari kupfuura vanhu.
Acts 5:30 Mwari wemadzibaba edu wakamutsa Jesu, iye wamakauraya imwi, mukaremberedza pamuti.
Acts 5:31 Iye uyu Mwari wakamusimudza neruoko rwake rwerudyi, <transChange type="added">ave</transChange> Muvambi neMuponesi, kupa Israeri kutendeuka nekanganwiro yezvivi.
Acts 5:32 Uye isu tiri zvapupu zvake zvezvinhu izvi, neMweya Mutsvenewo, Mwari waakapa avo vanomuteerera. <div eID="gen1153" type="x-p"/>
Acts 5:33 Zvino vakati vanzwa vakashatirwa kwazvo, vakarangana kuvauraya.
Acts 5:34 Ipapo kukasimuka umwe padare remakurukota, muFarisi wainzi Gamarieri, mudzidzisi wemurairo, waikudzwa nevanhu vese, akaraira kuti vaapositori vabudiswe chinguva chidiki.
Acts 5:35 Ndokuti kwavari: Varume VaIsraeri, zvichenjererei maererano nevanhu ava, zvamoda kuita.
Acts 5:36 Nokuti mazuva ano asati asvika kwakamuka Tudhasi, achiti iye pachake wakange ari munhu, uwandu hwevanhu hunenge mazana mana vakazvisanganisa naye; iye wakaurawa, nevese vaimuteerera neuwandu hwavo vakaparadzirwa, vakava pasina.
Acts 5:37 Shure kweuyu kukamuka Judhasi muGarirea, pamazuva ekuverengwa, akakwevera vanhu vazhinji shure kwake; iyewo wakaparara, nevese vakamuteerera neuwandu hwavo vakaparadzirwa.
Acts 5:38 Zvino ikozvino ndinoti kwamuri: Sudurukai kuvanhu ava, muvarege, nokuti kana zano iri kana basa iri riri revanhu, richaparadzwa.
Acts 5:39 Asi kana zviri zvaMwari, hamugoni kuzviparadza; kuti zvimwe muwanikwe muchirwa naMwariwo.
Acts 5:40 Vakamuteerera; uye vakati vadanira vaapositori kwavari vaka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>rova, vaka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>raira kusataura muzita raJesu, vakavaregedza.
Acts 5:41 Naizvozvo vakabva pazviso zvedare remakurukota, vachifara kuti vakafanirwa nekuzvidzwa nekuda kwezita rake.
Acts 5:42 Uye mazuva ese mutembere nepaimba imwe neimwe havana kumira kudzidzisa nekuparidza Jesu Kristu. <chapter eID="Acts.5"/><div eID="gen1154" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1151" type="section"/>
Acts 6:0 <div sID="gen1155" type="section"/> <chapter n="6" osisID="Acts.6" sID="Acts.6"/>  <div sID="gen1156" type="x-p"/>
Acts 6:1 Zvino nemazuva iwayo, vadzidzi vachiwanda, kwakamuka kunyunyuta kwemaHerenisiti* akanangana neVaHebheru, nokuti chirikadzi dzavo dzaiva dzisingatariswi pakushandirwa kwemusi umwe neumwe.
Acts 6:2 Zvino vanegumi nevaviri vakadanira kwavari chaunga chevadzidzi, vakati: Hazvina kufanira kuti isu tisiye shoko raMwari, tishande matafura.
Acts 6:3 Naizvozvo, hama, tarirai pakati penyu varume vanomwe vanopupurirwa zvakanaka, vazere neMweya Mutsvene nenjere, vatingagadza pabasa rakafanira iri.
Acts 6:4 Asi isu tichatsungirira pamunyengetero neushumiri hweshoko.
Acts 6:5 Zvino shoko rikafadza pamberi pechaunga chese; uye vakasarudza Sitefano, murume azere nerutendo uye neMweya Mutsvene, naFiripi, naProkoro, naNikanori, naTimoni, naPamenasi, naNikoraosi weAndiyokiya wakatendeukira kuVaJudha,
Acts 6:6 vavakagadza pamberi pevaapositori; uye vakati vanyengetera vakaisa maoko pamusoro pavo.
Acts 6:7 Zvino shoko raMwari rikakura, uye uwandu hwevadzidzi hukapamhidzira muJerusarema zvikurusa, nechaunga chikuru chevapristi chakateerera rutendo. <div eID="gen1156" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1155" type="section"/>
Acts 6:8 Zvino Sitefano azere nerutendo nesimba wakaita zvishamiso nezviratidzo zvikuru pakati pevanhu.
Acts 6:9 Zvino kwakamuka vamwe vesinagoge rinonzi reVakasununguka, neVaKureni, neVaAreksandiria, nereavo vaibva Kirikia neAsia, vachikakavadzana naSitefano.
Acts 6:10 Asi vakange vasingagoni kupikisa uchenjeri neMweya waaitaura nawo.
Acts 6:11 Ipapo vakamutsa varume vaiti: Tamunzwa achitaura mashoko anonyomba akanangana naMozisi naMwari.
Acts 6:12 Zvino vakamutsa vanhu nevakuru nevanyori, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>svikira vakamubata vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>uisa kudare remakurukota,
Acts 6:13 ndokuisapo zvapupu zvenhema zvakati: Munhu uyu haamiri kutaura mashoko anomhura achipokana nenzvimbo iyi tsvene nemurairo,
Acts 6:14 nokuti tamunzwa achiti uyu Jesu muNazareta achaparadza nzvimbo iyi, uye achashandura tsika Mozisi dzaakatikumikidza.
Acts 6:15 Zvino vese vakange vagere padare remakurukota vakamudzvokora, vakaona chiso chake sechainge chiso chemutumwa. <chapter eID="Acts.6"/><div eID="gen1158" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1157" type="section"/>
Acts 7:0 <div sID="gen1159" type="section"/> <chapter n="7" osisID="Acts.7" sID="Acts.7"/>  <div sID="gen1160" type="x-p"/>
Acts 7:1 Zvino mupristi mukuru akati: Ko zvinhu izvi zvakadai here?
Acts 7:2 Zvino akati: Varume, hama nemadzibaba, teererai. Mwari wekubwinya wakaonekwa kuna baba vedu Abhurahama vari muMesopotamia, vasati vagara Harani,
Acts 7:3 akati kwaari: Buda munyika yako nekuhama dzako, uuye kunyika yandichakuratidza.
Acts 7:4 Zvino vakabuda munyika yeVaKaradhia, vakagara muHarani; zvino kubva ipapo shure kwekufa kwababa vavo, wakavabvisira kunyika iyi yamunogara imwi ikozvino;
Acts 7:5 asi haana kuvapa nhaka mairi, kwete kunyange chitsiko chetsoka, asi wakavimbisa kuvapa iyo ive yavo, neyembeu yavo shure kwavo, vasati vava nemwana.
Acts 7:6 Mwari ndokutaura seizvi, kuti mbeu yavo ichava mutorwa kunyika yeumweni, uye vachaiita nhapwa neku<transChange type="added">i</transChange>bata zvakaipa makore mazana mana;
Acts 7:7 asi rudzi urwo rwavachava varanda kwarwuri ndicharwutonga ini, wakadaro Mwari; uye shure kweizvozvo vachabuda vagondishumira panzvimbo ino.
Acts 7:8 Zvino akavapa sungano yedzingiso, naizvozvowo vakabereka Isaka, vakamudzingisa zuva rerusere; naIsaka <transChange type="added">wakabereka</transChange> Jakobho; naJakobho mateteguru gumi nemaviri.
Acts 7:9 Mateteguru akagodoka, vakatengesa Josefa kuEgipita; asi Mwari waiva naye.
Acts 7:10 Akamusunungura pamatambudziko ake ese, akamupa nyasha nenjere pamberi paFarao mambo weEgipita; ndokumuita mutungamiriri pamusoro peEgipita neimba yake yese.
Acts 7:11 Zvino kwakauya nzara panyika yese yeEgipita neKenani, nedambudziko guru; madzibaba edu akasawana kudya.
Acts 7:12 Asi Jakobho wakati anzwa kuti kwaiva nezviyo kuEgipita, wakatuma madzibaba edu kwekutanga.
Acts 7:13 Zvino kwechipiri Josefa wakaziviswa kuvanakomana vababa vake; uye rudzi rwaJosefa rwukaziviswa kuna Farao.
Acts 7:14 Zvino Josefa akatumira akadana baba vake Jakobho nehama dzake dzese, iri mweya makumi manomwe nemishanu.
Acts 7:15 Zvino Jakobho akaburukira Egipita, ndokufa iye nemadzibaba edu;
Acts 7:16 uye vakatakurirwa Shekemi, vakaradzikwa paguva Abhurahama raakange atenga nemutengo wesirivheri kuvanakomana vaEmori weShekemi.
Acts 7:17 Zvino nguva yechivimbiso yakati yaswedera Mwari chaakange apikira kuna Abhurahama, vanhu vakakura, vakawanda muEgipita,
Acts 7:18 kusvikira umwe mambo amuka wakange asingazivi Josefa.
Acts 7:19 Ndiye wakabata rudzi rwedu nemano-mano, akatambudza madzibaba edu, achivarasisa vacheche vavo kuti varege kurarama.
Acts 7:20 Munguva iyoyo Mozisi wakaberekwa, uye wakange akanaka kuna Mwari; ndokurerwa mumba mababa vake mwedzi mitatu.
Acts 7:21 Zvino wakati araswa, mukunda waFarao akamunonga, akazvirerera iye kuti ave mwanakomana <transChange type="added">wake</transChange>.
Acts 7:22 Mozisi akadzidziswa muuchenjeri hwese hweVaEgipita; akava nesimba pamashoko nepamabasa.
Acts 7:23 Zvino makore makumi mana akati asvika kwaari, zvakasvika mumoyo make kushanyira hama dzake, vana vaIsraeri.
Acts 7:24 Zvino achiona umwe achiitirwa zvisakarurama, aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>rwira ndokutsivira wakange achitambudzwa, akarova muEgipita;
Acts 7:25 zvino waifunga kuti hama dzake dzichanzwisisa kuti Mwari anovapa ruponeso neruoko rwake; asi havana kunzwisisa.
Acts 7:26 Zvino zuva raitevera wakazvionesa kwavari vachirwa, akavayananisa nesimba achiti: Varume, imwi muri hama; munoitiranirei zvisakarurama?
Acts 7:27 Zvino iye wakange achiitira umwe wake zvakaipa wakamusundidzira achiti: Ndiani wakuita mutungamiriri nemutongi pamusoro pedu?
Acts 7:28 Iwe unoda kundiuraya, sezvo wakauraya muEgipita zuro here?
Acts 7:29 Zvino neshoko iri Mozisi wakatiza, ndokuva mutorwa munyika yeMidhiani, kwaakabereka vanakomana vaviri.
Acts 7:30 Zvino makore makumi mana akati azadziswa, kwakaonekwa kwaari murenje regomo Sinai mutumwa waIshe mumurazvo wemoto we<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>gwenzi.
Acts 7:31 Mozisi wakati aona, akashamisika nechionekwa ichi; zvino paaiswedera kunocherekedza, inzwi raIshe rikasvika kwaari <transChange type="added">richiti</transChange>:
Acts 7:32 Ndini Mwari wemadzibaba ako, Mwari waAbhurahama, naMwari waIsaka, naMwari waJakobho. Zvino Mozisi akadedera akasashinga kucherekedza.
Acts 7:33 Zvino Ishe akati kwaari: Kurura shangu patsoka dzako, nokuti nzvimbo yaumire pairi ivhu dzvene.
Acts 7:34 Ndaonesesa dambudziko revanhu vangu vari muEgipita, ndikanzwa kugomera kwavo, zvino ndaburuka kuzovasunungura; ikozvino uya, ndichakutuma kuEgipita.
Acts 7:35 Uyu Mozisi wavakaramba vachiti: Ndiani wakakuita mutungamiri nemutongi? Ndiye Mwari waakatuma <transChange type="added">kuva </transChange>mutungamiriri nemudzukunuri neruoko rwemutumwa, wakaonekwa kwaari mugwenzi.
Acts 7:36 Iye akavabudisa, aita zvishamiso nezviratidzo munyika yeEgipita nemuGungwa Dzvuku, nemurenje makore makumi mana.
Acts 7:37 Ndiye uyu Mozisi wakati kuvana vaIsraeri: Ishe Mwari wenyu achakumutsirai Muporofita pahama dzenyu, wakafanana neni; muchamunzwa iye.
Acts 7:38 Uyu ndiye wakange ari mukereke murenje, ane mutumwa wakataura naye mugomo Sinai ane madzibaba edu; wakagamuchira mashoko mapenyu kuti atipe.
Acts 7:39 Ndiye madzibaba edu wavakange vasingadi kuteerera; asi vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>sundidzira parutivi, vakadzokera kuEgipita mumoyo yavo.
Acts 7:40 Vachiti kuna Aroni: Tiitire vamwari vachatitungamirira; nokuti Mozisi uyu wakatibudisa munyika yeEgipita, hatizivi zvamuwira.
Acts 7:41 Zvino vakaita mhuru mumazuva ayo, vakauisa chibairo kuchifananidzo, vakafara nemabasa emaoko avo.
Acts 7:42 Zvino Mwari akafuratira, akavakumikidza kuti vashumire hondo yekudenga, sezvakanyorwa mubhuku revaporofita, <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Ko makauisa kwandiri here zvibairo nezvipo makore makumi mana murenje, imwi imba yaIsraeri?
Acts 7:43 Uye makatakura tabhenakeri yaMoroki, nenyeredzi yamwari wenyu Remifani, zvifananidzo zvamakaita kuti muzvinamate; uye ndichakutamisirai mberi kweBhabhironi.
Acts 7:44 Madzibaba edu aiva netabhenakeri yeuchapupu murenje, sekuraira kwaiye wakataura naMozisi kuti aiite nemufananidzo waakange aona;
Acts 7:45 yakatiwo madzibaba edu aitevera aigamuchira, akaipinza pamwe naJoshua munhumbi dzevahedheni, Mwari vaakadzinga pamberi pechiso chemadzibaba edu, kusvika kumazuva aDhavhidhi;
Acts 7:46 wakawana nyasha pamberi paMwari, akakumbira kuwanira Mwari waJakobho tabhenakeri.
Acts 7:47 Asi Soromoni wakamuvakira imba.
Acts 7:48 Asi Wekumusoro-soro haagari mutembere dzakaitwa nemaoko, sezvinoreva muporofita <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>:
Acts 7:49 Denga chigaro changu cheushe, nenyika chitsiko chetsoka dzangu; muchandivakira imba yakadini? <transChange type="added">ndizvo</transChange> zvinoreva Ishe; kana nzvimbo yezororo rangu ndeipi?
Acts 7:50 Ruoko rwangu haruna kuita zvinhu izvi zvese here?
Acts 7:51 Imwi vemitsipa mikukutu uye vasina kudzingiswa pamoyo nenzeve, imwi munogara muchipikisa Mweya Mutsvene; semadzibaba enyu saizvozvo imwi.
Acts 7:52 Ndeupi wevaporofita madzibaba enyu wavasina kushusha? Vakauraya avo vaifanozivisa nezvekuuya kweWakarurama, iye ikozvino wamava vatengesi nevaurayi vake.
Acts 7:53 Imwi vakagamuchira murairo neurongwa hwevatumwa, asi mukasa<transChange type="added">u</transChange>chengeta. <div eID="gen1160" type="x-p"/>
Acts 7:54 Zvino vanzwa zvinhu izvi vakabaiwa pamoyo yavo, vakamugedera-gedera meno.
Acts 7:55 Asi azere neMweya Mutsvene wakatarisisa kudenga, akaona kubwinya kwaMwari, naJesu amire kuruoko rwerudyi rwaMwari,
Acts 7:56 akati: Tarirai, ndinoona matenga akazaruka, neMwanakomana wemunhu amire kuruoko rwerudyi rwaMwari.
Acts 7:57 Zvino vakadanidzira nenzwi guru, vakadzivira nzeve dzavo, vakamhanyira paari nemoyo umwe;
Acts 7:58 vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>budisira kunze kweguta, ndoku<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>taka nemabwe; nezvapupu zvikaisa nguvo dzazvo patsoka dzejaya rainzi Sauro.
Acts 7:59 Zvino vakataka Sitefano nemabwe, achidana achiti: Ishe Jesu, gamuchirai mweya wangu.
Acts 7:60 Zvino wakafugama, akadanidzira nenzwi guru, <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Ishe, musavaverengera chivi ichi. Zvino wakati areva izvi, akarara. <chapter eID="Acts.7"/><div eID="gen1161" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1159" type="section"/>
Acts 8:0 <div sID="gen1162" type="section"/> <chapter n="8" osisID="Acts.8" sID="Acts.8"/>  <div sID="gen1163" type="x-p"/>
Acts 8:1 Zvino Sauro wakange achitenderana nerufu rwake. Zvino pazuva iro kwamuka kushushwa kukuru kwakanangana nekereke yaiva paJerusarema; vese ndokuparadzirwa kunyika dzese dzeJudhiya neSamaria, kunze kwevaapositori.
Acts 8:2 Varume vaitya Mwari vakaviga Sitefano, vakamuchema zvikuru.
Acts 8:3 Asi Sauro wakaparadza kereke, achipinda muimba imwe neimwe, achikakata varume nevakadzi nekukumikidza mutirongo. <div eID="gen1163" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1162" type="section"/>
Acts 8:4 Naizvozvo avo vakange vaparadzirwa vakagura vachiparidza shoko.
Acts 8:5 Firipi ndokuburukira kuguta reSamaria, akaparidza Kristu kwavari.
Acts 8:6 Zvaunga ndokuteerera nemoyo umwe kuzvinhu zvinotaurwa naFiripi, pavakanzwa nekuona zviratidzo zvaaiita.
Acts 8:7 Nokuti mweya yetsvina yakabuda kuvazhinji vaiva vakabatwa, ichidanidzira nenzwi guru; nevazhinji vakange vakafa mitezo nevaikamhina vakaporeswa.
Acts 8:8 Zvino kwakava nemufaro mukuru muguta iro. <div eID="gen1165" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1164" type="section"/>
Acts 8:9 Zvino umwe murume, wainzi Simoni, waimboita un'anga paguta, achishamisa rudzi rweSamaria, achizviti munhu mukuru;
Acts 8:10 wavaiteerera vese kubva kumudiki kusvika kumukuru, vachiti: Uyu isimba guru raMwari.
Acts 8:11 Zvino vaimuteerera, nokuti wakange avashamisa neun'anga nguva refu.
Acts 8:12 Zvino vakati vatenda Firipi achiparidza mashoko akanaka nezveushe hwaMwari uye nezvezita raJesu Kristu, vakabhabhatidzwa vese varume nevakadzi.
Acts 8:13 NaSimoniwo pachake wakatenda, zvino wakati abhabhatidzwa, wakagara naFiripi; akashamisika, achiona mabasa esimba nezviratidzo zvaiitwa.
Acts 8:14 Zvino vaapositori vaiva paJerusarema vakati vanzwa kuti Samaria yagamuchira shoko raMwari, vakatumira kwavari Petro naJohwani;
Acts 8:15 ivo vakati vaburukira<transChange type="added">ko</transChange> vakavanyengeterera, kuti vagamuchire Mweya Mutsvene;
Acts 8:16 nokuti wakange asati aburukira pamusoro peumwe wavo, asi vakange vabhabhatidzwa muzita raIshe Jesu chete.
Acts 8:17 Ipapo vakaisa maoko pamusoro pavo, zvino vakagamuchira Mweya Mutsvene.
Acts 8:18 Zvino Simoni wakati aona kuti nekuiswa kwemaoko evaapositori Mweya Mutsvene waipiwa, akavavigira mari,
Acts 8:19 achiti: Ndipei neni simba iri, kuti pana ani nani wandinoisa maoko pamusoro, agamuchire Mweya Mutsvene.
Acts 8:20 Asi Petro wakati kwaari: Sirivheri yako pamwe newe ngazvive zvekuparadzwa, nokuti wafunga kuti chipo chaMwari chingawanikwa nemari.
Acts 8:21 Hauna mugove kana nhaka pashoko iri. Nokuti moyo wako hauna kururama pamberi paMwari.
Acts 8:22 Naizvozvo tendeuka pakuipa kwako uku, ukumbirise Mwari, kuti zvimwe murangariro wemoyo wako uukanganwirwe.
Acts 8:23 Nokuti ndinoona kuti uri munduru inovava, uye musungo weuipi.
Acts 8:24 Zvino Simoni akapindura akati: Ndikumbirirei imwi kuna Ishe, kuti pasava nechimwe chezvinhu zvamataura chingawira pamusoro pangu.
Acts 8:25 Naizvozvo vakati vapupura nekutaura shoko raIshe, vakadzokera kuJerusarema, uye vakaparidza evhangeri mumisha mizhinji yeVaSamaria. <div eID="gen1167" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1166" type="section"/>
Acts 8:26 Zvino mutumwa waIshe wakataura kuna Firipi, achiti: Simuka, upfuurire kuchamhembe kunzira inoburuka kubva kuJerusarema ichienda kuGaza; iyo irenje.
Acts 8:27 Zvino wakasimuka akaenda; zvino tarira murume weEtiopia, mutenwa, gurukota guru raKandase mambokadzi weVaEtiopia, waiona nezvefuma yake yese, uye wakange auya kuJerusarema kuzonamata,
Acts 8:28 wakange achidzokera uye agere mungoro yake, achiverenga muporofita Isaya.
Acts 8:29 Mweya ndokuti kuna Firipi: Swedera unamatire pangoro iyi.
Acts 8:30 Firipi ndokumhanyirako, akamunzwa achiverenga muporofita Isaya, ndokuti: Zvino unonzwisisa zvaunoverenga here?
Acts 8:31 Iye ndokuti: Zvino ndingagona sei, kunze kwekuti umwe munhu andirairira? Zvino akakumbira Firipi kuti akwire agare naye.
Acts 8:32 Zvino ndima yerugwaro yaaiverenga yaiva iyi: Wakatungamirirwa segwai <transChange type="added">rinoenda</transChange> kunobaiwa; uye segwayana rinyerere pamberi pemuvevuri waro, saizvozvo haana kushamisa muromo wake.
Acts 8:33 Mukuninipiswa kwake mutongo wake wakabviswa, zvino ndiani acharondedzera zera rake? Nokuti upenyu hwake hunobviswa panyika.
Acts 8:34 Mutenwa ndokupindura Firipi akati: Ndinokukumbirisa, muporofita anoreva izvi maererano nani? Nezvake amene kana nezveumwewo?
Acts 8:35 Firipi ndokuzarura muromo wake; akatanga parugwaro irworwo, ndokumuparidzira Jesu.
Acts 8:36 Zvino pavaifamba munzira, vakasvika pane imwe mvura; mutenwa ndokuti: Heyi mvura; chii chinondidzivirira kubhabhatidzwa?
Acts 8:37 Firipi ndokuti: Kana uchitenda nemoyo wese, zvinotenderwa. Akapindura ndokuti: Ndinotenda kuti Jesu Kristu Mwanakomana waMwari.
Acts 8:38 Zvino akaraira ngoro kuti imire; ndokuburukira mumvura vari vaviri, Firipi nemutenwa; ndokumubhabhatidza.
Acts 8:39 Zvino vakati vakwira kubva mumvura, Mweya waIshe wakabvuta Firipi; mutenwa ndokusazomuonazve; nokuti wakafamba nenzira yake achifara.
Acts 8:40 Asi Firipi wakawanikwa paAzota; uye achipfuura wakaparidza evhangeri kumaguta ese, kusvikira asvika paKesariya.  <chapter eID="Acts.8"/><div eID="gen1169" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1168" type="section"/>
Acts 9:0 <div sID="gen1170" type="section"/> <chapter n="9" osisID="Acts.9" sID="Acts.9"/>  <div sID="gen1171" type="x-p"/>
Acts 9:1 Zvino Sauro, achiri kufema kutyisa nekuuraya akamirisana nevadzidzi vaIshe, wakaenda kumupristi mukuru,
Acts 9:2 akakumbira kwaari magwaro ekuenda Dhamasiko kumasinagoge, kuti kana awana chero venzira iyo vese varume nevakadzi, avauise vakasungwa kuJerusarema.
Acts 9:3 Zvino pakufamba, wakaswedera kuDhamasiko; zvino kamwe-kamwe kwakapenya kwakamupoteredza chiedza kubva kudenga;
Acts 9:4 zvino wakawira pasi, akanzwa inzwi richiti kwaari: Sauro, Sauro, unondishushirei?
Acts 9:5 Zvino akati: Ndimwi ani, Ishe? Ishe ndokuti: Ndini Jesu waunoshusha iwe; zvinokuremera kukavana nezvibayo.
Acts 9:6 Achidederawo nekushamisika wakati: Ishe, chii chamunoda kuti ndiite? Ishe ndoku<transChange type="added">ti </transChange>kwaari: Simuka upinde muguta, zvino uchaudzwa zvaunofanira kuita.
Acts 9:7 Zvino varume vaifamba naye vakamira vasina remuromo, vachinzwa inzwi, asi vasingaoni munhu.
