Acts 9:8 Zvino Sauro akasimuka kubva pasi; asi meso ake azarurwa, haana kuona munhu. Zvino vakamubata ruoko, vakamuuisa kuDhamasiko.
Acts 9:9 Akava nemazuva matatu asingaoni, uye asingadyi kana kunwa. <div eID="gen1171" type="x-p"/>
Acts 9:10 Zvino pakange pane umwe mudzidzi paDhamasiko wainzi Ananiasi; Ishe ndokuti kwaari muchiratidzo: Ananiasi! Zvino akati: Tarirai ndiri <transChange type="added">pano</transChange> Ishe.
Acts 9:11 Ishe ndoku<transChange type="added">ti</transChange> kwaari: Simuka uende munzira yemuguta inonzi Yakarurama, ugobvunza mumba maJudhasi <transChange type="added">munhu</transChange> anonzi Sauro, weTaso; nokuti tarira anonyengetera,
Acts 9:12 uye waona muchiratidzo murume anonzi Ananiasi achipinda nekuisa ruoko paari, kuti aonezve.
Acts 9:13 Asi Ananiasi wakapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Ishe, ndakanzwa nevazhinji zvemurume uyu, zvakakura sei zvakaipa zvaakaitira vatsvene venyu paJerusarema;
Acts 9:14 uye pano ane simba kubva kuvapristi vakuru, kusunga vese vanodana zita renyu.
Acts 9:15 Asi Ishe wakati kwaari: Enda, nokuti iye mudziyo wakasarudzwa kwandiri, kutakurira zita rangu pamberi pevahedheni nemadzimambo, nevana vaIsraeri;
Acts 9:16 nokuti ini ndichamuratidza kuti anofanira kutambura zvakadini nekuda kwezita rangu.
Acts 9:17 Zvino Ananiasi wakaenda ndokupinda mumba, ndokuisa maoko pamusoro pake akati: Sauro hama, Ishe wandituma, Jesu wakaonekwa kwauri munzira yawakauya nayo, kuti uonezve uye uzadzwe neMweya Mutsvene.
Acts 9:18 Zvino pakarepo kwakawa mumeso ake zvinenge mafunurwa, akaonazve pakarepo, uye asimuka wakabhabhatidzwa.
Acts 9:19 Zvino wakati agamuchira kudya akawana simba. Sauro wakavawo nevadzidzi vaiva paDhamasiko mamwe mazuva. <div eID="gen1172" type="x-p"/>
Acts 9:20 Zvino pakarepo wakaparidza Kristu mumasinagoge, kuti iye Mwanakomana waMwari.
Acts 9:21 Asi vese vaka<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa vakashamisika ndokuti: Ko uyu haasi iye waiparadza avo vaidana zita iri muJerusarema here, uye akauyira izvozvo pano, kuti avatinhire vakasungwa kuvapristi vakuru?
Acts 9:22 Asi Sauro wakaramba achisimbiswa, akavhiringidza VaJudha vaigara paDhamasiko, achibudisa pachena kuti uyu ndiye Kristu. <div eID="gen1173" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1170" type="section"/>
Acts 9:23 Zvino mazuva mazhinji akati azadziswa, VaJudha vakarangana pamwe chete kuti vamuuraye;
Acts 9:24 asi zano ravo rakazikanwa kuna Sauro. Vakarindawo masuwo masikati neusiku, kuti vamuuraye;
Acts 9:25 asi vadzidzi vakamutora usiku, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>burusa neparusvingo vachi<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>burusa <transChange type="added">ari</transChange> mudengu. <div eID="gen1175" type="x-p"/>
Acts 9:26 Zvino Sauro wakati asvika kuJerusarema, akaidza kuzvibatanidza kuvadzidzi; asi vese vaimutya, vasingatendi kuti mudzidzi.
Acts 9:27 Asi Bhanabhasi wakamutora aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>uisa kuvaapositori, ndokurondedzera kwavari kuti wakaona Ishe sei munzira, uye kuti wakange ataura kwaari, uye kuti wakataura akashinga sei paDhamasiko muzita raJesu.
Acts 9:28 Zvino wakava navo achipinda nekubuda paJerusarema,
Acts 9:29 ndokutaura akashinga muzita raIshe Jesu, akataura achipikisa VaHerenisiti*; asi vakaidza kumuuraya.
Acts 9:30 Asi hama dzakati dza<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ziva dzikamuburusira Kesariya, ndokumutumira kuTaso. <div eID="gen1176" type="x-p"/>
Acts 9:31 Naizvozvo kereke paJudhiya yese neGarirea neSamaria dzikava nerugare, dzikavakwa, dzikawedzerwa, dzichifamba mukutya Ishe nemunyaradzo yeMweya Mutsvene. <div eID="gen1177" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1174" type="section"/>
Acts 9:32 Zvino zvakaitika Petro achigura <transChange type="added">nzvimbo</transChange> dzese, akaburukirawo kuvatsvene vakange vagere paRidha.
Acts 9:33 Akawanapo umwe munhu wainzi Eneasi, wakange arere panhovo makore masere, akafa mitezo.
Acts 9:34 Petro ndokuti kwaari: Eneasi, Jesu Kristu anokuporesa; simuka, uzviwaridzire. Zvino akasimuka pakarepo.
Acts 9:35 Zvino vese vakange vagere Ridha neSaroni vakamuona, vakatendeukira kuna Ishe. <div eID="gen1179" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1178" type="section"/>
Acts 9:36 Zvino paivapo paJopa umwe mudzidzikadzi wainzi Tabhita, ndiko kuti Dhokasi kana zvichitsanangurwa; uyo wakange azere nemabasa akanaka nemabasa erudo aaiita.
Acts 9:37 Zvino zvakaitika mumazuva iwayo kuti iye akarwara ndokufa; vakati vamushambidza, vakamuradzika mukamuri yekumusoro.
Acts 9:38 Zvino Ridha zvarakange riri pedo neJopa, vadzidzi vakange vanzwa kuti Petro wakange aripo, vakatumira kwaari varume vaviri, vachikumbira zvikuru kuti asanonoka kuuya kwavari.
Acts 9:39 Zvino Petro wakasimuka akaenda navo; akati asvika vakamuisa kuimba yekumusoro, uye chirikadzi dzese dzikamirapo naye dzichichema dzichiratidza nguvo refu nezvipfeko Dhokasi zvaakange aita achiri navo.
Acts 9:40 Asi Petro wakavabudisira panze vese akafugama akanyengetera; ndokutendeukira kumutumbi, akati: Tabhita, muka! Akazarura meso ake; zvino wakati achiona Petro, akagara.
Acts 9:41 Zvino wakamupa ruoko, akamusimudza; ndokuti adana vatsvene nechirikadzi, akamuisa pamberi <transChange type="added">pavo</transChange> achirarama.
Acts 9:42 Zvino zvikazikanwa paJopa yese; vazhinji ndokutenda kuna Ishe.
Acts 9:43 Zvino zvikaitika kuti wakagara mazuva mazhinji paJopa neumwe Simoni musuki wematehwe.  <chapter eID="Acts.9"/><div eID="gen1181" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1180" type="section"/>
Acts 10:0 <div sID="gen1182" type="section"/> <chapter n="10" osisID="Acts.10" sID="Acts.10"/>  <div sID="gen1183" type="x-p"/>
Acts 10:1 Kwakange kune umwewo murume muKesariya wainzi Koneriyo, mukuru wezana wehondo yainzi yeItaria,
Acts 10:2 wakazvipira uye anotya Mwari pamwe neimba yake yese, waiita mabasa erudo mazhinji kuvanhu, nekunyengetera kuna Mwari nguva yese;
Acts 10:3 akaona muchiratidzo pachena, neawa rinenge repfumbamwe rezuva, mutumwa waMwari achipinda kwaari, achiti kwaari: Koneriyo!
Acts 10:4 Zvino wakati amutarisisa akatya, akati: Chii, Ishe? Zvino akati kwaari: Minyengetero yako nemabasa ako erudo zvakwira kuva chirangaridzo pamberi paMwari.
Acts 10:5 Zvino ikozvino tuma varume kuJopa, udane Simoni anonzi Petro;
Acts 10:6 anogara neumwe Simoni musuki wematehwe, imba yake iri parutivi rwegungwa; iye achakuudza zvaunofanira kuita.
Acts 10:7 Zvino mutumwa wakange ataura naKoneriyo wakati abva, wakadana vaviri vevaranda vake vemumba nemurwi wakatendeka pane vaimumirira nguva dzese,
Acts 10:8 zvino wakati arondedzera zvinhu zvese kwavari, akavatuma kuJopa. <div eID="gen1183" type="x-p"/>
Acts 10:9 Zvino chifume ivo vachiri kufamba voswedera muguta, Petro wakakwira pamusoro pedenga reimba kunonyengetera, neawa rinenge rechitanhatu.
Acts 10:10 Akava nenzara kwazvo, akashuva kudya; asi ivo vakati vachagadzirira, chiyeverwa chikamuwira;
Acts 10:11 ndokuona denga rakazaruka, neumwe mudziyo uchiburukira kwaari, semucheka mukuru, wakasungwa makona mana uchiburusirwa pasi.
Acts 10:12 Maiva nemhuka dzese dzemakumbo mana dzenyika nemhuka dzesango nezvinokambaira neshiri dzedenga.
Acts 10:13 Zvino inzwi rikauya kwaari <transChange type="added">richiti</transChange>: Simuka, Petro, baya udye.
Acts 10:14 Asi Petro wakati: Aiwa kwete, Ishe; nokuti handina kutongodya chero chinhu chisakachena kana chine tsvina.
Acts 10:15 Zvino inzwi <transChange type="added">rikauya</transChange>zve kwaari rwechipiri <transChange type="added">richiti</transChange>: Mwari chaanatsa, iwe usati chakasviba.
Acts 10:16 Zvino izvi zvakaitwa kusvikira katatu; mudziyo ndokukwidzwazve kudenga.
Acts 10:17 Zvino Petro wakati achakashamiswa maari kuti chiratidzo chaakange aona chairevei, zvino tarira, varume vakange vatumwa kubva kuna Koneriyo, vabvunza imba yaSimoni, vakamira pasuwo,
Acts 10:18 vakadanidzira vachibvunza kana Simoni, anonzi Petro achigarapo.
Acts 10:19 Zvino Petro achafunga nezvechiratidzo, Mweya wakati kwaari: Tarira, varume vatatu vanokutsvaka.
Acts 10:20 Naizvozvo simuka uburuke, uende navo usiri asina chokwadi nechinhu; nokuti ndini ndavatuma.
Acts 10:21 Petro ndokuburukira kuvarume vakange vatumwa kwaari kubva kuna Koneriyo, akati: Tarirai, ndini wamunotsvaka; chikonzeroi chamauyira?
Acts 10:22 Zvino vakati: Koneriyo mukuru wezana, murume wakarurama neanotya Mwari, anopupurirwa nerudzi rwese rweVaJudha, wakayambirwa naMwari nemutumwa mutsvene kuti akudanirei kumba kwake, uye kuti anzwe mashoko kwamuri.
Acts 10:23 Ipapo akavadanira mukati, aka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>garisa<transChange type="added">po</transChange>. Zvino chifume Petro wakabuda akaenda navo, nedzimwe dzehama dzaibva paJopa dzikamuperekedza. <div eID="gen1184" type="x-p"/>
Acts 10:24 Zvino chifume vapinda Kesariya. NaKoneriyo wakange akavamirira, uye akadanira pamwe chete hama dzake neshamwari dzepedo.
Acts 10:25 Zvino zvakaitika kuti Petro apinda, Koneriyo akamuchingamidza, akawira patsoka <transChange type="added">dzake</transChange>, aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>namata.
Acts 10:26 Asi Petro wakamusimudza, achiti: Simuka; ini pachangu ndiri munhuwo.
Acts 10:27 Zvino wakati achataura naye akapinda, akawana vazhinji vakaungana,
Acts 10:28 ndokuti kwavari: Imwi munoziva kuti hazvisi pamutemo kumurume ari muJudha kufambidzana kana kuuya ku<transChange type="added">munhu</transChange> werumwe rudzi; asi Mwari wandiratidza kuti ndirege kuti munhu haana kunaka kana kuchena;
Acts 10:29 naizvozvowo ndauya ndisingapikisi zvandangodanwa. Naizvozvo ndinobvunza, kuti mandidanira chinangwai?
Acts 10:30 Koneriyo ndokuti: Mazuva mana apfuura kusvikira paawa rino ndakange ndichitsanya, neawa repfumbamwe ndakange ndichinyengetera mumba mangu; zvino tarira, murume wakamira pamberi pangu ane nguvo dzinopenya,
Acts 10:31 ndokuti: Koneriyo, munyengetero wako wanzwikwa, nemabasa ako erudo arangarirwa pamberi paMwari.
Acts 10:32 Tumira naizvozvo kuJopa, uye udane Simoni anonzi Petro; iye anogara mumba maSimoni musuki wematehwe parutivi rwegungwa; iye kana auya achataura newe.
Acts 10:33 Naizvozvo pakarepo ndatuma kwamuri; zvino imwi maita zvakanaka kuti mauya. Naizvozvo ikozvino tese tiripo pamberi paMwari, kuti tinzwe zvinhu zvese zvamakarairwa naIshe. <div eID="gen1185" type="x-p"/>
Acts 10:34 Zvino Petro wakashamisa muromo, akati: Zvirokwazvo ndinonzwisisa kuti Mwari haasi musaruri wevanhu;
Acts 10:35 asi parudzi rupi nerupi uyo anomutya achiita kururama anogamuchirika kwaari.
Acts 10:36 Shoko raakatuma kuvana vaIsraeri achiparidza rugare naJesu Kristu (iye ndiIshe wevese).
Acts 10:37 Imwi munoziva shoko rakaitika paJudhiya rese, kutanga paGarirea, shure kwerubhabhatidzo Johwani rwaakaparidza;
Acts 10:38 <transChange type="added">ra</transChange>Jesu weNazareta, kuti Mwari wakamuzodza sei neMweya Mutsvene nesimba, waipfuura, achiita zvakanaka uye achiporesa vese vakamanikidzwa nadhiabhorosi, nokuti Mwari waiva naye.
Acts 10:39 Nesu tiri zvapupu zvezvinhu zvese zvaakaita, zvese munyika yeVaJudha nemuJerusarema; iye wavakauraya, nekuremberedza pamuti.
Acts 10:40 Iye Mwari waakamutsa nezuva retatu, akamupa kuti aonekwe,
Acts 10:41 kwete kuvanhu vese, asi kuzvapupu zvakagara zvasarudzwa naMwari, kwatiri taidya nekunwa naye, mushure mekunge amuka kubva kuvakafa.
Acts 10:42 Zvino wakatiraira kuti tiparidze kuvanhu, nekupupura kwazvo kuti ndiye wakagadzwa naMwari <transChange type="added">kuva</transChange> mutongi wevapenyu nevakafa.
Acts 10:43 Vaporofita vese vanopupura nezvake, kuti nezita rake ani nani anotenda maari achagamuchira kanganwiro yezvivi. <div eID="gen1186" type="x-p"/>
Acts 10:44 Petro wakati achataura mashoko awa, Mweya Mutsvene wakaburukira pamusoro pavo vese vakanzwa shoko.
Acts 10:45 Zvino vekudzingiswa vaitenda vakashamisika, vese vakange vauya naPetro, nokuti nepamusoro pevahedheni chipo cheMweya Mutsvene chakange chadururwa;
Acts 10:46 nokuti vakavanzwa vachitaura nendimi, vachikudza Mwari. Ipapo Petro akapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>:
Acts 10:47 Kune munhu anogona kurambidza mvura here, kuti ava vasabhabhatidzwa, vakagamuchira Mweya Mutsvene sesuwo?
Acts 10:48 Zvino akaraira kuti vabhabhatidzwe muzita raIshe. Ipapo vakamukumbira kuti agare mamwe mazuva. <chapter eID="Acts.10"/><div eID="gen1187" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1182" type="section"/>
Acts 11:0 <div sID="gen1188" type="section"/> <chapter n="11" osisID="Acts.11" sID="Acts.11"/>  <div sID="gen1189" type="x-p"/>
Acts 11:1 Zvino vaapositori nehama dzaiva paJudhiya vakanzwa kuti vahedheni vagamuchirawo shoko raMwari.
Acts 11:2 Zvino Petro wakati akwira kuJerusarema, vekudzingiswa vakapokana naye,
Acts 11:3 vachiti: Wakapinda muvarume vasina kudzingiswa, ukadya navo.
Acts 11:4 Asi Petro atanga wakavarondedzera zvichitevedzana achiti:
Acts 11:5 Ini ndakange ndiri muguta reJopa ndichinyengetera, zvino muchiyeverwa ndakaona chiratidzo, umwe mudziyo wakaburuka, semucheka mukuru unoburuswa kubva kudenga nemakona mana, ndokusvika kwandiri;
Acts 11:6 wandakati ndatarisisa ndacherekedza, zvino ndakaona mhuka dzine makumbo mana dzenyika nemhuka dzesango nezvinokambaira neshiri dzedenga.
Acts 11:7 Zvino ndakanzwa inzwi richiti kwandiri: Simuka, Petro, baya udye.
Acts 11:8 Asi ndakati: Aiwa kwete Ishe; nokuti hakuna chisakachena kana chine tsvina chakatongopinda mumuromo mangu.
Acts 11:9 Asi inzwi rakandipindura rwechipiri richibva kudenga <transChange type="added">richiti</transChange>: Mwari chaachenesa, iwe usati chakasviba.
Acts 11:10 Uye izvi zvakaitika kusvikira katatu, zvese ndokukweverwazve kumusoro kudenga.
Acts 11:11 Zvino tarira, pakarepo varume vatatu vamire pamberi pemba yandakange ndiri, vatumwa kwandiri kubva kuKesariya.
Acts 11:12 Mweya ndokuti kwandiri ndiende navo, ndisiri asina chokwadi nechinhu; nehama idzi nhanhatuwo dzakaenda neni, zvino takapinda mumba memurume <transChange type="added">uyu;</transChange>
Acts 11:13 iye akatipira kuti wakaona sei mutumwa amire mumba make, achiti kwaari: Tumira varume kuJopa, ugodana Simoni, anonzi Petro,
Acts 11:14 achakuudza mashoko, auchaponeswa nawo iwe nemhuri yako yese.
Acts 11:15 Zvino ndakati ndichatanga kutaura, Mweya Mutsvene wakaburukira pamusoro pavowo, sezva<transChange type="added">zvakaita</transChange> pamusoro pedu pakutanga.
Acts 11:16 Zvino ndakarangarira shoko raIshe, kuti wakataura sei <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Johwani zvirokwazvo wakabhabhatidza nemvura, asi imwi muchabhabhatidzwa neMweya Mutsvene.
Acts 11:17 Naizvozvo kana Mwari avapa chipo chakafanana ne<transChange type="added">chaakapa</transChange> kwatiriwo, takatenda kuna Ishe Jesu Kristu, ini ndaiva ani waigona kudzivisa Mwari?
Acts 11:18 Zvino vakati vanzwa zvinhu izvozvi vakanyarara, vakarumbidza Mwari, vachiti: Naizvozvo Mwari wakapawo kuvahedheni kutendeukira kuupenyu. <div eID="gen1189" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1188" type="section"/>
Acts 11:19 Zvino avo vakapararira nekushushwa kwakaitika pamusoro paSitefano vakagura kusvikira paFenikia neSaipuresi neAndiyokiya, vasingatauri shoko kuna ani asi kuVaJudha chete.
Acts 11:20 Asi kwaiva nevamwe vavo, varume VaSaipuresi neVaSairini vakati vasvika kuAndiyokiya, vakataura kuVaHerenisiti*, vachiparidza mashoko akanaka <transChange type="added">a</transChange>Ishe Jesu.
Acts 11:21 Neruoko rwaIshe rwaiva navo; uye uwandu ukuru hwakatenda hukatendeukira kuna Ishe.
Acts 11:22 Zvino shoko pamusoro pavo rikanzwikwa munzeve dzekereke yaiva paJerusarema; zvino vakatuma Bhanabhasi kuti agure kunosvika Andiyokiya;
Acts 11:23 iye asvika ndokuona nyasha dzaMwari akafara, akavakurudzira vese kuti varambire panaIshe nekuzvipira kwemoyo;
Acts 11:24 nokuti waiva murume wakanaka, uye azere neMweya Mutsvene uye nekutenda; chaunga chikuru ndokuwedzerwa kuna Ishe.
Acts 11:25 Bhanabhasi ndokubuda akaenda kuTaso kunotsvaka Sauro.
Acts 11:26 Zvino wakati amuwana akamuuisa kuAndiyokiya. Zvino zvikaitika kuti gore rese vakaungana mukereke vakadzidzisa chaunga chikuru; uye vadzidzi vakatanga kunzi vaKristu paAndiyokiya.
Acts 11:27 Zvino nemazuva iwayo, vaporofita vakaburukira kuAndiyokiya vachibva kuJerusarema.
Acts 11:28 Zvino kwakasimuka umwe wavo wainzi Agabhusi, ndokuratidza neMweya kuti nzara huru ichavapo panyika yese; yakaitikawo panguva yaKiraudhio Kesari.
Acts 11:29 Uye vadzidzi vakazvipira kuti chero ani paaigona napo, umwe neumwe wavo atume zvinobatsira kuhama dzigere muJudhiya;
Acts 11:30 zvavakaitawo, vakatumira kuvakuru neruoko rwaBhanabhasi naSauro. <chapter eID="Acts.11"/><div eID="gen1191" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1190" type="section"/>
Acts 12:0 <div sID="gen1192" type="section"/> <chapter n="12" osisID="Acts.12" sID="Acts.12"/>  <div sID="gen1193" type="x-p"/>
Acts 12:1 Nenguva iyoyo Herodhe mambo wakaisa maoko kuti atambudze vamwe kubva mukereke.
Acts 12:2 Ndokuuraya Jakobho mukoma waJohwani nemunondo.
Acts 12:3 Zvino wakati achiona kuti zvinofadza VaJudha, wakapfuurira mberi akabata Petrowo; zvino aiva mazuva ezvingwa zvisina mbiriso;
Acts 12:4 akati amubatawo akaisa mutirongo, aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>kumikidza kumapoka mana evanhu vana emauto kuti vamurinde, achida kumuisa kuvanhu mushure mepasika.
Acts 12:5 Naizvozvo Petro wakachengetwa mutirongo; asi munyengetero wakaenderera mberi uchiitwa nekereke kuna Mwari uchiitirwa iye.
Acts 12:6 Zvino Herodhe wakati oda kumubudisa, usiku ihwohwo Petro wakange arere pakati pemauto maviri, akasungwa nemaketani maviri; nevarindi pamberi pemusuwo vakarinda tirongo.
Acts 12:7 Zvino tarira, mutumwa waIshe wakamirapo, chiedza ndokupenya muchitokisi; zvino akarova rutivi rwaPetro, akamumutsa achiti: Simuka nekukurumidza. Zvino maketani ake akawa pamaoko <transChange type="added">ake</transChange>.
Acts 12:8 Mutumwa ndokuti kwaari: Zvisunge chiuno, uye sunga manyatera ako. Ndokuita saizvozvo. Zvino akati kwaari: Monera nguvo yako, unditevere.
Acts 12:9 Zvino wakabuda akamutevera; uye asingazivi kuti ichokwadi chinoitwa nemutumwa, asi waifunga kuti anoona chiratidzo.
Acts 12:10 Zvino vakati vapfuura chirindo chekutanga nechepiri, vakasvika pasuwo reutare raipinda muguta; iro rakavazarukira rega; zvino vakabuda, vakapfuura nzira imwe yemumusha, pakarepo mutumwa ndokubva kwaari.
Acts 12:11 Zvino Petro, wakati apengenuka, akati: Zvino ndinoziva zvirokwazvo kuti Ishe watuma mutumwa wake, uye wandisunungura paruoko rwaHerodhe netarisiro yese yevanhu veVaJudha.
Acts 12:12 Zvino wakati arangarira akaenda kumba kwaMaria mai vaJohwani wainzi Mariko, vazhinji pavakange vakaungana vachinyengetera.
Acts 12:13 Zvino Petro wakati agogodza pagonhi resuwo, murandakadzi wakauya kuzoteerera, wainzi Rodha.
Acts 12:14 Zvino wakati achiziva inzwi raPetro, haana kuzarura suwo nekuda kwemufaro, asi wakamhanyira mukati akavaudza kuti Petro amire pamberi pesuwo.
Acts 12:15 Asi vakati kwaari: Unopenga. Asi wakaramba achisimbisa kuti zvaiva zvakadaro. Ivo ndokuti: Mutumwa wake.
Acts 12:16 Asi Petro wakaramba achigogodza; zvino vakati vazarura vakamuona, vakashamisika.
Acts 12:17 Zvino wakavaninira neruoko kuti vanyarare, akavarondedzera kuti Ishe wakamubudisa sei mutirongo, akati: Pirai kuna Jakobho nekuhama zvinhu izvi. Zvino akabuda akaenda kune imwe nzvimbo. <div eID="gen1193" type="x-p"/>
Acts 12:18 Zvino kwakati kwaedza, bongozozo risati riri diki rikavapo pakati pemauto, kuti chii chakawira Petro.
Acts 12:19 Zvino Herodhe wakati amutsvaka akasa<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>wana, wakabvunzisisa varindi, akaraira kuti vabviswe. Zvino akabva Judhiya akaburukira Kesariya akagara<transChange type="added">ko</transChange>. <div eID="gen1194" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1192" type="section"/>
Acts 12:20 Zvino Herodhe wakatsamwira zvikuru veTire neVaSidhoni; asi vakauya kwaari nemoyo umwe, vakashamwaridzana naBhurasto mutariri weimba yekurara yamambo, vakakumbira rugare, nokuti nyika yavo yaipiwa kudya ne<transChange type="added">nyika</transChange> yamambo.
Acts 12:21 Zvino nezuva rakatarwa Herodhe wakapfeka nguvo dzeumambo, akagara pachigaro chekutonga, akaita nhaurwa kwavari.
Acts 12:22 Vanhu ndokudanidzira <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Inzwi raMwari, uye kwete remunhu.
Acts 12:23 Zvino pakarepo mutumwa waIshe wakamurova, nokuti haana kupa Mwari rukudzo; ndokudyiwa nehonye, akapera. <div eID="gen1196" type="x-p"/>
Acts 12:24 Asi shoko raMwari rakakura rikawanda.
Acts 12:25 Zvino Bhanabhasi naSauro vakadzoka vachibva kuJerusarema, vapedzisa basa, vakaenda naJohwaniwo wainzi Mariko. <chapter eID="Acts.12"/><div eID="gen1197" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1195" type="section"/>
Acts 13:0 <div sID="gen1198" type="section"/> <chapter n="13" osisID="Acts.13" sID="Acts.13"/>  <div sID="gen1199" type="x-p"/>
Acts 13:1 Zvino paivapo muAndiyokiya, mukereke ipapo vamwe vaporofita nevadzidzisi, Bhanabhasi naSimioniwo wainzi Nigeri, naRukio muKurini, naManaeni wakange arerwa pamwe naHerodhe umwe wevatungamiriri vana, naSauro.
Acts 13:2 Vakati vachishumira kuna Ishe nekutsanya, Mweya Mutsvene akati: Nditsaurirei Bhanabhasi pamwe naSauro pabasa randakavadanira.
Acts 13:3 Ipapo vatsanya nekunyengetera nekuisa maoko pamusoro pavo, vakavaendesa. <div eID="gen1199" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1198" type="section"/>
Acts 13:4 Naizvozvo zvirokwazvo ivo vakati vatumwa naMweya Mutsvene, vakaburukira Serukia, vakabvapowo vakaenda kuSaipuresi nechikepe.
Acts 13:5 Zvino vasvika paSarami, vakaparidza shoko raMwari mumasinagoge eVaJudha; uye vakange vanaJohwaniwo mubatsiri.
Acts 13:6 Zvino vakati vagura nemuchiwi kusvikira paPafosi, vakawana imwe n'anga, muporofita wenhema, muJudha, wainzi Bhari-Jesu.
Acts 13:7 Wainge ane mutungamiriri Sejiyo Pauro, murume wakachenjera. Iye wakadanira kwaari Bhanabhasi naSauro akatsvaka kunzwa shoko raMwari.
Acts 13:8 Asi Erimasi n'anga, nokuti ndiro zita rake kana zvichishandurwa, akavapikisa, achitsvaka kutsausa mutungamiriri parutendo.
Acts 13:9 Asi Sauro, ndiye Paurowo, azadzwa neMweya Mutsvene, uye amutarisisa,
Acts 13:10 wakati: Iwe uzere nekubiridzira kwese nekunyengera kwese, mwanakomana wadhiabhorosi, muvengi wekururama kwese, haugumi here kutsausa nzira dzakarurama dzaIshe?
Acts 13:11 Uye ikozvino tarira, ruoko rwaIshe <transChange type="added">rwuri</transChange> pamusoro pako, uye uchava bofu, usingaoni zuva kwenguva. Pakarepo mhute nerima zvakamuwira, akatenderera achitsvaka vanga<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>tungamirira neruoko.
Acts 13:12 Panguva iyo mutungamiriri wakati aona zvakaitika akatenda, achishamiswa nedzidziso yaIshe. <div eID="gen1201" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1200" type="section"/>
Acts 13:13 Zvino Pauro nevaiva naye vakabva Pafosi nechikepe vakasvika paPega muPamufiriya. Asi Johwani wakabva kwavari akadzokera kuJerusarema.
Acts 13:14 Asi ivo vakati vagura vachibva paPega, vakasvika kuAndiyokiya muPisidhiya; vakapinda musinagoge nezuva resabata, vakagara pasi.
Acts 13:15 Zvino shure kwekuverengwa kwemurairo nevaporofita, vakuru vesinagoge vakatumira kwavari, vachiti: Varume hama, kana kune shoko mukati menyu rekurudziro kuvanhu, taurai.
Acts 13:16 Zvino Pauro wakasimuka, ndokuninira neruoko, akati: Varume VaIsraeri, nemwi munotya Mwari, teererai.
Acts 13:17 Mwari werudzi urwu rwaIsraeri wakasarudza madzibaba edu, akakudza vanhu vachiri vatorwa munyika yeEgipita, uye neruoko rwakakwirira akavabudisa mairi.
Acts 13:18 Uye akava nemoyo murefu nemaitiro avo nguva inenge makore makumi mana murenje.
Acts 13:19 Zvino wakati aparadza marudzi manomwe munyika yeKenani, akavagovera nyika yavo nemujenya.
Acts 13:20 Zvino shure kweizvozvo, makore anenge mazana mana nemakumi mashanu, waka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>pa vatongi kusvikira kuna Samueri muporofita.
Acts 13:21 Uye kubvira ipapo vakakumbira mambo; Mwari ndokuvapa Sauro mwanakomana waKishi, murume werudzi rwaBhenjamini, makore makumi mana.
Acts 13:22 Zvino wakati amubvisa, wakavamutsira Dhavhidhi kuva mambo, waakapupurirawo akati: Ndawana Dhavhidhi waJese, murume anoenderana nemoyo wangu, achaita chido changu chese.
Acts 13:23 Pambeu yeuyu sechivimbiso, Mwari wakamutsira Israeri Muponesi Jesu;
Acts 13:24 iye asati asvika Johwani wakaparidza pakutanga rubhabhatidzo rwekutendeuka kuvanhu vese VaIsraeri.
Acts 13:25 Zvino Johwani wakati azadzisa rwendo, akati: Munofunga kuti ndini ani? Ini handisi <transChange type="added">iye</transChange>, asi tarirai, shure kwangu anouya, wandisakafanira kusunungura shangu dzetsoka <transChange type="added">dzake</transChange>.
Acts 13:26 Varume hama, vana verudzi rwaAbhurahama, neavo pakati penyu vanotya Mwari, shoko reruponeso urwu ratumirwa kwamuri.
Acts 13:27 Nokuti avo vanogara muJerusarema nevatungamiriri vavo havana kumuziva uyu, uye manzwi evaporofita anoverengwa sabata rimwe nerimwe, vaka<transChange type="added">a</transChange>zadzisa paku<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>rasa;
Acts 13:28 uye kunyange vasina kuwana mhosva yerufu, vakakumbira kuna Pirato kuti aurawe.
Acts 13:29 Zvino vakati vapedza zvese zvakanyorwa pamusoro pake, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>turura pamuti, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>radzika muguva.
Acts 13:30 Asi Mwari wakamumutsa kubva kuvakafa;
Acts 13:31 iye wakaonekwa kwemazuva mazhinji neavo vakange vakwira naye kuJerusarema vachibva Garirea, vari zvapupu zvake kuvanhu.
Acts 13:32 Nesu tinoparidza kwamuri mashoko akanaka echivimbiso chakaitwa kumadzibaba,
Acts 13:33 kuti Mwari wakazadzisa ichi kwatiri, isu vana vavo, pakuti wakamutsa Jesu; sezvazvakanyorwawo mupisarema rechipiri <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Iwe uri Mwanakomana wangu, nhasi ini ndakubereka.
Acts 13:34 Zvino zvekuti wakamumutsa kubva kuvakafa, asadzokerazve kukuora, wakareva sezvizvi: Ndichakupai maropafadzo matsvene anovimbika aDhavhidhi.
Acts 13:35 Naizvozvowo anoti pane imwe <transChange type="added">nzvimbo</transChange>: Hamungapi Mutsvene wenyu kuti aone kuora.
Acts 13:36 Nokuti Dhavhidhi, ashumira zano raMwari pazera rake pachake wakarara, uye wakaradzikwa kumadzibaba ake, ndokuona kuora;
Acts 13:37 asi Mwari waakamutsa, haana kuona kuora.
Acts 13:38 Naizvozvo ngazvizikanwe kwamuri, varume hama, kuti neuyu kanganwiro yezvivi inoparidzirwa imwi;
Acts 13:39 uye neuyu ani nani anotenda anonzi wakarurama pazvinhu zvese zvamakange musingagoni kunzi makarurama pazviri nemurairo waMozisi.
Acts 13:40 Naizvozvo onai kuti zvirege kuwira pamusoro penyu zvakarehwa muvaporofita, <transChange type="added">zvinoti</transChange>:
Acts 13:41 Tarirai, imwi vazvidzi, uye mushamisike, nekuparadzwa; nokuti ini ndinobata basa pamazuva enyu, basa ramusingatombotendi, kunyange umwe achikurondedzerai. <div eID="gen1203" type="x-p"/>
Acts 13:42 Zvino pakubuda kweVaJudha musinagoge, vahedheni vakakumbira kuti mashoko awa ataurwe kwavari pasabata raitevera.
Acts 13:43 Zvino <transChange type="added">ve</transChange>sinagoge vakati vapera, vazhinji veVaJudha nevakatendeukira kuVaJudha vainamata vakatevera Pauro naBhanabhasi; ivo vakataura kwavari, vachivagombedzera kuti varambire munyasha dzaMwari.
Acts 13:44 Zvino nesabata rakatevera guta rinenge rese rakaungana kuzonzwa shoko raMwari.
Acts 13:45 Zvino VaJudha vakati vachiona zvaunga vakazadzwa negodo, vakapikisa zvinhu zvakarehwa naPauro, vachipikisa uye vachinyomba.
Acts 13:46 Asi Pauro naBhanabhasi vachitaura vakashinga vakati: Zvakange zvakafanira kuti shoko raMwari ritaurirwe kwamuri pakutanga; asi zvamarininira <transChange type="added">kure</transChange>, uye mazvitongera kusafanira upenyu husingaperi, tarirai, tinotendeukira kuvahedheni.
Acts 13:47 Nokuti Ishe wakatiraira saizvozvo <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Ndakakugadza kuva chiedza chevahedheni, kuti uve weruponeso kusvikira kumugumo wenyika. <div eID="gen1204" type="x-p"/>
Acts 13:48 Zvino vahedheni vakati vachinzwa <transChange type="added">izvi</transChange> vakafara, uye vakakudza shoko raIshe, neuwandu hwe<transChange type="added">vese</transChange> vakange vatarirwa upenyu husingaperi vakatenda;
Acts 13:49 uye shoko raIshe rikaparadzirwa kudunhu rese.
Acts 13:50 Asi VaJudha vakamutsa vakadzi vaishumira vaikudzwa, nevakuru veguta, vakamutsira Pauro naBhanabhasi rushusho, vakavadzinga kubva kumiganhu yavo.
Acts 13:51 Asi ivo vakavazuzira guruva retsoka dzavo, vakasvika Ikonio.
Acts 13:52 Zvino vadzidzi vakazadzwa nemufaro neMweya Mutsvene.  <chapter eID="Acts.13"/><div eID="gen1205" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1202" type="section"/>
Acts 14:0 <div sID="gen1206" type="section"/> <chapter n="14" osisID="Acts.14" sID="Acts.14"/>  <div sID="gen1207" type="x-p"/>
Acts 14:1 Zvino zvakaitika paIkonio, vakapinda pamwe musinagoge reVaJudha, vakataura kudai zvekuti chaunga chikuru cheVaJudha necheVaGirikiwo chakatenda.
Acts 14:2 Asi VaJudha vasingatendi vakamutsa nekuipisa moyo yevahedheni kuvapesanisa nehama.
Acts 14:3 Naizvozvo vakagara nguva refu vachitaura vakashinga muna Ishe anopupurira shoko renyasha dzake, uye ano<transChange type="added">va</transChange>pa kuti kuitwe zviratidzo nezvishamiso nemaoko avo.
Acts 14:4 Asi chaunga cheguta chakakamurwa; vamwe ndokuva neVaJudha, vamwewo nevaapositori.
Acts 14:5 Zvino kwakati kwava nekushushwa kwevahedheni nekweVaJudhawo nevatungamiriri vavo, ku<transChange type="added">va</transChange>bata zvakaipa nekuvataka nemabwe,
Acts 14:6 vakati <transChange type="added">vazvi</transChange>ziva, vakatizira kumaguta eRikaonia, Ristra neDhebhe, nekudunhu rakapoteredza;
Acts 14:7 neipapo vakaparidza evhangeri. <div eID="gen1207" type="x-p"/>
Acts 14:8 Zvino paRistra paigara umwe murume wakange asina simba patsoka, ari chirema kubva padumbu ramai vake, asina kutongofamba.
Acts 14:9 Uyu wakanzwa Pauro achitaura; iye akamutarisisa, akaona kuti ane rutendo kuti aporeswe,
Acts 14:10 akati nenzwi guru: Simuka, uti tasa netsoka dzako. Zvino akakwakuka akafamba.
Acts 14:11 Zvino zvaunga, zvakati zvaona Pauro zvaakange aita, zvakasimudza manzwi azvo zvichiti nechiRikaonia: Vamwari vaburukira kwatiri vakafanana nevanhu.
Acts 14:12 Bhanabhasi vakamutumidzawo Zeusi, naPauro Herimesi, nokuti ndiye waiva mutungamiriri wekutaura.
Acts 14:13 Zvino mupristi waZeusi waiva pamberi peguta ravo, wakauisa nzombe nezvishongo pamisuwo, achida kubaira pamwe nezvaunga.
Acts 14:14 Asi vaapositori Bhanabhasi naPauro vakati vanzwa, vakabvarura nguvo dzavo, vakamhanyira pakati pechaunga, vachidanidzira,
Acts 14:15 ndokuti: Varume, munoitirei zvinhu izvi? Isuwo tiri vanhu vane manzwiro mamwe nemwi, tinokuparidzirai mashoko akanaka kuti pane izvozvi zvisina maturo mutendeukire kuna Mwari mupenyu, wakaita denga nenyika negungwa nezvinhu zvese zviri mazviri.
Acts 14:16 Iye pamazera akapfuura wakatendera vahedheni vese kufamba nenzira dzavo.
Acts 14:17 Zvakadaro haana kuzvisiya asina uchapupu, pakuti wakaita zvakanaka akatipa mvura kubva kudenga nenguva dzezvibereko, achizadza moyo yedu nekudya nemufaro.
Acts 14:18 Zvino vachitaura zvinhu izvi, zvairema kugumisa zvaunga kuti vasabaira kwavari. <div eID="gen1208" type="x-p"/>
Acts 14:19 Asi kwakasvika VaJudha vakabva Andiyokiya neIkonio, vanyengetedza zvaunga, zvino vataka Pauro nemabwe, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>kwevera kunze kweguta, vachifunga kuti wafa.
Acts 14:20 Asi vadzidzi vakati vamukomba, akasimuka akapinda muguta; zvino chifume akabuda naBhanabhasi akaenda kuDhebhe.
Acts 14:21 Vakati vaparidzawo evhangeri kuguta iro, uye vaita vazhinji vadzidzi, vakadzokera kuRistra neIkonio neAndiyokiya,
Acts 14:22 vachisimbisa mweya yevadzidzi, vachi<transChange type="added">va</transChange>kurudzira kurambira parutendo, uye kuti tinofanira kupinda muushe hwaMwari nemumatambudziko mazhinji.
Acts 14:23 Zvino vakati vavagadzira vakuru pakereke imwe neimwe, vanyengetera nekutsanya, vakavakumikidza kuna Ishe, wavaitenda kwaari.
Acts 14:24 Zvino vakati vagura nePisidhiya vakasvika Pamufiriya.
Acts 14:25 Uye vakati vaparidza shoko paPega, vakaburukira Ataria;
Acts 14:26 vakabvapo nechikepe vakaenda kuAndiyokiya, apo pavakange vakumikidzwa munyasha dzaMwari pabasa ravakange vapedzisa.
Acts 14:27 Vakatiwo vasvika vakaunganidza kereke, vakarondedzera zvese Mwari zvaakange aita navo, uye kuti wakange azarurira vahedheni mukova werutendo.
Acts 14:28 Ipapo vakagara nguva isati iri pfupi nevadzidzi. <chapter eID="Acts.14"/><div eID="gen1209" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1206" type="section"/>
Acts 15:0 <div sID="gen1210" type="section"/> <chapter n="15" osisID="Acts.15" sID="Acts.15"/>  <div sID="gen1211" type="x-p"/>
Acts 15:1 Zvino vamwe vakaburuka kubva kuJudhiya, vakadzidzisa hama kuti: Kana musingadzingiswi netsika yaMozisi, hamugoni kuponeswa.
Acts 15:2 Naizvozvo, kwakati kwava nekupesana nekupikisana kusati kuri kudiki kwaPauro naBhanabhasi navo, vakaronga kuti Pauro naBhanabhasi nevamwezve vavo vakwire kuJerusarema kuvaapositori nevakuru, pamusoro peshoko iri.
Acts 15:3 Naizvozvo vakati vachiperekedzwa nekereke, vakagura neFenike neSamaria, vachirondedzera <transChange type="added">zve</transChange>kutendeuka kwevahedheni; vakaitira hama dzese mufaro mukuru.
Acts 15:4 Zvino vakati vasvika kuJerusarema, vakagamuchirwa nekereke nevaapositori nevakuru, vakarondedzera zvese Mwari zvaakaita navo.
Acts 15:5 Asi kwakamuka vamwe vebato reVaFarisi vaitenda, vachiti: Zvinofanira kuvadzingisa, neku<transChange type="added">va</transChange>raira kuchengeta murairo waMozisi. <div eID="gen1211" type="x-p"/>
Acts 15:6 Vaapositori nevakuru vakaungana pamwe kuti vaongorore zveshoko iri.
Acts 15:7 Zvino kwakava nekukakavadzana kukuru, Petro wakasimuka akati kwavari: Varume hama, imwi munoziva kuti kubva <transChange type="added">pa</transChange>mazuva akare Mwari wakasarudza pakati pedu, kuti nemuromo wangu vahedheni vanzwe shoko reevhangeri, uye vatende.
Acts 15:8 Uye Mwari muzivi wemoyo wakapupura kwavari, achivapa Mweya Mutsvene, sekwatiriwo;
Acts 15:9 uye haana kuisa mutsauko pakati pedu navo, achichenura moyo yavo nerutendo.
Acts 15:10 Naizvozvo ikozvino munoidzirei Mwari, kuisa joko pamutsipa wevadzidzi, ratisina kugona kutakura kana madzibaba edu kana isu?
Acts 15:11 Asi nenyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu tinotenda kuti tinoponeswa, nenzira imwe savowo.
Acts 15:12 Chaunga chese ndokunyarara; ndokuteerera Bhanabhasi naPauro vachirondedzera kuti zvikuru sei zviratidzo nezvishamiso Mwari zvaakaita navo pakati pevahedheni.
Acts 15:13 Zvino ivo vakati vanyarara, Jakobho akapindura achiti: Varume hama, nditeererei:
Acts 15:14 Simioni warondedzera kuti Mwari wakashanyira vahedheni sei pakutanga kuti atorere zita rake vanhu kwa<transChange type="added">vari</transChange>.
Acts 15:15 Nemashoko evaporofita anobvumirana neizvi, sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>:
Acts 15:16 Shure kweizvi ndichadzoka, uye ndichavakazve tabhenakeri yaDhavhidhi yakawa; uye ndichavakazve matongo aro, uye ndicharimisazve;
Acts 15:17 kuti vakasara vevanhu vatsvake Ishe, nevechirudzi vese, pavanodanwa nezita rangu, <transChange type="added">ndizvo</transChange> zvinoreva Ishe anoita zvinhu izvi zvese.
Acts 15:18 Anozikanwa kuna Mwari mabasa ake ese kubva pakusingaperi.
Acts 15:19 Naizvozvi ini ndinogura kuti tirege kutambudza vakabva kuvahedheni vakatendeukira kuna Mwari;
Acts 15:20 asi tivanyorere kuti vabve pazvakashatiswa zvezvifananidzo neupombwe nezvakadzipwa neropa.
Acts 15:21 Nokuti Mozisi anavo kubva pamazera akare vanomuparidza paguta rimwe nerimwe, achiverengwa mumasinagoge sabata rimwe nerimwe. <div eID="gen1212" type="x-p"/>
Acts 15:22 Ipapo zvikaonekwa zvakanaka kuvaapositori nevakuru vane kereke yese, kuti vatume varume vakasarudzwa pakati pavo kuAndiyokiya pamwe naPauro naBhanabhasi: Judhasi wainzi Bharisabhasi, naSirasi, varume vatungamiriri pakati pehama,
Acts 15:23 vakanyora <transChange type="added">se</transChange>izvi neruoko rwavo: Vaapositori nevakuru nehama, kuhama dzekuvahedheni paAndiyokiya neSiriya neKirikia, kwaziwai;
Acts 15:24 sezvatakanzwa kuti vamwe vakabuda kwatiri vakakutambudzai nemashoko, vachikanganisa mweya yenyu, vachiti mudzingiswe nekuchengeta murairo, <transChange type="added">ivo</transChange> vatisina kuraira;
Acts 15:25 zvaonekwa zvakanaka kwatiri tava nemoyo umwe, kutuma kwamuri varume vakasarudzwa, pamwe nevadikanwi vedu Bhanabhasi naPauro,
Acts 15:26 vanhu vakazvipira upenyu hwavo nekuda kwezita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu.
Acts 15:27 Naizvozvo tatuma Judhasi naSirasi, ivo vachataurawo zvimwe chete neshoko <transChange type="added">remuromo</transChange>.
Acts 15:28 Nokuti zvakaonekwa zvakanaka kuMweya Mutsvene, nekwatiri, kuti tirege kuchikutakudzai mutoro mukuru, kunze kwezvinhu izvi zvakafanira:
Acts 15:29 Kuti mubve pazvakabairwa zvifananidzo neropa nechakadzipwa neupombwe; kana mukazvisunungura pazviri, muchaita zvakanaka. Sarai zvakanaka. <div eID="gen1213" type="x-p"/>
Acts 15:30 Zvino vakati vaendeswa vakasvika kuAndiyokiya; vakati vaunganidza chaunga, vakakumikidza tsamba.
Acts 15:31 Zvino vakati vaverenga, vakafara pamusoro pekukurudzirwa.
Acts 15:32 Judhasiwo naSirasi, vaiva vaporofitawo pachavo, vakakurudzira hama nenhaurwa zhinji, neku<transChange type="added">va</transChange>simbisa.
Acts 15:33 Vakati vagara kwenguva, vakaendeswa nehama murugare kuvaapositori,
Acts 15:34 asi zvakaonekwa zvakanaka kuna Sirasi kuti asarepo.
Acts 15:35 Paurowo naBhanabhasi vakasara muAndiyokiya vachidzidzisa nekuparidza shoko raIshe, nevamwewo vazhinji. <div eID="gen1214" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1210" type="section"/>
Acts 15:36 Zvino shure kwemamwe mazuva Pauro wakati kuna Bhanabhasi: Ngatidzokere ikozvino tishanyire hama dzedu muguta rimwe nerimwe, matakaparidza shoko raIshe, <transChange type="added">tione</transChange> kuti vakadini.
Acts 15:37 Zvino Bhanabhasi wakange aronga kutora Johwani wainzi Mariko, kuti afambe na<transChange type="added">vo</transChange>.
Acts 15:38 Asi Pauro wakafunga kuti zvakanaka kusamutora afambe navo uyu wakavasiya kubva paPamufiriya, akasaenda navo kubasa.
Acts 15:39 Zvino kwakauya kukakavadzana kukuru, zvekuti vakaparadzana, umwe kubva kune umwe; Bhanabhasi ndokutora Mariko kufamba naye, akaenda kuSaipuresi nechikepe;
Acts 15:40 asi Pauro wakasarudza Sirasi akabuda akaenda, akumikidzwa nehama panyasha dzaMwari.
Acts 15:41 Ndokugura neSiriya neKirikia, achisimbisa makereke.  <chapter eID="Acts.15"/><div eID="gen1216" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1215" type="section"/>
Acts 16:0 <div sID="gen1217" type="section"/> <chapter n="16" osisID="Acts.16" sID="Acts.16"/>  <div sID="gen1218" type="x-p"/>
Acts 16:1 Zvino wakasvika kuDhebhe neRistra; zvino tarira, ipapo paiva neumwe mudzidzi, wainzi Timotio, mwanakomana weumwe mukadzi muJudhakadzi waitenda, asi wababa muGiriki;
Acts 16:2 waipupurirwa zvakanaka nehama dzepaRistra neIkonio.
Acts 16:3 Uyu Pauro wakada kuti abude naye, ndokumutora aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>dzingisa nekuda kweVaJudha vaiva kunzvimbo idzo; nokuti vese vakange vachiziva baba vake, kuti muGiriki.
Acts 16:4 Zvino vakati vachigura nemumaguta, vakavakumikidza zviga zvakatemwa nevaapositori nevakuru vaiva paJerusarema kuti vachengete.
Acts 16:5 Naizvozvo makereke akasimbiswa parutendo, ndokuwedzera pauwandu zuva nezuva. <div eID="gen1218" type="x-p"/>
Acts 16:6 Zvino vakati vagura Frigia nedunhu reGaratia, vadziviswa neMweya Mutsvene kutaura shoko paAsia,
Acts 16:7 vakati vasvika pakatarisana neMisia vakaidza kuenda kuBhitiniasi; asi Mweya haana kuvatendera;
Acts 16:8 zvino vakati vapfuura paMisia vakaburukira kuTroasi.
Acts 16:9 Chiratidzo ndokuonekwa kuna Pauro usiku; umwe murume muMakedhonia wakange amirepo, achimukumbira zvikuru achiti: Yambukira kuMakedhonia, utibatsire.
Acts 16:10 Zvino wakati achiona chiratidzo, pakarepo tikatsvaka kubuda tiende kuMakedhonia, tapedza tichiti Ishe watidana kunoparidza evhangeri kwavari. <div eID="gen1219" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1217" type="section"/>
Acts 16:11 Naizvozvo takabva Troasi nechikepe, tikaruramira kuSamotirasi, fumewo kuNeapori,
Acts 16:12 ndokubvapo <transChange type="added">tikaenda</transChange> kuFiripi, rinova guta rekutanga redunhu reMakedhonia, raitongwa neimwe nyika; uye takagara mamwe mazuva muguta iri.
Acts 16:13 Zvino nezuva resabata tikabuda kunze kweguta kurutivi rwerwizi, paifanira kuitirwa munyengetero; zvino takagara pasi tikataura nevakadzi vakange vaungana<transChange type="added">po</transChange>.
Acts 16:14 Zvino umwe mukadzi wainzi Ridhia, mutengesikadzi wemicheka yeruvara rwehute weguta reTiatira, wainamata Mwari, waka<transChange type="added">ti</transChange>nzwa; moyo wake Ishe waakazarura, kuti ateerere zvinhu zvinotaurwa naPauro.
Acts 16:15 Zvino wakati abhabhatidzwa, neimba yake, akakumbira achiti: Kana matonga kuti ndakatendeka kuna Ishe, pindai mumba mangu mugare. Zvino akatigombedzera. <div eID="gen1221" type="x-p"/>
Acts 16:16 Zvino takati pataipinda kumunyengetero, umwe murandasikana waiva nemweya wekuuka wakasangana nesu, waivigira vatenzi vake mubairo muzhinji nekuuka.
Acts 16:17 Uyu wakatevera Pauro nesu, achidanidzira achiti: Vanhu ava varanda vaMwari Wekumusoro-soro, vanotiparidzira nzira yeruponeso.
Acts 16:18 Zvino izvi wakazviita mazuva mazhinji. Pauro wakati asemburwa, akatendeuka, akati kumweya: Ndinokuraira muzita raJesu Kristu kuti ubude kwaari. Zvino ukabuda nenguva iyoyo.
Acts 16:19 Vatenzi vake vakati vaona kuti tariro yemubairo yavo yaenda, vakabata Pauro naSirasi, vaka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>kakatira kudare pamberi pevakuru,
Acts 16:20 vakati vavauisa kuvatungamiriri vakati: Vanhu ava vanovhiringidza guta redu, vari VaJudha,
Acts 16:21 uye vanoparidza tsika dzisiri pamutemo kwatiri kugamuchira kana kuita, tiri vanhu VaRoma.
Acts 16:22 Zvino chaunga chikavamukira pamwe, uye vatungamiriri vakavabvarurira nguvo vakaraira kuti va<transChange type="added">va</transChange>rove netsvimbo.
Acts 16:23 Vakati vaisa mavanga mazhinji pamusoro pavo vaka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>kanda mutirongo, vakaraira murindi wetirongo kuti avachengete kwazvo;
Acts 16:24 iye, agamuchira murairo wakadaro, wakavakanda mutirongo remukati, akasimbisa tsoka dzavo mudanda.
Acts 16:25 Zvino panenge pakati peusiku Pauro naSirasi vakange vachinyengetera nekuimba nziyo dzekurumbidza kuna Mwari, uye vasungwa vaivanzwa;
Acts 16:26 zvino pakarepo kwakavapo kudengenyeka kwenyika kukuru, zvekuti nheyo dzetirongo dzakazununguswa; zvino pakarepo mikova yese ikazarurwa, nezvisungo zvevese zvikasunungurwa.
Acts 16:27 Murindi wetirongo wakati apepuka, uye aona mikova yetirongo yakazarurwa, akavhomora munondo, oda kuzviuraya, achifunga kuti vasungwa vatiza.
Acts 16:28 Asi Pauro wakadanidzira nenzwi guru, achiti: Usazvikuvadza; nokuti tiri muno tese.
Acts 16:29 Zvino wakakumbira mwenje akasvetukiramo, ndokusvika achibvunda akawira pasi pamberi paPauro naSirasi,
Acts 16:30 zvino akati avabudisira kunze akati: Madzishe, ndinofanira kuitei kuti ndiponeswe?
Acts 16:31 Zvino vakati: Tenda kuna Ishe Jesu Kristu, zvino uchaponeswa iwe neimba yako.
Acts 16:32 Zvino vakataura kwaari shoko raIshe, nekune vese vaiva mumba make.
Acts 16:33 Ndokuvatora nenguva iyoyo yeusiku aka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>shambidza pamavanga, ndokubhabhatidzwa pakarepo iye nevake vese.
Acts 16:34 Zvino wakati avaisa mumba make ndokugadzika tafura pamberi <transChange type="added">pavo</transChange>, akafara neimba yake yese achitenda kuna Mwari.
Acts 16:35 Zvino kwakati kwaedza vatungamiriri vakatuma mapurisa vachiti: Sunungurai vanhu avo.
Acts 16:36 Murindi wetirongo ndokuudza Pauro mashoko iwayo, achiti: Vatungamiriri vatuma <transChange type="added">shoko,</transChange> kuti musunungurwe; naizvozvo budai ikozvino muende murugare.
Acts 16:37 Asi Pauro wakati kwavari: Vakatirova pachena tisina kubatwa mhosva tiri vanhu VaRoma, vaka<transChange type="added">ti</transChange>kanda mutirongo, zvino ikozvino votikanda panze chinyararire here? Haiwa, kwete! Asi vanofanira kuuya vamene vatibudise.
Acts 16:38 Mapurisa ndokuudza vatungamiriri mashoko iwayo; zvino vakatya pavakanzwa kuti VaRoma,
Acts 16:39 ndokuuya vakavakumbira, zvino vakavabudisa vakakumbira kuti vabude muguta.
Acts 16:40 Zvino vakabuda mutirongo vakapinda kwaRidhia; ndokuti vaona hama, vakavanyaradza, vakabva ndokuenda.  <chapter eID="Acts.16"/><div eID="gen1222" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1220" type="section"/>
Acts 17:0 <div sID="gen1223" type="section"/> <chapter n="17" osisID="Acts.17" sID="Acts.17"/>  <div sID="gen1224" type="x-p"/>
Acts 17:1 Zvino vakati vagura nemuAmufipori neAporonia, vakasvika paTesaronika, paiva nesinagoge reVaJudha;
Acts 17:2 zvino setsika yaPauro wakapinda kwavari, uye kwemasabata matatu akataurirana navo kubva mumagwaro,
Acts 17:3 achizarura nekuratidza kuti Kristu waifanira kutambudzika nekumuka kubva kuvakafa, uye kuti: Uyu Jesu, ini wandinoparidza kwamuri, ndiye Kristu.
Acts 17:4 Zvino vamwe vavo vakatenda, vakazvibatanidza naPauro naSirasi, nechaunga chikuru cheVaGiriki vaishumira, nekuvakadzi vaikudzwa vasiri vashoma.
Acts 17:5 Asi VaJudha vasingatendi vakaita godo, vakatora vamwe varume vakaipa dzaiva simbe dzepamusika, vakaita chaunga, vakamutsira guta bongozozo; vakawira imba yaJasoni, vachitsvaka kuvabudisira kuvanhu;
Acts 17:6 asi vakati vasingavawani, vakakakatira Jasoni nedzimwe hama kuvatungamiriri veguta, vachidanidzira vachiti: Ava vakanyonganisa nyika, ivo vasvika panowo,
Acts 17:7 avo Jasoni vaakagamuchira; uye ava vese vanoita zvinopesana nezviga zvaKesari, vachiti umwe mambo ariko, <transChange type="added">anonzi</transChange> Jesu.
Acts 17:8 Uye vakanyonganisa chaunga nevatungamiriri veguta vachinzwa zvinhu izvi.
Acts 17:9 Zvino vakati vatora rubatso kuna Jasoni nekuvamwe, vakavaregedza. <div eID="gen1224" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1223" type="section"/>
Acts 17:10 Zvino pakarepo hama dzikatuma Pauro naSirasi kuBheriya neusiku; vakati vachisvika vakabva vakaenda musinagoge reVaJudha.
Acts 17:11 Ava vakange vakanaka kukunda veTesaronika, vakagamuchira shoko nechido chese, vachinzvera magwaro zuva rimwe nerimwe, kana zvinhu izvi zvaiva zvakadaro.
Acts 17:12 Naizvozvo vazhinji vavo vakatenda, nevevakadzi vaikudzwa veVaGiriki, nevevarume vasiri vashoma.
Acts 17:13 Asi VaJudha veTesaronika vakati vachiziva kuti shoko raMwari rinoparidzwa naPauro paBheriyawo, vakasvikapowo vakabvongodza zvaunga.
Acts 17:14 Zvino nenguva iyoyo pakarepo hama dzakatuma Pauro seanoenda kugungwa; asi Sirasi naTimotio vakasarapo.
Acts 17:15 Zvino avo vakaperekedza Pauro, vakamusvitsa kuAtene; ndokuti vagamuchira kuraira kuna Sirasi naTimotio kuti vakurumidzise kuuya kwaari, vakabva vaenda. <div eID="gen1226" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1225" type="section"/>
Acts 17:16 Zvino Pauro achakavagarira paAtene, mweya wake wakabvongonyodzeka maari, achiona guta rizere zvifananidzo.
Acts 17:17 Naizvozvo wakapikisana neVaJudha musinagoge nevainamata Mwari, nepamusika zuva rimwe nerimwe nevanenge varipo.
Acts 17:18 Zvino dzimwe nyanzvi dzekufunga dzeVaEpikuro nedzeVaStoiko dzakaita nharo naye. Vamwe ndokuti: Uyu mubvotomoki anoda kurevei? Asi vamwe <transChange type="added">vakati</transChange>: Anenge muparidzi wevamwari vekumwe; nokuti neevhangeri wakavaparidzira Jesu nekumuka.
Acts 17:19 Zvino vakamubata, vakamuisa paAreopago vachiti: Tingaziva here kuti dzidziso iyi itsva inotaurwa newe chii?
Acts 17:20 Nokuti unouisa zvimwe zvinhu zvinoshamisa panzeve dzedu; naizvozvo tinoda kuziva kuti zvinhu izvi zvinoda kuva zvii?
Acts 17:21 Nokuti vese VaAtene nevatorwa vaigarapo vakashandisa nguva yavo kwete pane chimwe chinhu, asi kunzwa kana kutaura chinhu chitsva.
Acts 17:22 Zvino Pauro amira pakati peAreopago, wakati: Varume VaAtene, pazvinhu zvese ndinoona kuti semune chitendero chikuru.
Acts 17:23 Nokuti ndati ndichipfuura nekucherekedza zvinhu zvenyu zvamunonamata, ndawana aritariwo yakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: KUNA MWARI ASINGAZIKANWI. Naizvozvo uyo wamunonamata musingazivi, ndiye ini wandinokuparidzirai.
Acts 17:24 Mwari wakaita nyika nezvinhu zvese zviri mairi, iye ari Ishe wedenga nepasi, haagari mutembere dzakaitwa nemaoko,
Acts 17:25 uye haashumirwi nemaoko evanhu, <transChange type="added">se</transChange>anoshaiwa chinhu, nokuti iye anopa vese upenyu nekufema nezvinhu zvese;
Acts 17:26 uye wakaita kubva paropa rimwe marudzi ese evanhu, kuti agare pachiso chese chenyika, atara nguva dzakagara dzatemwa uye miganhu yeugaro hwavo;
Acts 17:27 kuti vatsvake Ishe, zvimwe zvirokwazvo vamutsvangadzire va<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>wane, kunyange asiri kure neumwe neumwe wedu.
Acts 17:28 Nokuti maari tinorarama uye tinofamba uye tiripo; sezvo vamwewo vanyanduri vekwenyu vakati: Nokuti tiri zvizvarwa zvakewo.
Acts 17:29 Naizvozvo zvatiri zvizvarwa zvaMwari, hatifaniri kufunga kuti uMwari hwakafanana negoridhe kana sirivheri kana ibwe, zvakavezwa neumhizha kana murangariro wemunhu.
Acts 17:30 Naizvozvo nguva dzekusaziva Mwari wakarega kurangarira, ikozvino anoraira vanhu vese kwese-kwese kuti vatendeuke.
Acts 17:31 Nokuti wakatara zuva, raachatonga nyika mukururama, nemurume waakagadza, akasimbisa kune vese, pakumumutsa kubva kuvakafa.
Acts 17:32 Zvino vakati vanzwa zvekumuka kwevakafa, vamwe vakasveveredza, asi vamwe vakati: Tichazokunzwazve pamusoro paizvozvi.
Acts 17:33 Zvino nokudaro Pauro wakabuda pakati pavo.
Acts 17:34 Asi vamwe varume vakamunamatira, vakatenda; pakati pavo Dhionisiowo muAreopago, nemukadzi wainzi Dhamarisi, nevamwe vanavo. <chapter eID="Acts.17"/><div eID="gen1228" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1227" type="section"/>
Acts 18:0 <div sID="gen1229" type="section"/> <chapter n="18" osisID="Acts.18" sID="Acts.18"/>  <div sID="gen1230" type="x-p"/>
Acts 18:1 Shure kwezvinhu izvi Pauro wakabva paAtene akauya kuKorinde.
Acts 18:2 Zvino akawana umwe muJudha wainzi Akwira, wePonto pakuberekwa (achangosvika kubva kuItaria), naPrisira mukadzi wake, nekuda kwekuraira kwaKiraudhio kuti VaJudha vese vabve kuRoma, akaenda kwavari;
Acts 18:3 zvino nokuti vakange vari vebasa rimwe, wakagara navo ndokushanda; nokuti vaiva vagadziri vematende pabasa.
Acts 18:4 Zvino waiparidza sabata rimwe nerimwe musinagoge, achigombedzera VaJudha neVaGiriki.
Acts 18:5 Zvino Sirasi naTimotio vakati vachiburuka kubva kuMakedhonia, Pauro wakamanikidzwa neMweya, akapupura kuVaJudha <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> Jesu ndiye Kristu.
Acts 18:6 Zvino vakati vachi<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>pikisa nekutuka, akazunza nguvo, akati kwavari: Ropa renyu <transChange type="added">ngarive</transChange> pamusoro penyu; ini ndakachena; kubva ikozvino ndichaenda kuvahedheni.
Acts 18:7 Zvino wakabva ipapo akaenda kumba kweumwe wainzi Jusito, wainamata Mwari, imba yake yaiva yakabatana nesinagoge.
Acts 18:8 NaKrisipo mutungamiriri wesinagoge wakatenda kuna Ishe neimba yake yese; nevazhinji veVaKorinde vakanzwa vakatenda uye vakabhabhatidzwa.
Acts 18:9 Zvino Ishe wakataura kuna Pauro pausiku nechiratidzo: Usatya, asi taura uye usanyarara;
Acts 18:10 nokuti ini ndinewe, uye hapana angakumukira kuti akukuvadze; nokuti ndine vanhu vazhinji muguta rino.
Acts 18:11 Zvino wakagara gore nemwedzi mitanhatu, achidzidzisa shoko raMwari pakati pavo. <div eID="gen1230" type="x-p"/>
Acts 18:12 Zvino Gario wakati ava mutungamiriri weAkaya, VaJudha vakamukira Pauro nemoyo umwe, vakamuuisa pamberi pechigaro chekutonga,
Acts 18:13 vachiti: Uyu anogombedzera vanhu kunamata Mwari zvinopesana nemurairo.
Acts 18:14 Zvino Pauro wakati oda kushamisa muromo, Gario akati kuVaJudha: Naizvozvo dai chaiva chinhu chezvisakarurama kana mhosva yakaipa, haiwa VaJudha, nechikonzero <transChange type="added">ichi</transChange> ndaikuitirai nemoyo murefu;
Acts 18:15 asi kana dziri nharo pamusoro peshoko nemazita, nemurairo wenyu pachenyu, zvionerei imwi; nokuti ini handidi kuva mutongi weizvozvo.
Acts 18:16 Ndokuvadzinga pachigaro chekutonga.
Acts 18:17 Zvino VaGiriki vese vakabata Sositeni mutungamiriri wesinagoge, vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>rova pamberi pechigaro chekutonga. Asi Gario haana kuva nehanya nechinhu chimwe cheizvozvo.
Acts 18:18 Pauro wakati achigere mazuva mazhinji, akaonekana nehama, akabvapo nechikepe akaenda kuSiriya, uye Prisira naAkwira vanaye, aveura musoro paKenikirea, nokuti wakange ane mhiko.
Acts 18:19 Zvino wakasvika muEfeso, akavasiyapo; asi iye wakapinda musinagoge akataurirana neVaJudha.
Acts 18:20 Zvino vakati vamukumbira kugara navo nguva yakati rebei, haana kutenda;
Acts 18:21 asi wakavaoneka achiti: Ndinofanira nenzira dzese kuchengetedza mutambo unouya muJerusarema; asi ndichadzokazve kwamuri, kana Mwari achida. Akabva paEfeso nechikepe.
Acts 18:22 Zvino wakati asvika Kesariya, ndokukwira akakwazisa kereke, akaburukira kuAndiyokiya. <div eID="gen1231" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1229" type="section"/>
Acts 18:23 Zvino wakati ambopedza nguva, akabva, akagura nedunhu reGaratia neFrigia achitevedzanisa, achisimbisa vadzidzi vese.
Acts 18:24 Zvino umwe muJudha wainzi Aporo, muAreksandiria nekuberekwa, murume nyanzvi yekutaura, ane simba pamagwaro, wakasvika paEfeso.
Acts 18:25 Uyu wakange adzidziswa nzira yaIshe, uye waishingaira mumweya, achitaura nekunyatsodzidzisa zvinhu zvaIshe, achiziva rubhabhatidzo rwaJohwani chete;
Acts 18:26 iye ndokutanga kutaura asingatyi musinagoge. Zvino Prisira naAkwira vakati vamunzwa, vakamutora, vakanyatsomududzira nzira yaMwari nemazvo.
Acts 18:27 Zvino wakati achida kuyambukira kuAkaya, hama dzakanyora dzichisimbisa vadzidzi kuti vamugamuchire; iye wakati achisvika akabatsira zvikuru avo vakatenda nenyasha;
Acts 18:28 nokuti wakapwisa VaJudha nesimba pachena, achiratidza nemagwaro kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu. <chapter eID="Acts.18"/><div eID="gen1233" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1232" type="section"/>
Acts 19:0 <div sID="gen1234" type="section"/> <chapter n="19" osisID="Acts.19" sID="Acts.19"/>  <div sID="gen1235" type="x-p"/>
Acts 19:1 Zvino zvakaitika, Aporo achiri paKorinde, Pauro wakati agura nemativi ekumusoro akasvika paEfeso; akawana vamwe vadzidzi,
Acts 19:2 akati kwavari: Makagamuchira Mweya Mutsvene here pamakatenda? Zvino vakati kwaari: Asi hatina kutongonzwa kana kune Mweya Mutsvene.
Acts 19:3 Zvino akati kwavari: Ko makabhabhatidzwa mune zvipi? Zvino vakati: Murubhabhatidzo rwaJohwani.
Acts 19:4 Zvino Pauro wakati: Johwani zvirokwazvo wakabhabhatidza nerubhabhatidzo rwekutendeuka, achiudza vanhu kuti vatende kuna iye anouya shure kwake, ndiko kuti, kuna Kristu Jesu.
Acts 19:5 Zvino vakati vanzwa, vakabhabhatidzwa muzita raIshe Jesu.
Acts 19:6 Zvino Pauro wakati aisa maoko pamusoro pavo, Mweya Mutsvene akauya pamusoro pavo; vakataura nendimi, ndokuporofita.
Acts 19:7 Zvino varume vese vainge gumi nevaviri.
Acts 19:8 Zvino wakapinda musinagoge akataura akashinga, kwemwedzi mitatu achiparidza achipwisa pazvinhu zveushe hwaMwari.
Acts 19:9 Asi vamwe vakati vachiomesa moyo uye vasingatendi, vachitaura zvakaipa pamusoro penzira iyo pamberi pechaunga, akabva kwavari akatsaura vadzidzi, akaparidza zuva rimwe nerimwe muchikoro cheumwe Tiranosi.
Acts 19:10 Zvino izvi zvakaitika kwemakore maviri, zvekuti vese vakange vagere paAsia vakanzwa shoko raIshe Jesu, vese VaJudha neVaGiriki.
Acts 19:11 Mwari ndokuita mabasa esimba asina kujairika nemaoko aPauro,
Acts 19:12 zvekuti kunyange kuvarwere kwaiiswa micheka yekumeso kana mafasikoti zvaibva pamuviri wake, hosha dzikabva kwavari, nemweya yakaipa ikabuda kwavari.
Acts 19:13 Zvino vamwe VaJudha vambeyi vadzingi vemweya yakaipa, vakaidza kudana zita raIshe Jesu pamusoro pevaiva nemweya yakaipa, vachiti: Ndinokupikirai naJesu Pauro waanoparidza.
Acts 19:14 Zvino paiva nevamwe vanakomana vanomwe vaSikevha muJudha mupristi mukuru vaiita izvi.
Acts 19:15 Mweya wakaipa ndokupindura ukati: Jesu ndinomuziva, naPauro ndinoziva nezvake; asi imwi ndimwi vana ani?
Acts 19:16 Zvino munhu mweya wakaipa wawaiva paari akavakwakukira, akavakurira, akavakunda, zvekuti vakatiza mumba umo vasina nguvo vakuvadzwa.
Acts 19:17 Zvino izvi zvikazikanwa kune vese VaJudha neVaGirikiwo vakange vagere paEfeso; kutya ndokuvawira vese; zita raIshe Jesu ndokukudzwa.
Acts 19:18 Zvino vazhinji vevakange vatenda vakauya, vakareurura, nekurondedzera mabasa avo.
Acts 19:19 Zvino vazhinji vevaiita zveun'anga vakaunganidza mabhuku pamwe vakaapisa pamberi pevese; ndokuverenga mutengo wawo, zvino vakawana masirivheri zvuru makumi mashanu.
Acts 19:20 Naizvozvo shoko raIshe rakakura nesimba rikakunda.
Acts 19:21 Zvino izvi zvakati zvapera, Pauro wakazvipira mumweya, ambogura nepaMakedhonia neAkaya, kuenda kuJerusarema, achiti: Shure kwekuva kwangu ikoko, ndinofanirawo kunoona Roma.
Acts 19:22 Zvino akatumira kuMakedhonia vaviri vevaimushandira, Timotio naErasto, iye akagara muAsia kwenguva. <div eID="gen1235" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1234" type="section"/>
Acts 19:23 Zvino nenguva iyoyo nyonga-nyonga isati iri diki ikavapo pamusoro penzira <transChange type="added">iyo</transChange>.
Acts 19:24 Nokuti umwe, wainzi Dhemetrio, mupfuri wesirivheri, waiita <transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>tembere zvaDhiana zvesirivheri, waiuisa mubairo usati uri mudiki kumhizha;
Acts 19:25 wakadziunganidza pamwe nevamwe vebasa rakadaro, akati: Varume, munoziva kuti nebasa iri tine upfumi hwedu.
Acts 19:26 Zvino munoona nekunzwa kuti pasati pari paEfeso chete, asi panenge paAsia yese, Pauro uyu wakagombedzera nekutsausa chaunga chikuru, achiti vakaitwa nemaoko havasi vamwari.
Acts 19:27 Zvino hazvisi izvi chete kuti chikamu chedu chisvike panjodzi yekuzvidzwa, asi netembere yamwarikadzi mukuru Dhiana ichaitwa chinhu pasina neukuru-kuru hwake huchaderedzwa, iye Asia nenyika yese wavanonamata.
Acts 19:28 Zvino vakati vachi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa vakazara nekutsamwa, vakadanidzira vachiti: Mukuru Dhiana weVaEfeso!
Acts 19:29 Zvino guta rese rakazadzwa nenyonga-nyonga; vakamhanyira nemoyo umwe panhandare, vakakweva Gayo naArisitako VaMakedhonia, vaperekedzi vaPauro.
Acts 19:30 Zvino Pauro akada kupinda muchaunga, vadzidzi havana kumutendera.
Acts 19:31 Uye nevamwe vevakuru veAsia, vaiva shamwari dzake, vakatuma <transChange type="added">shoko</transChange> kwaari, vachikumbira zvikuru kwaari kuti arege kuzvipinza panhandare.
Acts 19:32 Zvino vamwe vakadanidzira chimwe <transChange type="added">vamwe</transChange> chimwe; nokuti ungano yakange yanyonganiswa, uye vazhinji vasingazivi zvavakaunganira.
Acts 19:33 Zvino vakabudisira Arekisandiro kunze kubva muchaunga, VaJudha vachimusundira mberi. Zvino Arekisandiro akaninira neruoko, achida kuzvidavirira kuvanhu.
Acts 19:34 Asi pavakaziva kuti muJudha, inzwi rimwe rakamuka kune vese, vakadanidzira maawa anenge maviri <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Mukuru Dhiana weVaEfeso!
Acts 19:35 Zvino munyori wakati anyaradza vanhu akati: Varume veEfeso, nokuti munhu ndeupi aripo asingazivi kuti guta reVaEfeso ndiro muchengetedzi wetembere yamwarikadzi mukuru Dhiana newechakawa kubva kudenga.
Acts 19:36 Naizvozvo zvinhu izvi zvazvisingagoni kurambwa, munofanira kunyarara musingaiti chinhu nekumhanyirira.
Acts 19:37 Nokuti mauisa varume ava, vasiri makororo edzitembere kana vamhuri vamwarikadzi wenyu.
Acts 19:38 Naizvozvo kana Dhemetrio nemhizha dzinaye vane mhosva neumwe, matare emhosva akazarurwa, nevatongi varipo; ngavakwirirane.
Acts 19:39 Asi kana muchitsvaka chimwe chinhu maererano nezvimwe zvinhu, zvingatemwa paungano iri pamutemo.
Acts 19:40 Nokuti tiri munjodziwo yekupiwa mhosva yebongozozo ranhasi zvapasina chikonzero chatingapa nacho rondedzero yenyongano iyi.
Acts 19:41 Zvino wakati ataura izvozvi, akaparadza ungano.  <chapter eID="Acts.19"/><div eID="gen1237" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1236" type="section"/>
Acts 20:0 <div sID="gen1238" type="section"/> <chapter n="20" osisID="Acts.20" sID="Acts.20"/>  <div sID="gen1239" type="x-p"/>
Acts 20:1 Shure kwekuguma kwemhirizhonga, Pauro akadanira kwaari vadzidzi, aka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>mbundikira, akabuda kuti aende kuMakedhonia.
Acts 20:2 Zvino wakati agura nemativi iwawo, avakurudzira nemashoko mazhinji, akasvika kuGirisi,
Acts 20:3 akati agara mwedzi mitatu, rangano yaitwa neVaJudha pamusoro pake, ava kuda kuenda kuSiriya nechikepe, akazvipira kudzokera nemuMakedhonia.
Acts 20:4 Zvino Sopatro weBheriya wakamuperekedza kusvika kuAsia, neveVaTesaronika, Arisitako naSekundo, naGayo weDhebhe, naTimotio, uye Tikiko naTrofimo VaAsia.
Acts 20:5 Ava vakatungamira vakatimirira paTroasi.
Acts 20:6 Asi isu takabva Firipi nechikepe mushure memazuva ezvingwa zvisina mbiriso, zvino takasvika kwavari paTroasi mumazuva mashanu, patakagara mazuva manomwe.
Acts 20:7 Zvino ne<transChange type="added">musi </transChange>wekutanga wevhiki, vadzidzi vakaungana kumedura chingwa, Pauro akaparidza kwavari, achida kubva chifume, akaredzva nhaurwa kusvikira pakati peusiku.
Acts 20:8 Zvino kwakange kune mwenje mizhinji mukamuri yekumusoro mavakange vakaungana.
Acts 20:9 Zvino pahwindo pakange pagere rimwe jaya rainzi Yutikosi, rikabatwa nehope kwazvo, Pauro wakati achiparidza nguva refu, iro rikakundwa nehope, rikawira pasi, kubva panhurikwa yechitatu, ndokunongwa rafa.
Acts 20:10 Zvino Pauro akaburuka akazviwisira pamusoro paro, aka<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>mbundikira akati: Musazvinetsa; nokuti mweya waro uri mariri.
Acts 20:11 Wakati akwirazve ndokumedura chingwa ndokudya, akataura navo nguva refu kusvikira kuchiedza, saizvozvo wakaenda.
Acts 20:12 Zvino vakauya nemukomana ari mupenyu, vakanyaradzwa zvisati zviri zvishoma.
Acts 20:13 Asi isu, takatungamira kuchikepe, tikaenda nechikepe kuAso, takananga kukwidza Pauro ipapo; nokuti wakange aronga saizvozvo, iye achitarisira kufamba netsoka.
Acts 20:14 Zvino wakati asangana nesu paAso, tikamukwidza tikasvika kuMitirene,
Acts 20:15 tikabva ipapo nechikepe, chifume tikasvika pakatarisana neKiyo; chifume tikasvika paSamo; ndokugara paTrogiriamu, chifume tikasvika Mireto.
Acts 20:16 Nokuti Pauro wakange akazvipira kupfuura Efeso nechikepe, kuti asapedza nguva paAsia; nokuti waimhanya, kana zvichibvira kwaari, ave paJerusarema nezuva rePendekosita. <div eID="gen1239" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1238" type="section"/>
Acts 20:17 Zvino ari paMireto wakatumira kuEfeso akadanira vakuru vekereke kwaari.
Acts 20:18 Zvino vakati vasvika kwaari, akati kwavari: Imwi munoziva kubva pazuva rekutanga randakasvika muAsia, kuti ndakava nemwi sei nguva dzese,
Acts 20:19 ndichibatira Ishe nekuzvininipisa kwese uye nemisodzi mizhinji, nemiedzo yakandiwira nerangano dzeVaJudha;
Acts 20:20 kuti handina sei kuvanza zvezvingabatsira, kusakuparidzirai nekukudzidzisai pachena uye muimba neimba,
Acts 20:21 ndichipupura zvese kuVaJudha nekuVaGiriki kutendeukira kuna Mwari, nerutendo kuna Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu.
Acts 20:22 Zvino ikozvino tarirai, ini ndinoenda kuJerusarema ndakasungwa neMweya, ndisingazivi zvichandiwira mariri,
Acts 20:23 kunze kwekuti Mweya Mutsvene anopupura muguta rimwe nerimwe achiti zvisungo nenhamo zvakandigarira.
Acts 20:24 Asi handirangariri chinhu pane izvi, uye handiverengeri upenyu hwangu kuti chinhu chinokosha kwandiri kuti ndipedze rwendo rwangu nemufaro nebasa randakagamuchira kuna Ishe Jesu rekupupura evhangeri yenyasha dzaMwari.
Acts 20:25 Zvino ikozvino tarirai, ini ndinoziva kuti imwi mese, vandakafamba pakati penyu ndichiparidza ushe hwaMwari, hamuchazooni chiso changu.
Acts 20:26 Naizvozvo ndinopupura kwamuri nezuva ranhasi, kuti ini ndakachena paropa revese;
Acts 20:27 nokuti handina kuvanza kwekusakuparidzirai zano rese raMwari.
Acts 20:28 Naizvozvo zvichenjererei imwi, neboka rese Mweya Mutsvene paakakugadzai vatariri pamusoro paro, kuti mufudze kereke yaMwari, yaakatenga neropa rake amene.
Acts 20:29 Nokuti ini ndinoziva izvi, kuti shure kwekuenda kwangu mapumhi anorura achapinda pakati penyu, asingaregi boka;
Acts 20:30 uye kubva pamuri imwi momene pachamuka varume vachataura zvinhu zvinotsausa, kuti vakwezve vadzidzi vavatevere.
Acts 20:31 Naizvozvo rindai, murangarire kuti kwemakore matatu handina kuguma siku nesikati kuyambira umwe neumwe nemisodzi.
Acts 20:32 Uye ikozvino hama, ndinokukumikidzai kuna Mwari nekushoko renyasha dzake, iye anogona kukuvakai, nekukupai nhaka pakati pevese vakaitwa vatsvene.
Acts 20:33 Handina kuchiva sirivheri kana goridhe kana nguvo yemunhu.
Acts 20:34 Imwiwo momene munoziva kuti maoko awa akabatira kushaiwa kwangu nekwevaiva neni.
Acts 20:35 Pazvinhu zvese ndakakuratidzai, kuti muchibata saizvozvi munofanira kubatsira vane utera, nekurangarira mashoko aIshe Jesu, kuti iye wakati: Kwakaropafadzwa kupa kupfuura kugamuchira.
Acts 20:36 Zvino wakati ataura zvinhu izvi, akafugama, akanyengetera navo vese.
Acts 20:37 Kukava nekuchema kwavo vese kukuru; vakawira pamutsipa waPauro vakamutsvoda,
Acts 20:38 vachishungurudzika zvikuru neshoko raakataura, kuti havachazooni chiso chake. Zvino vakamuperekedza kuchikepe. <chapter eID="Acts.20"/><div eID="gen1241" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1240" type="section"/>
Acts 21:0 <div sID="gen1242" type="section"/> <chapter n="21" osisID="Acts.21" sID="Acts.21"/>  <div sID="gen1243" type="x-p"/>
Acts 21:1 Zvino zvakaitika kuti tichibva nechikepe taparadzana navo, takafamba nenzira yakarurama tikasvika muKose, neraitevera muRodhe, tikabvapo tikasvika Patara;
Acts 21:2 ndokuti tawana chikepe chaiyambukira kuFonisiya, takapinda tikaenda nechikepe.
Acts 21:3 Takati tabudikira Saipuresi, ndokuisiya kuruoko rweruboshwe, tikaenda kuSiriya nechikepe, tikamhara paTire; nokuti chikepe chaifanira kututunura mutoro ipapo;
Acts 21:4 zvino takati tawana vadzidzi, tikagarapo mazuva manomwe; ivo vakati neMweya kuna Pauro, arege kukwira kuJerusarema.
Acts 21:5 Zvino zvakaitika kuti takapedza mazuva, tikabva tikaenda, vese vakatiperekedza nevakadzi nevana kusvikira kunze kweguta; zvino takafugama nemabvi pamahombekombe tikanyengetera.
Acts 21:6 Zvino tawonekana, takapinda muchikepe, asi ivo vakadzokera kwavo. <div eID="gen1243" type="x-p"/>
Acts 21:7 Asi isu takati tapedza rwendo nechikepe kubva kuTire, takasvika kuPitoremai, tikakwazisa hama tikagara navo zuva rimwe.
Acts 21:8 Chifume isu taiva naPauro takabva tikasvika kuKesariya; ndokupinda mumba maFiripi muevhangeri, waiva <transChange type="added">umwe</transChange> wevanomwe, tikagara naye.
Acts 21:9 Uyuwo wakange ane vakunda vana, mhandara dzaiporofita.
Acts 21:10 Zvino takati tagara mazuva mazhinji, kwakaburuka kubva kuJudhiya umwe muporofita wainzi Agabhusi,
Acts 21:11 ndokusvika kwatiri, akatora bhanhire raPauro, akazvisunga maoko nemakumbo ake, akati: Mweya Mutsvene anoreva izvi: Murume bhanhire iri riri rake, VaJudha paJerusarema vachamusunga saizvozvi, neku<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>kumikidza mumaoko evahedheni.
Acts 21:12 Zvino takati tanzwa zvinhu izvi tese isu nevenzvimbo iyo tikakumbirisa kuti arege kukwira kuJerusarema.
Acts 21:13 Asi Pauro wakapindura <transChange type="added">akati:</transChange> Munoitei muchichema nekuputsa moyo wangu? Nokuti ini ndakagadzirira, kwete kusungwa chete, asi nekufa paJerusarema nekuda kwezita raIshe Jesu.
Acts 21:14 Zvino wakati asingapwiswi, takanyarara tikati: Chido chaIshe ngachiitwe.
Acts 21:15 Zvino shure kwemazuva iwayo takarongedza, tikakwira kuJerusarema.
Acts 21:16 Ne<transChange type="added">vamwe</transChange>wo vevadzidzi veKesariya vakaenda nesu, vakauya neumwe Minasoni weSaipuresi, mudzidzi wekare, watainogara naye.
Acts 21:17 Zvino takati tichisvika kuJerusarema, hama dzakatigamuchira nemufaro. <div eID="gen1244" type="x-p"/>
Acts 21:18 Chifume Pauro wakapinda nesu kuna Jakobho, nevakuru vese vakange varipo.
Acts 21:19 Zvino wakati avakwazisa, wakarondedzera chimwe nechimwe chezvinhu Mwari chaakaita pakati pevahedheni neshumiro yake.
Acts 21:20 Ivo vakati vachi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa, vakakudza Ishe; vakati kwaari: Unoona, hama, kuti zvuru zvingani zveVaJudha vanotenda; uye vese vanoshingairira murairo;
Acts 21:21 zvino vakaudzwa nezvako, kuti unodzidzisa VaJudha vese vari pakati pevahedheni kuti vasiye Mozisi, uchiti varege kudzingisa vana, kana kufamba netsika.
Acts 21:22 Ko zvino chii? Zvirokwazvo zvakafanira kuti chaunga chiungane; nokuti vachanzwa kuti wasvika.
Acts 21:23 Naizvozvo ita izvi zvatinoreva kwauri; tine varume vana vane mhiko pamusoro pavo;
Acts 21:24 vatore pamwe newe, uzvichenure pamwe navo, uye uripe muripo wavo, kuti vaveure musoro, kuti vese vazive kuti zvavakaudzwa maererano newe hapana zviripo, asi iwewo pachako unofamba zvakarurama uchichengeta murairo.
Acts 21:25 Asi maererano nevahedheni vanotenda isu tanyora, tikatema kuti vasachengeta chinhu chakadai, kunze kwekuti vazvidzore pane zvakabairwa zvifananidzo, neropa nezvakadzipwa neupombwe.
Acts 21:26 Ipapo Pauro wakatora varume avo, zuva raitevera akazvichenura pamwe navo, akapinda mutembere kupira kupera kwemazuva ekunatswa, kusvikira kwabairwa chibairo cheumwe neumwe wavo. <div eID="gen1245" type="x-p"/>
Acts 21:27 Zvino mazuva manomwe akati opera, VaJudha vaibva kuAsia pavakamuona mutembere, vakamutsa chaunga chese, ndokuisa maoko kwaari.
Acts 21:28 Vakadanidzira, <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Varume VaIsraeri, batsirai! Uyu ndiye munhu anodzidzisa vese kwese-kwese zvinopesana nevanhu, nemurairo, nenzvimbo ino; pamusoro pazvo anouisa VaGirikiwo mutembere, ndokusvibisa nzvimbo ino tsvene.
Acts 21:29 Nokuti vakange vamboona Trofimo muEfeso anaye muguta, wavaifunga kuti Pauro wamupinza mutembere.
Acts 21:30 Neguta rese rakanyonganiswa; vanhu vakamhanyira pamwe; vakabata Pauro, vakamukwevera kunze kwetembere; mikova ikazarirwa pakarepo.
Acts 21:31 Zvino vakati vachitsvaka kumuuraya, shoko rikakwira kumukuru wechuru wehondo, kuti Jerusarema rese ranyonganiswa.
Acts 21:32 Iye pakarepo akatora mauto nevakuru vezana, akaburuka achimhanyira kwavari; ivo vakati vachiona mukuru wechuru chemazana nemauto, vakarega kurova Pauro.
Acts 21:33 Zvino mukuru wechuru chemazana wakaswedera, akamubata, ndokuraira kuti asungwe nemaketani maviri, akabvunza kuti waiva ani, uye kuti waitei.
Acts 21:34 Zvino vamwe pakati pevazhinji vakadanidzira chimwe <transChange type="added">vamwe</transChange> chimwewo; zvino asingagoni kuziva chokwadi nekuda kwenyonga-nyonga, wakaraira kuti aiswe kuimba yemauto.
Acts 21:35 Zvino wakati asvika pamitanho, zvakaitika kuti atakurwe nemauto nekuda kwemhirizhonga yechaunga;
Acts 21:36 nokuti chaunga chevanhu chakatevera chichidanidzira <transChange type="added">chichiti</transChange>: Mubvise! <div eID="gen1246" type="x-p"/>
Acts 21:37 Pauro wakati oda kupinzwa muimba yemauto akati kumukuru wechuru: Zvinotenderwa here kuti nditaure chinhu kwauri? Iye ndokuti: Unoziva chiGiriki here?
Acts 21:38 Ko iwe hausi uya muEgipita wakamutsa bongozozo mazuva ano asati asvika here, akatungamirira kurenje zvuru zvina zvevarume vaiva mhondi?
Acts 21:39 Asi Pauro wakati: Ini ndiri munhu muJudha, weTaso yeKirikia, mugari weguta risina kureruka. Zvino ndinokukumbirai, nditenderei kutaura kuvanhu.
Acts 21:40 Zvino wakati amutendera, Pauro wakamira pamitanho akaninira kuvanhu neruoko; zvino kwakati kwanyarara kwazvo, akataura kwavari nerurimi rwechiHebheru achiti: <chapter eID="Acts.21"/><div eID="gen1247" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1242" type="section"/>
Acts 22:0 <div sID="gen1248" type="section"/> <chapter n="22" osisID="Acts.22" sID="Acts.22"/>  <div sID="gen1249" type="x-p"/>
Acts 22:1 Varume, hama, nemadzibaba, inzwai kuzvidavirira kwangu ikozvino kwamuri.
Acts 22:2 Vakati vachinzwa kuti anotaura nerurimi rwechiHebheru kwavari, vakanyanya kunyarara, zvino akati:
Acts 22:3 Ini ndiri zvirokwazvo murume muJudha, wakaberekerwa muTaso yeKirikia, akarerwa muguta rino pamakumbo aGamarieri, ndikadzidziswa zvakasimba maererano nemurairo wemadzibaba, mushingairiri waMwari, sezvamuri mese nhasi;
Acts 22:4 waishusha nzira iyi kusvikira parufu, ndichisunga nekukumikidza mutirongo vese varume nevakadzi,
Acts 22:5 nemupristi mukuru sezvaanondipupurira, nedare rese remakurukota evakuru, kwandakagamuchirawo kwavari tsamba kuhama, ndikaenda kuDhamasiko kuti ndiuise kuJerusarema avo vaivapowo vakasungwa, kuti varangwe.
Acts 22:6 Zvino zvakaitika kuti ndichifamba ndoswedera Dhamasiko, anenge masikati, pakarepo kwakapenya kubva kudenga chiedza chikuru chakandipoteredza.
Acts 22:7 Zvino ndakawira pasi, ndokunzwa inzwi richiti kwandiri: Sauro, Sauro, unondishushirei?
Acts 22:8 Ini ndikapindura, <transChange type="added">ndikati</transChange>: Ndimwi ani, Ishe? Akati kwandiri: Ndini Jesu weNazareta waunoshusha iwe.
Acts 22:9 Zvino avo vaiva neni vakaona chiedza, uye vakatya; asi havana kunzwisisa inzwi rewakataura neni.
Acts 22:10 Zvino ndikati: Ndoita chii, Ishe? Ishe ndokuti kwandiri: Simuka uende kuDhamasiko; uye ikoko uchaudzwa maererano nezvinhu zvese zvakatarirwa iwe kuti uite.
Acts 22:11 Zvino zvandakange ndisingaoni nekubwinya kwechiedza icho, ndakatungamirirwa neruoko nevaiva neni, ndikasvika kuDhamasiko.
Acts 22:12 Zvino umwe Ananiasi, murume waishingaira pakunamata zvinoenderana nemurairo, waipupurirwa zvakanaka neVaJudha vese vakange vagere<transChange type="added">po</transChange>,
Acts 22:13 akauya kwandiri ndokumira padivi <transChange type="added">pangu</transChange> akati kwandiri: Sauro hama, chionazve. Neni nenguva iyo ndikamuona.
Acts 22:14 Zvino akati: Mwari wemadzibaba edu wakagara akusarudza kuti uzive chido chake, nekuona Wakarurama, uye unzwe inzwi rinobva mumuromo wake.
Acts 22:15 Nokuti uchava chapupu chake kuvanhu vese chezvawakaona nekunzwa.
Acts 22:16 Zvino ikozvino uchanonokerei? Simuka ubhabhatidzwe uye usukwe zvivi zvako, uchidana zita raIshe.
Acts 22:17 Zvino zvakaitika kuti ndadzokera kuJerusarema, uye ndichinyengetera mutembere, ndikaita chiyeverwa chemweya,
Acts 22:18 ndokumuona achiti kwandiri: Kurumidza uye ubude muJerusarema ikozvino-zvino; nokuti havagamuchiri uchapupu hwako maererano neni.
Acts 22:19 Ini ndikati: Ishe, ivo vanoziva kuti ini ndaiisa mutirongo nekurova musinagoge rega-rega avo vaitenda kwamuri;
Acts 22:20 uye pakadururwa ropa raSitefano chapupu chenyu, neni ndakange ndimirepo ndichibvumirana nekuurawa kwake, uye ndakachengeta nguvo dzevaimuuraya.
Acts 22:21 Zvino akati kwandiri: Enda, nokuti ini ndichakutuma kure kuvahedheni. <div eID="gen1249" type="x-p"/>
Acts 22:22 Vakamuteerera kusvikira pashoko iri, ndokusimudza inzwi ravo vachiti: Wakadai ngaabviswe panyika; nokuti hazvina kufanira kuti ararame.
Acts 22:23 Zvino vachidanidzira, nekurasa nguvo, vachikushira guruva mumhepo,
Acts 22:24 mukuru wechuru wakaraira kuti aiswe kuimba yemauto achiti abvunzurudzwe nekurohwa netyava, kuti azive kuti chikonzeroi chavaidanidzira kudai pamusoro pake.
Acts 22:25 Zvino vakati vamutandavadzira mberi nemakashu, Pauro akati kumukuru wezana wakange amirepo: Zviri pamutemo here kwamuri kurova netyava munhu <transChange type="added">ari</transChange> muRoma uye asina kupiwa mhosva?
Acts 22:26 Zvino mukuru wezana wakati achi<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>nzwa, akaswedera akaudza mukuru wechuru achiti: Chenjerai zvamoda kuita; nokuti munhu uyu muRoma.
Acts 22:27 Zvino mukuru wechuru akaswedera akati kwaari: Ndiudze, iwe uri muRoma here? Iye akati: Hongu.
Acts 22:28 Mukuru wechuru ndokupindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Nemutengo mukuru ini ndakawana ugaro uhu. Pauro akati: Asi neni ndakaberekwa <transChange type="added">nahwo</transChange>.
Acts 22:29 Naizvozvo pakarepo vakabva kwaari ivo vaiva vomubvunzurudza. Nemukuru wechuru wakatyawo aziva kuti iye muRoma, uye nokuti wakange amusunga.
Acts 22:30 Zvino chifume achida kuziva chokwadi, kuti nemhosva yei aipomerwa neVaJudha, wakamusunungura pazvisungo, akaraira kuti vapristi vakuru nedare ravo remakurukota rese vauye, akaburusira Pauro ndokugadzika pamberi pavo.  <chapter eID="Acts.22"/><div eID="gen1250" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1248" type="section"/>
Acts 23:0 <div sID="gen1251" type="section"/> <chapter n="23" osisID="Acts.23" sID="Acts.23"/>  <div sID="gen1252" type="x-p"/>
Acts 23:1 Zvino Pauro wakati achitarisisa dare remakurukota akati: Varume hama, ini ndakafamba pamberi paMwari nehana yese yakanaka, kusvikira zuva rino.
Acts 23:2 Asi mupristi mukuru Ananiasi wakaraira vakange vamire naye kuti vamurove muromo.
Acts 23:3 Ipapo Pauro akati kwaari: Mwari achakurova, madziro akadzudzurwa akacheneswa; nokuti iwe ugere kuti unditonge maererano nemurairo, zvino unoraira kuti ndirohwe zvinopesana nemurairo here?
Acts 23:4 Zvino vakange vamirepo vakati: Unotuka mupristi mukuru waMwari here?
Acts 23:5 Pauro ndokuti: Ndanga ndisingazivi, hama, kuti mupristi mukuru; nokuti kwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Usataura zvakaipa pamusoro pemutungamiriri wevanhu vekwako.
Acts 23:6 Zvino Pauro wakati aziva kuti rimwe divi ndereVaSadhusi uye rimwe ndereVaFarisi, akadanidzira kudare remakurukota, <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Varume hama, ini ndiri muFarisi, mwanakomana wemuFarisi; ini ndinotongwa pamusoro petariro nekumuka kwevakafa.
Acts 23:7 Wakati areva izvi, kupesana kukauya pakati peVaFarisi neVaSadhusi, chaunga ndokukamukana.
Acts 23:8 Nokuti VaSadhusi vanoti hakuna kumuka, kana mutumwa, kana mweya; asi VaFarisi vanobvuma zviri zviviri.
Acts 23:9 Zvino mhere-mhere huru ikamuka; vanyori vekudivi reVaFarisi vakasimuka vachipikisa zvikuru vachiti: Hatiwani chinhu chakaipa kumunhu uyu; asi kana mweya akataura naye kana mutumwa, hatingarwisani naMwari.
Acts 23:10 Zvino kupesana kukuru kwakati kwauya, mukuru wechuru akatya kuti Pauro angabvamburwa navo, akaraira mauto kuti aburuke amubvute pakati pavo, amuise kuimba yemauto.
Acts 23:11 Zvino usiku hwakatevera Ishe wakamira naye akati: Tsunga moyo Pauro; nokuti sezvawakapupura zvinhu maererano neni paJerusarema, saizvozvo zvakafanirawo kuti upupure kuRoma. <div eID="gen1252" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1251" type="section"/>
Acts 23:12 Zvino kwakati kwaedza, vamwe veVaJudha vakaita rangano, vakazvisunga nemhiko, vachiti havangadyi kana kunwa kusvikira vauraya Pauro.
Acts 23:13 Zvino vaipfuura makumi mana vakange vaita mhiko iyi pamwe chete;
Acts 23:14 ava vakaenda kuvapristi vakuru nevakuru vakati: Tazvisunga nemhiko huru, kuti hatidyi chinhu kusvikira tauraya Pauro.
Acts 23:15 Naizvozvo ikozvino imwi nedare remakurukota taridzai kumukuru wechuru, kuti amuburusire kwamuri mangwana, sezvinonzi munoda kunyatsobvunzisisa zviri maererano naye; asi isu asati aswedera, tazvigadzira kumuuraya.
Acts 23:16 Zvino mwanakomana wehanzvadzi yaPauro akanzwa zvekuvandira, akauya akapinda mumba memauto, akaudza Pauro.
Acts 23:17 Pauro ndokudanira kwaari umwe wevakuru vezana akati: Isa jaya iri kumukuru wechuru; nokuti rine chekutaura kwaari.
Acts 23:18 Zvino ndokumutora, aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>uisa kumukuru wechuru, ndokuti: Pauro musungwa wandidanira kwaari akakumbira kuti ndiuise jaya iri kwamuri, rine chekutaura kwamuri.
Acts 23:19 Mukuru wechuru akabata ruoko rwaro, akaenda <transChange type="added">naro</transChange> parutivi vari vega, akabvunza <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Chii chaunacho chekundiudza?
Acts 23:20 Iye akati: VaJudha vatenderana kukukumbirai, kuti muburusire Pauro kudare remakurukota mangwana, sevanoda kunyatsobvunzisisa chimwe chinhu maererano naye.
Acts 23:21 Naizvozvo imwi musatendeswa navo; nokuti vakamuvandira pakati pavo varume vanopfuura makumi mana, vakazvisunga nemhiko kuti havangadyi kana kunwa kusvikira vamuuraya; zvino ikozvino vakagadzirira vachimirira chivimbiso kubva kwamuri.
Acts 23:22 Naizvozvo mukuru wechuru wakaregera jaya richienda, a<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>raira <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Usaudza munhu kuti wandizivisa zvinhu izvi. <div eID="gen1254" type="x-p"/>
Acts 23:23 Zvino akadanira kwaari vamwe vaviri vevakuru vezana, akati: Gadzirirai mauto mazana maviri kuti afambe kusvikira Kesariya, nevatasvi vemabhiza makumi manomwe, nevemapfumo mazana maviri, kubva paawa rechitatu reusiku;
Acts 23:24 mu<transChange type="added">va</transChange>wanisewo zvipfuwo, kuti vatasvise Pauro vamuise akachengeteka kumutungamiriri Ferikisi;
Acts 23:25 akanyora tsamba yakatakura zvemukati izvi:
Acts 23:26 Kiraudhio Risia kuna Ferikisi mutungamiriri changamire, kwaziwai.
Acts 23:27 Uyu murume wakabatwa neVaJudha, uye angadai akaurawa navo, ndikasvika nemauto ndikamununura, ndanzwa kuti muRoma.
Acts 23:28 Zvino ndakati ndichida kuziva chikonzero chavaimupomera nacho, ndikamuburusira kudare ravo remakurukota;
