Acts 23:29 ndikawana achipomerwa pamusoro pemashoko emurairo wavo, asi asingapomerwi chinhu chingafanira rufu kana zvisungo.
Acts 23:30 Zvino ndakati ndaziviswa kuti kwakange koda kuva nekuvandirwa kwemurume uyu neVaJudha, ndika<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>tumira kwamuri pakarepo, ndikarairawo vano<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>mhan'arira kuti vataure pamberi penyu zvavanopesana naye. Chisarai.
Acts 23:31 Zvino mauto, sezvaakarairwa akatora Pauro, akamuisa kuAntipatiri neusiku.
Acts 23:32 Zvino chifume, vakarega vatasvi vemabhiza kuti vaende naye, vakadzokera kuimba yemauto;
Acts 23:33 ivo vakati vasvika kuKesariya, vakakumikidza tsamba kumutungamiriri, vakaisawo Pauro pamberi pake.
Acts 23:34 Zvino mutungamiriri wakati averenga, akabvunza kuti ndewedunhu ripi; zvino aziva kuti ndeweKirikia,
Acts 23:35 akati: Ndichakunzwa, kana vanokupomera mhosva vasvikawo; akaraira kuti achengetwe mumba maHerodhe mekutongera. <chapter eID="Acts.23"/><div eID="gen1255" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1253" type="section"/>
Acts 24:0 <div sID="gen1256" type="section"/> <chapter n="24" osisID="Acts.24" sID="Acts.24"/>  <div sID="gen1257" type="x-p"/>
Acts 24:1 Zvino mushure memazuva mashanu Ananiasi mupristi mukuru wakaburuka nevakuru neumwe mumiririri <transChange type="added">wainzi</transChange> Teturo; vakamhan'arira Pauro kumutungamiriri.
Acts 24:2 Zvino wakati adanwa, Teturo akatanga ku<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>pa mhosva achiti: Rugare rukuru tinorwuwana nemwi, nemabasa akanaka akaitika murudzi rwuno neurongwa hwenyu,
Acts 24:3 tino<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>gamuchira nemitoo yese nepanzvimbo dzese, changamire Ferikisi, nekuvonga kwese.
Acts 24:4 Asi kuti ndisaramba ndichikubatirirai, ndino<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>kumbirai zvikuru kuti netsitsi dzenyu mutinzwe muchidimbu.
Acts 24:5 Nokuti takawana murume uyu ari hosha huru, anomutsa bongozozo pakati peVaJudha vese panyika yese, ari mutungamiriri weboka reVaNazareta.
Acts 24:6 Iye wakaidzawo kushatisa tembere; watakabatawo tichida kumutonga maererano nemurairo wedu,
Acts 24:7 zvino mukuru wehondo Risiasi wakauya ndoku<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>tora nechisimba chikuru mumaoko edu,
Acts 24:8 akaraira vaimupa mhosva kuti vauye kwamuri; wamunogona kuti muku<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>bvunzisisa momene muchawana ruzivo rwezvinhu izvi zvese isu zvatinomupira mhosva.
Acts 24:9 NeVaJudha vakabvumawo, vachiti zvinhu izvi zvakadaro. <div eID="gen1257" type="x-p"/>
Acts 24:10 Zvino Pauro wakapindura, mutungamiriri amuninira kuti ataure, <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Nokuti ndinoziva kuti mava wemakore mazhinji muri mutongi kurudzi urwu, ndinozvidavirira nemufaro mukuru zviri maererano neni,
Acts 24:11 sezvo mungagona kuziva kuti mazuva achi<transChange type="added">gere</transChange> kupfuura gumi nemaviri kwandiri, kubvira pandakakwira kuJerusarema kunonamata;
Acts 24:12 uye havana kundiwana mutembere ndichiita nharo nemunhu, kana kumutsira chaunga bongozozo, kunyange mumasinagoge kana muguta rese;
Acts 24:13 uye havagoni kupa uchapupu pamusoro pezvinhu zvavanondimhan'arira ikozvino.
Acts 24:14 Asi ndinobvuma izvi kwamuri, kuti nenzira yavanoti kutsauka, saizvozvo ndinoshumira Mwari wemadzibaba, ndichitenda zvinhu zvese zvakanyorwa pamurairo wese nepavaporofita;
Acts 24:15 ndine tariro kuna Mwari, iyo yavanomirirawo vamene, kuti kuchava nekumuka kwevakafa, kwevakarurama pamwe nevasakarurama.
Acts 24:16 Uye pachinhu ichi ini ndinoidza, kuti nguva dzese ndive nehana isina mhosva kuna Mwari nekuvanhu.
Acts 24:17 Zvino shure kwemakore mazhinji ndakasvika kuzopa zvipo zvenyasha kurudzi rwangu nezvibairo;
Acts 24:18 ndiri pane izvozvi vamwe VaJudha vakabva Asia vakandiwana ndakanatswa mutembere, pasina chaunga, pasina bongozozo;
Acts 24:19 vanofanira kuva pano pamberi penyu va<transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>pe mhosva kana vane chekupokana neni;
Acts 24:20 kana ivo pachavo ngavareve vamene, kuti vakawana chii chisakarurama mandiri, pandakamira pamberi pedare remakurukota,
Acts 24:21 kunze kweshoko iri rimwe, randakadanidzira ndimire pakati pavo rekuti: Maererano nekumuka kwevakafa ini ndinotongwa nemwi nhasi. <div eID="gen1258" type="x-p"/>
Acts 24:22 Asi Ferikisi wakati anzwa zvinhu izvi achiziva zvakanyanya zvenzira iyo akambovamisa, achiti: Kana Risiasi mutungamiri wechuru aburukira <transChange type="added">pano</transChange>, ndichanyatsoongorora zviri maererano nemwi;
Acts 24:23 ndokuraira mukuru wezana kuti achengete Pauro, uye ave nerusununguko, uye kuti varege kudzivisa umwe wevekwake kushumira kana kumushanyira.
Acts 24:24 Zvino shure kwemamwe mazuva, Ferikisi wakasvika nemukadzi wake Drusira muJudhakadzi, akatuma kunodana Pauro, akamunzwa pamusoro perutendo kuna Kristu.
Acts 24:25 Zvino wakati achataura zvekururama nezvekuzvidzora uye zvekutonga kunouya, Ferikisi akatya akapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Enda zvaikozvino; kana ndikazova nenguva yakafanira, ndichakudana;
Acts 24:26 panguva iyoyo waitarisirawo kuti mari ichapiwa kwaari naPauro, kuti amusunungure; naizvozvo wakamudanawo kazhinji achitaura naye.
Acts 24:27 Asi makore maviri akati azadziswa, Ferikisi akagamuchira waimutevera Pokio Fesitasi; Ferikisi akada kufadza VaJudha akasiya Pauro akasungwa. <chapter eID="Acts.24"/><div eID="gen1259" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1256" type="section"/>
Acts 25:0 <div sID="gen1260" type="section"/> <chapter n="25" osisID="Acts.25" sID="Acts.25"/>  <div sID="gen1261" type="x-p"/>
Acts 25:1 Zvino Fesitasi wakati asvika padunhu iro, shure kwemazuva matatu akakwira kuJerusarema achibva Kesariya.
Acts 25:2 Zvino mupristi mukuru nevakuru veVaJudha vakamhan'arira Pauro kwaari, vakamukumbirisa,
Acts 25:3 vachikumbira nyasha dzinopikisana naye, kuti amudanire kuJerusarema, vakavandira kuti vamuuraye panzira.
Acts 25:4 Asi Fesitasi wakapindura, kuti Pauro wakachengetwa paKesariya, uye kuti iye amene wakange okurumidza kuenda<transChange type="added">ko</transChange>.
Acts 25:5 Akati: Naizvozvo avo vanokwanisa pakati penyu ngavaburuke ne<transChange type="added">ni</transChange>; kana pane chisina kururama kumurume uyu, ngaamupe mhosva. <div eID="gen1261" type="x-p"/>
Acts 25:6 Wakati agara pakati pavo mazuva anopfuura gumi, wakaburukira Kesariya; chifume agara pachigaro chekutonga akaraira kuti Pauro auiswe.
Acts 25:7 Zvino wakati asvika, VaJudha vakaburuka vachibva kuJerusarema vakamira vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>komba, vachiuisa mhosva zhinji uye dzinorema pana Pauro, dzavakange vasingagoni kusimbisa,
Acts 25:8 iye achizvidavirira akati: Kumurairo weVaJudha, kana kutembere, kana kuna Kesari handina kutadza chinhu.
Acts 25:9 Asi Fesitasi achida kufadza VaJudha, wakapindura Pauro akati: Unoda here kukwira kuJerusarema, unotongwako pamusoro pezvinhu izvi pamberi pangu?
Acts 25:10 Asi Pauro akati: Ndimire pamberi pechigaro chekutonga chaKesari, pandinofanira kutongwa; kuVaJudha handina kuita zvisakarurama, sezvamunozivisisa imwiwo.
Acts 25:11 Nokuti kana ndakatadza uye ndakaita chinhu chakafanira rufu, handirambi kufa; asi kana pasina chinhu chezvinhu zvavanondipira mhosva ivo, hakuna munhu anogona kundikumikidza kwavari pachena. Ndinoikwidza kuna Kesari.
Acts 25:12 Ipapo Fesitasi ataurirana nedare remakurukota, akapindura <transChange type="added">akati</transChange>: Waikwidza kuna Kesari? Kuna Kesari uchaenda. <div eID="gen1262" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1260" type="section"/>
Acts 25:13 Zvino mamwe mazuva akati apfuura, mambo Agripa naBhenike vakasvika kuKesariya kuzokwazisa Fesitasi.
Acts 25:14 Vakati vagarako mazuva mazhinji, Fesitasi akarondedzera zviri maererano naPauro kuna mambo, achiti: Kune umwe murume wakasiiwa naFerikisi ari musungwa,
Acts 25:15 wandakati pandakange ndiri kuJerusarema, vapristi vakuru nevakuru veVaJudha vakamumhan'arira, vachikumbira mutongo unopokana naye.
Acts 25:16 Vandakapindura, kuti haisi tsika yeVaRoma kukumikidza pachena chero munhu kurufu, uyo anopiwa mhosva asati ambotarisana nevanomupa mhosva, akagamuchira mukana wekuzvipindurira maererano nemhosva.
Acts 25:17 Naizvozvo vakati vaungana pano, pasina kunonoka, ne<transChange type="added">zuva</transChange> raitevera ndakagara pachigaro chekutonga, ndikaraira kuti murume auiswe.
Acts 25:18 Vamhan'ari vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>simukira vakasamupa mhosva yezvandaifungira ini,
Acts 25:19 asi vaiva nezvimwe zvavaimupikisa maererano nechitendero chavo, uye zveumwe Jesu wakange afa, Pauro waaiti mupenyu.
Acts 25:20 Zvino ini zvandakange ndisina chokwadzi maererano negakava rakadai, ndakati anoda kuenda kuJerusasrema here, anotongwa ikoko pamusoro pezvinhu izvi.
Acts 25:21 Pauro wakati aikwidza kuti achengeterwe mutongo wamambo mukuru, ndakaraira kuti achengetwe, kusvikira ndichimutumira kuna Kesari.
Acts 25:22 Agripa ndokuti kuna Fesitasi: Neni ndinoda kunzwa munhu uyu. Iye akati: Mangwana muchamunzwa. <div eID="gen1264" type="x-p"/>
Acts 25:23 Naizvozvo chifume, Agripa wakati asvika naBhenike, vachionekera kwazvo, vakapinda mumba mekutambira mhosva, nevatungamiriri vezvuru, nevarume vakuru veguta, Fesitasi araira, vakauya naPauro.
Acts 25:24 Zvino Fesitasi akati: Mambo Agripa, nevarume vese vari pano nesu, munoona uyu, chaunga chese cheVaJudha wachakandikumbira zvese paJerusarema nepano, vachidanidzira kuti haafaniri kuramba achirarama.
Acts 25:25 Asi ini ndakati ndawana kuti haana kuita chinhu chakafanira rufu, uye kuti iye pachake waikwidza kuna mambo mukuru, ndagura kumutumira.
Acts 25:26 Asi handina chinhu chakasimba chandinganyorera ishe pamusoro pake. Naizvozvo ndauya naye pamberi penyu, uye zvikuru pamberi penyu, mambo Agripa, kuti <transChange type="added">ma</transChange>muongorora, ndingava nechandinganyora.
Acts 25:27 Nokuti ndinoona zvisina musoro kutuma musungwa, pasina kutaridzwawo mhosva dzakanangana naye. <chapter eID="Acts.25"/><div eID="gen1265" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1263" type="section"/>
Acts 26:0 <div sID="gen1266" type="section"/> <chapter n="26" osisID="Acts.26" sID="Acts.26"/>  <div sID="gen1267" type="x-p"/>
Acts 26:1 Zvino Agripa akati kuna Pauro: Unotenderwa kuzvitaurira. Ipapo Pauro akatandavadza ruoko, akazvipindurira <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>:
Acts 26:2 Pane zvese zvandakamhan'arirwa neVaJudha, mambo Agripa, ndinoona ndichifara kuti ndodozvidavirira pamberi penyu nhasi;
Acts 26:3 zvikuru nokuti ndinoziva kuti mune ruzivo rwetsika dzese nemakakava ari pakati peVaJudha; naizvozvo ndinokukumbirai, kuti mundinzwe nemoyo murefu.
Acts 26:4 Naizvozvo mufambiro wangu kubva paudiki, waiva kubva pakutanga pakati perudzi rwangu paJerusarema, VaJudha vese vanoziva,
Acts 26:5 vaindiziva kubva pakutanga kana vachida kupupura, kuti nenzira yakasimba yeboka rechitendero chedu ndairarama ndiri muFarisi.
Acts 26:6 Uye ikozvino ndimire ndichitongwa nekuda kwetariro yechivimbiso chakaitwa naMwari kumadzibaba,
Acts 26:7 marudzi edu gumi nemaviri achishumira akasimba siku nesikati vachitarisira kusvika pachiri. Nekuda kwetariro iyi, mambo Agripa, ndinopiwa mhosva neVaJudha.
Acts 26:8 Sei zvichifungwa kuti zvinhu zvisingatendeseki kwamuri, kana Mwari achimutsa vakafa?
Acts 26:9 Naizvozvo ini ndaifunga ndomene kuti ndinofanira kuita zvinhu zvizhinji zvinopesana nezita raJesu weNazareta;
Acts 26:10 neni zvandakaita muJerusarema, uye ini ndakapfigira vazhinji vevatsvene mumatirongo, ndagamuchira simba kubva kuvapristi vakuru; nepavaiurawa ndai<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>sarudza.
Acts 26:11 Uye ndaivaranga kazhinji mumasinagoge ese, ndichi<transChange type="added">va</transChange>roverera kuti vanyombe; zvino ndichinyanya kuvapengera, ndaka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>shusha kusvikira nekumaguta ekunze.
Acts 26:12 Ndipo neni ndichienda kuDhamasiko nesimba uye nekutumwa kubva kuvapristi vakuru,
Acts 26:13 pamasikati makuru, mambo, ndakaona munzira chiedza chichibva kudenga, chaikunda kupenya kwezuva, chichipenya chakandipoteredza nevaifamba neni.
Acts 26:14 Zvino takati tese tawira pasi pavhu, ndakanzwa izwi richitaura kwandiri richiti nerurimi rwechiHebheru: Sauro, Sauro, unondishushirei? Zvinokuremera kukavana nezvibayo.
Acts 26:15 Zvino ini ndikati: Ndimwi ani, Ishe? Akatiwo: Ndini Jesu waunoshusha iwe.
Acts 26:16 Asi simuka, uye umire netsoka dzako; nokuti ndazviratidzira izvi kwauri, ndikuite mushumiri nechapupu zvese chezvinhu zvawakaona nezvandichazviratidza nazvo kwauri,
Acts 26:17 ndichikununura kuvanhu nevahedheni, vandinokutumira kwavari ikozvino,
Acts 26:18 kusvinudza meso avo, neku<transChange type="added">va</transChange>tendeusa kubva murima <transChange type="added">vaende</transChange> kuchiedza, nepasimba raSatani <transChange type="added">vaende</transChange> kuna Mwari, kuti vagamuchire kanganwiro yezvivi, uye nhaka pakati pevakaitwa vatsvene nerutendo rwuri mandiri.
Acts 26:19 Naizvozvo, mambo Agripa, handina kuramba kuteerera chiratidzo chekudenga;
Acts 26:20 asi ndakaparidza kutanga kune veDhamasiko neveJerusarema, nekudunhu rese reJudhiya, nekuvahedheni, kuti vatendeuke, uye vadzokere kuna Mwari, vaite mabasa akafanira kutendeuka.
Acts 26:21 Nekuda kwezvinhu izvi VaJudha vakandibata mutembere, vakaidza ku<transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>uraya.
Acts 26:22 Naizvozvo ndawana rubatsiro kubva kuna Mwari, ndakamira kusvikira zuva rino, ndichipupura kuvadiki nevakuru, ndisingarevi zvimwe zvinhu kunze kweizvo vaporofita naMozisi zvavakataura kuti zvichaitika,
Acts 26:23 kuti Kristu wakafanira kutambudzika, <transChange type="added">uye</transChange> kuti ari wekutanga kumuka kuvakafa, achaparidza chiedza kuvanhu ava nekuvahedheni. <div eID="gen1267" type="x-p"/>
Acts 26:24 Zvino wakati achazvidavirira zvinhu izvi, Fesitasi akati nenzwi guru: Pauro, unopenga; kudzidza kukuru kunokupenza.
Acts 26:25 Asi wakati: Handipengi, Fesitasi changamire; asi ndinodanidzira mashoko echokwadi uye euchenjeri.
Acts 26:26 Nokuti mambo vanoziva zvezvinhu izvi <transChange type="added">ivo</transChange> vandinotaura pamberi pavowo ndisingatyi; nokuti ndine chokwadi kuti hapana chimwe chezvinhu izvi chakavanzika kwavari, nokuti chinhu ichi hachina kuitwa pachikona.
Acts 26:27 Mambo Agripa, munotenda vaporofita here? Ndinoziva kuti munotenda.
Acts 26:28 Agripa ndokuti kuna Pauro: Wasara padiki wandipwisa kuva muKristu.
Acts 26:29 Pauro ndokuti: Ndinoshuva kuna Mwari, kunyange nediki uye nehuru musava imwi mega, asi nevese vanondinzwa nhasi, vave vakadai sezvandiri ini, kunze kwezvisungo izvi.
Acts 26:30 Zvino wakati ataura zvinhu izvi, mambo akasimuka, nemutungamiriri, naBhenike, nevakange vagere navo;
Acts 26:31 vakati vabuda vakataurirana, vachiti: Munhu uyu haaiti chinhu chakafanira rufu kana zvisungo.
Acts 26:32 Agripa ndokuti kuna Fesitasi: Munhu uyu ungadai asunungurwa dai asina kuikwidza kuna Kesari.  <chapter eID="Acts.26"/><div eID="gen1268" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1266" type="section"/>
Acts 27:0 <div sID="gen1269" type="section"/> <chapter n="27" osisID="Acts.27" sID="Acts.27"/>  <div sID="gen1270" type="x-p"/>
Acts 27:1 Zvino kwakati kwatemwa kuti tiende kuItaria nechikepe, vakakumikidza Pauro nevamwewo vasungwa kumukuru wezana wainzi Juriasi, wehondo yamambo mukuru.
Acts 27:2 Zvino takati tapinda muchikepe cheAdhiramitiyamu, chaiva choda kuenda nemugungwa tichitevedza nzvimbo dzeAsia, tikatanga kufamba nechikepe, Arisitako muMakedhonia weTesaronika anesu.
Acts 27:3 Chifume tikasvika paSidhoni; Juriasi akabata Pauro zvakanaka, aka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>tendera kuti aende kushamwari, kuti abatsirwe.
Acts 27:4 Takati tabva ipapo nechikepe tikapfuura takadzikatirwa neSaipuresi, nokuti mhepo yai<transChange type="added">ti</transChange>pikisa,
Acts 27:5 tikati tayambuka gungwa rakatevedza Kirikia nePamufiriya, takasvika paMaira yeRisia.
Acts 27:6 Ipapo mukuru wezana akawana chikepe cheAreksandiria chinoenda kuItaria, ndokutipinza machiri.
Acts 27:7 Zvino takati tananaira nechikepe mazuva mazhinji, tikasvika pakatarisana neKinido nemutsutsururu, mhepo isingatitenderi, tikaburuka takatevedza Kirete, kwakatarisana neSarimoni;
Acts 27:8 tikapapfuura nemutsutsururu tikasvika pane imwe nzvimbo panonzi Zororo Rakanaka; pedo naro paiva neguta Rasea. <div eID="gen1270" type="x-p"/>
Acts 27:9 Zvino nguva huru yakati yapfuura, nekufamba nechikepe ikozvino kwava nenjodzi, nokuti kutsanyawo kwakange kwatopfuura, Pauro aka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>yambira,
Acts 27:10 achiti kwavari: Varume, ndinoona kuti rwendo rwuchava nekukuvara nekurasikirwa kuzhinji, zvisati zviri zvemutoro nechikepe chete, asi nekweupenyu hwedu.
Acts 27:11 Asi mukuru wezana wakatenda mufambisi wechikepe nemwene wechikepe kupfuura zvinhu zvakarehwa naPauro.
Acts 27:12 Zvino sezvo zororo rakange risina kunaka kugarwa muchando, vazhinji vakayambira kuti pabviwe, zvimwe vangagona kusvika kuFenikisi vagare<transChange type="added">ko</transChange> muchando, ndiro zororo reKirete, rakange rakatarira kuchamhembe kwakadziva kumavirira nekumaodzanyemba akadziva kumavirira. <div eID="gen1271" type="x-p"/>
Acts 27:13 Zvino mhepo yechamhembe yakati ichifefetera, vakafunga kuti vawana vavariro <transChange type="added">yavo</transChange>, vakabvisa zvipingo <transChange type="added">zvechikepe</transChange>, vakatevedza pedo neKirete nechikepe.
Acts 27:14 Asi pasina kupfuura <transChange type="added">nguva</transChange> huru mhepo ine simba yainzi Yurokiridhoni, yakachirova;
Acts 27:15 zvino chikepe chakati chabatwa, chisingagoni kumirisana nemhepo, tikarega tikakukurwa.
Acts 27:16 Zvino takatevedza zasi kwechimwe chiwi chidiki chinonzi Kraudha, tikakwanisa kubata chikepe nemutsutsururu;
Acts 27:17 chavakati vachisimudza, vakashandisa zvibatsiro, vachisunga chikepe nepasi; vachitya kuti vacharasikira paSetisi, vakaderedza seiri, ndokukukurwa saizvozvo.
Acts 27:18 Zvino tichatambudzwa kwazvo nedutu remhepo, chifume vakabudisa nhumbi kunze;
Acts 27:19 uye pa<transChange type="added">zuva</transChange> retatu, takarasa zvombo zvechikepe nemaoko edu pachedu.
Acts 27:20 Zvino kwakati kusina kuonekwa zuva kana nyeredzi kwemazuva mazhinji, nedutu risati riri diki remhepo richisimba, kubva ipapo tariro yese yekuti tichaponeswa ikatorwa. <div eID="gen1272" type="x-p"/>
Acts 27:21 Zvino yakati yava nguva refu vasingadyi, ipapo Pauro akamira pakati pavo, akati: Haiwa, varume, mungadai makanditeerera mukasabva paKirete, mukapukunyuka kukuvara uku nekurasikirwa.
Acts 27:22 Asi ikozvino ndinokukurudzirai kuti mutsunge moyo; nokuti hakungavi nekurasikirwa neupenyu pakati penyu, asi kwechikepe.
Acts 27:23 Nokuti usiku huno kwakamira neni mutumwa waMwari, wandiri wake, newandinoshumira,
Acts 27:24 achiti: Usatya Pauro; unofanira kumira pamberi paKesari; zvino tarira, Mwari wakupa vese vanofamba newe muchikepe.
Acts 27:25 Naizvozvo varume tsungai moyo; nokuti ndinotenda kuna Mwari kuti zvichava saizvozvi senzira yandakaudzwa nayo.
Acts 27:26 Asi tinofanira kurasirwa pane chimwe chiwi. <div eID="gen1273" type="x-p"/>
Acts 27:27 Zvino usiku hwegumi neuna hwakati hwasvika, tichangomveeswa muAdhira, panenge pakati peusiku, vafambisi vechikepe vakafunga kuti imwe nyika yoswedera kwavari;
Acts 27:28 vakakanda gavi rekuyera kudzika vakawana mafadomi* makumi maviri; vakati vapfuura zvishoma, vakakandazve gavi rekuyera kudzika, vakawana mafadomi gumi nemashanu;
Acts 27:29 zvino vakatya kuti zvimwe tichawira pamabwe, vakakanda zvipingo zvina neshure kwechikepe, vakashuva kuedza.
Acts 27:30 Zvino vafambisi vechikepe vakati vachitsvaka kutiza muchikepe, vaburusira igwa mugungwa, vachiita sevanenge vokanda zvipingo mberi kwechikepe,
Acts 27:31 Pauro akati kumukuru wezana nekumauto: Kana ava vakasagara muchikepe, imwi hamugoni kuponeswa.
Acts 27:32 Ipapo mauto akagura mabote egwa, ndokurirega rikawa. <div eID="gen1274" type="x-p"/>
Acts 27:33 Zvino kwakati koedza, Pauro akakumbirisa vese kuti vadye, achiti: Nhasi izuva regumi nechina ramakagarira muchitsanya, musingadyi chinhu.
Acts 27:34 Saka ndinokukumbirisai kuti mudye; nokuti ndezveruponeso rwenyu; nokuti hakuna ruvhudzi rwuchawa pamusoro weumwe wenyu.
Acts 27:35 Wakati areva zvinhu izvi, atora chingwa, akavonga kuna Mwari pamberi pavo vese, akati a<transChange type="added">chi</transChange>medura akatanga kudya.
Acts 27:36 Zvino vakatsunga moyo vese, uye ivo vakadya.
Acts 27:37 Zvino isu, mweya yese yaiva muchikepe, taiva mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevatanhatu.
Acts 27:38 Zvino vakati vaguta kudya vakarerusa chikepe, vachikanda zviyo kunze mugungwa. <div eID="gen1275" type="x-p"/>
Acts 27:39 Kwakati kwaedza, vakasaziva nyika; asi vakaona rimwe mhenderekedzo rekuzorora raiva nemahombekombe ejecha, vakarangana kana vaigona, kuti vasundire chikepe pariri.
Acts 27:40 Zvino vakagura zvipingo, vaka<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>siya mugungwa, nenguva iyoyo vakasunungura zvisungo, vakasimudzira seiri repamberi kumhepo, vakaruramira kumahombekombe.
Acts 27:41 Zvino vakati vachiwira panzvimbo pamasanganirano emakungwa, vakagumhirisa chikepe pasi; muromo ukabatira ndokurambira usingazununguki, asi rutivi rweshure rukavhunika nesimba remafungu.
Acts 27:42 Zvino zano remauto rekuti vauraye vasungwa, kuti zvimwe vamwe vangashambira vakatiza.
Acts 27:43 Asi mukuru wezana achida kuponesa Pauro, akavadzivisa pazvinangwa <transChange type="added">zvavo</transChange>, akaraira kuti vanogona kushambira vatange kuzviwisira mugungwa, vaende kunyika;
Acts 27:44 uye vakasara, vamwe pamatanda, vamwe pane zvimwe <transChange type="added">zvipenga</transChange> zvechikepe. Saizvozvowo zvakaitika kuti vese vakasvika kunyika vari vapenyu.  <chapter eID="Acts.27"/><div eID="gen1276" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1269" type="section"/>
Acts 28:0 <div sID="gen1277" type="section"/> <chapter n="28" osisID="Acts.28" sID="Acts.28"/>  <div sID="gen1278" type="x-p"/>
Acts 28:1 Zvino vakati vapona, ipapo vakaziva kuti chiwi chinonzi Merita.
Acts 28:2 Zvino vatorwa vakatiitira unyoro husina kujairika; nokuti vakavesa moto, vakatigamuchira tese, nekuda kwemvura yaitanga uye nekuda kwechando.
Acts 28:3 Zvino Pauro wakati aunganidza svinga rehuni, akaisa pamoto, kwakabuda chiva kubva murudziyira, chikakwinyira paruoko rwake.
Acts 28:4 Zvino vatorwa vakati vachiona chikara chakaremberera paruoko rwake, vakataurirana <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Zvirokwazvo munhu uyu imhondi, iye kunyange apukunyuka gungwa, kururama hakumutenderi kurarama.
Acts 28:5 Iye ndokuzuzira chikara mumoto, akasambokuvara.
Acts 28:6 Zvino vakatarisira kuti iye achazvimba, kana kuwira pasi pakarepo akafa; asi vakati vatarira nguva refu, vakaona pasina chinhu chisina kujairika chaitika kwaari, vakashandura fungwa dzavo voti iye ndimwari. <div eID="gen1278" type="x-p"/>
Acts 28:7 Zvino panharaunda yenzvimbo iyo paiva neminda yemukuru wechiwi wainzi Pubhirio; iye wakatigamuchira akatigarisa zvakanaka mazuva matatu.
Acts 28:8 Zvino zvakaitika kuti baba vaPubhirio vakange varere vakabatwa nefivhiri nemudumbu weropa; kwavari Pauro kwaakapinda, akanyengetera, akaisa maoko pamusoro pavo, akavaporesa.
Acts 28:9 Naizvozvo izvi zvakati zvaitika, vamwewo vaiva nezvirwere pachiwi vakaswedera ndokuporeswa;
Acts 28:10 ivo vakatikudzawo nerukudzo ruzhinji, uye toenda nechikepe, vakakwidza zvinhu zvaidikanwa. <div eID="gen1279" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1277" type="section"/>
Acts 28:11 Zvino shure kwemwedzi mitatu takabva nechikepe cheArekizandiria, chakange chagara muchando pachiwi, chaiva nechiratidzo <transChange type="added">chekuti</transChange> Dhiosikuri*.
Acts 28:12 Zvino tasvika paSirakuse takagara mazuva matatu.
Acts 28:13 Tabvapo tikatenderera tikasvika kuRegiomu; zvino shure kwezuva rimwe mhepo yechamhembe ikasimuka, zuva repiri tikasvika muPuteori;
Acts 28:14 matakawana hama, tikakumbirwa kugara nadzo mazuva manomwe; saizvozvowo takaenda kuRoma.
Acts 28:15 Zvino kubva ipapo hama dzakati dzanzwa nezvedu, dzikabuda kuzotichingamidza kudzamara Apio Foramu ne<transChange type="added">pa</transChange>Dzimba Dzevaeni Nhatu; ivo Pauro vaakati achiona, akavonga Mwari, akatsunga moyo.
Acts 28:16 Zvino takati tasvika kuRoma, mukuru wezana akakumikidza vasungwa kumutungamiriri wevarindi; asi Pauro wakatenderwa kugara ari ega, nemuuto anomurinda. <div eID="gen1281" type="x-p"/>
Acts 28:17 Zvino zvikaitika shure kwemazuva matatu, kuti Pauro wakadanira vaiva vakuru veVaJudha pamwe; zvino vakati vaungana, akati kwavari: Varume hama, ini ndisina kuita chinhu chinopesana nerudzi kana tsika dzemadzibaba, ndiri musungwa ndabva kuJerusarema ndakumikidzwa pamaoko eVaRoma;
Acts 28:18 ivo vakati vandiongorora vakada ku<transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>sunungura, nokuti pakange pasina chikonzero cherufu kwandiri.
Acts 28:19 Asi VaJudha vakaramba, ndikarovererwa kuikwidza kuna Kesari, kwete kuti ndaiva nechinhu chekumhan'arira rudzi rwangu.
Acts 28:20 Naizvozvo nekuda kwechikonzero ichi ndakudanai kuti ndi<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>one<transChange type="added">i</transChange>, nditaure ne<transChange type="added">mwi;</transChange> nokuti ndakamoneredzwa neketani iyi nekuda kwetariro yaIsraeri.
Acts 28:21 Zvino vakati kwaari: Isu hatina kugamuchira tsamba kubva kuJudhiya pamusoro pako, uye hakuna umwe wehama, wakati asvika, akatipira kana kutaura chinhu chakaipa pamusoro pako.
Acts 28:22 Asi tinoda kunzwa newe zvaunofunga; nokuti maererano nebato iri tinoziva kuti rinopikiswa kwese-kwese.
Acts 28:23 Zvino vakati vamutarira zuva, vazhinji vakauya kwaari kuimba yevaenzi; akavadudzira achivapupurira ushe hwaMwari, akavagombedzera zviri maererano naJesu, zvese kubva pamurairo waMozisi nevaporofita, kubva mangwanani kusvikira madekwani.
Acts 28:24 Zvino vamwe vakatenda zvinhu zvakataurwa, asi vamwe vakasatenda.
Acts 28:25 Zvino zvavakange vasingawirirani pachavo, vakaenda, Pauro ataura shoko rimwe chete rekuti: Mweya Mutsvene wakataura zvakanaka naIsaya muporofita kumadzibaba edu,
Acts 28:26 achiti: Enda kurudzi urwu ugoti: Nekunzwa muchanzwa, uye hamungatongonzwisisi; nekuona muchaona, uye hamungatongoonesesi.
Acts 28:27 Nokuti moyo wevanhu ava wakasindimadzwa, uye nenzeve vanonzwa nemutsutsururu, nemeso avo vakavhara; <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> zvimwe vangaona nemeso, nekunzwa nenzeve, nekunzwisisa nemoyo, zvino vatendeuke, ndigovaporesa.
Acts 28:28 Naizvozvo ngazvizikanwe kwamuri, kuti ruponeso rwaMwari rwunotumirwa kuvahedheni, ivo vachanzwawo.
Acts 28:29 Zvino wakati ataura zvinhu izvi, VaJudha vakaenda, vachiita nharo huru pakati pavo. <div eID="gen1282" type="x-p"/>
Acts 28:30 Pauro akagara makore maviri agere muimba yake pachake yaairipira mari, uye akagamuchira vese vaipinda kwaari,
Acts 28:31 achiparidza ushe hwaMwari, nekudzidzisa zviri maererano naIshe Jesu Kristu, neushingi hwese, pasina kudziviswa. <div eID="gen1283" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1280" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Acts.28"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1120" osisID="Acts" type="book"/>
Romans 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Rom" sID="gen1284" type="book"/>   <milestone n="VAROMA" type="x-usfm-h"/>
Romans 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Rom.1" sID="Rom.1"/>
Romans 1:1 Pauro, muranda waJesu Kristu, wakadanwa <transChange type="added">kuva</transChange> muapositori, atsaurirwa evhangeri yaMwari,
Romans 1:2 (yaakagara avimbisa nevaporofita vake mumagwaro matsvene),
Romans 1:3 maererano neMwanakomana wake, wakabva kumbeu yaDhavhidhi zvichienderana nenyama,
Romans 1:4 wakatemerwa <transChange type="added">kuva</transChange> Mwanakomana waMwari nesimba, maererano neMweya weutsvene, nekumuka kwevakafa, <transChange type="added">ndiye</transChange> Jesu Kristu Ishe wedu;
Romans 1:5 watakagamuchira naye nyasha nevuapositori kuti kuve kuteerera kwerutendo pakati pevahedheni vese, nekuda kwezita rake,
Romans 1:6 vamuri pakati pavo nemwi, vakadanwa vaJesu Kristu;
Romans 1:7 kune vese vari muRoma, vadikanwi vaMwari, vakadanwa <transChange type="added">kuva</transChange> vatsvene: Nyasha kwamuri nerugare rwunobva kuna Mwari Baba vedu naIshe Jesu Kristu. <div eID="gen1286" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1285" type="section"/>
Romans 1:8 Kutangawo ndinovonga Mwari wangu nemuna Jesu Kristu pamusoro penyu mese, kuti rutendo rwenyu rwunoparidzirwa panyika yese.
Romans 1:9 Nokuti Mwari chapupu changu, wandinoshumira pamweya wangu muevhangeri yeMwanakomana wake, kuti handiregi kukurangarirai,
Romans 1:10 panguva dzese muminyengetero yangu ndinokumbira, kuti kana zvichigoneka nechido chaMwari, ndibudirire kuuya kwamuri pakuguma.
Romans 1:11 Nokuti ndinoshuva kukuonai, kuti ndikupei chimwe chipo chemweya, kuti musimbiswe,
Romans 1:12 ndiko kuti, ndinyaradzwe pamwe pakati penyu, nerutendo rweumwe neumwe, zvese rwenyu nerwangu.
Romans 1:13 Zvino handidi kuti musaziva, hama, kuti kazhinji ndaizvipira kuuya kwamuri (ndokudziviswa kusvikira ikozvino), kuti ndive nechimwe chibereko pakati penyuwo, sepakati pevamwe vahedheniwo.
Romans 1:14 Ndine ngava kuVaGiriki nekuvatorwawo, kuvakachenjera nekune vasina kuchenjerawo;
Romans 1:15 saizvozvo sezviri mandiri ndakagadzirira kuparidza evhangeri kwamuriwo <transChange type="added">imwi</transChange> muri paRoma. <div eID="gen1288" type="x-p"/>
Romans 1:16 Nokuti handinyadzisvi neevhangeri yaKristu; nokuti isimba raMwari <transChange type="added">rinoendesa</transChange> kuruponeso kune umwe neumwe anotenda, kumuJudha pakutanga, nekumuGirikiwo.
Romans 1:17 Nokuti kururama kwaMwari kunoratidzwa mairi kubva parutendo kusvika parutendo; sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Asi wakarurama achararama nerutendo. <div eID="gen1289" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1287" type="section"/>
Romans 1:18 Nokuti kutsamwa kwaMwari kunoratidzwa kubva kudenga pamusoro pekusada Mwari kwese nekusarurama kwevanhu vanodzivisa chokwadi nekusarurama;
Romans 1:19 nokuti izvo zvinozikanwa pamusoro paMwari zviri pachena pakati pavo; nokuti Mwari waka<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ratidza kwavari.
Romans 1:20 Nokuti zvisingaonekwi zvake, kubva pakusikwa kwenyika, zvinonzwisisika pazvinhu zvakaitwa, zvinooneswa pachena, simba rake rekusingaperi pamwe neuMwari <transChange type="added">hwake</transChange>, kuti vasava nemanzvengero;
Romans 1:21 nokuti vakati vaziva Mwari, havana ku<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>rumbidza saMwari kana kuvonga, asi vakava vasina maturo mumirangariro yavo, nemoyo wavo usinganzwisisi wakaitwa mutema.
Romans 1:22 Vachizvipupurira kuva vakachenjera vakava mapenzi,
Romans 1:23 uye vakashandurira kubwinya kwaMwari asingafi kumufananidzo wechifananidzo chemunhu anofa nekushiri nekuzvine makumbo mana nekuzvinokambaira.
Romans 1:24 Naizvozvowo Mwari wakavapa kutsvina kubudikidza nekuchiva kwemoyo yavo, kuti vazvidze miviri yavo pakati pavo;
Romans 1:25 avo vakashandurira chokwadi chaMwari kunhema, uye vakanamata nekushumira chisikwa kupfuura Musiki, iye anorumbidzwa nekusingaperi. Ameni.
Romans 1:26 Nekuda kweizvozvo Mwari wakavapa kukuchiva kunonyadzisa; nokuti kunyange vanhukadzi vavo vakashandura basa rechisikirwo rive rinopesana nechisikirwo;
Romans 1:27 uye saizvozvowo vanhurume vakasiya basa rechisikirwo kumunhukadzi, vakapiswa nekuchivana kwavo, vanhurume nevanhurume vachiita zvinonyadzisa vachigamuchira mukati mavo muripo wakafanira kurasika kwavo.
Romans 1:28 Uye zvavakaona zvisina kufanira kugara naMwari muruzivo, Mwari wakavapa kumurangariro wakaraswa, kuti vaite zvinhu zvisakafanira;
Romans 1:29 vakazadzwa nekusarurama kwese, ufeve, kuipa, ruchiva, unhubu, kuzara negodo, umhondi, gakava, kunyengera, utsotsi, vanoita makuhwa,
Romans 1:30 vacheri, vavengi vaMwari, vazvidzi, vadadi, vanozvikudza, vavambi vezvakaipa, vasingateereri vabereki,
Romans 1:31 vasinganzwisisi, vaputsi vesungano, vane utsinye, vasingaregereri, vasina tsitsi,
Romans 1:32 avo vanoti vachiziva murairo wekururama kwaMwari, kuti vanoita zvakadai vakafanirwa nerufu, havaiti izvo chete, asiwo vanotenderana nevanozviita. <chapter eID="Rom.1"/><div eID="gen1291" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1290" type="section"/>
Romans 2:0 <div sID="gen1292" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="Rom.2" sID="Rom.2"/>  <div sID="gen1293" type="x-p"/>
Romans 2:1 Naizvozvo hauna manzvengero, iwe munhu, upi neupi anotonga; nokuti neicho chaunotonga nacho umwe, unozvipa mhosva iwe, nokuti iwe unotonga unoita zvinhu zvakangodaro.
Romans 2:2 Asi tinoziva kuti kutonga kwaMwari kunoenderana nechokwadi pamusoro pevanoita zvinhu zvakadaro.
Romans 2:3 Zvino unofunga izvi, haiwa munhu anotonga vanoita zvinhu zvakadaro, uchiitawo zvakadaro, kuti iwe uchatiza kutonga kwaMwari here?
Romans 2:4 Kana unozvidza here fuma yenyasha dzake nemoyo murefu nemoyo munyoro, usingazivi kuti nyasha dzaMwari dzinokuisa pakutendeuka?
Romans 2:5 Asi neukukutu hwako nemoyo usingatendeuki unozvichengetera hasha nezuva rehasha nekuzarurwa kwekutonga kwakarurama kwaMwari,
Romans 2:6 iye achapa mubairo kune umwe neumwe maererano nemabasa ake;
Romans 2:7 upenyu husingaperi kune vanotsungirira pakuita kwakanaka vanotsvaka kubwinya nekukudzwa nekusafa;
Romans 2:8 asi kune vane nharo, uye vasingateereri chokwadi asi vanoteerera kusarurama, kuchava<transChange type="added">po</transChange> kutsamwa nehasha,
Romans 2:9 dambudziko nekumanikidzika, pamusoro pemweya umwe neumwe wemunhu anoita zvakaipa, pakutanga wemuJudha newemuGirikiwo;
Romans 2:10 asi kubwinya nerukudzo nerugare kune umwe neumwe anoita zvakanaka, kumuJudha pakutanga, nekumuGirikiwo;
Romans 2:11 nokuti hakuna rusarura rwemunhu kuna Mwari. <div eID="gen1293" type="x-p"/>
Romans 2:12 Nokuti vese vakatadza vasina murairo, vachapararawo vasina murairo; uye vese vakatadza mumurairo, vachatongwa nemurairo;
Romans 2:13 nokuti havasi vanzwi vemurairo vakarurama pamberi paMwari, asi vaiti vemurairo vachanzi vakarurama.
Romans 2:14 Nokuti kana vahedheni vasina murairo vachiita pachisikirwo zviri pamurairo, ivo, vasina murairo, ndivo murairo kwavari vamene;
Romans 2:15 vanoratidza basa remurairo wakanyorwa mumoyo yavo; hana yavo ichipupurawo, nemirangariro ichipa mhosva kanawo kuvapembedza pakati pavo,
Romans 2:16 nezuva Mwari raachatonga zvakavanzika zvevanhu, naJesu Kristu, maererano neevhangeri yangu. <div eID="gen1294" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1292" type="section"/>
Romans 2:17 Tarira iwe unonzi muJudha, uye unozembera pamurairo, unozvikudza muna Mwari,
Romans 2:18 uye unoziva chido <transChange type="added">chake,</transChange> nekugamuchira zvakanakisa, uchidzidziswa kubva pamurairo,
Romans 2:19 uye unozvivimba kuti iwe uri mutungamiriri wemapofu, chiedza chevari murima,
Romans 2:20 murairiri wemapenzi, mudzidzisi wevacheche, une chimiro cheruzivo nechechokwadi mumurairo;
Romans 2:21 naizvozvo iwe anodzidzisa umwe, hauzvidzidzisi here? Iwe anoparidza kuti usaba, unoba here?
Romans 2:22 Iwe anoti usapomba, unopomba here? Iwe anosema zvifananidzo, unopamba tembere here?
Romans 2:23 Iwe anozvirumbidza nemurairo, unoshoora Mwari nekudarika murairo here?
Romans 2:24 Nokuti zita raMwari rinonyombwa pakati pevahedheni nekuda kwenyu, sezvo zvakanyorwa.
Romans 2:25 Nokuti kudzingiswa kunobatsira zvirokwazvo, kana uchiita murairo; asi kana uri mudariki wemurairo, kudzingiswa kwako kwava kusadzingiswa.
Romans 2:26 Naizvozvo kana kusadzingiswa kuchichengeta zviga zvemurairo, kusadzingiswa kwake hakuverengwi kuti kudzingiswa here?
Romans 2:27 Nekusadzingiswa kwepachisikirwo, kana kuchizadzisa murairo, <transChange type="added">hakunga</transChange>kutongi here iwe mudariki wemurairo nerugwaro uye <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>kudzingiswa?
Romans 2:28 Nokuti haasi muJudha, ari <transChange type="added">muJudha</transChange> rwekunze, kana kudzingiswa kuri kwekunze panyama;
Romans 2:29 asi iye muJudha ari <transChange type="added">iye</transChange> makavanda, nekudzingiswa <transChange type="added">nde</transChange>kwemoyo mumweya, kwete murugwaro; ane kurumbidzwa kwake kusingabvi kuvanhu asi kuna Mwari.  <chapter eID="Rom.2"/><div eID="gen1296" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1295" type="section"/>
Romans 3:0 <div sID="gen1297" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="Rom.3" sID="Rom.3"/>  <div sID="gen1298" type="x-p"/>
Romans 3:1 Ko zvino muJudha ane pundutso yei, kana rubatsiro rwekudzingiswa <transChange type="added">nde</transChange>rwupi?
Romans 3:2 Zvizhinji nemutoo wese; nokuti pakutanga kuti vakabatiswa mashoko aMwari.
Romans 3:3 Nokuti ko kana vamwe vasina kutenda? Kusatenda kwavo kuchashayisa kutendeka kwaMwari maturo here?
Romans 3:4 Ngazvisadaro! Asi Mwari ngaave wechokwadi, asi munhu wese murevi wenhema, sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Kuti munzi makarurama pamashoko enyu, uye mukunde pakutongwa kwenyu.
Romans 3:5 Asi kana kusarurama kwedu kuchiratidza kururama kwaMwari, tichati chii? Kuti Mwari haana kururama here anodurura hasha? (Ndinotaura semunhu.)
Romans 3:6 Ngazvisadaro! Kana zvakadaro Mwari angagozotonga nyika sei?
Romans 3:7 Nokuti kana chokwadi chaMwari chakawanzwa nenhema dzangu parumbidzo yake, ini ndichiri kutongerweiwo semutadzi?
Romans 3:8 Uye zvikasadaro tichapomerwa zvakaipa, uye sezvinotaura vamwe kuti tinoti: Ngatiite zvakaipa kuti zvakanaka zviuye? Kuraswa kwavo kunova kwakarurama. <div eID="gen1298" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1297" type="section"/>
Romans 3:9 Ko zvino? Tiri nani here? Kwete nepadiki pese; nokuti tambopa mhosva vese VaJudha neVaGiriki kuti vese vari pasi pechivi,
Romans 3:10 sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: Hakuna wakarurama, kwete kunyange neumwe;
Romans 3:11 hakuna anonzwisisa, hakuna anotsvaka Mwari;
Romans 3:12 vese vakatsauka, vakava pamwe vasina maturo; hakuna anoita zvakanaka, hakuna kunyange neumwe;
Romans 3:13 huro yavo iguva rakashama; nendimi dzavo vakanyengera; uturu hwemhungu <transChange type="added">huri</transChange> pasi pemiromo yavo;
Romans 3:14 vemuromo wavo uzere nekutuka nekuvava;
Romans 3:15 tsoka dzavo dzinokurumidza kuteura ropa;
Romans 3:16 kuparadza nekutambudzika <transChange type="added">zviri</transChange> munzira dzavo,
Romans 3:17 uye nzira yerugare havana kuiziva;
Romans 3:18 kutya Mwari hakupo pamberi pemeso avo.
Romans 3:19 Zvino tinoziva kuti zvese murairo zvaunoreva, unozvireva kune vari pasi pemurairo; kuti muromo umwe neumwe udzivirwe, nenyika yese ive nemhosva kuna Mwari;
Romans 3:20 naizvozvo nemabasa emurairo hakuna nyama ichanzi yakarurama pamberi pake; nokuti nemurairo kune ruzivo rwechivi.
Romans 3:21 Asi ikozvino kururama kwaMwari kwakaratidzwa kunze kwemurairo, kuchipupurwa nemurairo nevaporofita;
Romans 3:22 ikowo kururama kwaMwari kubudikidza nerutendo rwaJesu Kristu kune vese nepamusoro pevese vanotenda; nokuti hapana musiyano;
Romans 3:23 nokuti vese vakatadza vakataira pakubwinya kwaMwari,
Romans 3:24 vachinzi vakarurama pachena nenyasha dzake kubudikidza nerudzikunuro rwuri muna Kristu Jesu;
Romans 3:25 iye Mwari waakagadza <transChange type="added">kuva</transChange> muripo wekuyananisa, nerutendo muropa rake, kuva chiratidzo chekururama kwake, nekusarangarira zvivi zvakaitwa kare mukuva nemoyo murefu kwaMwari;
Romans 3:26 kuti chive chiratidzo chekururama kwake panguva yaikozvino, kuti ave wakarurama uye kururamisa werutendo rwaJesu.
Romans 3:27 Naizvozvo kuzvikudza kuripi? Kwavharirwa kunze. Nemurairo upi? Wemabasa here? Kwete, asi nemurairo werutendo.
Romans 3:28 Naizvozvo tinogura kuti munhu anonzi wakarurama nerutendo, kunze kwemabasa emurairo.
Romans 3:29 Kuti <transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>Mwari weVaJudha vega here? Haasi wevahedheniwo here? Hongu wevahedheniwo;
Romans 3:30 Mwari zvaari zvirokwazvo mumwe, achati kudzingiswa kwakarurama kubva parutendo, nevasina kudzingiswa nerutendo.
Romans 3:31 Naizvozvo tinoshayisa maturo murairo nerutendo here? Ngazvisadaro! Asi tinosimbisa murairo.  <chapter eID="Rom.3"/><div eID="gen1300" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1299" type="section"/>
Romans 4:0 <div sID="gen1301" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="Rom.4" sID="Rom.4"/>  <div sID="gen1302" type="x-p"/>
Romans 4:1 Ko zvino tichati Abhurahama baba vedu wakawanei panyama?
Romans 4:2 Nokuti kana Abhurahama akanzi wakarurama nemabasa, ane kuzvikudza, asi kwete pamberi paMwari.
Romans 4:3 Nokuti rugwaro rwunoti kudini? <transChange type="added">Rwunoti</transChange>: Abhurahama wakatenda kuna Mwari, zvikaverengwa kwaari kuti kururama.
Romans 4:4 Asi kune anoshanda mubairo hauverengwi sewenyasha, asi sewengava.
Romans 4:5 Asi kune asingashandi, asi anotenda kuna iye anoshaisa mhosva asingadi Mwari, rutendo rwake rwunoverengerwa kuti kururama.
Romans 4:6 Uye sezvo Dhavhidhi achitsanangura kuropafadzwa kwemunhu, Mwari waanoverengera kururama kunze kwemabasa, <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>:
Romans 4:7 Vakaropafadzwa vane kudarika kwakakanganwirwa, uye vane zvivi zvakafukidzirwa.
Romans 4:8 Wakaropafadzwa munhu Ishe waasingatongoverengeri chivi.
Romans 4:9 Naizvozvo kuropafadzwa uku <transChange type="added">kuri</transChange> pamusoro pekudzingiswa here, kana pamusoro pekusadzingiswawo? Nokuti tinoti: Rutendo rwakaverengwa kuna Abhurahama kuti kururama.
Romans 4:10 Ko kwakaverengwa sei? Paakange ari mukudzingiswa here, kana mukusadzingiswa? Kwete mukudzingiswa, asi mukusadzingiswa.
Romans 4:11 Zvino wakagamuchira chiratidzo chekudzingiswa, mucherechedzo wekururama kwerutendo, <transChange type="added">rwaakange anarwo</transChange> mukusadzingiswa; kuti ave baba vevese vanotenda mukusadzingiswa, kuti kururama kuverengerwe kwavariwo;
Romans 4:12 uye baba vekudzingiswa kune avo vasiri vanobva mukudzingiswa chete, asi vanofambawo mumakwara erutendo rwababa vedu Abhurahama <transChange type="added">kwavaiva nako</transChange> mukusadzingiswa.
Romans 4:13 Nokuti chivimbiso hachina kuva kuna Abhurahama kana kumbeu yake kubudikidza nemurairo, chekuva mugari wenhaka yenyika, asi nekururama kwerutendo.
Romans 4:14 Nokuti kana ivo vanobva pamurairo <transChange type="added">vari</transChange> vagari venhaka, rutendo rwunoshaiswa maturo, nechivimbiso chinokoneswa;
Romans 4:15 nokuti murairo unouisa kutsamwa; nokuti pasina murairo, ha<transChange type="added">pana</transChange> kudarikawo.
Romans 4:16 Naizvozvo <transChange type="added">nde</transChange>zverutendo, kuti <transChange type="added">zvive</transChange> zvenyasha, kuti chivimbiso chisimbiswe kumbeu yese; isati iri yemurairo chete asi neiyo yerutendo rwaAbhurahama, anova baba vedu tese,
Romans 4:17 (sezvazvakanyorwa zvichinzi: Ndakakugadza <transChange type="added">uve</transChange> baba vemarudzi mazhinji) pamberi paiye waakatenda, <transChange type="added">iye</transChange> Mwari, anoraramisa vakafa, neanodana zvisipo sekunge zviripo.
Romans 4:18 Iye achipokana netariro wakatenda kutariro, kuti achava baba vemarudzi mazhinji, sezvakange zvataurwa <transChange type="added">kuti:</transChange> Ichaita saizvozvo mbeu yako.
Romans 4:19 Uye haana kushaiwa simba parutendo, haana kurangarira muviri wake womene wakange watofa, ava nemakore anenge zana, uye kufa kwechizvaro chaSara;
Romans 4:20 asi haana kuva nechokwadi nechivimbiso chaMwari nekusatenda, asi wakasimbiswa parutendo, achipa rumbidzo kuna Mwari,
Romans 4:21 achipwisa zvakazara kuti icho chaakavimbisa, wakange achigonawo kuchiita.
Romans 4:22 Zvino naizvozvo zvakaverengerwa kwaari kuti kururama.
Romans 4:23 Asi zvakange zvisina kunyorwa nekuda kwake ega, kuti zvakaverengerwa kwaari;
Romans 4:24 asi nekuda kweduwo, tichaverengerwa icho, tinotenda kune wakamutsa Jesu Ishe wedu kubva kuvakafa,
Romans 4:25 wakatengeswa nekuda kwezvitadzo zvedu, akamutswazve nekuda kwekunzi takarurama.  <chapter eID="Rom.4"/><div eID="gen1302" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1301" type="section"/>
Romans 5:0 <div sID="gen1303" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="Rom.5" sID="Rom.5"/>  <div sID="gen1304" type="x-p"/>
Romans 5:1 Naizvozvo zvatakanzi takarurama nerutendo, tine rugare kuna Mwari kubudikidza naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu,
Romans 5:2 watine mapindirowo naye nerutendo munyasha idzi dzatinomira madziri, tichizvikudza mutariro yekubwinya kwaMwari.
Romans 5:3 Zvisati zviri <transChange type="added">izvo</transChange> chetewo, asi tichizvikudzawo mumatambudziko, tichiziva kuti dambudziko rinouisa kutsungirira,
Romans 5:4 uye kutsungirira kutsiga, nekutsiga tariro;
Romans 5:5 uye tariro hainyadzisi, nokuti rudo rwaMwari rwakadirwa mumoyo yedu neMweya Mutsvene wakapiwa kwatiri.
Romans 5:6 Nokuti tichiri pakushaiwa simba, Kristu panguva yakafanira wakafira vasingadi Mwari.
Romans 5:7 Nokuti zvinorema kuti umwe afire wakarurama; nokuti zvimwe kungavapo kunyange angatsunga kufira wakanaka.
Romans 5:8 Asi Mwari anosimbisa rudo rwake amene kwatiri, kuti tichiri vatadzi Kristu wakatifira.
Romans 5:9 Naizvozvo zvikurusa, ikozvino zvatinonzi takarurama muropa rake, tichaponeswa naye pahasha.
Romans 5:10 Nokuti kana pataiva vavengi takayananiswa naMwari nerufu rweMwanakomana wake, kunyanya zvatakayananiswa tichaponeswa muupenyu hwake;
Romans 5:11 zvisati zviri <transChange type="added">izvozvo</transChange>wo chete, asi tinozvikudzawo muna Mwari kubudikidza naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, watakagamuchira ikozvino naye chiyananiso. <div eID="gen1304" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1303" type="section"/>
Romans 5:12 Naizvozvo, chivi sezvachakapinda munyika nemunhu umwe, nerufu <transChange type="added">rukapinda</transChange> nechivi, uye saizvozvo rufu rwakapfuurira kuvanhu vese, nokuti vese vakatadza;
Romans 5:13 nokuti kusvika murairo <transChange type="added">wavapo</transChange> chivi chakange chiripo panyika; nokuti chivi hachiverengerwi, pasina murairo,
Romans 5:14 asi rufu rwakabata ushe kubva kuna Adhamu kusvikira kuna Mozisi, kunyange pamusoro pevakange vasina kutadza zvakafanana sekudarika kwaAdhamu, anova mufananidzo waiye wakange achizouya.
Romans 5:15 Asi kwete sekudarika, zvakaitawo chipo chenyasha. Nokuti kana nekudarika kweumwe vazhinji vakafa, kunyanya kazhinji nyasha dzaMwari nechipo zvakawandira vazhinji nenyasha dzemunhu umwe, Jesu Kristu.
Romans 5:16 Uye chipo hachina kuita seumwe wakatadza; nokuti kutongwa kwakabva kuneumwe kuchienda mukupiwa mhosva, asi chipo chenyasha chinobva pazvitadzo zvizhinji chichienda mukushaiswa mhosva.
Romans 5:17 Nokuti kana nekudarika kweumwe rufu rwakatonga naiyeyu ega, kunyanya ivo vanogamuchira kuwanda kwenyasha nekwechipo chekururama vachatonga paupenyu naiyeyu umwe, Jesu Kristu.
Romans 5:18 Naizvozvo sezvo nekudarika kweumwe <transChange type="added">kutonga kwakauya</transChange> kuvanhu vese, mukupiwa mhosva, saizvozvowo nekururama kweumwe, <transChange type="added">nyasha</transChange> <transChange type="added">dzakauya</transChange> kuvanhu vese mukusapiwa mhosva kweupenyu.
Romans 5:19 Nokuti sezvo nekusateerera kwemunhu umwe vazhinji vakaitwa vatadzi, saizvozvowo nekuteerera kweumwe, vazhinji vachaitwa vakarurama.
Romans 5:20 Asi murairo wakapinda ukawedzera, kuti kudarika kuwande; asi chivi pachakawanda, nyasha dzakawanda nekupfuurisa;
Romans 5:21 kuti chivi sezvachakatonga murufu, saizvozvo nenyasha dzitonge nekururama kusvika kuupenyu husingaperi, naJesu Kristu Ishe wedu.  <chapter eID="Rom.5"/><div eID="gen1306" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1305" type="section"/>
Romans 6:0 <div sID="gen1307" type="section"/> <chapter n="6" osisID="Rom.6" sID="Rom.6"/>  <div sID="gen1308" type="x-p"/>
Romans 6:1 Zvino tichatii? Ticharambira muchivi kuti nyasha dziwande here?
Romans 6:2 Ngazvisadaro! Isu takafa kuchivi, ticharamba tichirarama sei machiri?
Romans 6:3 Kana hamuzivi here kuti isu tese takabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu Jesu, takabhabhatidzwa murufu rwake?
Romans 6:4 Naizvozvo takavigwa pamwe naye murufu nerubhabhatidzo; kuti sezvo Kristu akamutswa kubva kuvakafa nekubwinya kwaBaba, saizvozvo isuwo tifambe pautsva hweupenyu.
Romans 6:5 Nokuti kana takadzvarwa pamwe pakufanana kwerufu rwake, asi tichadarowo pakumuka <transChange type="added">kwake</transChange>;
Romans 6:6 tichiziva izvi, kuti munhu wedu wekare wakarovererwa pamwe <transChange type="added">naye</transChange>, kuti muviri wechivi uparadzwe, kuti isu tisachishumira chivi;
Romans 6:7 nokuti uyo wakafa wakasunungurwa pachivi.
Romans 6:8 Zvino kana takafa pamwe naKristu, tinotenda kuti tichararamawo pamwe naye;
Romans 6:9 tichiziva kuti Kristu amutswa kubva kuvakafa haafizve; rufu haruchina simba pamusoro pake.
Romans 6:10 Nokuti pakuti wakafa, wakafa kamwe kuchivi; zvino pakuti anorarama, anorarama kuna Mwari.
Romans 6:11 Saizvozvo nemwi zviverengei semakafa zvirokwazvo kuchivi, asi munorarama kuna Mwari naKristu Jesu Ishe wedu.
Romans 6:12 Naizvozvo chivi ngachirege kutonga mumuviri wenyu unofa, kuti muchiteerere kuchiva kwacho;
Romans 6:13 uye musapa mitezo yenyu <transChange type="added">ive</transChange> midziyo yekusarurama kuchivi; asi muzvipe imwi kuna Mwari sevapenyu kubva kuvakafa, nemitezo yenyu <transChange type="added">ive</transChange> midziyo yekururama kuna Mwari.
Romans 6:14 Nokuti chivi hachizotongi pamusoro penyu; nokuti hamusi pasi pemurairo, asi pasi penyasha.
Romans 6:15 Ko zvino? Tichatadza here, nokuti hatisi pasi pemurairo, asi pasi penyasha? Ngazvisadaro!
Romans 6:16 Hamuzivi here kuti uyo wamunozvipa kwaari <transChange type="added">muve</transChange> varanda veku<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>teerera, muri varanda vaiye wamunoteerera; kana vechivi chinoisa kurufu, kana vekuteerera kunoisa kukururama?
Romans 6:17 Asi Mwari ngaavongwe, kuti maiva varanda vechivi, asi mava kuteerera kubva pamoyo muenzaniso wedzidziso wamakakumikidzwa kwauri;
Romans 6:18 uye masunungurwa kubva pachivi, makaitwa varanda vekururama.
Romans 6:19 Ndinotaura nenzira yevanhu nekuda kweutera hwenyama yenyu; nokuti sezvamakapa mitezo yenyu <transChange type="added">kuva</transChange> varanda kutsvina neuipi <transChange type="added">zvinoisa</transChange> kune zvakaipa, saizvozvo ikozvino ipai mitezo yenyu <transChange type="added">kuva</transChange> varanda vekururama <transChange type="added">kunoisa</transChange> kuutsvene.
Romans 6:20 Nokuti pamaiva varanda vechivi, makange makasununguka pakururama.
Romans 6:21 Naizvozvo maiva nechibereko chei panguva iyo pazvinhu izvo zvamava kunyadziswa nazvo ikozvino? Nokuti mugumo wezvinhu izvo rufu.
Romans 6:22 Asi ikozvino zvamakasunungurwa pachivi, mukaitwa varanda kuna Mwari, mune chibereko chenyu <transChange type="added">chinoisa</transChange> kuutsvene, uye mugumo upenyu husingaperi.
Romans 6:23 Nokuti mubairo wechivi rufu, asi chipo chenyasha chaMwari upenyu husingaperi muna Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu.  <chapter eID="Rom.6"/><div eID="gen1308" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1307" type="section"/>
Romans 7:0 <div sID="gen1309" type="section"/> <chapter n="7" osisID="Rom.7" sID="Rom.7"/>  <div sID="gen1310" type="x-p"/>
Romans 7:1 Hamuzivi here, hama (nokuti ndinotaura kuna avo vanoziva murairo), kuti murairo unotonga munhu nguva yese yaanenge ari mupenyu?
Romans 7:2 Nokuti mukadzi akawanikwa wakasungwa nemurairo kumurume anorarama; asi kana murume afa, wasunungurwa pamurairo wemurume.
Romans 7:3 Naizvozvo zvino kana murume ari mupenyu, achanzi chifeve kana akava weumwe murume; asi kana murume afa, wasununguka pamurairo, kuti asava chifeve, kana akava wemumwe murume.
Romans 7:4 Naizvozvo, hama dzangu, nemwi makaitwa vakafa kumurairo nemuviri waKristu, kuti muve veumwe, kuna iye wakamutswa kubva kuvakafa, kuti tiberekere Mwari zvibereko.
Romans 7:5 Nokuti pataiva munyama, kuchiva kwezvivi zvaiva kubidikidza nemurairo kwakabata mumitezo yedu kubereka zvibereko <transChange type="added">zvinoisa</transChange> kurufu.
Romans 7:6 Asi zvino takasunungurwa pamurairo, takafa kune zvatakange takabatwa nazvo, kuti tishumire muutsva hwemweya, kwete neutsaru hwerugwaro.
Romans 7:7 Ko zvino tichatii? Murairo chivi here? Ngazvisadaro! Asi handisaiziva chivi, kunze kwekubudikidza nemurairo; nokuti handisaizivawo ruchiva, kana murairo wakange usina kureva <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Usachiva.
Romans 7:8 Asi chivi, chawana mukana nemurairo, chikaita mandiri ruchiva rwese; nokuti kunze kwemurairo chivi chakafa.
Romans 7:9 Ini ndakambova mupenyu kunze kwemurairo, asi murairo pawakasvika, chivi chakava chipenyuzve, neni ndikafa;
Romans 7:10 uye murairo waiva weupenyu, iwo wakawanikwa neni wava werufu;
Romans 7:11 nokuti chivi, chawana mukana nemurairo, chakandinyengera chikandiuraya nawo.
Romans 7:12 Naizvozvo mutemo mutsvene, nemurairo mutsvene, uye wakarurama, uye wakanaka.
Romans 7:13 Naizvozvo zvakanaka zvakava rufu mandiri here? Ngazvisadaro! Asi chivi, kuti chiratidzwe <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> chivi, chinobata rufu mandiri nezvakanaka; kuti chivi nemurairo chive chakaipa kwazvo-kwazvo.
Romans 7:14 Nokuti tinoziva kuti murairo ndewemweya; asi ini ndiri wenyama, ndakatengeswa pasi pechivi.
Romans 7:15 Nokuti icho chandinoita, handichizivi; nokuti chandinoda, ndicho chandisingaiti; asi chandinovenga, ndicho chandinoita.
Romans 7:16 Zvino kana ndichiita icho chandisingadi, ndinobvumirana nemurairo kuti wakanaka.
Romans 7:17 Asi ikozvinowo handisisiri ini ndinochiita, asi chivi chinogara mandiri.
Romans 7:18 Nokuti ndinoziva kuti mandiri, ndiko kuti munyama yangu, hamugari chakanaka; nokuti kuda kurimo mandiri, asi kuita chakanaka handikuwani.
Romans 7:19 Nokuti chakanaka chandinoda, handiiti; asi chakaipa chandisingadi, ndicho chandinoita.
Romans 7:20 Zvino kana ndichiita icho chandisingadi ini, handisisiri ini ndinochiita, asi chivi chinogara mandiri.
Romans 7:21 Naizvozvo ndinowana murairo wekuti kana ndichida kuita chakanaka, chakaipa chiripo pandiri.
Romans 7:22 Nokuti ndinofara mumurairo waMwari zvinoenderana nemunhu wemukati;
Romans 7:23 asi ndinoona umwe murairo mumitezo yangu unorwa nemurairo wemurangariro wangu, uye uchanditapira kumurairo wechivi uri mumitezo yangu.
Romans 7:24 Ini munhu anosuruvara! Ndiani achandisunungura pamuviri werufu urwu?
Romans 7:25 Ndinotenda Mwari kubudikidza naJesu Kristu Ishe wedu. Naizvozvo zvino nemurangariro ini ndomene ndinoshumira murairo waMwari, asi nenyama murairo wechivi.  <chapter eID="Rom.7"/><div eID="gen1310" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1309" type="section"/>
Romans 8:0 <div sID="gen1311" type="section"/> <chapter n="8" osisID="Rom.8" sID="Rom.8"/>  <div sID="gen1312" type="x-p"/>
Romans 8:1 Naizvozvo ikozvino ha<transChange type="added">kuna</transChange> kupiwa mhosva kune vari muna Kristu Jesu vasingafambi maererano nenyama, asi maererano neMweya.
Romans 8:2 Nokuti murairo weMweya weupenyu muna Kristu Jesu wakandisunungura kubva pamurairo wechivi newerufu.
Romans 8:3 Nokuti zvakange zvisingagoneki nemurairo, pakuti wakange une utera nekuda kwenyama, Mwari achituma Mwanakomana wake mumufananidzo wenyama yezvivi, uye nekuda kwechivi, wakapa mhosva chivi munyama;
Romans 8:4 kuti kururama kwemurairo kuzadziswe matiri, tisingafambi maererano nenyama, asi maererano neMweya.
Romans 8:5 Nokuti avo vepanyama vanofunganya zvinhu zvenyama; asi vari paMweya zvinhu zveMweya.
Romans 8:6 Nokuti kufunganya kwenyama rufu; asi kufunganya kweMweya upenyu nerugare;
Romans 8:7 nokuti kufunganya kwenyama ruvengo kuna Mwari; nokuti hakuzviisi pasi pemurairo waMwari; nokuti hakugoniwo;
Romans 8:8 neavo vari munyama havagoni kufadza Mwari.
Romans 8:9 Asi imwi hamusi munyama, asi muMweya, kana zvirokwazvo Mweya waMwari achingogara mamuri. Asi kana umwe asina Mweya waKristu, uyu haasi wake.
Romans 8:10 Asi kana Kristu <transChange type="added">ari</transChange> mamuri, muviri wakafa nekuda kwechivi, asi mweya upenyu nekuda kwekururama.
Romans 8:11 Zvino kana Mweya waiye wakamutsa Jesu kubva kuvakafa achigara mamuri, iye wakamutsa Kristu kubva kuvakafa achararamisawo miviri yenyu inofa neMweya wake anogara mamuri.
Romans 8:12 Naizvozvo zvino, hama, tine ngava, kwete kunyama, kuti tirarame maererano nenyama;
Romans 8:13 nokuti kana muchirarama maererano nenyama, muchafa; asi kana muchiuraya mabasa emuviri neMweya, muchararama.
Romans 8:14 Nokuti vese vanotungamirirwa neMweya waMwari, ndivo vana vaMwari.
Romans 8:15 Nokuti hamuna kugamuchira mweya weuranda kuti mutyezve, asi makagamuchira mweya wekuitwa vana, watinodana nawo <transChange type="added">tichiti</transChange>: Abha*, Baba.
Romans 8:16 Mweya amene unopupurirana nemweya wedu, kuti tiri vana vaMwari;
Romans 8:17 zvino kana <transChange type="added">tiri</transChange> vana, <transChange type="added">tiri</transChange> vadyi venhakawo; vadyi venhaka vaMwari, nevadyi venhaka pamwe naKristu; kana zvirokwazvo tichitambudzika <transChange type="added">naye</transChange>, kuti tikudzwewo pamwe <transChange type="added">naye</transChange>.
Romans 8:18 Nokuti ndinoona kuti matambudziko enguva yaikozvino haana kufanira kuenzaniswa nekubwinya kuchazoratidzwa kwatiri.
Romans 8:19 Nokuti tarisiro huru yechisikwa inomirira kubudiswa pachena kwevana vaMwari.
Romans 8:20 Nokuti chisikwa chakaiswa pasi pekushaiwa maturo, kwete nekuda, asi nekuda kwaiye waka<transChange type="added">chi</transChange>isa pasi; mutariro
Romans 8:21 kuti chisikwa pachachowo chichasunungurwa kubva pauranda hwekuora, <transChange type="added">chiiswe</transChange> parusununguko rwekubwinya kwevana vaMwari.
Romans 8:22 Nokuti tinoziva kuti chisikwa chese chinogomera pamwe nekurwadziwa pamwe chete kusvikira ikozvino.
Romans 8:23 Zvisati zviri <transChange type="added">izvo</transChange> chete, asi nesu tomene, tine chibereko chekutanga cheMweya, nesu tomene tinogomera mukati medu, tichimirira kuitwa vana, rudzikunuro rwemuviri wedu.
Romans 8:24 Nokuti tinoponeswa netariro; asi tariro inoonekwa haisi tariro; nokuti izvo munhu zvaanoona, achazvitaririreizve?
Romans 8:25 Asi kana tichitarisira chatisingaoni, tino<transChange type="added">chi</transChange>mirira nemoyo murefu.
Romans 8:26 Saizvozvo neMweyawo unobatsira utera hwedu; nokuti hatizivi chatinofanira kunyengeterera sezvinofanira, asi Mweya amene anotireverera nekugomera kusingatauriki;
Romans 8:27 zvino iye anonzvera moyo anoziva fungwa yeMweya kuti chii, nokuti anoreverera vatsvene maererano naMwari.
Romans 8:28 Uye tinoziva kuti zvinhu zvese zvinobata pamwe kuti zvinakire avo vanoda Mwari, avo vakadanwa maererano nezano <transChange type="added">rake</transChange>.
Romans 8:29 Nokuti vaakagara aziva, wakagarawo avatemera kuti vafanane nechimiro cheMwanakomana wake, kuti iye ave dangwe pakati pehama zhinji;
Romans 8:30 neavo vaakagara atemera, ndivo vaakadanawo; nevaakadana, ndivo vaakaruramisawo; nevaakaruramisa, ndivo vaakakudzawo.
Romans 8:31 Ko zvino tichatii kuzvinhu izvi? Kana Mwari <transChange type="added">ari</transChange> kwatiri, ndiani achatirwisa?
Romans 8:32 Iye asina kutongoramba neMwanakomana wake pachake, asi wakamukumikidza nekuda kwedu tese, angarega sei kutipa zvese pachena pamwe nayewo?
Romans 8:33 Ndiani achapa mhosva pavasanangurwa vaMwari? <transChange type="added">Ndi</transChange>Mwari anoti <transChange type="added">va</transChange>karurama;
Romans 8:34 ndiani anopa mhosva? <transChange type="added">Ndi</transChange>Kristu wakafa, uye zvikuru wakamutswawo, uye ari kuruoko rwerudyi rwaMwari, uye anotireverera.
Romans 8:35 Ndiani achatiparadzanisa nerudo rwaKristu? Kutambudzika, kana kumanikidzika, kana kushushwa, kana nzara, kana kushama, kana njodzi, kana munondo here?
Romans 8:36 Sezvazvakanyorwa kuti: Nekuda kwenyu tinourawa zuva rese; tinoverengwa semakwai ekubaiwa.
Romans 8:37 Asi pazvinhu izvi zvese tiri vakundi nekupfuurisa naiye wakatida.
Romans 8:38 Nokuti ndine chokwadi kuti harwusi rufu kana upenyu kana vatumwa kana utungamiriri kana masimba kana zvinhu zviripo kana zvinhu zvinouya
Romans 8:39 kana urefu kana udzamu kana chimwe chisikwa chipi zvacho chingagona kutiparadzanisa nerudo rwaMwari rwuri muna Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu.  <chapter eID="Rom.8"/><div eID="gen1312" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1311" type="section"/>
Romans 9:0 <div sID="gen1313" type="section"/> <chapter n="9" osisID="Rom.9" sID="Rom.9"/>  <div sID="gen1314" type="x-p"/>
Romans 9:1 Ndinotaura chokwadi muna Kristu, handinyepi, hana yangu ichipupurirana neni muMweya Mutsvene,
Romans 9:2 kuti ndinoshushikana kwazvo, neshungu dzisingaperi mumoyo mangu.
Romans 9:3 Nokuti ndaishuva kuti ini ndomene nditukwe kuna Kristu nekuda kwehama dzangu, verudzi rwangu panyama;
Romans 9:4 vari VaIsraeri, vane kuitwa vana, nekubwinya, nesungano, nekupiwa kwemurairo, neushumiri hwaMwari, nezvivimbiso,
Romans 9:5 madzibaba ndeavo, naKristu wakabva kwavari panyama, ari pamusoro pezvese, Mwari anokudzwa narinhi. Ameni.
Romans 9:6 Asi kwete shoko raMwari serakakundikana. Nokuti havasi vese vakabva kuna Israeri, vari VaIsraeri;
Romans 9:7 kwete nokuti imbeu yaAbhurahama, vese vana; asi <transChange type="added">zvinonzi</transChange>: Kuna Isaka ndiko kuchadanwa mbeu yako.
Romans 9:8 Ndiko kuti, havasi vana venyama, ivo vari vana vaMwari; asi vana vechivimbiso vanoverengerwa kumbeu.
Romans 9:9 Nokuti iri ishoko rechivimbiso <transChange type="added">rinoti</transChange>: Nenguva ino ndichauya, uye Sara achava nemwanakomana.
Romans 9:10 Handizvo chete, asi naRibheka wakati ava nemimba neumwe, Isaka baba vedu;
Romans 9:11 nokuti <transChange type="added">vana</transChange> vasati vaberekwa, kana kumboita chakanaka kana chakaipa, kuti zano raMwari maererano nesananguro rigare, kwete kubva pamabasa, asi kubva kune anodana,
Romans 9:12 zvakataurwa kwaari kuti: Mukuru achashumira mudiki,
Romans 9:13 sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Jakobho ndakamuda, asi Esau ndakamuvenga.
Romans 9:14 Ko zvino tichatii? Kusarurama <transChange type="added">kuriko</transChange> kuna Mwari here? Ngazvisadaro!
Romans 9:15 Nokuti anoti kuna Mozisi: Ndichava netsitsi kune wandine tsitsi naye, ndichanzwira ngoni wandinonzwira ngoni.
Romans 9:16 Naizvozvo zvakadaro ha<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>si zveanoda, kana zveanomhanya, asi zvaMwari anonzwira tsitsi.
Romans 9:17 Nokuti rugwaro rwunoti kuna Farao: Ndizvozvi zvandakakumutsira, kuti ndiratidze simba rangu mauri, uye kuti zita rangu riparidzwe panyika yese.
Romans 9:18 Naizvozvo zvino anonzwira tsitsi iye waanoda; uye anowomesa moyo <transChange type="added">we</transChange>waanoda.
Romans 9:19 Zvino iwe uchati kwandiri: <transChange type="added">Iye</transChange> achiri kuwanirei mhosva? Nokuti ndiani angapikisa kuda kwake?
Romans 9:20 Haiwa, iwe munhu ndiwe ani anokakavadza Mwari? Chakaumbiwa chingati here kune wakaumba: Wakandiitirei sezvizvi?
Romans 9:21 Kana muumbi haana simba pamusoro pevhu here, kuti nebundu rimwe aite mudziyo umwe unokudzwa, neumwe unozvidzwa?
Romans 9:22 Uye kana Mwari achida kuratidza hasha, nekuzivisa simba rake, wakatakura nemoyo murefu kwazvo midziyo yehasha yakagadzirirwa kuparadzwa;
Romans 9:23 uye kuti azivise fuma yekubwinya kwake pamidziyo yetsitsi, yaakagara agadzirira kubwinya,
Romans 9:24 nesu, vaakadana, <transChange type="added">yatiri</transChange> isu, kusiri kuVaJudha chete, asi nekuvahedheni?
Romans 9:25 Sezvaanorevawo muna Hosiya <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Ndichavaidza vanhu vangu <transChange type="added">ivo </transChange>vasiri vanhu vangu; naiye wakange asingadikanwi mudikanwi;
Romans 9:26 zvino zvichaitika <transChange type="added">kuti,</transChange> panzvimbo pazvakanzi kwavari: Hamusi vanhu vangu imwi, ipapo vachaidzwa vana vaMwari mupenyu.
Romans 9:27 Isaya anodanidzirawo maererano naIsraeri <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Kunyange uwandu hwevana vaIsraeri hukaita sejecha regungwa, vakasara vachaponeswa;
Romans 9:28 nokuti achapedza basa neku<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>gurisira mukururama; nokuti Ishe achagurisira basa panyika.
Romans 9:29 Uye Isaya sezvaakagara areva <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Dai Ishe wehondo asina kutisiira mbeu, tingadai takava seSodhoma, uye takaitwa takafanana neGomora.
Romans 9:30 Ko tichatii? Kuti vahedheni vasingatsvaki kururama, vakabata kururama, iko kururama kunobva parutendo;
Romans 9:31 asi Israeri, achitsvaka murairo wekururama, haana kusvika pamurairo wekururama.
Romans 9:32 Nekuda kwei? Nokuti havana <transChange type="added">kutsvaka</transChange> nerutendo, asi nezvainge namabasa emurairo; nokuti vakagumburwa pabwe rekugumbura.
Romans 9:33 Sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Tarira, ndinoisa paZiyoni ibwe rekugumbura nedombo rechipinganidzo; uye ani nani anotenda kwaari haanganyadziswi.  <chapter eID="Rom.9"/>
Romans 10:0 <chapter n="10" osisID="Rom.10" sID="Rom.10"/>
Romans 10:1 Hama, chishuwo chemoyo wangu nemukumbiro kuna Mwari pamusoro paIsraeri ndiko kuti <transChange type="added">va</transChange>poneswe.
Romans 10:2 Nokuti ndinovapupurira kuti vanoshingairira Mwari, asi kwete paruzivo;
Romans 10:3 nokuti vasingazivi kururama kwaMwari, uye vachitsvaka kumisa kururama kwavo pachavo, vakasazviisa pasi pekururama kwaMwari.
Romans 10:4 Nokuti Kristu mugumo wemurairo mukururama kuna ani nani anotenda.
Romans 10:5 Nokuti Mozisi anonyora kururama kuri kwemurairo, kuti munhu anoita zvinhu izvi achararama nazvo.
Romans 10:6 Asi kururama kunobva parutendo kunotaura sezvizvi: Usati mumoyo mako: Ndiani achakwira kudenga? Ndiko kuti kuburusa Kristu;
Romans 10:7 kana <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Ndiani achaburukira mukudzika? Ndiko kuti kukwidza Kristu kubva kuvakafa.
Romans 10:8 Asi kunoti kudini? Shoko riri pedo newe, mumuromo mako nemumoyo mako; iri ishoko rerutendo ratinoparidza;
Romans 10:9 kuti kana iwe ukabvuma nemuromo wako Ishe Jesu, uye ukatenda mumoyo mako kuti Mwari wakamumutsa kubva kuvakafa, uchaponeswa;
Romans 10:10 nokuti nemoyo <transChange type="added">umwe</transChange> anotenda mukururama, uye nemuromo anobvuma mukuponeswa.
Romans 10:11 Nokuti rugwaro rwunoti: Ani nani anotenda kwaari haangazonyadziswi.
Romans 10:12 Nokuti hapana musiyano pakati pemuJudha nemuGiriki; nokuti Ishe ndeumwe wevese, wakafuma kune vese vanodana kwaari.
Romans 10:13 Nokuti wese ani nani achadana kuzita raIshe achaponeswa.
Romans 10:14 Zvino vachadana sei wavasina kutenda kwaari? Uye vachatenda sei wavasina kunzwa nezvake? Uye vachanzwa sei vasina anoparidza?
Romans 10:15 Zvino vachaparidza sei kana vasina kutumwa? Sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Dzakanaka sei tsoka dzevanoparidza evhangeri yerugare, dzevanoparidza evhangeri yezvakanaka?
Romans 10:16 Asi vese havana kuteerera evhangeri. Nokuti Isaya anoti: Ishe, ndiani wakatenda zvatakasuma?
Romans 10:17 Naizvozvo rutendo rwunobva mukunzwa, nekunzwa neshoko raMwari.
Romans 10:18 Asi ndinoti: Havana kunzwa here? Hongu zvirokwazvo, inzwi ravo rakabuda kunyika yese, nemashoko avo kumigumo yenyika.
Romans 10:19 Asi ndinoti: Israeri haana kunzwisisa here? Pakutanga Mozisi anoti: Ini ndichakumutsirai godo nevasiri rudzi, nerudzi rusingafungi ndichakutsamwisai.
Romans 10:20 NaIsaya akashinga anotiwo: Ndakawanikwa nevasina kunditsvaka, ndakaonekwa kune vasina kundibvunza.
Romans 10:21 Asi kuna Israeri anoti: Zuva rese ndakatandavadza maoko angu kuvanhu vasingateereri nevanokakavara.  <chapter eID="Rom.10"/><div eID="gen1314" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1313" type="section"/>
Romans 11:0 <div sID="gen1315" type="section"/> <chapter n="11" osisID="Rom.11" sID="Rom.11"/>  <div sID="gen1316" type="x-p"/>
Romans 11:1 Naizvozvo ndinoti: Mwari wakarasa vanhu vake here? Ngazvisadaro! Nokuti iniwo ndiri muIsraeri, kubva pambeu yaAbhurahama, werudzi rwaBhenjamini.
Romans 11:2 Mwari haana kurasa vanhu vake vaakagara aziva. Kana hamuzivi kuti rugwaro rwunoti kudini kuna Eria here? Kuti anoreverera sei kuna Mwari achipesana neVaIsraeri, achiti:
Romans 11:3 Ishe, vakauraya vaporofita venyu, uye vakaputsa aritari dzenyu; zvino ini ndasara ndega, uye vanotsvaka upenyu hwangu.
Romans 11:4 Asi mhinduro yaMwari inoti kudii kwaari? <transChange type="added">Inoti</transChange>: Ndakazvisiira zvuru zvinomwe zvevarume, vasina kufugamira ibvi kuna Bhaari.
Romans 11:5 Zvino saizvozvo nemunguva yaikozvino variko vakasara maererano nesananguro yenyasha.
Romans 11:6 Asi kana zviri zvenyasha, hazvichabvi pamabasa; kana zvisakadaro, nyasha hadzisisiri nyasha. Asi kana zvichibva pamabasa, hadzisati dzichiri nyasha; kana zvisakadaro basa harisati richiri basa.
Romans 11:7 Ko zvino? Israeri zvaakange achitsvaka, haana kuzviwana, asi vasanangurwa vakazviwana, vamwewo vakaomeswa;
Romans 11:8 sezvazvakanyorwa, <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Mwari wakavapa mweya wehope huru, meso kuti varege kuona, nenzeve kuti varege kunzwa, kusvikira zuva ranhasi.
Romans 11:9 NaDhavhidhi anoti: Tafura yavo ngaiitwe rudzingi nemusungo, nechigumbuso nekutsiva kwavari;
Romans 11:10 meso avo ngaasvibirwe kuti varege kuona, uye mukotamise musana wavo narinhi.
Romans 11:11 Naizvozvo ndinoti: Vakagumbuswa kuti vawe here? Ngazvisadaro! Asi nekudarika kwavo ruponeso <transChange type="added">rwakasvika</transChange> kuvahedheni, kuvamutsira godo.
Romans 11:12 Zvino kana kudarika kwavo <transChange type="added">kuri</transChange> fuma yenyika, nekukundikana kwavo ifuma yevahedheni, zvikuru sei kuzara kwavo?
Romans 11:13 Nokuti ndinotaura kwamuri vahedheni; sezvo ndiri ini muapositori wevahedheni, ndinokudza ushumiri hwangu;
Romans 11:14 kuti zvimwe ndingamutsira godo <transChange type="added">ve</transChange>nyama yangu, uye ndiponese vamwe vavo.
Romans 11:15 Nokuti kana kuraswa kwavo <transChange type="added">kuri</transChange> kuyananiswa kwenyika, kugamuchirwa ku<transChange type="added">cha</transChange>veiko, kunze kwekuti upenyu hunobva kuvakafa?
Romans 11:16 Zvino kana chibereko chekutanga <transChange type="added">chiri</transChange> chitsvene, bunduwo <transChange type="added">rakadaro</transChange>; uye kana mudzi <transChange type="added">uri</transChange> mutsvene, nematavi <transChange type="added">akadaro.</transChange>
Romans 11:17 Asi kana mamwe ematavi akavhuniwa, newe uri muorivhi wekudondo ukabatanidzwa pakati pawo, ukava mugovani pamwe nawo pamudzi nepamafuta emuorivhi,
Romans 11:18 usazvikudza pamusoro pematavi; asi kana uchizvikudza, hausi iwe anotakura mudzi, asi mudzi <transChange type="added">unokutakura</transChange> iwe.
Romans 11:19 Zvino uchati: Matavi akavhuniwa, kuti ini ndibatanidzwe.
Romans 11:20 Zvakanaka; nekusatenda vakavhuniwa, iwe umire nerutendo. Usazvikudza, asi itya;
Romans 11:21 nokuti kana Mwari asina kurega matavi echisikirwo, zvimwe haangakuregi iwewo.
Romans 11:22 Zvino tarira unyoro nekuomarara kwaMwari; kune vanowa, kuomarara; asi kwauri, unyoro, kana uchigara paunyoro <transChange type="added">hwake</transChange>; kana zvikasadaro newe ungatemwa.
Romans 11:23 Naivowo, kana vasingagari pakusatenda, vachabatanidzwa, nokuti Mwari anogona kuvabatanidzazve.
Romans 11:24 Nokuti kana iwe wakatemwa kumuorivhi uri wedondo pachisikirwo, ukabatanidzwa zvinopesana nechisikirwo pamuorivhi wakasimwa, vangabatanidzwa zvikuru sei avo vari <transChange type="added">matavi</transChange> echisikirwo pamuorivhi wekwavo?
Romans 11:25 Nokuti handidi kuti musaziva, hama, zvechakavanzika ichi, kuti murege kuzviita vakangwara, kuti kuomeswa kwemoyo kwakawira Israeri muchidimbu kusvikira kwapinda kuzara kwavahedheni;
Romans 11:26 saizvozvowo Israeri wese achaponeswa; sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: PaZiyoni pachabva Musununguri achabvisa kusada Mwari kuna Jakobho.
Romans 11:27 Uye iyi isungano yangu kwavari, pandichabvisa zvivi zvavo.
Romans 11:28 Maererano neevhangeri vavengi nekuda kwenyu; asi maererano nekusanangura vadikanwi nekuda kwemadzibaba;
Romans 11:29 nokuti zvipo nekudana kwaMwari hazvishanduki.
Romans 11:30 Nokuti semwiwo kare musina kuteerera Mwari, asi zvino makanzwirwa tsitsi nekusateerera kwavo;
Romans 11:31 saizvozvo naivava ikozvino havana kuteerera, kuti netsitsi dzenyu naivo vanzwirwe tsitsi;
Romans 11:32 nokuti Mwari wakavapfigira vese mukusateera, kuti ave netsitsi kwavari vese.
Romans 11:33 Haiwa kudzika kwefuma, zvese yeuchenjeri neruzivo rwaMwari! Kutonga kwake hakunzverwi zvakadini, nenzira dzake hadzirondwi!
Romans 11:34 Nokuti ndiani wakaziva fungwa yaIshe? Kana ndiani wakange ari murairidzi wake?
Romans 11:35 Kana ndiani wakatanga kupa kwaari, uye zvichadzorerwa kwaari?
Romans 11:36 Nokuti zvese zvinobva kwaari, nemaari, <transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>noenda kwaari; kubwinya <transChange type="added">ngakuve</transChange> kwaari kusvika narinhi. Ameni.  <chapter eID="Rom.11"/><div eID="gen1316" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1315" type="section"/>
Romans 12:0 <div sID="gen1317" type="section"/> <chapter n="12" osisID="Rom.12" sID="Rom.12"/>  <div sID="gen1318" type="x-p"/>
Romans 12:1 Naizvozvo ndinokukumbirisai, hama, netsitsi dzaMwari, mupire miviri yenyu, <transChange type="added">chive</transChange> chibairo chipenyu, chitsvene, chinogamuchirika kuna Mwari, <transChange type="added">ndiko</transChange> kunamata kwenyu kunonzwisisika.
Romans 12:2 Uye musazvifananidza nenyika ino, asi mushandurwe nekuvandudzwa kwefungwa yenyu, kuti muidze chiri chido chaMwari chakanaka uye chinogamuchirika uye chakazara. <div eID="gen1318" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1317" type="section"/>
Romans 12:3 Nokuti ndinoti, nenyasha dzakapiwa kwandiri, kune umwe neumwe ari pakati penyu, arege kuzvifunga kuti mukuru kupfuura paanofanira kufunga <transChange type="added">napo</transChange>; asi afunge neuchenjeri, Mwari sezvaakagovera umwe neumwe chiyero cherutendo.
Romans 12:4 Nokuti sezvatine mitezo mizhinji pamuviri umwe, asi mitezo yese haina basa rakafanana;
Romans 12:5 saizvozvo <transChange type="added">tiri</transChange> vazhinji, tiri muviri umwe muna Kristu, uye umwe neumwe tiri mitezo weumwe kune umwe.
Romans 12:6 Uye tine zvipo zvakasiyana maererano nenyasha dzinopiwa kwatiri; kungava kuporofita, <transChange type="added">ngatiporofite</transChange> nechiyero cherutendo;
Romans 12:7 kana ushumiri, <transChange type="added">ngatishande</transChange> paushumiri; kana anodzidzisa, pakudzidzisa;
Romans 12:8 kana anoraira, pakuraira; anopa, <transChange type="added">ngaape</transChange> nemoyo wese; anotonga, <transChange type="added">ngaatonge</transChange> nekushingaira; anoitira tsitsi, nemufaro.
Romans 12:9 Rudo <transChange type="added">ngaruve</transChange> rwechokwadi. Semai zvakaipa, makanamatira zvakanaka.
Romans 12:10 Dananai zvikuru nerudo rwehama; pakukudza muchitangirana.
Romans 12:11 Musava neusimbe pakushingaira; mupise pamweya; muchishumira Ishe;
Romans 12:12 muchifara mutariro; muchitsungirira padambudziko; muchirambira mumunyengetero;
Romans 12:13 muchigovera pakushaiwa kwevatsvene; muchishingirira kugamuchira vaeni.
Romans 12:14 Ropafadzai vanokushushai; ropafadzai, musatuka.
Romans 12:15 Farai nevanofara, uye chemai nevanochema.
Romans 12:16 <transChange type="added">Ivai</transChange> vemoyo umwe, umwe kune umwe. Musafunganya zvinhu zvakakwirira, asi mufambidzane navanozvininipisa. Musazviidza vakachenjera.
Romans 12:17 Musatsiva ani zvake chakaipa nechakaipa. Muchirangarirai zvakarurama pamberi pevanhu vese.
Romans 12:18 Kana zvichigona, <transChange type="added">se</transChange>zvinobva kwamuri, garai nerugare nevanhu vese.
Romans 12:19 Vadikanwi, musazvitsivira, asi ipai hasha nzvimbo; nokuti kwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Kutsiva ndekwangu, ini ndicharipira, anodaro Ishe.
Romans 12:20 Naizvozvo kana muvengi wako ane nzara, mupe kudya; kana ane nyota, munwise; nokuti mukuita izvozvo, uchadurikidza mazimbe emoto pamusoro wake.
Romans 12:21 Usakundwa nechakaipa, asi kunda chakaipa nechakanaka.  <chapter eID="Rom.12"/><div eID="gen1320" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1319" type="section"/>
Romans 13:0 <div sID="gen1321" type="section"/> <chapter n="13" osisID="Rom.13" sID="Rom.13"/>  <div sID="gen1322" type="x-p"/>
Romans 13:1 Mweya umwe neumwe ngauzviise pasi pemasimba epamusoro; nokuti hakuna simba kunze kwerakabva kuna Mwari; masimba aripo akagadzwa naMwari.
Romans 13:2 Naizvozvo anopikisa simba anopikisa chimiso chaMwari; zvino ivo vanopikisa vanozvigamuchirira kuraswa.
Romans 13:3 Nokuti vatongi havasi chityiso kumabasa akanaka, asi kune akaipa. Zvino unoda kusatya simba here? Ita zvakanaka, zvino uchava nerumbidzo kubva kwariri;
Romans 13:4 nokuti ndiro muranda waMwari kuti zvikunakire. Asi kana uchiita zvakaipa, itya; nokuti harina kubatira munondo pasina; nokuti muranda waMwari, mutsivi pahasha kune anoita zvakaipa.
Romans 13:5 Naizvozvo zvakafanira kuzviisa pasi, kwete nekuda kwehasha chete, asi nekuda kwehanawo.
Romans 13:6 Nokuti nekuda kwezvizvi munoterawo; nokuti varanda vaMwari, vanoramba vachibatirira chinhu ichochi.
Romans 13:7 Naizvozvo ripirai vese zvakafanira: Mutero kuna <transChange type="added">vanofanira</transChange> mutero; mubhadharo kune <transChange type="added">vanofanira</transChange> mubhadharo; kutyiwa kune <transChange type="added">vanofanira</transChange> kutyiwa; rukudzo kune <transChange type="added">vanofanira</transChange> rukudzo. <div eID="gen1322" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1321" type="section"/>
Romans 13:8 Musava nengava nemunhu, kunze kwerekudanana; nokuti anoda umwe, wazadzisa murairo.
Romans 13:9 Nokuti izvi <transChange type="added">zvekuti</transChange>: Usapomba, usauraya, usaba, usapupura nhema, usachiva, kana kune murairowo upi neupi, zvakasanganiswa pashoko iri, rekuti: Ude wekwako sezvaunozvi<transChange type="added">da</transChange> iwe.
Romans 13:10 Rudo haruiti zvakaipa kune wekwako; naizvozvo rudo kuzadzisika kwemurairo. <div eID="gen1324" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1323" type="section"/>
Romans 13:11 Uye izvi, muchiziva nguva, kuti ratova awa rekuti timuke pahope; nokuti ikozvino ruponeso rwedu rwava pedo kupfuura patakatenda.
Romans 13:12 Usiku hwaenda, uye zuva rava pedo; naizvozvo ngatibvise mabasa erima, uye ngatishonge zvombo zvechiedza.
Romans 13:13 Ngatifambe zvakafanira, sapamasikati, kwete mumitambo yemafaro akaipa nekuraradza, kwete pamabonde nekunyangadza, kwete mugakava negodo.
Romans 13:14 Asi pfekai Ishe Jesu Kristu, musafunganyira nyama, mukuchiva. <chapter eID="Rom.13"/><div eID="gen1326" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1325" type="section"/>
Romans 14:0 <div sID="gen1327" type="section"/> <chapter n="14" osisID="Rom.14" sID="Rom.14"/>  <div sID="gen1328" type="x-p"/>
Romans 14:1 Zvino ane utera parutendo mugamuchirei, kwete negakava pamaonero.
Romans 14:2 Umwe anotenda kudya zvese, asi ane utera anodya miriwo.
Romans 14:3 Anodya ngaarege kuzvidza asingadyi, uye asingadyi ngaarege kutonga anodya; nokuti Mwari wakamugamuchira.
Romans 14:4 Iwe ndiwe ani anotonga muranda weumwe? Anomira kana kuwa kuna ishe wake pachake. Achamiswa zvirokwazvo; nokuti Mwari anogona kumumisa.
Romans 14:5 Umwe anotemera zuva kupfuura <transChange type="added">rimwe </transChange>zuva; umwe anotemera zuva rimwe nerimwe <transChange type="added">zvakafanana</transChange>. Umwe neumwe ngaazivisise mumurangariro wake pachake.
Romans 14:6 Uyo anorangarira zuva, ano<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>rangarira muna Ishe; neasingarangariri zuva, haarangariri muna Ishe; anodya anodya kuna Ishe, nokuti anovonga Mwari; uye asingadyi haadyi muna Ishe, uye anovonga Mwari.
Romans 14:7 Nokuti hakuna umwe kwatiri anozviraramira, uye hakuna anozvifira.
Romans 14:8 Nokuti kana tichirarama, tinoraramira Ishe; uye kana tichifa, tinofira Ishe; naizvozvo kana tichirarama, kana tichifa, tiri vaIshe.
Romans 14:9 Nokuti naKristu wakafira izvozvi, uye akamuka, akararamazve kuti ave Ishe wevese vakafa nevapenyu.
Romans 14:10 Zvino iwe unotongerei hama yako? Kana newe unozvidzirei hama yako? Nokuti isu tese tichamira pamberi pechigaro chekutonga chaKristu.
Romans 14:11 Nokuti kwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Ini ndinorarama, anodaro Ishe; ibvi rimwe nerimwe richandifugamira, nerurimi rumwe nerumwe rwuchabvuma kuna Mwari.
Romans 14:12 Naizvozvo zvino umwe neumwe wedu achazvidavirira pachake kuna Mwari.
Romans 14:13 Naizvozvo ngatirege kuva tichatongana; asi zviri nani mutonge izvi, kuti tisaisira hama chigumbuso kana chipinganidzo.
Romans 14:14 Ndinoziva uye ndine chokwadi muna Ishe Jesu, kuti ha<transChange type="added">kuna</transChange> chinhu chakasviba pachacho; asi kune uyo anofunga kuti chakasviba, kwaari chakasviba.
Romans 14:15 Asi kana hama yako ichishungurudzwa nekudya, hauchafambi maererano nerudo. Usamuparadza nekudya kwako, uyo Kristu waakafira.
