Romans 14:16 Naizvozvo zvakanaka zvenyu ngazvirege kunyombwa.
Romans 14:17 Nokuti ushe hwaMwari hahusi kudya nechinwiwa, asi kururama nerugare nemufaro muMweya Mutsvene.
Romans 14:18 Nokuti anoshumira Kristu pazvinhu izvi, anogamuchirika kuna Mwari, uye anotendwa kuvanhu.
Romans 14:19 Naizvozvo zvino ngatitsvakisise zvinhu zverugare, nezvinhu zvekuvakana.
Romans 14:20 Rega kuparadza basa raMwari nekuda kwekudya. Zvese zvakachena, asi zvakaipa kumunhu anodya nechigumbuso.
Romans 14:21 Zvakanaka kusadya nyama, kana kunwa waini, kana <transChange type="added">chimwe</transChange> hama yako chaingagumburwa nacho kana kukanganiswa kana kushaiwa simba.
Romans 14:22 Iwe une rutendo here? Iva na<transChange type="added">rwo</transChange> pachako pamberi paMwari. Wakaropafadzwa asingazvitongi pachinhu chaanotendera.
Romans 14:23 Asi asina chokwadi, kana achidya, wava nemhosva, nokuti haa<transChange type="added">dyi</transChange> nerutendo; uye chese chisingabvi parutendo, chivi.  <chapter eID="Rom.14"/><div eID="gen1328" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1327" type="section"/>
Romans 15:0 <div sID="gen1329" type="section"/> <chapter n="15" osisID="Rom.15" sID="Rom.15"/>  <div sID="gen1330" type="x-p"/>
Romans 15:1 Zvino isu tine simba tinofanira kutakura utera hwevasina simba, uye tisingazvifadzi isu.
Romans 15:2 Naizvozvo umwe neumwe wedu ngaafadze umwe wake pane zvakanaka paku<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>vaka.
Romans 15:3 Nokuti naKristu haana kuzvifadza iye, asi, sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Kutuka kwevakakutukai kwakawira pamusoro pangu.
Romans 15:4 Nokuti zvese zvakagara zvanyorwa, zvakagara zvanyorerwa kudzidza kwedu, kuti nemoyo murefu uye nekunyaradza kwemagwaro tive netariro.
Romans 15:5 Asi dai Mwari wemoyo murefu newenyaradzo apa kwamuri kuva nemoyo umwe pakati penyu maererano naKristu Jesu;
Romans 15:6 kuti nemoyo umwe nemuromo umwe mukudze Mwari, ivo Baba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu.
Romans 15:7 Naizvozvo gamuchiranai, Kristu sezvaakatigamuchirawo, ruve rukudzo rwaMwari.
Romans 15:8 Zvino ndinoti, Jesu Kristu wakava muranda wedzingiso nekuda kwechokwadi chaMwari, kuti asimbise zvivimbiso zvemadzibaba;
Romans 15:9 uye vahedheni vakudze Mwari nekuda kwetsitsi; sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Nekuda kweizvozvi ndichakureururai pakati pevahedheni, nekuimbira zita renyu rumbidzo.
Romans 15:10 Uyezve anoti: Farai, vahedheni, pamwe nevanhu vake.
Romans 15:11 Uyezve: Rumbidzai Ishe imwi vahedheni vese; mumukudzewo imwi vanhu vese.
Romans 15:12 Uyezve Isaya anoti: Uchavapo mudzi waJese, neachasimukira kutonga vahedheni; vahedheni vachavimba kwaari.
Romans 15:13 Daiwo Mwari wetariro akuzadzai nemufaro wese uye nerugare muchitenda, kuti muwedzere patariro, nesimba reMweya Mutsvene. <div eID="gen1330" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1329" type="section"/>
Romans 15:14 Zvino ini ndomene ndinozivisisa nezvenyu, hama dzangu, kuti nemwi pachenyu muzere nekunaka, makazadzwa neruzivo rwese, munogonawo kurairana.
Romans 15:15 Asi, hama, ndinokunyorerai ndakatsunga zvikuru, neimwe nzira, ndichiita sendinokuyeuchidzai, nekuda kwenyasha dzandakapiwa naMwari,
Romans 15:16 kuti ndive mushumiri waJesu Kristu kuvahedheni, ndichishumira evhangeri yaMwari, kuti chibairo chevahedheni chigamuchirike, chichiitwa chitsvene neMweya Mutsvene.
Romans 15:17 Naizvozvo ndine kuzvikudza muna Kristu Jesu pazvinhu zvemaererano naMwari;
Romans 15:18 nokuti handingashingi kutaura chero chinhu chaizvo Kristu zvaasina kuita kubudikidza neni, kuti vahedheni vateerereswe, neshoko uye nebasa,
Romans 15:19 musimba rezviratidzo nezvishamiso, musimba reMweya waMwari; naizvozvo kubva paJerusarema nekwakapoteredza kusvikira Iririkumu ndaka<transChange type="added">paridza</transChange> zvakazara evhangeri yaKristu;
Romans 15:20 nokudaro ndakashingaira kuparidza evhangeri, kwete paka<transChange type="added">mbo</transChange>danwa Kristu, kuti ndirege kuvaka pamusoro penheyo dzeumwe;
Romans 15:21 asi, sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Vasina kuudzwa zvake, vachaona, nevasina kunzwa, vachanzwisisa.
Romans 15:22 Nekuda kweizvozviwo ndakadzivirirwa kazhinji kuuya kwamuri;
Romans 15:23 asi ikozvino zvandisisina nzvimbo pamatunhu awa, uye ndine chishuwo chikuru kwemakore mazhinji chekuuya kwamuri;
Romans 15:24 saizvozvo kana ndichaenda kuSipania, ndichauya kwamuri; nokuti ndinovimba kukuonai parwendo rwangu, nekuperekedzwa nemwi ikoko, kana ndatanga ndambogutswa muchikamu ndinemwi.
Romans 15:25 Asi ikozvinowo ndinoenda kuJerusarema, ndichishumira vatsvene.
Romans 15:26 Nokuti zvakavafadza Makedhonia neAkaya kupa chimwe chipo varombo vevatsvene vari paJerusarema.
Romans 15:27 Nokuti zvakavafadza, uye vane ngava navo. Nokuti kana vahedheni vakaisawo ruoko pazvinhu zvavo zvemweya, vane ngavawo rekuvashandira pazvinhu zvenyama.
Romans 15:28 Naizvozvo kana ndapedza <transChange type="added">chinhu</transChange> ichi, ndaisa mucherechedzo chibereko ichi kwavari, ndichabva ndiende kuSipania ndichipfuura nekwenyu.
Romans 15:29 Uye ndinoziva kuti kana ndichiuya kwamuri ndichauya pakuzara kwemaropafadzo eevhangeri yaKristu.
Romans 15:30 Zvino ndinokukumbirisai, hama, nekuda kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, uye nekuda kwerudo rweMweya, kuti murwise pamwe neni paminyengetero kuna Mwari pamusoro pangu;
Romans 15:31 kuti ndisunungurwe kune vasingatendi muJudhiya, uye kuti basa rangu reJerusarema rigamuchirike kuvatsvene;
Romans 15:32 kuti ndiuye kwamuri nemufaro nechido chaMwari, ndivandudzwe pamwe nemwi.
Romans 15:33 Zvino Mwari werugare <transChange type="added">ngaave</transChange> nemwi mese. Ameni.  <chapter eID="Rom.15"/><div eID="gen1332" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1331" type="section"/>
Romans 16:0 <div sID="gen1333" type="section"/> <chapter n="16" osisID="Rom.16" sID="Rom.16"/>  <div sID="gen1334" type="x-p"/>
Romans 16:1 Ndinorumbidza kwamuri Febhe hanzvadzi yedu, anova murandakadzi wekereke iri paKenikireya;
Romans 16:2 kuti mumugamuchire muna Ishe sezvinofanira vatsvene, uye kuti mumubatsire panhau ipi neipi yaangashaiwa kwamuri; nokuti iyewo wakava mubatsiri wevazhinji, newangu ndomene.
Romans 16:3 Kwazisai Prisira naAkwira vashandi pamwe neni muna Kristu Jesu.
Romans 16:4 Ivo nekuda kweupenyu hwangu vakaradzika mutsipa wavo pachavo, vandisingavongi ini ndega, asi nemakereke ese evahedheni;
Romans 16:5 <transChange type="added">kwazisai</transChange>wo kereke iri paimba yavo. Kwazisai Epaeneto mudikanwi wangu, anova chibereko chekutanga cheAkaya muna Kristu.
Romans 16:6 Kwazisai Maria, wakatishandira zvikuru.
Romans 16:7 Kwazisai Andoroniko naJunia hama dzangu nevakasungwa pamwe neni, vane mbiri pakati pevaapositori, vakanditangirawo kuva muna Kristu.
Romans 16:8 Kwazisai Amupiriyasi mudikanwi wangu muna Ishe.
Romans 16:9 Kwazisai Obhano mushandi pamwe nesu muna Kristu, naStako mudikanwi wangu.
Romans 16:10 Kwazisai Apere anotendwa muna Kristu. Kwazisai vekwaArisitobhuro.
Romans 16:11 Kwazisai Herodhio hama yangu. Kwazisai vekwaNakiso, vari muna Ishe.
Romans 16:12 Kwazisai Trufaina naTrufosa <transChange type="added">vakadzi</transChange> vanoshanda muna Ishe. Kwazisai Perisisi <transChange type="added">mukadzi</transChange> anodikanwa, wakashanda zvikuru muna Ishe.
Romans 16:13 Kwazisai Rufosi wakasanangurwa muna Ishe, namai vake vari vanguwo.
Romans 16:14 Kwazisai Asingirita, Firegoni, Herimasi, Patrobhasi, Herimesi, nehama dzinavo.
Romans 16:15 Kwazisai Firorogosi naJuria, Nerusi nehanzvadzi yake, naOrimba, nevatsvene vese vanavo.
Romans 16:16 Kwazisanai nekutsvoda kutsvene. Makereke aKristu anokukwazisai.
Romans 16:17 Zvino ndinokukumbirisai, hama, ngwarirai avo vanoita mhesaniso uye zvigumbuso, zvinopesana nedzidziso yamakadzidza imwi, uye muvanzvenge.
Romans 16:18 Nokuti vakadaro havashandiri Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu, asi dumbu ravo; uye neshoko rakanaka nekutaura kwakanaka vanonyengera moyo yevasina mhosva.
Romans 16:19 Nokuti kuteerera kwenyu kwakasvika kune vese. Naizvozvo ndinofara pamusoro penyu; asi ndinoda kuti muve vakachenjera kune chakanaka, asi vakachena kune chakaipa.
Romans 16:20 Zvino Mwari werugare achakurumidza kupwanya Satani pasi petsoka dzenyu. Nyasha dzaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> nemwi. Ameni.
Romans 16:21 Timotio, mushandi pamwe neni, naRukio naJasoni naSosipatro hama dzangu vanokukwazisai.
Romans 16:22 Ini Tetiosi, anonyora tsamba, ndinokukwazisai muna Ishe.
Romans 16:23 Gayosi, mugamuchiri wangu nekereke yese, anokukwazisai. Erastosi muchengeti wemari yeguta anokukwazisai, naKwaritosi hama.
Romans 16:24 Nyasha dzaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> nemwi mese. Ameni.
Romans 16:25 Zvino kune ane simba rekukusimbisai sezvinoreva evhangeri yangu nekuparidzwa kwaJesu Kristu, zvichienderana nekuzarurwa kwezvakavanzika, zvisina kutaurwa zvakavanzwa nguva dzakare,
Romans 16:26 asi ikozvino zvinoratidzwa, uye nemagwaro evaporofita semurairo waMwari wekusingaperi, wakaziviswa kumarudzi ese pakuteerera kwerutendo,
Romans 16:27 kuna Mwari iye wakachenjera ega <transChange type="added">ngakuve</transChange> nekurumbidzwa naJesu Kristu, kusvika narinhi. Ameni. <div eID="gen1334" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1333" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Rom.16"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1284" osisID="Rom" type="book"/>
I Corinthians 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="1Cor" sID="gen1335" type="book"/>   <milestone n="1 VAKORINDE" type="x-usfm-h"/>
I Corinthians 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="1Cor.1" sID="1Cor.1"/>
I Corinthians 1:1 Pauro wakadanwa <transChange type="added">kuva</transChange> muapositori waJesu Kristu nechido chaMwari, naSositenesi hama,
I Corinthians 1:2 kukereke yaMwari iri paKorinde, kune vakaitwa vatsvene muna Jesu Kristu, vakadanwa <transChange type="added">kuva</transChange> vatsvene, pamwe nevese vanodana kuzita raIshe wedu Kristu Jesu panzvimbo yega-yega, wavo neweduwo:
I Corinthians 1:3 Nyasha kwamuri nerugare rwunobva kuna Mwari Baba vedu naIshe Jesu Kristu.
I Corinthians 1:4 Ndinovonga Mwari wangu nguva dzese maererano nemwi, nekuda kwenyasha dzaMwari dzakapiwa kwamuri muna Kristu Jesu;
I Corinthians 1:5 kuti pachinhu chese makafumiswa maari, panhaurwa yese neruzivo rwese,
I Corinthians 1:6 sezvo uchapupu hwaKristu hwakasimbiswa mamuri;
I Corinthians 1:7 kuti hamushaiwi pane chimwe chipo, muchimirira kuratidzwa pachena kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu,
I Corinthians 1:8 iye achakusimbisaiwo kusvika kumagumo, <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> musava nemhosva pazuva raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu.
I Corinthians 1:9 Mwari wakatendeka, wamakadanwa kubudikidza naye mukudyidzana kweMwanakomana wake Jesu Kristu Ishe wedu. <div eID="gen1337" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1336" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 1:10 Zvino ndinokukumbirisai, hama, nezita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, kuti mese mutaure chinhu chimwe, uye pasava nekupatsanurana pakati penyu, asi muve vakakwana pamurangariro umwe nemuonero umwe.
I Corinthians 1:11 Nokuti ndakaudzwa pamusoro penyu, hama dzangu, nevekwaKirowa, kuti kune makakava pakati penyu.
I Corinthians 1:12 Zvino ndinoreva izvi, kuti umwe neumwe wenyu anoti: Ini ndiri waPauro, iniwo waAporo, asi ini waKefasi, iniwo waKristu.
I Corinthians 1:13 Kristu wakapatsanurwa here? Ko Pauro wakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa imwi here, kana makabhabhatidzwa muzita raPauro here?
I Corinthians 1:14 Ndinovonga Mwari kuti handina kubhabhatidza umwe wenyu, kunze kwaKrispo naGayo;
I Corinthians 1:15 kuti kurege kuva neanoti ndakabhabhatidza muzita rangu ndomene.
I Corinthians 1:16 Uye ndakabhabhatidzawo imba yaStefana; kunze kweizvi handizivi kana ndakabhabhatidza umwe munhu.
I Corinthians 1:17 Nokuti Kristu wakandituma kwete kuzobhabhatidza, asi kuzoparidza evhangeri; kwete nenjere dzeshoko, kuti zvimwe muchinjikwa waKristu ushaiswe maturo. <div eID="gen1339" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1338" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 1:18 Nokuti shoko remuchinjikwa kuna vanoparadzwa upenzi, asi kwatiri isu vanoponeswa isimba raMwari.
I Corinthians 1:19 Nokuti kwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Ndichaparadza njere dzevakachenjera, ndichashaisa maturo kunzwisisa kwevanzwisisi.
I Corinthians 1:20 Aripi wakachenjera? Aripi munyori? Aripi mukakavari wenyika ino? Mwari haana kuita uchenjeri hwenyika ino upenzi here?
I Corinthians 1:21 Nokuti zvakadaro muuchenjeri hwaMwari nyika neuchenjeri haina kuziva Mwari, zvakafadza Mwari neupenzi hwemharidzo kuponesa vanotenda.
I Corinthians 1:22 Nokuti neVaJudha vanokumbira chiratidzo, VaGirikiwo vanotsvaka uchenjeri;
I Corinthians 1:23 asi isu tinoparidza Kristu wakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa, kuVaJudha chigumbuso, nekuVaGiriki upenzi;
I Corinthians 1:24 asi kune vakadanwa, VaJudha pamwe neVaGiriki, Kristu <transChange type="added">i</transChange>simba raMwari nenjere dzaMwari;
I Corinthians 1:25 nokuti upenzi hwaMwari hwakachenjera kupfuura hwevanhu, neutera hwaMwari hwakasimba kupfuura hwevanhu.
I Corinthians 1:26 Nokuti tarirai kudanwa kwenyu, hama, kuti ha<transChange type="added">va</transChange>si vazhinji vakachenjera panyama, ha<transChange type="added">va</transChange>si vazhinji vane simba, ha<transChange type="added">va</transChange>si vazhinji vepamusoro;
I Corinthians 1:27 asi Mwari wakasarudza zvinhu zveupenzi zvenyika, kuti anyadzise vakachenjera; uye Mwari wakasarudza zvinhu zveutera zvenyika, kuti anyadzise zvine simba;
I Corinthians 1:28 nezvinhu zvepasi zvenyika nezvinhu zvinozvidzwa Mwari wakasarudza, nezvinhu zvisipo, kuti ashaise zvinhu zviripo maturo;
I Corinthians 1:29 kuti kusava nenyama ingazvikudza pamberi pake.
I Corinthians 1:30 Asi naye imwi muri muna Kristu Jesu, wakaitirwa isu uchenjeri hunobva kuna Mwari, nekururama, nekuitwa vatsvene, nerudzikunuro;
I Corinthians 1:31 kuti sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Anozvikudza, ngaazvikudze muna Ishe. <chapter eID="1Cor.1"/><div eID="gen1341" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1340" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 2:0 <div sID="gen1342" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="1Cor.2" sID="1Cor.2"/>  <div sID="gen1343" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 2:1 Zvino ini, hama, pakusvika kwangu kwamuri, handina kusvika neunyanzvi hweshoko kana hwenjere, ndichiparidza kwamuri uchapupu hwaMwari.
I Corinthians 2:2 Nokuti ndakagura kuti ndisaziva chinhu pakati penyu, kunze kwaJesu Kristu, naiye wakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa.
I Corinthians 2:3 Uye ini ndakange ndinemwi muutera nemukutya nemukudedera kukuru.
I Corinthians 2:4 Neshoko rangu nemharidzo yangu hazvina kuva nemashoko ekugombedzera enjere dzevanhu, asi mukuratidza kweMweya nekwesimba;
I Corinthians 2:5 kuti rutendo rwenyu rwurege kuva munjere dzevanhu, asi musimba raMwari.
I Corinthians 2:6 Asi njere tinodzitaura pakati pevakakwana, asi njere dzisati dziri dzenyika ino, kana dzevatongi venyika ino, vanozoshaiswa maturo;
I Corinthians 2:7 asi tinotaura njere dzaMwari muchakavanzika, dzakavigwa, Mwari dzaakagara agadza nyika isati yavapo dzive kubwinya kwedu;
I Corinthians 2:8 dzisina umwe wevatongi venyika ino wakaziva; nokuti dai vakaziva, vangadai vasina kuroverera pamuchinjikwa Ishe wekubwinya.
I Corinthians 2:9 Asi sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Izvo ziso zvarisina kuona, nenzeve zvaisina kunzwa, ne<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>sina kupinda mumoyo wemunhu, izvo Mwari zvaakagadzirira vanomuda.
I Corinthians 2:10 Asi Mwari wakazarurira isu neMweya wake; nokuti Mweya unonzvera zvinhu zvese, kunyange zvinhu zvakadzika zvaMwari.
I Corinthians 2:11 Nokuti ndiani pavanhu anoziva zvemunhu, kunze kwemweya wemunhu uri maari? Saizvozvowo zvaMwari hakuna munhu anoziva, kunze kweMweya waMwari.
I Corinthians 2:12 Nesu hatina kugamuchira mweya wenyika, asi Mweya unobva kuna Mwari, kuti tizive zvinhu zvatinopiwa pachena naMwari;
I Corinthians 2:13 zvatinotaurawo, kwete mumashoko njere dzevanhu adzinodzidzisa, asi Mweya Mutsvene waanodzidzisa, tichienzanisa zvemweya nezvemweya.
I Corinthians 2:14 Asi munhu wechisikirwo haagamuchiri zvinhu zveMweya waMwari; nokuti upenzi kwaari, uye haagoni kunzwisisa, nokuti zvinonzverwa pamweya.
I Corinthians 2:15 Asi wemweya anonzvera zvinhu zvese, asi iye haanzverwi nemunhu.
I Corinthians 2:16 Nokuti ndiani wakaziva fungwa yaIshe, kuti amuraire? Asi isu tine fungwa yaKristu. <chapter eID="1Cor.2"/><div eID="gen1343" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1342" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 3:0 <div sID="gen1344" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="1Cor.3" sID="1Cor.3"/>  <div sID="gen1345" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 3:1 Zvino ini, hama, ndakange ndisingagoni kutaura nemwi sekune veMweya, asi sekune venyama, sekune vacheche muna Kristu.
I Corinthians 3:2 Ndakakunwisai mukaka, uye kwete kudya kukukutu; nokuti makange musati mogona <transChange type="added">kudya</transChange>, asi naikozvino hamusati mogona;
I Corinthians 3:3 nokuti muchiri venyama; nokuti zva<transChange type="added">pachine</transChange> godo pakati penyu, negakava nekupatsanurana, hamusi venyama, muchifamba zvinoenderana nemunhu here?
I Corinthians 3:4 Nokuti kana umwe achiti: Ini ndiri waPauro, neumwe <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Ini waAporo, hamusi venyama here?
I Corinthians 3:5 Ko Pauro chii, naAporo chii, asi vabati vamakatenda kubudikidza navo, Ishe sezvaanopawo umwe neumwe?
I Corinthians 3:6 Ini ndakadzvara, Aporo wakadiridza, asi Mwari wakakurisa.
I Corinthians 3:7 Naizvozvo anodzvara haasi chinhu, kana anodiridza, asi Mwari anokudza.
I Corinthians 3:8 Zvino anodzvara neanodiridza ndevamwe; asi umwe neumwe achagamuchira mubairo wake zvichienderana nebasa rake.
I Corinthians 3:9 Nokuti tiri vashandi vaMwari pamwe naye; muri munda waMwari, chivakwa chaMwari. <div eID="gen1345" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1344" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 3:10 Zvichienderana nenyasha dzaMwari dzakapiwa kwandiri, semuvaki nyanzvi wakachenjera ndakaronga nheyo, uye umwe anovaka pamusoro payo. Asi umwe neumwe ngaachenjerere kuti anovaka sei pamusoro payo.
I Corinthians 3:11 Nokuti hakuna umwe anogona kuisa imwe nheyo kunze kweiyo yakaiswa, inova Jesu Kristu.
I Corinthians 3:12 Zvino kana umwe achivaka pamusoro penheyo iyi, goridhe, sirivheri, mabwe anokosha, matanda, uswa, mashanga,
I Corinthians 3:13 basa reumwe neumwe richaratidzwa; nokuti zuva richazvibudisa pachena, nokuti richazarurwa mumoto; uye moto uchaidza basa reumwe neumwe kuti rakadini.
I Corinthians 3:14 Kana basa raani nani raakavaka pamusoro <transChange type="added">payo</transChange> richigara, achagamuchira mubairo.
I Corinthians 3:15 Kana basa raani nani richizopiswa, acharasikirwa; asi iye amene achaponeswa, asi saizvozvo sewakabuda nemumoto.
I Corinthians 3:16 Hamuzivi here kuti muri tembere yaMwari, uye Mweya waMwari unogara mamuri?
I Corinthians 3:17 Kana ani nani achiparadza tembere yaMwari, Mwari achamuparadza iye; nokuti tembere yaMwari itsvene, yamuri imwi.
I Corinthians 3:18 Ngakurege kuva neanozvinyengera; kana umwe pakati penyu achifunga kuti wakachenjera panyika ino, ngaave benzi, kuti ave wakachenjera.
I Corinthians 3:19 Nokuti uchenjeri hwenyika ino upenzi kuna Mwari. Nokuti kwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Anobata vakachenjera paumhare hwavo;
I Corinthians 3:20 uyezve: Ishe anoziva ndangariro dzevakachenjera, kuti hadzina maturo.
I Corinthians 3:21 Naizvozvo ngakurege kuva neanozvikudza nevanhu; nokuti zvinhu zvese ndezvenyu,
I Corinthians 3:22 kana Pauro, kana Aporo, kana Kefasi, kana nyika, kana upenyu, kana rufu, kana zvinhu zviripo, kana zvinhu zvinouya; zvese ndezvenyu,
I Corinthians 3:23 uye imwi muri vaKristu, naKristu <transChange type="added">nde</transChange>waMwari.  <chapter eID="1Cor.3"/><div eID="gen1347" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1346" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 4:0 <div sID="gen1348" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="1Cor.4" sID="1Cor.4"/>  <div sID="gen1349" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 4:1 Munhu ngaatirangarire sezvizvi, sevabati vaKristu, nevachengeti vezvakavanzika zvaMwari.
I Corinthians 4:2 Uyezve, zvinotsvakwa pavachengeti, kuti ani nani awanikwe akatendeka.
I Corinthians 4:3 Asi kwandiri chinhu chidiki-diki kuti nditongeswe nemwi, kana nekutonga kwevanhu; asi neni handizvitongesi.
I Corinthians 4:4 Nokuti handirangariri chinhu kwandiri, zvakadaro handinzi ndakarurama neizvozvo; asi anonditonga ndiIshe.
I Corinthians 4:5 Naizvozvo regai kutonga chinhu nguva isati yasvika, kusvikira Ishe auya, iye achabudisawo pachena zvinhu zvakavanzika zverima, uye acharatidza mazano emoyo; uye ipapo munhu umwe neumwe acharumbidzwa naMwari. <div eID="gen1349" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1348" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 4:6 Zvino zvinhu izvi, hama, ndinozvifananidzira neni naAporo nekuda kwenyu, kuti mudzidze kwatiri kuti musafunga kupfuura zvakanyorwa, kuti umwe arege kuzvikudza neumwe muchipikisa umwe.
I Corinthians 4:7 Nokuti ndiani wakaita kuti usiyane <transChange type="added">nevamwe</transChange>? Uye chii chaunacho chausina kugamuchira? Uye kanawo wakagamuchira, unozvikudzirei seusina kugamuchira?
I Corinthians 4:8 Matoguta, matofuma, matonga kunze kwedu; ndinodawo kuti mutonge, kuti isuwo titonge pamwe nemwi.
I Corinthians 4:9 Nokuti ndinofunga kuti Mwari wakatigadza isu vaapositori vekupedzisira, sevakatemerwa rufu; nokuti takaitwa chiokerwa kunyika, nekuvatumwa, nekuvanhu.
I Corinthians 4:10 Isu <transChange type="added">tiri</transChange> mapenzi nekuda kwaKristu, asi imwi makachenjera muna Kristu; isu tine utera, asi imwi makasimba; imwi munokudzwa, asi isu tinozvidzwa.
I Corinthians 4:11 Kusvikira nguva ino tine nzarawo, uye tine nyota, uye takashama, uye tinorohwa netsiva, uye tiri vambeyi,
I Corinthians 4:12 uye tinoshingaira tichishanda nemaoko edu pachedu; tinoti tichitukwa tinoropafadza, tinoti tichishushwa tinotsunga moyo;
I Corinthians 4:13 kana tichinyeyewa tinonyengerera; tinoitwa setsvina yenyika, marara ezvinhu zvese, kusvikira ikozvino.
I Corinthians 4:14 Handinyoreri zvinhu izvi kuti ndikunyadzisei, asi savana vangu vanodikanwa ndino<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>nyevera<transChange type="added">i</transChange>.
I Corinthians 4:15 Nokuti kunyange mune varairidzi zvuru gumi muna Kristu, zvakadaro ha<transChange type="added">muna</transChange> madzibaba mazhinji; nokuti muna Kristu Jesu ini ndakakuberekai kubudikidza neevhangeri.
I Corinthians 4:16 Naizvozvo ndinokukumbirisai: Ivai vatevedzeri vangu.
I Corinthians 4:17 Nemhaka iyi ndatuma Timotio kwamuri, anova mwana wangu anodikanwa, uye wakatendeka muna Ishe, achakuyeuchidzai nzira dzangu dziri muna Kristu, sezvandinodzidzisa kwese pakereke imwe neimwe.
I Corinthians 4:18 Zvino vamwe vakazvikudza sezvinonzi handiuyi kwamuri.
I Corinthians 4:19 Asi ndichauya kwamuri nekukurumidza, kana Ishe achida, uye ndichaziva, kwete shoko revanozvikudza, asi simba.
I Corinthians 4:20 Nokuti ushe hwaMwari hahuzi pashoko, asi pasimba.
I Corinthians 4:21 Munodei? Ndiuye kwamuri netsvimbo here, kana murudo nemweya weunyoro?  <chapter eID="1Cor.4"/><div eID="gen1351" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1350" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 5:0 <div sID="gen1352" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="1Cor.5" sID="1Cor.5"/>  <div sID="gen1353" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 5:1 Zvinonzwikwa chose <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> upombwe <transChange type="added">huripo</transChange> pakati penyu, uye upombwe hwakadaro husingataurwi kunyange pakati pevahedheni, zvekuti umwe ave nemukadzi wababa vake.
I Corinthians 5:2 Asi imwi munozvikudza, uye pachinzvimbo chaizvozvo hamuna kuchema, kuti wakaita chiito ichi abviswe pakati penyu.
I Corinthians 5:3 Nokuti iniwo zvirokwazvo, sendisipo pamuviri, asi ndiripo pamweya ndatogura <transChange type="added">zve</transChange>uyo wakaita chiito chakadai ichi, sendinenge <transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>ripo,
I Corinthians 5:4 muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, maungana nemweya wangu nesimba raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu,
I Corinthians 5:5 kukumikidza wakadai kuna Satani mukuparadzwa kwenyama, kuti mweya uponeswe pazuva raIshe Jesu.
I Corinthians 5:6 Kuzvikudza kwenyu hakuna kunaka. Hamuzivi here kuti mbiriso shoma inovirisa mukanyiwa wese?
I Corinthians 5:7 Naizvozvo sukai kwazvo mbiriso yekare, kuti muve mukanyiwa mutsva, sezvamusina kuiswa mbiriso. Nokuti nepasika yedu yakabairwa isu, <transChange type="added">iye</transChange> Kristu.
I Corinthians 5:8 Saka ngatichengetedze mutambo, kwete nembiriso yekare, kana nembiriso yekuipa nekutadza; asi nechingwa chisina mbiriso chakatendeka nechechokwadi.
I Corinthians 5:9 Ndakakunyorerai mutsamba kuti musafambidzana nemhombwe;
I Corinthians 5:10 asi kwete zvakazara nemhombwe dzenyika ino, kana nevachivi, kana nevapambi, kana vanonamata zvifananidzo, nokuti kana zvakadaro zvingafanira kuti mubude munyika.
I Corinthians 5:11 Asi ikozvino ndakunyorerai kuti murege kufambidzana, kana munhu achiidzwa hama ari mhombwe, kana muchivi, kana munamati wezvifananidzo, kana mutuki, kana muraradzi, kana mupambi; musatongodya newakadai.
I Corinthians 5:12 Nokuti ini ndinei nekutongawo vari kunze? Imwi hamutongi vari mukati here?
I Corinthians 5:13 Asi avo vari kunze Mwari anotonga. Uye dzingai wakaipa abve pakati penyu pachenyu.  <chapter eID="1Cor.5"/><div eID="gen1353" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1352" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 6:0 <div sID="gen1354" type="section"/> <chapter n="6" osisID="1Cor.6" sID="1Cor.6"/>  <div sID="gen1355" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 6:1 Umwe wenyu anoti ane mhosva neumwe unotsunga kutongwa pamberi pevasakarurama uye pasiri pamberi pevatsvene here?
I Corinthians 6:2 Hamuzivi here kuti vatsvene vachatonga nyika? Zvino kana nyika ichizotongwa nemwi, hamuna kufanira <transChange type="added">kutonga</transChange> mhosva diki-diki here?
I Corinthians 6:3 Hamuzivi here kuti tichatonga vatumwa? Zvikuru sei zveupenyu huno?
I Corinthians 6:4 Naizvozvo kana mune mhosva dzezvinhu zveupenyu huno, vagadzei avo vanozvidzwa pakereke <transChange type="added">vatonge</transChange>.
I Corinthians 6:5 Ndinotaura kuti munyare. Naizvozvo hakuna munhu wakachenjera pakati penyu here, kana neumwe, angagona kutonga pakati pehama dzake?
I Corinthians 6:6 Asi hama inomhan'arira hama, uye izvi <transChange type="added">achizviita</transChange> pamberi pevasingatendi.
I Corinthians 6:7 Zvino naizvozvo patova nekukundikana kwazvo pakati penyu, kuti munomhan'arirana. Munoregerei kutenda kutadzirwa pakudaro? Munoregerei kutenda kubiridzirwa pakudaro?
I Corinthians 6:8 Asi imwi munotadza nekubiridzira, uye izvi <transChange type="added">munozviita</transChange> kuhama.
I Corinthians 6:9 Kana hamuzivi here kuti vasakarurama havazogari nhaka yeushe hwaMwari? Musatsauswa; hakuna mhombwe, kana vanamati vezvifananidzo, kana zvifeve, kana vakapata paungochani, kana vanorara nevamwe varume,
I Corinthians 6:10 kana mbavha, kana vachivi, kana vararadzi, kana vatuki, kana vapambi, vachagara nhaka yeushe hwaMwari.
I Corinthians 6:11 Uye vamwe venyu vakange vari izvozvi; asi makashambidzwa, asi makaitwa vatsvene, asi makanzi makarurama muzita raIshe Jesu, uye neMweya waMwari wedu. <div eID="gen1355" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1354" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 6:12 Zvinhu zvese zviri pamutemo kwandiri, asi hazvisi zvinhu zvese zvinobatsira; zvinhu zvese zviri pamutemo kwandiri, asi ini handizotongwi nechinhu.
I Corinthians 6:13 Kudya <transChange type="added">nde</transChange>kwedumbu, nedumbu <transChange type="added">nde</transChange>rezvekudya; asi Mwari achaparadza zviri zviviri iro naizvo. Zvino muviri hausi weupombwe, asi waIshe, naIshe ndevemuviri.
I Corinthians 6:14 Uye Mwari wakamutsa Ishewo achatimutsa nesu nesimba rake.
I Corinthians 6:15 Hamuzivi here kuti miviri yenyu mitezo yaKristu? Zvino ndichatora mitezo yaKristu ndikaita mitezo yechifeve here? Ngazvisadaro!
I Corinthians 6:16 Kana hamuzivi kuti anobatanidzwa nechifeve wava muviri umwe <transChange type="added">nacho</transChange> here? Nokuti ava vaviri, anoti, vachava nyama imwe.
I Corinthians 6:17 Asi anobatanidzwa naIshe wava mweya umwe <transChange type="added">naye</transChange>.
I Corinthians 6:18 Tizai upombwe. Chivi chese munhu chaanoita chiri kunze kwemuviri; asi anoita upombwe anotadzira muviri wake amene.
I Corinthians 6:19 Kana hamuzivi here kuti muviri wenyu itembere yaMweya Mutsvene <transChange type="added">ari</transChange> mamuri, wamunaye achibva kuna Mwari, uye imwi hamusi venyu?
I Corinthians 6:20 Nokuti makatengwa nemutengo; naizvozvo rumbidzai Mwari mumuviri wenyu, uye mumweya wenyu, zviri zvaMwari.  <chapter eID="1Cor.6"/><div eID="gen1357" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1356" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 7:0 <div sID="gen1358" type="section"/> <chapter n="7" osisID="1Cor.7" sID="1Cor.7"/>  <div sID="gen1359" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 7:1 Zvino maererano nezvinhu zvamakandinyorera, <transChange type="added">ndinoti</transChange>: Zvakanaka kumunhu kuti asabata mukadzi.
I Corinthians 7:2 Asi nekuda kweupombwe, umwe neumwe ngaave nemukadzi wake pachake, ne<transChange type="added">mukadzi</transChange> umwe neumwe ngaave nemurume wake pachake.
I Corinthians 7:3 Murume ngaaripire mukadzi chido chakafanira; nemukadzi saizvozvowo kumurume.
I Corinthians 7:4 Mukadzi haana simba pamusoro pemuviri wake pachake, asi murume; uye saizvozvowo murume haana simba pamusoro pemuviri wake pachake, asi mukadzi.
I Corinthians 7:5 Musanyimana, kunze kwekutenderana kwechinguva, kuti muzvipe kukutsanya nekunyengetera, mugosanganazve, kuti Satani arege kukuidzai pakusazvidzora kwenyu.
I Corinthians 7:6 Asi ndinotaura izvi nemvumo, kwete nemurairo.
I Corinthians 7:7 Nokuti ndinoda kuti dai vanhu vese vava seni; asi umwe neumwe ane chipo chake pachake chinobva kuna Mwari, umwe chakadai, umwewo chakadai.
I Corinthians 7:8 Asi ndinoti kune vasina kuwana nekuchirikadzi: Zvakanaka kwavari kana vachigara seniwo.
I Corinthians 7:9 Asi kana vasina kuzvidzora, ngavawane; nokuti zviri nani kuwana pakutsva.
I Corinthians 7:10 Zvino kune vakawana ndinoraira, kwete ini, asi Ishe, kuti mukadzi arege kuparadzana nemurume.
I Corinthians 7:11 Asi kana iye achiparadzana <transChange type="added">naye</transChange>, ngaarambe asina kuwanikwa, kana ayananiswe nemurume, nemurume ngaarege kurasa mukadzi.
I Corinthians 7:12 Zvino kune vamwe ndini ndinotaura, kwete Ishe: Kana hama ipi ine mukadzi asingatendi, uye iye achifara kugara naye, ngaarege kumurasa.
I Corinthians 7:13 Nemukadzi ane murume asingatendi, uye iye achida hake kugara naye, ngaarege kumusiya.
I Corinthians 7:14 Nokuti murume asingatendi anoitwa mutsvene nemukadzi, nemukadzi asingatendi anoitwa mutsvene nemurume. Kana zvisina kudaro vana venyu vaiva netsvina, asi zvino vatsvene.
I Corinthians 7:15 Zvino kana asingatendi achizviparadzanisa, ngaazviparadzanise; hamarume kana hamakadzi haisungwi pane zvakadaro; asi Mwari wakatidanira murugare.
I Corinthians 7:16 Nokuti unoziva nei, mukadzi, kana uchaponesa murume? Kana unoziva nei, murume, kana uchaponesa mukadzi?
I Corinthians 7:17 Chete Mwari sezvaakagovera kune umwe neumwe, Ishe sezvaakadana umwe neumwe, ngaafambe saizvozvo. Saizvozvowo ndinoraira pamakereke ese.
I Corinthians 7:18 Kune wakadanwa adzingiswa here? Ngaarege kuva asakadzingiswa. Kune wakadanwa asakadzingiswa here? Ngaaarege kudzingiswa.
I Corinthians 7:19 Dzingiso hachisi chinhu, nekusadzingiswa hachisi chinhu, asi kuchengetwa kwemirairo yaMwari.
I Corinthians 7:20 Umwe neumwe ngaagare mukudanwa kwaakadanwa makuri.
I Corinthians 7:21 Wakadanwa uri muranda here? Usazvidya moyo; asiwo kana ungasunungurwa, zviri nani u<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>shandise.
I Corinthians 7:22 Nokuti uyo wakadanwa muna Ishe <transChange type="added">ari</transChange> nhapwa, wava musunungurwa waIshe; saizvozvowo uyo wakadanwa akasununguka, wava nhapwa yaKristu.
I Corinthians 7:23 Makatengwa nemutengo; musava varanda vevanhu.
I Corinthians 7:24 Umwe neumwe zvaakadanirwa, hama, ngaagare pazviri anaMwari.
I Corinthians 7:25 Asi maererano nemhandara handina murairo waIshe; asi ndinopa maonero <transChange type="added">angu</transChange> sewakawana tsitsi naIshe kuva wakatendeka.
I Corinthians 7:26 Naizvozvo ndinofunga kuti izvi zvakanaka nekuda kwematambudziko aripo, kuti zvakanakira munhu kuti adai.
I Corinthians 7:27 Wakasungirirwa kumukadzi here? Usatsvaka kusunungurwa. Wakasunungurwa kubva kumukadzi here? Usatsvaka mukadzi.
I Corinthians 7:28 Asi zvino kana wawana, hauna kutadza; nemhandara kana yawanikwa, haina kutadza. Asi vakadaro vachava nedambudziko panyama; asi ini ndinoda kukutavirirai.
I Corinthians 7:29 Asi ndinozvitaura izvi, hama, kuti nguva ipfupi; kubva ikozvino nevane vakadzi ngavave sevasina;
I Corinthians 7:30 nevanochema, sevasingachemi; nevanofara, sevasingafari; nevanotenga, sevasina chinhu;
I Corinthians 7:31 nevanoshandisa nyika ino, se<transChange type="added">va</transChange>singa<transChange type="added">i</transChange>shandisi kwazvo; nokuti chimiro chenyika ino chinopfuura.
I Corinthians 7:32 Asi ndinoda kuti murege kuva nekufunganya. Asina kuwana anofunganya zvinhu zvaIshe, <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> angafadza Ishe sei;
I Corinthians 7:33 asi wakawana anofunganya zvinhu zvenyika, <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> angafadza mukadzi sei.
I Corinthians 7:34 Mukadzi wakasiyaniswa nemhandara. Asina kuwanikwa anofunganya zvinhu zvaIshe, kuti ave mutsvene zvese pamuviri nepamweya; asi uyo wakawanikwa anofunganya zvinhu zvenyika, <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> angafadza murume sei.
I Corinthians 7:35 Izvi ndinotaurira rubatsiro rwenyu pachenyu; kwete kuti ndikande musungo pamusoro penyu, asi zvakafanira nekunamatira pana Ishe musingapinganidzwi.
I Corinthians 7:36 Asi kana umwe achifunga kuti anozvibata zvisakafanira kumhandara yake, iyo yakurisa, uye zvakafanira kuti zviitike saizvozvo, ngaaite zvaanoda, haatadzi; ngavawanane.
I Corinthians 7:37 Asi anomira akasimba mumoyo, asingamanikidzwi chinhu, uye ane simba pamusoro pechido chake pachake, akatema izvi mumoyo make kuti achachengeta mhandara yake, anoita zvakanaka.
I Corinthians 7:38 Naizvozvowo uyo anowananisa anoita zvakanaka; asi asingawananisi anoita zviri nani.
I Corinthians 7:39 Mukadzi wakasungwa nemurairo nguva dzese murume wake achirarama; asi kana murume wake afa, wasununguka kuwanikwa newaanoda, muna Ishe chete.
I Corinthians 7:40 Asi anganyanya kufara kana achigara akadaro, pakufunga kwangu; uye ndinofunga kuti neni ndine Mweya waMwari.  <chapter eID="1Cor.7"/><div eID="gen1359" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1358" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 8:0 <div sID="gen1360" type="section"/> <chapter n="8" osisID="1Cor.8" sID="1Cor.8"/>  <div sID="gen1361" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 8:1 Zvino maererano nezvakabairwa zvifananidzo, tinoziva kuti tese tine ruzivo. Ruzivo rwunotutumadza, asi rudo rwunovaka.
I Corinthians 8:2 Uye kana ani nani achifunga kuti anoziva chinhu, haasati aziva chinhu sezvaanofanira kuziva;
I Corinthians 8:3 asi kana ani achida Mwari, ndiye anozikanwa naye.
I Corinthians 8:4 Naizvozvo maererano nekudya zvinhu zvakabairwa zvifananidzo, tinoziva kuti chifananidzo hachisi chinhu panyika, uye kuti hakuna umwe Mwari kunze kweumwe.
I Corinthians 8:5 Nokuti kunyange varipo vanonzi vamwari, kana kudenga, kana panyika (sezvavaripo vamwari vazhinji, nemadzishe mazhinji),
I Corinthians 8:6 asi kwatiri kuna Mwari umwe, Baba, zvinhu zvese zvinouya naye, nesu tiri maari; naIshe umwe, Jesu Kristu, zvinhu zvese <transChange type="added">zviripo</transChange> nekuda kwake, nesu <transChange type="added">tiripo</transChange> naye.
I Corinthians 8:7 Asi ruzivo harwuko kwavari vese; nokuti vamwe vane hana yechifananidzo kusvikira ikozvino, vanodya sezvakabairwa chifananidzo; nehana yavo isina simba inoshatiswa.
I Corinthians 8:8 Zvino kudya hakutiswededzi kuna Mwari; kwete nokuti kana tichidya, tinowanzirwa; uye kwete kuti kana tisingadyi, tinoshaiwa.
I Corinthians 8:9 Zvino chenjerai, zvimwe kodzero yenyu iyi ive chigumbuso kune avo vasina simba.
I Corinthians 8:10 Nokuti kana umwe achikuona iwe ane ruzivo ugere pakudya mutembere yechifananidzo, hana yeasina simba haingatsungiswi kuti adye izvo zvakabairwa zvifananidzo here?
I Corinthians 8:11 Uye neruzivo rwako hama isina simba ichaparara here, Kristu yaakafira?
I Corinthians 8:12 Zvino kana muchitadzira hama saizvozvo, muchikuvadza hana yavo isina simba, munotadzira Kristu.
I Corinthians 8:13 Naizvozvo kana kudya kuchigumbusa hama yangu, handingatongodyi nyama kusvikira narinhi, kuti ndirege kugumbusa hama yangu.  <chapter eID="1Cor.8"/><div eID="gen1361" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1360" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 9:0 <div sID="gen1362" type="section"/> <chapter n="9" osisID="1Cor.9" sID="1Cor.9"/>  <div sID="gen1363" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 9:1 Handisi muapositori here? Handisi wakasununguka here? Handina kuona Jesu Kristu Ishe wedu here? Imwi hamusi basa rangu muna Ishe here?
I Corinthians 9:2 Kana ndisiri muapositori kuna vamwe, asi zvirokwazvo ndiri <transChange type="added">iye</transChange> kwamuri; nokuti mucherechedzo wevuapositori hwangu ndimwi muna Ishe.
I Corinthians 9:3 Kuzvidavirira kwangu kune vanondinzvera ndeuku.
I Corinthians 9:4 Hatina simba here rekudya nekumwa?
I Corinthians 9:5 Hatina simba rekutenderera nehanzvadzi mudzimai sevamwewo vaapositori, nevanin'ina vaIshe naKefasi here?
I Corinthians 9:6 Kana ndini ndega naBhanabhasi tisina kodzero yekusashanda here?
I Corinthians 9:7 Ndiani anomboshanda muchiuto achizviripira mubairo? Ndiani anorima munda wemizambiringa, ndokusadya zvechibereko chawo? Kana ndiani anofudza boka akasadya zvemukaka weboka?
I Corinthians 9:8 Kuti zvinhu izvi ndinozvitaura semunhu? Kana murairo hautauriwo izvozvo here?
I Corinthians 9:9 Nokuti kwakanyorwa mumurairo waMozisi <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Usasunga muromo wenzombe inopura zviyo. Kuti Mwari ane hanya nenzombe?
I Corinthians 9:10 Kana anoreva zvirokwazvo nekuda kwedu? Nokuti kwakanyorwa nekuda kwedu, kuti anorima anofanira kurima mutariro, neanopura mutariro yake, kugoverwa mutariro.
I Corinthians 9:11 Kana isu takadzvara kwamuri zvinhu zvemweya, chinhu chikuru here kana isu tichicheka zvinhu zvenyu zvenyama?
I Corinthians 9:12 Kana vamwe vachigovana kodzero pamusoro penyu, isu hati<transChange type="added">va</transChange>dariki here? Asi hatina kushandisa kodzero iyi, asi tinoitira moyo murefu zvese, kuti tirege kupa chipinganidzo kuevhangeri yaKristu.
I Corinthians 9:13 Hamuzivi here kuti avo vanoshumira pazvinhu zvitsvene vanodya zvetembere, vanorindira paaritari vanogovana nearitari here?
I Corinthians 9:14 Saizvozvo naIshe wakaraira kuti avo vanoparidza evhangeri, vararame neevhangeri.
I Corinthians 9:15 Asi ini handina kushandisa chimwe chezvinhu izvi; uye handina kunyora zvinhu izvi kuti zviitwe saizvozvo kwandiri, nokuti zviri nani kwandiri kuti ndife, pakuti umwe ashaise kuzvikudza kwangu maturo.
I Corinthians 9:16 Nokuti kunyange ndichiparidza evhangeri, handina <transChange type="added">che</transChange>kuzvikudza <transChange type="added">nacho</transChange>, nokuti faniro yakatakudzwa pamusoro pangu; asi ndine nhamo, kana ndisingaparidzi evhangeri.
I Corinthians 9:17 Nokuti kana ndichiita chinhu ichi ndichizvidira, ndine mubairo; asi kana ndisingadi, ndakabatiswa utariri.
I Corinthians 9:18 Ko mubairo wangu chii? Kuti kana ndichiparidza evhangeri ndiite kuti evhangeri yaKristu isabhadharwa, kuti ndirege kushandisa kodzero yangu zvakapfuurikidza muevhangeri.
I Corinthians 9:19 Nokuti ndakasununguka kune vese, ndizviite muranda kune vese, kuti ndiwane vazhinji kwazvo.
I Corinthians 9:20 Uye kuVaJudha ndakava semuJudha, kuti ndiwane VaJudha; kune vari pasi pemurairo se<transChange type="added">a</transChange>ri pasi pemurairo, kuti ndiwane vari pasi pemurairo;
I Corinthians 9:21 kune vasina murairo seasina murairo (ndisati ndiri asina murairo kuna Mwari, asi mumurairo kuna Kristu), kuti ndiwane vasina murairo;
I Corinthians 9:22 kune vasina simba ndakava se<transChange type="added">a</transChange>sina simba, kuti ndiwane vasina simba; ndakava zvinhu zvese kune vese, kuti ndiponese vamwe nemitoo yese.
I Corinthians 9:23 Uye izvi ndinoita nekuda kweevhangeri, kuti ndive mugovani pairi.
I Corinthians 9:24 Hamuzivi here kuti vanomhanya munhangemutange vanomhanya vese, asi umwe anogamuchira mubairo? Mhanyai saizvozvo, kuti mu<transChange type="added">u</transChange>wane.
I Corinthians 9:25 Uye umwe neumwe anokwikwidza anozvidzora pazvinhu zvese; zvino ivo <transChange type="added">vanozviita</transChange> kuti vagamuchire korona inoparara, asi isu isingaparari.
I Corinthians 9:26 Naizvozvo ini ndinomhanya saizvozvo kwete seasina chokwadi; saizvozvo ndinorwa kwete seanorova mhepo;
I Corinthians 9:27 asi ndinotsikirira muviri wangu nekuuita muranda, kuti kana ndaparidzira vamwe, ini ndomene ndisaraswa.  <chapter eID="1Cor.9"/><div eID="gen1363" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1362" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 10:0 <div sID="gen1364" type="section"/> <chapter n="10" osisID="1Cor.10" sID="1Cor.10"/>  <div sID="gen1365" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 10:1 Uye handidi kuti murege kuziva, hama, kuti madzibaba edu ese akange ari pasi pegore, uye ese akagura nemugungwa,
I Corinthians 10:2 uye ese akabhabhatidzwa muna Mozisi mugore nemugungwa,
I Corinthians 10:3 uye ese akadya kudya kumwe kwemweya,
I Corinthians 10:4 uye ese akanwa zvinwiwa zvimwe zvemweya; nokuti akanwa kubva padombo remweya raka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>tevera; uye dombo iro rakange riri Kristu.
I Corinthians 10:5 Asi muruzhinji rwawo Mwari haana kufadzwa; nokuti akaparadzwa murenje.
I Corinthians 10:6 Zvino zvinhu izvi zvakava mifananidziro kwatiri, kuti tirege kushuva zvakaipa, sezvavakashuvawo.
I Corinthians 10:7 Uye musava vanamati vezvifananidzo, sevamwe vavo; sezvakwakanyorwa, <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Vanhu vakagara pasi kudya nekunwa, ndokusimuka kutamba.
I Corinthians 10:8 Uye ngatirege kupomba, sevamwe vavo vakaita upombwe, ndokuwa nezuva rimwe zvuru makumi maviri nezvitatu.
I Corinthians 10:9 Uye ngatirege kuidza Kristu, sevamwe vavowo vaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>idza, vakaparadzwa nenyoka.
I Corinthians 10:10 Muregewo kun'un'una, sevamwe vavowo vakan'un'una, vakaparadzwa nemuparadzi.
I Corinthians 10:11 Zvinhu izvi zvese zvakavawirawo kuti zvive mifananidziro; uye zvakanyorwa kuva yambiro yedu takasvikirwa nemagumo enyika.
I Corinthians 10:12 Naizvozvo anofunga kuti amire, ngaaone kuti haawi.
I Corinthians 10:13 Hakuna muedzo wakakubatai kunze kweuri muvanhu; asi Mwari wakatendeka, asingazotenderi kuti muidzwe kupfuura pamunogona napo, asi pamwe nemuedzo achaitawo nzira yekupukunyuka, kuti mugone ku<transChange type="added">u</transChange>takura. <div eID="gen1365" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1364" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 10:14 Naizvozvo, vadikanwi vangu, tizai kunamata zvifananidzo.
I Corinthians 10:15 Ndinotaura sekune vakachenjera; imwi tongai zvandinotaura.
I Corinthians 10:16 Mukombe weropafadzo watinoropafadza, hausi kugoverana kweropa raKristu here? Chingwa chatinomedura, hachisi kugoverana kwemuviri waKristu here?
I Corinthians 10:17 Nokuti isu vazhinji tiri chingwa chimwe, muviri umwe; nokuti isu tese tinogovana <transChange type="added">pa</transChange>chingwa chimwe.
I Corinthians 10:18 Tarirai Israeri zvepanyama; vanodya zvibairo havasi ivo vanogoverana nearitari here?
I Corinthians 10:19 Ko ndoti kudii? Kuti chifananidzo chinhu here? Kana kuti chakabairwa chifananidzo chinhu here?
I Corinthians 10:20 Asi kuti vahedheni zvavanobaya, vanozvibaira madhimoni, uye kwete kuna Mwari; zvino handidi kuti mudyidzane nemadhimoni.
I Corinthians 10:21 Hamugoni kunwa mukombe waIshe nemukombe wemadhimoni; hamugoni kugovana tafura yaIshe netafura yemadhimoni.
I Corinthians 10:22 Kana tinozvimutsira godo Ishe here? Ko takasimba kumupfuura here? <div eID="gen1367" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1366" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 10:23 Zvinhu zvese zvinotenderwa kwandiri; asi hazvisi zvese zvinobatsira. Zvinhu zvese zvinotenderwa kwandiri; asi hazvisi zvese zvinovaka.
I Corinthians 10:24 Kusava neanozvitsvakira zvake, asi umwe neumwe zveumwe.
I Corinthians 10:25 Zvese zvinotengeswa pamisika yenyama idyai, musingabvunzi chinhu nekuda kwehana;
I Corinthians 10:26 nokuti nyika ndeya Ishe nekuzara kwayo.
I Corinthians 10:27 Uye kana umwe wevasingatendi akakukokai, uye muchida kuenda, chese chinoiswa pamberi penyu idyai musingabvunzi chinhu nekuda kwehana.
I Corinthians 10:28 Asi kana umwe akati kwamuri: Ichi chakabairwa chifananidzo; musadya nekuda kwaiye wakuratidzai, uye kwehana; nokuti nyika ndeya Ishe nekuzara kwayo.
I Corinthians 10:29 Asi hana ndinoti, isati iri yako, asi yeumwe; nokuti kusununguka kwangu kunotongerwei nehana yeumwe?
I Corinthians 10:30 Uye kana ini nenyasha ndichiwana mugove, ndingagotukirwei nekuda kwechinhu chandinovonga ini?
I Corinthians 10:31 Naizvozvo kana muchidya, kana kunwa, kana chipi nechipi chamunoita, zviitirei rukudzo rwaMwari.
I Corinthians 10:32 Regai kugumbusa zvese kuVaJudha nekuVaGiriki nekukereke yaMwari;
I Corinthians 10:33 seniwo ndinofadza vese pazvese, ndisingatsvaki rubatsiro rwangu, asi rwevazhinji, kuti vaponeswe. <chapter eID="1Cor.10"/><div eID="gen1369" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1368" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 11:0 <div sID="gen1370" type="section"/> <chapter n="11" osisID="1Cor.11" sID="1Cor.11"/>  <div sID="gen1371" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 11:1 Ivai vatevedzeri vangu, seniwo <transChange type="added">ndiri</transChange> waKristu.
I Corinthians 11:2 Zvino ndinokurumbidzai, hama, kuti munondirangarira pazvinhu zvese, muchibatirira patsika sezvandakakumikidza kwamuri.
I Corinthians 11:3 Asi ndinoda kuti muzive, kuti musoro wemurume umwe neumwe ndiKristu; uye musoro wemukadzi murume; uye musoro waKristu ndiMwari.
I Corinthians 11:4 Murume umwe neumwe anonyengetera kana anoporofita, musoro wakafukidzwa, unozvidza musoro wake.
I Corinthians 11:5 Asi mukadzi umwe neumwe anonyengetera kana anoporofita nemusoro usina kufukidzwa, anozvidza musoro wake; nokuti ndizvo zvimwezvo nekuveurwa.
I Corinthians 11:6 Nokuti kana mukadzi asingafukidzwi, ngaagerwewo; asi kana chiri chinyadzo kumukadzi kugerwa kana kuveurwa, ngaazvifukidze.
I Corinthians 11:7 Nokuti murume zvirokwazvo haafaniri kufukidza musoro, sezvaari mufananidzo nekubwinya kwaMwari; asi mukadzi kubwinya kwemurume.
I Corinthians 11:8 Nokuti murume haabvi kumukadzi, asi mukadzi anobva kumurume;
I Corinthians 11:9 nokuti nemurume haana kusikirwa mukadzi, asi mukadzi <transChange type="added">wakasiki</transChange>rwa murume;
I Corinthians 11:10 nekuda kweizvozvi mukadzi anofanira kuva nesimba pamusoro <transChange type="added">wake</transChange> nekuda kwevatumwa.
I Corinthians 11:11 Asi murume haasi kunze kwemukadzi, kana mukadzi kunze kwemurume, muna Ishe.
I Corinthians 11:12 Nokuti mukadzi sezvaanobva kumurume, saizvozvo murumewo <transChange type="added">uripo</transChange> nemukadzi, asi zvinhu zvese zvinobva kuna Mwari.
I Corinthians 11:13 Zvionerei imwi, zvakafanira here kuti mukadzi anyengetere kuna Mwari asina kufukidzwa?
I Corinthians 11:14 Kana kunyange chisikirwo pachacho hachikudzidzisii here, kuti kana murume ane vhudzi refu, chinyadzo kwaari?
I Corinthians 11:15 Asi kana mukadzi ane vhudzi refu, rukudzo kwaari. Nokuti vhudzi refu rakapiwa kwaari chive chifukidzo.
I Corinthians 11:16 Asi kana umwe achiratidza kuva negakava, isu hatina tsika yakadaro, kunyange makereke aMwari. <div eID="gen1371" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1370" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 11:17 Zvino <transChange type="added">mu</transChange>kuraira uku handi<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>rumbidzi<transChange type="added">i</transChange>, nokuti munounganira kwete zvakapfuura kunaka, asi muzvakapfuura kuipa.
I Corinthians 11:18 Nokuti chekutanga kana muchiungana mukereke, ndinonzwa kuti kupatsanurana kuripo pakati penyu; muchidimbu ndinozvitenda.
I Corinthians 11:19 Nokuti kutsauka kunofanira kuva pakati penyu, kuti avo vakatendeka vaonekwe pakati penyu.
I Corinthians 11:20 Naizvozvo kana muchiungana pamwe, <transChange type="added">uku</transChange> hakusi kudya chirairo chaIshe;
I Corinthians 11:21 nokuti pakudya umwe neumwe anotanga kutora chirairo chake pachake, uye umwe ane nzara, uye umwe wakararadza.
I Corinthians 11:22 Ko hamuna dzimba dzekudyira nekunwira here? Kana munozvidza kereke yaMwari, muchinyadzisa avo vasina <transChange type="added">chinhu</transChange>? Ndichatii kwamuri? Ndingakurumbidzai here pane izvi? Handinga<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>rumbidzi<transChange type="added">i</transChange>.
I Corinthians 11:23 Nokuti ini ndakagamuchira kuna Ishe, icho chandakagamuchidzawo kwamuri, kuti Ishe Jesu neusiku hwaakatengeswa wakatora chingwa,
I Corinthians 11:24 zvino wakati avonga akamedura, ndokuti: Torai, idyai, ichi muviri wangu unomedurirwa imwi; izvi itai kundirangarira.
I Corinthians 11:25 Saizvozvo mukombewo, shure kwekurayira, achiti: Mukombe uyu isungano itsva muropa rangu; izvi itai, nguva dzese kana muchinwa, mukundirangarira.
I Corinthians 11:26 Nokuti nguva dzese kana muchidya chingwa ichi, nekunwa mukombe uyu, munoparidza rufu rwaIshe kusvikira asvika.
I Corinthians 11:27 Naizvozvo ani nani anodya chingwa ichi, kana kunwa mukombe waIshe zvisakafanira, achava nemhosva yemuviri neropa raIshe.
I Corinthians 11:28 Zvino munhu ngaazviongorore, saizvozvowo ngaadye zvechingwa nekunwa zvemukombe.
I Corinthians 11:29 Nokuti anodya nekunwa zvisakafanira, anozvidyira nekunwira kutongwa, zvaasingatsauri muviri waIshe.
I Corinthians 11:30 Nemhaka iyi vazhinji kwamuri indonda nevarwere, nevazhinji varere.
I Corinthians 11:31 Nokuti dai taizvinzvera tomene, hatizaitongwa;
I Corinthians 11:32 asi kana tichitongwa, tinodzorwa naIshe, kuti tirege kunzi tine mhosva pamwe nenyika.
I Corinthians 11:33 Naizvozvo, hama dzangu, kana muchiungana kuti mudye, miriranai.
I Corinthians 11:34 Uye kana umwe ane nzara, ngaadye kumba; kuti murege kuunganira kunzi mune mhosva. Asi zvasara, ndichazvironga kana ndichisvika.  <chapter eID="1Cor.11"/><div eID="gen1373" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1372" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 12:0 <div sID="gen1374" type="section"/> <chapter n="12" osisID="1Cor.12" sID="1Cor.12"/>  <div sID="gen1375" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 12:1 Zvino maererano ne<transChange type="added">zvipo</transChange> zveMweya, hama, handidi kuti musaziva.
I Corinthians 12:2 Munoziva kuti maiva vahedheni muchikweverwa kuzvifananidzo mbeveve, sevanotungamirirwa.
I Corinthians 12:3 Saka ndinokuzivisai, kuti hakuna munhu anotaura neMweya waMwari anoti: Jesu ndichakatukwa; uye hakuna munhu angati: Jesu ndiIshe, kunze neMweya Mutsvene.
I Corinthians 12:4 Zvino kune marudzi akasiyana ezvipo, asi Mweya ndeumwe.
I Corinthians 12:5 Uye kune marudzi akasiyana eushumiri, asi Ishe mumwe.
I Corinthians 12:6 Kune marudzi akasiyana emabasa, asi ndiMwari umwe, anobata zvese mune vese.
I Corinthians 12:7 Asi umwe neumwe anopiwa kuratidza kweMweya kune zvinobatsira.
I Corinthians 12:8 Nokuti kune umwe kunopiwa neMweya shoko reuchenjeri, nekune umwe shoko reruzivo, neMweya iwoyu;
I Corinthians 12:9 nekune umwe rutendo, neMweya iwoyu, nekune umwe zvipo zvekuporesa, neMweya iwoyu;
I Corinthians 12:10 nekune umwe kuita mabasa esimba, nekune umwe chiporofita, nekune umwe kupatsanura mweya, nekune umwe marudzi endimi, nekune umwe kududzira ndimi;
I Corinthians 12:11 asi izvi zvese Mweya iwoyu umwe unozviita, unogovera umwe neumwe pachake sezvaanoda. <div eID="gen1375" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1374" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 12:12 Nokuti muviri sezvauri umwe, uye une mitezo mizhinji, nemitezo yese yemuviri uyu umwe, <transChange type="added">kunyange</transChange> iri mizhinji, muviri ndeumwe; wakadarowo Kristu.
I Corinthians 12:13 Nokutiwo neMweya umwe isu tese takabhabhatidzirwa mumuviri umwe, kana VaJudha kana VaGiriki, kana varanda kana vakasununguka; tesewo takanwiswa paMweya umwe.
I Corinthians 12:14 Nokutiwo muviri hausi mutezo umwe asi mizhinji.
I Corinthians 12:15 Kana rutsoka rukati: Nokuti handisi ruoko, handisi wemuviri; zvisinei naizvozvi harwusi rwemuviri here?
I Corinthians 12:16 Nenzeve kana ikati: Nokuti handisi ziso, handisi wemuviri; zvisinei naizvozvi haisi yemuviri here?
I Corinthians 12:17 Dai muviri wese <transChange type="added">waiva</transChange> ziso, kunzwa kwaivepi? Kana wese <transChange type="added">waiva</transChange> kunzwa, kunhuhwidza <transChange type="added">kungadai</transChange> kuripi?
I Corinthians 12:18 Asi zvino Mwari wakagadza mitezo, umwe neumwe wayo, pamuviri, sezvaakada.
I Corinthians 12:19 Asi kana yese yaiva mutezo umwe, muviri <transChange type="added">ungadai</transChange> uri kupi?
I Corinthians 12:20 Asi zvino mitezo mizhinji, asi muviri umwe.
I Corinthians 12:21 Uye ziso harigoni kuti kuruoko: Handinei newe; kanazve musoro kutsoka: Handinei newe.
I Corinthians 12:22 Asi zvikuru kwazvo mitezo iyo yemuviri inoonekwa seisina simba zvikuru, inodikanwa;
I Corinthians 12:23 naiyo yemuviri yatinofunga kuti haikudzwi, ndiyo yatinopa rukudzo zvakawedzerwa; ne<transChange type="added">mitezo</transChange> iyo yedu isina kunaka ine runako rwakawedzerwa;
I Corinthians 12:24 asi yedu ine runako haishaiwi; asi Mwari wakabatanidza muviri pamwe, apa rukudzo rukuru kune yaishayiwa,
I Corinthians 12:25 kuti parege kuva nekupatsanurana pamuviri; asi mitezo ichengetane zvakaenzana.
I Corinthians 12:26 Uye kana mutezo umwe uchitambudzika, mitezo yese inotambudzika pamwe na<transChange type="added">wo</transChange>; kana mutezo umwe uchikudzwa, mitezo yese inofara pamwe na<transChange type="added">wo</transChange>.
I Corinthians 12:27 Zvino imwi muri muviri waKristu, nemitezo, umwe neumwe.
I Corinthians 12:28 Uye Mwari wakagadza vamwe pakereke, kutanga vaapositori, kechipiri vaporofita, kechitatu vadzidzisi, kozouya mabasa esimba, tevere zvipo zvekuporesa, mabasa erubatsiro, utungamiriri, ndimi dzakasiyana-siyana.
I Corinthians 12:29 Vese vaapositori here? Vese vaporofita here? Vese vadzidzisi here? Vese <transChange type="added">vanoita</transChange> mabasa esimba here?
I Corinthians 12:30 Vese vane zvipo zvekuporesa here? Vese vanotaura nendimi here? Vese vanodudzira here?
I Corinthians 12:31 Asi shuvai zvipo zvakanakisisa. Uye ndichiri kukuratidzai nzira yakanakisisa zvikuru.  <chapter eID="1Cor.12"/><div eID="gen1377" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1376" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 13:0 <div sID="gen1378" type="section"/> <chapter n="13" osisID="1Cor.13" sID="1Cor.13"/>  <div sID="gen1379" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 13:1 Kana ndikataura nendimi dzevanhu nedzevatumwa, asi ndisina rudo, ndava dare rinorira kana ndarira inoungudza.
I Corinthians 13:2 Uye kana ndine chiporofita, uye ndichinzwisisa zvakavanzika zvese neruzivo rwese, uye kana ndine rutendo rwese, zvekuti ndibvise makomo, asi ndisina rudo, handisi chinhu.
I Corinthians 13:3 Uye kana ndagovera <transChange type="added">varombo</transChange> zvinhu zvangu zvese, uye kana ndikagamuchidza muviri wangu kuti ndipiswe, asi ndisina rudo, hazvindibatsiri chinhu.
I Corinthians 13:4 Rudo rwune moyo murefu, rwune unyoro; rudo harwuna godo; rudo harwuzvikudzi, harwututumadzwi,
I Corinthians 13:5 harwuzvibati zvisakafanira, harwuzvitsvakiri zvarwo, harwudenhwi, harwurangariri zvakaipa;
I Corinthians 13:6 harwufari nekusarurama, asi rwunofara muchokwadi;
I Corinthians 13:7 rwunofukidza zvese, rwunotenda zvese, rwunotarisira zvese, rwunotsungirira <transChange type="added">pa</transChange>zvese.
I Corinthians 13:8 Rudo harwutongoperi. Zvino kana <transChange type="added">zviri</transChange> zviporofita, zvichashaiswa basa; kana <transChange type="added">dziri</transChange> ndimi, dzichaguma; kana <transChange type="added">rwuri</transChange> ruzivo, rwuchashaiswa basa.
I Corinthians 13:9 Nokuti tinoziva muchidimbu, uye tinoporofita muchidimbu;
I Corinthians 13:10 asi kana zvakazara zvasvika, ipapo zviri muchidimbu zvichashayiswa maturo.
I Corinthians 13:11 Pandakange ndiri mucheche, ndaitaura semucheche, ndainzwisisa semucheche, ndaifunga semucheche; asi pandakava murume, ndakashaisa maturo zveucheche.
I Corinthians 13:12 Nokuti ikozvino tinoona nepachionioni madzedzerera; asi nenguva iyo <transChange type="added">tichaona</transChange> zviso nezviso; ikozvino ndinoziva muchidimbu, asi ipapo ndichaziva sezvandakazikanwawo ini.
I Corinthians 13:13 Ikozvinowo rutendo, tariro, rudo, zvitatu izvi <transChange type="added">ndizvo</transChange> zvinogara; asi chikuru chezvizvi rudo.  <chapter eID="1Cor.13"/><div eID="gen1379" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1378" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 14:0 <div sID="gen1380" type="section"/> <chapter n="14" osisID="1Cor.14" sID="1Cor.14"/>  <div sID="gen1381" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 14:1 Tevererai rudo; mushuve zvikuru zvemweya, asi zvikurusa kuti muporofite.
I Corinthians 14:2 Nokuti anotaura nendimi haatauri kuvanhu, asi kuna Mwari; nokuti hakuna ano<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>nzwa; asi mumweya anotaura zvakavanzika.
I Corinthians 14:3 Asi anoporofita anotaura kuvanhu kuvaka nekurudziro nenyaradzo.
I Corinthians 14:4 Anotaura nendimi anozvivaka iye; asi anoporofita anovaka kereke.
I Corinthians 14:5 Ndinodawo kuti imwi mese mutaure nendimi, asi zvikuru kuti muporofite; nokuti anoporofita mukuru kune anotaura nendimi, kunze kwekuti achidudzira, kuti kereke iwane kuvakwa.
I Corinthians 14:6 Asi ikozvino, hama, kana ndichiuya kwamuri ndichitaura nendimi, ndichakubatsirai nei, kunze kwekuti ndichitaura nemwi kana muchakazarurwa, kana muruzivo, kana muchiporofita, kana mudzidziso?
I Corinthians 14:7 Zvakadaro zvinhu zvisina upenyu zvinorira, kana nyere, kana rudimbwa, kana zvisingapi musiyano pamaririro, zvingazikanwa sei chinoridzwa nenyere kana kuridzwa rudimbwa?
I Corinthians 14:8 Nokutiwo kana hwamanda ichipa maungira asinganzwisisiki, ndiani angazvigadzira hondo?
I Corinthians 14:9 Saizvozvowo imwi, kana musingapi nerurimi shoko rakareruka kunzwisiswa, zvinotaurwa zvichazikanwa sei? Nokuti muchava vanotaura kumhepo.
I Corinthians 14:10 Ariko, kana zvingaitika, manzwi ane marudzi mazhinji zvakadai panyika asi hakuna rimwe risingarevi chinhu.
I Corinthians 14:11 Naizvozvo kana ndisingazivi zvinoreva inzwi, ndichava munhu werumwe rurimi kune anotaura, neanotaura munhu werumwe rurimi kwandiri.
I Corinthians 14:12 Zvakadaro nemwi, sezvamunoshingairira <transChange type="added">zvipo</transChange> zveMweya, tsvakai kuti mupfuurise pakuvaka kereke.
I Corinthians 14:13 Naizvozvo anotaura nendimi ngaanyengetere kuti adudzire.
I Corinthians 14:14 Nokuti kana ndichinyengetera nendimi, mweya wangu unonyengetera, asi fungwa dzangu hadzina chibereko.
I Corinthians 14:15 Zvino chii? Ndichanyengetera nemweya, uye ndichanyengetera nefungwawo; ndichaimba nemweya, uye ndichaimba nefungwawo.
I Corinthians 14:16 Kana zvisakadaro, kana uchivonga nemweya, uyo agere pachigaro cheasina kudzidza achati Ameni sei pakuvonga kwako, zvaasingazivi chaunotaura?
I Corinthians 14:17 Nokuti zvirokwazvo iwe unovonga zvakanaka, asi umwe haavakwi.
I Corinthians 14:18 Ndinovonga Mwari wangu, kuti ndinotaura nendimi kupfuura imwi mese;
I Corinthians 14:19 asi mukereke ndinoda kutaura mashoko mashanu nefungwa dzangu, kuti ndidzidzise vamwewo, pamashoko zvuru gumi nendimi.
I Corinthians 14:20 Hama, musava vana pafungwa; asi pazvakaipa muve vacheche, asi pakuziva muve vakuru.
I Corinthians 14:21 Pamurairo pakanyorwa kuti: Nedzimwe ndimi uye neimwe miromo ndichataura kurudzi urwu; kunyange zvakadaro havangandinzwi, anoreva Ishe.
I Corinthians 14:22 Naizvozvo ndimi ndedzechiratidzo, kwete kune vanotenda, asi kune vasingatendi; asi chiporofita hachisi chevasingatendi, asi chevanotenda.
I Corinthians 14:23 Naizvozvo kana kereke yese yaungana panzvimbo imwe, vese ndokutaura nendimi, vasina kudzidza kana vasina rutendo vakapinda, havati munopenga here?
I Corinthians 14:24 Asi kana vese vakaporofita, umwe asingatendi kana asina kudzidza ndokupinda, achatsiurwa nevese, aongororwe nevese;
I Corinthians 14:25 uye saizvozvo zvakavanzika zvemoyo wake zvinoratidzwa; saizvozvowo achawa nechiso achinamata Mwari, nekupupura kuti Mwari ari pakati penyu zvirokwazvo. <div eID="gen1381" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1380" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 14:26 Zvino chii, hama? Pega-pega pamunoungana, umwe neumwe wenyu ane pisarema, ane dzidziso, ane ndimi, ane chakazarurwa, ane dudziro. Zvinhu zvese ngazviitirwe kuvaka.
I Corinthians 14:27 Kana umwe achitaura nendimi ngazviitwe nevaviri, kana varege kupfuura vatatu, uye vachiravana, neumwe ngaadudzire.
I Corinthians 14:28 Asi kana pasina mududziri, ngaanyarare mukereke; uye ngaataure kwaari nekuna Mwari.
I Corinthians 14:29 Vaporofitawo ngavataure vaviri kana vatatu, nevamwe ngavatonge.
I Corinthians 14:30 Asi kana zvakazarurirwa umwe agerepo, wekutanga ngaanyarare.
I Corinthians 14:31 Nokuti mese mungaporofita umwe-umwe, kuti vese vadzidze, uye vese vakurudzirwe;
I Corinthians 14:32 nemweya yevaporofita inozviisa pasi pevaporofita.
I Corinthians 14:33 Nokuti Mwari haasi wenyonga-nyonga, asi werugare, sapamakereke ese evatsvene.
I Corinthians 14:34 Vanhukadzi venyu ngavanyarare mumakereke; nokuti havatenderwi kutaura; asi kuzviisa pasi, sezvinorevawo murairo.
I Corinthians 14:35 Kana vachidawo kudzidza chinhu, ngavabvunze varume vavo kumba; nokuti chinyadzo kumunhukadzi kutaura mukereke.
I Corinthians 14:36 Ko shoko raMwari rakabva kwamuri here? Kana rakasvika kwamuri mega here?
I Corinthians 14:37 Kana munhu achifunga kuti muporofita kana wemweya, ngaatende zvinhu zvandinonyora kwamuri, kuti mirairo yaIshe.
I Corinthians 14:38 Asi kana munhu asingazivi, ngaave asingazivi.
I Corinthians 14:39 Naizvozvo, hama, shingairirai kuporofita, musingadzivisi kutaura nendimi.
I Corinthians 14:40 Zvinhu zvese ngazviitwe nemutoo wakafanira uye zvichitevedzana. <chapter eID="1Cor.14"/><div eID="gen1383" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1382" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 15:0 <div sID="gen1384" type="section"/> <chapter n="15" osisID="1Cor.15" sID="1Cor.15"/>  <div sID="gen1385" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 15:1 Naizvozvo, hama, ndinokuzivisai evhangeri yandakakuparidzirai, yamagamuchirawo, neyamumire mairi;
I Corinthians 15:2 uye yamunoponeswawo nayo, kana muchibatisisa inzwi reevhangeri randakaparidza kwamuri, kunze kwekuti makatenda pasina.
I Corinthians 15:3 Nokuti ndakakumikidza kwamuri pakutanga izvo zvandakagamuchirawo, kuti Kristu wakafira zvivi zvedu, zvichienderana nemagwaro;
I Corinthians 15:4 uye kuti wakavigwa, uye kuti wakamutswa nezuva retatu, zvichienderana nemagwaro;
I Corinthians 15:5 uye kuti wakaonekwa kuna Kefasi, pashure kune vanegumi nevaviri;
I Corinthians 15:6 shure kweizvozvo wakaonekwa kuhama dzinopfuura mazana mashanu nguva imwe, vazhinji vavo vachiripo kusvikira ikozvino, asi vamwewo varara;
I Corinthians 15:7 shure kweizvozvo wakaonekwa kuna Jakobho; pashure kuvaapositori vese.
I Corinthians 15:8 Uye pakupedzisira kwevese akaonekwa neniwo, sekune wakazvarwa nguva isina kufanira.
I Corinthians 15:9 Nokuti ini ndiri mudikisa wevaapositori, handifaniri kunzi muapositori, nokuti ndakashusha kereke yaMwari.
I Corinthians 15:10 Asi nenyasha dzaMwari ndiri zvandiri, uye nyasha dzake dziri pandiri hadzina kuva pasina; asi ndakabata zvikuru kupfuura vese; zvakadaro handisi ini, asi nyasha dzaMwari dzineni.
I Corinthians 15:11 Naizvozvo, kana <transChange type="added">ndiri</transChange> ini kana ivo, saizvozvo tinoparidza uye saizvozvo makatenda.
I Corinthians 15:12 Zvino kana Kristu achiparidzwa kuti wakamutswa kubva kuvakafa, vamwe pakati penyu vanoreva sei kuti hakuna kumuka kwevakafa?
I Corinthians 15:13 Asi dai pasina kumuka kwevakafa, naKristu haana kumutswa;
I Corinthians 15:14 uye kana Kristu asina kumutswa, naizvozvo kuparidza kwedu hakuna maturo, nerutendo rwenyuwo harwuna maturo.
I Corinthians 15:15 Nesuwo tinowanikwa tiri zvapupu zvaMwari zvenhema, nokuti takapupura zvaMwari kuti wakamutsa Kristu iye waasina kumutsa, kana kuri kuti vakafa havamutswi.
I Corinthians 15:16 Nokuti dai vakafa vasingamutswi, Kristu haanawo kumutswa;
I Corinthians 15:17 uye dai Kristu asina kumutswa, rutendo rwenyu haruna maturo; muchiri muzvivi zvenyu.
I Corinthians 15:18 Naizvozvo nevarere muna Kristu vaparara.
I Corinthians 15:19 Dai muupenyu huno tine tariro muna Kristu chete, tinonzwisa tsitsi kukunda vanhu vese.
I Corinthians 15:20 Asi ikozvinowo Kristu wakamutswa kubva kuvakafa, akava chibereko chekutanga chevarere.
I Corinthians 15:21 Nokuti sezvo nemunhu rufu <transChange type="added">rwakauya</transChange>, kumuka kwevakafawo <transChange type="added">kwakauya </transChange>nemunhu.
I Corinthians 15:22 Nokuti vese muna Adhamu sezvavanofa, saizvozvowo vese muna Kristu vachararamiswa.
I Corinthians 15:23 Asi umwe neumwe padzoro rake; Kristu chibereko chekutanga, tevere avo vari vaKristu pakuuya kwake,
I Corinthians 15:24 kozouya kuguma, paachazokumikidza umambo kuna Mwari, ivo Baba, paachaparadza kutonga kwese neushe hwese nesimba.
I Corinthians 15:25 Nokuti anofanira iye kutonga, kusvikira aisa vese vavengi pasi petsoka dzake.
I Corinthians 15:26 Muvengi wekupedzisira uchaparadzwa ndirwo rufu.
I Corinthians 15:27 Nokuti wakaisa zvinhu zvese pasi petsoka dzake. Asi kana achiti zvinhu zvese zvakaiswa pasi <transChange type="added">pake</transChange>, zviri pachena kuti ari kunze wakaisa zvinhu zvese pasi pake.
I Corinthians 15:28 Zvino kana zvinhu zvese zvaiswa pasi pake, ipapo Mwanakomanawo amene achaiswa pasi paiye wakaisa zvese pasi pake, kuti Mwari ave zvese mune zvese.
I Corinthians 15:29 Ko, vanobhabhatidzirwa vakafa vachaita sei kana vakafa vasingatongomutswi? Vakagobhabhatidzirwa vakafa nemhaka yei?
I Corinthians 15:30 Nemhaka yei nesu tiri panjodzi awa rega-rega?
I Corinthians 15:31 Ndinofa zuva nezuva, ndinopika nokuzvikudza pamusoro penyu kwandinako muna Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu.
I Corinthians 15:32 Kana ndakarwa nenzira yevanhu nezvikara paEfeso, zvinondibatsirei, kana vakafa vasingamutswi? Ngatidye nekunwa, nokuti mangwana tinofa.
I Corinthians 15:33 Musanyengerwa; kushamwaridzana nevakaipa kunoodza tsika dzakanaka.
I Corinthians 15:34 Pengenukai nenzira yekururama uye musatadza, nokuti vamwe vane kusaziva Mwari; ndinotaura kuti muve nenyadzi.
I Corinthians 15:35 Asi umwe achati: Vakafa vanomutswa sei? Uye vanouya nemuviri wakaita sei?
I Corinthians 15:36 Dununu, icho chaunodzvara iwe hachiitwi chipenyu kunze kwekuti chafa;
I Corinthians 15:37 uye icho chaunodzvara, haudzvari muviri uchavapo, asi tsanga isina chinhu, kana yezviyo kana yezvimwe;
I Corinthians 15:38 asi Mwari anoipa muviri paanoda napo, nekumbeu imwe neimwe muviri wayo pachayo.
I Corinthians 15:39 Nyama yese haisi nyama imwe; asi imwe <transChange type="added">i</transChange>nyama yevanhu, imwewo <transChange type="added">i</transChange>nyama yemhuka, imwewo yehove, imwewo yeshiri.
I Corinthians 15:40 <transChange type="added">Kune</transChange> miviriwo yekudenga, nemiviri yenyika; asi kubwinya kweyekudenga ndekumwe, asi kweyenyika ndekumwe.
I Corinthians 15:41 Kumwe kubwinya <transChange type="added">nde</transChange>kwezuva, nekumwe kubwinya <transChange type="added">nde</transChange>kwemwedzi, uye kumwe kubwinya ndekwenyeredzi, nokuti nyeredzi inosiyana neimwe nyeredzi pakubwinya.
I Corinthians 15:42 Kwakadarowo kumuka kwevakafa. Kunodzvarwa mukuora, kunomutswa mukusaora;
I Corinthians 15:43 kunodzvarwa mukuzvidzwa, kunomutswa mukubwinya; kunodzvarwa muutera, kunomutswa musimba.
I Corinthians 15:44 Kunodzvarwa <transChange type="added">kuri</transChange> muviri wechisikirwo, kunomutswa <transChange type="added">kuri</transChange> muviri wemweya. Kune muviri wechisikirwo, uye kune muviri wemweya.
I Corinthians 15:45 Zvakanyorwawo saizvozvo <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Munhu wekutanga Adhamu wakaitwa munhu anorarama; Adhamu wekupedzisira mweya unoraramisa.
I Corinthians 15:46 Asi zvinotanga hazvisi zvemweya asi zvechisikirwo; tevere zvemweya.
I Corinthians 15:47 Munhu wekutanga wakabva panyika, ndewevhu; munhu wechipiri ndiIshe anobva kudenga.
I Corinthians 15:48 Sewevhu, vakadarowo avo vevhu; uye sewekudenga, vakadarowo vekudenga.
I Corinthians 15:49 Uye sezvatakatakura chimiro chewevhu, tichatakurawo chimiro chewekudenga.
I Corinthians 15:50 Zvino ndinoreva izvi, hama, kuti nyama neropa hazvingagoni kugara nhaka yeushe hwaMwari; nokuora hakungagari nhaka yekusaora.
I Corinthians 15:51 Tarirai, ndinokuudzai chakavanzika: Hatingavati tese, asi tichashandurwa tese;
I Corinthians 15:52 nenguva diki-diki, mukuhwaira kweziso, pahwamanda yekupedzisira; nokuti hwamanda icharira, uye vakafa vachamutswa mukusaora, nesu tichashandurwa.
I Corinthians 15:53 Nokuti ichi chinoora chinofanira kupfeka kusaora, neichi chinofa chipfeke kusafa.
I Corinthians 15:54 Zvino kana ichi chinoora chapfeka kusaora, neichi chinofa chapfeka kusafa, ipapo kuchaitika shoko rakanyorwa <transChange type="added">rinoti</transChange>: Rufu rwakamedzwa mukukunda.
I Corinthians 15:55 Iwe rufu, rumborera rwako rwuripi? Iwe guva, kukunda kwako kuripi?
I Corinthians 15:56 Rumborera rwerufu chivi, nesimba rechivi murairo.
I Corinthians 15:57 Zvino ngaavongwe Mwari anotipa kukunda naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu.
I Corinthians 15:58 Naizvozvo, hama dzangu dzinodikanwa, simbai, musingazungunuswi, nguva dzese muchiwedzerwa pabasa raIshe muchiziva kuti kubata kwenyu hakusi pasina muna Ishe.  <chapter eID="1Cor.15"/><div eID="gen1385" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1384" type="section"/>
I Corinthians 16:0 <div sID="gen1386" type="section"/> <chapter n="16" osisID="1Cor.16" sID="1Cor.16"/>  <div sID="gen1387" type="x-p"/>
I Corinthians 16:1 Zvino maererano nezvakaunganidzirwa vatsvene, sezvandakaraira makereke eGaratia, imwiwo itai saizvozvo.
I Corinthians 16:2 <transChange type="added">Nemusi</transChange> wekutanga wega-wega wevhiki, umwe neumwe wenyu ngaazvichengetere <transChange type="added">parutivi</transChange> pakubudirira kwaakaita, kuti zvino kurege kuva nekuunganidza kana ndichisvika.
I Corinthians 16:3 Uye pandinosvikira, chero vamunotenda, netsamba, ivo ndichavatuma, vagondoisa zvipo zvenyu kuJerusarema.
I Corinthians 16:4 Kana zvakafanira kuti ini ndiendewo, vachaenda neni.
I Corinthians 16:5 Zvino ndichauya kwamuri, kana ndagura neMakedhonia; nokuti ndinogura neMakedhonia;
I Corinthians 16:6 uye zvimwe ndichagara nemwi, kanawo kupedza chando, kuti imwi mugondiperekedza pese pandinoenda.
I Corinthians 16:7 Nokuti handishuvi kukuonai ikozvino ndichipfuura; asi ndinovimba kugara imwe nguva nemwi, kana Ishe achitendera.
I Corinthians 16:8 Asi ndichagara paEfeso kusvikira paPendekosita*.
I Corinthians 16:9 Nokuti ndazarurirwa mukova mukuru uye unesimba; nevanopikisa vazhinji <transChange type="added">varipo</transChange>.
I Corinthians 16:10 Zvino kana Timotio achisvika, onai kuti anemwi asingatyi; nokuti anobata basa raIshe seniwo.
I Corinthians 16:11 Naizvozvo ngakurege kuva neanomuzvidza. Asi mumuperekedze murugare, kuti auye kwandiri; nokuti ndakamutarisira pamwe nehama.
I Corinthians 16:12 Zvino maererano naAporo hama, ndakamukumbira zvikuru kuti auye kwamuri pamwe nehama; asi zvirokwazvo chishuwo <transChange type="added">chake</transChange> chakange chisiri chekuuya ikozvino, asi achauya kana awana nguva yakafanira.
I Corinthians 16:13 Rindai, mumire makasimba murutendo, itai sevarume, musimbe.
I Corinthians 16:14 Zvinhu zvenyu zvese ngazviitwe nerudo.
I Corinthians 16:15 Ndinokukumbirisai hama, munoziva imba yaStefana, kuti ndicho chibereko chekutanga cheAkaya, uye vakazvipira kushandira vatsvene;
I Corinthians 16:16 kuti nemwi muzviise pasi pevakadaro, nekune vese vanobata pamwe <transChange type="added">nesu</transChange>, uye vachishingaira.
I Corinthians 16:17 Ndinofarawo nekuuya kwaStefana naForichunato naAkaiako, nokuti ivo vakazadzisa kutaira kwenyu.
I Corinthians 16:18 Nokuti vakavandudza mweya wangu newenyu. Naizvozvo rangarirai vakadaro.
I Corinthians 16:19 Makereke epaAsia anokukwazisai. Akwira naPrisira vanokukwazisai zvikuru muna Ishe, pamwe nekereke iri mumba mavo.
I Corinthians 16:20 Hama dzese dzinokukwazisai. Kwazisanai nekutsvoda kutsvene.
I Corinthians 16:21 Kwaziso neruoko rwangu rwaPauro.
I Corinthians 16:22 Kana munhu asingadi Ishe Jesu Kristu, ngaave chakatukwa. Uyai Ishe!
I Corinthians 16:23 Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> nemwi.
I Corinthians 16:24 Rudo rwangu <transChange type="added">ngaruve</transChange> nemwi mese muna Kristu Jesu. Ameni. <div eID="gen1387" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1386" type="section"/> <chapter eID="1Cor.16"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1335" osisID="1Cor" type="book"/>
II Corinthians 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="2Cor" sID="gen1388" type="book"/>   <milestone n="2 VAKORINDE" type="x-usfm-h"/>
II Corinthians 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="2Cor.1" sID="2Cor.1"/>
II Corinthians 1:1 Pauro muapositori waJesu Kristu nechido chaMwari, naTimotio hama, kukereke yaMwari iri paKorinde, pamwe nevatsvene vese vari muAkaya yese:
II Corinthians 1:2 Nyasha kwamuri nerugare rwunobva kuna Mwari Baba vedu ne<transChange type="added">kuna </transChange>Ishe Jesu Kristu. <div eID="gen1390" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1389" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 1:3 Ngaavongwe Mwari, uye <transChange type="added">vari</transChange> Baba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, Baba vetsitsi uye Mwari wenyaradzo yese,
II Corinthians 1:4 anotinyaradza padambudziko redu rese, kuti tigone kunyaradza avo vari mudambudziko ripi neripi, nenyaradzo yatinonyaradzwa nayo isu tomene naMwari.
II Corinthians 1:5 Nokuti matambudziko aKristu sezvaakawedzerwa matiri, saizvozvowo nyaradzo yedu yakawedzerwa nemuna Kristu.
II Corinthians 1:6 Zvino kana tichirwadziwa, <transChange type="added">nde</transChange>zvenyaradzo neruponeso rwenyu zvinobatiswa mukutsungirira mumatambudziko mamwewo atakatambudzikawo isu; kana tichinyaradzwa, <transChange type="added">nde</transChange>zvenyaradzo neruponeso rwenyu;
II Corinthians 1:7 uye tariro yedu maererano nemwi yakasimba, tichiziva kuti sezvamuri vagovani vematambudziko, saizvozvowo venyaradzo.
II Corinthians 1:8 Nokuti hatidi kuti musaziva, hama, pamusoro pedambudziko redu rakatiwira paAsia, kuti takaremerwa zvikurusa kukunda simba <transChange type="added">redu</transChange>, zvekuti takarasa tariro kunyange yeupenyu.
II Corinthians 1:9 Asi isu pachedu takange tine mutongo werufu matiri, kuti tirege kuzvivimba isu asi kuna Mwari anomutsa vakafa;
II Corinthians 1:10 wakatinunura parufu rukuru rwakadai, uye anonunura; watinovimba maari kuti acha<transChange type="added">ti</transChange>nunurazve;
II Corinthians 1:11 nemwi muchishandira isu pamwe nemukumbiro, kuti nekuda kwechipo pamusoro pedu kubudikidza nevanhu vazhinji tivongerwe nevazhinji. <div eID="gen1392" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1391" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 1:12 Nokuti kuzvikudza kwedu ndikoku, kupupura kwehana yedu, kuti muumwe neuzvokwadi hwaMwari, kwete neuchenjeri hwenyama, asi nenyasha dzaMwari, takazvibata panyika, zvikuru maererano nemwi.
II Corinthians 1:13 Nokuti hatinyori zvimwe zvinhu kwamuri, asi izvo zvamunoverenga nezvamunogamuchira; uye ndinovimba kuti mucha<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>gamuchirawo kusvika pakuguma;
II Corinthians 1:14 sezvamakatigamuchirawo muchidimbu, kuti tiri rumbidzo yenyu, semwiwo yedu nezuva raIshe Jesu. <div eID="gen1394" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1393" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 1:15 Zvino nechivimbo ichi ndaishuva pakutanga kuuya kwamuri, kuti muve nenyasha dzechipiri;
II Corinthians 1:16 nekupfuura nekwamuri ndichienda kuMakedhonia, nekudzoka kwamuri ndichibva Makedhonia, uye ndiperekedzwe nemwi kuJudhiya.
II Corinthians 1:17 Naizvozvo ndichifunga saizvozvi, ndakashandisa kusasimbisa moyo here, kana zvandinozvipira, ndinozvipira zvinoenderana nenyama kuti kwandiri zvive hongu, hongu; uye kwete, kwete here?
II Corinthians 1:18 Asi Mwari wakatendeka, kuti shoko redu kwamuri harina kuva hongu nakwete.
II Corinthians 1:19 Nokuti Mwanakomana waMwari Jesu Kristu uyo wakaparidzwa nesu pakati penyu, neni naSirivhano naTimotio, wakange asiri hongu nakwete, asi maari maiva hongu.
II Corinthians 1:20 Nokuti zvese zvivimbiso zvaMwari, maari ndihongu, nemaari ndiAmeni, rwuve rukudzo rwaMwari kubudikidza nesu.
II Corinthians 1:21 Zvino anosimbisa isu pamwe nemwi muna Kristu, neakatizodza <transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>Mwari,
II Corinthians 1:22 wakatiisawo mucherechedzo isu, akapa rubatso rweMweya mumoyo yedu.
II Corinthians 1:23 Asi ini ndinodana Mwari kuti ave chapupu pamweya wangu, kuti ndikuregererei handisati ndauya kuKorinde.
II Corinthians 1:24 Kwete kuti tinotonga parutendo rwenyu, asi tiri vabati pamwe chete vemufaro wenyu; nokuti mumire nerutendo. <chapter eID="2Cor.1"/>
II Corinthians 2:0 <chapter n="2" osisID="2Cor.2" sID="2Cor.2"/>
II Corinthians 2:1 Asi ndakazvipira izvi, kusauyazve kwamuri mukusuwa.
II Corinthians 2:2 Nokuti kana ini ndichikusuwisai, ndiani zvino anondifadza, kunze kwaiye wakasuruvadzwa neni?
II Corinthians 2:3 Zvino ndakakunyorerai chinhu ichi chakadai kuti ndasvika, ndirege kusuwiswa naivo vanofanira kundifadza, ndine chivimbo mamuri mese, kuti mufaro wangu ndewenyu mese.
II Corinthians 2:4 Nokuti kubva mudambudziko guru nekusuruvara kwemoyo ndakakunyorerai nemisodzi mizhinji, kwete kuti murwadziswe, asi kuti muzive rudo rukurusa rwandinarwo kwamuri.
II Corinthians 2:5 Zvino kana umwe akarwadzisa, haana kurwadzisa ini, asi muchidimbu (kuti ndirege ku<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>takudza<transChange type="added">i</transChange> mutoro) mese.
II Corinthians 2:6 Kuranga uku kwakakwanira wakadai ndiko kwevazhinji;
II Corinthians 2:7 kuti panzvimbo yaizvozvi zviri nani kuti mu<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>kanganwire nekunyaradza, zvimwe wakadaro arege kuodzwa moyo kwazvo nekusuruvara kukuru.
II Corinthians 2:8 Naizvozvo ndinokukumbirisai kuti musimbise rudo kwaari.
II Corinthians 2:9 Nokuti ndizvo zvandakanyorerawo, kuti ndizive kuedzwa kwenyu, kana muchiteerera pazvinhu zvese.
II Corinthians 2:10 Zvino iye wamunokanganwira chinhu, neni <transChange type="added">ndinomukanganwira</transChange>; nokuti kana neni ndichikanganwira chinhu, uyo wandinenge ndakakanganwira, <transChange type="added">ndinozviita</transChange> nekuda kwenyu pamberi pechiso chaKristu,
II Corinthians 2:11 kuti tirege kushandiswa naSatani; nokuti hatizi vasingazivi mano ake. <div eID="gen1396" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1395" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 2:12 Zvino ndichisvika paTroasi neevhangeri yaKristu, ndazarurirwa mukova muna Ishe,
II Corinthians 2:13 handina kuwana zororo pamweya wangu, pakusawana kwangu Tito hama yangu; asi ndakawonekana navo ndikabva ndikaenda kuMakedhonia.
II Corinthians 2:14 Zvino ngaavongwe Mwari, anotikundisa nguva dzese muna Kristu, uye anoratidza nesu panzvimbo dzese hwema hweruzivo rwake.
II Corinthians 2:15 Nokuti tiri hwema hunonhuhwira hwaKristu kuna Mwari pane ivo vanoponeswa nepane ivo vanoparara;
II Corinthians 2:16 kune vamwe hwema hwerufu mukufa, nekune vamwe hwema hweupenyu muupenyu. Zvino ndiani angakwanira zvinhu izvi?
II Corinthians 2:17 Nokuti hatifanani nevazhinji vanokanganisa shoko raMwari; asi sevanobva pauchokwadi, asi sezvinobva kuna Mwari pamberi paMwari tinotaura muna Kristu. <chapter eID="2Cor.2"/><div eID="gen1398" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1397" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 3:0 <div sID="gen1399" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="2Cor.3" sID="2Cor.3"/>  <div sID="gen1400" type="x-p"/>
II Corinthians 3:1 Tinotangazve kuzviratidza here? Kana tinotsvaka here, sevamwe, tsamba dzeku<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>ratidza kwamuri, kana dzekuratidza kunobva kwamuri?
II Corinthians 3:2 Imwi muri tsamba yedu, yakanyorwa mumoyo yedu, inozikanwa nekuverengwa nevanhu vese;
II Corinthians 3:3 muchiratidzwa kuti muri tsamba yaKristu inoshandiswa nesu, yakanyorwa kwete neingi, asi neMweya waMwari anorarama; kwete pamahwendefa emabwe, asi pamahwendefa enyama emoyo.
II Corinthians 3:4 Nechivimbo chakadai tinacho naKristu kuna Mwari;
