II Corinthians 3:5 kwete kuti tinokwanisa isu pachedu kufunga chimwe chinhu sechinobva kwatiri, asi kukwanisa kwedu kunobva kuna Mwari;
II Corinthians 3:6 iye wakatigonesa kuva vashumiri vesungano itsva, kwete yechakanyorwa asi yeMweya; nokuti chakanyorwa chinouraya, asi Mweya unoraramisa.
II Corinthians 3:7 Asi kana ushumiri hwerufu, pazvinyorwa zvakavezwa pamabwe hwakasvikira mukubwinya, zvekuti vana vaIsraeri vakakoniwa kutarisisa chiso chaMozisi nekuda kwekubwinya kwechiso chake, kwaipedzwa,
II Corinthians 3:8 ko shumiro yeMweya haingazovi nekubwinya kukuru here?
II Corinthians 3:9 Nokuti kana shumiro yekupiwa mhosva <transChange type="added">iri</transChange> kubwinya, shumiro yekururama ichakunda zvikuru sei mukubwinya.
II Corinthians 3:10 Nokuti kunyange icho chakabwinyiswa hachina kubwinyiswa pachinhu ichi nekuda kwekubwinya uku kwakanyanyisa.
II Corinthians 3:11 Nokuti kana icho chinopedzwa <transChange type="added">chaiva</transChange> nekubwinya, zvikuru sei icho chinogara, pakubwinya.
II Corinthians 3:12 Naizvozvo tine tariro yakadai, tinoshandisa ushingi ukuru mukutaura;
II Corinthians 3:13 uye kwete saMozisi waiisa chifukidziro pachiso chake, kuti vana vaIsraeri varege kutarisisa kuguma kwezvinopedzwa.
II Corinthians 3:14 Asi fungwa dzavo dzakaomeswa, nokuti kusvikira zuva rino chifukidziro ichochi chichiripo chisina kubviswa pakuverengwa kwetesitamende yekare, chakapedzwa muna Kristu.
II Corinthians 3:15 Asi kusvikira zuva rino, kana kuchiverengwa Mozisi, chifukidziro chirere pamoyo wavo.
II Corinthians 3:16 Chero rinhi kana achidzokera kuna Ishe, chifukidziro chinobviswa.
II Corinthians 3:17 Zvino Ishe ndiye Mweya; uye pane Mweya waIshe pane rusununguko.
II Corinthians 3:18 Asi isu tese, nechiso chakashama tichiona sepachionioni kubwinya kwaIshe, tinoshandurirwa kumufananidzo iwoyo kubva pakubwinya kuenda pakubwinya, sezvinobva kuMweya waIshe.  <chapter eID="2Cor.3"/><div eID="gen1400" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1399" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 4:0 <div sID="gen1401" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="2Cor.4" sID="2Cor.4"/>  <div sID="gen1402" type="x-p"/>
II Corinthians 4:1 Naizvozvo zvatine shumiro iyi, sezvatakagamuchira tsitsi, hatineti;
II Corinthians 4:2 asi takarasa zvinhu zvakavanzika zvechinyadzo, tisingafambi neunyengeri, kana kuminamisa shoko raMwari; asi nekuratidza chokwadi, tichizvipupurira kuhana yese yevanhu pamberi paMwari.
II Corinthians 4:3 Zvinowo kana evhangeri yedu yakafukidzwa, yakafukidzwa kune avo vanoparara;
II Corinthians 4:4 kwavari mwari wenyika ino wakapofumadza fungwa dzevasingatendi, kuti chiedza cheevhangeri yekubwinya yaKristu ari mufananidzo waMwari chisavhenekera kwavari.
II Corinthians 4:5 Nokuti hatizviparidzi, asi Kristu Jesu Ishe; uye isu <transChange type="added">tiri</transChange> varanda venyu nekuda kwaJesu.
II Corinthians 4:6 Nokuti Mwari wakati chiedza chivhenekere kubva parima ndiye wakavhenekera mumoyo yedu, kuti <transChange type="added">atipe</transChange> chiedza cheruzivo rwekubwinya kwaMwari pachiso chaJesu Kristu.
II Corinthians 4:7 Asi tine fuma iyi mumidziyo yevhu, kuti ukuru-ukuru hwesimba huve hwaMwari, uye husabva kwatiri;
II Corinthians 4:8 <transChange type="added">tino</transChange>dzvanyidzirwa pamativi ese, asi ha<transChange type="added">ti</transChange>manikidzwi; <transChange type="added">tino</transChange>vhiringidzika, asi hatipererwi;
II Corinthians 4:9 <transChange type="added">tino</transChange>shushwa, asi kwete kusiiwa; <transChange type="added">tino</transChange>wisirwa pasi, asi kwete kuparadzwa;
II Corinthians 4:10 tichipota takatakura nguva dzese kufa kwaIshe Jesu mumuviri, kuti upenyuwo hwaJesu huratidzwe mumuviri wedu.
II Corinthians 4:11 Nokuti isu tinorarama tinogara tichipiwa kurufu nekuda kwaJesu, kuti upenyuwo hwaJesu huratidzwe munyama yedu inofa.
II Corinthians 4:12 Saizvozvo rufu rwunobata matiri, asi upenyu mamuri.
II Corinthians 4:13 Zvino tine mweya iwoyu werutendo, sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Ndakatenda, naizvozvo ndakataura; isuwo tinotenda, naizvozvowo tinotaura;
II Corinthians 4:14 tichiziva kuti iye wakamutsa Ishe Jesu, achatimutsawo isu naJesu, agotikumikidza pamwe nemwi.
II Corinthians 4:15 Nokuti zvinhu zvese <transChange type="added">zvinoitwa</transChange> nekuda kwenyu, kuti nyasha dzakapamhidzirwa nekuda kwekuvonga kwevazhinji, dziwedzerwe dzive rukudzo rwaMwari. <div eID="gen1402" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1401" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 4:16 Naizvozvo hatineti, asi kana munhu wedu wekunze achiparadzwa, zvakadaro wemukati anovandudzwa zuva nezuva.
II Corinthians 4:17 Nokuti dambudziko redu rakareruka riripo kwechinguva chidiki, rinotiitira uremu hwekubwinya kukurusa kusingaperi;
II Corinthians 4:18 tisingatariri zvinoonekwa, asi zvisingaonekwi; nokuti zvinoonekwa ndezvenguva, asi zvisingaonekwi ndezvekusingaperi. <chapter eID="2Cor.4"/><div eID="gen1404" type="x-p"/>
II Corinthians 5:0 <div sID="gen1405" type="x-p"/><chapter n="5" osisID="2Cor.5" sID="2Cor.5"/>
II Corinthians 5:1 Nokuti tinoziva kuti kana imba yedu yenyika yetende ichiputswa, tine chivakwa chinobva kuna Mwari, imba isina kuitwa nemaoko, isingaperi kumatenga.
II Corinthians 5:2 Nokuti nemune iyi tinogomera, tichishuva kuti tifukidzwe neimba yedu inobva kudenga;
II Corinthians 5:3 kana nesu takapfekedzwa hatingawanikwi tisina chatakapfeka.
II Corinthians 5:4 Nokuti nesu tiri mutende tinogomera, tichiremerwa; nokuti hatishuvi kukururwa, asi kufukidzwa, kuti chinofa chimedzwe neupenyu.
II Corinthians 5:5 Zvino wakatigadzirira chinhu ichochi <transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>Mwari, wakatipawo rubatso rweMweya.
II Corinthians 5:6 Naizvozvo tine ushingi nguva dzose, tichiziva kuti tichiri kumusha mumuviri, tiri kure naIshe;
II Corinthians 5:7 nokuti tinofamba nerutendo, kwete nekuona;
II Corinthians 5:8 naizvozvo tine ushingi, uye tinofara zvikuru kuti zviri nani kusava pamuviri, uye kuva kumusha naIshe.
II Corinthians 5:9 Naizvozvowo tinoedza zvikuru, kana tiri pamusha kana tisiri pamusha, kuti tigamuchirike kwaari.
II Corinthians 5:10 Nokuti tese tinofanira kuonekwa pamberi pechigaro chekutonga chaKristu, kuti umwe neumwe agamuchire zvinhu <transChange type="added">zvaakaita</transChange> nemuviri, zvichienderana nezvaakaita, kana zvakanaka kana zvakaipa. <div eID="gen1405" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1403" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 5:11 Naizvozvo tichiziva kutyisa kwaIshe tinonyengetedza vanhu, asi tinoratidzwa kuna Mwari; uye ndine chivimbo kuti tiratidzwewo pahana dzenyu.
II Corinthians 5:12 Nokuti hatizvizivisizve kwamuri, asi tinokupai mukana wekuzvirumbidza nekuda kwedu, kuti mugone kumirisana nevanozvirumbidza pachiso, kwetewo pamoyo.
II Corinthians 5:13 Nokuti kana tichipenga, <transChange type="added">tinopenga </transChange>kuna Mwari; kana tiri vanhu kwavo, <transChange type="added">tiri kwavo </transChange>kwamuri.
II Corinthians 5:14 Nokuti rudo rwaKristu rwunotimanikidza, nokuti tinoona izvozvi kuti kana umwe akafira vese, zvino vese vakafa;
II Corinthians 5:15 uye wakafira vese kuti avo vanorarama vachirega kuzozviraramira ivo, asi iye wakavafira nekumukazve.
II Corinthians 5:16 Naizvozvo kubvira ikozvino isu hatizivi munhu panyama; uye kunyange kana takaziva Kristu panyama, asi ikozvino haticha<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>zivi <transChange type="added">saizvozvo</transChange>.
II Corinthians 5:17 Kuti kana munhu <transChange type="added">ari</transChange> muna Kristu, <transChange type="added">wava</transChange> chisikwa chitsva; zvekare zvapfuura, tarira zvese zvava zvitsva.
II Corinthians 5:18 Uye zvese zvinobva kuna Mwari, wakatiyananisa naye kubudikidza naJesu Kristu, uye wakatipa shumiro yeyananiso;
II Corinthians 5:19 sezvinonzi Mwari wakange achiyananisa nyika kwaari muna Kristu, asingavaverengeri kudarika kwavo, akaisa kwatiri shoko reyananiso.
II Corinthians 5:20 Naizvozvo tiri nhume pachinzvimbo chaKristu, Mwari saanenge achikumbirisa nesu; tinokumbirisa pachinzvimbo chaKristu <transChange type="added">tichiti</transChange>: Yananiswai naMwari.
II Corinthians 5:21 Nokuti uyo wakange asingazivi chivi wakamuita chivi pachinzvimbo chedu, kuti isu tive kururama kwaMwari maari.  <chapter eID="2Cor.5"/><div eID="gen1407" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1406" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 6:0 <div sID="gen1408" type="section"/> <chapter n="6" osisID="2Cor.6" sID="2Cor.6"/>  <div sID="gen1409" type="x-p"/>
II Corinthians 6:1 Zvino tinobata pamwe <transChange type="added">naye</transChange>, nesu tinokumbira zvikuru kuti musagamuchira nyasha dzaMwari pasina;
II Corinthians 6:2 nokuti anoti: Nenguva yakafanira ndakakunzwa, uye nepazuva reruponeso ndakakubatsira; tarira, ikozvino inguva yakafanira; tarira, ikozvino izuva reruponeso.
II Corinthians 6:3 Hatigumbusi kunyange pachinhu, kuti shumiro irege kumhurwa;
II Corinthians 6:4 asi pazvese tinozviratidza sevashumiri vaMwari, pakutsungirira kuzhinji, pamatambudziko, pakuomerwa, pakudzvinyirirwa,
II Corinthians 6:5 pakurohwa, pakusungwa, pamabongozozo, pamabasa anorema, pakusarara, pakutsanya,
II Corinthians 6:6 pakuchena, paruzivo, pamoyo murefu, paunyoro, paMweya Mutsvene, parudo rusinganyepedzeri,
II Corinthians 6:7 pashoko rechokwadi, pasimba raMwari, pazvombo zvekururama kurudyi nekuruboshwe,
II Corinthians 6:8 nekukudzwa uye kuzvidzwa, nekureverwa zvakaipa uye kureverwa zvakanaka; sevanyepedzeri, <transChange type="added">tiri</transChange> vechokwadiwo;
II Corinthians 6:9 sevasingazikanwi, tichizikanwawo zvikuru; sevanofa, tarirawo, tinorarama; sevanorohwa, tisingaurawiwo;
II Corinthians 6:10 sevakasuruvadzwa, asi tichifara nguva dzese; sevarombo, asi tichifumisa vazhinji; sevasina chinhu, asi tine zvese. <div eID="gen1409" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1408" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 6:11 VeKorinde, muromo wedu wakashamira imwi, moyo wedu wakuriswa.
II Corinthians 6:12 Hamudzvinyidzirwi matiri, asi munodzvinyidzirwa muvura hwenyu.
II Corinthians 6:13 Zvino pakutsiva kwakadaro (ndinotaura sekune vana <transChange type="added">vangu</transChange>), imwiwo kuriswai.
II Corinthians 6:14 Musasungwa zvisina kufanira pajoko pamwe nevasingatendi; nokuti kururama kungava nekudyidzana kwei nekusarurama? Chiedza chingadyidzana sei nerima?
II Corinthians 6:15 Uye Kristu ane kunzwana kwei naBeriari? Kana anotenda angava nemugove wei neasingatendi?
II Corinthians 6:16 Netembere yaMwari ine kutenderana kupi nezvifananidzo? Nokuti imwi muri tembere yaMwari mupenyu, Mwari sezvaakareva kuti: Ndichagara mavari, uye ndichafamba pakati <transChange type="added">pavo</transChange>; ndichavawo Mwari wavo, uye ivo vachava vanhu vangu.
II Corinthians 6:17 Naizvozvo budai pakati pavo mutsaurwe, anoreva Ishe, uye musabata chakasviba; iniwo ndichakugamuchirai.
II Corinthians 6:18 Uye ndichava Baba kwamuri, nemwi muchava vanakomana nevanasikana kwandiri, anoreva Ishe Wemasimbaose. <chapter eID="2Cor.6"/>
II Corinthians 7:0 <chapter n="7" osisID="2Cor.7" sID="2Cor.7"/>
II Corinthians 7:1 Zvatine zvivimbiso izvi, vadikanwi, ngatizvinatse patsvina yese yenyama neyemweya, tipedzise utsvene mukutya Mwari. <div eID="gen1411" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1410" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 7:2 Gamuchirai isu; hatina kuitira munhu chakaipa, hatina kukanganisira munhu, hatina kubatira munhu.
II Corinthians 7:3 Handitauriri kupa mhosva; nokuti ndamboreva, kuti muri mumoyo medu, kuti tife nekurarama pamwe.
II Corinthians 7:4 Ushingi hwenhauro yangu kwamuri hukuru, kuzvirumbidza kwangu kukuru pamusoro penyu; ndakazadzwa nenyaradzo, ndakawanzirwa mufaro padambudziko redu rese.
II Corinthians 7:5 Nokutiwo tasvika kuMakedhonia, nyama yedu haina kuva nezororo, asi takadzvinyirirwa pazvese; kunze kukakavara, mukati kutya.
II Corinthians 7:6 Asi Mwari, anonyaradza vakasuruvadzwa, wakatinyaradza nekusvika kwaTito;
II Corinthians 7:7 uye kwete pakusvika kwake chete, asi nepakunyaradzwa kwaakanyaradzwa nako pamusoro penyu, achitiudza zvechishuwo chenyu, kuchema kwenyu, kushingaira kwenyu pamusoro pangu, zvekuti ndakanyanya kufara.
II Corinthians 7:8 Nokuti kunyange ndakakusuruvadzai netsamba, handizvidembi, kunyange ndichizvidemba; nokuti ndinoona kuti tsamba iyoyo yakakusuruvadzai, kunyange kuri kwenguva diki.
II Corinthians 7:9 Ikozvino ndinofara, kwete kuti makasuruvadzwa, asi kuti makasuruvadzika mukatendeuka; nokuti makasuruvadzwa nenzira yeuMwari, kuti murege kurasikirwa nechinhu nekuda kwedu.
II Corinthians 7:10 Nokuti kuchema nenzira yeuMwari kunouisa kutendeuka rwuve ruponeso rwausingazvidembi narwo; asi kuchema nenzira yenyika kunouisa rufu.
II Corinthians 7:11 Nokuti tarirai, chinhu ichocho, kuti makasuruvadzwa nenzira yeuMwari, chakauisa mukati menyu shungu dzakadini, inga kuzvidavirira, inga kutsamwa, inga kutya, inga chishuvo chakasimba, inga kushingaira, inga kutsiva. Pazvese makazviratidza kuti makachena pachiitiko ichi.
II Corinthians 7:12 Naizvozvo kanawo ndakakunyorerai, <transChange type="added">ndakazviita</transChange> kwete nekuda kwewakatadza, kana nekuda kwaiye wakatadzirwa, asi kuti kukushingairirai kwedu kuratidzwe kwamuri pamberi paMwari.
II Corinthians 7:13 Nemhaka iyi takanyaradzwa panyaradzo yenyu; hongu takafara zvikuru kwazvo pamufaro waTito, nokuti mweya wake wakavandudzwa kubva kwamuri mese.
II Corinthians 7:14 Nokuti kana ndakazvikudza nechinhu kwaari pamusoro penyu, handinyadziswi; asi sezvatakataura zvinhu zvese kwamuri muchokwadi, saizvozvowo kuzvikudza kwedu kuri pamberi paTito kwakava chokwadi.
II Corinthians 7:15 Nehanya dzake dzawedzerwa kwazvo kwamuri, achirangarira kuteerera kwenyu mese, kuti makamugamuchira sei nekutya uye kudedera.
II Corinthians 7:16 Ndinofara naizvozvo kuti pazvese ndine chivimbo mamuri.  <chapter eID="2Cor.7"/><div eID="gen1413" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1412" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 8:0 <div sID="gen1414" type="section"/> <chapter n="8" osisID="2Cor.8" sID="2Cor.8"/>  <div sID="gen1415" type="x-p"/>
II Corinthians 8:1 Zvino tinokuzivisai, hama, nyasha dzaMwari dzakapiwa pamakereke eMakedhonia;
II Corinthians 8:2 kuti pakuedzwa kukuru kwedambudziko, kuwanzwa kwemufaro wavo neurombo hwavo hwakadzama zvakawedzera pafuma yekupa kwavo.
II Corinthians 8:3 Nokuti vakange vane chido pakukwanisa <transChange type="added">kwavo</transChange>, ndinopupura, kunyange kupfuura kukwanisa <transChange type="added">kwavo</transChange>,
II Corinthians 8:4 nechikumbiro chikuru vakatigombedzera, kuti tigamuchire chipo uye kugovana parubatsiro rwunova rwevatsvene;
II Corinthians 8:5 uye kwete sezvatakatarisira, asi vakatanga kuzvipa ivo kuna Ishe, nekwatiri nechido chaMwari.
II Corinthians 8:6 Zvekuti takakurudzira Tito, kuti sezvaakange ambotanga, saizvozvo apedzisewo kwamuri basa iri renyashawo.
II Corinthians 8:7 Asi sezvamakawanza pazvese, parutendo, uye pashoko, uye paruzivo, uye pakushingaira kwese, uye parudo rwenyu kwatiri, <transChange type="added">tarirai</transChange> kuti muwanzewo pabasa iri renyasha.
II Corinthians 8:8 Handitauri semurairo, asi nekushingaira kwevamwe uye ndichiidza uchokwadi hwerudo rwenyu.
II Corinthians 8:9 Nokuti munoziva nyasha dzaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, kuti kunyange akange akafuma, nekuda kwenyu wakava murombo, kuti imwi kubudikidza neurombo hwake mufume.
II Corinthians 8:10 Zvino pachinhu ichi ndinopa maonero; nokuti ichi chinokubatsirai, imwi makatotanga kubva gore rakapera, kwete kuita chete, asi nekuda.
II Corinthians 8:11 Asi ikozvinowo pedzisai kuita, kuti, sezva<transChange type="added">pan</transChange>e chishuwo chemoyo, saizvozvo <transChange type="added">kuripo</transChange> kupedzisawo kubva pane zva<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>nazvo.
II Corinthians 8:12 Nokuti kana chishuwo chemoyo chiripo, munhu anogamuchirika zvichienderana nezvaanazvo, kwete kuenderana nezvaasina.
II Corinthians 8:13 Nokuti hakusi kuti vamwe vave nekurerusirwa, imwi muremerwe; asi kubva pakuenzana, panguva yaikozvino zvakawanda zvenyu <transChange type="added">zviwedzere</transChange> pakushaiwa kwavo,
II Corinthians 8:14 kutiwo zvakawanda zvavo <transChange type="added">zviwedzere</transChange> pakushaiwa kwenyu, kuti kuve nekuenzana,
II Corinthians 8:15 sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Waka<transChange type="added">unganidza</transChange> zvizhinji haana kuva nezvakasara; newaka<transChange type="added">unganidza</transChange> zvishoma haana kushaiwa.
II Corinthians 8:16 Asi ngaavongwe Mwari wakaisa mumoyo maTito kushingaira kwakadaro kwamuri,
II Corinthians 8:17 kuti zvirokwazvo wakagamuchira kurudziro, asi zvaakange achishingaira zvikuru, wakabva akaenda kwamuri nechido chake.
II Corinthians 8:18 Zvino takatuma pamwe naye hama, rumbidzo yake muevhangeri yakagura nemumakereke ese;
II Corinthians 8:19 zvisati zviri <transChange type="added">izvozvo</transChange> chete, asi wakasarudzwawo nemakereke kuti atiperekedze nenyasha idzi, dzakabatiswa nesu mukurumbidzwa kwaIshe uyu, nechishuwo chemoyo wenyu;
II Corinthians 8:20 tichidzivirira izvi, zvimwe umwe angatimhura pamusoro pezvipamhidzirwa izvi zvinobatiswa nesu;
II Corinthians 8:21 tichirangarira zvakanaka kwete pamberi paIshe chete asi pamberi pevanhuwo.
II Corinthians 8:22 Uye takatuma navo hama yedu, yatakawana yakashingaira pazvizhinji kazhinji, asi zvino anonyanya kushingaira nekuda kwekukuvimbai kukuru.
II Corinthians 8:23 Kana zviri zvaTito, umwe wangu nemushandi pamwe neni kwamuri; kana hama dzedu, nhume dzekereke, <transChange type="added">vari</transChange> kukudzwa kwaKristu.
II Corinthians 8:24 Naizvozvo ratidzai kwavari uchapupu hwerudo rwenyu nehwekuzvikudza kwedu pamusoro penyu, nepamberi pemakereke.  <chapter eID="2Cor.8"/><div eID="gen1415" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1414" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 9:0 <div sID="gen1416" type="section"/> <chapter n="9" osisID="2Cor.9" sID="2Cor.9"/>  <div sID="gen1417" type="x-p"/>
II Corinthians 9:1 Nokuti maererano nerubatsiro rwevatsvene, hazvina kufanira kwandiri kuti ndikunyorerei;
II Corinthians 9:2 nokuti ndinoziva kushingaira kwenyu, kwandinozvirumbidza nako pamusoro penyu kune veMakedhonia, kuti Akaya yakange yazvigadzirira kubvira gore rakapera; nekushingaira kwenyu kwakamutsa vazhinji.
II Corinthians 9:3 Asi ndakatuma hama, kuti kuzvirumbidza kwedu pamusoro penyu kusava pasina pachinhu ichi; kuti, sezvandakareva, muve makagadzirira;
II Corinthians 9:4 zvimwe pamwe, kana veMakedhonia vachiuya neni vakuwanei musina kuzvigadzirira, isu tinyadziswe (kuti tisati, imwi) pakuvimba uku kwekuzvikudza.
II Corinthians 9:5 Naizvozvo ndakaona zvakafanira kukurudzira hama, kuti vatange kuuya kwamuri, uye vatange kugadzira chipo chenyu chepachena chakataurwa nezvacho kare, kuti ichi chive chakagadzirirwa, saizvozvo sechipo chepachena asi kwete sekukara.
II Corinthians 9:6 Asi izvi <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Anodzvara zvishoma, anokohwawo zvishoma; neanodzvara zvizhinji, achakohwawo zvizhinji.
II Corinthians 9:7 Umwe neumwe sezvinoda moyo; kwete nekurwadziwa, kana nekurovererwa; nokuti Mwari anoda anopa nemufaro.
II Corinthians 9:8 Uye Mwari anogona kukuwanzirai nyasha dzese, kuti nguva dzese muve nekuringana kwese pazvese, muwanze pabasa rese rakanaka;
II Corinthians 9:9 sezvazvakanyorwa <transChange type="added">zvichinzi</transChange>: Wakaparadzira, wakapa varombo; kururama kwake kunogara nekusingaperi.
II Corinthians 9:10 Zvino iye anopa mbeu kumudzvari, nekupa chingwa chekudya, ngaawanze mbeu dzenyu dzakadzvarwa, nekuwedzera zvibereko zvekururama kwenyu;
II Corinthians 9:11 muchifumiswa pazvinhu zvese <transChange type="added">zvichibva</transChange> pakupana kwese, zvinokonzera kubudikidza nesu kuvonga kuna Mwari.
II Corinthians 9:12 Nokuti basa rekushumira uku harizadzisi kushaiwa kwevatsvene chete, asi kunowanzisawo nekuvongwa kuzhinji kuna Mwari;
II Corinthians 9:13 nekuda kweuchapupu hweshumiro iyi vanorumbidza Mwari pamusoro pekuteerera kwekupupura kwenyu evhangeri yaKristu, nekukura kwekupa <transChange type="added">kwenyu</transChange> kwavari nekune vese.
II Corinthians 9:14 Uye nemunyengetero wavo pamusoro penyu, vachikushuvai nekuda kwenyasha hurusa dzaMwari pamusoro penyu.
II Corinthians 9:15 Zvino Mwari ngaavongwe nekuda kwechipo chake chisingarondedzereki.  <chapter eID="2Cor.9"/><div eID="gen1417" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1416" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 10:0 <div sID="gen1418" type="section"/> <chapter n="10" osisID="2Cor.10" sID="2Cor.10"/>  <div sID="gen1419" type="x-p"/>
II Corinthians 10:1 Zvino ini Pauro ndomene ndinokukumbirisai neunyoro, uye moyochena waKristu, wakaninipiswa pakati penyu kana <transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>ripo, asi kana ndisipo ndine ushingi kwamuri;
II Corinthians 10:2 ndinokumbirisawo, kuti kana ndiripo, ndirege kuva neushingi nekuzvipira uku kwandinoverengerwa kuti ndine ushingi hwekumirisana nevamwe vanotifungira sevanofamba panyama.
II Corinthians 10:3 Nokuti kunyange tichifamba panyama, hatirwi maererano nenyama;
II Corinthians 10:4 nokuti zvombo zvehondo yedu hazvisi zvenyama, asi zvakasimba kubudikidza naMwari pakuputsa nhare,
II Corinthians 10:5 tichiwisa mirangariro nechese chakakwirira chinozvikwiridza chichipesana neruzivo rwaMwari, nekuisa muutapwa murangariro wese pakuteerera Kristu;
II Corinthians 10:6 takazvigadzira kutsiva kusateerera kwese, kana kuteerera kwenyu kwazadzisika.
II Corinthians 10:7 Munotarira zvinhu pamaonekero <transChange type="added">azvo</transChange> ekunze here? Kana munhu achizvivimba kuti iye ndewaKristu, ngaazvirangarirezve, kuti iye sezvaari waKristu, saizvozvo nesu tiri vaKristu.
II Corinthians 10:8 Nokuti kana nezvinhu zvizhinjisa ndisazvirumbidzazve maererano nesimba redu, Ishe raakatipa pakuvaka, uye kwete rekuparadza kwedu, handinganyadziswi;
II Corinthians 10:9 kuti ndirege kuonekwa sendinokutyityidzirai netsamba.
II Corinthians 10:10 Nokuti vanoti: Tsamba <transChange type="added">dzake</transChange> dzinorema uye dzine simba; asi kuvapo kwemuviri kune utera nekutaura <transChange type="added">kwake</transChange> kunozvidzika.
II Corinthians 10:11 Wakadaro ngaarangarire ichi, kuti sezvatakadaro pashoko kubudikidza netsamba kana tisipo, nesu takadaro pakuita kana tiripo.
II Corinthians 10:12 Nokuti hatina ushingi hwekuzviverengera kana kuzvifananidza nevamwe vevanozvirumbidza; asi ivo vanozvienzanisa vega, nekuzvifananidza pachavo, havanzwisisi.
II Corinthians 10:13 Asi isu hatingazvikudzi zvinopfuura chipimo, asi zvinoenderana nechipimo chemuganhu Mwari waakatitemera, chipimo chekusvika nekwamuri.
II Corinthians 10:14 Nokuti hatizvitandavadzi kupfuurikidza setisingasvikiri kwamuri, nokuti nekwamuriwo takasvika muevhangeri yaKristu;
II Corinthians 10:15 tisingazvikudzi kupfuurikidza chipimo pamabasa evamwe; asi tine tariro, <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> kana rutendo rwenyu rwuchiwanzwa, isu tichakuriswa pakati penyu zvinoenderana nemuganhu wedu nekupfuurisa,
II Corinthians 10:16 kuparidza evhangeri pa<transChange type="added">matunhu</transChange> ari mhiri kwenyu, kwete kuzvirumbidza pamuganhu weumwe pazvinhu zvakagadzirwa.
II Corinthians 10:17 Asi anozvirumbidza, ngaazvirumbidze muna Ishe.
II Corinthians 10:18 Nokuti haasi anozvirumbidza uyo anogamuchirwa, asi Ishe waanorumbidza.  <chapter eID="2Cor.10"/><div eID="gen1419" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1418" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 11:0 <div sID="gen1420" type="section"/> <chapter n="11" osisID="2Cor.11" sID="2Cor.11"/>  <div sID="gen1421" type="x-p"/>
II Corinthians 11:1 Dai muchindiitira moyo murefu zvishoma paupenzi <transChange type="added">hwangu</transChange>; asiwo munondiitira moyo murefu.
II Corinthians 11:2 Nokuti ndine godo nemwi negodo raMwari; nokuti ndakakuwanisai kumurume umwe, kuti ndiku<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>mikidze<transChange type="added">i</transChange><transChange type="added">muri</transChange> mhandara yakachena kuna Kristu.
II Corinthians 11:3 Asi ndinotya kuti zvimwe nyoka sezvayakanyengera Evha nemano ayo, saizvozvo ndangariro dzenyu dzingatsauswa pauchokwadi huri muna Kristu.
II Corinthians 11:4 Nokuti kana anosvika achiparidza umwe Jesu watisina kuparidza, kana zvimwe muchigamuchira umwe mweya wamusina kugamuchira, kana imwe evhangeri yamusina kugamuchira, zvakanaka kuti mu<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>itire moyo murefu.
II Corinthians 11:5 Nokuti ndinoona ndisingasariri nepadiki kuvaapositori vakurusa.
II Corinthians 11:6 Kanawo kunyange ndisina kudzidza pashoko, asi kwete paruzivo; asi pachinhu chese takaratidzwa kwamuri muzvinhu zvese.
II Corinthians 11:7 Kana ndakaita chivi here pakuzvininipisa kuti imwi mukudzwe, nokuti ndakaparidza kwamuri evhangeri yaMwari pasina muripo?
II Corinthians 11:8 Ndakapamba amwe makereke, ndichitora muripo kuti ndikushandirei.
II Corinthians 11:9 Uye pandakange ndiripo kwamuri ndichishaiwa handina kuremedza munhu; nokuti zvandaishaiwa, hama dzaibva Makedhonia dzakapa; uye pazvese ndakazvichengeta kuti ndirege kuva mutoro kwamuri, uye ndicha<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>chengeta.
II Corinthians 11:10 Chokwadi chaKristu chiri mandiri, kuti kuzvikudza uku hakungamiswi mandiri kumatunhu eAkaya.
II Corinthians 11:11 Nemhaka yei? Nokuti handikudii here? Mwari anoziva.
II Corinthians 11:12 Asi chandinoita, ndichaitawo, kuti ndigure mukana kune vanoshuva mukana; kuti pane zvavanozvikudza nazvo vawanikwe vakaita sesuwo.
II Corinthians 11:13 Nokuti vakadaro vaapositori venhema, vabati vanonyengera, vanozvishandura kuva vaapositori vaKristu.
II Corinthians 11:14 Hazvishamisiwo; nokuti Satani amene anozvishandura kuva mutumwa wechiedza.
II Corinthians 11:15 Naizvozvo ha<transChange type="added">chi</transChange>si chinhu chikuru kana nevashumiri vake vachizvishandura <transChange type="added">kuita</transChange> sevashumiri vekururama; kuguma kwavo kuchava semabasa avo. <div eID="gen1421" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1420" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 11:16 Ndinotizve: Ngakurege kuva nemunhu anofunga kuti ndiri benzi; asi kana zvisaka<transChange type="added">daro</transChange>, sebenziwo ndigamuchirei, kuti neni ndizvikudze zvishoma.
II Corinthians 11:17 Zvandinotaura, handitauri sekuna Ishe, asi sepaupenzi, pachivimbo ichi chekuzvikudza.
II Corinthians 11:18 Sezvo vazhinji vachizvikudza panyama, iniwo ndichazvikudza.
II Corinthians 11:19 Nokuti munoitira mapenzi moyo murefu nemufaro muri vakachenjera.
II Corinthians 11:20 Nokuti munoita moyo murefu, kana munhu achikuisai muuranda, kana munhu achi<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>dyai kupedza, kana munhu achi<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>tapa<transChange type="added">i</transChange>, kana munhu achizvikudza, kana munhu achikurovai kumeso.
II Corinthians 11:21 Ndinoreva sechinyadzo, senge kuti isu takange tine utera. Asi pane chipi nechipi umwe paane ushingi (ndinotaura paupenzi), ini ndine ushingiwo.
II Corinthians 11:22 VaHebheru here? Neni<transChange type="added">wo</transChange>. VaIsraeri here? Neni<transChange type="added">wo</transChange>. Imbeu yaAbhurahama here? Neni<transChange type="added">wo</transChange>.
II Corinthians 11:23 Vashumiri vaKristu here? (Ndinotaura <transChange type="added">se</transChange>mupengo), ndino<transChange type="added">va</transChange>pfuura, zvikurusa pamabasa anorema, pamavanga kupfuura chipimo, mumajere zvikurusa, pandufu kazhinji.
II Corinthians 11:24 KuVaJudha ndakagamuchira kashanu <transChange type="added">shamhu</transChange> dzine makumi mana kusiya imwe.
II Corinthians 11:25 Katatu ndakarohwa netsvimbo, kamwe ndakatakwa nemabwe, katatu ndakaputsikirwa nechikepe, usiku <transChange type="added">humwe</transChange> nemasikati ndakange ndiri muudziku hwegungwa;
II Corinthians 11:26 panzendo kazhinji, panjodzi dzenzizi, panjodzi dzemakororo, panjodzi nevekwangu, panjodzi nevahedheni, panjodzi muguta, panjodzi murenje, panjodzi mugungwa, panjodzi pakati pehama dzenhema;
II Corinthians 11:27 pakutambudzika nepakuremerwa, pakusarara kazhinji, panzara nenyota, pakutsanya kazhinji, pachando nepakushama.
II Corinthians 11:28 Kunze kwezvinhu izvi zviri panze, kurangarira makereke ese kunondimanikidza zuva rimwe nerimwe.
II Corinthians 11:29 Ndiani anoshaiwa simba, neni ndikasashaiwa simba? Ndiani anogumburwa, neni ndikasatsva?
II Corinthians 11:30 Kana zvakafanira kuzvikudza, ndichazvikudza nezvinhu zveutera hwangu.
II Corinthians 11:31 Mwari naBaba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, anorumbidzwa kusvikira rinhi narinhi, anoziva kuti handirevi nhema.
II Corinthians 11:32 PaDhamasiko mutungamiriri wamambo Areta wakarinda guta reveDhamasiko achida kundibata;
II Corinthians 11:33 uye ndakaburuswa nepawindo <transChange type="added">ndiri</transChange> mudengu nepamudhuri, ndikapukunyuka pamaoko ake.  <chapter eID="2Cor.11"/><div eID="gen1423" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1422" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 12:0 <div sID="gen1424" type="section"/> <chapter n="12" osisID="2Cor.12" sID="2Cor.12"/>  <div sID="gen1425" type="x-p"/>
II Corinthians 12:1 Kuzvikudza zvirokwazvo hakubatsiri kwandiri; nokuti ndichauya pazviratidzo nezvakazarurwa zvaIshe.
II Corinthians 12:2 Ndinoziva munhu <transChange type="added">ari</transChange> muna Kristu makore gumi nemana apfuura (kana <transChange type="added">zvakaitwa</transChange> mumuviri, handizivi, kana kunze kwemuviri, handizivi, Mwari anoziva), wakadai wakabvutirwa kudenga rechitatu.
II Corinthians 12:3 Uye ndinoziva munhu wakadai (kana mumuviri, kana kunze kwemuviri, handizivi; Mwari anoziva),
II Corinthians 12:4 kuti wakabvutwa akaiswa muparadhiso, akanzwa mashoko asingatauriki, asingabviri munhu kutaura.
II Corinthians 12:5 Ndichazvikudza newakadai; asi pamusoro pangu ndomene handizvikudzi, asi pautera hwangu.
II Corinthians 12:6 Nokuti kana ndichida kuzvikudza, handaizova benzi; nokuti ndichareva chokwadi; asi ndinorega, zvimwe umwe angandifungira kuva mukuru kune zvaakaona ndiri, kana zvaakanzwa kwandiri,
II Corinthians 12:7 uye kuti ndirege kukudzwa kubudikidza nekuwanda kwezvakazarurwa, ndakapiwa munzwa munyama, nhume yaSatani kuti indirove, kuti ndirege kukudzwa.
II Corinthians 12:8 Maererano nechinhu ichi ndakakumbirisa Ishe katatu kuti chibve kwandiri.
II Corinthians 12:9 Zvino akati kwandiri: Nyasha dzangu dzakakukwanira; nokuti simba rangu rinozadziswa muutera. Naizvozvo ndichazvirumbidza nemufaro mukuru muutera hwangu, kuti simba raKristu rigare pamusoro pangu.
II Corinthians 12:10 Naizvozvo ndinofara muutera, mukutukwa, mukushaiwa, murushusho, mukushungurudzwa, nekuda kwaKristu; nokuti kana ndine utera, ipapo ndine simba. <div eID="gen1425" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1424" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 12:11 Ndava benzi ndichizvikudza; ndimwi makandimanikidza; nokuti ini ndaifanira kuziviswa nemwi; nokuti handisariri nepadiki kuvaapositori vakurusa, kunyange ndisiri chinhu.
II Corinthians 12:12 Zvirokwazvo zviratidzo zvemuapositori zvakaitwa pakati penyu pamoyo murefu wese, muzviratidzo nezvishamiso nemabasa esimba.
II Corinthians 12:13 Nokuti chii chamuri pasi nacho kune amwe makereke, kunze kwekuti ini ndomene handina kuva mutoro kwamuri? Ndikanganwirei kusarurama uku.
II Corinthians 12:14 Tarirai, ndazvigadzirira kuuya kwamuri rwechitatu, uye handizovi mutoro kwamuri; nokuti handitsvaki zvenyu, asi imwi; nokuti vana havafaniri kuchengetera vabereki, asi vabereki vana.
II Corinthians 12:15 Uye ndinoda nemufaro mukuru kuparadza uye kuparadzirwa mweya yenyu, kunyange ndichikudai zvakapamhidzirwa zvikuru, ndinodikanwa zvishoma.
II Corinthians 12:16 Asi zva<transChange type="added">kadaro</transChange>, ini handina kukuremedzai; asi <transChange type="added">zva</transChange>ndakange ndine mano, ndakakubatai nekunyengera.
II Corinthians 12:17 Ndakakutsvatai here chero neumwe waivo vandakatuma kwamuri?
II Corinthians 12:18 Ndakakumbira Tito, ndikatuma hama na<transChange type="added">ye</transChange>; Tito wakakutsvatai here? Hatina kufamba nemumweya umwe here? Ha<transChange type="added">tina</transChange><transChange type="added">kufamba</transChange> nemumakwara mamwe here? <div eID="gen1427" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1426" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 12:19 Zvekare munofunga kuti tinozvidzivirira kwamuri here? Tinotaura pamberi paMwari muna Kristu; asi <transChange type="added">tinotaura</transChange> zvese, vadikanwi, zvekuvakwa kwenyu.
II Corinthians 12:20 Nokuti ndinotya, zvimwe pakusvika ndikuwanei musina kuita sezvandinoda, neni ndiwanikwe nemwi ndisina kuita sezvamunoda; zvimwe kuvepo makakava, godo, hasha, kupesana, kucherana, makuhwa, manyawi, mabongozozo;
II Corinthians 12:21 zvimwe pakusvika kwanguzve Mwari wangu andininipise pakati penyu, uye ndichemere vazhinji vevakambotadza, vakasatendeuka pakusachena neupombwe neunzenza hwavakaita.  <chapter eID="2Cor.12"/><div eID="gen1429" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1428" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 13:0 <div sID="gen1430" type="section"/> <chapter n="13" osisID="2Cor.13" sID="2Cor.13"/>  <div sID="gen1431" type="x-p"/>
II Corinthians 13:1 Nenguva iyi yechitatu ndinouya kwamuri; mumuromo wezvapupu zviviri uye zvitatu shoko rega-rega ritsigirwe.
II Corinthians 13:2 Ndakambokuudzai uye ndinogara ndakuudzai, sendakange ndiripo rwechipiri, uye ikozvino ndisipo ndinonyorera avo vakagara vatadza, nekuvamwe vese, kuti kana ndikauyazve, handicha<transChange type="added">va</transChange>regereri.
II Corinthians 13:3 Sezvo muchitsvaka uchapupu hwaKristu anotaura mandiri, asina utera kwamuri, asi ane simba mamuri.
II Corinthians 13:4 Nokuti kunyange akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa neutera, zvakadaro anorarama nesimba raMwari. Nokuti isuwo tine utera maari asi tichararama pamwe naye nesimba raMwari kwamuri.
II Corinthians 13:5 Zviongororei kana muri parutendo; zviidzei. Kana hamuzivi here imwi, kuti Jesu Kristu ari mamuri sei? Kunze kwekuti zvirokwazvo muri vakaraswa.
II Corinthians 13:6 Asi ndinovimba kuti muchaziva kuti isu hatisi vakaraswa.
II Corinthians 13:7 Zvino ndinonyengetera kuna Mwari, kuti musaita chinhu chakaipa; kwete kuti isu tiratidzike takatendeka, asi kuti imwi muite zvakarurama, kunyange isu tive sevakaraswa.
II Corinthians 13:8 Nokuti hatigoni kuita chinhu chinopesana nechokwadi, asi chechokwadi.
II Corinthians 13:9 Nokuti tinofara kana isu tine utera, imwiwo makasimba; uye izviwo tinozvinyengeterera, kuperera kwenyu.
II Corinthians 13:10 Saka ndinonyora zvinhu izvi ndisipo, zvimwe <transChange type="added">kana</transChange> ndiripo ndingashandisa hasha, zvichienderana nesimba Ishe raakandipa pakuvaka, uye kwete pakuputsa. <div eID="gen1431" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1430" type="section"/>
II Corinthians 13:11 Pakupedzisira, hama, farai, muperedzerwe, munyaradzwe, muve vemoyo umwe, garai murugare; uye Mwari werudo nerugare achava nemwi.
II Corinthians 13:12 Kwazisanai nekutsvoda kutsvene.
II Corinthians 13:13 Vatsvene vese vanokukwazisai.
II Corinthians 13:14 Nyasha dzaIshe Jesu Kristu, nerudo rwaMwari, nekudyidzana kweMweya Mutsvene, <transChange type="added">nga</transChange>zvive nemwi mese. Ameni. <div eID="gen1433" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1432" type="section"/> <chapter eID="2Cor.13"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1388" osisID="2Cor" type="book"/>
Galatians 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Gal" sID="gen1434" type="book"/>   <milestone n="VAGARATIA" type="x-usfm-h"/>
Galatians 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Gal.1" sID="Gal.1"/>
Galatians 1:1 Pauro muapositori asingabvi kuvanhu, uye kwete nemunhu, asi naJesu Kristu, naMwari Baba vakamumutsa kubva kuvakafa,
Galatians 1:2 nehama dzese dzineni, kumakereke eGaratia:
Galatians 1:3 Nyasha kwamuri nerugare rwunobva kuna Mwari Baba, naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu,
Galatians 1:4 wakazvipa nekuda kwezvivi zvedu, kuti atisunungure panyika yakaipa yaikozvino, maererano nechido chaMwari naBaba vedu;
Galatians 1:5 <transChange type="added">kuve</transChange> nekubwinya kwaari kusvikira rinhi narinhi. Ameni. <div eID="gen1436" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1435" type="section"/>
Galatians 1:6 Ndinoshamisika kuti munokurumidza zvakadai kubva kune uyo wakakudanai munyasha dzaKristu, <transChange type="added">muchi</transChange>enda kune imwe evhangeri;
Galatians 1:7 isati iri imwe; asi kune vamwe vanokutambudzai vachidawo kutsaudzira evhangeri yaKristu.
Galatians 1:8 Asi kunyange isu kana mutumwa anobva kudenga akakuparidzirai evhangeri yakasiyana neyatakaparidza kwamuri, ngaave chakatukwa.
Galatians 1:9 Sezvatakamboreva, uye ndinorevazve ikozvino: Kana umwe akakuparidzirai evhangeri yakasiyana neyamakagamuchira, ngaave chakatukwa.
Galatians 1:10 Nokuti ikozvino ndinonyengetedza vanhu here kana Mwari? Kana ndinotsvaka kufadza vanhu here? Nokuti kana ndichiri kufadza vanhu, ndingadai ndisiri muranda waKristu.
Galatians 1:11 Asi ndinokuzivisai, hama, evhangeri yakaparidzwa neni, kuti haina kuita seyevanhu.
Galatians 1:12 Nokuti neni handina kuigamuchira kumunhu, uye handina ku<transChange type="added">i</transChange>dzidziswa, asi nekuzarurirwa kwaJesu Kristu.
Galatians 1:13 Nokuti makanzwa mufambiro wangu kwekutanga pachiJudha, kuti ndaishusha kereke yaMwari zvikurusa sei, nekuiparadza;
Galatians 1:14 uye ndaibudirira pachiJudha kupfuura vazhinji vezero rangu parudzi rwangu, ndichishingairisisa tsika dzemadzibaba angu.
Galatians 1:15 Asi zvakati zvafadza Mwari, iye wakandisanangura kubva padumbu ramai vangu, aka<transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>dana nenyasha dzake,
Galatians 1:16 kuratidza Mwanakomana wake mandiri, kuti ndimuparidze pakati pevahedheni, pakarepo handina kurangana nenyama neropa;
Galatians 1:17 uye handina kukwira kuJerusarema kune vakanditangira kuva vaapositori, asi ndakaenda kuArabhiya, ndikadzokerazve kuDhamasiko.
Galatians 1:18 Ipapo shure kwemakore matatu ndakakwira kuJerusarema kunoona Petro, ndikagara naye mazuva gumi nemashanu.
Galatians 1:19 Asi handina kuona umwe wevaapositori, kunze kwaJakobho munin'ina waIshe.
Galatians 1:20 Zvino zvinhu zvandinokunyorerai, tarira pamberi paMwari, kuti handinyepi.
Galatians 1:21 Shure kwaizvozvo ndakaenda kumatunhu eSiriya neeKirikia.
Galatians 1:22 Asi ndakange ndisingazikanwi pachiso nemakereke eJudhiya aiva muna Kristu;
Galatians 1:23 asi vakange vanzwa chete kuti: Waititambudza nguva dzakapfuura, zvino woparidza rutendo rwaaimboparadza.
Galatians 1:24 Vakarumbidzawo Mwari mandiri. <chapter eID="Gal.1"/><div eID="gen1438" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1437" type="section"/>
Galatians 2:0 <div sID="gen1439" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="Gal.2" sID="Gal.2"/>  <div sID="gen1440" type="x-p"/>
Galatians 2:1 Shure kweizvozvo kwapfuura makore gumi nemana ndakakwirazve kuJerusarema naBhanabhasi, ndikatorawo naTitosi.
Galatians 2:2 Zvino ndakakwira nekuzarurirwa, ndokuvarondedzera evhangeri yandinoparidza pakati pevahedheni, asi pachivande kune vakange vachikudzwa, zvimwe ndimhanyire kana ndakamhanyira pasina.
Galatians 2:3 Asi kunyange Titosi <transChange type="added">wa</transChange>iva neni, ari muGiriki, haana kurovererwa kuti adzingiswe;
Galatians 2:4 uye nekuda kwehama dzenhema, vakange vapinzwa pachivande, vakange vapinda nekunyangira kuzoshora kusununguka kwedu kwatinako muna Kristu Jesu, kuti vatiise muuranda;
Galatians 2:5 vatisina kutendera nekuzviisa pasi kunyange kweawa; kuti chokwadi cheevhangeri chirambe chigere nemwi.
Galatians 2:6 Asi kune vainzi chinhu (kunyange vaimbova chii hazvirevi chinhu kwandiri; Mwari haagamuchiri chimiro chemunhu), nokuti avo vaikudzwa havana kundiwedzera chinhu;
Galatians 2:7 asi zvakadaro, vakati vaona kuti evhangeri yevasina kudzingiswa yakakumikidzwa kwandiri, saPetro yevasina kudzingiswa,
Galatians 2:8 (nekuti iye wakaita nesimba kuna Petro kuvuapositori hwekudzingiswa, wakaita nesimba nekwandiri kuvahedheni);
Galatians 2:9 zvino vaziva nyasha dzandakapiwa, vanaJakobho naKefasi naJohwani, vaikudzwa kuva mbiru, vakapa ini naBhanabhasi ruoko rwerudyi rwekudyidzana, kuti isu <transChange type="added">tiende</transChange> kuvahedheni, ivowo kune vakadzingiswa;
Galatians 2:10 chete kuti tirangarire varombo, ichocho chandakashingairirawo kuita.
Galatians 2:11 Zvino Petro wakati asvika Andiyokiya, ndakamupikisa pachiso, nokuti wakange ane mhosva.
Galatians 2:12 Nokuti vamwe vasati vasvika vaibva kuna Jakobho, waidya nevahedheni; asi kana vasvika waisuduruka, achizviraura, achitya vekudzingiswa.
Galatians 2:13 Nevamwewo VaJudha vakanyepedzera pamwe naye, zvekuti Bhanabhasiwo wakatorwa neunyepedzeri hwavo.
Galatians 2:14 Asi ndakati ndaona kuti havafambi zvakarurama maererano nechokwadi cheevhangeri, ndakati kuna Petro pamberi pevese: Kana iwe uri muJudha, unorarama nemutoo wevahedheni, uye kwete sezvinoita VaJudha, unoroverera sei vahedheni kuti vararame seVaJudha?
Galatians 2:15 Isu tiri VaJudha pachisikirwo, uye kwete vatadzi vanobva kuvahedheni,
Galatians 2:16 tichiziva kuti munhu haanzi wakarurama nemabasa emurairo, asi nerutendo kuna Jesu Kristu, nesu takatenda kuna Kristu Jesu, kuti tinzi takarurama nerutendo kuna Kristu, uye kwete nemabasa emurairo; nokuti nemabasa emurairo hakuna nyama ichanzi yakarurama.
Galatians 2:17 Asi kana <transChange type="added">isu</transChange>, tinotsvaka kunzi takarurama kuna Kristu, nesu tomene tiwanikwe tiri vatadzi, naizvozvo Kristu wava mushumiri wechivi here? Ngazvisadaro!
Galatians 2:18 Nokuti kana ndikavakazve izvi zvandakaputsa, ndinozviratidza <transChange type="added">kuva</transChange> mudariki.
Galatians 2:19 Nokuti ini nemurairo ndakafa kumurairo, kuti ndirarame kuna Mwari.
Galatians 2:20 Ndakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pamwe naKristu; asi ndinorarama; handisisiri ini, asi Kristu anorarama mandiri; asi zvandinorarama ikozvino panyama, ndinorarama nerutendo rweMwanakomana waMwari, wakandida akazvipa nekuda kwangu.
Galatians 2:21 Handishaisi nyasha dzaMwari maturo; nokuti kana kunzi wakarurama <transChange type="added">kunowanikwa</transChange> nemurairo, saka Kristu wakafira pasina.  <chapter eID="Gal.2"/><div eID="gen1440" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1439" type="section"/>
Galatians 3:0 <div sID="gen1441" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="Gal.3" sID="Gal.3"/>  <div sID="gen1442" type="x-p"/>
Galatians 3:1 Haiwa VaGaratia matununu, ndiani wakakuroyai kuti murege kuteerera chokwadi, imwi makaratidzwa Jesu Kristu pachena pamberi pemeso, akarovererwa pamuchinjikwa pakati penyu?
Galatians 3:2 Ndichochi chete chandinoda kudzidza kwamuri <transChange type="added">chekuti</transChange>: Makagamuchira Mweya nemabasa emurairo here, kana nekunzwa kwerutendo?
Galatians 3:3 Ko muri matununu akadai? Makatanga muMweya, zvino mopedzisa munyama here?
Galatians 3:4 Makatambudzika zvikuru zvakadai pasina here? Zvakadaro pasinawo!
Galatians 3:5 Naizvozvo iye anokupai Mweya neanoita mabasa esimba pakati penyu, <transChange type="added">anozviita </transChange>nemabasa emurairo here, kana nekunzwa kwerutendo?
Galatians 3:6 Abhurahama sezvaakatenda Mwari, zvikaverengwawo kwaari kuti kururama.
Galatians 3:7 Naizvozvo munoziva kuti avo verutendo, ndivo vana vaAbhurahama.
Galatians 3:8 Nerugwaro, rwaona zviri mberi kuti Mwari anoti vahedheni vakarurama kubudikidza nerutendo, rwakagara rwaparidza evhangeri kuna Abhurahama, ruchiti: Mauri marudzi ese acharopafadzwa.
Galatians 3:9 Naizvozvo verutendo vanoropafadzwa pamwe naAbhurahama wakatenda.
Galatians 3:10 Nokuti vese vemabasa emurairo vari pasi pekutukwa; nokuti kwakanyorwa, <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Wakatukwa wese asingarambiri pazvese zvakanyorwa mubuku yemurairo kuti azviite.
Galatians 3:11 Asi zviri pachena kuti hakuna munhu anonzi wakarurama nemurairo pamberi paMwari, nokuti <transChange type="added">kunonzi</transChange>: Wakarurama achararama nerutendo.
Galatians 3:12 Zvino murairo haubvi parutendo, asi <transChange type="added">zvinonzi:</transChange> Munhu anoita zvinhu izvi achararama mazviri.
Galatians 3:13 Kristu wakatidzikunura pachakatukwa chemurairo, aitirwa chakatukwa isu, nokuti kwakanyorwa, <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Wakatukwa wese wakaremberera pamuti;
Galatians 3:14 kuti ropafadzo yaAbhurahama isvike kuvahedheni muna Kristu Jesu, kuti tigamuchire nerutendo chivimbiso cheMweya.
Galatians 3:15 Hama, ndinotaura nemutoo wevanhu; kunyange sungano yevanhu yasimbiswa, hakuna munhu anoikonesa kana kuwedzera kwairi.
Galatians 3:16 Zvino zvivimbiso zvakataurwa kuna Abhurahama nekumbeu yake. Haarevi <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Nekumbeu <transChange type="added">dzako</transChange>, sevanenge vazhinji, asi saanenge ari mumwe, <transChange type="added">anoti:</transChange> Nekumbeu yako; inova Kristu.
Galatians 3:17 Ndinoreva ichiwo: Sungano yakagara yasimbiswa naMwari muna Kristu, murairo ukazouya makore mazana mana nemakumi matatu apfuura haungaishaisi maturo, kuti uite chivimbiso chive chisina maturo.
Galatians 3:18 Nokuti kana nhaka ichibva kumurairo, haichabvi kuchivimbiso; asi Mwari wakapa pachena Abhurahama nechivimbiso.
Galatians 3:19 Ko murairo chii? Wakawedzerwa nekuda kwekudarika, kusvikira mbeu yasvika yakaitirwa chivimbiso; wakagadzwa nevatumwa muruoko rwemurevereri.
Galatians 3:20 Asi murevereri haasi weumwe, asi Mwari ndeumwe.
Galatians 3:21 Ko murairo unopesana nezvivimbiso zvaMwari here? Ngazvisadaro! Nokuti dai pakange pane murairo wakapiwa unogona kuraramisa, zvirokwazvo kururama kungadai kuchibva kumurairo.
Galatians 3:22 Asi rugwaro rwakapfigira zvese pasi pechivi, kuti chivimbiso chinobva parutendo rwaJesu Kristu chipiwe kune vanotenda.
Galatians 3:23 Asi kusati kwasvika rutendo, taichengetwa pasi pemurairo, takapfigirwa kusvikira kurutendo rwaizozarurwa shure.
Galatians 3:24 Saizvozvo murairo wakange uri murairidzi wedu kuna Kristu, kuti tinzi takarurama nerutendo.
Galatians 3:25 Asi rutendo rwakati rwasvika, hatisisiri pasi pemurairidzi.
Galatians 3:26 Nokuti mese muri vana vaMwari nerutendo muna Kristu Jesu.
Galatians 3:27 Nokuti mese makabhabhatidzwa muna Kristu, makapfeka Kristu.
Galatians 3:28 Hakuna muJudha kana muGiriki, hakuna wakasungwa kana wakasununguka, hakuna munhurume nemunhukadzi; nokuti imwi mese muri vamwe muna Kristu Jesu.
Galatians 3:29 Zvino kana imwi <transChange type="added">muri</transChange> <transChange type="added">vanhu</transChange> vaKristu, saka muri mbeu yaAbhurahama, uye vadyi venhaka maererano nechivimbiso.  <chapter eID="Gal.3"/><div eID="gen1442" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1441" type="section"/>
Galatians 4:0 <div sID="gen1443" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="Gal.4" sID="Gal.4"/>  <div sID="gen1444" type="x-p"/>
Galatians 4:1 Zvino ndinoti, mudyi wenhaka, kana achingori mwana chete, haatongosiyani nemuranda, kunyange ari ishe wezvese;
Galatians 4:2 asi ari pasi pevachengeti nevatariri kusvikira panguva yakatarwa nababa.
Galatians 4:3 Saizvozvo nesu, patakange tiri vana, taiva muuranda pasi pedzidziso dzekutanga dzenyika.
Galatians 4:4 Asi apo kuzara kwenguva kwasvika, Mwari wakatuma Mwanakomana wake, wakavapo kubva kumukadzi, wakavapo pasi pemurairo,
Galatians 4:5 kuti adzikunure vari pasi pemurairo, kuti tigamuchire kuitwa vanakomana.
Galatians 4:6 Uye nokuti muri vanakomana, Mwari wakatuma Mweya weMwanakomana wake mumoyo yenyu, achidanidzira <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Abha*, Baba!
Galatians 4:7 Saka hausisiri muranda, asi mwanakomana; zvino kana <transChange type="added">wava</transChange> mwanakomana, <transChange type="added">wava</transChange>wo mudyi wenhaka yaMwari nemuna Kristu.
Galatians 4:8 Asi nenguva iyo, musingazivi Mwari, maiva varanda vevasiri vamwari pachisikirwo;
Galatians 4:9 asi ikozvino sezvo moziva Mwari, zvikuru sei zvamunozikanwa naMwari, modzokerazve sei kudzidziso dzekutanga dzisina simba dzeurombo, dzamunoshuva kuva muuranda hwadzo zvekarezve?
Galatians 4:10 Munochengetedza misi, nemwedzi, nenguva, nemakore.
Galatians 4:11 Ndinokutyirai, zvimwe ndakashingairira pasina kwamuri.
Galatians 4:12 Ivai seni, nokuti ini ndakaitawo semwi, hama, ndinokukumbirisai; hamuna kutombonditadzira chinhu;
Galatians 4:13 munozivawo kuti nemuundonda hwenyama, ndakaparidza evhangeri kwamuri pakutanga,
Galatians 4:14 nemuedzo wangu waiva panyama yangu hamuna kuzvidza kana kuramba, asi makandigamuchira semutumwa waMwari, saKristu Jesu.
Galatians 4:15 Zvino ropafadzo yenyu chii? Nokuti ndinokupupurirai kuti, kana zvichibvira, mutumbure meso enyu mundipe.
Galatians 4:16 Naizvozvo ndava muvengi wenyu nekukuudzai chokwadi here?
Galatians 4:17 Vanokushingairirai zvisina kunaka; asi vanoda kukuvharirai kunze, kuti mushingairire ivo.
Galatians 4:18 Asi zvakanaka kushingairwa pachakanaka nguva dzese, uye kwete pakuvapo kwangu chete.
Galatians 4:19 Vana vangu vadiki, vandinorwadziwazve nemimba pakubereka, kusvikira Kristu aumbwa mamuri,
Galatians 4:20 asi ndaishuva kuvapo nemwi ikozvino, uye kushandura inzwi rangu; nokuti ndiri mukukanganiswa pamusoro penyu. <div eID="gen1444" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1443" type="section"/>
Galatians 4:21 Ndiudzei, imwi munoshuva kuva pasi pemurairo, hamunzwi murairo here?
Galatians 4:22 Nokuti kwakanyorwa kuti Abhurahama wakange ane vanakomana vaviri, umwe kubva kumurandakadzi, neumwe kubva kune wakasununguka.
Galatians 4:23 Asi wakabva kumurandakadzi wakaberekwa panyama, asi wakabva kune wakasununguka nechivimbiso.
Galatians 4:24 Zvinhu izvi zvinodimikira; nokuti ava isungano mbiri; imwe yepagomo reSinai, inoberekera uranda, inova Agari.
Galatians 4:25 Nokuti Agari ndiro gomo reSinai muArabhiya, rinomiririra Jerusarema raikozvino uye riri pauranda pamwe nevana varo.
Galatians 4:26 Asi Jerusarema riri kumusoro rakasununguka rinova mai vedu tese.
Galatians 4:27 Nokuti kwakanyorwa <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Fara, <transChange type="added">iwe</transChange> mhanje isingazvari; pururudza, udanidzire, iwe usingarwadziwi nemimba, nokuti vana vemusiiwa vazhinji kwazvo kune <transChange type="added">ve</transChange>une murume.
Galatians 4:28 Asi isu, hama, saIsaka tiri vana vechivimbiso.
Galatians 4:29 Asi sepanguva iyo uyo wakaberekwa nemutoo wenyama wakamutambudza iye wemutoo weMweya, zvakadaro kunyange ikozvino.
Galatians 4:30 Asi rugwaro rwunoti kudini? Dzinga murandakadzi nemwanakomana wake; nokuti mwanakomana wemurandakadzi haangatongovi mudyi wenhaka pamwe nemwanakomana wewakasununguka.
Galatians 4:31 Naizvozvo, hama, hatisi vana vemurandakadzi, asi vewakasununguka.  <chapter eID="Gal.4"/><div eID="gen1446" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1445" type="section"/>
Galatians 5:0 <div sID="gen1447" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="Gal.5" sID="Gal.5"/>  <div sID="gen1448" type="x-p"/>
Galatians 5:1 Naizvozvo mirai makasimba murusununguko Kristu rwaakatisunungura narwo, uye musasungwazve nejoko reuranda.
Galatians 5:2 Tarirai, ini Pauro ndinoti kwamuri, kuti kana muchidzingiswa, Kristu haakubatsirii chinhu.
Galatians 5:3 Uye ndinopupurirazve kumunhu wese anodzingiswa, kuti ane ngava rekuita murairo wese.
Galatians 5:4 Makasunungurwa kuna Kristu, imwi munonzi makarurama kumurairo; makawa panyasha.
Galatians 5:5 Nokuti isu paMweya tinomirira nerutendo tariro yekururama.
Galatians 5:6 Nokuti muna Kristu Jesu kudzingiswa kana kusadzingiswa chero chinhu hazvina maturo; asi rutendo rwunobata nerudo.
Galatians 5:7 Manga muchimhanya zvakanaka; ndiani wakakudzivisai kuti murege kuteerera chokwadi?
Galatians 5:8 Uku kukwezva hakubvi kune anokudanai.
Galatians 5:9 Mbiriso shoma inovirisa bundu rese.
Galatians 5:10 Ini ndine chivimbo nemwi muna Ishe, kuti hamuchazorangariri chimwe <transChange type="added">chinhu</transChange>; asi uyo anokutambudzai achatakura mutongo, angava ani.
Galatians 5:11 Asi ini, hama, kana ndichiri kuparidza dzingiso, ndichiri kushushirwei? Naizvozvo chigumbuso chemuchinjikwa chabviswa.
Galatians 5:12 Ndingati avo vanokutambudzai vazvichekewo.
Galatians 5:13 Nokuti imwi makadanirwa kurusununguko, hama; chete kwete <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> rusununguko rwuve mukana panyama, asi nerudo shandiranai.
Galatians 5:14 Nokuti murairo wese unozadziswa pashoko rimwe, pane ichi: Ude wekwako sezvaunozvi<transChange type="added">da</transChange> <transChange type="added">iwe</transChange>.
Galatians 5:15 Asi kana muchirumana nekudyana, chenjerai kuti murege kupedzwa umwe neumwe wenyu. <div eID="gen1448" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1447" type="section"/>
Galatians 5:16 Zvino ndinoti: Fambai muMweya, zvino hamungatongozadzisi kuchiva kwenyama.
Galatians 5:17 Nokuti nyama inochiva zvinopesana neMweya, neMweya zvinopesana nenyama; uye izvi zvinopesana; kuti musaita zvinhu zvamunoda.
Galatians 5:18 Asi kana muchitungamirirwa neMweya, hamusi pasi pemurairo.
Galatians 5:19 Zvino mabasa enyama ari pachena, ndiwo <transChange type="added">awa</transChange>: Upombwe, ufeve, tsvina, unzenza,
Galatians 5:20 kunamata zvifananidzo, uroyi, ruvengo, makakava, godo, kutsamwa, kupokana, kupatsanurana, kutsauka,
Galatians 5:21 shanje, umhondi, uraradzi, makaro, nezvakadai; zvandinogara ndakuudzai sezvandakagarawo ndareva, kuti vanoita zvakadai havazodyi nhaka yeushe hwaMwari.
Galatians 5:22 Asi chibereko cheMweya rudo, mufaro, rugare, moyo murefu, moyo munyoro, kunaka, rutendo,
Galatians 5:23 unyoro, kuzvidzora; hakuna murairo unopikisa zvakadai.
Galatians 5:24 Asi avo vari vaKristu vakaroverera pamuchinjikwa nyama pamwe nehavi neruchiva.
Galatians 5:25 Kana tichirarama muMweya, ngatifambewo muMweya,
Galatians 5:26 tirege kuzvikudza kusina maturo, tichidenhana, tichiitirana shanje. <chapter eID="Gal.5"/><div eID="gen1450" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1449" type="section"/>
Galatians 6:0 <div sID="gen1451" type="section"/> <chapter n="6" osisID="Gal.6" sID="Gal.6"/>  <div sID="gen1452" type="x-p"/>
Galatians 6:1 Hama, kanawo munhu akawirwa nekumwe kudarika, imwi veMweya mugadzirisei wakadai nemweya weunyoro, uchizvichenjerera iwe, zvimwe newe ungaidzwa.
Galatians 6:2 Takuriranai mitoro yenyu, saizvozvowo zadzisai murairo waKristu.
Galatians 6:3 Nokuti kana munhu achizviti ndiri chinhu, asati ari chinhu, anozvinyengera.
Galatians 6:4 Asi umwe neumwe ngaanzvere basa rake amene, zvino ipapo achazvirumbidza pamusoro pake amene ega, uye kwete pamusoro peumwe.
Galatians 6:5 Nokuti umwe neumwe achatakura mutoro wake pachake.
Galatians 6:6 Uye anodzidziswa shoko ngaagovane neanodzidzisa pazvinhu zvese zvakanaka.
Galatians 6:7 Musanyengerwa, Mwari haasekwi; nokuti chimwe nechimwe munhu chaanodzvara ndichowo chaanokohwa.
Galatians 6:8 Nokuti anodzvara kunyama yake, achakohwa kuora kunobva panyama; asi anodzvara kuMweya achakohwa upenyu husingaperi hunobva kuMweya.
Galatians 6:9 Asi ngatirege kuneta pakuita zvakanaka; nokuti nenguva yakafanira tinozokohwa, kana tisingaori moyo.
Galatians 6:10 Naizvozvo zvino zvatine mukana, ngatiite zvakanaka kune vese, zvikuruwo kune veimba yerutendo.
Galatians 6:11 Onai <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> akakura sei mavara andinokunyorerai nawo nerwangu ruoko.
Galatians 6:12 Vese vanoda kuonekera panyama, ndivo vanokurovererai kuti mudzingiswe; chete kuti varege kushushwa nekuda kwemuchinjikwa waKristu.
Galatians 6:13 Nokuti kunyange ivo pachavo vakadzingiswa havachengeti murairo, asi vanoda kuti mudzingiswe, kuti vazvirumbidze panyama yenyu.
Galatians 6:14 Asi kwandiri ngakurege kuva nekuzvirumbidza, kunze kwepamuchinjikwa waIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, naye nyika yakarovererwa pamuchinjikwa kwandiri, neni kunyika.
Galatians 6:15 Nokuti muna Kristu Jesu kudzingiswa kana kusadzingiswa hakuna maturo, asi chisikwa chitsva.
Galatians 6:16 Uye vese vanofamba nemurairo uyu, rugare <transChange type="added">ngaruve</transChange> pamusoro pavo, netsitsi, nepamusoro paIsraeri waMwari.
Galatians 6:17 Kubva ikozvino, ngakurege kuva nemunhu anonditambudza; nokuti ini ndakatakura pamuviri wangu rupawo rwaIshe Jesu.
Galatians 6:18 Nyasha dzaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> nomweya wenyu, hama. Ameni. <div eID="gen1452" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1451" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Gal.6"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1434" osisID="Gal" type="book"/>
Ephesians 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Eph" sID="gen1453" type="book"/>   <milestone n="VAEFESO" type="x-usfm-h"/>
Ephesians 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Eph.1" sID="Eph.1"/>
Ephesians 1:1 Pauro, muapositori waJesu Kristu nechido chaMwari, kuvatsvene vari muEfeso, nekune vakatendeka muna Kristu Jesu:
Ephesians 1:2 Nyasha kwamuri nerugare rwunobva kuna Mwari Baba vedu uye Ishe Jesu Kristu. <div eID="gen1455" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1454" type="section"/>
Ephesians 1:3 Ngaarumbidzwe Mwari uye Baba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, wakatiropafadza neropafadzo yese yemweya pazvinhu zvekudenga muna Kristu;
Ephesians 1:4 sezvaakatisarudza maari pasati pava nekuvambwa kwenyika, kuti tive vatsvene, uye vasingamhuriki pamberi pake murudo,
Ephesians 1:5 agara atitemera mukuitwa vana kwaari kubudikidza naJesu Kristu, sekuda kwakanaka kwechido chake,
Ephesians 1:6 kuve rumbidzo yekubwinya yenyasha dzake, madziri wakatiropafadza muMudikanwi;
Ephesians 1:7 watine dzikunuro maari neropa rake, <transChange type="added">iyo</transChange> kanganwiro yekudarika, zvichienderana nefuma yenyasha dzake,
Ephesians 1:8 dzaakawanza kwatiri mukuchenjera kwese neungwaru,
Ephesians 1:9 azivisa kwatiri chakavanzika chechido chake, sekushuva kwakanaka kwake kwaakaronga pachake;
Ephesians 1:10 kuti pakubata kwekuzara kwenguva, aunganidze pamwe zvinhu zvese muna Kristu, zvese zviri kumatenga nezviri panyika;
Ephesians 1:11 <transChange type="added">imo</transChange> maari, muna iye matakawanawo nhaka, yatakagara tatemerwa zvichienderana nechiga chaiye anoita zvinhu zvese zvichienderana nezano rechido chake,
Ephesians 1:12 kuti tive rumbidzo yekubwinya kwake, <transChange type="added">isu</transChange> takatanga kuvimba kuna Kristu;
Ephesians 1:13 nemwi muna iye, manzwa shoko rechokwadi, evhangeri yeruponeso rwenyu; kuna iyewo matenda kwaari makapiwa mucherechedzo neMweya Mutsvene wechivimbiso,
Ephesians 1:14 ari rubatso rwenhaka yedu, rwuve rudzikunuro rwezvakawanikwa, kurumbidzo yekubwinya kwake.
Ephesians 1:15 Naizvozvo iniwo ndakati ndanzwa zverutendo rwenyu muna Ishe Jesu nerudo kuvatsvene vese,
Ephesians 1:16 handiregi kukuvongerai, ndichikurangarirai paminyengetero yangu;
Ephesians 1:17 kuti Mwari waIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, Baba vekubwinya, akupei mweya wekuchenjera newechakazarurwa paruzivo pamusoro pake;
Ephesians 1:18 meso efungwa dzenyu avhenekerwa kuti muzive kuti tariro yekudana kwake chii, uye fuma yekubwinya kwenhaka yake pavatsvene chii,
Ephesians 1:19 uye kuti ukuru hwakapfuvurisa hwesimba rake kwatiri isu tinotenda chii, maererano nekubata kweusamasimba hwesimba rake,
Ephesians 1:20 raakashandisa muna Kristu, achimumutsa kubva kuvakafa, noku<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>garisa kuruoko rwake rwerudyi <transChange type="added">panzvimbo </transChange>dzekudenga,
Ephesians 1:21 kumusoro-soro kweutongi hwese, nesimba, neukuru, neushe, nezita rega-rega rinodanwa, kwete kwenguva ino chete, asi kune inouyawo;
Ephesians 1:22 akaisawo zvese pasi petsoka dzake, akamupa kuva musoro pamusoro pezvese kukereke,
Ephesians 1:23 ndiwo muviri wake, kuzara kwaiye anozadzisa zvese mune zvese.  <chapter eID="Eph.1"/><div eID="gen1457" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1456" type="section"/>
Ephesians 2:0 <div sID="gen1458" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="Eph.2" sID="Eph.2"/>  <div sID="gen1459" type="x-p"/>
Ephesians 2:1 <transChange type="added">Wakakuraramisai</transChange>, imwiwo makange makafa mukudarika nemuzvivi,
Ephesians 2:2 izvo zvamaifamba mazviri kare maererano nenzira yenyika ino, maererano nenzira dzemutungamiriri wesimba redenga, dzemweya unobata zvino muvana vekusateerera;
Ephesians 2:3 vataifamba tesewo pakati pavo kare mukuchiva kwenyama yedu, tichiita kuda kwenyama nekwefungwa, uye pachisikirwo taiva vana vekutsamwirwa, sevamwewo.
Ephesians 2:4 Asi Mwari, wakafuma panyasha, nekuda kwerudo rwake rukuru rwaakatida narwo,
Ephesians 2:5 kunyange takange takafa mukudarika, waka<transChange type="added">ti</transChange>raramisa pamwe naKristu (makaponeswa nenyasha);
Ephesians 2:6 aka<transChange type="added">ti</transChange>mutsa pamwe <transChange type="added">naye</transChange>, aka<transChange type="added">ti</transChange>garisa pamwe <transChange type="added">naye</transChange> ku<transChange type="added">nzvimbo </transChange>dzekudenga muna Kristu Jesu;
Ephesians 2:7 kuti nenguva dzinouya aratidze fuma hurusa yenyasha dzake muunyoro kwatiri muna Kristu Jesu.
Ephesians 2:8 Nokuti nenyasha makaponeswa nerutendo, uye izvi hazvibvi kwamuri; chipo chaMwari;
Ephesians 2:9 ha<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>bvi pamabasa, kuti kusava neanozvikudza.
Ephesians 2:10 Nokuti tiri basa rake, takasikirwa mabasa akanaka muna Kristu Jesu, Mwari aakagara agadzira, kuti tifambe maari. <div eID="gen1459" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1458" type="section"/>
Ephesians 2:11 Naizvozvo rangarirai kuti imwi maimbova vahedheni munyama, vanonzi kusadzingiswa nechinonzi kudzingiswa munyama kunoitwa nemaoko,
Ephesians 2:12 kuti panguva iyo makange musina Kristu, muri vatorwa paubwo hwaIsraeri, uye vatorwa pasungano dzechivimbiso, musina tariro, uye musina Mwari panyika.
Ephesians 2:13 Asi ikozvinowo muna Kristu Jesu, imwi maimbova kure, mava pedo neropa raKristu.
Ephesians 2:14 Nokuti ndiye rugare rwedu, iye wakaita zviviri <transChange type="added">zvive</transChange> chimwe, uye wakaputsa mudhuri wapakati wekuparadzanisa,
Ephesians 2:15 aparadza munyama yake ruvengo, <transChange type="added">iwo</transChange> mutemo wemirairo pazviga, kuti asike maari vaviri vave munhu umwe mutsva, aite rugare,
Ephesians 2:16 uye ayananise vaviri kuna Mwari mumuviri umwe kubudikidza nemuchinjikwa, auraya ruvengo nawo,
Ephesians 2:17 uye wakasvika akaparidza rugare kwamuri <transChange type="added">imwi</transChange> maiva kure, nekune avo vaiva pedo;
Ephesians 2:18 nokuti kubudikidza naye tese tine mapindiro neMweya umwe kuna Baba.
Ephesians 2:19 Naizvozvo zvino hamusisiri vaeni uye vatorwa, asi vebwo pamwe nevatsvene uye veimba yaMwari.
Ephesians 2:20 Makavakwa pamusoro penheyo dzevaapositori nevaporofita, Jesu Kristu amene ari ibwe repakona.
Ephesians 2:21 Maari imba yese yakabatanidzwa ikure ive tembere tsvene muna Ishe.
Ephesians 2:22 Maari nemwiwo makavakwa pamwe muve ugaro hwaMwari muMweya.  <chapter eID="Eph.2"/><div eID="gen1461" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1460" type="section"/>
Ephesians 3:0 <div sID="gen1462" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="Eph.3" sID="Eph.3"/>  <div sID="gen1463" type="x-p"/>
Ephesians 3:1 Nemhaka yeizvi, ini Pauro, musungwa waKristu Jesu nekuda kwenyu vahedheni,
Ephesians 3:2 kana zvirokwazvo makanzwa nezvekushandiswa kwenyasha dzaMwari dzakapiwa kwandiri pamusoro penyu,
Ephesians 3:3 kuti sechakazarurwa wakandizivisa chakavanzika, sezvandakambonyora ne<transChange type="added">mashoko</transChange> mashoma;
Ephesians 3:4 naizvozvo kana muchirava, munogona kunzwisisa ruzivo rwangu muchakavanzika chaKristu;
Ephesians 3:5 icho pane mamwe mazera chisina kuziviswa kuvanakomana vevanhu, sezvachozarurwa ikozvino kuvaapositori vake vatsvene nevaporofita muMweya;
Ephesians 3:6 kuti vahedheni vave vadyi venhaka pamwe <transChange type="added">nesu</transChange> uye vemuviri umwe nevagovani vechivimbiso chake muna Kristu kubudikidza neevhangeri,
Ephesians 3:7 yandakaitwa nayo mushumiri zvichienderana nechipo chenyasha dzaMwari chakapiwa kwandiri nekubata kwesimba rake.
Ephesians 3:8 Kwandiri ndiri mudiki kumudikisa wevatsvene vese, nyasha idzi dzakapiwa, kuti ndiparidze pakati pevahedheni fuma isinganzvereki yaKristu,
Ephesians 3:9 nekuita kuti vese vaone kuti kudyidzana kwakadini kwechakavanzika chakange chakavigwa muna Mwari kubva pakuvamba kwenyika, wakasika zvinhu zvese kubudikidza naJesu Kristu,
Ephesians 3:10 kuti ikozvino kuchenjera kwakasiyana-siyana kwaMwari kuziviswe nekereke paushe nepamasimba pa<transChange type="added">nzvimbo</transChange> dzekudenga,
Ephesians 3:11 sechiga chekusingaperi chaakatema muna Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu;
Ephesians 3:12 maari tine kutsunga nekupinda nechivimbo, nerutendo rwake.
Ephesians 3:13 Naizvozvo ndinokumbira kuti murege kuora moyo pamatambudziko angu pamusoro penyu, ndiwo kurumbidzwa kwenyu. <div eID="gen1463" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1462" type="section"/>
Ephesians 3:14 Nekuda kweizvozvi ndinofugama mabvi angu kuna Baba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu,
Ephesians 3:15 rudzi rwese rwuri kumatenga nepanyika rwunotumidzwa mavari,
Ephesians 3:16 kuti vakupei, zvichienderana nefuma yekubwinya kwavo, musimbiswe musimba neMweya wake mumunhu wemukati,
Ephesians 3:17 kuti Kristu agare pamoyo yenyu nerutendo; mune midzi uye makateiwa nheyo murudo,
Ephesians 3:18 kuti mugone kwazvo kunzwisisa pamwe nevatsvene vese, kuti kufara, nekureba, nekukwirira, nekudzika chii,
Ephesians 3:19 nekuziva rudo rwaKristu rwunopfuura ruzivo, kuti muzadzwe mukuzara kwese kwaMwari.
Ephesians 3:20 Zvino kune ane simba rekuita zvikuru kwazvo zvinopfuura zvese zvatinokumbira kana kufunga, maererano nesimba rinobata matiri,
Ephesians 3:21 kwaari <transChange type="added">ngakuve</transChange> nekubwinya mukereke naKristu Jesu kusvikira kumarudzi ese narinhi narinhi. Ameni.  <chapter eID="Eph.3"/><div eID="gen1465" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1464" type="section"/>
Ephesians 4:0 <div sID="gen1466" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="Eph.4" sID="Eph.4"/>  <div sID="gen1467" type="x-p"/>
Ephesians 4:1 Naizvozvo ndinokukumbirisai, ini musungwa muna Ishe, kuti mufambe zvakafanira kudanwa kwamakadanwa nako,
Ephesians 4:2 pamwe nekuzvininipisa kwese neunyoro, nemoyo murefu, muchiitirana moyo murefu murudo,
Ephesians 4:3 muchishingaira kuchengeta umwe hweMweya muchisungo cherugare.
Ephesians 4:4 <transChange type="added">Kune</transChange> muviri umwe uye Mweya umwe, sezvamakadanwawo mutariro imwe yekudanwa kwenyu;
Ephesians 4:5 Ishe umwe, rutendo rumwe, rubhabhatidzo rwumwe,
Ephesians 4:6 Mwari umwe naBaba vevese, ari pamusoro pevese, uye kubudikidza nevese, nekwamuri mese.
Ephesians 4:7 Asi kune umwe neumwe wedu kwakapiwa nyasha zvichienderana nechiyero chechipo chaKristu.
Ephesians 4:8 Naizvozvo anoti: Paakakwira kumusoro, wakatapa utapwa, akapa zvipo kuvanhu.
Ephesians 4:9 Zvino izvi <transChange type="added">kuti:</transChange> Wakakwira, chii kunze kwekuti wakaburukawo pakutanga kunzvimbo dzakaderera dzenyika?
Ephesians 4:10 Wakaburuka ndiyewo wakakwira kumusoro-soro kwematenga ese, kuti azadzise zvinhu zvese.
Ephesians 4:11 Zvino iye wakapa vamwe <transChange type="added">kuva</transChange> vaapositori, nevamwe vaporofita, nevamwe vaevhangeri, nevamwe vafudzi nevadzidzisi,
Ephesians 4:12 kuitira kukwaniswa kwevatsvene, pabasa reushumiri, pakuvakwa kwemuviri waKristu;
Ephesians 4:13 kusvikira tese tasvika paumwe hwerutendo, nehweruzivo rweMwanakomana waMwari, pamurume wakazara, pachiyero chechimiro chekuzara kwaKristu;
Ephesians 4:14 kuti tisazova vacheche, vanodzungaidzwa nemafungu kuenda nekudzoka nekupepereswa nemhepo ipi neipi yedzidziso, nekunyengera kwevanhu, pakunyengera, kumano ekutsauka;
Ephesians 4:15 asi titaure chokwadi murudo, tigokura maari pazvinhu zvese, iye musoro, Kristu;
Ephesians 4:16 kunobva kwaari muviri wese, wakabatanidzwa pamwe zvakaringana nekuumbanidzwa, kubudikidza nemudemhe-mudemhe wefundo rimwe nerimwe, zvichienderana nemashandiro muchiero chenhengo imwe neimwe achikurisa muviri pakuvakwa kwawo murudo. <div eID="gen1467" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1466" type="section"/>
Ephesians 4:17 Naizvozvo ndinoreva ichi, nekupupura muna Ishe, kuti imwi kubva zvino musachifamba sevamwe vahedheni vanofamba mukushaya maturo kwefungwa yavo,
Ephesians 4:18 vakasvibiridzwa mufungwa, vari vatorwa paupenyu hwaMwari nekuda kwekusaziva kuri mukati mavo, nekuda koukukutu hwemoyo yavo;
Ephesians 4:19 ivo vakazvipa vatindivara kuunzenza, kuti vabate utsvina hwese neruchiva.
Ephesians 4:20 Asi imwi hamuna kudzidza Kristu saizvozvo,
Ephesians 4:21 kana zvakadaro makamunzwa nekudzidziswa maari, sezvo chokwadi chiri muna Jesu;
Ephesians 4:22 kuti murase zvinoenderana nemufambiro wekutanga, munhu wekare, anoodzwa nekuchiva kwekunyengera;
Ephesians 4:23 uye muvandudzwe mumweya wefungwa yenyu,
Ephesians 4:24 uye kuti mufuke munhu mutsva, wakasikwa maererano naMwari mukururama neutsvene hwechokwadi.
Ephesians 4:25 Naizvozvo muchiisa nhema parutivi, mutaure chokwadi umwe neumwe kune umwe wake; nokuti tiri mitezo, umwe weumwe.
Ephesians 4:26 Tsamwai musingatadzi; zuva ngarirege kuvira pamusoro pekutsamwa kwenyu;
Ephesians 4:27 uye musapa dhiabhorosi nzvimbo.
Ephesians 4:28 Wakaba ngaarege kubazve; asi zviri nani kuti abate nesimba chinhu chakanaka nemaoko, kuti ave nechaangapa anoshaiwa.
Ephesians 4:29 Shoko ripi zvaro rakaora ngarirege kubuda mumuromo menyu, asi chero kana rakanakira kuvaka sezvakafanira, kuti ripe nyasha kune vanonzwa.
Ephesians 4:30 Uye regai kushungurudza Mweya Mutsvene waMwari, wamakaiswa mucherechedzo maari kusvikira pazuva redzukunuro.
Ephesians 4:31 Shungu dzese, nehasha, nekutsamwa, nekupopota, nekutuka ngazvibviswe kwamuri neuipi hwese;
Ephesians 4:32 asi ivai nemoyo munyoro umwe kune mumwe, muchinzwira tsitsi, muchikanganwirana, Mwari sezvaakakukanganwiraiwo muna Kristu. <chapter eID="Eph.4"/><div eID="gen1469" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1468" type="section"/>
Ephesians 5:0 <div sID="gen1470" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="Eph.5" sID="Eph.5"/>  <div sID="gen1471" type="x-p"/>
Ephesians 5:1 Naizvozvo ivai vateveri vaMwari, sevana vanodikanwa;
Ephesians 5:2 uye fambai murudo, Kristu sezvaakatidawo, akazvipa nekuda kwedu, <transChange type="added">ave</transChange> chipo nechibairo kuna Mwari zvive hwema hunonhuhwira.
Ephesians 5:3 Asi upombwe netsvina yese kana kuchiva ngazvirege kutongorehwa pakati penyu, sezvinofanira vatsvene;
Ephesians 5:4 neunzenza, nekutaura kweupenzi, kana kunemera, zvinhu zvisina kufanira; asi zviri nani kuvonga.
Ephesians 5:5 Nokuti munozviziva izvi, kuti mhombwe yega-yega, kana munhu asina kuchena, kana munhu anochiva, anova munamati wezvifananidzo, haana nhaka muushe hwaKristu nehwaMwari.
Ephesians 5:6 Ngakurege kuva nemunhu unokunyengerai nemashoko asina maturo; nokuti nekuda kwezvinhu izvi kutsamwa kwaMwari kunouya pamusoro pevana vekusateerera.
Ephesians 5:7 Naizvozvo regai kuva vagovani navo.
Ephesians 5:8 Nokuti maimbova rima, asi ikozvino <transChange type="added">mava</transChange> chiedza muna Ishe; fambai sevana vechiedza.
Ephesians 5:9 Nokuti chibereko cheMweya <transChange type="added">chiri</transChange> mukunaka kwese nekururama nechokwadi,
Ephesians 5:10 muchiongorora zvinofadza kuna Ishe;
Ephesians 5:11 uye musadyidzana nemabasa erima asina zvibereko, asi zviri nani mutsiurewo;
Ephesians 5:12 nokuti zvinhu zvinoitwa navo pakavanda zvinonyadzisa kunyange kutaura.
Ephesians 5:13 Asi zvinhu zvese zvinotsiurwa zvinoratidzwa nechiedza; nokuti zvese zvinoratidzwa chiedza.
Ephesians 5:14 Naizvozvo anoti: Simuka iwe urere, uye muka kubva kuvakafa, zvino Kristu achakuvhenekera.
Ephesians 5:15 Naizvozvo chenjerai kuti munofamba sei nekuchenjerera, kwete semapenzi asi sevakachenjera;
Ephesians 5:16 muchidzikunura nguva, nokuti mazuva akaipa.
Ephesians 5:17 Naizvozvo musava matununu, asi vanonzwisisa zviri kuda kwaIshe.
Ephesians 5:18 Uye regai kuraradza newaini, makuri mune bongozozo guru, asi zadzwai neMweya,
Ephesians 5:19 muchitaurirana nemapisarema nenziyo, nenziyo dzeMweya, muchiimba nekuita mutinhimira mumoyo yenyu kuna Ishe,
Ephesians 5:20 muchipa kuvonga nguva dzese pamusoro pezvinhu zvese kuna Mwari naBaba, muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu,
Ephesians 5:21 muchizviisa pasi umwe kune umwe mukutya Mwari. <div eID="gen1471" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1470" type="section"/>
Ephesians 5:22 Vakadzi, zviisei pasi pevarume venyu pachenyu, sekuna Ishe,
Ephesians 5:23 nokuti murume musoro wemukadzi, saKristuwo ari musoro wekereke, uye ndiye Muponesi wemuviri.
Ephesians 5:24 Asi kerekewo sezvairi pasi paKristu, saizvozvowo vakadzi kuvarume vavo pachavo pachinhu chese.
Ephesians 5:25 Varume, idai vakadzi venyu pachenyu, Kristu sezvaakadawo kereke, akazvipa nekuda kwayo;
Ephesians 5:26 kuti aiite tsvene a<transChange type="added">i</transChange>natse nekusuka kwemvura neShoko,
Ephesians 5:27 kuti aikumikidze kwaari, kereke inobwinya isina gwapa kana kuwonyana, kana chimwe chezvakadai, asi kuti ive tsvene isina chaingapomerwa.
Ephesians 5:28 Saizvozvo varume vanofanira kuda vakadzi vavo pachavo semiviri yavo pachavo. Anoda mukadzi wake pachake, anozvida iye.
Ephesians 5:29 Nokuti hakuna wakatongovenga nyama yake pachake, asi anoifunda nekuchengetedza, sezvinoita Ishewo <transChange type="added">ku</transChange>kereke;
Ephesians 5:30 nokuti isu tiri mitezo yemuviri wake, yenyama yake neyemafupa ake.
Ephesians 5:31 Nekuda kweizvozvi munhu achasiya baba namai vake, ndokubatanidzwa kumukadzi wake; uye ava vaviri vachava nyama imwe.
Ephesians 5:32 Chakavanzika ichi chikuru, asi ndinotaura zvaKristu nezvekereke.
Ephesians 5:33 Asi imwiwo umwe neumwe pachake ngaade mukadzi wake pachake se<transChange type="added">zvaano</transChange>zvi<transChange type="added">da</transChange> iye; nemukadzi <transChange type="added">aone</transChange> kuti atye murume.  <chapter eID="Eph.5"/><div eID="gen1473" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1472" type="section"/>
Ephesians 6:0 <div sID="gen1474" type="section"/> <chapter n="6" osisID="Eph.6" sID="Eph.6"/>  <div sID="gen1475" type="x-p"/>
Ephesians 6:1 Vana, teererai vabereki venyu muna Ishe; nokuti izvi zvakarurama.
Ephesians 6:2 Kudza baba vako namai, unova murairo wekutanga une chivimbiso,
Ephesians 6:3 kuti zvikunakire, uye urarame nguva refu panyika.
Ephesians 6:4 Nemwi vana baba, musatsamwisa vana venyu, asi varerei pakuranga nekutsiura kwaIshe.
Ephesians 6:5 Varanda, teererai vatenzi <transChange type="added">venyu</transChange> panyama, nekutya nekudedera, nemoyo wenyu wakarurama sekuna Kristu;
Ephesians 6:6 kwete nekushandira maziso, sevafadzi vevanhu, asi sevaranda vaKristu, vanoita kuda kwaMwari kubva pamoyo;
Ephesians 6:7 muchishanda nechido chakanaka sekuna Ishe uye kwete kuvanhu;
Ephesians 6:8 muchiziva kuti chinhu chipi nechipi chakanaka umwe neumwe chaanoita, achagamuchira ichochi kuna Ishe, kana muranda, kana wakasununguka.
Ephesians 6:9 Nemwi madzitenzi, itai zvinhu zvimwezvo kwavari, muchirega kuvhundudzira; muchiziva kutiwo Tenzi wenyu pachenyu uri kumatenga; uye kwaari hakuna rusarura rwevanhu. <div eID="gen1475" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1474" type="section"/>
Ephesians 6:10 Pakupedzisira hama dzangu, simbai muna Ishe, nemukugwinya kwesimba rake.
Ephesians 6:11 Shongai zvombo zvese zvaMwari, kuti mugone kumirisana nemano adhiabhorosi;
Ephesians 6:12 nokuti hatirwisani neropa nenyama, asi neutongi, nemasimba, nevatungamiriri verima renyika ino, nemweya yakaipa kunzvimbo dzekumatenga.
Ephesians 6:13 Saka torai zvombo zvese zvaMwari kuti mugone kuramba mumire pazuva rakaipa, maita zvese, mumire.
Ephesians 6:14 Naizvozvo mirai, zvivuno zvenyu zvakasungwa nechokwadi, makapfeka chidzitiro chechifuva chekururama,
Ephesians 6:15 uye makasunga tsoka negadziriro yeevhangeri yerugare;
Ephesians 6:16 pamusoro pezvese matora nhoo yerutendo, yamungagona kudzima nayo miseve yese inopfuta yewakaipa.
Ephesians 6:17 Uye torai ngowani yeruponeso, nemunondo weMweya, unova shoko raMwari;
Ephesians 6:18 muchinyengetera nguva dzese nemunyengetero wese nemukumbiro muMweya, muchirinda pazvinhu izvi nekutsungirira kwese nekukumbirira vatsvene vese,
Ephesians 6:19 nepamusoro pangu, kuti shoko ripiwe kwandiri pakushamisa muromo wangu neushingi kuti ndidudzire zvakavanzika zveevhangeri,
Ephesians 6:20 yandiri nhume yayo mumaketani, kuti mairi nditaure ndisingatyi, sezvandinofanira kutaura. <div eID="gen1477" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1476" type="section"/>
Ephesians 6:21 Asi kuti imwiwo muzive zvakanangana neni, kuti ndinoitei, Tikiko hama inodikanwa, nemushumiri wakatendeka muna Ishe, achakuzivisai zvinhu zvese;
Ephesians 6:22 wandakatuma kwamuri nechinangwa ichi, kuti muzive zvakanangana nesu, uye anyaradze moyo yenyu.
Ephesians 6:23 Rugare kuhama, nerudo pamwe nerutendo rwunobva kuna Mwari Baba naIshe Jesu Kristu.
Ephesians 6:24 Nyasha <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> nevese vanoda Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu nekusingaperi. Ameni. <div eID="gen1479" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1478" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Eph.6"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1453" osisID="Eph" type="book"/>
Philippians 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Phil" sID="gen1480" type="book"/>   <milestone n="VAFIRIPI" type="x-usfm-h"/>
Philippians 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Phil.1" sID="Phil.1"/>
Philippians 1:1 Pauro naTimotio, varanda vaJesu Kristu, kuvatsvene vese muna Kristu Jesu vari paFiripi, pamwe nevatungamiriri nevadhikoni:
Philippians 1:2 Nyasha kwamuri, nerugare rwunobva kuna Mwari Baba vedu ne<transChange type="added">kuna </transChange>Ishe Jesu Kristu. <div eID="gen1482" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1481" type="section"/>
Philippians 1:3 Ndinovonga Mwari wangu pakukurangarirai nguva dzese,
Philippians 1:4 nguva dzese pamunyengetero wangu wega-wega pamusoro penyu mese ndichiita munyengetero nemufaro,
Philippians 1:5 nekuda kwekudyidzana kwenyu muevhangeri kubva zuva rekutanga kusvikira ikozvino;
Philippians 1:6 ndichivimba chinhu ichi, kuti wakatanga basa rakanaka mamuri, acha<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>pedzisa kusvikira zuva raJesu Kristu;
Philippians 1:7 sezvazvakandinakira kufunga izvi pamusoro penyu mese, nokuti ndinemwi mumoyo zvekuti zvese muzvisungo zvangu nemukutavirira nekusimbisa kweevhangeri, imwi mese muri vagovani pamwe neni venyasha.
Philippians 1:8 Nokuti Mwari ndiye chapupu changu, kuti ndinokushuvai mese zvikuru sei muura hwaJesu Kristu.
Philippians 1:9 Uye izvi ndinonyengetera, kuti rudo rwenyu rwurambe rwuchiwandisisa paruzivo nekunzwisisa kwese,
Philippians 1:10 kuti mutende zvinhu zvakanakisisa, kuti muve vakarurama nevasine mhosva, kusvikira zuva raKristu,
Philippians 1:11 makazadzwa nezvibereko zvekururama <transChange type="added">zvinouya</transChange> naJesu Kristu, pakubwinya nekurumbidzwa kwaMwari.
Philippians 1:12 Zvino ndinoda kuti muzive, hama, kuti zvinhu zvakandiwira zvakaita zvikuru kufambira mberi kweevhangeri;
Philippians 1:13 zvekuti zvisungo zvangu muna Kristu zvinoratidzwa pamuzinda wese nekuvamwe vese.
Philippians 1:14 Nevazhinji vehama muna Ishe, vavimbiswa nezvisungo zvangu, vonyanya kutsunga kutaura shoko raMwari vasingatyi.
Philippians 1:15 Vamwe zvirokwazvo vanoparidza Kristu kunyange negodo negakava, nevamwewo nemoyo wakanaka;
Philippians 1:16 vamwe vanoparidza Kristu nenharo, kwete pauchokwadi, vachifunga kuti vawedzere marwadzo pazvisungo zvangu.
Philippians 1:17 Asi vamwe <transChange type="added">vanoita</transChange> nerudo, vachiziva kuti ndakagadzirwa kutavirira evhangeri.
Philippians 1:18 Zvino chii? Kunyange zvakadaro kunzira dzese, kana mumano-mano kana muchokwadi, Kristu anoparidzwa, uye ndinofara mazviri, hongu ndichazofarazve.
Philippians 1:19 Nokuti ndinoziva kuti izvi zvichashandukira kwandiri kuva ruponeso kubudikidza nemunyengetero wenyu, nerubatsiro rweMweya waJesu Kristu,
Philippians 1:20 zvichienderana nekutarisira kwangu kukuru netariro, kuti handinganyadziswi pachinhu asi neushingi hwese samagariro uye ikozvino Kristu achakudzwa mumuviri wangu, kana neupenyu, kana nerufu.
Philippians 1:21 Nokuti kwandiri kurarama <transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>Kristu, uye kufa mubairo.
Philippians 1:22 Asi kana kurarama panyama chiri chibereko chebasa rangu; zvino zvandichasarudza handizivi.
Philippians 1:23 Nokuti ndiri mukumanikidzwa pakati pezviviri, ndine chishuwo chekubva nekuva naKristu, zvinopfuurisa pakunaka;
Philippians 1:24 asi kugara munyama kunonyanyisa kudiwa nekuda kwenyu.
Philippians 1:25 Zvino ndine chivimbo ichi, ndinoziva kuti ndichagara, ndicharamba ndigere nemwi mese, pakupfuurira kwenyu mberi, uye mufaro werutendo,
Philippians 1:26 kuti kuzvirumbidza kwenyu kuwande muna Kristu Jesu pamusoro pangu kubudikidza nekuvapo kwangu kwamurizve.
Philippians 1:27 Chete fambai zvakafanira evhangeri yaKristu, kuti kunyange ndikauya ndikakuonai, kunyange kusavapo, ndinzwe nyaya dzenyu kuti mumire nesimba mumweya umwe, nemoyo umwe muchirwira pamwe rutendo rweevhangeri;
