Philippians 1:28 uye musingatyityidzirwi nevanopikisa pachinhu chimwe; ndicho chiratidzo chekuparadzwa kwavari, asi kwamuri cheruponeso, uye icho chinobva kuna Mwari.
Philippians 1:29 Nokuti kwamuri kwakapiwa pachena pachinzvimbo chaKristu, kwete kutenda kwaari kwega, asi kumutambudzikirawo;
Philippians 1:30 mune kurwa kumweko sekwamakaona mandiri, nekunzwa ikozvino mandiri.  <chapter eID="Phil.1"/><div eID="gen1484" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1483" type="section"/>
Philippians 2:0 <div sID="gen1485" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="Phil.2" sID="Phil.2"/>  <div sID="gen1486" type="x-p"/>
Philippians 2:1 Naizvozvo kana <transChange type="added">kune</transChange> imwe kurudziro kuna Kristu, kana imwe nyaradzo yerudo, kana kumwe kudyidzana kweMweya, kana mune umwe moyo munyoro nemukunzwira tsitsi,
Philippians 2:2 zadzisai mufaro wangu, kuti muve nefungwa imwe, muve nerudo rumwe, nemweya umwe, nendangariro imwe;
Philippians 2:3 <transChange type="added">mu</transChange>si<transChange type="added">ngaiti </transChange>chinhu nenharo kana nekuzvikudza kusina maturo, asi mukuzvininipisa kwemoyo umwe neumwe achikudza vamwe kukupfuurai pakunaka;
Philippians 2:4 umwe neumwe ngaarege kutarira zvake, asi umwe neumwe zvinhu zvevamwewo.
Philippians 2:5 Nokuti fungwa iyi ngaive mamuri, yakange iri muna Kristu Jesuwo;
Philippians 2:6 iye ari muchimiro chaMwari, haana kurangarira kuti kuenzana naMwari kupamba;
Philippians 2:7 asi wakazviita asina maturo, akatora chimiro chemuranda, akava mumufananidzo wevanhu;
Philippians 2:8 akati awanikwa muchimiro chemunhu, akazvininipisa, akava wakateerera kusvikira parufu, irwo rufu rwemuchinjikwa.
Philippians 2:9 Naizvozvo Mwariwo wakamukudza zvikuru, akamupa zita rinopfuura zita rimwe nerimwe;
Philippians 2:10 kuti muzita raJesu ibvi rese rifugame, revekudenga nevepanyika, nevepasi penyika,
Philippians 2:11 uye rurimi rwega-rwega rwupupure kuti Jesu Kristu <transChange type="added">ndiye</transChange> Ishe, kuve rumbidzo yaMwari Baba.
Philippians 2:12 Naizvozvo, vadikanwi vangu, sezvamakateerera nguva dzese, kwete sepakuvapo kwangu chete, asi ikozvino kunyanyisa pakusavapo kwangu, shandai ruponeso rwenyu pachenyu nekutya nekudedera;
Philippians 2:13 nokuti ndiMwari anoshanda mamuri, zvese kuda nekuita nekuda kwechido <transChange type="added">chake</transChange> chakanaka.
Philippians 2:14 Itai zvinhu zvese musinganyunyuti nekupikisana;
Philippians 2:15 kuti muve vakachena uye vasina chavangapomerwa, vana vaMwari vasina gwapa pakati perudzi rwakakombama nekutsauka, vamunopenya pakati pavo sezviedza munyika,
Philippians 2:16 muchitaridza shoko reupenyu, pakuzvikudza kwangu nezuva raKristu, kuti handina kumhanya pasina, kana kushanda pasina.
Philippians 2:17 Asi kana neni ndikadururwa sechibairo chinodururwa pamusoro pechibairo nebasa rerutendo rwenyu, ndinofara uye ndinofara nemwi mese.
Philippians 2:18 Nekuda kweizvozvi imwiwo mufare uye mufare pamwe neni. <div eID="gen1486" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1485" type="section"/>
Philippians 2:19 Asi ndinovimba muna Ishe Jesu kutumira Timotio kwamuri nekukurumidza, kuti iniwo ndifare pandinoziva zviri maererano nemwi.
Philippians 2:20 Nokuti handina munhu ane fungwa yakadaro, achava nehanya zvirokwazvo nezvenyu.
Philippians 2:21 Nokuti vese vanozvitsvakira zvavo, kwete zvinhu zviri zvaKristu Jesu.
Philippians 2:22 Asi munoziva kutendeka kwake, kuti semwana kuna baba wakashanda pamwe neni paevhangeri.
Philippians 2:23 Zvino ndiye wandinotarisira kutumira kwamuri pakarepo, kana ndaona zvakanangana neni;
Philippians 2:24 asi ndinovimba muna Ishe kuti iniwo ndomene ndichakurumidza kuuya.
Philippians 2:25 Asi ndakaona zvakafanira kutuma kwamuri Epafrodito, hama, nemushandi pamwe neni neuto pamwe neni, asi nhume yenyu nemushumiri wekushaiwa kwangu;
Philippians 2:26 sezvo akange achikushuvai mese, uye akatambudzika, nokuti makange manzwa kuti wakange achirwara.
Philippians 2:27 Nokuti zvirokwazvo wakange achirwara <transChange type="added">ari</transChange> pedo nekufa; asi Mwari wakamunzwira tsitsi; kwete iye ega, asi neni, kuti ndirege kuva neshungu pamusoro peshungu.
Philippians 2:28 Naizvozvo ndakashingaira zvikuru kumutuma, kuti kana momuonazve mufare, neni shungu dzangu dziderere zvikuru.
Philippians 2:29 Naizvozvo mugamuchirei muna Ishe nemufaro wese, uye mubate vakadai neruremekedzo;
Philippians 2:30 nokuti nekuda kwebasa raKristu wakaswedera pakufa, asingarangariri upenyu <transChange type="added">hwake</transChange>, kuti akwanise kushaiwa kundishumira kwenyu.  <chapter eID="Phil.2"/><div eID="gen1488" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1487" type="section"/>
Philippians 3:0 <div sID="gen1489" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="Phil.3" sID="Phil.3"/>  <div sID="gen1490" type="x-p"/>
Philippians 3:1 Pakupedzisira, hama dzangu, farai muna Ishe. Kukunyorerai zvinhu zvimwechetezvo, kwandiri zvirokwazvo hazvinetesi, asi kwamuri zvinokusimbisai.
Philippians 3:2 Chenjererai imbwa, chenjererai vabati vakaipa, chenjererai vekucheka;
Philippians 3:3 nokuti isu tiri kudzingiswa, vanonamata Mwari muMweya, tichizvirumbidza muna Kristu Jesu, uye tisingavimbi nenyama;
Philippians 3:4 kunyange ini ndingavawo nechivimbo munyama; kana umwewo achifunga kuvimba nenyama, zvikuru ini;
Philippians 3:5 ndakadzingiswa nezuva rerusere, <transChange type="added">ndiri</transChange> werudzi rwaIsraeri, <transChange type="added">we</transChange>dzinza raBhenjamini, muHebheru weVaHebheru; zviri zvemurairo <transChange type="added">ndiri</transChange> muFarisi;
Philippians 3:6 maererano nekushingaira ndichishusha kereke; maererano nekururama kuri mumurairo ndisina chandingapomerwa.
Philippians 3:7 Asi zvinhu zvaiva mubairo kwandiri, ndizvo zvandakaverenga kuva kurasikirwa nekuda kwaKristu.
Philippians 3:8 Hongu zvirokwazvo, uye ndinoverenga zvinhu zvese kuva kurasikirwa nekuda kwekunakisisa kweruzivo rwaKristu Jesu Ishe wangu, wandakarasikirwa nezvinhu zvese nekuda kwake, ndikazviidza kuva marara, kuti ndiwane Kristu;
Philippians 3:9 uye ndiwanikwe maari, ndisina kururama kwangu kunobva kumurairo, asi kunobudikidzwa nerutendo rwaKristu, kururama kunobva kuna Mwari nerutendo;
Philippians 3:10 kuti ndimuzive iye, nesimba rekumuka kwake, nekudyidzana kwematambudziko ake, nditodze kufa kwake,
Philippians 3:11 kana zvingagoneka ndisvike pakumuka kwevakafa.
Philippians 3:12 Handi<transChange type="added">revi</transChange> kuti ndakato<transChange type="added">chi</transChange>wana, kana ndakatokwaniswa, asi ndinoteverera, kuti ndichibatewo, chandakabatirwawo naKristu Jesu.
Philippians 3:13 Hama, ini handizviverengi kuti ndachibata, asi <transChange type="added">ndinoita</transChange> chinhu chimwe, ndichikanganwa zvinhu zviri shure, ndichinanavira zvinhu zviri mberi,
Philippians 3:14 ndinoteverera kuchinangwa, kumubairo wekudana kwekumusoro kwaMwari muna Kristu Jesu.
Philippians 3:15 Naizvozvo isu tese takakwana, ngative nemufungo uyu; uye kana zvimwe mune umwe mufungo, Mwari achakuratidzai kunyange izvi.
Philippians 3:16 Asi pane patasvika, ngatifambe nemurairo iwoyu tifunge chinhu ichochi.
Philippians 3:17 Hama, ivai vatevedzeri vangu pamwe, natsai kutarira avo vanofamba saizvozvo sezvamakava nesu semuenzaniso.
Philippians 3:18 Nokuti vazhinji vanofamba, vandakakuudzai nezvavo kazhinji, nazvino ndinokuudzai kunyange nekuchema, vavengi vemuchinjikwa waKristu;
Philippians 3:19 kuguma kwavo kuparadzwa, mwari wavo <transChange type="added">i</transChange>dumbu <transChange type="added">ravo</transChange>, uye kurumbidzwa <transChange type="added">kuri</transChange> mukunyadzwa kwavo, vanofunga zvenyika.
Philippians 3:20 Nokuti ubwo hwedu huri kumatenga, uko kwatakataririrawo kuti Muponesi achabva, Ishe Jesu Kristu;
Philippians 3:21 uyo achavandudza muviri wekuninipiswa kwedu, kuti ufananidzwe nemuviri wekubwinya kwake, nesimba iro raanogonawo naro kuisa zvinhu zvese pasi pake.  <chapter eID="Phil.3"/><div eID="gen1490" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1489" type="section"/>
Philippians 4:0 <div sID="gen1491" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="Phil.4" sID="Phil.4"/>  <div sID="gen1492" type="x-p"/>
Philippians 4:1 Naizvozvo, hama dzangu vadikanwi vanoshuviwa, mufaro wangu nekorona, saizvozvo mirai nesimba muna Ishe, vadikanwi.
Philippians 4:2 Ndinokumbirisa Yuodhia, uye ndinokumbirisa Sindike, kuti vave nemurangariro umwe muna Ishe.
Philippians 4:3 Uye ndinonyengerera iwewo, umwe wangu wechokwadi pabasa, batsira vanhukadzi vaya, vakabatirana neni paevhangeri, pamwe naKiremendi, nevamwe vakabata neni, mazita avo ari mubhuku reupenyu. <div eID="gen1492" type="x-p"/>
Philippians 4:4 Farai muna Ishe nguva dzese; ndinotizve: Farai.
Philippians 4:5 Unyoro hwenyu ngahuzikanwe kuvanhu vese. Ishe ari pedo.
Philippians 4:6 Musafunganya pamusoro pechinhu, asi pazvinhu zvese, nemunyengetero nemukumbiro nekuvonga, zvichemo zvenyu ngazvizikanwe kuna Mwari,
Philippians 4:7 zvino rugare rwaMwari rwunopfuura kunzwisisa kwese, rwuchachengeta moyo yenyu nemifungo yenyu muna Kristu Jesu. <div eID="gen1493" type="x-p"/>
Philippians 4:8 Pakupedzisira, hama, chese chechokwadi, chese chinokudzwa, chese chakarurama, chese chakachena, chese chinodikanwa, chese chinorumbidzwa, kana kunaka kupi nekupi, uye kana chingarumbidzwa chipi nechipi, fungai zvinhu izvi;
Philippians 4:9 nezvamakadzidza nekugamuchira nekunzwa nekuona mandiri, itai izvozvo; naMwari werugare achava nemwi. <div eID="gen1494" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1491" type="section"/>
Philippians 4:10 Asi ndakafara zvikuru muna Ishe, kuti ikozvino makatomutsiridzazve kundirangarira; kwamaindirangarirawo nako, asi makashaiwa mukana.
Philippians 4:11 Kwete kuti ndinotaura <transChange type="added">izvi</transChange> nekuda kwekushaiwa, nokuti ini ndadzidza kugutsikana nezvinhu zvandiri.
Philippians 4:12 Ndinoziva zvese kuzvidzwa, uye ndinoziva kuva nezvakawandisa; papi nepapi nepazvinhu zvese ndakadzidziswa zvese kuguta nekunzwa nzara, zvese kuva nezvizhinjisa nekushaiwa.
Philippians 4:13 Ndinogona kuita zvinhu zvese kubudikidza naKristu anondisimbisa.
Philippians 4:14 Kunyange zvakadaro makaita zvakanaka zvamakabatana <transChange type="added">neni</transChange> pakutambudzika kwangu.
Philippians 4:15 Zvino munozivawo imwi VaFiripi, kuti pakutanga kweevhangeri, pandakabva kuMakedhonia, hapana kereke yakadyidzana neni pashoko rekupa nekugamuchira, asi imwi mega;
Philippians 4:16 nokuti kunyange paTesaronika makatumira kamwe nekupamha pakushaiwa kwangu.
Philippians 4:17 Kwete kuti ndinotsvaka chipo, asi ndinotsvaka chibereko chinowedzera kuchikwama chenyu.
Philippians 4:18 Zvino ndagamuchira zvese uye ndawanzirwa; ndaguta, ndagamuchira kuna Epafrodito zvinhu zvinobva kwamuri, hwema hwezvinonhuhwira, chibairo chinogamuchirwa, chinofadza Mwari.
Philippians 4:19 Asi Mwari wangu achazadzisa kushaiwa kwenyu kwese zvichienderana nefuma yake mukubwinya, muna Kristu Jesu.
Philippians 4:20 Zvino kuna Mwari naBaba vedu, <transChange type="added">ngakuve</transChange> <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>kubwinya kusvikira rinhi narinhi. Ameni. <div eID="gen1496" type="x-p"/>
Philippians 4:21 Kwazisai mutsvene umwe neumwe muna Kristu Jesu. Hama dzineni dzinokukwazisai.
Philippians 4:22 Vatsvene vese vanokukwazisai, zvikuruwo avo veimba yaKesari. <div eID="gen1497" type="x-p"/>
Philippians 4:23 Nyasha dzaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> nemwi mese. Amen. <div eID="gen1498" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1495" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Phil.4"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1480" osisID="Phil" type="book"/>
Colossians 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Col" sID="gen1499" type="book"/>   <milestone n="VAKOROSE" type="x-usfm-h"/>
Colossians 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Col.1" sID="Col.1"/>
Colossians 1:1 Pauro muapositori waJesu Kristu nechido chaMwari, naTimotio hama,
Colossians 1:2 kuvatsvene nehama dzakatendeka muna Kristu dziri paKorose: Nyasha kwamuri nerugare rwunobva kuna Mwari Baba vedu naIshe Jesu Kristu. <div eID="gen1501" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1500" type="section"/>
Colossians 1:3 Tinovonga Mwari naBaba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, tichikunyengetererai nguva dzese,
Colossians 1:4 sezvo takanzwa zverutendo rwenyu muna Kristu Jesu, uye zverudo kuvatsvene vese,
Colossians 1:5 nekuda kwetariro yakaisirwa imwi kumatenga, yamakagara manzwa pashoko rechokwadi cheevhangeri,
Colossians 1:6 yasvika kwamuri sepanyika yesewo; ichibereka chibereko, sezva<transChange type="added">inoita</transChange>wo kwamuri, kubvira pazuva ramakanzwa nekuziva nyasha dzaMwari muchokwadi;
Colossians 1:7 sezvamakadzidzawo kuna Epafrasi, muranda anodikanwa pamwe nesu, anova mushumiri wakatendeka waKristu nekuda kwenyu,
Colossians 1:8 wakatiudzawo <transChange type="added">zve</transChange>rudo rwenyu muMweya. <div eID="gen1503" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1502" type="section"/>
Colossians 1:9 Nekuda kweizvi isuwo, kubvira pazuva ratakanzwa, hatimiri kukunyengetererai, nekukumbira kuti muzadzwe neruzivo rwechido chake pauchenjeri hwese nekunzwisisa kwemweya,
Colossians 1:10 kuti mufambe zvinofanira Ishe pane zvese zvinofadza, muchibereka zvibereko pabasa rese rakanaka, muchikura paruzivo rwaMwari;
Colossians 1:11 muchisimbiswa nesimba rese, zvichienderana nesimba rekubwinya kwake, pamoyo murefu wese nekutsungirira pamwe nemufaro;
Colossians 1:12 muchivonga kuna Baba, vakatiita kuti tifanire kugoverana kwenhaka yevatsvene muchiedza,
Colossians 1:13 vakatinunura pasimba rerima, vakatishandurira muushe hweMwanakomana werudo rwavo,
Colossians 1:14 watine dzikunuro maari neropa rake, <transChange type="added">ndiko</transChange> kukanganwirwa kwezvivi.
Colossians 1:15 Anova mufananidzo waMwari asingaonekwi, dangwe rechisikwa chega-chega.
Colossians 1:16 Nokuti maari zvinhu zvese zvakasikwa, zviri kumatenga nezviri panyika, zvinoonekwa nezvisingaonekwi, kana zviri zvigaro zveushe, kana umambo, kana ukuru, kana masimba; zvinhu zvese zvakasikwa naye, <transChange type="added">zvikasiki</transChange>rwa iye.
Colossians 1:17 Ndiyewo anotangira zvinhu zvese, uye zvinhu zvese zvakabatanidzwa maari.
Colossians 1:18 Uye iye musoro wemuviri, wekereke; anova kutanga, dangwe kubva kune vakafa; kuti pazvese iye ave wekutanga;
Colossians 1:19 nokuti zvakafadza <transChange type="added">Baba</transChange>, kuti kuzara kwese kugare maari,
Colossians 1:20 uye ayananisa naye zvinhu zvese kwaari, aita rugare neropa remuchinjikwa wake kubudikidza naiye, kunyange zviri panyika kunyange zviri kumatenga. <div eID="gen1505" type="x-p"/>
Colossians 1:21 Nemwi maimbova vaeni nevavengi mufungwa nemabasa akaipa, asi ikozvinowo wayanana <transChange type="added">nemwi</transChange>
Colossians 1:22 mumuviri wenyama yake kubudikidza nerufu, akukumikidzei muri vatsvene uye musina mhosva uye musingamhuriki pamberi pake;
Colossians 1:23 zvino kana muchirambira parutendo makateyiwa uye makasimbiswa, uye hamubviswi patariro yeevhangeri yamakanzwa, yakaparidzirwa chisikwa chega-chega chiri pasi pedenga; iyo yandakaitwa mushumiri wayo ini Pauro. <div eID="gen1506" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1504" type="section"/>
Colossians 1:24 Zvino ikozvino ndinofara pamatambudziko angu nekuda kwenyu, nekuzadzisa zvakasara pamatambudziko aKristu munyama yangu nekuda kwemuviri wake, unova kereke;
Colossians 1:25 ini yandakaitwa mushumiri wayo zvichienderana nekubatiswa kwaMwari chandakapiwa pamusoro penyu, kuzadzisa shoko raMwari,
Colossians 1:26 chakavanzika chakange chakavanzwa kubvira kare uye kubva kumazera, asi ikozvino chinoratidzwa kuvatsvene vake,
Colossians 1:27 kune ivo Mwari vaakada kuzivisa kuti fuma yekubwinya kwechakavanzika ichi pakati pevahedheni chii, chinova Kristu mamuri, tariro yekubwinya;
Colossians 1:28 watinoparidza isu, tichiyambira munhu umwe neumwe, nekudzidzisa munhu umwe neumwe munjere dzese, kuti tikumikidze munhu umwe neumwe akakwana muna Kristu Jesu;
Colossians 1:29 ndizvo zvandinoshingairirawo, ndichirwa zvinoenderana nekubata kwake kunobata mandiri nesimba. <chapter eID="Col.1"/><div eID="gen1508" type="x-p"/>
Colossians 2:0 <div sID="gen1509" type="x-p"/><chapter n="2" osisID="Col.2" sID="Col.2"/>
Colossians 2:1 Nokuti ndinoda kuti muzive <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> kurwa kukuru zvakadini kwandinako pamusoro penyu, nevari paRaodhikia, nevese vasina kuona chiso changu panyama,
Colossians 2:2 kuti moyo yavo inyaradzwe, vasonanidzwe murudo, nemufuma yese yekuvimbiswa kwakakwana kwekunzwisisa, paruzivo rwechakavanzika chaMwari naBaba, nechaKristu,
Colossians 2:3 maari fuma yese yeuchenjeri neyeruzivo yakavigwa.
Colossians 2:4 Ndinoreva izvi, kuti kusava nemunhu anokunyengerai nemashoko anonyengera.
Colossians 2:5 Nokuti kunyange ndisipo panyama, zvakadaro ndinemwi pamweya, ndichifara nekuvona kurongeka kwenyu, nekusimba kwerutendo rwenyu muna Kristu. <div eID="gen1509" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1507" type="section"/>
Colossians 2:6 Naizvozvo sezvamakagamuchira Kristu Jesu Ishe, fambai maari,
Colossians 2:7 makadzika midzi nekuvakwa maari, nekusimbiswa murutendo, sezvamakadzidziswa, muchiwedzera makuri nekuvonga.
Colossians 2:8 Chenjerai, zvimwe umwe munhu angakupambai neuchenjeri, nekunyengera kusina maturo, setsika dzevanhu, sedzidziso dzekuvamba dzenyika, uye kwete sekuna Kristu.
Colossians 2:9 Nokuti kuzara kwese kweuMwari kunogara maari pamuviri.
Colossians 2:10 Uye makazadziswa maari, iye musoro weutungamiriri hwese nesimba;
Colossians 2:11 wamakadzingiswawo maari nedzingiso isina kuitwa nemaoko, pakubvisa muviri wezvivi zvenyama, pakudzingisa kwaKristu;
Colossians 2:12 makavigwa pamwe naye pabhabhatidzo, pamakamutswawo pamwe <transChange type="added">naye</transChange> nerutendo rwekuita kwaMwari, wakamumutsa kubva kuvakafa.
Colossians 2:13 Nemwi makafa mukudarika nekusadzingiswa kwenyama yenyu, wakakuitai vapenyu pamwe naye, akukanganwirai kudarika kwese,
Colossians 2:14 akadzima rugwaro rwezviga rwaipikisana nesu, rwaipesana nesu, akarubvisa pakati, aruroverera pamuchinjikwa;
Colossians 2:15 akurura vatungamiriri nemasimba, akavabudisa pachena, akatungamira kuvakunda mauri.
Colossians 2:16 Naizvozvo kusava nemunhu anokutongai pakudya kana pachinwiwa, kana panhau yemutambo kana yekugara kwemwedzi kana yemasabata;
Colossians 2:17 zvinova mumvuri wezvinhu zvichauya, asi muviri <transChange type="added">nde</transChange>wa Kristu.
Colossians 2:18 Kusava nemunhu anokutorerai mubairo wenyu nemano, achifarira kuzvininipisa nekunamata vatumwa, achipindira pazvinhu zvaasina kuona, achizvikudza pasina nefungwa dzake dzenyama,
Colossians 2:19 uye asingabatisisi Musoro, uyo maari muviri wese nezvisungo nemarunda unoriritirwa, nekurukirwa pamwe, uchikura nekukura kwaMwari.
Colossians 2:20 Naizvozvo kana makafa pamwe naKristu kune dzidziso dzekuvamba dzenyika, munosungikanirei nemirairo semugere munyika,
Colossians 2:21 (usabata, usaravira, usagunzva,
Colossians 2:22 izvo zvese zvichaparara nekushandiswa) semirairo nedzidziso dzevanhu?
Colossians 2:23 Zvine chimiro cheuchenjeri pakuzvidira kunamata, nekuzvininipisa, nekutambudza muviri; hazvitongobatsiri kukunda kugutsa nyama.  <chapter eID="Col.2"/><div eID="gen1511" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1510" type="section"/>
Colossians 3:0 <div sID="gen1512" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="Col.3" sID="Col.3"/>  <div sID="gen1513" type="x-p"/>
Colossians 3:1 Naizvozvo kana makamutswa pamwe naKristu, tsvakai zvekumusoro, uko kuna Kristu agere kuruoko rwerudyi rwaMwari.
Colossians 3:2 Rangarirai zviri kumusoro, kwete zviri panyika.
Colossians 3:3 Nokuti makafa, uye upenyu hwenyu hwakavigwa pamwe naKristu muna Mwari.
Colossians 3:4 Kana Kristu upenyu hwedu achionekwa, ipapo imwiwo muchaonekwa pamwe naye mukubwinya.
Colossians 3:5 Naizvozvo urayai mitezo yenyu iri panyika, upombwe, tsvina, kushumba kwakaipa, kuda zvakaipa, uye kuchiva, kunova kunamata zvifananidzo.
Colossians 3:6 Nekuda kwezvinhu izvi, hasha dzaMwari dzinouya pavana vekusateerera;
Colossians 3:7 imwiwo maimbofamba mazviri, pamairarama mazviri.
Colossians 3:8 Asi ikozvino imwiwo bvisai zvese izvi, kutsamwa, hasha, uipi, kunyomba, nekutaura zvinonyadzisa kubva mumuromo wenyu;
Colossians 3:9 regai kureverana nhema, zvamakabvisa munhu wekare nemabasa ake,
Colossians 3:10 mukapfeka mutsva, anovandudzwa paruzivo semufananidzo wewakamusika;
Colossians 3:11 apo pasina muGiriki uye muJudha, kudzingiswa uye kusadzingiswa, mutorwa, muSikitia, musungwa, wakasununguka; asi Kristu <transChange type="added">ndiye</transChange> zvese, uye <transChange type="added">ari</transChange> mune zvese.
Colossians 3:12 Naizvozvo pfekai sevasanangurwa vaMwari, vatsvene nevanodikanwa, moyo yetsitsi, moyo munyoro, kuzvininipisa, unyoro, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>moyo murefu;
Colossians 3:13 muchiitirana moyo murefu, nekukanganwirana kana umwe ane mhosva neumwe; Kristu sezvaakakukanganwiraiwo, saizvozvowo imwi;
Colossians 3:14 zvino pamusoro pezvinhu zvese izvi <transChange type="added">pfekai</transChange> rudo, ndicho chisungo chekupedzeredza.
Colossians 3:15 Nerugare rwaMwari ngarwutonge mumoyo yenyu, ndirwo rwamakadanirwawo mumuviri mumwe; uye ivai vanovonga.
Colossians 3:16 Shoko raKristu ngarigare mamuri neufumi muuchenjeri hwese; muchidzidzisana nekurairana mumapisarema, nenziyo, nenziyo dzemweya, muimbire Ishe nenyasha mumoyo wenyu;
Colossians 3:17 uye zvese chero chipi chamunoita pashoko kana pachiito, <transChange type="added">itai</transChange> zvese muzita raIshe Jesu, muchivonga Mwari naBaba kubudikidza naye. <div eID="gen1513" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1512" type="section"/>
Colossians 3:18 Vakadzi zviisei pasi pevarume venyu pachenyu, sezvo zvakafanira muna Ishe.
Colossians 3:19 Varume, idai vakadzi <transChange type="added">venyu</transChange>, uye regai kuvavavira.
Colossians 3:20 Vana, teererai vabereki pazvinhu zvese, nokuti izvi zvinofadza Ishe.
Colossians 3:21 Madzibaba, musatsamwisa vana venyu, kuti varege kuora moyo.
Colossians 3:22 Varanda, teererai pazvinhu zvese vari vatenzi <transChange type="added">venyu</transChange> panyama; kwete nekushandira maziso sevafadzi vevanhu, asi nemoyo wakarurama, muchitya Mwari;
Colossians 3:23 uye zvese kunyange chipi chamunoita, itai nemoyo, sekuna Ishe, uye kwete kuvanhu;
Colossians 3:24 muchiziva kuti kuna Ishe muchagamuchira mubairo wenhaka; nokuti munoshandira Ishe Kristu.
Colossians 3:25 Asi anoita zvisakarurama achagamuchira zvisakarurama zvaakaita; uye hakuna kusarurwa kwavanhu.  <chapter eID="Col.3"/><div eID="gen1515" type="x-p"/>
Colossians 4:0 <div sID="gen1516" type="x-p"/><chapter n="4" osisID="Col.4" sID="Col.4"/>
Colossians 4:1 Madzishe, ipai varanda zvakarurama nezvakaringana, muchiziva kuti imwiwo muna Ishe kumatenga. <div eID="gen1516" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1514" type="section"/>
Colossians 4:2 Tsungirirai pamunyengetero, murinde pakuri nekuvonga;
Colossians 4:3 mutinyengetererewo panguva imweyo, kuti Mwari atizarurire mukova weshoko, kutaura chakavanzika chaKristu, chandakasungirwawo;
Colossians 4:4 kuti ndichiratidze, sezvandinofanira kutaura.
Colossians 4:5 Fambai muuchenjeri kune vari kunze, muchidzikunura nguva.
Colossians 4:6 Shoko renyu ngarigare munyasha, rakarungwa nemunyu, kuti muzive kuti munofanira kupindura sei umwe neumwe. <div eID="gen1518" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1517" type="section"/>
Colossians 4:7 Zvese zvakanangana neni Tikiko achakuzivisai, hama inodikanwa nemushumiri wakatendeka, nemushandi pamwe <transChange type="added">neni</transChange> muna Ishe;
Colossians 4:8 wandatumira kwamuri ichochi, kuti azive zviri maererano nemwi, nekunyaradza moyo yenyu;
Colossians 4:9 pamwe naOnesimo, hama yakatendeka inodikanwa, anova wekwenyu. Vachakuzivisai zvese zviri pano. <div eID="gen1520" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1519" type="section"/>
Colossians 4:10 Arisitako musungwa pamwe neni anokukwazisai, naMariko muzukuru waBhanabhasi, wamakagamuchira mirairo maererano naye; kana achisvika kwamuri, mumugamuchire,
Colossians 4:11 naJesu anonzi Justo, ve<transChange type="added">ve</transChange>kudzingiswa; ivava chete vabati pamwe <transChange type="added">neni</transChange> paushe hwaMwari, vaiva nyaradzo kwandiri.
Colossians 4:12 Epafrasi wekwenyu, muranda waKristu, anokukwazisai, achirwa nguva dzese muminyengetero nekuda kwenyu, kuti mumire makazara uye makakwana muchido chese chaMwari.
Colossians 4:13 Nokuti ndinomupupurira kuti ane shungu kwazvo nemwi, neveRaodhikia, neveHierapori.
Colossians 4:14 Anokukwazisai Ruka chiremba anodikanwa, naDhemasi.
Colossians 4:15 Kwazisai hama dziri Raodhikia, naNimifa, nekereke iri mumba make.
Colossians 4:16 Zvino kana tsamba iyi yaverengwa pakati penyu, itai kuti nemukereke yeVaRaodhikia iverengwe; kuti nemwi muverengewo inobva Raodhikia.
Colossians 4:17 Vudzai Akipo, <transChange type="added">muti</transChange>: Chenjerera ushumiri hwawakagamuchira muna Ishe, kuti uhupedzise.
Colossians 4:18 Kwaziso neruoko rwangu rwaPauro. Rangarirai zvisungo zvangu. Nyasha <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> nemwi. Ameni. <div eID="gen1522" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1521" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Col.4"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1499" osisID="Col" type="book"/>
I Thessalonians 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="1Thess" sID="gen1523" type="book"/>   <milestone n="1 VATESARONIKA" type="x-usfm-h"/>
I Thessalonians 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="1Thess.1" sID="1Thess.1"/>
I Thessalonians 1:1 Pauro naSivhano naTimotio, kukereke yeVaTesaronika muna Mwari Baba, naIshe Jesu Kristu: Nyasha kwamuri nerugare zvinobva kuna Mwari Baba vedu, naIshe Jesu Kristu.
I Thessalonians 1:2 Tinovonga Mwari nguva dzese pamusoro penyu mese, tichikutaurai muminyengetero yedu,
I Thessalonians 1:3 tichiramba tichirangarira basa renyu rerutendo nebasa rinorema rerudo nekutsungirira kwetariro muna Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu pamberi paMwari naBaba vedu;
I Thessalonians 1:4 tichiziva hama dzinodikanwa, kusanangurwa kwenyu naMwari;
I Thessalonians 1:5 nokuti evhangeri yedu haina kuuya kwamuri mushoko chete, asiwo musimba, nemuMweya Mutsvene, nemukuvimbisa kukuru, sezvamunoziva kuti takange tiri vanhu vakadini pakati penyu nekuda kwenyu.
I Thessalonians 1:6 Nemwi makava vateveri vedu nevaIshe, magamuchira shoko mukutambudzika kukuru, nemufaro weMweya Mutsvene,
I Thessalonians 1:7 zvekuti makava mienzaniso kune vese vanotenda muMakedhonia neAkaya.
I Thessalonians 1:8 Nokuti kwamuri kwakanzwikwa shoko raIshe, kwete muMakedhonia neAkaya chete, asiwo kunzvimbo imwe neimwe rutendo rwenyu kuna Mwari rwakabudira kunze, zvekuti hatifaniri kutaura chinhu.
I Thessalonians 1:9 Nokuti ivo vamene vanoparidza pamusoro pedu kuti takapinda nemutoo upi kwamuri; uye kuti makatendeukira sei kuna Mwari muchibva pazvifananidzo, kuti mushumire Mwari mupenyu uye wechokwadi,
I Thessalonians 1:10 uye makamirira Mwanakomana wake achibva kumatenga, waakamutsa kuvakafa, <transChange type="added">ndiye</transChange> Jesu anotinunura pahasha dzinouya.  <chapter eID="1Thess.1"/><div eID="gen1525" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1524" type="section"/>
I Thessalonians 2:0 <div sID="gen1526" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="1Thess.2" sID="1Thess.2"/>  <div sID="gen1527" type="x-p"/>
I Thessalonians 2:1 Nokuti munoziva imwi, hama, kupinda kwedu kwamuri, kuti hakuna kuva pasina;
I Thessalonians 2:2 asi kunyange takambotambudzika nekuitirwa zvakaipa, sezvamunoziva, paFiripi, takatsunga muna Mwari wedu kutaura kwamuri evhangeri yaMwari pakati pekupikiswa kukuru.
I Thessalonians 2:3 Nokuti kurudziro yedu haina kubva pakunyengera, uye haina kubva patsvina, hainawo kubva pamano-mano;
I Thessalonians 2:4 asi sezvatakatendiwa naMwari, kuti tibatiswe evhangeri, saizvozvo tinotaura; kwete sekufadza vanhu, asi Mwari anoidza moyo yedu.
I Thessalonians 2:5 Nokuti hatina kutongouya nemashoko ekubata kumeso, sezvamunoziva, kana nemano-mano eruchiva; Mwari chapupu;
I Thessalonians 2:6 tisingatsvaki rukudzo kuvanhu, kana rwunobva kwamuri kana kuvamwe, kunyange taigona ku<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>remedza<transChange type="added">i</transChange> sevaapositori vaKristu.
I Thessalonians 2:7 Asi takange tiri vanyoro pakati penyu, semureri achivaraidza vana vake;
I Thessalonians 2:8 sezvatinokushuvai kwazvo, takada zvikuru kukupai kwete evhangeri yaMwari chete, asi mweya yedu pacheduwo, nokuti makange muri vadikanwi kwatiri.
I Thessalonians 2:9 Nokuti munorangarira, hama, kushingaira nekurwisa kwedu; nokuti taibata siku nesikati, kuti tisava mutoro kune umwe wenyu, takakuparidzirai evhangeri yaMwari.
I Thessalonians 2:10 Imwi <transChange type="added">muri</transChange> zvapupu, naMwari, kuti taiva vatsvene sei uye takarurama tisina chatingapomerwa kwamuri vanotenda.
I Thessalonians 2:11 Sezvamunoziva kuti umwe neumwe wenyu, sababa kuvana vavo takakukurudzirai sei nekunyaradza nekupupura,
I Thessalonians 2:12 kuti mufambe zvakafanira Mwari, anokudanirai kuushe hwake nekubwinya.
I Thessalonians 2:13 Nekuda kwaizvozvi nesu hatimiri kuvonga Mwari, kuti pamakagamuchira shoko raMwari ramakanzwa kwatiri, maka<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>gamuchira kwete <transChange type="added">se</transChange>shoko revanhu, asi seriri chokwadi, shoko raMwari rinoshandawo mamuri imwi munotenda.
I Thessalonians 2:14 Nokuti imwi, hama, makava vateveri vemakereke aMwari ari muJudhiya muna Kristu Jesu; nokuti imwiwo makatambudzika zvakadaro kune vekwenyu momene, se<transChange type="added">zvavakatambudzwa</transChange> ivowo neVaJudha,
I Thessalonians 2:15 ndivowo vakauraya Ishe Jesu nevaporofita vavo vomene, vakatishushawo isu, vasingafadziwo Mwari, uye vachipesana nevanhu vese,
I Thessalonians 2:16 vachitidzivisa kutaurira vahedheni kuti vaponeswe, kuti vagare vachizadzisa zvivi zvavo; asi hasha dzakasvika pamusoro pavo kusvikira pakuguma. <div eID="gen1527" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1526" type="section"/>
I Thessalonians 2:17 Zvino isu, hama, sezvo takaparadzaniswa nemwi kwechinguvana pazviso, kwete pamoyo, takashingairira zvikuru nechishuwo chikuru kuti tione chiso chenyu.
I Thessalonians 2:18 Naizvozvo taida kuuya kwamuri, zvikuru ini Pauro, kamwe nekudzokorora, asi Satani wakatidzivisa.
I Thessalonians 2:19 Nokuti tariro yedu chii, kana mufaro, kana korona yekuzvirumbidza? Hamusi imwizve here pamberi paIshe wedu Jesu Kristu pakuuya kwake?
I Thessalonians 2:20 Nokuti imwi muri kubwinya nemufaro wedu. <chapter eID="1Thess.2"/><div eID="gen1529" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1528" type="section"/>
I Thessalonians 3:0 <div sID="gen1530" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="1Thess.3" sID="1Thess.3"/>  <div sID="gen1531" type="x-p"/>
I Thessalonians 3:1 Saka zvatakange tisisagoni kutsunga, takati zvakanaka kuti tisiiwe tiri tega paAtene,
I Thessalonians 3:2 ndokutuma Timotio hama yedu nemushumiri waMwari nemushandi pamwe nesu muevhangeri yaKristu, kuti akusimbisei, nekukunyaradzai maererano nerutendo rwenyu,
I Thessalonians 3:3 kuti kurege kuva neumwe anozununguswa nematambudziko awa, nokuti munoziva momene kuti takamisirwa izvozvi.
I Thessalonians 3:4 Nokuti kunyange tichinemwi, takagara takuudzai kuti tava kuzotambudzwa, kunyange sezvazvakaitika, nemwi munoziva.
I Thessalonians 3:5 Nekuda kweizvozviwo zvandakange ndisisagoni kutsunga, ndaka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>tuma kuti ndizive rutendo rwenyu, zvimwe pamwe muidzi wakakuidzai, basa redu rikava pasina.
I Thessalonians 3:6 Asi zvino Timotio wakati asvika kwatiri achibva kwamuri, wakatipira mashoko akanaka erutendo rwenyu nerudo, uye kuti mune murangariro wakanaka pamusoro pedu nguva dzese, muchishuva zvikuru kutiona, sesuwo imwi;
I Thessalonians 3:7 nekuda kwezvizvi takanyaradzwa, hama, pamusoro penyu padambudziko redu rese nenhamo nerutendo rwenyu;
I Thessalonians 3:8 nokuti ikozvino tinorarama, kana imwi mumire makasimba muna Ishe.
I Thessalonians 3:9 Nokuti kuvonga kwakadini kwatingagona kuripira kuna Mwari pamusoro penyu, nemufaro wese watinofara nawo nekuda kwenyu pamberi paMwari wedu?
I Thessalonians 3:10 Siku nesikati tichinyengetera zvikurusa kuti tione chiso chenyu, tizadzise zvakataira parutendo rwenyu.
I Thessalonians 3:11 Zvino dai Mwari pachake naBaba vedu, naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu aruramisira nzira yedu kwamuri;
I Thessalonians 3:12 uye dai Ishe akukurisai neku<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>wanzira<transChange type="added">i</transChange> rudo umwe kune umwe nekune vese, sesuwo kwamuri,
I Thessalonians 3:13 kuti asimbise moyo yenyu isingamhuriki pautsvene pamberi paMwari, uye Baba vedu, pakuuya kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu pamwe nevatsvene vake vese.  <chapter eID="1Thess.3"/><div eID="gen1531" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1530" type="section"/>
I Thessalonians 4:0 <div sID="gen1532" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="1Thess.4" sID="1Thess.4"/>  <div sID="gen1533" type="x-p"/>
I Thessalonians 4:1 Zvino zvimwe, hama, tinokukumbirisai, nekukurudzira naIshe Jesu, sezvamakagamuchira kwatiri kuti munofanira kufamba nekufadza Mwari sei, kuti muwanze nekuwanzisisa <transChange type="added">pazviri</transChange>.
I Thessalonians 4:2 Nokuti munoziva mirairo yakadini yatakakupai kubudikidza naIshe Jesu. <div eID="gen1533" type="x-p"/>
I Thessalonians 4:3 Nokuti ichi ndicho chido chaMwari, kuitwa vatsvene kwenyu, kuti murege upombwe;
I Thessalonians 4:4 kuti umwe neumwe wenyu azive kuzviwanira mudziyo wake mukuitwa mutsvene nemurukudzo,
I Thessalonians 4:5 kwete pakuchiva kwechishuwo, kunyange sevahedheni vasingazivi Mwari;
I Thessalonians 4:6 kusava neanopfuurikidza akanyengera hama yake pachiitiko; nokuti Ishe <transChange type="added">ndiye</transChange> mutsivi wezvese izvi, sezvatakagara takuudzaiwo nekupupura.
I Thessalonians 4:7 Nokuti Mwari haana kutidanira kutsvina, asi kuutsvene.
I Thessalonians 4:8 Naizvozvo anozvidza, haazvidzi munhu, asi Mwari wakatipawo Mweya wake Mutsvene.
I Thessalonians 4:9 Zvino maererano nerudo rweukama hamutsvaki kuti <transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>kunyorerei, nokuti imwi mumene makadzidziswa naMwari kuti mudanane;
I Thessalonians 4:10 nokuti nemwi munozviita kuhama dzese dziri paMakedhonia yese; asi tinokukurudzirai, hama, kuti muwanzise zvikuru,
I Thessalonians 4:11 uye mushingairire kuva nerunyararo, nekuita basa renyu pachenyu, nekushanda nemaoko enyu pachenyu, sezvatakakurairai;
I Thessalonians 4:12 kuti mufambe zvinoremekedzwa kune vari kunze, uye musashaya chinhu. <div eID="gen1534" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1532" type="section"/>
I Thessalonians 4:13 Asi handidi kuti mushaiwe ruzivo, hama, maererano nevarere, kuti murege kushungurudzika sevamwewo vasina tariro.
I Thessalonians 4:14 Nokuti kana tichitenda kuti Jesu wakafa uye wakamuka, saizvozvowo vakarara kubudikidza naJesu, Mwari achavauisa pamwe naye.
I Thessalonians 4:15 Nokuti izvi tinokuudzai neshoko raIshe, kuti isu vapenyu, tinosiiwa kusvikira pakuuya kwaIshe, hatingatongotangiri vakarara.
I Thessalonians 4:16 Nokuti Ishe amene achaburuka kubva kudenga nekudana kune simba, nenzwi remutumwa mukuru, nehwamanda yaMwari; zvino vakafa muna Kristu vachatanga kumuka;
I Thessalonians 4:17 kozouya isu vanorarama vanosiiwa, tichabvutwa pamwe navo mumakore, kuti tichingamidze Ishe mumhepo; saizvozvowo tichava naIshe nekusingaperi.
I Thessalonians 4:18 Naizvozvo nyaradzanai nemashoko awa. <chapter eID="1Thess.4"/><div eID="gen1536" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1535" type="section"/>
I Thessalonians 5:0 <div sID="gen1537" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="1Thess.5" sID="1Thess.5"/>  <div sID="gen1538" type="x-p"/>
I Thessalonians 5:1 Asi maererano nenguva nemwaka, hama, hamufaniri kuti munyorerwe,
I Thessalonians 5:2 nokuti imwi mumene munoziva kwazvo kuti sembavha usiku, saizvozvo zuva raIshe rinosvika;
I Thessalonians 5:3 nokuti pavanoti: Rugare nekugarika, pakarepo kuparadzwa kunovawira, sekurwadzwa nemimba kwemukadzi ane mimba; uye havangatongopukunyuki.
I Thessalonians 5:4 Asi imwi, hama, hamusi murima, kuti zuva iro rikubatei sembavha.
I Thessalonians 5:5 Imwi mese muri vana vechiedza nevana vemasikati; hatisi veusiku kana verima;
I Thessalonians 5:6 naizvozvo zvino ngatirege kurara sevamwewo, asi ngatirinde, tipengenuke.
I Thessalonians 5:7 Nokuti vanorara vanorara usiku; nevanoraradza vanoraradza usiku.
I Thessalonians 5:8 Asi isu tiri vemasikati, ngatipengenuke, tichipfeka chidzitiro chechifuva cherutendo nerudo; netariro yeruponeso <transChange type="added">ive </transChange>ngowani.
I Thessalonians 5:9 Nokuti Mwari haana kutitemera hasha, asi kuwana ruponeso naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu,
I Thessalonians 5:10 wakatifira, kuti kana tikarinda kana kurara, tirarame pamwe naye.
I Thessalonians 5:11 Saka kurudziranai, muvakane, sezvamunoitawo. <div eID="gen1538" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1537" type="section"/>
I Thessalonians 5:12 Asi tinokukumbirai, hama, kuziva vanoshanda zvine simba pakati penyu, nevanokutungamirirai muna Ishe, nekukurairai,
I Thessalonians 5:13 uye muvakudze zvikurusa murudo, nekuda kwebasa ravo. Ivai nerugare pakati penyu.
I Thessalonians 5:14 Asi tinokukurudzirai, hama, yambirai vasina murairo, munyaradze vanopera moyo, tsigirai vasina simba, muve nemoyo murefu kune vese.
I Thessalonians 5:15 Chenjerai kuti umwe arege kutsiva umwe zvakaipa nezvakaipa; asi nguva dzese teverai zvakanaka, zvese pakati penyu nekune vese.
I Thessalonians 5:16 Farai nekusingaperi;
I Thessalonians 5:17 nyengeterai musingamiri;
I Thessalonians 5:18 vongai pazvinhu zvese; nokuti ichi ndicho chido chaMwari muna Kristu Jesu maererano nemwi.
I Thessalonians 5:19 Musadzima Mweya;
I Thessalonians 5:20 musazvidza zviporofita;
I Thessalonians 5:21 idzai zvinhu zvese; mubatisise zvakanaka;
I Thessalonians 5:22 ibvai pakuonekwa kwese kwekuipa.
I Thessalonians 5:23 NaMwari werugare amene ngaakuitei vatsvene zvakazara; nemweya wenyu wese, nemoyo, nemuviri, zvichengetwe zvisina zvazvingapomerwa pakuuya kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu.
I Thessalonians 5:24 Wakatendeka iye anokudanai, acha<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>itawo.
I Thessalonians 5:25 Hama, tinyengetererei.
I Thessalonians 5:26 Kwazisai hama dzese nekutsvoda kutsvene.
I Thessalonians 5:27 Ndinokupikirai naIshe, kuti tsamba iyi iverengerwe hama tsvene dzese.
I Thessalonians 5:28 Nyasha dzaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> nemwi. Ameni. <div eID="gen1540" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1539" type="section"/> <chapter eID="1Thess.5"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1523" osisID="1Thess" type="book"/>
II Thessalonians 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="2Thess" sID="gen1541" type="book"/>   <milestone n="2 VATESARONIKA" type="x-usfm-h"/>
II Thessalonians 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="2Thess.1" sID="2Thess.1"/>
II Thessalonians 1:1 Pauro naSirivhano naTimotio kukereke yeVaTesaronika muna Mwari Baba vedu naIshe Jesu Kristu:
II Thessalonians 1:2 Nyasha kwamuri nerugare rwunobva kuna Mwari Baba vedu naIshe Jesu Kristu. <div eID="gen1543" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1542" type="section"/>
II Thessalonians 1:3 Tinofanira kuvonga Mwari nguva dzese pamusoro penyu, hama, sezvazvakafanira, nokuti rutendo rwenyu rwunokura zvikurusa, nerudo rweumwe neumwe wenyu mese kune umwe neumwe rwunowanda;
II Thessalonians 1:4 nekudaro isu tomene tinozvirumbidza mamuri mumakereke aMwari pamusoro pemoyo murefu wenyu nerutendo mukushushwa kwenyu kwese nematambudziko amunotsunga maari.
II Thessalonians 1:5 <transChange type="added">Ndicho</transChange> chiratidzo chekutonga kwakarurama kwaMwari, kuti muverengwe <transChange type="added">se</transChange>makafanira ushe hwaMwari, hwamunotambudzikirawo;
II Thessalonians 1:6 sezvo <transChange type="added">chiri</transChange> chinhu chakarurama kuna Mwari kutsiva dambudziko kune vanokutambudzai,
II Thessalonians 1:7 uye kwamuri munotambudzwa, kuzorora pamwe nesu, pakuzarurwa kwaIshe Jesu achibva kudenga nevatumwa vesimba rake,
II Thessalonians 1:8 mumoto unopfuta achitsiva kune vasingazivi Mwari, nekune vasingateereri evhangeri yaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu;
II Thessalonians 1:9 vacharangwa nekuparadza kusingaperi, vabviswe pamberi paIshe, nepakubwinya kwesimba rake,
II Thessalonians 1:10 paachauya kuzorumbidzwa muvatsvene vake, nekuyemurwa mune vese vanotenda (nekuti kupupura kwedu kwamuri kwakatendwa) nezuva iro.
II Thessalonians 1:11 Naizvozvo tinokunyengetereraiwo nguva dzese, kuti Mwari wedu akuverengei makafanirwa kudanwa uye azadzise kuda kwese kwakanaka kwekunaka <transChange type="added">hwake </transChange>nebasa rerutendo nesimba;
II Thessalonians 1:12 kuti zita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu rirumbidzwe mamuri, nemwi maari, zvichienderana nenyasha dzaMwari wedu nedzaIshe Jesu Kristu.  <chapter eID="2Thess.1"/><div eID="gen1545" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1544" type="section"/>
II Thessalonians 2:0 <div sID="gen1546" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="2Thess.2" sID="2Thess.2"/>  <div sID="gen1547" type="x-p"/>
II Thessalonians 2:1 Zvino tinokukumbirisai, hama, maererano nekuuya kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, nekuunganira kwedu kwaari,
II Thessalonians 2:2 kuti murege kukurumidza kuzununguswa mufungwa, kana kuvhunduswa, kana nemweya, kana neshoko, kana netsamba seino<transChange type="added">nyorwa</transChange> nesu, sezvinonzi zuva raKristu ratosvika.
II Thessalonians 2:3 Ngakurege kuva nemunhu anokunyengerai nemutoo upi neupi; nokuti <transChange type="added">harisviki </transChange>kunze kwekuti kuwa kwatanga kusvika, uye munhu wechivi aratidzwe, mwanakomana wekuparadzwa,
II Thessalonians 2:4 anopikisa nekuzvikudza pamusoro pezvese zvinonzi Mwari, kana zvinonamatwa, kusvikira agara mutembere yaMwari saMwari, achizviratidza kuti ndiMwari.
II Thessalonians 2:5 Hamurangariri here kuti ndichiri nemwi ndakakuudzai zvinhu izvi?
II Thessalonians 2:6 Asi ikozvino munoziva chinodzivirira kuti aratidzwe munguva yake pachake.
II Thessalonians 2:7 Nokuti chakavanzika chekusava nemurairo chotoshanda; chete <transChange type="added">aripo</transChange> anodzivirira ikozvino, kusvikira achibviswa pakati.
II Thessalonians 2:8 Ipapowo asina murairo acharatidzwa, Ishe waachapedza nemweya wemuromo wake, uye waachaparadza nekuonekwa kwekuuya kwake;
II Thessalonians 2:9 <transChange type="added">iye</transChange> kuuya kwake kwakaita sekuita kwaSatani nesimba rese nezviratidzo nezvinoshamisa zvenhema,
II Thessalonians 2:10 nepakunyengera kwese kwekusarurama mune vanoparara, nokuti havana kugamuchira rudo rwechokwadi kuti vaponeswe.
II Thessalonians 2:11 Uye nekuda kwaizvozvi Mwari achavatumira simba rekutsauka, kuti vatende nhema;
II Thessalonians 2:12 kuti vese varaswe vasina kutenda chokwadi, asi vakafara mukusarurama. <div eID="gen1547" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1546" type="section"/>
II Thessalonians 2:13 Asi isu tinofanira kuvonga Mwari nguva dzese pamusoro penyu, hama vadikanwi vaIshe, kuti Mwari kubva pakutanga wakakusarudzirai ruponeso pakuitwa vatsvene kweMweya nerutendo rwechokwadi;
II Thessalonians 2:14 zvaakakudanirai neevhangeri yedu, pakuwana kubwinya kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu.
II Thessalonians 2:15 Naizvozvo zvino, hama, mirai makasimba, mubatirire tsika dzamakadzidziswa, kana neshoko kana netsamba yedu.
II Thessalonians 2:16 Zvino Ishe wedu Jesu Kristu amene, naMwari, kunyange Baba vedu vakatida, vakapa nyaradzo isingaperi netariro yakanaka munyasha,
II Thessalonians 2:17 anyaradze moyo yenyu, nekukusimbisai pashoko rega-rega rakanaka nebasa. <chapter eID="2Thess.2"/><div eID="gen1549" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1548" type="section"/>
II Thessalonians 3:0 <div sID="gen1550" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="2Thess.3" sID="2Thess.3"/>  <div sID="gen1551" type="x-p"/>
II Thessalonians 3:1 Pakupedzisira, hama, tinyengetererei, kuti shoko raIshe rimhanye nekukudzwa kunyange se<transChange type="added">zvakaitika</transChange> nekwamuri,
II Thessalonians 3:2 uye kuti tisunungurwe kuvanhu vasingafungi nevakaipa; nokuti rutendo harwusi rwevese.
II Thessalonians 3:3 Asi Ishe wakatendeka, achakusimbisai neku<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>chengeta<transChange type="added">i</transChange> kubva kune wakaipa.
II Thessalonians 3:4 Uye tine chivimbo muna Ishe maererano nemwi, kuti munoitawo zvinhu zvatinokurairai uye muchazviita.
II Thessalonians 3:5 Asi Ishe ngaatungamirire moyo yenyu murudo rwaMwari, nemumoyo murefu waKristu.
II Thessalonians 3:6 Zvino tinokurairai, hama, muzita raIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, kuti muzviraure pahama imwe neimwe inofamba zvisakafanira, uye kwete zvinoenderana netsika yamakagamuchira kwatiri.
II Thessalonians 3:7 Nokuti imwi momene munoziva kuti <transChange type="added">mu</transChange>nofanira kutitevera sei, nokuti hatina kufamba zvisakafanira pakati penyu,
II Thessalonians 3:8 uye hatina kudya chingwa chemunhu pachena, asi pakushingaira nekutambudzika nekushanda siku nesikati, kuti tisava mutoro kune umwe wenyu;
II Thessalonians 3:9 kwete nokuti hatina kodzero, asi kuti tizvipe kwamuri <transChange type="added">se</transChange>muenzaniso wekutitevera.
II Thessalonians 3:10 Nokuti kunyange pataiva nemwi, takakurairai izvi, kuti: Kana umwe asingadi kushanda, ngaaregewo kudya.
II Thessalonians 3:11 Nokuti tinonzwa kuti vamwe pakati penyu vanofamba-famba zvisakafanira, vasingatongobati, asi vachiita zvisina maturo.
II Thessalonians 3:12 Zvino vakadaro tinoraira nekukurudzira naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, kuti vashande nekunyarara vadye kudya kwavo pachavo.
II Thessalonians 3:13 Asi imwi, hama, musaneta kuita zvakanaka.
II Thessalonians 3:14 Asi kana umwe asingateereri shoko redu netsamba, mutarisise uyo, uye musafambidzana naye, kuti anyare;
II Thessalonians 3:15 uye musa<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>tora semuvengi, asi mu<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>raire sehama.
II Thessalonians 3:16 Zvino Ishe werugare amene ngaakupei rugare nguva dzese nemitoo yese. Ishe <transChange type="added">ngaave</transChange> nemwi mese.
II Thessalonians 3:17 Kwaziso neruoko rwangu rwaPauro, ndiwo mucherechedzo patsamba imwe neimwe; ndinonyora saizvozvo.
II Thessalonians 3:18 Nyasha dzaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> nemwi mese. Ameni. <div eID="gen1551" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1550" type="section"/> <chapter eID="2Thess.3"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1541" osisID="2Thess" type="book"/>
I Timothy 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="1Tim" sID="gen1552" type="book"/>   <milestone n="1 TIMOTIO" type="x-usfm-h"/>
I Timothy 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="1Tim.1" sID="1Tim.1"/>
I Timothy 1:1 Pauro, muapositori waJesu Kristu nekuraira kwaMwari Muponesi wedu, nekwaIshe Jesu Kristu tariro yedu,
I Timothy 1:2 kuna Timotio mwana <transChange type="added">wangu</transChange> chaiye parutendo: Nyasha, tsitsi, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>rugare zvinobva kuna Mwari Baba vedu naJesu Kristu Ishe wedu. <div eID="gen1554" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1553" type="section"/>
I Timothy 1:3 Sezvandakakukurudzira kuti ramba ugere paEfeso, ndichienda kuMakedhonia, kuti uraire vamwe kuti varege kudzidzisa imwe dzidziso,
I Timothy 1:4 kana kuchenjerera ngano nenhoroondo dzemadzinza dzisingaperi, dzinomutsa gakava pane kuvaka kwaMwari kuri murutendo.
I Timothy 1:5 Asi chinangwa chemurairo rudo rwunobva pamoyo wakachena nehana yakanaka nerutendo rusinganyepedzeri;
I Timothy 1:6 pane izvozvi vamwe vakatsvedza vakatsaukira kukutaura kusina maturo,
I Timothy 1:7 vachida kuva vadzidzisi vemurairo, vasinganzwisisi kana zvavanoreva, kana maererano nezvavanosimbisa.
I Timothy 1:8 Asi tinoziva kuti murairo wakanaka, kana munhu achiushandisa zviri pamurairo,
I Timothy 1:9 achiziva izvi, kuti murairo hauna kuitirwa wakarurama, asi vasina murairo nevasingateereri, vasingadi Mwari nevatadzi, vasiri vatsvene nevasina hanya naMwari, mhondi dzemadzibaba nemhondi dzana amai, vanouraya vanhu,
I Timothy 1:10 mhombwe, ngochani, vanopamba vanhu, vanyepi, vaputsi vemhiko, uye kana chimwe chiriko chinopesana nedzidziso yakagwinya,
I Timothy 1:11 maererano neevhangeri yekubwinya kwaMwari wakaropafadzwa yandakabatiswa. <div eID="gen1556" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1555" type="section"/>
I Timothy 1:12 Uye ndinovonga wakandigonesa, Kristu Jesu Ishe wedu, kuti wakandiona ndakatendeka, aka<transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>isa paushumiri,
I Timothy 1:13 <transChange type="added">ini</transChange> ndaimbova munyombi nemushushi nemutuki; asi ndakawana tsitsi, nokuti ndakaita nekusaziva pakusatenda;
I Timothy 1:14 asi nyasha dzaIshe wedu dzakawedzeresa pamwe nerutendo nerudo rwuri muna Kristu Jesu.
I Timothy 1:15 Ishoko rakatendeka uye rinofanira kugamuchirwa chese, kuti Kristu Jesu wakauya munyika kuzoponesa vatadzi, vandiri ini mukuru wavo;
I Timothy 1:16 asi nekuda kweizvi ndakawana tsitsi, kuti mandiri ndinova mukuru, Jesu Kristu aratidze moyo murefu wese, uve muenzaniso kune vanozotenda kwaari, paupenyu husingaperi.
I Timothy 1:17 Zvino kuna Mambo wekusingaperi, asingafi, asingaonekwi, Mwari wega wakachenjera, nga<transChange type="added">kuve</transChange> nekukudzwa nekubwinya kusvikira rinhi narinhi. Ameni. <div eID="gen1558" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1557" type="section"/>
I Timothy 1:18 Murairo uyu ndinokumikidza kwauri, mwana <transChange type="added">wangu </transChange>Timotio, sezviporofita zvakatanga pamusoro pako, kuti nazvo urwe kurwa kwakanaka;
I Timothy 1:19 wakabata rutendo nehana yakanaka, vamwe vakati vairasa zvichienderana nerutendo vakaputsikirwa nechikepe,
I Timothy 1:20 <transChange type="added">vamwe</transChange> vavo ndiHimenayosi naArekizandro, vandakakumikidza kuna Satani, kuti vadzidze kusanyomba.  <chapter eID="1Tim.1"/><div eID="gen1560" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1559" type="section"/>
I Timothy 2:0 <div sID="gen1561" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="1Tim.2" sID="1Tim.2"/>  <div sID="gen1562" type="x-p"/>
I Timothy 2:1 Naizvozvo kutanga pazvese ndinokurudzira <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> mikumbiro, minyengetero, kureverera <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>kupa kuvonga zviitirwe vanhu vese;
I Timothy 2:2 pamadzimambo nevese vari panzvimbo dzakakwirira kuti tirarame upenyu hwerugare nerunyararo pakunamata Mwari kwese nerukudzo;
I Timothy 2:3 nokuti izvi zvakanaka uye zvinogamuchirwa pamberi paMwari Muponesi wedu,
I Timothy 2:4 uyo anoda <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> vanhu vese vaponeswe uye vasvike pakuziva chokwadi.
I Timothy 2:5 Nokuti <transChange type="added">kuna</transChange> Mwari umwe, nemurevereri umwe <transChange type="added">pakati</transChange> paMwari nevanhu, <transChange type="added">ndiye</transChange> munhu Kristu Jesu,
I Timothy 2:6 wakazvipa iye kuva rudzikunuro rwevese, <transChange type="added">chive</transChange> chapupu panguva dzakafanira,
I Timothy 2:7 icho chandagadzirwa ini kuva muparidzi nemuapositori (ndinoreva chokwadi muna Kristu, handitauri nhema), mudzidzisi wevahedheni parutendo nechokwadi. <div eID="gen1562" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1561" type="section"/>
I Timothy 2:8 Naizvozvo ndinoshuva kuti varume vanyengetere panzvimbo dzese, vachisimudza maoko matsvene, pasina kutsamwa nekupikisana.
I Timothy 2:9 Saizvozvowo vakadzi vazvishongedze nezvipfeko zvakafanira, vane kunyara nekuzvidzora, kwete nevhudzi rakarukwa, kana goridhe, kana maparera*, kana nguvo dzinodhura,
I Timothy 2:10 asi, zvakafanira vakadzi vanoti vanoshumira Mwari, nemabasa akanaka.
I Timothy 2:11 Mukadzi ngaadzidze mukunyarara nekuzvininipisa kwese.
I Timothy 2:12 Asi handitenderi mukadzi kuti adzidzise, kana kuti ave nesimba pamusoro pemurume, asi ave mukunyarara.
I Timothy 2:13 Nokuti Adhamu wakatanga kuumbwa, tevere Evha;
I Timothy 2:14 naAdhamu haana kunyengerwa, asi mukadzi anyengerwa wakava mukudarika,
I Timothy 2:15 asi achaponeswa kubudikidza nekubereka vana, kana vachirambira murutendo nerudo neutsvene pamwe nekuzvidzora. <chapter eID="1Tim.2"/><div eID="gen1564" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1563" type="section"/>
I Timothy 3:0 <div sID="gen1565" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="1Tim.3" sID="1Tim.3"/>  <div sID="gen1566" type="x-p"/>
I Timothy 3:1 <transChange type="added">I</transChange>shoko rakatendeka <transChange type="added">rekuti:</transChange> Kana munhu achishuva basa reutariri, anoshuva basa rakanaka.
I Timothy 3:2 Naizvozvo mutariri anofanira kuva asina chaangapomerwa, murume wemukadzi umwe, wakazvibata, anozvidzora, ane chiremerera, anogamuchira vaeni, nyanzvi pakudzidzisa,
I Timothy 3:3 asiri muraradzi, asingafariri kurwa, asingakariri mibairo yakaipa, asi wakadzikama, asina gakava, asingakariri mari;
I Timothy 3:4 anobata imba yake pachake zvakanaka, anodzora vana vake nerukudzo rwese,
I Timothy 3:5 nokuti kana munhu asingazivi kubata imba yake pachake, achachengeta sei kereke yaMwari?
I Timothy 3:6 Asava mutendi mutsva, kuti nekukudzwa arege kuwira mukupiwa mhosva kwadhiabhorosi.
I Timothy 3:7 Uyezve anofanira kuva neuchapupu hwakanaka kubva kune vari kunze, kuti arege kuwira mukumhurwa ne<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>musungo wadhiabhorosi.
I Timothy 3:8 Saizvozvo vadhikoni* <transChange type="added">ngavave</transChange> vanokudzwa, vasina manzwi maviri, vasingadi waini zhinji, vasingakariri fuma yakaipa,
I Timothy 3:9 vanochengeta chakavanzika cherutendo muhana yakachena.
I Timothy 3:10 Naivava ngavatange kuedzwawo, ipapo vangashumire, kana vasina chavangapomerwa.
I Timothy 3:11 Saizvozvo vakadzi <transChange type="added">vavo ngavave</transChange> vanokudzwa, kwete vacheri, vanozvidzora, vakatendeka pazvese.
I Timothy 3:12 Vadhikoni ngavave varume vemukadzi umwe, vanobata vana vavo nedzimba dzavo pachavo zvakanaka.
I Timothy 3:13 Nokuti avo vakashumira zvakanaka, vanozviwanira chimiro chakanaka, nekutsunga kukuru parutendo rwuri muna Kristu Jesu.
I Timothy 3:14 Zvinhu izvi ndinokunyorera, ndichitarisira kuuya kwauri nekukurumidza;
I Timothy 3:15 asi kana ndikanonoka, kuti uzive kuti vanofanira kufamba sei mumba maMwari, inova kereke yaMwari mupenyu, mbiru nehwaro hwechokwadi.
I Timothy 3:16 Zvinotendekawo <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> chakavanzika chekunamata Mwari chikuru; Mwari wakaratidzwa panyama, wakanzi wakarurama paMweya, wakaonekwa nevatumwa, akaparidzwa kuvahedheni, akatendwa panyika, akakwidzwa mukubwinya.  <chapter eID="1Tim.3"/><div eID="gen1566" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1565" type="section"/>
I Timothy 4:0 <div sID="gen1567" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="1Tim.4" sID="1Tim.4"/>  <div sID="gen1568" type="x-p"/>
I Timothy 4:1 Zvino Mweya anoreva zvakajeka, kuti panguva dzekupedzisira vamwe vachatsauka parutendo, vachiteerera mweya inonyengera nedzidziso dzemadhimoni,
I Timothy 4:2 paunyepedzeri hwevanoreva nhema, vakapiswa pahana dzavo pachavo nedare rinopisa,
I Timothy 4:3 vachidzivisa kuwanana <transChange type="added">nekuraira</transChange> kurega kudya Mwari kwaakasika kuti kugamuchirwe nekuvonga nevanotenda uye vanoziva chokwadi.
I Timothy 4:4 Nokuti chese chisikwa chaMwari chakanaka, uye hakuna chingafanira kuraswa kana chichigamuchirwa nekuvonga;
I Timothy 4:5 nokuti chinoitwa chitsvene neshoko raMwari nemunyengetero. <div eID="gen1568" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1567" type="section"/>
I Timothy 4:6 Kana uchiraira hama zvinhu izvi, uchava mushumiri wakanaka waJesu Kristu, wakafundwa nemashoko erutendo needzidziso yakanaka, yaunonyatsotevera.
I Timothy 4:7 Asi urambe ngano dzakaipa nedzechembere. Uzvirovedze pakunamata Mwari;
I Timothy 4:8 nokuti kurovedza muviri kunobatsira zvishoma; asi kunamata Mwari kunobatsira pazvinhu zvese, zvahune chivimbiso cheupenyu hwazvino nehwunouya.
I Timothy 4:9 Shoko iri rakatendeka uye rinofanirwa nekugamuchirwa kwese.
I Timothy 4:10 Nokuti naizvozvo nesu tinoshanda nesimba, nekushorwa, nokuti tinovimba naMwari mupenyu, anova Muponesi wevanhu vese, zvikuru weavo vanotenda.
I Timothy 4:11 Raira zvinhu izvi udzidzise.
I Timothy 4:12 Kusava nemunhu anozvidza udiki hwako, asi uve muenzaniso wevanotenda pashoko, pamufambiro, parudo, pamweya, parutendo, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>pautsvene.
I Timothy 4:13 Kusvikira ndasvika, ngwarira pakuverenga, pakuraira, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>padzidziso.
I Timothy 4:14 Usashaya hanya nechipo chiri mauri, chawakapiwa kubudikidza nechiporofita pamwe nekuiswa maoko eutariri.
I Timothy 4:15 Funganya pamusoro pezvinhu izvi, uve pazvinhu izvi, kuti kupfuurira mberi kwako kuonekwe kune vese.
I Timothy 4:16 Uzvichenjerere iwe nedzidziso. Urambire pazviri, nokuti mukuita izvi, uchazviponesa iwe pamwe nevanokunzwa. <chapter eID="1Tim.4"/><div eID="gen1570" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1569" type="section"/>
I Timothy 5:0 <div sID="gen1571" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="1Tim.5" sID="1Tim.5"/>  <div sID="gen1572" type="x-p"/>
I Timothy 5:1 Usatuka mukuru, asi u<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>tsiure sababa, vadiki sevanin'ina,
I Timothy 5:2 vakadzi vakuru sanamai; vakadzi vadiki sehanzvadzi, pakuchena kwese.
I Timothy 5:3 Kudza chirikadzi dziri chirikadzi zvirokwazvo.
I Timothy 5:4 Asi kana imwe chirikadzi ine vana kana vazukuru, ngavatange kudzidza kuratidza rukudzo kumba kwavo pachavo, vadzosere zvakafanira kuvabereki; nokuti ndizvo zvakanaka zvinogamuchirwa pamberi paMwari.
I Timothy 5:5 Zvino uyo ari chirikadzi zvirokwazvo yakasiiwawo yega anovimba naMwari, anogarawo pamikumbiro neminyengetero siku nesikati.
I Timothy 5:6 Asi uyo anozvipira kuzvifadza, wakafa ari mupenyu.
I Timothy 5:7 Uye raira zvinhu izvi, kuti varege kuva nechavangapomerwa.
I Timothy 5:8 Asi kana munhu asingachengeti vekwake, zvikuruwo veimba <transChange type="added">yake</transChange>, waramba rutendo, uye wakaipa kukunda asingatendi.
I Timothy 5:9 Chirikadzi ngainyorwe pasi ine makore asiri pasi pemakumi matanhatu, yaiva mukadzi wemurume umwe,
I Timothy 5:10 inopupurirwa mabasa akanaka, kana yakarera vana, kana yakagamuchira vaeni, kana yakashambidza tsoka dzevatsvene, kana yakabatsira vari mumatambudziko, kana yakateverera basa rese rakanaka.
I Timothy 5:11 Asi chirikadzi diki urambe, nokuti kana dzochiva zvinopesana naKristu, dzinoda kuwanikwa;
I Timothy 5:12 dzava nemhosva, nokuti dzarasa rutendo rwekutanga.
I Timothy 5:13 Neipapowo dzinodzidza usimbe dzichipotedza dzimba; uye <transChange type="added">hadzisi</transChange> simbe chete, asi vezvisina maturo, vanopindira zvisi zvavo, vachitaura zvavasingafaniri.
I Timothy 5:14 Naizvozvo ndinoda kuti <transChange type="added">chirikadzi</transChange> diki dziwanikwe, dzibereke vana, dzibate dzimba <transChange type="added">dzadzo</transChange>, dzirege kutongopa muvengi mukana wekutuka.
I Timothy 5:15 Nokuti vamwe vatotsauka vachitevera Satani.
I Timothy 5:16 Kana murume upi neupi kana mukadzi anotenda ane chirikadzi, ngaadzibatsire, nekereke irege kuremedzwa, kuti ibatsire chirikadzi chaidzo. <div eID="gen1572" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1571" type="section"/>
I Timothy 5:17 Vakuru vanobata zvakanaka ngavaverengerwe sevanofanirwa nekukudzwa kwakapetwa, zvikuru avo vanobata nesimba pashoko nepadzidziso.
I Timothy 5:18 Nokuti rugwaro rwunoti: Usasunga muromo wenzombe inopura; uye: Mushandi wakafanirwa nemubairo wake.
I Timothy 5:19 Usangogamuchira mhaka inopomerwa mutariri, kunze kana kuri mberi kwezvapupu zviviri kana zvitatu.
I Timothy 5:20 Vanotadza utsiure pamberi pevese, kuti vamwewo vave nekutya.
I Timothy 5:21 Ndino<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>rairisa kwazvo pamberi paMwari naIshe Jesu Kristu, nevatumwa vakasanangurwa, kuti uchengete zvinhu izvi usingagari watotonga, kana kuita chinhu uchitsaura vanhu.
I Timothy 5:22 Usakurumidza kuisa maoko pamusoro pemunhu, kana kugovana pazvivi zvevamwe; uzvichengete iwe uri mutsvene.
I Timothy 5:23 Usachiramba uchinwa mvura <transChange type="added">chete</transChange>, asi ushandise waini shoma, nekuda kwemudumbu mako neundonda hwako hwekazhinji.
I Timothy 5:24 Zvivi zvevamwe vanhu zviri pachena, zvinotungamirira kukutongwa; zvevamwewo zvichiteverawo.
I Timothy 5:25 Saizvozvowo mabasa akanaka ari pachena, neasina kudaro haagoni kuvanzwa. <chapter eID="1Tim.5"/><div eID="gen1574" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1573" type="section"/>
I Timothy 6:0 <div sID="gen1575" type="section"/> <chapter n="6" osisID="1Tim.6" sID="1Tim.6"/>  <div sID="gen1576" type="x-p"/>
I Timothy 6:1 Vese vari varanda pasi pejoko, ngavaverenge vatenzi vavo sevanofanirwa nerukudzo rwese, kuti zita raMwari nedzidziso zvirege kunyombwa.
I Timothy 6:2 Nevane vatenzi vanotenda ngavarege ku<transChange type="added">va</transChange>zvidza, zvadziri hama, asi zvikuru ngava<transChange type="added">va</transChange>shandire, nokuti vakatendeka uye vanodikanwa vagovani vemubairo. Dzidzisa zvinhu izvi ukurudzire. <div eID="gen1576" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1575" type="section"/>
I Timothy 6:3 Kana munhu achidzidzisa zvakasiyana <transChange type="added">nezvizvi</transChange>, uye asingabvumiri mashoko awa mapenyu, aIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, nekudzidziso inoenderana nekunamata Mwari,
I Timothy 6:4 anongozvikudza, asingazivi chinhu, asi anongokarira mibvunzo nenharo dzemashoko, panobva godo, gakava, kutuka, kufungidzira kwakaipa,
I Timothy 6:5 kukakavadzana kwevanhu vane murangariro wakaodzwa, vakarasikirwa nechokwadi, vachiti kunamata Mwari ndizvo zvinofumisa. Zviparadzanise nevakadaro.
I Timothy 6:6 Asi kunamata Mwari nekugutsikana ndizvo zvinofumisa kwazvo;
I Timothy 6:7 nokuti hatina kuuya nechinhu panyika, zviri pachena kuti hatigoni kubuda nechinhu;
I Timothy 6:8 asi kana tine kudya nezvekupfeka tichagutsikana neizvozvi.
I Timothy 6:9 Asi vanoshuva kufuma vanowira mumuedzo ne<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>musungo, ne<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>kuchiva kweupenzi kuzhinji kunokuvadza, zvinonyudza vanhu mukuparadzwa nekuputswa;
I Timothy 6:10 nokuti kuda mari ndiwo mudzi wezvakaipa zvese; uyo vamwe vakati vachishuva vakatsauswa parutendo, vakazvibaya neshungu zhinji.
I Timothy 6:11 Asi iwe, haiwa munhu waMwari, tiza zvinhu izvi; utevere kururama, kunamata Mwari, rutendo, rudo, moyo murefu, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>unyoro.
I Timothy 6:12 Irwa kurwa kwakanaka kwerutendo, batisisa upenyu husingaperi, hwawakadanirwawo kwahuri, ukabvumawo kubvuma kwakanaka pamberi pezvapupu zvizhinji.
I Timothy 6:13 Ndinokuraira pamberi paMwari, anoraramisa zvinhu zvese, naKristu Jesu, wakapupura kupupura kwakanaka pamberi paPondiyo Pirato,
I Timothy 6:14 kuti uchengete murairo usina gwapa, usina chaungapomerwa, kusvikira pakuonekwa kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu,
I Timothy 6:15 kwaacharatidza panguva dzake, iye Wakaropafadzwa neWemasimbaose ega, Mambo wemadzimambo naIshe wemadzishe,
I Timothy 6:16 iye ega ane kusafa, agere pachiedza chisingasvikiki, hakuna umwe wevanhu wakambomuona, kana kugona kuona; kukudzwa nesimba risingaperi <transChange type="added">zviri</transChange> kwaari. Ameni.
I Timothy 6:17 Raira vakafuma panyika ino, kuti varege kuzvikudza, kana kuvimba nefuma isingavimbiki, asi muna Mwari mupenyu, anotipa zvinhu zvese achiwanza kuti tifare;
I Timothy 6:18 vaite zvakanaka, kuti vave vafumi pamabasa akanaka, vagadzirire kupa, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>kugovana;
I Timothy 6:19 vazvirongedzere nheyo yakanaka yenguva inouya, kuti vabatisise upenyu husingaperi.
I Timothy 6:20 Haiwa, Timotio, chengetedza icho chawakabatiswa, ufuratire kutaura kusina maturo nekupikisa kwezvinonzi ruzivo zviri zvenhema;
I Timothy 6:21 irwo vamwe vakati vachibvuma vakarasika maererano nerutendo. Nyasha <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> newe. Ameni. <div eID="gen1578" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1577" type="section"/> <chapter eID="1Tim.6"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1552" osisID="1Tim" type="book"/>
II Timothy 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="2Tim" sID="gen1579" type="book"/>   <milestone n="2 TIMOTIO" type="x-usfm-h"/>
II Timothy 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="2Tim.1" sID="2Tim.1"/>
II Timothy 1:1 Pauro, muapositori waJesu Kristu kubudikidza nechido chaMwari, zvichienderana nechivimbiso cheupenyu huri muna Kristu Jesu,
II Timothy 1:2 kuna Timotio mwana <transChange type="added">wangu</transChange> unodikanwa: Nyasha, tsitsi, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>rugare zvinobva kuna Mwari Baba naKristu Jesu Ishe wedu. <div eID="gen1581" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1580" type="section"/>
II Timothy 1:3 Ndinovonga Mwari, wandinoshumira kubva kumadziteteguru muhana yakachena, kuti ndisingamiri ndinokurangarira paminyengetero yangu siku nesikati,
II Timothy 1:4 ndichishuva kukuona, ndichirangarira misodzi yako, kuti ndizadzwe nemufaro,
II Timothy 1:5 ndichiisa mumurangariro rutendo rusinganyepedzeri rwuri mauri, rwaimbogara muna mbuya vako Roisi namai vako Yunisi, uye ndinovimba kuti rwuri mauriwo.
II Timothy 1:6 Nemhaka yeizvi ndinokuyeudzira kuti ukutidzire chipo chaMwari, chiri mauri nekuiswa kwemaoko angu.
II Timothy 1:7 Nokuti Mwari haana kutipa mweya wekutya asi wesimba, newerudo, newekuzvidzora.
II Timothy 1:8 Naizvozvo usanyadziswa neuchapupu hwaIshe wedu, kana hwangu musungwa wake; asi utambudzikire evhangeri pamwe <transChange type="added">neni</transChange> zvichienderana nesimba raMwari,
II Timothy 1:9 wakatiponesa, akatidana nekudana kutsvene, kwete zvichienderana nemabasa edu, asi zvichienderana nezano rake pachake, nenyasha dzakapiwa kwatiri muna Kristu Jesu nhambo dzenguva dzisati dzavapo,
II Timothy 1:10 asi ikozvino kunoratidzwa nekuonekwa kweMuponesi wedu Jesu Kristu, wakaparadza rufu, akabudisa pachena upenyu nekusafa kubudikidza neevhangeri,
II Timothy 1:11 yandakagadzirwa ini kuva muparidzi, nemuapositori, nemudzidzisi wevahedheni.
II Timothy 1:12 Nemhaka yeizvi neni ndinotambudzika zvinhu izvi, zvakadaro handinyadziswi, nokuti ndinoziva wandakatenda, uye ndine chokwadi kuti anogona kuchengeta chandakaisa muruoko kusvikira zuva iroro.
II Timothy 1:13 Batisisa muenzaniso wemashoko mapenyu awakanzwa kwandiri murutendo nerudo rwuri muna Kristu Jesu.
II Timothy 1:14 Icho chinhu chakanaka chakaiswa mumaoko <transChange type="added">mako</transChange> chengeta neMweya Mutsvene anogara matiri.
II Timothy 1:15 Unozviziva izvi, kuti vese vari paAsia vakandifuratira; pakati pavo pana Figero naHemogene.
II Timothy 1:16 Ishe ngaape tsitsi kuimba yaOnesiforo; nokuti kazhinji wakandivandudza, uye haana kunyadziswa neketani yangu,
II Timothy 1:17 asi asvika Roma, wakanditsvakisisa, aka<transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>wana.
II Timothy 1:18 Ishe ngaamuitire kuti awane tsitsi kuna Ishe nezuva iro; uye muzvinhu zvingani zvaaka<transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>batira paEfeso, iwe unozivisisa.  <chapter eID="2Tim.1"/><div eID="gen1583" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1582" type="section"/>
II Timothy 2:0 <div sID="gen1584" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="2Tim.2" sID="2Tim.2"/>  <div sID="gen1585" type="x-p"/>
II Timothy 2:1 Naizvozvo iwe, mwana wangu, simba munyasha dziri muna Kristu Jesu.
II Timothy 2:2 Nezvinhu zvawakanzwa kwandiri pakati pezvapupu zvizhinji, uzvikumikidze izvozvo kuvanhu vakatendeka vachagonawo kudzidzisa vamwe.
II Timothy 2:3 Naizvozvo iwe utambudzike zvakaoma, semurwi wakanaka waJesu Kristu.
II Timothy 2:4 Hakuna munhu anobata semurwi anozvipinganidza nezviitiko zveupenyu, kuti afadze uyo waka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>pinza basa.
II Timothy 2:5 Uye kana munhuwo achikwikwidza, haashongedzwi korona kana asina kukwikwidza zviri pamurairo.
II Timothy 2:6 Murimi anobata zvakasimba anofanira kutanga kugamuchira zvibereko.
II Timothy 2:7 Fungisisa zvandinoreva; uye Ishe ngaakupe kunzwisisa pazvinhu zvese.
II Timothy 2:8 Rangarira Jesu Kristu wakamutswa kubva kuvakafa, wembeu yaDhavhidhi, zvichienderana neevhangeri yangu;
II Timothy 2:9 yandinotambudzika mairi zvakaipa, kusvikira pazvisungo, semuiti wezvakaipa; asi shoko raMwari harina kusungwa.
II Timothy 2:10 Saka ndinotsungirira zvinhu zvese nekuda kwevakasanangurwa, kuti naivo vawane ruponeso rwuri muna Kristu Jesu, pamwe nekubwinya kusingaperi.
II Timothy 2:11 Shoko <transChange type="added">iri</transChange> rakatendeka; nokuti kana takafa pamwe <transChange type="added">naye</transChange>, tichararamawo pamwe <transChange type="added">naye</transChange>.
II Timothy 2:12 Kana tikatsungirira, tichatongawo pamwe na<transChange type="added">ye</transChange>; kana tika<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>ramba, naiye achatiramba.
II Timothy 2:13 Kana tisingatendeki, iye anoramba akatendeka; iye haagoni kuzviramba. <div eID="gen1585" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1584" type="section"/>
II Timothy 2:14 U<transChange type="added">va</transChange>rangaridze zvinhu izvi, uchirairisa pamberi paIshe kusapikisa pamashoko kusingabatsiri chinhu <transChange type="added">asi</transChange> kutsausa vanonzwa.
II Timothy 2:15 Shingaira kuti uzviratidze kuna Mwari uri wakatendeka, mushandi asingafaniri kunyadziswa, anonyatsoruramisa shoko rechokwadi.
II Timothy 2:16 Asi nzvenga kutaura kwetsvina kusina maturo; nokuti vacharamba vachingonyanya pakusatya Mwari,
II Timothy 2:17 neshoko ravo richanyenga segomarara; pakati pavo pana Himenayosi naFiretosi;
II Timothy 2:18 ivo vakatsauka pachokwadi, vachiti kumuka kwatova<transChange type="added">po</transChange>, vachipidigura rutendo rwevamwe.
II Timothy 2:19 Kunyange zvakadaro nheyo yaMwari inomira yakasimba, ine mucherechedzo uyu: Ishe anoziva vari vake, uye <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Umwe neumwe anoreva zita raKristu ngaabve pakusarurama.
II Timothy 2:20 Asi muimba huru hamuna midziyo yegoridhe neyesirivheri chete, asiwo yematanda neyevhu, uye imwe ndeyekukudzwa asi imwe ndeyekusakudzwa.
II Timothy 2:21 Naizvozvo kana munhu achizvinatsa pazvinhu izvi, achava mudziyo wekukudzwa, wakaitwa mutsvene, wakakwanira basa raTenzi, wakagadzirirwa basa rese rakanaka.
II Timothy 2:22 Tizawo kuchiva kweudiki, asi uteverere kururama, rutendo, rudo, rugare, pamwe nevanodana kuna Ishe zvichibva pamoyo wakachena.
II Timothy 2:23 Asi mibvunzo yeupenzi neyekusadzidza urambe, uchiziva kuti zvinomutsa kurwa.
II Timothy 2:24 Zvino muranda waIshe haafaniri kurwa, asi ave munyoro kune vese, anoziva kudzidzisa, ane moyo murefu,
II Timothy 2:25 anoraira neunyoro avo vanozvipikisa, kuti zvimwe Mwari avape kutendeukira kuruzivo rwechokwadi,
II Timothy 2:26 uye vapengenuke kubva pamusungo wadhiabhorosi, wavakange vakabatwa naye pakuda kwake.  <chapter eID="2Tim.2"/><div eID="gen1587" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1586" type="section"/>
II Timothy 3:0 <div sID="gen1588" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="2Tim.3" sID="2Tim.3"/>  <div sID="gen1589" type="x-p"/>
II Timothy 3:1 Asi uzive ichi, kuti mumazuva ekupedzisira nguva dzekutambudzika dzichasvika.
II Timothy 3:2 Nokuti vanhu vachava vanozvida, vanoda mari, vanozvirumbidza, vanozvikudza, vatuki, vasingateereri vabereki, vasingavongi, vasiri vatsvene,
II Timothy 3:3 vasina rudo rwechisikirwo, vasingaregereri, vacheri, vasingazvidzori, vane hasha, vasingadi zvakanaka,
II Timothy 3:4 vatengesi, vanomhanyirira, vane manyawi, vanoda mafaro kupfuura kuda Mwari,
II Timothy 3:5 vane mufananidzo wekunamata Mwari, asi vachiramba simba rawo; ubve pane vakadaiwo.
II Timothy 3:6 Nokuti kwavari kunobva vanoverevedza mudzimba, vachitapa vakadzi nzenza, vakaremedzwa nezvivi, vachitungamirirwa nekuchiva kwakasiyana-siyana,
II Timothy 3:7 vanongogara vachidzidza, asi havatongogoni kusvika paruzivo rwechokwadi.
II Timothy 3:8 Sezvowo Jane naJambere vakapikisa Mozisi, saizvozvowo ava vanoramba chokwadi, vanhu vendangariro dzakaodzwa, vakaraswa maererano nerutendo.
II Timothy 3:9 Asi havachapfuuriri mberi; nokuti upenzi hwavo huchaonekwa kune vese, sezvakazoita hwavowo.
II Timothy 3:10 Asi iwe wakanyatsoteverera dzidziso yangu, mufambiro, chinangwa, rutendo, moyo murefu, rudo, kutsungirira,
II Timothy 3:11 kushushwa, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>nhamo, zvakandiwira paAndiyokiya, paIkonio, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>paRistra, kushushwa kwakadini kwandakatsungirira <transChange type="added">makuri;</transChange> uye Mwari wakandinunura kubva maari ese.
II Timothy 3:12 Nevesewo vanoda kurarama mukunamata Mwari muna Kristu Jesu vachashushwa;
II Timothy 3:13 asi vanhu vakaipa nevanyengeri vachaenderera mberi pakuipa vachitsausa nekutsauswa.
II Timothy 3:14 Asi iwe rambira pazvinhu zvawakadzidza uye zvawakatendeswa, uchiziva kuti waka<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>dzidza kuna ani,
II Timothy 3:15 uye kuti kubvira paucheche wakaziva magwaro matsvene, anogona kukuchenjedza kusvikira pakuponeswa kubudikidza nerutendo rwuri muna Kristu Jesu.
II Timothy 3:16 Rugwaro rwese rwakafemerwa naMwari uye rwunobatsira padzidziso, pakutsiura, pakururamisa, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>pakuraira kuri mukururama;
II Timothy 3:17 kuti munhu waMwari ave wakakwana zvizere, agadzirirwa basa rese rakanaka.  <chapter eID="2Tim.3"/><div eID="gen1589" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1588" type="section"/>
II Timothy 4:0 <div sID="gen1590" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="2Tim.4" sID="2Tim.4"/>  <div sID="gen1591" type="x-p"/>
II Timothy 4:1 Naizvozvo ndinorairisa pamberi paMwari, naIshe Jesu Kristu, iye achatonga vapenyu nevakafa, pakuonekwa kwake neushe hwake:
II Timothy 4:2 Paridza shoko; iva wakagadzirira nenguva yakafanira, panguva isakafanira, dzora, tsiura, kurudzira nemoyo murefu wese nedzidziso.
II Timothy 4:3 Nokuti nguva ichavapo yavacharamba kutendera dzidziso mhenyu, asi zvichienderana nekuchiva kwavo pachavo vachazvivunganidzira vadzidzisi, vachirumwa nzeve;
II Timothy 4:4 uye vachafuratidza nzeve <transChange type="added">dzavo</transChange> pachokwadi, vachitendeukira kungano.
II Timothy 4:5 Asi iwe svinura pazvinhu zvese, utsungirire pamatambudziko, uite basa remuevhangeri, uzadzise basa rako.
II Timothy 4:6 Nokuti ini ndatodururwa sechipo chinodururwa, nenguva yekubva kwangu yasvika.
II Timothy 4:7 Ndarwa kurwa kwakanaka, ndapedza nhangemutange, ndachengeta rutendo;
II Timothy 4:8 kubva ikozvino, ndakaisirwa korona yekururama Ishe yavachandipa, mutongi wakarurama nezuva iroro; kwetewo kwandiri ndega, asi nekune vese vanoda kuonekwa kwake. <div eID="gen1591" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1590" type="section"/>
II Timothy 4:9 Shingairira kukurumidza kuuya kwandiri.
II Timothy 4:10 Nokuti Dhemasi wakandisiya, ada nyika yaikozvino, akaenda kuTesaronika; Kresike kuGaratia, Tito kuDharimatia.
II Timothy 4:11 Ruka ega aneni. Tora Mariko uuye naye nokuti anondibatsira pakushumira.
II Timothy 4:12 Asi Tikiko ndakamutuma kuEfeso.
II Timothy 4:13 Nguvo yandakasiya paTroasi kuna Kapo, kana wouya uuye na<transChange type="added">yo</transChange>, nemabhuku, zvikuru magwaro ematehwe.
II Timothy 4:14 Arekisandiro mupfuri wendarira wakandiitira zvakaipa zvizhinji; Ishe achamutsiva zvinoenderana nemabasa ake;
II Timothy 4:15 iwewo umuchenjerere, nokuti wakapikisa zvikurusa mashoko edu.
II Timothy 4:16 Pakuzvidavirira kwangu kwekutanga hapana wakamira neni, asi vese vakandisiya. Dai zvarega kuverengerwa kwavari.
II Timothy 4:17 Asi Ishe wakamira neni, akandisimbisa, kuti neni kuparidza kukwaniswe, nevahedheni vese vanzwe; uye ndakarwirwa kubva pamuromo weshumba.
II Timothy 4:18 Uye Ishe achandirwira pabasa rese rakaipa, uye acha<transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>chengetera muushe hwake hwekudenga; kubwinya <transChange type="added">ngakuve</transChange> kwaari rinhi narinhi. Ameni.
II Timothy 4:19 Kwazisa Priska naAkwira, neimba yaOnesiforo.
II Timothy 4:20 Erasto wakasara paKorinde; asi Trofimo ndakamusiya paMireto achirwara.
II Timothy 4:21 Shingairira kuuya chando chisati chasvika. Yubhuro anokukwazisa, naPudheni, naRinosi, naKraudhia, nehama dzese.
II Timothy 4:22 Ishe Jesu Kristu <transChange type="added">ngaave</transChange> nemweya wako. Nyasha <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> nemwi. Ameni. <div eID="gen1593" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1592" type="section"/> <chapter eID="2Tim.4"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1579" osisID="2Tim" type="book"/>
Titus 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Titus" sID="gen1594" type="book"/>   <milestone n="TITO" type="x-usfm-h"/>
Titus 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Titus.1" sID="Titus.1"/>
Titus 1:1 Pauro, muranda waMwari, nemuapositori waJesu Kristu, zvichienderana nerutendo rwevasanangurwa vaMwari nekuziva chokwadi chiri pakunamata Mwari,
Titus 1:2 patariro yeupenyu husingaperi, uhwo Mwari asingagoni kureva nhema hwaakavimbisa nhambo dzenguva dzisati dzavapo,
Titus 1:3 asi panguva dzakafanira wakaratidza shoko rake nekuparidza kwakaiswa mumaoko angu zvichienderana nemurairo waMwari Muponesi wedu,
Titus 1:4 kuna Tito, mwana <transChange type="added">wangu</transChange> chaiye zvichienderana nerutendo rwatinodyidzana: Nyasha, tsitsi, rugare zvinobva kuna Mwari Baba, naIshe Jesu Kristu Muponesi wedu. <div eID="gen1596" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1595" type="section"/>
Titus 1:5 Nekuda kwaizvozvi ndakakusiya paKrete, kuti ugadzirise zvakasara, uye ugadze vatariri muguta rega-rega, sezvandakakuraira ini;
Titus 1:6 kana aripo asina chaangapomerwa, murume wemukadzi umwe, ane vana vakatendeka, vasingapiwi mhosva yekusazvidzora, kana kusateerera.
Titus 1:7 Nokuti mutariri anofanira kuva asina chaangapomerwa, semuchengeti weimba waMwari; asina mukundo, asingakurumidzi kutsamwa, asiri muraradzi, asiri murwi, asingakariri fuma yakaipa,
Titus 1:8 asi anofarira kugamuchira vaenzi, anoda zvakanaka, anozvidzora, wakarurama, mutsvene, anozvibata,
Titus 1:9 anobatisisa shoko rakatendeka sezvaakadzidziswa, kuti agone kukurudzira nedzidziso mhenyu, uye kupwisa vakakavari. <div eID="gen1598" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1597" type="section"/>
Titus 1:10 Nokuti vazhinjiwo varipo vasingateereri, vanotaura zvisina maturo nevanyengeri, zvikuru avo vekudzingiswa,
Titus 1:11 vanofanira kudzivira miromo yavo; vanopidigura misha yese, vachidzidzisa zvinhu zvavasingafaniri, nekuda kwefuma yakaipa.
Titus 1:12 Umwe pakati pavo, <transChange type="added">anova</transChange> muporofita wavo pachavo, wakati: VaKrete vagara vari varevi venhema, zvikara zvakaipa, simbe dzinokara.
Titus 1:13 Uchapupu uhu ndehwechokwadi. Nekuda kwechikonzero ichi uvatsiure zvakasimba, kuti vagwinye parutendo,
Titus 1:14 vasingateereri ngano dzeVaJudha nemirairo yevanhu vanofuratira chokwadi.
Titus 1:15 Kune vakachena zvinhu zvese zvakachena; asi kune vakasvibiswa nevasingatendi hakuna chakachena, asi kufunga kwavowo nehana zvakasvibiswa.
Titus 1:16 Vanobvuma kuti vanoziva Mwari, asi pamabasa vano<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>ramba, vari vanyangadzi nevasingateereri uye vasingabatsiri pabasa rese rakanaka.  <chapter eID="Titus.1"/><div eID="gen1600" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1599" type="section"/>
Titus 2:0 <div sID="gen1601" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="Titus.2" sID="Titus.2"/>  <div sID="gen1602" type="x-p"/>
Titus 2:1 Zvino iwe taura zvinhu zvakafanira dzidziso yakagwinya.
Titus 2:2 Varume vakuru kuti vazvibate, vanokudzwa, vakangwara, vakagwinya parutendo, parudo, pakutsungirira;
Titus 2:3 saizvozvo vakadzi vakuru kuti pamafambiro <transChange type="added">vave</transChange> sezvakafanira vatsvene, kwete vacheri, kwete varanda vewaini zhinji, vadzidzisi vezvinhu zvakanaka,
Titus 2:4 kuti vadzidzise vakadzi vadiki kuchenjera, kuda varume vavo, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>kuda vana vavo,
Titus 2:5 vakazvibata, vakachena, vachengeti vemisha, vakanaka, vanozviisa pasi pevarume vavo pachavo, kuti shoko raMwari rirege kumhurwa.
Titus 2:6 Varume vadiki saizvozvo ukurudzire kuti vave vanozvidzora;
Titus 2:7 pazvinhu zvese iwe uzviratidze uri mufananidzo wamabasa akanaka, padzidziso yechokwadi, mugariro unokudzwa <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>kuvimbika,
Titus 2:8 shoko rakagwinya, risingashoreki, kuti uyo wedivi rinopikisa anyare, asina chinhu chakaipa chaangareva pamusoro penyu.
Titus 2:9 <transChange type="added">Kurudzira</transChange> varanda kuzviisa pasi pavatenzi vavo pachavo, kuti vafadze pazvese, vasingakakavari,
Titus 2:10 vasinganyimi, asi varatidze kutendeka kwakanaka kwese, kuti vashongedze dzidziso yaMwari Muponesi wedu pazvese.
Titus 2:11 Nokuti nyasha dzaMwari dzinoponesa dzakaratidzwa kuvanhu vese,
Titus 2:12 dzichidzidzisa isu kuti, tirambe kusanamata Mwari uye kuchiva kwenyika, tirarame nekuchenjera uye kururama nekunamata Mwari panyika yaikozvino,
Titus 2:13 tichimirira tariro yakaropafadzwa nekuratidzwa kwekubwinya kwaMwari mukuru neMuponesi wedu Jesu Kristu,
Titus 2:14 wakazvipira isu, kuti adzikunure isu pakuipa kwese, uye azvichenurire vanhu vakasanangurwa, vanoshingairira mabasa akanaka.
