Titus 2:15 Taura zvinhu izvi, uye kurudzira, uye tsiura nesimba rese. Kusava nemunhu anokuzvidza.  <chapter eID="Titus.2"/>
Titus 3:0 <chapter n="3" osisID="Titus.3" sID="Titus.3"/>
Titus 3:1 Uvayeudzire ivo kuzviisa pasi pevatungamiriri nevabati, va<transChange type="added">va</transChange>teerere, vakazvigadzirira basa rese rakanaka,
Titus 3:2 varege kuchera munhu, varege kuva vakakavari, vanyoro, vaitire vanhu vese unyoro hwese.
Titus 3:3 Nokuti nesu pachedu taimbova matununu, vasingateereri, tichitsauswa, tichishumira kuchiva nemafaro zvakasiyana-siyana, tichirarama mukushata negodo, tichivenga, tichivengana.
Titus 3:4 Asi apo unyoro nerudo kuvanhu zvaMwari Muponesi wedu zvoonekwa,
Titus 3:5 kwete zvichibva pamabasa ekururama atakaita isu, asi zvichienderana netsitsi dzake wakatiponesa, kubudikidza nekushambidzwa kwekuberekwa kutsva nekuvandudzwa kweMweya Mutsvene,
Titus 3:6 waakadururira achiwanza pamusoro pedu, kubudikidza naJesu Kristu Muponesi wedu,
Titus 3:7 kuti tichinzi takarurama nenyasha dzake, tive vadyi venhaka zvichienderana netariro yeupenyu husingaperi.
Titus 3:8 Ishoko rakatendeka, uye izvi ndinoda kuti musimbise zvirokwazvo, kuti vakatenda kuna Mwari vachenjerere kuzvipira pamabasa akanaka. Ndizvo zvinhu zvakanaka uye zvinobatsira kuvanhu;
Titus 3:9 asi nzvenga mibvunzo yeupenzi nenhoroondo dzemazita emadzinza nemakakatanwa nemakakava pamusoro pemurairo, nokuti hazvibatsiri uye hazvina maturo.
Titus 3:10 Munhu anotsauka shure kwekurairwa kwekutanga nekwechipiri umurambe,
Titus 3:11 uchiziva kuti uyo wakadaro wakatsauka, uye anotadza, achizvipa mhosva amene. <div eID="gen1602" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1601" type="section"/>
Titus 3:12 Pandichatuma Aritema kwauri, kana Tikiko, ushingaire kuuya kwandiri kuNikopori; nokuti ndakazvipira kugarapo pachando.
Titus 3:13 Shingaira kubatsira Zenasi mududziri wemurairo naAporo parwendo rwavo, kuti kusava nechinhu chinoshaikwa kwavari.
Titus 3:14 Nevekweduwo ngavadzidze kuzvipira pamabasa akanaka anodikanwa pakushaiwa, kuti varege kuva vasina zvibereko.
Titus 3:15 Vese vaneni vanokukwazisa. Kwazisa vanotida parutendo. Nyasha <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> nemwi mese. Ameni. <div eID="gen1604" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1603" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Titus.3"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1594" osisID="Titus" type="book"/>
Philemon 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Phlm" sID="gen1605" type="book"/>   <milestone n="FIRIMONI" type="x-usfm-h"/>
Philemon 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Phlm.1" sID="Phlm.1"/>
Philemon 1:1 Pauro musungwa waKristu Jesu, naTimotio hama, kuna Firimoni mudikanwi nemushumiri pamwe nesu,
Philemon 1:2 nekumudikanwi Apifia, nekuna Akipo muuto pamwe nesu, nekukereke iri mumba mako:
Philemon 1:3 Nyasha kwamuri nerugare rwunobva kuna Mwari Baba vedu naIshe Jesu Kristu. <div eID="gen1607" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1606" type="section"/>
Philemon 1:4 Ndinovonga Mwari wangu, ndichikureva nguva dzese paminyengetero yangu,
Philemon 1:5 ndichinzwa zverudo rwako, nerutendo rwaunarwo kuna Ishe Jesu nekuvatsvene vese,
Philemon 1:6 kuti kudyidzana kwerutendo rwako kuve nesimba pakuziva chese chakanaka chiri mamuri muna Kristu Jesu.
Philemon 1:7 Nokuti tine mufaro mukuru nekunyaradzwa parudo rwako, nokuti ura hwevatsvene hwakavandudzwa newe, hama. <div eID="gen1609" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1608" type="section"/>
Philemon 1:8 Naizvozvo kunyange ndine kushinga kukuru muna Kristu kukuraira izvo zvakafanira,
Philemon 1:9 <transChange type="added">asi</transChange> nekuda kwerudo zviri nani kukumbirisa, sezvandakadai <transChange type="added">ini</transChange> Pauro mutana, uye ikozvinowo musungwa waJesu Kristu.
Philemon 1:10 Ndinokukumbirisa pamusoro pemwana wangu, wandakabereka muzvisungo zvangu, Onesimo,
Philemon 1:11 wakange asingambokubatsiri, asi ikozvino anobatsira kwauri nekwandiri,
Philemon 1:12 wandatumirazve <transChange type="added">kwauri;</transChange> asi iwe, mugamuchire, ndiko kuti ura hwangu;
Philemon 1:13 wandaida kuramba naye aneni, kuti panzvimbo yako andishumire pazvisungo zveevhangeri;
Philemon 1:14 asi handina kuda kuita chinhu kunze kwetendero yako, kuti chakanaka chako chirege kuitwa nekurovererwa, asi sepachido.
Philemon 1:15 Nokuti zvimwe wakaparadzaniswa <transChange type="added">newe</transChange> chinguva nemhaka iyi, kuti umugamuchirezve nekusingaperi;
Philemon 1:16 arege kuchiva semuranda, asi anopfuura muranda, hama inodikanwa, zvikuru kwandiri, asi zvikuru sei kwauri zvese panyama nemuna Ishe.
Philemon 1:17 Naizvozvo kana uchindiverenga semubatidzani, mugamuchire se<transChange type="added">unogamuchira</transChange> ini.
Philemon 1:18 Asi kana akakutadzira chimwe kana kuva nengava <transChange type="added">newe</transChange>, izvozvo zviverengere kwandiri;
Philemon 1:19 ini Pauro ndanyora neruoko rwangu, ini ndicharipa; kuti ndirege kuti kwauri, uri ngava kwandiri iwewo pachako.
Philemon 1:20 Hongu, hama, ngandive nemufaro newe muna Ishe; vandudza ura hwangu muna Ishe.
Philemon 1:21 Ndakunyorera ndichivimba kuteerera kwako, ndichiziva kutiwo uchaita kupfuura zvandinoreva.
Philemon 1:22 Uyewo panguva iyoyo ndigadzirire pekugara; nokuti ndinotarisira kuti kubudikidza neminyengetero yenyu ndichapiwa kwamuri.
Philemon 1:23 Anokukwazisa Epafrasi musungwa pamwe neni muna Kristu Jesu,
Philemon 1:24 Mariko, Arisitako, Dhemasi, Ruka, vabati pamwe neni.
Philemon 1:25 Nyasha dzaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> nemweya wenyu. Ameni. <div eID="gen1611" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1610" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Phlm.1"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1605" osisID="Phlm" type="book"/>
Hebrews 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Heb" sID="gen1612" type="book"/>   <milestone n="VAHEBHERU" type="x-usfm-h"/>
Hebrews 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Heb.1" sID="Heb.1"/>
Hebrews 1:1 Mwari iye ataura kare nenzira dzakawanda kumadzibaba nevaporofita muzvikamu nezvikamu,
Hebrews 1:2 pamazuva awa ekupedzisira akataura kwatiri muMwanakomana, waakagadza mudyi wenhaka wezvinhu zvese, waakaitawo naye nyika,
Hebrews 1:3 iye ari kupenya kwekubwinya, nemufananidzo chaiwo wekuvapo kwake, uye achitakura zvinhu zvese neshoko resimba rake, wakati aita kubudikidza naiye pachake kunatswa kwezvivi zvedu, akagara pasi kuruoko rwerudyi rweuMambo huri <transChange type="added">kunzvimbo dze</transChange>kumusoro,
Hebrews 1:4 apfuudzwa vatumwa zvikuru pakunaka, sezvo akange awana nhaka yezita gurusa kupfuura ivo.
Hebrews 1:5 Nokuti ndekune upi wevatumwa kwaakamboti: Ndiwe Mwanakomana wangu, nhasi ini ndakubereka? Uyezve: Ini ndichava kwaari Baba, uye iye achava Mwanakomana kwandiri?
Hebrews 1:6 Uye kana achiuisazve dangwe panyika anoti: Nevatumwa vese vaMwari ngavamunamate.
Hebrews 1:7 Nekuvatumwa zvirokwazvo anoti: Iye anoita vatumwa vake mweya, nevaranda vake murazvo wemoto;
Hebrews 1:8 asi kuMwanakomana <transChange type="added">anoti</transChange>: Chigaro chenyu cheushe, Mwari, chiripo nekusingaperi-peri, tsvimbo yekururama itsvimbo yeushe hwenyu.
Hebrews 1:9 Makada kururama, ndokuvenga kuipa; naizvozvo Mwari, <transChange type="added">iye</transChange> Mwari wenyu, wakakuzodzai nemafuta emufaro kupfuura vamwe venyu.
Hebrews 1:10 Uye <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Imwi Ishe, pakutanga makateya nheyo dzenyika, nematenga mabasa emaoko enyu;
Hebrews 1:11 izvo zvichaparara, asi imwi mucharamba muripo; uye zvese zvichasakara senguvo;
Hebrews 1:12 uye sechifukidzo muchazvipeta, uye zvichashandurwa; asi imwi makangodaro, nemakore enyu haangagumi.
Hebrews 1:13 Asi ndekune upi wevatumwa kwaakambotaura <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Gara kuruoko rwangu rwerudyi, kusvikira ndaita vavengi vako chitsiko chetsoka dzako?
Hebrews 1:14 Ko havasi vese mweya inoshumira yakatumwa kuzoshumira nekuda kwevachazodya nhaka yeruponeso here?  <chapter eID="Heb.1"/><div eID="gen1614" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1613" type="section"/>
Hebrews 2:0 <div sID="gen1615" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="Heb.2" sID="Heb.2"/>  <div sID="gen1616" type="x-p"/>
Hebrews 2:1 Nekuda kweizvozvi tinofanira kuchenjerera zvikuru kuzvinhu zva<transChange type="added">ta</transChange>kanzwa, zvimwe tingakukurwa.
Hebrews 2:2 Nokuti kana shoko rakataurwa nevatumwa rakange rakasimba, uye kudarika kwese nekusateerera kwakagamuchira kutsiva kwakarurama,
Hebrews 2:3 isu tichapukunyuka sei kana tisina hanya neruponeso rukuru rwakadai? Irwo pakutanga rwakataurwa naIshe, rukasimbiswa kwatiri naivo vakanzwa,
Hebrews 2:4 Mwari achi<transChange type="added">va</transChange>pupurirawo zvese nezviratidzo nezvishamiso, nemasimba akasiyana-siyana, nezvipo zveMweya Mutsvene, zvichienderana nechido chake. <div eID="gen1616" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1615" type="section"/>
Hebrews 2:5 Nokuti haana kuisa nyika inouya pasi pevatumwa, yatinotaura nezvayo.
Hebrews 2:6 Asi umwe pane imwe nzvimbo wakapupura achiti: Munhu chii, kuti mumurangarire? kana mwanakomana wemunhu, kuti muve nehanya naye?
Hebrews 2:7 Makamuderedza zvishoma kuvatumwa; makamushongedza korona nekubwinya nerukudzo, ndokumumisa pamusoro pemabasa emaoko enyu.
Hebrews 2:8 Zvinhu zvese makaisa pasi petsoka dzake. Nokuti pane izvozvi wakaisa zvese pasi pake, haana kusiya chinhu chisina kuiswa pasi pake. Asi ikozvino tigere kuona zvinhu zvese zvakaiswa pasi pake.
Hebrews 2:9 Asi tinoona Jesu, akaderedzwa zvishoma kuvatumwa, nekuda kwedambudziko rerufu, akashongedzwa korona nekubwinya nerukudzo, kuti iye nenyasha dzaMwari aravire rufu achiitira wese.
Hebrews 2:10 Nokuti zvakange zvakamufanira, iye zvinhu zvese <transChange type="added">zviripo</transChange> nekuda kwake, uye kubudikidza naye zvese <transChange type="added">zviripo</transChange>, pakuisa vanakomana vazhinji mukubwinya, apedzeredze mutungamiriri weruponeso rwavo kubudikidza nematambudziko.
Hebrews 2:11 Nokuti neano<transChange type="added">va</transChange>itisa vatsvene naivo vanoitwa vatsvene vese vakabva kune umwe; nemhaka iyi haanyadziswi kuvaidza hama,
Hebrews 2:12 achiti: Ndichaparidzira zita renyu kuhama dzangu, pakati pekereke ndichakuimbirai rumbidzo.
Hebrews 2:13 Uyezve: Ini ndichavimba naye. Uyezve: Tarirai ini nevana Mwari vaakandipa.
Hebrews 2:14 Naizvozvo sezvo vana vari vagovani venyama neropa, naiye pachake wakagovana navo izvozvi; kuti kubudikidza nerufu iye aparadze uyo ane simba rerufu, iye dhiabhorosi,
Hebrews 2:15 agosunungura avo vese kubudikidza nekutya rufu vaiva pasi peuranda upenyu hwese.
Hebrews 2:16 Nokuti zvirokwazvo haazvitoreri vatumwa, asi wakazvitorera mbeu yaAbhurahama.
Hebrews 2:17 Naizvozvo wakafanira pazvinhu zvese kufananidzwa nehama <transChange type="added">dzake</transChange>, kuti ave mupristi mukuru ane tsitsi nekutendeka pazvinhu zvaMwari, kuti aite muripo wezvivi zvevanhu.
Hebrews 2:18 Nokuti pane izvozvo iye amene wakatambudzika achiedzwa, anogona kubatsira vanoedzwa.  <chapter eID="Heb.2"/><div eID="gen1618" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1617" type="section"/>
Hebrews 3:0 <div sID="gen1619" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="Heb.3" sID="Heb.3"/>  <div sID="gen1620" type="x-p"/>
Hebrews 3:1 Naizvozvo, hama tsvene, vagovani vekudanwa kwekudenga, rangarirai muapositori nemupristi mukuru wekupupura kwedu, <transChange type="added">iye</transChange> Kristu Jesu,
Hebrews 3:2 wakatendeka kuna iye wakamugadza, saMozisiwo muimba yake yese.
Hebrews 3:3 Nokuti uyu wakanzi wakafanira rukudzo kupfuura Mozisi, sezvo anovaka imba ane rukudzo kuipfuura.
Hebrews 3:4 Nokuti imba imwe neimwe inovakwa neumwe; asi anovaka zvese <transChange type="added">ndi</transChange>Mwari.
Hebrews 3:5 Zvino Mozisi zvirokwazvo <transChange type="added">wakanga</transChange> akatendeka muimba yake yese semuranda, kuti huve uchapupu hwezvinhu zvaizotaurwa;
Hebrews 3:6 asi Kristu seMwanakomana pamusoro peimba yake; imba yake yatiri isu, kana chete tikabatisisa kushinga nekuzvirumbidza kwetariro kusvika pakuguma.
Hebrews 3:7 Naizvozvo sezvinotaura Mweya Mutsvene <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Nhasi kana muchinzwa inzwi rake,
Hebrews 3:8 musaomesa moyo yenyu, sepakumukira, nezuva rekuedzwa murenje,
Hebrews 3:9 madzibaba enyu paakandiedza, vachindinzvera, ndokuona mabasa angu makore makumi mana.
Hebrews 3:10 Naizvozvo ndakatsamwiswa nezera iro, ndokuti: Vanogara vachitsauka pamoyo; uye ava havana kuziva nzira dzangu;
Hebrews 3:11 naizvozvo ndakapika pakutsamwa kwangu, <transChange type="added">ndikati</transChange>: Havangatongopindi pazororo rangu.
Hebrews 3:12 Chenjererai, hama, kuti kusava nemoyo wakashata wekusatenda pakati peumwe neumwe wenyu, pakutsauka kubva kuna Mwari mupenyu;
Hebrews 3:13 asi kurudziranai pazuva nezuva, kuchanzi nhasi; kuti kurege kuva neumwe wenyu anoomeswa nekunyengera kwechivi;
Hebrews 3:14 nokuti tava vagovani vaKristu, kana chete tichibatisisa kuvamba kwechivimbo kusvikira pakuguma;
Hebrews 3:15 kuchanzi: Nhasi kana muchinzwa inzwi rake, musaomesa moyo yenyu, sepakumukira.
Hebrews 3:16 Nokuti vamwe vakati vanzwa vakamukira, asi havasi vese vakabva Egipita kubudikidza naMozisi.
Hebrews 3:17 Asi wakatsamwiswa nani makore makumi mana? Havasi ivo vakatadza here, vane mitumbi yakawira murenje?
Hebrews 3:18 Uye ndivana ani vaakapikira kuti havangapindi pazororo rake, kunze kweavo vasina kutenda?
Hebrews 3:19 Zvino tinoona kuti vakange vasingagoni kupinda nekuda kwekusatenda.  <chapter eID="Heb.3"/><div eID="gen1620" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1619" type="section"/>
Hebrews 4:0 <div sID="gen1621" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="Heb.4" sID="Heb.4"/>  <div sID="gen1622" type="x-p"/>
Hebrews 4:1 Naizvozvo ngatitye zvimwe chivimbiso chekupinda muzororo rake chichiripo umwe wenyu aonekwe achitaira kuchisvikira.
Hebrews 4:2 Nokuti nesuwo takaparidzirwa evhangeri, sekwavariwo; asi shoko ravakanzwa harina kuvabatsira, sezvo risina kuvhenganiswa nerutendo kune avo vakanzwa.
Hebrews 4:3 Nokuti isu vakatenda tinopinda pazororo, sezvaakareva <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Sezvo ndakapika pakutsamwa kwangu <transChange type="added">ndikati</transChange>: Havangatongopindi muzororo rangu; kunyange mabasa akange apedzwa kubva pakuvambwa kwenyika.
Hebrews 4:4 Nokuti wakataura pane imwe nzvimbo pamusoro pe<transChange type="added">zuva</transChange> rechinomwe sezvizvi: Mwariwo wakazorora nezuva rechinomwe pamabasa ake ese;
Hebrews 4:5 nepanozve: Havangatongopindi muzororo rangu.
Hebrews 4:6 Naizvozvo zvazvichipo kuti vamwe vachapinda mariri, uye vakatanga kuparidzirwa evhangeri havana kupinda nekusateerera,
Hebrews 4:7 anogurazve rimwe zuva, <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Nhasi, achitaura kubudikidza naDhavhidhi, nguva huru yakadai yapfuura, sezvakwakataurwa, <transChange type="added">kuchinzi:</transChange> Nhasi kana muchinzwa inzwi rake, musaomesa moyo yenyu.
Hebrews 4:8 Nokuti dai Joshua akange avapa zororo, haazaizoreva pashure peizvi pamusoro perimwe zuva.
Hebrews 4:9 Naizvozvo rasarirwa vanhu vaMwari zororo resabata.
Hebrews 4:10 Nokuti wakapinda muzororo rake iyewo wakazorora pamabasa ake, saMwari pane ake.
Hebrews 4:11 Naizvozvo ngatishingairire kupinda muzororo iroro, kuti kusava neanowira mumuenzaniso iwoyo wekusateerera.
Hebrews 4:12 Nokuti shoko raMwari ibenyu, uye rine simba, uye rinopinza kukunda munondo unocheka kumativi maviri, uye rinobaya kusvikira panoparadzana moyo nemweya, nepemafundo nemongo; uye mutongi wendangariro nezvinangwa zvemoyo.
Hebrews 4:13 Hakunawo chisikwa chisingaratidziki pamberi pake; asi zvinhu zvese zvakashama uye zvakazarurirwa meso aiye watinozvidavirira kwaari. <div eID="gen1622" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1621" type="section"/>
Hebrews 4:14 Naizvozvo zvatine mupristi mukuru kwazvo, wakapfuurira kumatenga, Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari, ngatibatisise kupupura <transChange type="added">kwedu</transChange>.
Hebrews 4:15 Nokuti hatina mupristi mukuru asingagoni kunzwiswa tsitsi neutera hwedu, asi wakaedzwa pazvinhu zvese se<transChange type="added">su,</transChange> asina chivi.
Hebrews 4:16 Naizvozvo ngatiswederei nekushinga kuchigaro cheushe chenyasha, kuti tigamuchire tsitsi, tiwane nyasha, tibatsirwe panguva yakafanira.  <chapter eID="Heb.4"/>
Hebrews 5:0 <chapter n="5" osisID="Heb.5" sID="Heb.5"/>
Hebrews 5:1 Nokuti mupristi mukuru umwe neumwe, wakatorwa kubva kuvanhu, anogadzirwa vanhu pazvinhu zvaMwari, kuti abaire zvese zvipo nezvibairo nekuda kwezvivi;
Hebrews 5:2 iye anogona kuva nemoyo munyoro pane vasingazivi nevakatsauka, sezvo naiye akakomberedzwa neutera.
Hebrews 5:3 Uye nekuda kwaizvozvi anofanira kubaira zvivi, se<transChange type="added">zvaanobaira</transChange> zvevanhu, zvakadaro nekwaari.
Hebrews 5:4 Zvino hakuna munhu angazvitorera rukudzo uru, asi uyo wakadanwa naMwari, saAroniwo.
Hebrews 5:5 Saizvozvo Kristuwo haana kuzvikudza iye kuva mupristi mukuru, asi uyo wakati kwaari: Ndiwe Mwanakomana wangu, nhasi ndakubereka.
Hebrews 5:6 Sepamwewo anoti: Ndiwe mupristi nekusingaperi kubva kurudzi rwaMerikizedheki.
Hebrews 5:7 Iye pamazuva enyama yake, abaira minyengetero nemikumbiro nekuchema kukuru nemisodzi kuna iye waigona kumuponesa kubva parufu, uye akanzwikwa nekuda kwekutya Mwari,
Hebrews 5:8 kunyange aiva Mwanakomana, wakadzidza kuteerera kubva pazvinhu zvaakatambudzika,
Hebrews 5:9 akatiwo aitwa wakaperedzerwa, akava muvambi weruponeso rwusingaperi kune vese vanomuteerera;
Hebrews 5:10 anzi naMwari mupristi mukuru kubva kurudzi rwaMerikizedheki. <div eID="gen1624" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1623" type="section"/>
Hebrews 5:11 Watine zvizhinji zvatingataura pamusoro pake zvinoremawo kududzira, zvamakagomara pakunzwa.
Hebrews 5:12 Nokuti apo pamaifanira kuva vadzidzisi nekuda kwenguva, makashaiwazve kuti kuve neanokudzidzisai kuti zvimiso zvekutanga zvemashoko aMwari zvii, uye mava vanoda mukaka, uye kwete kudya kukukutu.
Hebrews 5:13 Nokuti ani nani anodya mukaka haana unyanzvi mushoko rekururama; nokuti mucheche.
Hebrews 5:14 Asi kudya kukukutu ndekwevakura zvakazara, ivo nekurovedzwa vakadzidzisa pfungwa kuparadzanisa zvese zvakanaka nezvakaipa. <chapter eID="Heb.5"/>
Hebrews 6:0 <chapter n="6" osisID="Heb.6" sID="Heb.6"/>
Hebrews 6:1 Naizvozvo, tichisiya zvekutanga zvedzidziso yaKristu, ngatipfuurire mukupedzeredza, tisingaisizve nheyo yekutendeuka kubva pamabasa akafa, neyekutenda kuna Mwari,
Hebrews 6:2 yedzidziso yebhabhatidzo, neyekuisa maoko, neyekumuka kwevakafa, neyekutonga kwekusingaperi.
Hebrews 6:3 Uye izvi tichaita, kwega kana Mwari achitendera.
Hebrews 6:4 Nokuti hazvigoneki kuti vakambovhenekerwa, vakaravira chipo chekudenga, ndokuva vagovani veMweya Mutsvene,
Hebrews 6:5 vakaravira shoko rakanaka raMwari, nemasimba enyika inouya,
Hebrews 6:6 ndokutsauka <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange><transChange type="added">va</transChange>vavandudzirezve mukutendeuka, zvavanozvirovererazve pamuchinjikwa Mwanakomana waMwari, vachi<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>nyadzisa pachena.
Hebrews 6:7 Nokuti nyika inonwa mvura inogarouya pamusoro payo, ndokubereka miriwo yakafanira avo vanoirimawo, inowana ropafadzo kubva kuna Mwari;
Hebrews 6:8 asi iyo inobereka minzwa nerukato, inorambwa uye yava pedo nekutukwa; kuguma kwayo kuri mukupiswa.
Hebrews 6:9 Asi tine chokwadi pamusoro penyu chezvinhu zviri nani, vadiwa, uye zvinhu zvine ruponeso, kunyange tichitaura sezvizvi;
Hebrews 6:10 nokuti Mwari haasi asakarurama kuti akanganwe basa renyu nebasa rakarema rerudo rwamakaratidza kuzita rake, pamakashumira vatsvene uye mu<transChange type="added">chiri</transChange> kushumira.
Hebrews 6:11 Zvino tinoshuva kuti umwe neumwe wenyu aratidze kushingaira kwakadaro kuve kuvimbiswa kwakakwana kwetariro pakuguma.
Hebrews 6:12 Kuti murege kuva simbe, asi vateveri veavo vanodya nhaka yezvivimbiso kubudikidza nerutendo nemoyo murefu.
Hebrews 6:13 Nokuti Mwari paakavimbisa Abhurahama, nokuti wakange asina waka<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>darika waangapika naye, wakapika naiye pachake,
Hebrews 6:14 achiti: Zvirokwazvo kuropafadza ndichakuropafadza, nekuwanza ndichakuwanza.
Hebrews 6:15 Saizvozvowo, wakati atsungirira nemoyo murefu akawana chivimbiso.
Hebrews 6:16 Nokuti vanhu zvirokwazvo vanopika nemukuru <transChange type="added">kwavari,</transChange> nemhiko yekusimbisa kuguma kwegakava rese kwavari.
Hebrews 6:17 Pakazoti Mwari achida zvikurusa kuratidza kuvadyi venhaka yechivimbiso kusashanduka kwezano rake, wakamiririra nemhiko,
Hebrews 6:18 kuti nezvinhu zviviri zvisingashanduki, pazviri pasingagoni kuti Mwari areve nhema, tive nekunyaradzwa kwakasimba, <transChange type="added">iyesu</transChange> takatizira kunovanda kuti tibatirire kutariro yakaiswa pamberi <transChange type="added">pedu</transChange>;
Hebrews 6:19 yatinayo sechitsigiso chemweya chakatsiga uye chakasimba, inopinda kune zviri mukati mevheiri;
Hebrews 6:20 apo nhungamiri payakatipindira, <transChange type="added">iye</transChange> Jesu, wakaitwa mupristi mukuru nekusingaperi, kubva kurudzi rwaMerikizedheki.  <chapter eID="Heb.6"/><div eID="gen1626" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1625" type="section"/>
Hebrews 7:0 <div sID="gen1627" type="section"/> <chapter n="7" osisID="Heb.7" sID="Heb.7"/>  <div sID="gen1628" type="x-p"/>
Hebrews 7:1 Nokuti Merikizedheki uyu, mambo weSaremi, mupristi waMwari Wekumusoro-soro, wakasangana naAbhurahama achidzoka kubva kunouraya madzimambo, ndokumuropafadza,
Hebrews 7:2 Abhurahama wakamugovera chegumi chezvese; iye pakutanga ari nekuturikirwa mambo wekururama, uye shure kweizvozvo mambo weSaremiwo, ndokuti mambo werugare;
Hebrews 7:3 asina baba, asina mai, asina dzinza, asina mavambo amazuva, kana kuguma kweupenyu, asi wakafananidzwa neMwanakomana waMwari, anogara ari mupristi nekusingaperi.
Hebrews 7:4 Zvino rangarirai kuti mukuru sei uyu, teteguru Abhurahama vaakapawo chegumi chezvakapambiwa.
Hebrews 7:5 Zvino zvirokwazvo avo vanobva kuvanakomana VaRevhi vakagamuchira basa reupristi vane murairo wekutora chegumi kuvanhu zvichienderana nemurairo, ndiko kuti kuhama dzavo, kunyange vakabva muchiuno chaAbhurahama;
Hebrews 7:6 asi iye dzinza rake risina kuverengerwa kwavari wakagamuchira chegumi kuna Abhurahama, akamuropafadza iye wakange ane zvivimbiso.
Hebrews 7:7 Zvino pasina kupikisa kwese, mudiki unoropafadzwa nemukuru.
Hebrews 7:8 Uye pano vanhu vanofa vanogamuchira zvegumi; asi apo, anopupurirwa kuti mupenyu <transChange type="added">ndiye anogamuchira</transChange>.
Hebrews 7:9 Zvino, kunganzi, kubudikidza naAbhurahama Revhiwo anogamuchira zvegumi wakapa zvegumi;
Hebrews 7:10 nokuti wakange achiri muchiuno chababa, apo Merikizedheki akamuchingamidza.
Hebrews 7:11 Naizvozvo, kana kupedzeredzwa kwaivapo neupristi hwaRevhi (nokuti pasi pahwo vanhu rwakapiwa murairo), ko umwe mupristi waifanira kuzomukirei kubva kurudzi rwaMerikizedheki, uye asingaidzwi werudzi rwaAroni?
Hebrews 7:12 Nokuti kana upristi huchishandurwa, zvinofanirawo kuti kuve neshanduko yemurairo.
Hebrews 7:13 Nokuti iye anorehwa zvinhu izvi pamusoro pake ndewerumwe rudzi, rwakange rusina munhu wakashumira paaritari.
Hebrews 7:14 Nokuti zviri pachena kuti Ishe wedu wakamuka kuna Judha, rudzi Mozisi rwaasina kumbotaura pamusoro parwo maererano neupristi.
Hebrews 7:15 Uye zvichiri pachena kwazvo kwazvo, kana kuchimuka umwe mupristi sewakatodzana naMerikizedheki,
Hebrews 7:16 asina kuitwa nenzira yemurairo wekuraira kwenyama, asi nenzira yesimba reupenyu husingaparadziki.
Hebrews 7:17 Nokuti anopupura achiti: Iwe uri mupristi nekusingaperi kubva kurudzi rwaMerikizedheki.
Hebrews 7:18 Nokuti kuparadzwa kwemurairo wekutanga kwakavapo nekuda kweutera nekusabatsira kwawo;
Hebrews 7:19 nokuti murairo hauna kupedzeredza chinhu, asi kutangiswa kwetariro iri nani <transChange type="added">kwakazviita</transChange>, yatinoswedera nayo kuna Mwari.
Hebrews 7:20 Uye zvaasina <transChange type="added">kuitwa</transChange> pasina mhiko,
Hebrews 7:21 (nokuti ivo vakava vapristi pasina mhiko, asi iye nemhiko, kubudikidza naiye wakati kwaari: Ishe wakapika uye haangazvidembi <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Iwe uri mupristi nekusingaperi kubva kurudzi rwaMerikizedheki);
Hebrews 7:22 saizvozvo Jesu wakaitwa rubatso rwesungano inopfuura pakunaka.
Hebrews 7:23 Naivo zvirokwazvo vaiva vapristi vazhinji, nokuti vakadziviswa kugara nekuda kwerufu.
Hebrews 7:24 Asi uyu, nokuti anogara nekusingaperi ane upristi husingapfuuri.
Hebrews 7:25 Naizvozvo ane simbawo rekuponesa zvakakwana avo vanouya kuna Mwari nemaari, zvaanoraramira kuvareverera nekusingaperi.
Hebrews 7:26 Nokuti mupristi mukuru wakadaro ndiye wakatifanira, mutsvene, asina chakaipa, asina kusvibiswa, wakaparadzaniswa nevatadzi, wakakwidzwa kupfuura matenga;
Hebrews 7:27 asingafaniri zuva nezuva, sevaya vapristi vakuru, kubaira chibairo pakutanga pamusoro pezvivi zvake pachake, pashure zvevanhu; nokuti wakaita izvozvi kamwe chete, paakazvibaira iye.
Hebrews 7:28 Nokuti murairo unogadza vanhu kuva vapristi vakuru, vane utera; asi shoko remhiko, rakatevera murairo, <transChange type="added">rinogadza</transChange> Mwanakomana, wakakwana nekusingaperi.  <chapter eID="Heb.7"/><div eID="gen1628" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1627" type="section"/>
Hebrews 8:0 <div sID="gen1629" type="section"/> <chapter n="8" osisID="Heb.8" sID="Heb.8"/>  <div sID="gen1630" type="x-p"/>
Hebrews 8:1 Zvino shoko guru pazvinhu zvatataura <transChange type="added">ndirori</transChange>: Tine mupristi mukuru wakadai wakagara kuruoko rwerudyi rwechigaro cheushe cheMukuru kumatenga,
Hebrews 8:2 mushumiri wenzvimbo tsvene, newetabhenakeri yechokwadi Ishe yaakadzika, kwete munhu.
Hebrews 8:3 Nokuti mupristi mukuru umwe neumwe wakagadzirwa kubaira zvipo nezvibairo; naizvozvo zvakafanira kuti naye ave nechimwe chaangabaira.
Hebrews 8:4 Nokuti kana aiva panyika, angadai asina kutombova mupristi, vapristi zvavaripo, vanobaira zvipo zvinoenderana nemurairo;
Hebrews 8:5 vanoshumira zviratidzo nemumvuri wezvinhu zvekudenga, Mozisi sezvaakarairwa naMwari oda kugadzira tabhenakeri; nokuti wakati: Chenjera kuti uite zvese zvichienderana nemufananidzo wawakaratidzwa mugomo.
Hebrews 8:6 Asi ikozvino wakawana ushumiri hwakanyanyisa kunaka, sezvaariwo murevereri wesungano inopfuura pakunaka, yakasimbiswa pazvivimbiso zvinopfuura pakunaka.
Hebrews 8:7 Nokuti dai iya yekutanga yakange isina chaingapomerwa, dai pasina nzvimbo yakatsvakirwa yechipiri.
Hebrews 8:8 Nokuti achivapa mhosva, anoti: Tarira, mazuva anouya, anotaura Ishe, zvino ndichaita sungano itsva neimba yaIsraeri uye neimba yaJudha.
Hebrews 8:9 Kwete zvichienderana nesungano yandakaita nemadzibaba avo, pazuva randakabata ruoko rwavo kuti ndivabudise munyika yeEgipita; nokuti havana kurambira musungano yangu, neni ndikasava nehanya navo, anoreva Ishe.
Hebrews 8:10 Nokuti iyi isungano yandichasungana nayo neimba yaIsraeri shure kwemazuva iwayo, anotaura Ishe; ndichaisa mirairo yangu mumurangariro wavo, nemuhana dzavo ndichainyora; uye ndichava kwavari Mwari, ivo vachavawo kwandiri vanhu;
Hebrews 8:11 uye havangatongozodzidzisi umwe neumwe umwe wake, neumwe neumwe hama yake, achiti: Ziva Ishe; nokuti vese vachandiziva, kubva kumudiki wavo kusvikira kumukuru wavo.
Hebrews 8:12 Nokuti ndichava netsitsi pakusarurama kwavo, nezvivi zvavo nezvakaipa zvavo handichatongozorangariri.
Hebrews 8:13 Pakuti: <transChange type="added">Sungano</transChange> itsva, yakasakadza yekutanga. Zvino chosakarawo chova chakare, chava pedo kurova.  <chapter eID="Heb.8"/><div eID="gen1630" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1629" type="section"/>
Hebrews 9:0 <div sID="gen1631" type="section"/> <chapter n="9" osisID="Heb.9" sID="Heb.9"/>  <div sID="gen1632" type="x-p"/>
Hebrews 9:1 Naizvozvowo zvirokwazvo <transChange type="added">sungano</transChange> yekutanga yakange ine zviga zvekushumira Mwari, nenzvimbo tsvene yenyika.
Hebrews 9:2 Nokuti tabhenakeri yakagadzirwa, yekutanga maiva nechigadziko chemwenje netafura nezvingwa zvekuratidza, ndiyo inonzi nzvimbo tsvene.
Hebrews 9:3 Zvino seri kwevheiri rechipiri kwakange kune tabhenakeri yainzi nzvimbo tsvene yedzitsvene,
Hebrews 9:4 yakange ine mudziyo wegoridhe wezvipfungaidzo zvinonhuhwira, neareka yesungano yakange yakanamwa nhivi dzese negoridhe, maiva nehari yegoridhe yakange ine mana, netsvimbo yaAroni yakatunga, nemaheandefa esungano;
Hebrews 9:5 nepamusoro payo makerubhi ekubwinya, akadzikatira nzvimbo yetsitsi; zvatisingarondedzeri tichiita chimwe chimwe ikozvino.
Hebrews 9:6 Zvinhu izvi zvakati zvagadzirwa saizvozvo, vapristi vaipinda nguva dzese mutabhenakeri yekutanga, vachipedzeredza mabasa ekushumira Mwari;
Hebrews 9:7 asi kune yechipiri mupristi mukuru <transChange type="added">waipinda</transChange> ari ega kamwe pagore, kwete asina ropa, raaizvibairira iye pachake nezvitadzo zvevanhu;
Hebrews 9:8 Mweya Mutsvene achiratidza ichi, kuti nzira yenzvimbo tsvene yakange isati yataridzwa, tabhenakeri yekutanga ichimire;
Hebrews 9:9 yakange iri mufananidzo wenguva iyoyo, paibairwa zvese zvipo nezvibairo, zvisingagoni kupedzeredza maererano nehana iye anoshumira;
Hebrews 9:10 zvinongova zvekudya nezvinwiwa nekushamba kwakasiyana-siyana nezviga zvenyama, zvakaiswa pamusoro <transChange type="added">pavo</transChange> kusvikira panguva yekururamisa.
Hebrews 9:11 Asi Kristu wakati asvika ari mupristi mukuru wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinozouya, kubudikidza netabhenakeri yakapfuura pakukura nepakuperedzerwa, isina kuitwa nemaoko, ndiko kuti isati iri yekusikwa kuno,
Hebrews 9:12 uye kwete neropa rembudzi nemhuru, asi neropa rake pachake wakapinda kamwe panzvimbo tsvene, awana rudzikunuro rwusingaperi.
Hebrews 9:13 Nokuti kana ropa renzombe nerembudzi, nemadota etsiru zvichisasa pavakasvibiswa, zvichi<transChange type="added">va</transChange>ita vatsvene kusvika pakuchenurwa panyama,
Hebrews 9:14 zvikuru sei ropa raKristu, iye kubudikidza neMweya wekusingaperi wakazvibaira kuna Mwari asina gwapa, richanatsa hana dzenyu pamabasa akafa, pakushumira Mwari mupenyu?
Hebrews 9:15 Uye nemhaka iyi ndiye murevereri wesungano itsva, kuti sezvo rufu rwakasvika pakudzikunurwa kwekudarika pasungano yekutanga, avo vakadanwa vagogamuchira chivimbiso chenhaka isingaperi.
Hebrews 9:16 Nokuti pane rugwaro rwenhaka, panofanira kukumikidzwa rufu rwaiye wakaita rugwaro rwenhaka.
Hebrews 9:17 Nokuti rugwaro rwenhaka rwune simba kune vakafa, sezvo rwusingatongovi nesimba kana wakaita rugwaro rwenhaka achiri mupenyu.
Hebrews 9:18 Naizvozvo kunyange yekutanga haina kugadzwa pasina ropa.
Hebrews 9:19 Nokuti zviga zvese zvakati zvataurwa kuvanhu vese naMozisi zvichienderana nemurairo, wakatora ropa remhuru nembudzi, pamwe nemvura nemakushe matsvuku, nehisopi*, akasasa zvese bhuku pacharo nevanhu vese,
Hebrews 9:20 achiti: Iri iropa resungano Mwari yaakakurairai.
Hebrews 9:21 Saizvozvowo wakasasa neropa zvese tabhenakeri nemidziyo yese yekushumira.
Hebrews 9:22 Zvino zvinhu zvinenge zvese maererano nemurairo zvinonatswa neropa, uye pasina kuteurwa kweropa hapana kanganwiro.
Hebrews 9:23 Naizvozvo zvakafanira kuti mifananidzo yezvinhu zviri kumatenga inatswe nezvizvi, asi zvinhu zvekudenga pachazvo <transChange type="added">zvinatswe</transChange> nezvibairo zvakanaka kupfuura izvi.
Hebrews 9:24 Nokuti Kristu haana kupinda pa<transChange type="added">nzvimbo</transChange> tsvene yakaitwa nemaoko, iri mifananidzo yezvechokwadi, asi <transChange type="added">wakapinda</transChange> kudenga pachake, kuti ikozvino aonekerwe isu pachiso chaMwari;
Hebrews 9:25 uye kwete kuti azvibaire kazhinji, semupristi mukuru anopinda panzvimbo tsvene gore rimwe nerimwe neropa rezvimwe;
Hebrews 9:26 dai zvakange zvakadaro, waifanira kutambura kazhinji kubva pakuvambwa kwenyika; asi ikozvino wakaonekwa kamwe pakupedzisira kwenguva kuti abvise chivi kubudikidza nechibairo chake amene.
Hebrews 9:27 Uye sezvazvakatemerwa vanhu kuti vafe kamwe, uye shure kwezvizvi kutongwa;
Hebrews 9:28 saizvozvowo Kristu, abairwa kamwe kuti atakure zvivi zvevazvinji, achazoonekwa rwechipiri asina chivi neavo vanomutarira, rwuve ruponeso.  <chapter eID="Heb.9"/><div eID="gen1632" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1631" type="section"/>
Hebrews 10:0 <div sID="gen1633" type="section"/> <chapter n="10" osisID="Heb.10" sID="Heb.10"/>  <div sID="gen1634" type="x-p"/>
Hebrews 10:1 Nokuti murairo zvaune mumvuri wezvinhu zvakanaka zvinouya, usiri mufananidzo wemene wezvinhu <transChange type="added">izvozvo</transChange>, haungatongogoni <transChange type="added">kubudikidza</transChange> nezvibairo izvozvo zvavanoramba vachibaira gore rimwe nerimwe kupedzeredza avo vanoswedera.
Hebrews 10:2 Dai zvakange zvakadaro zvingadai zvisina kuguma kubairwa here? Nokuti vanamati vangadai vasingachazivizve zvivi, vanatswa kamwe chete.
Hebrews 10:3 Asi ku<transChange type="added">zvibairo</transChange> izvozvo kune kurangarirwa kwezvivi gore rimwe nerimwe;
Hebrews 10:4 nokuti hazvigoni kuti ropa renzombe nerembudzi ribvise zvivi.
Hebrews 10:5 Naizvozvo paanosvika panyika anoti: Chibairo nechipo hamuna kuzvida, asi makandigadzirira muviri;
Hebrews 10:6 zvibairo zvinopiswa nezvechivi hamuna kuzvifarira;
Hebrews 10:7 ipapo ndikati: Tarirai ndinouya (murugwaro rwakapetwa makanyorwa pamusoro pangu) kuita chido chenyu, Mwari.
Hebrews 10:8 Pakutanga achiti: Zvibairo nezvipiriso nezvibairo zvinopiswa <transChange type="added">nezvibairo</transChange> zvechivi hamuna kuzvida kana kufadzwa <transChange type="added">nazvo,</transChange> (izvo zvinobairwa sezvinoenderana nemurairo),
Hebrews 10:9 ndokuzoti: Tarira, ndinouya kuzoita chido chenyu, Mwari. Anobvisa chekutanga, kuti amise chechipiri.
Hebrews 10:10 Pachido ichi takaitwa vatsvene kubudikidza nechibairo chemuviri waJesu Kristu kamwe.
Hebrews 10:11 Uye mupristi umwe neumwe wakamira zuva rimwe nerimwe achishumira, nekubaira kazhinji zvibairo izvozvo zvisingatongogoni kubvisa zvivi;
Hebrews 10:12 asi iye wakati abaira chibairo chimwe nekuda kwezvivi nekusingaperi, akagara pasi kuruoko rwerudyi rwaMwari,
Hebrews 10:13 kubva ikozvino anotarisira kusvikira vavengi vake vaitwa chitsiko chetsoka dzake.
Hebrews 10:14 Nokuti nechibairo chimwe chete wakapedzeredza nekusingaperi avo vanoitwa vatsvene.
Hebrews 10:15 NeMweya Mutsvenewo anotipupurira; nokuti shure kwekuti ataura pakutanga <transChange type="added">anoti</transChange>:
Hebrews 10:16 Iyi isungano yandichaita navo shure kwemazuva iwayo, ndizvo zvinotaura Ishe, ndichaisa mirairo yangu mumoyo yavo, uye ndichainyora mufungwa dzavo.
Hebrews 10:17 Nezvivi zvavo nekuipa kwavo handichatongorangaririzve.
Hebrews 10:18 Zvino pane kanganwiro yeizvi, hapachina chibairo chechivi. <div eID="gen1634" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1633" type="section"/>
Hebrews 10:19 Naizvozvo, hama, tine ushingi hwekupinda panzvimbo tsvene neropa raJesu,
Hebrews 10:20 nenzira itsva mhenyu, yaakatizarurira kubudikidza nemuvheiri, ndiyo nyama yake;
Hebrews 10:21 uye <transChange type="added">tine</transChange> mupristi mukuru pamusoro peimba yaMwari,
Hebrews 10:22 ngatiswedere nemoyo wechokwadi muchivimbo chakazara cherutendo, moyo yasaswa kubva pahana yakaipa, nemuviri wakashambidzwa nemvura yakachena.
Hebrews 10:23 Ngatibatisise kupupura kwetariro yedu, tisingazungunuki, nokuti iye wakavimbisa wakatendeka;
Hebrews 10:24 uye ngatirangariranei pakumutsa rudo uye mabasa akanaka,
Hebrews 10:25 tisingasii kuungana kwedu, setsika yevamwe, asi tichikurudzira<transChange type="added">na</transChange>; zvikuru kwazvowo sezvamunoona zuva richiswedera. <div eID="gen1636" type="x-p"/>
Hebrews 10:26 Nokuti kana tichitadza maune mushure mekunge tagamuchira ruzivo rwechokwadi, hakuchina kusara chibairo pamusoro pezvivi,
Hebrews 10:27 asi kumwe kumirira kunotyisa kwekutongwa, nehasha dzemoto dzichapedza vapikisi.
Hebrews 10:28 Munhu anoramba murairo waMozisi anofa pasina tsitsi nezvapupu zviviri kana zvitatu;
Hebrews 10:29 munofunga kuti achanzi wakafanira kurangwa zvinorwadza sei wakatsikira pasi Mwanakomana waMwari, uye akatora ropa resungano raakaitwa mutsvene naro serisiri dzvene, uye akazvidza Mweya wenyasha?
Hebrews 10:30 Nokuti tinomuziva iye wakati: Kutsiva ndekwangu, ini ndicharipira, anotaura Ishe. Uyezve <transChange type="added">anoti</transChange>: Ishe achatonga vanhu vake.
Hebrews 10:31 Zvinotyisa kuwira mumaoko aMwari mupenyu. <div eID="gen1637" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1635" type="section"/>
Hebrews 10:32 Asi rangarirai mazuva akare, amakati mavhenekerwa maari mukatsunga pakurwa kukuru kwematambudziko;
Hebrews 10:33 pamwe, pamakaitwa chiokero zvese nekunyombwa nematambudziko; pamwewo pamakagovana naivo vakaitirwa zvakadaro.
Hebrews 10:34 Nokuti nemwi makanzwira tsitsi zvisungo zvangu, makagamuchira nemufaro kupambiwa kwenhumbi dzenyu, muchiziva mukati menyu kuti imwi mune fuma yakapfuura nekunaka, uye inogara iripo kumatenga.
Hebrews 10:35 Naizvozvo regai kurasa kushinga kwenyu, kune mubairo mukuru.
Hebrews 10:36 Nokuti munofanira kuva nekutsungirira, zvekuti kana maita chido chaMwari, mugamuchire chivimbiso.
Hebrews 10:37 Nokuti pachine kanguva kadiki-diki, anouya achauya, uye haanganonoki.
Hebrews 10:38 Asi wakarurama achararama nerutendo; zvino kana akadzokera shure, mweya wangu haungafari naye.
Hebrews 10:39 Zvino isu hatisi veavo vanodzokera shure kukuparadzwa; asi veavo vanotenda kukuponeswa kwemweya. <chapter eID="Heb.10"/><div eID="gen1639" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1638" type="section"/>
Hebrews 11:0 <div sID="gen1640" type="section"/> <chapter n="11" osisID="Heb.11" sID="Heb.11"/>  <div sID="gen1641" type="x-p"/>
Hebrews 11:1 Zvino rutendo ndirwo rusimbiso rwezvinotarisirwa, umbowo hwezvinhu zvisingaonekwi.
Hebrews 11:2 Nokuti nairwo vanhu vekare vakapupurirwa.
Hebrews 11:3 Nerutendo tinonzwisisa kuti nyika dzakarongwa neshoko raMwari, zvekuti zvinhu zvinoonekwa hazvibvi kuzvinhu zvinoonekwa.
Hebrews 11:4 Nerutendo Abheri wakabaira kuna Mwari chibairo chakanakisisa kupfuura Kaini; chaakawana nacho uchapupu kuti wakange akarurama, Mwari achipupurira zvipo zvake; naicho kunyange akafa achiri kutaura.
Hebrews 11:5 Nerutendo Enoki wakabviswa kuti arege kuona rufu, uye haana kuwanikwa, nokuti Mwari wakange amubvisa; nokuti asati abviswa wakapupurirwa kuti wakange afadza Mwari;
Hebrews 11:6 asi kunze kwerutendo hazvigoni ku<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>fadza; nokuti anouya kuna Mwari anofanira kutenda kuti <transChange type="added">iye</transChange> aripo, uye mupi wemubairo wevanomutsvaka.
Hebrews 11:7 Nerutendo Nowa wakati ayambirwa naMwari pamusoro pezvinhu zvichigere kuonekwa, nekutya akagadzira areka yeruponeso rweimba yake; akapa nyika mhosva nayo, akava mudyi wenhaka wekururama zvichienderana nerutendo.
Hebrews 11:8 Nerutendo Abhurahama wakateerera adanwa kuti abude aende kunzvimbo yaakanzi achazoigamuchira ive nhaka, ndokubuda, asingazivi kwaanoenda.
Hebrews 11:9 Nerutendo wakagara semutorwa munyika yechivimbiso, senyika yeutorwa, achigara mumatende pamwe naIsaka naJakobho, vadyi venhaka yechivimbiso chimwecho pamwe naye;
Hebrews 11:10 nokuti wakange achitarisira guta rine nheyo, Mwari ari mhizha nemuvaki waro.
Hebrews 11:11 Nerutendo naSara pachake wakagamuchira simba rekugamuchira mbeu, akabereka apfuura nguva, nokuti wakati iye wavimbisa wakatendeka.
Hebrews 11:12 Naizvozvowo vakaberekwa neumwe, izviwo ndezvewakafa, vakaita senyeredzi dzekudenga pakuwanda, uye sejecha riri pamahombekombe egungwa risingaverengeki.
Hebrews 11:13 Iva vese vakafira murutendo, vasina kugamuchira zvivimbiso, asi vakazvionera kure, vakatendeswa, vaka<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>gamuchira, vakabvuma kuti vaeni nevapfuuri panyika.
Hebrews 11:14 Nokuti vanotaura zvinhu zvakadaro, vanoratidza kuti vanotsvaka nyika yekwavo.
Hebrews 11:15 Nokuti kana zvirokwazvo vaifunga zve<transChange type="added">nyika</transChange> iyo yavakabva kwairi, vangadai vakawana mukana wekudzokera.
Hebrews 11:16 Asi ikozvino vanoshuva iri nani, ndiyo yekudenga; naizvozvo Mwari haana nyadzi pamusoro pavo, kuti aidzwe Mwari wavo; nokuti wakavagadzirira guta.
Hebrews 11:17 Nerutendo Abhurahama paakaedzwa wakabaira Isaka, iyewo wakange agamuchira zvivimbiso akabaira mwana <transChange type="added">wake</transChange> wakaberekwa umwe wega,
Hebrews 11:18 kwakanzi kwaari: Muna Isaka mbeu yako ichatumidzwa;
Hebrews 11:19 wakaona kuti Mwari anogona kumutsa kunyange kubva kuvakafa; ndipapowo paakamugamuchira mumufananidzo.
Hebrews 11:20 Nerutendo Isaka wakaropafadza Jakobho naEsau pamusoro pezvinhu zvinouya.
Hebrews 11:21 Nerutendo Jakobho ava kufa wakaropafadza umwe neumwe wevanakomana vaJosefa, akanamata <transChange type="added">akasendama</transChange> pamusoro pemudonzvo wake.
Hebrews 11:22 Nerutendo Josefa ava kufa wakataura zvekubuda kwevana vaIsraeri, akaraira pamusoro pemafupa ake.
Hebrews 11:23 Nerutendo Mozisi aberekwa wakavanzwa mwedzi mitatu nevabereki vake, nokuti vakaona mwana akanaka; uye havana kutya murairo wamambo.
Hebrews 11:24 Nerutendo Mozisi akura wakaramba kunzi mwanakomana wemukunda waFarao,
Hebrews 11:25 akasarudza kupfuura izvozvo kuitirwa zvakaipa pamwe nevanhu vaMwari pane kuva mumufaro wechivi kwechinguva;
Hebrews 11:26 akati kutukwa kwaKristu ifuma huru pane zvakakosha zveEgipita; nokuti wakange akatarira kumubairo.
Hebrews 11:27 Nerutendo wakasiya Egipita, asingatyi kutsamwa kwamambo; nokuti wakatsungirira seanomuona uyo asingaonekwi.
Hebrews 11:28 Nerutendo wakachengetedza pasika nekusaswa kweropa, kuti anouraya matangwe arege kuvabata.
Hebrews 11:29 Nerutendo vakagura nemuGungwa Dzvuku sepakaoma; VaEgipita vachizviidza vakanyura.
Hebrews 11:30 Nerutendo masvingo eJeriko akawa, apoteredzwa kusvikira mazuva manomwe.
Hebrews 11:31 Nerutendo Rakabhi chifeve haana kuparara pamwe nevasina kutenda, agamuchira vashori nerugare.
Hebrews 11:32 Zvino ndichataurireizve? Nokuti ndichapererwa nenguva ndichirondedzera zvaGidhioni naBharaki naSamusoni naJefita naDhavhidhi naSamueri, nezvevaporofita;
Hebrews 11:33 avo nerutendo vakakunda ushe, vakaita kururama, vakawana zvivimbiso, vakadzivira miromo yeshumba,
Hebrews 11:34 vakadzima simba remoto, vakapukunyuka muromo wemunondo, vakava nesimba kubva pautera, vakasimba pakurwa, vakadzinga hondo dzemamwe marudzi.
Hebrews 11:35 Vakadzi vakagamuchira vakafa vavo vachibva pakumuka; vamwewo vakashungurudzwa, vasingagamuchiri kusunungurwa, kuti vawane kumuka kuri nani;
Hebrews 11:36 vamwewo vakaedzwa nekuitwa chiseko nekuzvamburwa, uye nezvisungo nejere;
Hebrews 11:37 vakatakwa nemabwe, vakatsemurwa nepakati, vakaedzwa, vakafa pakuuraya kwemunondo; vakadzungaira vakapfeka matehwe emakwai <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>matehwe embudzi; vari nhoronhondo, vachitambudzika, vachishungurudzwa,
Hebrews 11:38 (nyika haina kuvafanira) vachidzungaira mumagwenga nemakomo nemapako nemakomba enyika.
Hebrews 11:39 Neava vese, vapupurirwa zvakanaka kubudikidza nerutendo havana kugamuchira chivimbiso,
Hebrews 11:40 sezvo Mwari wakange atigadzirira chinhu chiri nani, kuti varege kupedzeredzwa pasina isu.  <chapter eID="Heb.11"/><div eID="gen1641" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1640" type="section"/>
Hebrews 12:0 <div sID="gen1642" type="section"/> <chapter n="12" osisID="Heb.12" sID="Heb.12"/>  <div sID="gen1643" type="x-p"/>
Hebrews 12:1 Naizvozvo nesu tine gore rezvapupu rakatikomberedza, ngatibvise mutoro wese nechivi chinonamatira nyore, ngatimhanye nemoyo murefu nhangemutange yatakaisirwa,
Hebrews 12:2 takatarira kuna Jesu, muvambi nemupedzeredzi werutendo, iye nekuda kwemufaro waakaisirwa, wakatsunga <transChange type="added">pa</transChange>muchinjikwa, achizvidza kunyadziswa, akagara kuruoko rwerudyi rwechigaro cheushe chaMwari.
Hebrews 12:3 Nokuti cherekedzai iye wakatsunga <transChange type="added">pa</transChange>gakava rakadai revatadzi vachimirisana naye, kuti murege kuneta, muchipera simba pamweya yenyu.
Hebrews 12:4 Muchigere kupikisa kusvikira muropa muchirwa nechivi;
Hebrews 12:5 uye makakanganwa kurudziro inokurukura kwamuri sekuvana <transChange type="added">ichiti</transChange>: Mwanakomana wangu, usazvidza kuranga kwaIshe, kana kupera simba kana uchitsiurwa naye.
Hebrews 12:6 Nokuti Ishe anoranga waanoda, nekushapura mwanakomana umwe neumwe waanogamuchira.
Hebrews 12:7 Kana muchitsunga <transChange type="added">pa</transChange>kurangwa, Mwari anokubatai sevanakomana; nokuti mwanakomana ndeupi baba wavasingarangi?
Hebrews 12:8 Asi kana musina kurangwa, pavanoitwa vagovani vese, naizvozvo muri vana veupombwe, uye kwete vanakomana.
Hebrews 12:9 Uyezve takambova nemadzibaba enyama yedu aidzora, uye tika<transChange type="added">va</transChange>kudza; ko, hatingazviisi zvikurusa pasi paBaba vemweya tigorarama here?
Hebrews 12:10 Nokuti ivo zvimwe vaka<transChange type="added">ti</transChange>ranga kwemazuva mashoma, semaonero avo; asi iye <transChange type="added">anotirangira</transChange> kubatsirwa, kuti <transChange type="added">ti</transChange>goverane utsvene hwake.
Hebrews 12:11 Zvino kuranga kwese kunoenda pakuvapo hakuratidzi sekwekufadza, asi kwekushungurudza; zvakadaro pashure kunobereka zvibereko zverugare zvakarurama kune vakarovedzwa mazviri.
Hebrews 12:12 Naizvozvo simbisai maoko akaremberera pasi nemabvi asina simba;
Hebrews 12:13 uye gadzirirai tsoka dzenyu nzira dzakarurama, kuti icho chinokamhina chirege kushodoka, asi panzvimbo yeizvozvo chiporeswe.
Hebrews 12:14 Tevererai rugare nevese, neutsvene, kunze kwezvizvi hakuna munhu achaona Ishe.
Hebrews 12:15 Muchichenjerera <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> kurege kuva nemunhu anokundikana panyasha dzaMwari; kuti zvimwe mudzi wekuvava urege kukura kuzopa dambudziko, uye nawo vazhinji vasvibiswe;
Hebrews 12:16 ngakurege kuva neumwe anova mhombwe kana asina hanya naMwari, saEsau, wakatengesa udangwe hwake nekudya kumwe.
Hebrews 12:17 Nokuti munoziva kuti pashurewo, oda kugara nhaka yekuropafadzwa, wakarambwa; nokuti haana kuwana nzvimbo yekutendeuka, kunyange akaitsvaka zvikuru nemisodzi. <div eID="gen1643" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1642" type="section"/>
Hebrews 12:18 Nokuti hamuna kuuya kugomo ringabatwa, nerinopfuta moto, uye kurima, nekusviba, nekudutu remhepo,
Hebrews 12:19 uye kurira kwehwamanda, nenzwi remashoko; iro ivo vaka<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>nzwa vakakumbira kuti shoko rirege kuchi<transChange type="added">taurwa</transChange> kwavari;
Hebrews 12:20 nokuti vakakonewa kutakura icho chakange charairwa, <transChange type="added">chekuti</transChange>: Kana kunyange mhuka ikabata gomo, ichatakwa nemabwe, kana kufurwa nemuseve;
Hebrews 12:21 uye, chakaonekwa chaityisa kudai, Mozisi wakati: Ndinovhunduka, ndinodedera.
Hebrews 12:22 Asi mauya kugomo reZiyoni, nekuguta raMwari mupenyu, kuJerusarema rekudenga, nekumazana evatumwa vasingaverengeki,
Hebrews 12:23 kuungano huru nekereke yematangwe akanyorwa kumatenga, nekuna Mwari mutongi wevese, nekumweya yevakarurama vakapereredzwa,
Hebrews 12:24 nekuna Jesu murevereri wesungano itsva, nekuropa rekusasa, rinotaura zvinhu zviri nani pane <transChange type="added">ra</transChange>Abhero.
Hebrews 12:25 Chenjerai kuti murege kuramba uyo anotaura. Nokuti kana vasina kupukunyuka ivo vakaramba iye wakataura panyika zvinobva kuna Mwari, zvikuru sei isu kana tichifuratira iye anobva kumatenga;
Hebrews 12:26 iye inzwi rake rakazungunusa nyika nguva iyo, asi ikozvino wakavimbisa, achiti: Kamwe chetezve ini ndichazungunusa kwete nyika chete, asi nedenga.
Hebrews 12:27 Uye izvi <transChange type="added">zvekuti:</transChange> Kamwe chetezve, zvinoratidza kutamiswa kwezvinhu zvinozununguka, sezvinhu zvakaitwa, kuti zvisingazungunuki zvigare.
Hebrews 12:28 Naizvozvo zvatinogamuchira ushe husingazununguswi, ngative nenyasha dzatingashumira nadzo Mwari zvinogamuchirika pamwe nekukudza nekutya Mwari.
Hebrews 12:29 Nokutiwo Mwari wedu moto unoparadza.  <chapter eID="Heb.12"/><div eID="gen1645" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1644" type="section"/>
Hebrews 13:0 <div sID="gen1646" type="section"/> <chapter n="13" osisID="Heb.13" sID="Heb.13"/>  <div sID="gen1647" type="x-p"/>
Hebrews 13:1 Rudo rweukama ngarugare.
Hebrews 13:2 Musakanganwa kugamuchira vaeni; nokuti mukudaro vamwe vakagamuchira vatumwa vasingazvizivi.
Hebrews 13:3 Rangarirai vasungwa, semakasungwa pamwe na<transChange type="added">vo</transChange>; vanoitirwa zvakaipa, sezvinonzi ndimwiwo muri pamuviri.
Hebrews 13:4 Wanano ngaikudzwe kune vese, nenhovo irege kusvibiswa; asi Mwari achatonga mhombwe nezvifeve.
Hebrews 13:5 Mararamiro <transChange type="added">enyu</transChange> ngaave ekusakarira mari; gutsikanai nezvinhu zviripo; nokuti iye wakati: Handingatongokurasi, uye handingatongokusii.
Hebrews 13:6 Naizvozvo tingashinga tichiti: Ishe mubatsiri wangu, uye handingatyi munhu zvaangandiitira.
Hebrews 13:7 Rangarirai vanokutungamirirai, vakataura kwamuri shoko raMwari; muchicherekedza kuguma kwemafambiro <transChange type="added">avo, </transChange>teverai rutendo rwavo.
Hebrews 13:8 Jesu Kristu wakadaro zuro nanhasi, nekusingaperi.
Hebrews 13:9 Musakukurwa nedzidziso dzakasiyana-siyana uye dzisingazikanwi; nokuti chinhu chakanaka kuti moyo usimbiswe nenyasha, kwete nekudya, kwavasina kubatsirwa nako <transChange type="added">ivo</transChange> vakafamba makuri.
Hebrews 13:10 Tine aritari, pavasina kodzero yekudya pairi ivo vanoshumira tabhenakeri.
Hebrews 13:11 Nokuti mhuka idzo, dzakaisirwa ropa radzo panzvimbo tsvene nemupristi mukuru nekuda kwechivi, mitumbi yadzo inopiswa kunze kwemusasa.
Hebrews 13:12 Naizvozvo naJesu<transChange type="added">wo</transChange>, kuti aite vanhu vave vatsvene neropa rake pachake wakatambudzika kunze kwesuwo.
Hebrews 13:13 Naizvozvo ngatibudire kwaari kunze kwemusasa, takatakura kunyadziswa kwake.
Hebrews 13:14 Nokuti pano hatina guta rinogara, asi tinotsvaka rinouya.
Hebrews 13:15 Naizvozvo kubudikidza naye ngatirambe tichibaira chibairo chekurumbidza kuna Mwari, ndicho chibereko chemiromo ichibvuma zita rake.
Hebrews 13:16 Asi musakanganwa kuita zvakanaka nekudyidzana; nokuti Mwari anofadzwa nezvibairo zvakadaro.
Hebrews 13:17 Teererai vanokutungamirirai, uye muzviise pasi <transChange type="added">pavo</transChange>; nokuti ava vanorindira mweya yenyu, sevachazopa rondedzero, kuti vaite izvozvo nemufaro, kwete nekugomera; nokuti izvozvo hazvikubatsiriyi.
Hebrews 13:18 Tinyengetererei; nokuti tinovimba kuti tine hana yakanaka, tichida kufamba zvakanaka pazvinhu zvese;
Hebrews 13:19 uye ndino<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>kumbirisisa<transChange type="added">i</transChange> kuti muite izvozvi, kuti ndikurumidze kudzoserwa kwamuri. <div eID="gen1647" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1646" type="section"/>
Hebrews 13:20 Zvino Mwari werugare, wakadzosa kubva kuvakafa Mufudzi mukuru wemakwai, neropa resungano yekusingaperi, <transChange type="added">iye</transChange> Ishe wedu Jesu,
Hebrews 13:21 ngaakupereredzei pabasa rese rakanaka kuti muite chido chake, achiita mukati menyu izvo zvinofadza pamberi pake kubudikidza naJesu Kristu, ngaave nekubwinya kusvikira rinhi narinhi. Ameni.
Hebrews 13:22 Asi ndinokukumbirisai, hama, gamuchirai makatsunga shoko rekurudziro, nokutiwo ndakunyorerai nemashoko mashoma.
Hebrews 13:23 Zivai kuti Timotio hama <transChange type="added">yedu</transChange> wakasunungurwa, kana akakurumidza kusvika, ndinozokuonai ndinaye.
Hebrews 13:24 Kwazisai vese vanokutungamirirai, nevatsvene vese. Vanobva Itaria vanokukwazisai.
Hebrews 13:25 Nyasha <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> nemwi mese. Ameni. <div eID="gen1649" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1648" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Heb.13"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1612" osisID="Heb" type="book"/>
James 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Jas" sID="gen1650" type="book"/>   <milestone n="JAKOBHO" type="x-usfm-h"/>
James 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Jas.1" sID="Jas.1"/>
James 1:1 Jakobho, muranda waMwari newaIshe Jesu Kristu, kumarudzi gumi nemaviri ari mukupararira: Kwaziwai. <div eID="gen1652" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1651" type="section"/>
James 1:2 Zvitorei <transChange type="added">se</transChange>mufaro wese, hama dzangu, kana muchiwira mumiedzo yakasiyana-siyana,
James 1:3 muchiziva kuti kuedzwa kwerutendo rwenyu kunobudisa kutsungirira;
James 1:4 asi kutsungirira ngakuve nebasa rakapedzeredzwa, kuti muve vakapedzeredzwa nekukwana, musingatairi pachinhu.
James 1:5 Uye kana umwe wenyu achishaiwa uchenjeri, ngaakumbire kuna Mwari, anopavhurira vese, uye asingatuki, zvino achadzipiwa.
James 1:6 Asi ngaakumbire murutendo, asiri asina chokwadi nechinhu; nokuti asina chokwadi wakaita sefungu regungwa rinosundwa nemhepo richidzungaidzwa.
James 1:7 Nokuti munhu uyu ngaarege kufunga kuti achagamuchira chinhu kuna Ishe.
James 1:8 Murume ane moyo miviri anoshanduka-shanduka panzira dzake dzese.
James 1:9 Asi hama yakaderera ngaizvikudze pakukudzwa kwake;
James 1:10 nemufumi pakuderedzwa kwake; nokuti seruva reuswa achapfuura.
James 1:11 Nokuti zuva rinobuda pamwe nekupisa, ndokuomesa uswa, neruva rahwo rinowira pasi, nekunaka kwechimiro chahwo kwakaparara; saizvozvowo mufumi achabvuruvara panzira dzake.
James 1:12 Wakaropafadzwa munhu anotsungirira <transChange type="added">pa</transChange>muedzo; nokuti kana atendwa, achagamuchira korona yeupenyu, Ishe yaakavimbisa kune vanomuda.
James 1:13 Kusava nemunhu anoti achiidzwa ati: Ndinoidzwa naMwari; nokuti Mwari haagoni kuedzwa nechakaipa, naiye amene haaidzi munhu.
James 1:14 Asi umwe neumwe anoidzwa, kana achikwehwa nekuchiva kwake pachake, nekukwezwa.
James 1:15 Ipapo kuchiva kana kwarema kunozvara chivi; nechivi kana chaperedzerwa, chinobereka rufu.
James 1:16 Musanyengerwa, hama dzangu dzinodikanwa.
James 1:17 Chipo chese chakanaka nechipiwa chese chakaperedzerwa chinobva kumusoro, chichiburuka kubva kuna Baba vezviedza, navo pasina kupinduka, kana mumvuri wekushanduka.
James 1:18 Nekuda kwake wakabereka isu neshoko rechokwadi, kuti isu tive sechibereko chekutanga chezvisikwa zvake. <div eID="gen1654" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1653" type="section"/>
James 1:19 Naizvozvo, hama dzangu dzinodiwa, munhu umwe neumwe ngaave anokurumidza pakunzwa, anononoka pakutaura, anononoka pakutsamwa;
James 1:20 nokuti kutsamwa kwemunhu hakuiti kururama kwaMwari.
James 1:21 Naizvozvo bvisai zvinyangadzo zvese nekuwandisa kwekuipa, mugamuchire nemoyo munyoro shoko rakabatanidzwa pa<transChange type="added">muri</transChange>, rinogona kuponesa mweya yenyu.
James 1:22 Asi ivai vaiti veshoko, uye kwete vanzwi chete, muchizvinyengera pachenyu.
James 1:23 Nokuti kana umwe ari munzwi weshoko uye asiri muiti, iye wakafanana nemunhu anoona chiso chake chechisikirwo muchionioni;
James 1:24 nokuti anozviona pachake, ndokuenda, ndokukanganwa pakarepo kuti wanga akadini.
James 1:25 Asi uyo anotarisisa mumurairo wakaperedzerwa werusununguko ndokurambirirapo, uyo asati ari munzwi anokanganwa asi muiti webasa, uyu acharopafadzwa pakuita kwake.
James 1:26 Kana umwe pakati penyu achiti anotenda, kana asingadzori rurimi rwake, asi achinyengera moyo wake, chitendero cheuyu hachina maturo.
James 1:27 Chitendero chakachena chisina kusvibiswa pamberi paMwari naBaba ndechichi: Kufambira nherera nechirikadzi pakutambudzika kwavo, azvichengete asina gwapa kubva kunyika. <chapter eID="Jas.1"/><div eID="gen1656" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1655" type="section"/>
James 2:0 <div sID="gen1657" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="Jas.2" sID="Jas.2"/>  <div sID="gen1658" type="x-p"/>
James 2:1 Hama dzangu, kwete nerusarura muve nerutendo rwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu wekubwinya.
James 2:2 Nokuti kana muungano yenyu mukapinda murume ane mhete yegoridhe nenguvo inopenya, mukapindawo murombo ane nguvo yakasviba,
James 2:3 imwi ndokutarira uyo wakapfeka nguvo inopenya; ndokuti kwaari: Iwe gara pano zvakanaka; ndokuti kumurombo: Iwe mira ipapo; kana: Gara pano pasi pechitsiko chetsoka dzangu;
James 2:4 hamunawo kusarura mukati menyu pachenyu mukavawo vatongi vendangariro dzakaipa here?
James 2:5 Inzwai, hama dzangu dzinodikanwa. Mwari haana here kusarudza varombo venyika ino, vakafuma parutendo, nevadyi venhaka yeushe hwaakavimbisa kune vanomuda?
James 2:6 Asi imwi makazvidza murombo. Vafumi havakutsikiririi here, uye ndivo vanokukweverai kumatare?
James 2:7 Ivo havanyombi zita rakanaka rakadanwa pamuri here?
James 2:8 Kana zvirokwazvo muchizadzisa murairo weushe, zvinoenderana nerugwaro <transChange type="added">rwunoti</transChange>: Ida wekwako sezvaunozvi<transChange type="added">da</transChange><transChange type="added">iwe</transChange>, munoita zvakanaka;
James 2:9 asi kana mune rusarura, munoita chivi, munopwiswa nemurairo sevadariki.
James 2:10 Nokuti ani nani anochengeta murairo wese, asi akagumburwa pane umwe, anova nemhosva kune yese.
James 2:11 Nokuti iye wakati: Usaita upombwe; wakatiwo: Usauraya; zvino kana usingaiti upombwe, asi uchiuraya, wava mudariki wemurairo.
James 2:12 Taurai saizvozvo uye itai saizvozvo, sevachazotongwa nemurairo werusununguko.
James 2:13 Nokuti kutonga kusina tsitsi ndekweasina kuita tsitsi; uye tsitsi dzinozvirumbidza pakukutonga. <div eID="gen1658" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1657" type="section"/>
James 2:14 Zvinobatsirei, hama dzangu, kana munhu achiti ane rutendo, asi asina mabasa? Rutendo urwu rwunogona kumuponesa here?
James 2:15 Zvino kana hamarume kana hamakadzi yakashama uye achishaiwa kudya kwezuva rimwe nerimwe,
James 2:16 umwe wenyu ndokuti kwavari: Ibvai murugare, mudziyirwe uye mugute; asi musingavapi zvinhu zvinodikanwa nemuviri, izvo zvinobatsirei?
James 2:17 Saizvozvowo rutendo, kana rwusina mabasa, rwakafa pacharwo.
James 2:18 Asi umwe achati: Iwe une rutendo, neni ndine mabasa; ndiratidze rutendo rwako kunze kwemabasa, neni pamabasa angu ndichakuratidza rutendo rwangu.
James 2:19 Iwe unotenda kuti kuna Mwari umwe; unoita zvakanaka; nemadhimoni anotenda uye anodedera.
James 2:20 Asi unoda kuziva here, haiwa dununu, kuti rutendo rwusina mabasa rwakafa?
James 2:21 Abhurahama baba vedu havana kunzi vakarurama kubva pamabasa here, vabaira mwanakomana wavo Isaka pamusoro pearitari?
James 2:22 Unoona kuti rutendo rwakabata pamwe nemabasa ake, uye kubva pamabasa rutendo rwakaperedzerwa here?
James 2:23 Nerugwaro rukazadzisika rwunoti: NaAbhurahama wakatenda kuna Mwari, zvikaverengerwawo kwaari kuti ndiko kururama, akanziwo shamwari yaMwari.
James 2:24 Naizvozvo munoona kuti munhu anonzi wakarurama kubva pamabasa, uye kwete kubva parutendo chete.
James 2:25 Saizvozvowo naRakabhi chifeve haana kunzi wakarurama kubva pamabasa here, agamuchira vatumwa, nekuvabudisa neimwe nzira?
James 2:26 Nokuti semuviri pasina mweya wakafa, saizvozvowo rutendo rwusina mabasa rwakafa. <chapter eID="Jas.2"/><div eID="gen1660" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1659" type="section"/>
James 3:0 <div sID="gen1661" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="Jas.3" sID="Jas.3"/>  <div sID="gen1662" type="x-p"/>
James 3:1 Musava vadzidzisi vazhinji, hama dzangu, muchiziva kuti tichagamuchira kutongwa kukuru.
James 3:2 Nokuti tese tinogumburwa pazvinhu zvizhinji. Kana umwe asingagumburwi pashoko, ndiye murume wakaperedzerwa, anogona kudzorawo muviri wese.
James 3:3 Tarira, tinoisa matomu mumiromo yemabhiza kuti atiteerere, ndokutenderedza muviri wawo wese.
James 3:4 Tarirai, nezvikepe, kunyange zviri zvikuru zvakadai, uye zvichitinhwa nemhepo dzine simba, zvinonangiswa nechidzoreso chidiki diki, chero kupi kunodikanwa nechishuwo chemufambisi.
James 3:5 Rwakadarowo rurimi rwuri mutezo mudiki, uye rwunozvirumbidza zvikuru. Tarirai, moto mudiki unotungidza matanda akakura sei!
James 3:6 Nerurimi moto, nyika yeuipi; ndizvo zvakaita rurimi rwakaiswa pakati pemitezo yedu, rwunosvibisa muviri wese, nekutungidza nzira yeupenyu, uye rwunotungidzwa negehena.
James 3:7 Nokuti marudzi ese emhuka neeshiriwo, neezvesewo zvinokambaira neezvisikwa zvegungwa anopingudzwa uye akapingudzwa nechisikirwo chevanhu;
James 3:8 asi hakuna munhu anogona kupingudza rurimi; uipi husingadzoreki, rwuzere nechepfu inouraya.
James 3:9 Narwo tinorumbidza Mwari uye Baba, narwowo tinotuka vanhu vakaitwa nemufananidzo waMwari;
James 3:10 mumuromo umwewo munobva kurumbidza nekutuka. Hazvina kufanira, hama dzangu, izvi zvive saizvozvo.
James 3:11 Chitubu chingadzutura pamuromo umwe chinonaka nechinovava here?
James 3:12 Hama dzangu, muonde unogona kubereka maorivhi here, kana muzambiringa maonde? Saizvozvo hakuna chitubu chinobudisa mvura inovava neinonaka. <div eID="gen1662" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1661" type="section"/>
James 3:13 Ndiani wakachenjera neanonzwisisa pakati penyu? Ngaaratidze nemufambiro wakanaka mabasa ake neunyoro hweuchenjeri.
James 3:14 Asi kana mune godo rinovava nerukave mumoyo wenyu, musazvirumbidza nekurevera chokwadi nhema.
James 3:15 Uhu hausi uchenjeri hunoburuka kubva kumusoro, asi hwenyika, hwechisikirwo, hweudhimoni.
James 3:16 Nokuti pane godo nerukave, ndipo pane nyongano nekuita kwese kwakaipa.
James 3:17 Asi uchenjeri hunobva kumusoro pakutanga hwakachena, kozouya kuva nerugare, kunyorova, kuteerera, kuzara netsitsi nezvibereko zvakanaka, husina kutsaura, uye husina kunyengera.
James 3:18 Uye chibereko chekururama chinodzvarwa murugare kune vanoita rugare. <chapter eID="Jas.3"/><div eID="gen1664" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1663" type="section"/>
James 4:0 <div sID="gen1665" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="Jas.4" sID="Jas.4"/>  <div sID="gen1666" type="x-p"/>
James 4:1 Dzinobvepi hondo nekurwa pakati penyu? Hazvibvi apa here, pakuchiva kwenyu kunorwa pamitezo yenyu?
James 4:2 Munoshuva, asi hamuna <transChange type="added">chinhu</transChange>; munouraya uye munoshumba, asi hamugoni kuwana <transChange type="added">chinhu;</transChange> munorwa muchiita hondo, asi hamuna <transChange type="added">chinhu,</transChange> nokuti hamukumbiri.
James 4:3 Munokumbira, asi hamugamuchiri, nokuti munokumbira zvakaipa, kuti muparadze pakuchiva kwenyu.
James 4:4 Imwi mhombwe nemhombwekadzi, hamuzivi here kuti ushamwari hwenyika ruvengo kuna Mwari? Naizvozvo umwe neumwe anoda kuva shamwari yenyika, anova muvengi waMwari.
James 4:5 Kana munofunga kuti rugwaro rwunotaura pasina maturo here <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Mweya wakagara mukati medu anochivira godo?
James 4:6 Asi anopa nyasha huru; saka anoti: Mwari anopikisa vanozvikudza, asi anopa nyasha vanozvininipisa.
James 4:7 Naizvozvo muzviise pasi kuna Mwari; pikisai dhiabhorosi, zvino achakutizai.
James 4:8 Swederai kuna Mwari, na<transChange type="added">iye</transChange> achaswedera kwamuri; shambai maoko, vatadzi, uye muchenure moyo, imwi vemoyo miviri.
James 4:9 Tambudzikai uye chemai uye rirai; kuseka kwenyu ngakushandurwe kuve kuchema, nemufaro uve kusuruvara.
James 4:10 Zvininipisei pamberi paIshe, uye achakusimudzai. <div eID="gen1666" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1665" type="section"/>
James 4:11 Musareverana zvakaipa, hama. Anorevera hama zvakaipa uye kutonga hama yake, anorevera murairo zvakaipa, nekutonga murairo; zvino kana uchitonga murairo, hausi muiti wemurairo, asi mutongi.
James 4:12 Umwe chete ndiye mutemi wemurairo, anogona kuponesa nekuparadza; iwe ndiwe ani anotonga umwe? <div eID="gen1668" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1667" type="section"/>
James 4:13 Uyai ikozvino imwi munoti: Nhasi kana mangwana tichaenda kuguta rekuti, tigogarako gore rimwe, tigotengeserana, tigowana mubairo;
James 4:14 imwi musingazivi zvamangwana. Nokuti upenyu hwenyu chii? Nokuti imhute inoonekwa nguva diki, ipapo ndokunyangarika.
James 4:15 Pakuti muti: Kana Ishe achida, tichararamawo, tigoita ichi kana icho.
James 4:16 Asi ikozvino munozvirumbidza pakuzvikudza kwenyu; kuzvirumbidza kwese kwakadai kwakaipa.
James 4:17 Naizvozvo anoziva kuita zvakanaka asinga<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>iti, chivi kwaari. <chapter eID="Jas.4"/><div eID="gen1670" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1669" type="section"/>
James 5:0 <div sID="gen1671" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="Jas.5" sID="Jas.5"/>  <div sID="gen1672" type="x-p"/>
James 5:1 Uyai ikozvino imwi vafumi, rirai muridze mhere nekuda kwematambudziko enyu ano<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>wira<transChange type="added">i</transChange>.
James 5:2 Fuma yenyu yakaora, uye nguvo dzenyu dzakava dzakafusiwa.
James 5:3 Goridhe renyu nesirivheri zvava nengura; uye urari hwazvo huchava chapupu kwamuri, uye huchadya nyama yenyu semoto. Maka<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>chengetera fuma pamazuva ekupedzisira.
James 5:4 Tarira, mubairo wevaranda vakacheka minda yenyu, yakanyimwa nemwi nekunyengera, unodanidzira; nekuchema kwevacheki kwakasvika kunzeve dzaIshe wehondo.
James 5:5 Makagara muumbozha panyika, uye makakarira zvinofadza; makakodza moyo yenyu sepazuva rekubaya.
James 5:6 Makapa mhosva, makauraya wakarurama; haakupikisii. <div eID="gen1672" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1671" type="section"/>
James 5:7 Naizvozvo ivai nemoyo murefu, hama, kusvikira pakuuya kwaIshe. Tarira, murimi anomirira chibereko chinokosha chevhu, anochiitira moyo murefu, kusvikira chagamuchira mvura yekutanga neyekupedzisira.
James 5:8 Imwiwo ivai nemoyo murefu; simbisai moyo yenyu, nokuti kuuya kwaIshe kwaswedera.
James 5:9 Musanyunyutirana, hama, kuti murege kupiwa mhosva; tarira, mutongi amire pamukova.
James 5:10 Torai vaporofita semuenzaniso wekutambudzika, hama dzangu, newemoyo murefu, vakataura nezita raIshe.
James 5:11 Tarira, tinoti vakaropafadzwa vanotsungirira; makanzwa zvekutsungirira kwaJobho, uye makaona kuguma kwaIshe, kuti Ishe ane moyo munyoro kwazvo uye ane tsitsi. <div eID="gen1674" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1673" type="section"/>
James 5:12 Asi pamberi pezvese, hama dzangu, musapika, kana nedenga, kana nenyika, kana nekumwe kupika kupi; asi hongu yenyu ngaive hongu, uye kwete, kwete; kuti murege kuwira mukutongwa. <div eID="gen1676" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1675" type="section"/>
James 5:13 Kune umwe anotambudzika pakati penyu here? Ngaanyengetere. Pane anofara here? Ngaaimbe mapisarema.
James 5:14 Pane anorwara pakati penyu here? Ngaadane vatariri vekereke; uye ngavanyengetere pamusoro pake, vachimuzodza namafuta muzita raIshe;
James 5:15 uye munyengetero werutendo uchaponesa anorwara, uye Ishe achamumutsa; zvino kana akaita zvivi, achazvikanganwirwa.
James 5:16 Reururiranai zvivi, uye nyengetereranai, kuti muporeswe. Munyengetero wakasimba wewakarurama une simba zvikuru.
James 5:17 Eria wakange ari munhu wemanzwiro akafanana nesu, akanyengetera nemoyo wese kuti kusanaya; ikasanaya panyika makore matatu nemwedzi mitanhatu;
James 5:18 zvino wakanyengeterazve; denga ndokupa mvura, nyika ikabereka chibereko chayo.
James 5:19 Hama, kana umwe pakati penyu achitsauka kubva pachokwadi, umwewo akamudzora,
James 5:20 ngaazive kuti uyo anodzora mutadzi pakutsauka kwenzira yake, achaponesa mweya parufu nekufukidza zvivi zvizhinji. <div eID="gen1678" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1677" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Jas.5"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1650" osisID="Jas" type="book"/>
I Peter 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="1Pet" sID="gen1679" type="book"/>   <milestone n="1 PETRO" type="x-usfm-h"/>
I Peter 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="1Pet.1" sID="1Pet.1"/>
I Peter 1:1 Petro, muapositori waJesu Kristu, kuvaeni vakasanangurwa vekupararira kwePonto, Garatia, Kapadhokiasi, Asia, neBhitiniasi,
I Peter 1:2 maererano nekuziva zviri mberi kwaMwari Baba, mukuita vatsvene kweMweya, pakuteerera nekusasa kweropa raJesu Kristu: Nyasha nerugare ngazviwanzwe kwamuri. <div eID="gen1681" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1680" type="section"/>
I Peter 1:3 Wakaropafadzwa Mwari naBaba vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, iye zvichienderana nekuwanda kwetsitsi dzake wakatiberekazve patariro inorarama kubudikidza nekumuka kwaJesu Kristu kubva kuvakafa,
I Peter 1:4 panhaka isingaori neisina kusvibiswa uye isingabvuruvari, yakachengeterwa imwi kumatenga,
I Peter 1:5 <transChange type="added">imwi</transChange> munochengetwa nesimba raMwari kubudikidza nerutendo kuruponeso rwakagadzirirwa kuzarurwa panguva yekupedzisira.
I Peter 1:6 Yamunofara mairi zvikuru, <transChange type="added">kunyange</transChange> ikozvino kwechinguvana, kana zvichifanira, muri pakushungurudzwa mumiedzo yakasiyana-siyana,
I Peter 1:7 kuti kuedzwa kwerutendo rwenyu kunokosha zvikuru kupfuura kwegoridhe rinoparara, kunyange ichiidzwa nemoto, kuwanikwe mukurumbidzwa nerukudzo nekubwinya pakuonekwa kwaJesu Kristu;
I Peter 1:8 iye musina kumuona munomuda; iye ikozvino musinga<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>oni asi munotenda kwaari, munofara nemufaro usingatauriki uye unorumbidzwa,
I Peter 1:9 muchigamuchira mugumo werutendo rwenyu, ruponeso rwemweya <transChange type="added">yenyu.</transChange>
I Peter 1:10 Nezveruponeso urwu vaporofita vakabvunzisisa nekunzvera, ivo vakaporofita zvenyasha dzinouya kwamuri;
I Peter 1:11 vachinzvera kuti panguva ipi kana yakadini Mweya waKristu akange ari mavari yaakaratidza, paakagara apupura matambudziko maererano naKristu, nekubwinya shure kweizvi.
I Peter 1:12 Kwavari kwakaratidzwa kuti kwete kwavari ivo, asi kwatiri vaishandira zvinhu izvi, zvamunoparidzirwa ikozvino nevakakuparidzirai evhangeri neMweya Mutsvene wakatumwa kubva kudenga, zvinhu izvo vatumwa zvavanoshuva kunyatsoongorora. <div eID="gen1683" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1682" type="section"/>
I Peter 1:13 Naizvozvo masunga zviuno zvemurangariro wenyu, zvidzorei, mutaririre zvakakwana kunyasha dzinouyiswa kwamuri pakuratidzwa kwaJesu Kristu;
I Peter 1:14 sevana vanoteerera, musingazvifananidzi nekuchiva kwakare pakusaziva kwenyu.
I Peter 1:15 Asi sezvo wakakudanai ari mutsvene, nemwiwo ivai vatsvene pamafambiro ese;
I Peter 1:16 nokuti kwakanyorwa, <transChange type="added">kuchinzi</transChange>: Ivai vatsvene, nokuti ini ndiri mutsvene.
I Peter 1:17 Zvino kana muchi<transChange type="added">mu</transChange>idza Baba, iye pasina rusarura anotonga zvinoenderana nebasa reumwe neumwe, garai panguva yeutorwa hwenyu mukutya;
I Peter 1:18 muchiziva kuti hamuna kudzikunurwa nezvinoora, sirivheri kana goridhe, pamafambiro enyu asina maturo a<transChange type="added">ma</transChange>kagamuchira kumadzibaba enyu;
I Peter 1:19 asi neropa rinokosha raKristu seregwayana risina charinopomerwa uye risina gwapa.
I Peter 1:20 Iye zvirokwazvo wakagara azikanwa nyika isati yavambwa, asi wakaratidzwa panguva dzekupedzisira nekuda kwenyu,
I Peter 1:21 iye wamunotenda naye kuna Mwari, wakamumutsa kubva kuvakafa, akamupa kubwinya; kuti rutendo rwenyu netariro zvive kuna Mwari.
I Peter 1:22 Manatsa mweya yenyu pakuteerera chokwadi kubudikidza neMweya mukuda hama nekusanyengera, dananai zvikuru nemoyo wakachena;
I Peter 1:23 maberekwa kutsva kwete zvichibva pambeu inoora, asi isingaori, neshoko raMwari rinorarama nekugara nekusingaperi.
I Peter 1:24 Nokuti nyama yese yakaita seuswa, nekubwinya kwese kwemunhu seruva reuswa. Uswa hwunosvava, neruva rahwo rinodonha;
I Peter 1:25 asi shoko raIshe rinogara nekusingaperi. Uye iri ishoko rakaparidzirwa kwamuri neevhangeri. <chapter eID="1Pet.1"/><div eID="gen1685" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1684" type="section"/>
I Peter 2:0 <div sID="gen1686" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="1Pet.2" sID="1Pet.2"/>  <div sID="gen1687" type="x-p"/>
I Peter 2:1 Naizvozvo bvisai uipi hwese nemano-mano ese neunyepedzeri negodo neucheri hwese,
I Peter 2:2 savacheche vachangoberekwa, pangai mukaka usina kunyengera wakarongeka, kuti mukure nawo;
I Peter 2:3 zvimwe kana makaravira kuti Ishe ane moyo munyoro.
I Peter 2:4 Wamunouya kwaari, ibwe benyu, rakarambwa zvirokwazvo nevanhu, asi pana Mwari rakasarudzwa, rinokosha,
I Peter 2:5 imwiwo semabwe mapenyu makavakwa <transChange type="added">muve</transChange> imba yemweya, upristi utsvene, kuti mubaire zvibairo zvemweya, zvinogamuchirika kuna Mwari kubudikidza naJesu Kristu.
I Peter 2:6 Naizvozvo murugwaro zvirimowo, <transChange type="added">zvinoti</transChange>: Tarira, ndinoisa muZiyoni ibwe repakona, rakasanangurwa, rinokosha; neanotenda kwaari haangatongonyadziswi.
I Peter 2:7 Naizvozvo kwamuri munotenda anokosha; asi kune vasingateereri: Ibwe vavaki ravakaramba, ndiro rakazova musoro wekona,
I Peter 2:8 uye ibwe rekugumbusa nedombo rekupinga; vanogumburwa pashoko vasingariteereri; ndizvo zvavakaisirwawo.
I Peter 2:9 Asi imwi muri dzinza rakasarudzwa, upristi hweumambo, rudzi rutsvene, vanhu vakawanikwa, kuti muparidze kwese kunaka kwaiye wakadana imwi kubva parima muuye kuchiedza chake chinoshamisa;
I Peter 2:10 imwi maimbova musi vanhu, asi ikozvino muri vanhu vaMwari; makange musina kunzwirwa tsitsi, asi ikozvino manzwirwa tsitsi. <div eID="gen1687" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1686" type="section"/>
I Peter 2:11 Vadiwa, ndino<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>kumbirisa<transChange type="added">i</transChange> sevatorwa nevapfuuri, kuti muzvidzore pakuchiva kwenyama, kunorwa nemweya;
I Peter 2:12 mune mufambiro wenyu wakanaka pakati pevahedheni; kuti pavanokumhurai sevaiti vezvakaipa, pamabasa akanaka avanoona varumbidze Mwari nezuva rekushanyirwa. <div eID="gen1689" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1688" type="section"/>
I Peter 2:13 Naizvozvo muzviise pasi pechimiso chimwe nechimwe chevanhu nekuda kwaIshe; kana ari mambo, saiye anotonga;
I Peter 2:14 kana kuvatungamiriri, sekune vakatumwa naye pakurangwa zvirokwazvo kwevaiti vezvakaipa, asi ive rumbidzo yevanoita zvakanaka.
I Peter 2:15 Nokuti ndizvo zvinoita chido chaMwari, kuti nekuita zvakanaka munyaradze kusaziva kwevanhu mapenzi;
I Peter 2:16 sevakasununguka, asi musava nekusungunuka sechifukidzo chezvakaipa, asi sevaranda vaMwari.
I Peter 2:17 Kudzai vese. Idai ukama. Ityai Mwari. Kudzai mambo. <div eID="gen1691" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1690" type="section"/>
I Peter 2:18 Varanda, zviisei pasi pemadzitenzi nekutya kwese, kwete kune vakanaka nevanyoro chete, asiwo kune vasakarurama.
I Peter 2:19 Nokuti idzi inyasha, kana nekuda kwehana kuna Mwari munhu achitsungirira kurwadziwa, achitambudzika zvisakafanira.
I Peter 2:20 Nokuti zvine rumbidzo yei, kana muchitadza ndokurohwa muchitsungirira? Asi kana muchiita zvakanaka uye muchitambudzika muchitsungirira, izvi inyasha kuna Mwari.
I Peter 2:21 Nokuti makadanirwa izvi, nokuti Kristuwo wakatambudzikira isu, akasiira isu muenzaniso, kuti mutevere makwara ake;
I Peter 2:22 iye asina kuita chivi, nekunyengera hakuna kuwanikwa mumuromo make;
I Peter 2:23 iye wakati achituka haana kutukawo; achitambudzika haana kutyityidzira; asi waka<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>kumikidza kune anotonga zvakarurama;
I Peter 2:24 iye amene wakatakura zvivi zvedu pamuviri wake pamuti, kuti tafa kuzvivi tiraramire kururama; iye wamakaporeswa nemavanga ake.
I Peter 2:25 Nokuti makange makaita semakwai akarasika; asi ikozvino madzokera kuMufudzi neMutariri wemweya yenyu. <chapter eID="1Pet.2"/><div eID="gen1693" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1692" type="section"/>
I Peter 3:0 <div sID="gen1694" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="1Pet.3" sID="1Pet.3"/>  <div sID="gen1695" type="x-p"/>
I Peter 3:1 Saizvozvo vakadzi, muzviise pasi pevarume venyu pachenyu; kuti kanawo vamwe vasingateereri kushoko, vawanikwe nemafambiro evakadzi pasina shoko,
I Peter 3:2 vachiona mafambiro enyu akachena pakutya.
I Peter 3:3 Kushonga kwenyu ngakurege kuva kwekunze kwekuruka vhudzi nekwekupfeka goridhe, kana kupfeka nguvo;
I Peter 3:4 asi <transChange type="added">ngakuve</transChange> munhu wakavanzika wemoyo, pachinhu chisingaori chemweya munyoro wakanyarara, anokosha zvikuru pamberi paMwari.
I Peter 3:5 Nokuti karewo vakazvishongedza saizvozvo vakadzi vatsvene vaivimba naMwari, vachizviisa pasi pevarume vavo pachavo;
I Peter 3:6 saSara akateerera Abhurahama akamuidza ishe; vakunda vake vamuri <transChange type="added">imwi,</transChange> kana muchiita zvakanaka, uye musingatyiswi nechipi nechipi chinovhundusa.
I Peter 3:7 Saizvozvo varume, garisanai <transChange type="added">nevakadzi venyu</transChange> zvinoenderana neruzivo, muchikudza mukadzi sekumudziyo usina simba, sevadyiwo venhaka yenyasha dzeupenyu pamwe <transChange type="added">navo</transChange>; kuti minyengetero yenyu irege kudzivirirwa. <div eID="gen1695" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1694" type="section"/>
I Peter 3:8 Pakupedzisirawo, ivai nemoyo umwe mese, muchinzwirana tsitsi, mude hama, muve nemoyo munyoro, mune rudo;
I Peter 3:9 musingatsivi chakaipa nechakaipa, kana kutuka nekutuka; asi pachinzvimbo chaizvozvo muchiropafadze, muchiziva kuti ndizvo zvamakadanirwa, kuti mugare nhaka yeropafadzo.
I Peter 3:10 Nokuti uyo anoda kuda upenyu, nekuona mazuva akanaka, ngaadzore rurimi rwake pane zvakaipa, nemiromo yake kuti irege kutaura kunyengera.
I Peter 3:11 Ngaatsauke pane zvakaipa ndokuita zvakanaka; ngaatsvake rugare arutevere.
I Peter 3:12 Nokuti meso aIshe ari pamusoro pevakarurama, nenzeve dzake pamunyengetero wavo. Asi chiso chaIshe chinopikisa vanoita zvakaipa.
I Peter 3:13 Zvino ndiani achakukuvadzai, kana muri vatevedzeri vezvakanaka?
I Peter 3:14 Asi kunyange kana imwi muchitambudzika nekuda kwekururama, makaropafadzwa; uye musatya kutyisa kwavo, kana kuvhiringidzwa;
I Peter 3:15 asi itai Ishe Mwari mutsvene mumoyo yenyu; mugare makazvigadzirira kupindura umwe neumwe anokubvunzai chikonzero chetariro iri mukati menyu, neunyoro nekutya;
I Peter 3:16 mune hana yakanaka, kuti pavanokucherai sevaiti vezvakaipa vanyare, ivo vanotuka mafambiro enyu akanaka muna Kristu.
I Peter 3:17 Nokuti zviri nani kutambudzika muchiita zvakanaka, kana chido chaMwari chichida, pane muchiita zvakaipa.
I Peter 3:18 Nokuti Kristuwo wakatambudzika kamwe nekuda kwezvivi, iye wakarurama pachinzvimbo chevasakarurama, kuti atiise kuna Mwari; aurawa zvirokwazvo panyama, asi wakararamiswa neMweya;
I Peter 3:19 mauri wakaendawo akaparidzira kumweya iri mutirongo,
I Peter 3:20 iyo yaimbova isingateereri, apo moyo murefu waMwari uchimirira, pamazuva aNowa apo areka ichagadzirwa, kukaponeswa mairi vashoma, ndiko kuti mweya misere nemvura.
I Peter 3:21 Mufananidzo wayo rubhabhatidzo rwunotiponesawo ikozvino, kwete kubviswa kwetsvina yenyama, asi kukumbira kwehana yakanaka kuna Mwari kubudikidza nekumukazve kwaJesu Kristu,
I Peter 3:22 ari kuruoko rwerudyi rwaMwari aenda kudenga; vatumwa neumambo nemasimba zvaiswa pasi pake. <chapter eID="1Pet.3"/><div eID="gen1697" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1696" type="section"/>
I Peter 4:0 <div sID="gen1698" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="1Pet.4" sID="1Pet.4"/>  <div sID="gen1699" type="x-p"/>
I Peter 4:1 Naizvozvo Kristu zvaakatitamburira panyama, nemwi muzvishongedze nemurangariro wakadaro; nokuti iye watambudzika panyama, aregedzwa pachivi;
I Peter 4:2 kuti nguva yasara panyama musachiraramira kuchiva kwevanhu, asi chido chaMwari.
I Peter 4:3 Nokuti yakatiringana nguva yakapfuura yeupenyu kuita chido chevahedheni, patakafamba mukusazvibata, kuchiva, kuraradza, makaro, nemitambo yekunwa, nekunamata zvifananidzo zvisingatenderwi;
I Peter 4:4 zvavanoshamisika mazviri, kuti hamumhanyidzani <transChange type="added">navo</transChange> pakuwandisa kumwe kwenyonga-nyonga, vachi<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>tuka<transChange type="added">i</transChange>;
I Peter 4:5 vachazvidavirira kuna iye wakagadzirira kutonga vapenyu nevakafa.
I Peter 4:6 Nokuti nekuda kwaizvozvi evhangeri yakaparidzirwa kune vakafawo, kuti vatongwe zvinoenderana nevanhu panyama, asi vararame zvinoenderana naMwari pamweya. <div eID="gen1699" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1698" type="section"/>
I Peter 4:7 Zvino kuguma kwezvinhu zvese kwaswedera; naizvozvo svinurai murinde muminyengetero.
I Peter 4:8 Uye mberi kwezvinhu zvese ivai nerudo rwunopfuta pakati penyu, nokuti rudo ruchafukidzira zvivi zvizhinji-zhinji.
I Peter 4:9 Gamuchiranai, pasina kunyunyuta.
I Peter 4:10 Umwe neumwe sezvaakagamuchira chipo, shumiranai ichocho sevatariri vakanaka venyasha dzakasiyana-siyana dzaMwari.
I Peter 4:11 Kana umwe achitaura, <transChange type="added">ngaataure</transChange> semashoko aMwari; kana umwe achishumira <transChange type="added">ngazviitwe</transChange> sezvinobva kusimba Mwari raanopa; kuti Mwari akudzwe pazvinhu zvese kubudikidza naJesu Kristu, kwaari kune kukudzwa nesimba kusvikira rinhi narinhi. Ameni.
I Peter 4:12 Vadiwa, musashamisika nemuedzo unopisa uri pamuri unokuidzai, sezvinonzi mawirwa nechisingazikanwi;
I Peter 4:13 asi sezvamuri vagovani vematambudziko aKristu, farai, kuti nepakuratidzwa kwekubwinya kwake mufare nemufaro mukurusa.
I Peter 4:14 Kana muchitukwa nekuda kwezita raKristu, makaropafadzwa; nokuti Mweya wekubwinya newaMwari agere pamusoro penyu; kwavari zvirokwazvo anonyombwa, asi kwamuri anokudzwa.
