I Peter 4:15 Asi kusava neumwe wenyu anotambudzika semhondi, kana mbavha, kana muiti wezvakaipa, kana anongongwarira zvevamwe;
I Peter 4:16 asi kana <transChange type="added">achitambudzika</transChange> semuKristu, asanyara; asi ngaakudze Mwari pachinhu ichi.
I Peter 4:17 Nokuti yava nguva yekuti kutonga kutange paimba yaMwari; zvino kana kukatanga kwatiri, kuguma kwevasingateereri evhangeri yaMwari kuchavei?
I Peter 4:18 Uye kana wakarurama achiponeswa nemutsutsururu, asingadi Mwari nemutadzi vachaonekwepi?
I Peter 4:19 Naizvozvo naivo vanotambudzika zvinoenderana nechido chaMwari, sekuMusiki wakatendeka ngavakumikidze mweya yavo pakuita zvakanaka.  <chapter eID="1Pet.4"/><div eID="gen1701" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1700" type="section"/>
I Peter 5:0 <div sID="gen1702" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="1Pet.5" sID="1Pet.5"/>  <div sID="gen1703" type="x-p"/>
I Peter 5:1 Vatariri vari pakati penyu ndino<transChange type="added">va</transChange>kurudzira, vandiri mutariri pamwe na<transChange type="added">vo</transChange> nechapupu chematambudziko aKristu, nemugovani wekubwinya kuchazoratidzwa.
I Peter 5:2 Fudzai boka raMwari riri pakati penyu, muchitaridzira, kwete nekurovererwa asi nekuda, kwete nekuda kwekukarira fuma yakaipa, asi nechido,
I Peter 5:3 kana kuva semadzishe pane vamakagoverwa, asi muri mifananidzo yeboka.
I Peter 5:4 Zvino Mufudzi mukuru paachaonekwa muchagamuchira korona yekubwinya isingabvuruvari.
I Peter 5:5 Saizvozvo, vadiki, zviisei pasi pevakuru, uye mese muzviise pasi umwe kune mumwe, mupfekedzwe nekuzvininipisa, nokuti Mwari anopikisa vanozvikudza, asi anopa nyasha vanozvininipisa.
I Peter 5:6 Naizvozvo zvininipisei pasi peruoko rwune simba rwaMwari, kuti akukudzei panguva yakafanira,
I Peter 5:7 muchikandira pamusoro pake kufunganya kwenyu kwese, nokuti iye ane hanya nemwi.
I Peter 5:8 Svinurai, rindai, nokuti mupikisi wenyu dhiabhorosi, seshumba inoomba anofamba-famba achitsvaka waangapedza;
I Peter 5:9 mumupikise makasimba parutendo, muchiziva kuti matambudziko iwawo anozadziswa kuhama dzenyu dziri panyika.
I Peter 5:10 Asi Mwari wenyasha dzese, iye wakatidanira mukubwinya kwake kusingaperi muna Kristu Jesu, kana <transChange type="added">ta</transChange>tambudzika chinguvana, iye anokupedzeredzai neku<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>tsigisa<transChange type="added">i</transChange>, neku<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>pa<transChange type="added">i</transChange> simba, neku<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>teya<transChange type="added">i</transChange>.
I Peter 5:11 Kwaari <transChange type="added">ngakuve</transChange> kubwinya nesimba kusvikira rinhi narinhi. Ameni. <div eID="gen1703" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1702" type="section"/>
I Peter 5:12 NaSirivhano hama yakatendeka kwamuri, pakufunga kwangu, ndanyora nepadiki, ndichikurudzira nekupupura kuti idzi ndidzo nyasha dzechokwadi dzaMwari, dzamumire madziri.
I Peter 5:13 <transChange type="added">Kereke</transChange> iri muBhabhironi yakasarudzwa pamwe ne<transChange type="added">mwi</transChange> inokukwazisai, naMariko mwanakomana wangu.
I Peter 5:14 Kwazisanai nekutsvoda kwerudo. Rugare kwamuri mese muri muna Kristu Jesu. Ameni. <div eID="gen1705" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1704" type="section"/> <chapter eID="1Pet.5"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1679" osisID="1Pet" type="book"/>
II Peter 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="2Pet" sID="gen1706" type="book"/>   <milestone n="2 PETRO" type="x-usfm-h"/>
II Peter 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="2Pet.1" sID="2Pet.1"/>
II Peter 1:1 Simoni Petro, muranda nemuapositori waJesu Kristu, kune avo vakawana rutendo rwunokosha rwakafanana nerwedu mukururama kwaMwari wedu neMuponesi wedu Jesu Kristu:
II Peter 1:2 Nyasha nerugare ngazviwanzwe kwamuri paruzivo rwaMwari nerwaJesu Ishe wedu.
II Peter 1:3 Sesimba rake reuMwari rakatipa zvinhu zvese zveupenyu nekunamata Mwari kubudikidza neruzivo rwaiye wakatidana kubudikidza nekubwinya uye kunaka;
II Peter 1:4 akatipa nazvo zvivimbiso zvikurusa uye zvinokosha; kuti naizvozvi muve vagovani vechizvarirwo cheuMwari, mapukunyuka kuora kuri panyika kubudikidza nekuchiva. <div eID="gen1708" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1707" type="section"/>
II Peter 1:5 Zvino nekuda kweizviwo maita kushingaira kwese, wedzerai parutendo rwenyu kunaka, nepakunaka ruzivo,
II Peter 1:6 neparuzivo kuzvidzora, nepakuzvidzora moyo murefu, nepamoyo murefu kunamata Mwari,
II Peter 1:7 nepakunamata Mwari rudo rwehama, neparudo rwehama, rudo.
II Peter 1:8 Nokuti kana zvinhu izvi zviri mamuri, uye zvichiwanda, hazvi<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>iti<transChange type="added">i</transChange> vasingashandi kana vanoshaiwa zvibereko pakuziva Ishe wedu, Jesu Kristu.
II Peter 1:9 Nokuti asina zvinhu izvi, ibofu, anoonera pedo, wakanganwa kunatswa kwezvivi zvake zvekare.
II Peter 1:10 Naizvozvo, hama, shingairai zvikuru kusimbisa kudanwa nekusanangurwa kwenyu; nokuti kana muchiita zvinhu izvi hamungatongogumburwi narinhi.
II Peter 1:11 Nokuti saizvozvo muchawedzerwa zvakanyanya kupinda muushe husingaperi hwaIshe wedu neMuponesi Jesu Kristu.
II Peter 1:12 Naizvozvo handingashaiwi hanya nekukuyeudzirai zvinhu izvi nguva dzese, kunyange muchiziva, uye makasimbiswa pachokwadi chiripo.
II Peter 1:13 Uye ndinoona zvakanaka <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> kana ndichingori mutabhenakeri ino chete ndikumutsei nechiyeuchidzo;
II Peter 1:14 ndichiziva kuti kunokurumidza kubviswa kwetabhenakeri yangu, Ishe wedu Jesu Kristuwo sezvaakandiratidza.
II Peter 1:15 Asi neni ndichashingaira kuti nguva dzese shure kwekuenda kwangu muve nechiyeuchidzo chezvinhu izvi.
II Peter 1:16 Nokuti hatina kutevera ngano dzakarukwa nenjere patakakuzivisai simba nekuuya kwaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu, asi takange tiri vakazvionera kubwinya kwake.
II Peter 1:17 Nokuti wakagamuchira kubva kuna Mwari Baba rukudzo nekubwinya, inzwi rakadai parakasvika kwaari pakubwinya kukuru-kuru <transChange type="added">richiti</transChange>: Uyu Mwanakomana wangu anodika, wandinofara maari ini;
II Peter 1:18 uye inzwi iri isu takarinzwa richibva kudenga pataiva naye mugomo dzvene.
II Peter 1:19 Uye tine shoko rakasimba kwazvo rechiporofita, ramunoita zvakanaka muchirichenjerera sekumwenje unovhenekera panzvimbo ine rima, kusvikira utonga huchitsvuka, nenyamasase ichibudira mumoyo yenyu;
II Peter 1:20 muchiziva izvi pakutanga, kuti hakuna chiporofita cherugwaro chinobva mududziro yemwene wacho.
II Peter 1:21 Nokuti hakuna kumbouyiswa chiporofita nechido chemunhu, asi vanhu vatsvene vaMwari vakataura vachisundwa neMweya Mutsvene.  <chapter eID="2Pet.1"/><div eID="gen1710" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1709" type="section"/>
II Peter 2:0 <div sID="gen1711" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="2Pet.2" sID="2Pet.2"/>  <div sID="gen1712" type="x-p"/>
II Peter 2:1 Asi kwaiva nevaporofita venhemawo pakati pevanhu, sezvakuchavapowo vadzidzisi venhema pakati penyu, vachapinza pachivande kutsauka kunoparadza, vachiramba kunyange Ishe wakavatenga, vachizviwisira kuparara kunokurumidza.
II Peter 2:2 Vazhinjiwo vachatevera kuparadzwa kwavo; nekuda kwavo nzira yechokwadi ichanyombwa.
II Peter 2:3 Uye pakuchiva namashoko akaumbwa vachawana mubairo nemwi; kutongwa kwavo kwakare hakunonoki, nekuparadzwa kwavo hakutsumwairi.
II Peter 2:4 Nokuti kana Mwari asina kurega vatumwa vakatadza, asi waka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>kandira mugehena achi<transChange type="added">va</transChange>kumikidza kumaketeni erima kuti vachengeterwe mutongo;
II Peter 2:5 uye haana kurega nyika yekare, asi wakachengetedza Nowa muparidzi wekururama nevamwe vanomwe, paakauisa mafashame panyika yevasingadi Mwari;
II Peter 2:6 nekuroromesa maguta eSodhoma neGomora, akaatongera kuparadzwa, akaaita chive chiratidzo kune vachazogara vasingadi Mwari;
II Peter 2:7 akanunurawo Roti wakarurama, wakazvidya moyo pakuzvibata mukunyangadza kwevakaipa;
II Peter 2:8 (nekuti uyo wakarurama, agere pakati pavo, pakuona nekunzwa, wakarwadzisa kwazvo mweya <transChange type="added">wake</transChange> wakarurama zuva rimwe nerimwe nemabasa asina murairo).
II Peter 2:9 Ishe anoziva kununura vanonamata Mwari kubva pamiedzo, nekuchengeta vasakarurama kusvika pazuva rekutongwa vachirangwa;
II Peter 2:10 asi zvikuru ivo vanofamba nemutoo wenyama paruchiva rwetsvina, nekuzvidza utongi. Vasina hanya, vane nharo, vasingatyi kutuka vanokudzwa;
II Peter 2:11 izvo vatumwa, vanopfuura pakugona nesimba, havauyisi pavari mutongo wekunyomba pamberi paIshe.
II Peter 2:12 Asi ava, <transChange type="added">vakaita</transChange> semhuka pachisikirwo dzisina fungwa dzakaberekerwa kubatwa nekuparadzwa, vanotuka zvavasingazivi, vachaparadzwa pakuora kwavo,
II Peter 2:13 vachagamuchira mubairo wekusarurama, vanoti mafaro kuita umbozha masikati, ivo makwapa nechinyadzo, vanofara mukunyengera kwavo kana vari pamabiko nemwi,
II Peter 2:14 vane meso azere neupombwe, nevasingaregi chivi, vanonyengera mweya isina simba, vane moyo wakarovedzwa kuchiva; vana vechakatukwa;
II Peter 2:15 vasiya nzira yakarurama vakatsauka, vatevera nzira yaBharami waBhosori, wakada mubairo wekusarurama,
II Peter 2:16 asi wakava nekutsiurwa kwekudarika kwake, mbongoro chimumumu ichitaura muinzwi remunhu, chikadzivisa upengo hwemuporofita.
II Peter 2:17 Iva zvitubu zvisina mvura, makore anosundwa nedutu remhepo; ivo vakachengeterwa mhute yerima kusvikira kusingaperi.
II Peter 2:18 Nokuti vachitaura zvekuzvikudza kusina maturo, vanokwezva neruchiva rwenyama neunzenza avo vakapukunyuka zvirokwazvo kune vanofamba mukutsauka;
II Peter 2:19 vachivavimbisa rusununguko, ivo pachavo varanda vekuora; nokuti uyo umwe waakundwa naye, ndiyewo waanoitwa muranda kwaari.
II Peter 2:20 Nokuti kana vapukunyuka patsvina yenyika kubudikidz<transChange type="added">a</transChange> neruzivo rwaIshe neMuponesi Jesu Kristu, vanopfekanidzwazve mazviri vachikundwa, zvinhu zvekuguma zvigova kwavari zvakaipa kupfuura zvekutanga.
II Peter 2:21 Nokuti zvaiva nani kwavari kuti <transChange type="added">dai</transChange> vaiva vasina kuziva nzira yekururama, pakuti vaziva vadzoke kubva pamurairo mutsvene wakakumikidzwa kwavari.
II Peter 2:22 Asi zvakaitika kwavari zvedimikira rechokwadi <transChange type="added">zvinoti</transChange>: Imbwa yakadzokera kumarutsi ayo pachayo; nehadzi yenguruve yakange yashamba kukuvumburuka mumatope.  <chapter eID="2Pet.2"/><div eID="gen1712" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1711" type="section"/>
II Peter 3:0 <div sID="gen1713" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="2Pet.3" sID="2Pet.3"/>  <div sID="gen1714" type="x-p"/>
II Peter 3:1 Ikozvino iyi, vadikanwi, itsamba yechipiri yandinokunyorerai; panaidzodzi <transChange type="added">mbiri</transChange> ndinomutsa murangariro wenyu wakachena nechiyeuchidzo,
II Peter 3:2 kuti <transChange type="added">mu</transChange>rangarire mashoko akambotaurwa nevaporofita vatsvene, nemurairo wedu tiri vaapasitori vaIshe neMuponesi;
II Peter 3:3 muchiziva ichi pakutanga, kuti kuchauya pakuguma kwemazuva vanongoseka, vachifamba maererano neruchiva rwavo pachavo,
II Peter 3:4 uye vachiti: Chiripi chivimbiso chekuuya kwake? Nokuti kubva zvarara madzibaba zvinhu zvese zvakaramba zvakadaro kubva pakutanga kwekusikwa.
II Peter 3:5 Nokuti ichi vanokanganwa maune, kuti matenga aivapo kubva kare, nenyika, iripo kubva mumvura, kubudikidza nemvura, neshoko raMwari;
II Peter 3:6 nazvo nyika yaivapo nguva iyo yakafukidzwa nemvura yakaparadzwa.
II Peter 3:7 Asi matenga nenyika zviripo ikozvino zvakachengetwa neirori shoko, zvakachengeterwa moto pazuva rekutongwa nerekuparadzwa kwevanhu vasingadi Mwari.
II Peter 3:8 Asi chinhu chimwe ichi ngachirege kusazikanwa nemwi, vadikanwi, kuti zuva rimwe kuna Ishe <transChange type="added">ra</transChange>kaita samakore ane churu, nemakore ane churu sezuva rimwe.
II Peter 3:9 Ishe haanonoki maererano nechivimbiso, sevamwe vanoti kunonoka; asi ane moyo murefu kwatiri, asingadi kuti ani nani aparare asi vese vasvike pakutendeuka.
II Peter 3:10 Asi zuva raIshe richasvika sembavha usiku, naro matenga achapfuura nekutinhira kukuru, nezvekutanga zvichaguranyiwa nekupisa kukuru, nenyika nemabasa ari mairi achapiswa.
II Peter 3:11 Sezvo zvinhu izvi zvese zvichaparadzwa, imwi munofanira kuva vakadini pamafambiro matsvene nekunamata Mwari,
II Peter 3:12 makatarisira nekumhanyira kusvika kwezuva raMwari; naro matenga achipiswa achaparadzwa, nezvekutanga zvinyunguduke nekupisa kukuru.
II Peter 3:13 Asi sechivimbiso chake tinotarisira matenga matsva nenyika itsva, mazviri munogara kururama.
II Peter 3:14 Naizvozvo vadikanwi, zvamunotarisira zvinhu izvi, shingairai kuti muwanikwe naye murugare, musina gwapa uye musingamhuriki.
II Peter 3:15 Zvino muti moyo murefu waIshe wedu ruponeso, hama yedu inodikanwa Pauro sezvaakakunyoreraiwo zvichienderana nenjere dzakapiwa kwaari;
II Peter 3:16 semutsamba <transChange type="added">dzake</transChange> dzesewo, achitaura madziri maererano nezvinhu izvi; madziri mune zvimwe zvikukutu kunzwisisika, izvo avo vasina kudzidza nevasina kusimba vanozviminamisa, semamwewo magwaro, kusvika pakuparadzwa kwavo pachavo.
II Peter 3:17 Naizvozvo imwi, vadikanwi, zvamagara muchiziva, chenjerai kuti murege kutsauswa pamwe nekunyengera kwevasina murairo, muwe pakusimba kwenyu.
II Peter 3:18 Asi kurai munyasha neparuzivo rwaIshe wedu neMuponesi Jesu Kristu. Rukudzo <transChange type="added">ngaruende</transChange> kwaari ikozvinowo uye kusvika zuva rekusingaperi. Ameni. <div eID="gen1714" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1713" type="section"/> <chapter eID="2Pet.3"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1706" osisID="2Pet" type="book"/>
I John 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="1John" sID="gen1715" type="book"/>   <milestone n="1 JOHWANI" type="x-usfm-h"/>
I John 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="1John.1" sID="1John.1"/>
I John 1:1 Icho chakange chiripo kubva pakutanga, icho chatakanzwa, icho chatakaona nemeso edu, icho chatakatarira, uye maoko edu akachibata, cheShoko reupenyu,
I John 1:2 (uye upenyu hwakaratidzwa, tika<transChange type="added">hu</transChange>onawo, uye tinopupura nekukuparidzirai upenyu husingaperi, hwakange huna Baba, hukaratidzwawo kwatiri);
I John 1:3 icho chatakaona nekunzwa, tinokuparidzirai, kuti nemwi mudyidzane nesu; uyewo kudyidzana kwedu kuripo naBaba, uye neMwanakomana wavo Jesu Kristu;
I John 1:4 uye zvinhu izvi tinonyora kwamuri, kuti mufaro wenyu uzadziswe. <div eID="gen1717" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1716" type="section"/>
I John 1:5 Zvino iri ishoko ratakanzwa kwaari uye ratinoparidza kwamuri, kuti Mwari chiedza, uye maari hamuna rima zvachose.
I John 1:6 Kana tichiti tine kudyidzana naye, asi tichifamba murima, tinoreva nhema, uye hatiiti chokwadi;
I John 1:7 asi kana tichifamba muchiedza, saiye ari muchiedza, tine kudyidzana umwe neumwe, neropa raJesu Kristu Mwanakomana wake rinotinatsa pachivi chese.
I John 1:8 Kana tichiti hatina chivi, tinozvinyengera, nechokwadi hachisi matiri.
I John 1:9 Kana tichibvuma zvivi zvedu, iye wakatendeka uye wakarurama kuti atikanganwire zvivi, nekutinatsa pakusarurama kwese.
I John 1:10 Kana tichiti hatina kutadza, tinomuita murevi wenhema, neshoko rake harisi matiri. <chapter eID="1John.1"/><div eID="gen1719" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1718" type="section"/>
I John 2:0 <div sID="gen1720" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="1John.2" sID="1John.2"/>  <div sID="gen1721" type="x-p"/>
I John 2:1 Vana vangu vadiki, zvinhu izvi ndinokunyorerai, kuti musatadza. Uye kana umwe achitadza, tine Murevereri kuna Baba, Jesu Kristu wakarurama;
I John 2:2 uye iye muripo wekuyananisa wezvivi zvedu; kwete wezvedu chetewo, asiwo wezvenyika yese.
I John 2:3 Uye mune izvi tinoziva kuti tinomuziva, kana tichichengeta mirairo yake.
I John 2:4 Uyo anoti: Ndinomuziva, asi asingachengeti mirairo yake, murevi wenhema, nemaari chokwadi hachimo;
I John 2:5 asi ani nani anochengeta shoko rake, zvirokwazvo rudo rwaMwari rwakaperedzerwa maari. Naizvozvi tinoziva kuti tiri maari.
I John 2:6 Uyo anoti anogara maari iye anofanirawo kufamba saizvozvo sezvaakafamba iyewo. <div eID="gen1721" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1720" type="section"/>
I John 2:7 Hama, handinyori murairo mutsva kwamuri, asi murairo mutsaru, wamakange munawo kubva pakutanga; murairo mutsaru ishoko ramakanzwa kubva pakutanga.
I John 2:8 Ndinopamha kukunyorerai murairo mutsva, chiri chinhu chechokwadi maari nemamuri; nokuti rima rinopfuura, zvino chiedza chechokwadi chadovhenekera.
I John 2:9 Uyo anoti ari muchiedza, achivengawo hama yake, ari murima kusvikira zvino.
I John 2:10 Uyo anoda hama yake anogara muchiedza, uye hapana chigumbuso maari.
I John 2:11 Asi uyo anovenga hama yake ari murima, uye anofamba murima, haaziviwo kwaanoenda, nokuti rima rakapofumadza meso ake. <div eID="gen1723" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1722" type="section"/>
I John 2:12 Ndinonyorera imwi, vana vadiki, nokuti zvivi makazvikanganwirwa nekuda kwezita rake.
I John 2:13 Ndinonyorera imwi, madzibaba, nokuti makamuziva u<transChange type="added">ripo</transChange> kubva pakutanga. Ndinonyorera imwi, vadiki, nokuti makakunda wakaipa. Ndinonyorera imwi, vanana, nokuti makaziva Baba.
I John 2:14 Ndanyorera imwi, madzibaba, nokuti makamuziva iye <transChange type="added">wakange aripo</transChange> kubva pakutanga. Ndanyora kwamuri, vadiki, nokuti makasimba, uye shoko raMwari rinogara mamuri uye makakunda wakaipa.
I John 2:15 Musada nyika, kana zvinhu zviri munyika. Kana umwe achida nyika, rudo rwaBaba harwusi maari.
I John 2:16 Nokuti zvese zviri munyika, kuchiva kwenyama, nekuchiva kwameso, nekuzvikudza kweupenyu, hazvibvi kuna Baba, asi zvinobva panyika.
I John 2:17 Uye nyika inopfuura, nekuchiva kwayo; asi anoita kuda kwaMwari anogara kusvika rinhi narinhi. <div eID="gen1725" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1724" type="section"/>
I John 2:18 Vana vadiki, inguva yekupedzisira; uye sezvamakanzwa kuti mupikisi waKristu anouya, naikozvino vazhinji vava vapikisi vaKristu; ndizvo zvinotizivisa kuti yava nguva yekupedzisira.
I John 2:19 Vakabuda kwatiri, asi vakange vasiri vanobva kwedu, nokuti dai vaibva kwedu, vangadai vaigara nesu; asi <transChange type="added">vakabuda</transChange> kuti varatidzwe kuti havasi vese vanobva kwedu.
I John 2:20 Asi imwi mune kuzodzwa kunobva kune Mutsvene, uye munoziva zvinhu zvese.
I John 2:21 Handina kukunyorerai nokuti hamuzivi chokwadi, asi nokuti munochiziva, uye nokuti hakutongorina nhema dzingabva pachokwadi.
I John 2:22 Ndiani murevi wenhema, kunze kwaiye anoramba kuti Jesu ndiKristu? Iye mupikisi waKristu, anoramba Baba neMwanakomana.
I John 2:23 Ani nani anoramba Mwanakomana haanawo Baba; anobvuma Mwanakomana ana Babawo.
I John 2:24 Zvino imwi zvamakanzwa kubva pakutanga ngazvigare mamuri. Kana zvamakanzwa kubva pakutanga zvichigara mamuri, imwiwo muchagara muMwanakomana nemuna Baba.
I John 2:25 Uye ichi ndicho chivimbiso chaakativimbisa iye, upenyu husingaperi.
I John 2:26 Zvinhu izvi ndakakunyorerai pamusoro pevanokutsausai.
I John 2:27 Asi imwi kuzodzwa kwamakagamuchira kwaari kunogara mamuri, uye hamutsvaki kuti umwe akudzidzisei; asi kuzodzwa ikoku sezvakunokudzidzisai pamusoro pezvinhu zvese, uye kuri chokwadi, dzisati dziri nhema, uye sezvakwakakudzidzisai, muchagara maari.
I John 2:28 Uye ikozvino, vana vadiki, garai maari, kuti kana achizoonekwa, tive nechivimbo, tiregewo kunyadziswa naye pakuuya kwake.
I John 2:29 Kana muchiziva kuti wakarurama, munoziva kuti umwe neumwe anoita zvakarurama wakaberekwa naye.  <chapter eID="1John.2"/><div eID="gen1727" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1726" type="section"/>
I John 3:0 <div sID="gen1728" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="1John.3" sID="1John.3"/>  <div sID="gen1729" type="x-p"/>
I John 3:1 Tarirai kuti rudo rwakadini Baba rwavakatipa, kuti tinzi vana vaMwari. Nekuda kwaizvozvi nyika haitizivi, nokuti haina kumuziva iye.
I John 3:2 Vadikanwi, ikozvino tiri vana vaMwari, uye zvichigere kuratidzwa kuti tichazovei. Asi tinoziva kuti kana achizoratidzwa, tichafanana naye; nokuti tichamuona sezvaakaita.
I John 3:3 Uye umwe neumwe ane tariro iyi maari anozvichenesa, sezvaakachena iye.
I John 3:4 Umwe neumwe anoita chivi anoitawo kusava nemurairo; uye chivi ndiko kusava nemurairo.
I John 3:5 Uye munoziva kuti iye wakaratidzwa kuti abvise zvivi zvedu; uye zvivi hazvimo maari.
I John 3:6 Ani nani anogara maari haatadzi; ani nani anotadza haana kumuona, kana kumuziva.
I John 3:7 Vana vadiki, kusava neanokunyengerai; uyo anoita kururama wakarurama, saiye akarurama;
I John 3:8 uyo anoita chivi anobva kuna dhiabhorosi, nokuti dhiabhorosi anotadza kubva pakutanga. Nechikonzero ichi Mwanakomana waMwari wakaratidzwa kuti aparadze mabasa adhiabhorosi.
I John 3:9 Ani nani wakaberekwa naMwari haaiti chivi, nokuti mbeu yake inogara maari; zvino haagoni kutadza, nokuti wakaberekwa naMwari.
I John 3:10 Mune izvozvi vana vaMwari nevana vadhiabhorosi vanoratidzwa; ani nani asingaiti zvakarurama haabvi kuna Mwari, neasingadi hama yake.
I John 3:11 Nokuti iri ndiro shoko ramakanzwa kubva pakutanga, kuti tidanane;
I John 3:12 kwete saKaini wakabva kune wakaipa, ndokuuraya munin'ina wake. Zvino wakamuurayirei? Nokuti mabasa ake akange akaipa, asi emunin'ina wake akange akarurama.
I John 3:13 Musashamisika, hama dzangu, kana nyika ichikuvengai.
I John 3:14 Isu tinoziva kuti takapfuura murufu tikapinda muupenyu, nokuti tinoda hama. Asingadi hama anogara murufu.
I John 3:15 Ani nani anovenga hama yake imhondi; uye munoziva kuti hakutongorina mhondi ine upenyu husingaperi hunogara mairi.
I John 3:16 Neizvi tinoziva rudo rwaMwari, nokuti iye wakatiradzikira pasi upenyu hwake; nesu tinofanira kuradzikira pasi hama upenyu.
I John 3:17 Asi ani nani ane nhumbi dzenyika, uye achiona hama yake ichishaiwa, ndokumupfigira tsitsi dzake, rudo rwaMwari rwunogara sei maari?
I John 3:18 Vana vangu vadiki, ngatirege kuda pashoko kana parurimi, asi pazviito nepachokwadi.
I John 3:19 Uye neizvi tinoziva kuti tiri vechokwadi, uye tichavimbisa moyo yedu pamberi pake.
I John 3:20 Nokuti kana moyo wedu uchi<transChange type="added">ti</transChange>pa mhosva, Mwari mukuru kumoyo wedu, uye anoziva zvinhu zvese.
I John 3:21 Vadikanwi, kana moyo wedu usingatipi mhosva, tine chivimbo pamberi paMwari;
I John 3:22 uye chipi nechipi chatinokumbira, tinogamuchira kubva kwaari, nokuti tinochengeta mirairo yake, uye tinoita zvinhu zvinofadza pamberi pake.
I John 3:23 Uye uyu ndiwo murairo wake, kuti titende kuzita reMwanakomana wake Jesu Kristu, uye tidanane, sezvaakatipa murairo.
I John 3:24 Uye uyo anochengeta mirairo yake anogara maari, naiye maari. Neizviwo tinoziva kuti anogara matiri, kubva paMweya waakatipa. <chapter eID="1John.3"/><div eID="gen1729" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1728" type="section"/>
I John 4:0 <div sID="gen1730" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="1John.4" sID="1John.4"/>  <div sID="gen1731" type="x-p"/>
I John 4:1 Vadikanwi, musatenda mweya umwe neumwe, asi muidze mweya, kana yakabva kuna Mwari; nokuti vazhinji vaporofita venhema vakabudira munyika.
I John 4:2 Neizvi munoziva Mweya waMwari: Wese mweya unobvuma kuti Jesu Kristu wakauya panyama, unobva muna Mwari.
I John 4:3 Zvino mweya wese usingabvumi kuti Jesu Kristu wakauya panyama, haubvi muna Mwari; uye uyu ndiye wemupikisi waKristu, wamakanzwa kuti anouya, naikozvino watova panyika.
I John 4:4 Imwi munobva muna Mwari, vana vadiki, uye makavakunda; nokuti ari mamuri mukuru kune ari munyika.
I John 4:5 Ivo vanobva munyika; naizvozvo vanotaura zvinobva munyika, uye nyika inovanzwa.
I John 4:6 Isu tinobva muna Mwari; uyo anoziva Mwari, anotinzwa; asingabvi muna Mwari, haatinzwi. Kubva pane izvi tinoziva mweya wechokwadi nemweya wekutsauka. <div eID="gen1731" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1730" type="section"/>
I John 4:7 Vadikanwi, ngatidanane; nokuti rudo rwunobva muna Mwari, uye umwe neumwe anoda wakaberekwa kubva muna Mwari, uye anoziva Mwari.
I John 4:8 Asingadi, haazivi Mwari, nokuti Mwari rudo.
I John 4:9 Pane izvi rudo rwaMwari rwakaratidzwa matiri, kuti Mwari wakatuma Mwanakomana wake wakaberekwa umwe wega munyika, kuti tirarame kubudikidza naye.
I John 4:10 Rudo rwuri pachinhu ichi, kwete kuti isu takada Mwari, asi kuti iye wakatida, akatuma Mwanakomana wake <transChange type="added">kuti ave</transChange> muripo wekuyananisa maererano nezvivi zvedu.
I John 4:11 Vadikanwi, kana Mwari akatida saizvozvo, nesu tinofanira kudanana.
I John 4:12 Hakuna wakamboona Mwari; kana tichidanana, Mwari anogara matiri, uye rudo rwake rwunoperedzerwa matiri.
I John 4:13 Pane izvi tinoziva kuti tinogara maari, naiye matiri, nokuti wakatipa zvinobva paMweya wake.
I John 4:14 Isuwo takaona uye tinopupura kuti Baba vakatuma Mwanakomana <transChange type="added">kuva</transChange> Muponesi wenyika.
I John 4:15 Ani nani anobvuma kuti Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari, Mwari anogara maari, naiye muna Mwari.
I John 4:16 Nesu takaziva uye takatenda rudo Mwari rwaanarwo kwatiri. Mwari rudo, uye anogara murudo anogara muna Mwari, naMwari maari.
I John 4:17 Pane izvi rudo rwakapedzeredzwa nesu, kuti tive neushingi nezuva rekutonga, nokuti sezvaari iye, nesu taka<transChange type="added">daro</transChange> kunyika ino.
I John 4:18 Hakuna kutya murudo, asi rudo rwakaperera rwunodzingira kunze kutya, nokuti kutya kune marwadzo; anotya haana kuperedzerwa parudo.
I John 4:19 Isu tinomuda, nokuti iye wakatanga kutida.
I John 4:20 Kana umwe achitaura kuti: Ndinoda Mwari, asi achivenga hama yake, murevi wenhema; nokuti uyo asingadi hama yake yaakaona, anogona sei kuda Mwari waasina kuona?
I John 4:21 Uye murairo uyu tinawo kubva kwaari, kuti anoda Mwari ngaadewo hama yake.  <chapter eID="1John.4"/><div eID="gen1733" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1732" type="section"/>
I John 5:0 <div sID="gen1734" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="1John.5" sID="1John.5"/>  <div sID="gen1735" type="x-p"/>
I John 5:1 Ani nani anotenda kuti Jesu ndiye Kristu, wakaberekwa kubva kuna Mwari; uye ani nani anoda uyo wakabereka anodawo wakaberekwa kubva kwaari.
I John 5:2 Pane izvi tinoziva kuti tinoda vana vaMwari, kana tichida Mwari, uye tichichengeta mirairo yake.
I John 5:3 Nokuti urwu rudo rwaMwari, kuti tichengete mirairo yake; uye mirairo yake hairemi.
I John 5:4 Nokuti chipi nechipi chakaberekwa kubva kuna Mwari chinokunda nyika; uye uku ndiko kukunda kunokunda nyika, <transChange type="added">irwo</transChange> rutendo rwedu.
I John 5:5 Ndiani anokunda nyika, kana asiri iye anotenda kuti Jesu Mwanakomana waMwari?
I John 5:6 Uyu ndiye wakauya nemvura neropa, <transChange type="added">iye</transChange> Jesu Kristu; kwete nemvura yega, asi nemvura neropa. Zvino Mweya ndiye anopupura, nokuti Mweya ichokwadi.
I John 5:7 Nokuti kune vatatu vanopupura kudenga, Baba, Shoko, naMweya Mutsvene; uye ava vatatu ndimumwe.
I John 5:8 Uye kune vatatu vanopupura panyika, Mweya, nemvura, neropa, uye ava vatatu vanonova chimwe.
I John 5:9 Kana tichigamuchira uchapupu hwevanhu, uchapupu hwaMwari hwakapfuura kukura; nokuti uhu uchapupu hwaMwari, hwaakapupura pamusoro peMwanakomana wake.
I John 5:10 Uyo anotenda kuMwanakomana waMwari ane uchapupu maari pachake; asingatendi Mwari wakamuita murevi wenhema, nokuti haana kutenda uchapupu Mwari hwaakapupura maererano neMwanakomana wake.
I John 5:11 Uye uhu ndihwo uchapupu, kuti Mwari wakatipa upenyu husingaperi; zvino upenyu uhu huri muMwanakomana wake.
I John 5:12 Uyo ane Mwanakomana ane upenyu; uyo asina Mwanakomana waMwari haana upenyu. <div eID="gen1735" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1734" type="section"/>
I John 5:13 Zvinhu izvi ndazvinyora kwamuri imwi munotenda kuzita reMwanakomana waMwari, kuti muzive kuti mune upenyu husingaperi, uye kuti mutende kuzita reMwanakomana waMwari.
I John 5:14 Uye uhu ndihwo ushingi hwatinahwo maari, kuti kana tichikumbira chinhu zvinoenderana nekuda kwake, anotinzwa;
I John 5:15 zvino kana tichiziva kuti anotinzwa, zvese zvatinokumbira, tinoziva kuti tine zvichemo zvatakakumbira kwaari.
I John 5:16 Kana umwe achiona hama yake ichitadza chivi chisiri cherufu, achakumbira, uye achamupa upenyu kune vasingatadzi chivi cherufu. Chiripo chivi cherufu; handisi kuti akumbire pamusoro pechichi.
I John 5:17 Kusarurama kwese chivi; uye chivi chiripo chisiri cherufu.
I John 5:18 Tinoziva kuti ani nani wakaberekwa kubva kuna Mwari haatadzi; asi uyo wakaberekwa kubva kuna Mwari anozvichengeta, uye wakaipa haamubati.
I John 5:19 Tinoziva kuti tiri vanobva kuna Mwari, nenyika yese irere muzvakaipa.
I John 5:20 Uye tinoziva kuti Mwanakomana waMwari wakauya, akatipa kunzwisisa kuti tizive iye wechokwadi; nesu tiri mune wechokwadi, muMwanakomana wake Jesu Kristu. Uyu ndiye Mwari wechokwadi, neupenyu husingaperi.
I John 5:21 Vana vadiki, zvichengetedzei pazvifananidzo. Ameni. <div eID="gen1737" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1736" type="section"/> <chapter eID="1John.5"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1715" osisID="1John" type="book"/>
II John 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="2John" sID="gen1738" type="book"/>   <milestone n="2 JOHWANI" type="x-usfm-h"/>
II John 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="2John.1" sID="2John.1"/>
II John 1:1 Mukuru kuna amai vakasanangurwa nekuvana vavo, ini vandinoda muchokwadi, uye kwete ini ndega, asiwo vese vakaziva chokwadi,
II John 1:2 nekuda kwechokwadi chinogara matiri, uye chichava nesu nekusingaperi.
II John 1:3 Ngazvive nemwi nyasha, tsitsi, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>rugare zvinobva kuna Mwari Baba, nekuna Ishe Jesu Kristu Mwanakomana waBaba, muchokwadi nerudo. <div eID="gen1740" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1739" type="section"/>
II John 1:4 Ndinofara zvikuru kuti ndakawana kubva pavana vako vanofamba muchokwadi, sezvatakagamuchira murairo kuna Baba.
II John 1:5 Ikozvinowo ndinokukumbirisai, amai, kwete sendinokunyorerai murairo mutsva, asi uyo watakange tinawo kubva pakutanga, kuti tidanane.
II John 1:6 Zvino urwu ndirwo rudo, kuti tifambe zvinoenderana nemirairo yake. Uyu ndiwo murairo, sezvamakanzwa kubva pakutanga, kuti mufambe mauri.
II John 1:7 Nokuti vanyepedzeri vazhinji vakapinda munyika, vasingabvumi kuti Jesu Kristu wakauya panyama. Uyu ndiye munyepedzeri nemupikisi waKristu.
II John 1:8 Zvichenjererei pachenyu, kuti tirege kurasikirwa nezvinhu zvatakabatira, asi tigamuchire mubairo wakakwana.
II John 1:9 Ani nani anodarika uye asingagari mudzidziso yaKristu, haana Mwari; asi uyo anogara mudzidziso yaKristu, uyu ana Babawo uye Mwanakomana.
II John 1:10 Kana umwe achiuya kwamuri, asingauyi nedzidziso iyi, musamugamuchira mumba, kana kuti kwaari: Kwaziwai;
II John 1:11 nokuti anoti kwaari: Kwaziwai, anodyidzana nemabasa ake akaipa. <div eID="gen1742" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1741" type="section"/>
II John 1:12 Kunyange ndine zvinhu zvizhinji zvekunyora kwamuri, handina kuda <transChange type="added">kukunyorerai</transChange> pabepa neingi; asi ndinotarisira kuuya kwamuri, uye kutaura muromo nemuromo, kuti mufaro wenyu uve wakazara.
II John 1:13 Vana vemunin'ina wenyu wakasanangurwa vanokukwazisai. Ameni. <div eID="gen1744" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1743" type="section"/> <chapter eID="2John.1"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1738" osisID="2John" type="book"/>
III John 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="3John" sID="gen1745" type="book"/>   <milestone n="3 JOHWANI" type="x-usfm-h"/>
III John 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="3John.1" sID="3John.1"/>
III John 1:1 Mukuru, kuna Gayo anodikanwa, wandinoda ini pachokwadi. <div eID="gen1747" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1746" type="section"/>
III John 1:2 Mudikanwi, ndinonyengetera pazvinhu zvese kuti ubudirire, uye ugwinye, semweya wako uchibudirira.
III John 1:3 Nokuti ndakafara zvikuru, hama padzakasvika ndokupupurira chokwadi chako, sezvaunofamba iwe muchokwadi.
III John 1:4 Handina mufaro unopfuura izvi, kuti ndinzwe vana vangu vachifamba muchokwadi.
III John 1:5 Mudikanwi, unoita nekutendeka zvese zvaunobata kuhama nekuvaeni,
III John 1:6 vakapupurira rudo rwako pamberi pekereke; uchaita zvakanaka kana ukavaperekedza zvakafanira Mwari.
III John 1:7 Nokuti nekuda kwezita rake vakabuda vasingagamuchiri chinhu kuvahedheni.
III John 1:8 Naizvozvo isu tinofanira kugamuchira vakadaro, kuti tigova vanobatsirana pachokwadi. <div eID="gen1749" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1748" type="section"/>
III John 1:9 Ndakanyorera kereke; asi Dhiotirefesi, anoda kuva wekutanga pakati pavo asingatigamuchiri.
III John 1:10 Naizvozvo, kana ndichiuya, ndicharangarira mabasa ake aanoita, achitiitira makuhwa nemashoko akaipa; uye asingagutsikani neizvozvo, kunyange iye amene haagamuchiri hama, uye anovadzivisa vanoda, nekudzinga mukereke.
III John 1:11 Mudikanwi, usatevera chakaipa, asi chakanaka. Anoita chakanaka ndeanobva kuna Mwari; asi anoita zvakaipa, haana kuona Mwari.
III John 1:12 Dhemetrio anopupurirwa zvakanaka nevese, uye nechokwadi pachacho; nesuwo tinopupura, nemwi munoziva kuti kupupura kwedu ndekwechokwadi. <div eID="gen1751" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1750" type="section"/>
III John 1:13 Ndakange ndine zvizhinji zvekunyora, asi handidi kukunyorera neingi nepeni;
III John 1:14 asi ndinovimba kukurumidza kukuona, titauriranewo muromo nemuromo. Rugare kwauri. Vadikanwi vanokukwazisa. Kwazisa vadikanwi nezita. <div eID="gen1753" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1752" type="section"/> <chapter eID="3John.1"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1745" osisID="3John" type="book"/>
Jude 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Jude" sID="gen1754" type="book"/>   <milestone n="JUDHA" type="x-usfm-h"/>
Jude 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Jude.1" sID="Jude.1"/>
Jude 1:1 Judha muranda waJesu Kristu, uye munin'ina waJakobho, kune vakaitwa vatsvene muna Mwari Baba, uye vakachengetedzwa muna Jesu Kristu, vakadanwa:
Jude 1:2 Tsitsi kwamuri, nerugare, nerudo, ngazvipamhidzirwe. <div eID="gen1756" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1755" type="section"/>
Jude 1:3 Vadikanwi, ndichiita kushingaira kwese kukunyorerai zvekuponeswa kwedu tese, zvakange zvakandifanira kukunyorerai, ndichikurudzira kuti murwire rutendo rwakapiwa vatsvene kamwe.
Jude 1:4 Nokuti kuna vamwe vanhu vakapinda nekunyangira, vakagara vanyorerwa kupiwa mhosva uku, vasingadi Mwari, vanoshandura nyasha dzaMwari wedu kuita unzenza, uye vachiramba Tenzi umwe wega Mwari, naIshe wedu Jesu Kristu.
Jude 1:5 Asi ndinoda kukuyeuchidzai, kunyange maiziva ichi kamwe, kuti Ishe aponesa vanhu munyika yeEgipita, pashure akazoparadza avo vakange vasingatendi.
Jude 1:6 Nevatumwa vasina kuchengeta ukuru hwavo, asi vakasiya ugaro hwavo pachavo, waka<transChange type="added">va</transChange>chengetera kutonga kwezuva guru nezvisungo zvekusingaperi pasi perima.
Jude 1:7 SeSodhoma neGomora, nemaguta akaapoteredza, akazvikumikidza kuupombwe nenzira yakafanana nawo, nekutevera imwe nyama, akaitwa mufananidzo pachena, akatambudzika pakurangwa nemoto usingaperi.
Jude 1:8 Saizvozvowo neimwe nzira neava vachirota zvirokwazvo vanosvibisa nyama, vachiramba utongi, nekutuka ukuru.
Jude 1:9 Asi Mikaeri mutumwa mukuru, nguva yaakapokana nadhiabhorosi akakakavara pamusoro pemutumbi waMozisi, haana kushinga kumupa mhosva nemutongo wekutuka, asi wakati: Ishe ngaakutsiure.
Jude 1:10 Asi ava vanotuka zvese zvavasingazivi; asi zvese zvavanoziva pachisikirwo, semhuka dzisina pfungwa, vanozviparadza muzvinhu izvi.
Jude 1:11 Vane nhamo! Nokuti vakafamba nenzira yaKaini, uye vakazviwisira mukutsauka kwaBharami nekuda kwemubairo, vakaparadzwa panharo dzaKora.
Jude 1:12 Ava makwapa pamabiko enyu erudo, kana vachipemberera nemwi, vachizvifunda vasina kutya; makore asina mvura, anotinhwa nemhepo; miti yechando, isina zvibereko, yakafa kaviri, yakadzurwa;
Jude 1:13 mafungu egungwa anopengereka, anopupuma nyadzi dzawo pachawo; nyeredzi dzinongombeya, vakachengeterwa kusviba kwerima nekusingaperi.
Jude 1:14 NaEnokiwo wechinomwe kubva kuna Adhamu, wakaporofita zvaivava achiti: Tarira, Ishe wakauya nevatsvene vake zvuru zvamazana,
Jude 1:15 kuzoita mutongo unopikisa vese, nekupa mhosva vese vavo vasingadi Mwari pamusoro pemabasa avo ese ekusada Mwari, avakaita mukusada Mwari, nepamusoro pezvikukutu zvese vatadzi vasingadi Mwari zvavakataura maererano naye.
Jude 1:16 Ava van'un'uni, vasingagutsikani, vanofamba nekuchiva kwavo; uye muromo wavo unotaura zvekuzvikudza, vachirumbidza vanhu nekuda kwemubairo. <div eID="gen1758" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1757" type="section"/>
Jude 1:17 Asi imwi vadikanwi, rangarirai mashoko akagara ataurwa nevaapositori vaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu;
Jude 1:18 kuti vakati kwamuri: Panguva yekupedzisira vaseki vachavapo, vachafamba nekuchiva kwavo kwekusada Mwari.
Jude 1:19 Ava ndivo vanozviparadzanisa, ndevechisikirwo, vasina Mweya.
Jude 1:20 Asi imwi vadikanwi, muchizvivaka parutendo rwenyu rwutsvene-tsvene, muchinyengetera muMweya Mutsvene,
Jude 1:21 muzvichengete murudo rwaMwari, muchitarisira tsitsi dzaIshe wedu, Jesu Kristu, kusvikira kuupenyu husingaperi.
Jude 1:22 Ivaiwo netsitsi nevamwe muchipa mutsauko,
Jude 1:23 asi vamwe mu<transChange type="added">va</transChange>ponese nekutya, muchi<transChange type="added">va</transChange>bvuta kubva mumoto; muchivenga kunyange nguvo yakasvibiswa nezvinobva panyama. <div eID="gen1760" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1759" type="section"/>
Jude 1:24 Zvino kuna iye anogona kukuchengetai pasina kugumburwa, neku<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>teya<transChange type="added">i </transChange>musina chamungapomerwa pamberi pekubwinya kwake mumufaro mukuru,
Jude 1:25 kuna Mwari umwe wakachenjera, Muponesi wedu, ngakuve nekubwinya uye ukuru, simba uye umambo, ikozvinowo narinhi kwese. Ameni. <div eID="gen1762" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1761" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Jude.1"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1754" osisID="Jude" type="book"/>
Revelation of John 0:0 <div canonical="true" osisID="Rev" sID="gen1763" type="book"/>   <milestone n="ZVAKAZARURWA" type="x-usfm-h"/>
Revelation of John 1:0 <chapter n="1" osisID="Rev.1" sID="Rev.1"/>
Revelation of John 1:1 Chakazarurwa chaJesu Kristu, Mwari chaakapa kwaari, kuti aratidze kuvaranda vake zvinhu zvinofanira kukurumidza kuitika, zvino a<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>tuma nemutumwa wake wakaratidza muranda wake Johwani,
Revelation of John 1:2 iye wakapupura shoko raMwari uye uchapupu hwaJesu Kristu, nezvese zvaakaona.
Revelation of John 1:3 Wakaropafadzwa anoverenga, nevanonzwa mashoko echiporofita ichi vachichengeta zvakanyorwa machiri; nokuti nguva yava pedo. <div eID="gen1765" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1764" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 1:4 Johwani kumakereke manomwe ari muAsia: Nyasha kwamuri nerugare zvinobva kuna iye aripo uye wakange aripo neachazouya; nekuMweya minomwe iri pamberi pechigaro chake cheushe;
Revelation of John 1:5 nekuna Jesu Kristu, chapupu chakatendeka, dangwe kubva kune vakafa, nemutungamiriri wemadzimambo enyika. Kuna iye wakatida, akatisuka kubva pazvivi zvedu muropa rake;
Revelation of John 1:6 akatiitawo madzimambo nevapristi kuna Mwari naBaba vake; kwaari <transChange type="added">ngakuve</transChange> kubwinya nesimba kusvikira rinhi narinhi. Ameni.
Revelation of John 1:7 Tarira, anouya pamwe nemakore, uye ziso rese richamuona, neavo vakamubaya; nemarudzi ese enyika achachema nekuda kwake. Hongu. Ameni. <div eID="gen1767" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 1:8 Ini ndini Arifa naOmega, Kutanga neKupedzisira, anoreva Ishe, aripo, newakange aripo, neachazouya, Wemasimbaose. <div eID="gen1768" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1766" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 1:9 Ini Johwani, <transChange type="added">ndiri</transChange> hama yenyuwo, uye mufambidzani pakutambudzika nemuushe nekutsungirira kwaJesu Kristu, ndakange ndiri pachiwi chinonzi Patimosi, nekuda kweshoko raMwari uye nekuda kweuchapupu hwaJesu Kristu.
Revelation of John 1:10 Ndakange ndiri muMweya nezuva raIshe, zvino ndakanzwa shure kwangu inzwi guru, serehwamanda,
Revelation of John 1:11 richiti: Ndini Arifa naOmega, Wekutanga neWekupedzisira; uye <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange>: Zvaunoona, nyora mubhuku, uye tumira kumakereke manomwe ari muAsia, kuEfeso, nekuSimirina, nekuPerigamo, nekuTiatira, nekuSaridhisi, nekuFiradhefia, nekuRaodhikia. <div eID="gen1770" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 1:12 Zvino ndikatendeuka kuona inzwi rakataura neni. Ndatendeukawo ndakaona zvigadziko zvemwenje zvegoridhe zvinomwe,
Revelation of John 1:13 nepakati pezvigadziko zvemwenje zvinomwe, <transChange type="added">mumwe</transChange> wakaita seMwanakomana wemunhu, akapfeka nguvo yakasvikira kutsoka, uye akazvisunga kupoteredza chifuva nebhanhire regoridhe.
Revelation of John 1:14 Nemusoro wake nemavhudzi zvakachena semakushe emakwai machena, semagada echando; uye meso ake semurazvo wemoto;
Revelation of John 1:15 uye tsoka dzake dzakafanana nendarira yakakwenenzverwa, sedzinenge dzakapiswa muvira remoto; neinzwi rake seinzwi remvura zhinji.
Revelation of John 1:16 Uye wakange ane muruoko rwake rwerudyi nyeredzi nomwe; zvino mumuromo make makabuda munondo unopinza unocheka mativi maviri; uye chiso chake chaiva sezuva rinopenya musimba raro. <div eID="gen1771" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 1:17 Zvino pandakamuona, ndakawira patsoka dzake sewakafa; ndokuisa ruoko rwake rwerudyi pamusoro pangu, achiti kwandiri: Usatya; ndini wekutanga newekupedzisira;
Revelation of John 1:18 uye mupenyu; ndakange ndakafawo, zvino tarira, ndiri mupenyu kusvikira rinhi narinhi. Ameni. Uye ndine kiyi dzegehena nedzerufu.
Revelation of John 1:19 Nyora zvawaona, nezvinhu zviripo, nezvinhu zvichazovapo shure kweizvi.
Revelation of John 1:20 Chakavanzika chenyeredzi nomwe dzawaona paruoko rwangu rwerudyi, nezvigadziko zvemwenje zvinomwe zvegoridhe. Nyeredzi nomwe ndivo vatumwa vekereke nomwe; nezvigadziko zvemwenje zvinomwe zvawaona ndidzo kereke nomwe. <chapter eID="Rev.1"/><div eID="gen1772" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1769" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 2:0 <div sID="gen1773" type="section"/> <chapter n="2" osisID="Rev.2" sID="Rev.2"/>  <div sID="gen1774" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 2:1 Kumutumwa wekereke yeEfeso nyora <transChange type="added">uti</transChange>: Zvinhu izvi ndizvo zvinotaura iye wakabata nyeredzi nomwe muruoko rwake rwerudyi, anofamba pakati pezvigadziko zvemwenje zvinomwe zvegoridhe,
Revelation of John 2:2 <transChange type="added">achiti:</transChange> Ndinoziva mabasa ako, nekuremerwa kwako, nekutsungirira kwako, uye kuti haugoni kumirisana nevakaipa, uye wakavaidza ivo vanoti vaapositori asi vasiri ivo, uye wakavawana <transChange type="added">vari</transChange> varevi venhema,
Revelation of John 2:3 wakamirawo uye ukava nemoyo murefu, uye nekuda kwezita rangu wakarwisa, ukasaneta.
Revelation of John 2:4 Asi ndine kupikisana newe, kuti wakasiya rudo rwako rwekutanga.
Revelation of John 2:5 Naizvozvo rangarira pawakawa, uye tendeuka, uitewo mabasa ekutanga; kana zvikasadarowo ndichauya kwauri nekukurumidza, uye ndichabvisa chigadziko chako chemwenje kubva panzvimbo yacho, kana usingatendeuki.
Revelation of John 2:6 Asi ichi unacho, kuti unovenga mabasa aVaNikoraiti, neni andinovenga.
Revelation of John 2:7 Ane nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya kumakereke. Kuna iye anokunda ndichapa kuti adye zvemuti weupenyu uri pakati peParadhiso yaMwari. <div eID="gen1774" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1773" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 2:8 Nekumutumwa wekereke yeSimirina nyora <transChange type="added">uti</transChange>: Zvinhu izvi ndizvo zvinotaura Wekutanga neWekupedzisira, wakava akafa ndokurarama:
Revelation of John 2:9 Ndinoziva mabasa ako nedambudziko neurombo (asi uri mufumi), nekutuka kwevanoti ivo VaJudha pachavo, asi vasiri, asi vari sinagoge raSatani.
Revelation of John 2:10 Usatya chimwe chezvinhu zvaoda kutambudzika nazvo; tarira, dhiabhorosi woda kukanda <transChange type="added">vamwe</transChange> venyu mutirongo, kuti muidzwe; uye muchava nedambudziko mazuva gumi. Uve wakatendeka kusvikira parufu, zvino ndichakupa korona yeupenyu.
Revelation of John 2:11 Ane nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya kumakereke. Anokunda haatongokuvadzwi nerufu rwechipiri. <div eID="gen1776" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1775" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 2:12 Uye kumutumwa wekereke yePegamo nyora <transChange type="added">uti</transChange>: Zvinhu izvi anotaura iye ane munondo unopinza mativi maviri:
Revelation of John 2:13 Ndinoziva mabasa ako uye paunogara, ipo pane chigaro cheushe chaSatani, uye wakabatisisa zita rangu, uye hauna kuramba rutendo rwangu, kunyange pamazuva paiva naAntipasi, chapupu changu chakatendeka, wakaurawa pakati penyu, apo panogara Satani.
Revelation of John 2:14 Asi ndine zvinhu zvishoma zvinopokana newe, nokuti unavo ipapo vanobatirira dzidziso yaBharami, wakadzidzisa Bharaki kukanda chigumbuso pamberi pevana vaIsraeri, kuti vadye zvakabairwa zvifananidzo nekuita upombwe.
Revelation of John 2:15 Saizvozvo newe unavo vanobatisisa dzidziso yeVaNikoraiti, chinhu chandinovenga.
Revelation of John 2:16 Tendeuka; zvino kana zvikasadaro, ndichakurumidza kuuya kwauri, ndigorwa navo nemunondo wemuromo wangu.
Revelation of John 2:17 Ane nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya kumakereke. Anokunda, ndichapa kwaari kuti adye kubva pamana yakavanzika, uye ndichamupa ibwe jena, nepabwe <transChange type="added">iro</transChange> zita idzva rakanyorwa, risina anoziva, kunze kweano<transChange type="added">ri</transChange>gamuchira. <div eID="gen1778" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1777" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 2:18 Nekumutumwa wekereke iri paTiatira nyora <transChange type="added">uti</transChange>: Izvi anoreva Mwanakomana waMwari, ane meso ake akafanana nemurazvo wemoto, netsoka dzake dzakaita sendarira yakakwenenzverwa:
Revelation of John 2:19 Ndinoziva mabasa ako, nerudo, nekushumira, nerutendo, nekutsungirira kwako, uye mabasa ako, uye <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> ekupedzisira anopfuura ekutanga.
Revelation of John 2:20 Asi ndine zvinhu zvishoma zvinopokana newe, kuti unotendera mukadzi Jezebheri, anozviidza muporofitakadzi kudzidzisa nekutsausa varanda vangu kuti vaite upombwe nekudya zvakabairwa zvifananidzo.
Revelation of John 2:21 Zvino ndakamupa nguva kuti atendeuke kubva paufeve hwake, asi haana kutendeuka.
Revelation of John 2:22 Tarira, ini ndichamukandira panhovo, nevanoita upombwe naye padambudziko guru, kana vasingatendeuki kubva pamabasa avo.
Revelation of John 2:23 Uye ndichauraya vana vake murufu; nemakereke ese achaziva kuti ini ndini ndinonzvera itsvo nemoyo; zvino ndichapa kwamuri umwe neumwe zvinoenderana nemabasa enyu.
Revelation of John 2:24 Asi ndinotaura kwamuri nekune vamwe vari paTiatira, vese vasina dzidziso iyi, uye vasina kuziva zvakadzika zvaSatani, sezvavanotaura <transChange type="added">vachiti</transChange>: Handingakutakudzii umwe mutoro.
Revelation of John 2:25 Asi izvo zvamunazvo batisisai kusvikira ndichiuya.
Revelation of John 2:26 Uye anokunda nekuchengeta mabasa angu kusvikira pakuguma, kwaari ndichapa simba pamusoro pemarudzi;
Revelation of John 2:27 uye achaatonga netsvimbo yedare; semidziyo yemuumbi achaputsanyiwa; sezvandakagamuchirawo kuna Baba vangu.
Revelation of John 2:28 Uye ndichamupa nyeredzi yemangwanani.
Revelation of John 2:29 Ane nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya kumakereke.  <chapter eID="Rev.2"/><div eID="gen1780" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1779" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 3:0 <div sID="gen1781" type="section"/> <chapter n="3" osisID="Rev.3" sID="Rev.3"/>  <div sID="gen1782" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 3:1 Uye kumutumwa wekereke iri muSadhisi nyora <transChange type="added">uti</transChange>: Zvinhu izvi anoreva iye ane Mweya minomwe yaMwari nenyeredzi nomwe: Ndinoziva mabasa ako, kuti une zita rekuti unorarama, asi wakafa.
Revelation of John 3:2 Iva wakarinda, uye simbisa zvinhu zvakasara zvoda kufa; nokuti handina kuwana mabasa ako akaperedzerwa pamberi paMwari.
Revelation of John 3:3 Naizvozvo rangarira kuti wakagamuchira nekunzwa sei; uye chengeta, uye tendeuka. Naizvozvo kana usingarindi, ndichauya kwauri sembavha, uye haungatongozivi <transChange type="added">kuti</transChange> iawa ripi randichauya naro pamusoro pako.
Revelation of John 3:4 Une mazita mashoma kunyange paSadhisi asina kusvibiswa nguvo dzawo; uye vachafamba neni mu<transChange type="added">nguvo </transChange> chena, nokuti vakafanira.
Revelation of John 3:5 Uyo anokunda, ndiye achapfekedzwa nguvo chena; uye handichatongodzimi zita rake pabhuku reupenyu, uye ndichareurura zita rake pamberi paBaba vangu, nepamberi pevatumwa vake.
Revelation of John 3:6 Ane nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya kumakereke. <div eID="gen1782" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1781" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 3:7 Nekumutumwa wekereke iri muFiradhefia nyora <transChange type="added">uti</transChange>: Zvinhu izvi anoreva Mutsvene, Wechokwadi, iye ane kiyi yaDhavhidhi, iye anozarura pasinawo anopfiga, nekupfiga pasinawo anozarura:
Revelation of John 3:8 Ndinoziva mabasa ako; tarira, ndakaisa pamberi pako mukova wakazarurwa, uye hakuna angagona kuupfiga, nokuti une simba shoma, uye wakachengeta shoko rangu, nekusaramba zita rangu.
Revelation of John 3:9 Tarira, ndicha<transChange type="added">ku</transChange>pa vanobva kusinagoge raSatani, vanozviti VaJudha, vasiri ivo, asi vanoreva nhema; tarira, ndichavaita kuti vauye vagonamata pamberi petsoka dzako, uye vazive kuti ini ndakakuda.
Revelation of John 3:10 Nokuti wakachengeta shoko rekutsungirira kwangu, neni ndichakuchengeta panguva <transChange type="added">ye</transChange>kuedzwa ichauya pamusoro penyika yese, kuedza vanogara panyika.
Revelation of John 3:11 Tarira, ndinouya nekukurumidza; batisisa chaunacho, kuti kusava neanotora korona yako.
Revelation of John 3:12 Uyo anokunda, ndichamuita mbiru mutembere yaMwari wangu, uye haachatongobudizve; uye ndichanyora pamusoro pake zita raMwari wangu, nezita reguta raMwari wangu, reJerusarema idzva, rinoburuka richibva kudenga kuna Mwari wangu, nezita rangu idzva.
Revelation of John 3:13 Ane nzeve ngaanzwe zvinoreva Mweya kumakereke. <div eID="gen1784" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1783" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 3:14 Nekumutumwa wekereke yeVaRaodhikia nyora <transChange type="added">uti</transChange>: Zvinhu izvi anoreva Ameni, chapupu chakatendeka uye chechokwadi, kutanga kwezvisikwa zvaMwari:
Revelation of John 3:15 Ndinoziva mabasa ako, kuti hautonhori uye haupisi. Ndaida kuti dai uchitonhora kana uchipisa.
Revelation of John 3:16 Zvino zvaunodziya, uye hautonhori uye haupisi, ndichakusvisvina mumuromo mangu.
Revelation of John 3:17 Nokuti unoti: Ndiri mufumi, uye ndakafuma, uye handishaiwi chinhu, asi hauzivi kuti ndiwe unotambura, neune nhamo, nemurombo, nebofu, newakashama;
Revelation of John 3:18 ndinokupa zano kuti utenge kwandiri goridhe rakaidzwa mumoto, kuti ufume; nenguvo chena, kuti upfeke, uye nyadzi dzekushama kwako dzirege kuratidzika; uye uzore meso ako nechizoro chameso, kuti uone.
Revelation of John 3:19 Vese vandinoda ini, ndinotsiura nekuranga. Naizvozvo shingaira utendeuke.
Revelation of John 3:20 Tarira, ndimire pamukova ndichigogodza; kana umwe achinzwa inzwi rangu, akazarura mukova, ndichapinda kwaari, uye ndicharaira naye, naiye neni.
Revelation of John 3:21 Anokunda, ndichamupa kugara neni pachigaro changu cheushe, sezvo neni ndakakunda ndikagara pamwe naBaba vangu pachigaro chavo cheushe.
Revelation of John 3:22 Ane nzeve ngaanzwe zinoreva Mweya kumakereke. <chapter eID="Rev.3"/><div eID="gen1786" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1785" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 4:0 <div sID="gen1787" type="section"/> <chapter n="4" osisID="Rev.4" sID="Rev.4"/>  <div sID="gen1788" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 4:1 Shure kweizvi ndakaona, zvino tarira, mukova wakazaruka kudenga, nenzwi rekutanga randakanzwa <transChange type="added">rakaita</transChange> serehwamanda richitaura neni, richiti: Kwira pano, ndigokuratidza zvinhu zvinofanira kuitika shure kweizvi.
Revelation of John 4:2 Zvino pakarepo ndakava muMweya; zvino tarira, chigaro cheushe chakagadzwa kudenga, nepamusoro pechigaro cheushe <transChange type="added">umwe</transChange> agere.
Revelation of John 4:3 Iye wakange agere pakuonekwa wakange akafanana nebwe rejasipisi* nesadhio*; nemurarabungu wakakomberedza chigaro cheushe waitaridzika sebwe reemaradhi*.
Revelation of John 4:4 Zvino zvigaro zveushe makumi maviri nezvina zvakange zvakakomberedza chigaro cheushe; nepazvigaro zveushe ndakaona vakuru makumi maviri nevana vagere, vakapfeka nguvo chena, uye vakange vane korona dzegoridhe pamisoro yavo.
Revelation of John 4:5 Nepachigaro cheushe pakabuda mheni nekutinhira nemanzwi; nemwenje minomwe yemoto ichipfuta pamberi pechigaro cheushe, iri Mweya minomwe yaMwari.
Revelation of John 4:6 Zvino pamberi pechigaro cheushe pakange <transChange type="added">pane</transChange> gungwa regirazi, rakafanana nekrisitaro*. Nepakati pechigaro cheushe nepakapoteredza chigaro cheushe <transChange type="added">pane</transChange> zvisikwa zvina zvipenyu zvizere nemeso mberi neshure.
Revelation of John 4:7 Zvino chisikwa chipenyu chekutanga chakange chakafanana neshumba, uye chisikwa chipenyu chechipiri chakafanana nemhuru, nechisikwa chipenyu chechitatu chakange chine chiso semunhu, nechisikwa chipenyu chechina chakange chakafanana negondo rinobhururuka.
Revelation of John 4:8 Nezvisikwa zvipenyu <transChange type="added">izvi</transChange> chimwe nechimwe chakange chine mapapiro matanhatu mativi ese, nemukati zvakange zvizere nemeso; uye hazvizorori masikati neusiku, zvichiti: Mutsvene, mutsvene, mutsvene, Ishe Mwari, Wemasimbaose, wakange aripo, uye aripo, neachazouya.
Revelation of John 4:9 Zvino apo zvisikwa zvipenyu izvi pazvaimupa kubwinya nerukudzo nekuvongwa iye anogara pachigaro cheushe, iye anorarama kusvikira rinhi narinhi,
Revelation of John 4:10 vakuru makumi maviri nevana vakazviwisira pasi pamberi peagere pachigaro cheushe ndokumunamata iye anorarama kusvikira rinhi narinhi, uye vachikandira korona dzavo pamberi pechigaro cheushe, vachiti:
Revelation of John 4:11 Makafanira, Ishe, kugamuchira kubwinya, nerukudzo, nesimba; nokuti ndimwi makasika zvinhu zvese, uye nekuda kwechido chenyu zviripo uye zvakasikwa.  <chapter eID="Rev.4"/><div eID="gen1788" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1787" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 5:0 <div sID="gen1789" type="section"/> <chapter n="5" osisID="Rev.5" sID="Rev.5"/>  <div sID="gen1790" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 5:1 Zvino ndakaona muruoko rwerudyi rwaiye wakange agere pachigaro cheushe bhuku rakanyorwa mukati nekunze, rakanamatidzwa nemicherechedzo minomwe.
Revelation of John 5:2 Zvino ndakaona mutumwa ane simba achidanidzira nenzwi guru; <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Ndiani wakafanira kuzarura bhuku nekusunungura micherechedzo yaro?
Revelation of John 5:3 Asi kwakange kusina munhu kudenga kana panyika, kana pasi penyika, wakagona kuzarura bhuku, kana kuritarira.
Revelation of John 5:4 Zvino ini ndakachema zvikuru, nokuti hakuna kutongowanikwa wakafanira kuzarura nekuverenga bhuku, kana kuritarira.
Revelation of John 5:5 Zvino umwe wevakuru wakati kwandiri: Usachema; tarira, yakunda Shumba inobva kurudzi rwaJudha, Mudzi waDhavhidhi, kuti izarure bhuku nekusunungura micherechedzo yaro minomwe.
Revelation of John 5:6 Zvino ndakaona, uye tarira, pakati pechigaro cheushe nechezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina, nepakati pevakuru, Gwayana rimire serakabaiwa, rine nyanga nomwe nemeso manomwe, ndiyo Mweya minomwe yaMwari yakatumwa kunyika yese.
Revelation of John 5:7 Zvino rakauya, rikatora bhuku kubva muruoko rwerudyi rwaiye wakagara pachigaro cheushe.
Revelation of John 5:8 Zvino rakati ratora bhuku, zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina nevakuru makumi maviri nevana vakawira pamberi peGwayana, umwe neumwe ane rudimbwa nendiro dzegoridhe dzizere nezvinonhuhwira inova minyengetero yevatsvene.
Revelation of John 5:9 Zvino vakaimba rwiyo rutsva, vachiti: Makafanira kutora bhuku, nekuzarura micherechedzo yaro; nokuti makabaiwa, ndokutidzikunurira Mwari neropa renyu kubva kudzinza rese, nekururimi, nekuvanhu, nekurudzi,
Revelation of John 5:10 makatiitawo kuna Mwari wedu tive madzimambo nevapristi, uye tichatonga panyika.
Revelation of John 5:11 Zvino ndakaona, uye ndakanzwa inzwi revatumwa vazhinji vakakomberedza chigaro cheushe, nezvisikwa zvipenyu nevakuru; nekuwanda kwazvo kwakange kuri mazana nemazana emazana nemazana, nezvuru zvezvuru,
Revelation of John 5:12 vachiti nenzwi guru: Rakafanira Gwayana rakabaiwa kugamuchira simba neufumi nenjere nemasimba nerukudzo nekubwinya nekurumbidzwa.
Revelation of John 5:13 Nechisikwa chega-chega chiri kudenga, nepanyika, nepasi penyika, nezviri pagungwa nezvese zviri mazviri, ndakanzwa zvichiti: Kuna iye agere pamusoro pechigaro cheushe nekuGwayana ngakuve nekurumbidzwa, nerukudzo, nekubwinya, nesimba kusvikira rinhi narinhi.
Revelation of John 5:14 Zvino zvisikwa zvipenyu zvina zvakati: Ameni. Nevakuru makumi maviri nevana vakawa, vakanamata iye anorarama kusvika rinhi narinhi. <chapter eID="Rev.5"/><div eID="gen1790" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1789" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 6:0 <div sID="gen1791" type="section"/> <chapter n="6" osisID="Rev.6" sID="Rev.6"/>  <div sID="gen1792" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 6:1 Zvino ndakaona Gwayana parakazarura chimwe chemicherechedzo, ndokunzwa chimwe chezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina chichiti, senzwi remutinhiro: Uya uone.
Revelation of John 6:2 Zvino ndakaona, uye tarira, bhiza jena, naiye wakaritasva wakange ane uta; korona ndokupiwa kwaari, zvino akabuda achikunda, uye kuti akunde.
Revelation of John 6:3 Zvino rakati razarura mucherechedzo wechipiri, ndakanzwa chisikwa chipenyu chechipiri chichiti: Uya uone.
Revelation of John 6:4 Zvino kwakabuda rimwe bhiza dzvuku; newakaritasva akapiwa <transChange type="added">simba</transChange> kuti abvise rugare panyika, nokuti vaurayane; ndokupiwa kwaari munondo mukuru.
Revelation of John 6:5 Zvino rakati razarura mucherechedzo wechitatu, ndakanzwa chisikwa chipenyu chechitatu chichiti: Uya uone. Zvino ndikaona, uye tarira, bhiza dema, newakange akaritasva wakange ane chiyereso muruoko rwake.
Revelation of John 6:6 Zvino ndakanzwa inzwi pakati pezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina richiti: Chiyero chezviyo nedhenario*, nezviyero zvitatu zvebhari* nedhenario; nemafuta newaini usa<transChange type="added">zvi</transChange>tadzira.
Revelation of John 6:7 Zvino rakati razarura mucherechedzo wechina, ndakanzwa inzwi rechisikwa chipenyu chechina richiti: Uya uone.
Revelation of John 6:8 Zvino ndakaona, uye tarira, bhiza rakachenuruka, newakange akaritasva zita rake Rufu; uye hadhesi rakateverana naye. Simba ndokupiwa kwazviri kuuraya kusvika pane chechina chenyika, nemunondo, uye nenzara, uye nerufu, uye nezvikara zvenyika.
Revelation of John 6:9 Zvino rakati razarura mucherechedzo wechishanu, ndakaona pasi pearitari mweya yevakange vaurawa nekuda kweshoko raMwari, uye nekuda kweuchapupu hwavaiva nahwo.
Revelation of John 6:10 Zvino vakadana nenzwi guru vachiti: Kusvikira rinhi, Tenzi, mutsvene uye wechokwadi, regai kutonga nekutsiva ropa redu pane vanogara panyika?
Revelation of John 6:11 Zvino kwakapiwa umwe neumwe nguvo refu chena, zvikanzi kwavari vambozorora chinguva chidiki kusvikira vamwewo varanda pamwe navo nehama dzavo dzaiva dzoda kuurawa saivowo vakwaniswa.
Revelation of John 6:12 Zvino ndakaona parakange razarura mucherechedzo wechitanhatu, uye tarira, kwakava nekudengenyeka kwenyika kukuru, uye zuva rakasviba sesaga remvere, nemwedzi ukaita seropa;
Revelation of John 6:13 nenyeredzi dzedenga dzakawira panyika, semuonde unowisa maonde awo eshure, uchizuzwa nemhepo huru.
Revelation of John 6:14 Zvino denga rakabva serugwaro rwakapetwa; negomo rega-rega nechiwi zvakabviswa panzvimbo dzazvo.
Revelation of John 6:15 Nemadzimambo enyika, nevanhu vakuru, nevafumi, nevatungamiriri vehondo, nevane simba, nevaranda vese, nevakasununguka vese vakanozvivanza mumapako nemumabwe emakomo,
Revelation of John 6:16 zvino vakati kumakomo nekumabwe: Wirai pamusoro pedu, mutivige pachiso chaiye anogara pachigaro cheushe, nepakutsamwa kweGwayana;
Revelation of John 6:17 nokuti zuva guru rekutsamwa kwaro rasvika; zvino ndiani anogona kumira?  <chapter eID="Rev.6"/><div eID="gen1792" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1791" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 7:0 <div sID="gen1793" type="section"/> <chapter n="7" osisID="Rev.7" sID="Rev.7"/>  <div sID="gen1794" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 7:1 Zvino shure kweizvi ndakaona vatumwa vana vamire kumativi mana enyika vakabata mhepo ina dzenyika, kuti mhepo irege kuvhuvhuta panyika, kana pagungwa, kana pamuti upi zvawo.
Revelation of John 7:2 Uye ndakaona umwe mutumwa achikwira kubva kumabvazuva kwezuva ane mucherechedzo waMwari mupenyu; akadana nenzwi guru kuvatumwa vana, vaya vakange vapiwa <transChange type="added">simba</transChange> kuti vatadzire nyika negungwa,
Revelation of John 7:3 achiti: Musatadzira nyika, kana gungwa, kana miti, kusvikira taisa mucherechedzo varanda vaMwari wedu pahuma dzavo.
Revelation of John 7:4 Zvino ndakanzwa uwandu hwevakaiswa mucherechedzo: Zvuru zana nemakumi mana nezvina vakaiswa mucherechedzo kubva kumarudzi ese evana vaIsraeri.
Revelation of John 7:5 Kubva kurudzi rwaJudha zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaRubheni zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaGadhi zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo;
Revelation of John 7:6 kubva kurudzi rwaAsheri zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaNafutarimi zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaManase zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo;
Revelation of John 7:7 kubva kurudzi rwaSimioni zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaRevhi zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaIsaskari zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo;
Revelation of John 7:8 kubva kurudzi rwaZebhuruni zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaJosefa zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo; kubva kurudzi rwaBhenjamini zvuru gumi nezviviri vakaiswa mucherechedzo. <div eID="gen1794" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1793" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 7:9 Shure kwaizvozvi ndakaona, zvino tarira, chaunga chikuru, chisina anogona kuverenga, chinobva kundudzi dzese, nemarudzi, nevanhu, nendimi, vakamira pamberi pechigaro cheushe nepamberi peGwayana, vakamonera nguvo refu chena, nemichindwe mumaoko avo;
Revelation of John 7:10 zvino vakadanidzira nenzwi guru, vachiti: Ruponeso <transChange type="added">ngaruve</transChange> kuna Mwari wedu anogara pachigaro cheushe, nekuGwayana.
Revelation of John 7:11 Zvino vatumwa vese vakamira vakakomba chigaro cheushe nevakuru nezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina, vakawa pamberi pechigaro cheushe nezviso zvavo, ndokunamata Mwari,
Revelation of John 7:12 vachiti: Ameni: Kurumbidzwa nekubwinya nenjere nekuvonga nerukudzo nesimba nemasimba <transChange type="added">ngazvive</transChange> kuna Mwari wedu kusvikira rinhi narinhi. Ameni.
Revelation of John 7:13 Zvino umwe wevakuru wakapindura, achiti kwandiri: Ava vakapfeka nguvo refu chena ndivana ani, uye vakabvepi?
Revelation of John 7:14 Zvino ndakati kwaari: Ishe, ndimwi munoziva. Zvino akati kwandiri: Ava ndivo vanobva mukutambudzika kukuru, uye vakasuka nguvo refu dzavo, uye ivo vakadzichenesa muropa reGwayana.
Revelation of John 7:15 Nekuda kweizvi vari pamberi pechigaro cheushe chaMwari, vanomushumira masikati neusiku mutembere yake; uye anogara pachigaro cheushe achatandavadza tende pamusoro pavo.
Revelation of John 7:16 Havachazombovi nenzara kana kuzombova nenyota, nezuva haringatongovawiri, kana kupisa kupi zvako;
Revelation of John 7:17 nokuti Gwayana riri pakati pechigaro cheushe richavafunda, uye richavatungamirira kuzvitubu zvipenyu zvemvura; uye Mwari achapusika misodzi yese pameso avo.  <chapter eID="Rev.7"/><div eID="gen1796" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1795" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 8:0 <div sID="gen1797" type="section"/> <chapter n="8" osisID="Rev.8" sID="Rev.8"/>  <div sID="gen1798" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 8:1 Zvino wakati azarura mucherechedzo wechinomwe, kwakavapo kunyarara kudenga kwakaita sehafu yeawa.
Revelation of John 8:2 Zvino ndakaona vatumwa vanomwe vamire pamberi paMwari, kukapiwawo kwavari hwamanda nomwe.
Revelation of John 8:3 Zvino umwe mutumwa wakauya akamira paaritari, ane mudziyo wezvinonhuhwira wegoridhe; kukapiwa kwaari zvinonhuhwira zvizhinji, kuti azvipe neminyengetero yevatsvene vese pamusoro pearitari yegoridhe yakange iri pamberi pechigaro cheushe.
Revelation of John 8:4 Zvino utsi hwezvinonhuhwira hwakakwira neminyengetero yevatsvene huchibva muruoko rwemutumwa pamberi paMwari.
Revelation of John 8:5 Mutumwa akatora mudziyo wezvinonhuhwira, ndokuuzadza nemoto wearitari, ndoku<transChange type="added">u</transChange>kanda panyika; zvino kwakavapo manzwi nekutinhira nemheni nekudengenyeka kwenyika.
Revelation of John 8:6 Zvino vatumwa vanomwe vakange vane hwamanda nomwe vakazvigadzirira kuti varidze.
Revelation of John 8:7 Zvino mutumwa wekutanga wakaridza, ndokuvapo chimvuramabwe nemoto zvakavhenganiswa neropa, ndokukandwa panyika; nechetatu chemiti chakapiswa, neuswa unyoro hwese hwakapiswa.
Revelation of John 8:8 Zvino mutumwa wechipiri wakaridza, zvino <transChange type="added">chimwe</transChange> segomo guru rinopfuta nemoto chikakandwa mugungwa; chetatu chegungwa ndokuva ropa;
Revelation of John 8:9 ndokufa chetatu chezvisikwa zviri mugungwa zvine upenyu, nechetatu chezvikepe chikaparadzwa.
Revelation of John 8:10 Zvino mutumwa wechitatu wakaridza, kukawa kubva kudenga nyeredzi huru, ichipfuta semwenje, ndokuwira pamusoro pechetatu chenzizi, nepamusoro pezvitubu zvemvura.
Revelation of John 8:11 Zvino zita renyeredzi rainzi Gavakava; chetatu chemvura ndokuva gavakava, nevanhu vazhinji vakafa nemvura, nokuti yakange yavaviswa.
Revelation of John 8:12 Zvino mutumwa wechina wakaridza, chetatu chezuva ndokurohwa nechetatu chemwedzi nechetatu chenyeredzi, kuti chetatu chazvo chisvibiswe, uye kuti chetatu chemasikati chirege kuvhenekera, neusiku saizvozvo.
Revelation of John 8:13 Zvino ndakatarira, ndokunzwa mutumwa umwe achibhururuka ari pakati pedenga achiti nenzwi guru: Mune nhamo, mune nhamo, mune nhamo vagari vepanyika, pamanzwi asara ehwamanda yevatumwa vatatu vachazoridza!  <chapter eID="Rev.8"/><div eID="gen1798" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1797" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 9:0 <div sID="gen1799" type="section"/> <chapter n="9" osisID="Rev.9" sID="Rev.9"/>  <div sID="gen1800" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 9:1 Zvino mutumwa wechishanu wakaridza, zvino ndakaona nyeredzi ichibva kudenga ichiwira panyika, ndokupiwa kwaari kiyi yegomba risina chigadziko.
Revelation of John 9:2 Zvino yakazarura gomba risina chigadziko, utsi ndokusimuka kubva mugomba seutsi hwevira guru, nezuva nedenga zvikasvibiswa nekuda kweutsi hwegomba.
Revelation of John 9:3 Zvino muutsi mukabuda mhashu dzikauya panyika, ndokupiwa kwadziri simba, sezvinyavada zvenyika zvine simba.
Revelation of John 9:4 Kukanzi kwadziri dzirege kutadzira uswa hwenyika, kana chipi zvacho chinyoro, kana muti upi, asi vanhu chete vasina mucherechedzo waMwari pahuma dzavo.
Revelation of John 9:5 Zvino kwakapiwa kwadziri kuti dzisavauraya, asi kuti varwadziswe mwedzi mishanu; uye kurwadzisa kwadzo kwaiita sekurwadzisa kwechinyavada kana chichiruma munhu.
Revelation of John 9:6 Zvino pamazuva iwayo vanhu vachatsvaka rufu, asi havangaruwani; uye vachashuva kufa, asi rufu rwuchavatiza.
Revelation of John 9:7 Uye zvimiro zvemhashu zvakaita semabhiza akagadzirirwa hondo; nepamisoro yadzo pane zvakaita sekorona dzakafanana negoridhe, nezviso zvadzo sezviso zvevanhu.
Revelation of John 9:8 Zvino dzakange dzine vhudzi sevhudzi revakadzi, nemeno adzo akaita seeshumba.
Revelation of John 9:9 Zvino dzakange dzine zvidzitiro zvechifuva zvakaita sezvidzitiro zvechifuva zvedare, nekutinhira kwemapapiro adzo sekutinhira kwengoro dzemabhiza mazhinji achimhanyira kuhondo.
Revelation of John 9:10 Zvino dzakange dzine miswe yakafanana nezvinyavada, uye pakange pane umborera pamiswe yadzo, nesimba radzo rekukuvadza vanhu mwedzi mishanu.
Revelation of John 9:11 Zvino dzakange dzina mambo pamusoro padzo, mutumwa wegomba risina chigadziko, zita rake nechiHebheru riri Abhadhoni, uye nechiGiriki ane zita Aporioni.
Revelation of John 9:12 Nhamo imwe yapfuura; tarira, kuchiri kuuya nhamo mbiri shure kweizvi. <div eID="gen1800" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1799" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 9:13 Zvino mutumwa wechitanhatu wakaridza, zvino ndakanzwa inzwi kubva panyanga ina dzearitari yegoridhe iri pamberi paMwari,
Revelation of John 9:14 richiti kumutumwa wechitanhatu wakange ane hwamanda: Sunungura vatumwa vana vakasungwa parwizi rukuru Yufuratesi.
Revelation of John 9:15 Zvino vakasunungurwa vatumwa vana vakange vakagadzirirwa awa nezuva nemwedzi negore, kuti vauraye chetatu chevanhu.
Revelation of John 9:16 Zvino uwandu hwehondo dzevatasvi vemabhiza hwaiva makumi ezvuru maviri emakumi ezvuru; ndakanzwawo uwandu hwavo.
Revelation of John 9:17 Zvino saizvozvo ndakaona mabhiza muchiratidzo, nevakange vakaatasva, vane zvidzitiro zvechifuva zvemoto, nezvehiasindo*, nezvesarufa*, nemisoro yemabhiza semisoro yeshumba, nemumiromo yawo makabuda moto neutsi nesarufa.
Revelation of John 9:18 Neizvi zvitatu kwakaurawa chetatu chevanhu, nemoto uye neutsi uye nesarufa, zvakabuda mumiromo yawo.
Revelation of John 9:19 Nokuti simba rawo riri mumuromo wawo, nemumiswe yawo; nokuti miswe yawo yakaita senyoka uye ine misoro; uye anokuvadza nayo.
Revelation of John 9:20 Zvino vakasara vevanhu, vasina kuurawa pamatambudziko awa, havana kutendeuka pamabasa emaoko avo, kuti varege kunamata madhimoni, nezvifananidzo zvegoridhe nesirivheri nezvendarira nezvemabwe nezvematanda, zvisingagoniwo kuona, zvisinganzwiwo, uye zvisingafambi;
Revelation of John 9:21 uye havana kutendeuka paumhondi hwavo, kana pauroyi hwavo, kana paupombwe hwavo, kana paumbavha hwavo. <chapter eID="Rev.9"/><div eID="gen1802" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1801" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 10:0 <div sID="gen1803" type="section"/> <chapter n="10" osisID="Rev.10" sID="Rev.10"/>  <div sID="gen1804" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 10:1 Zvino ndakaona umwe mutumwa ane simba achiburuka kubva kudenga, akapfekedzwa gore; nemurarabungu uri mumusoro <transChange type="added">make</transChange>, uye chiso chake chakaita sezuva, netsoka dzake sembiru dzemoto;
Revelation of John 10:2 uye wakange ane bhuku diki rakazaruka muruoko rwake; ndokuisa rutsoka rwake rwerudyi pamusoro pegungwa, nerweruboshwe pamusoro penyika;
Revelation of John 10:3 zvino akadanidzira nenzwi guru seshumba inodzvova; wakatiwo adanidzira, kutinhira kunomwe kukareva manzwi ako.
Revelation of John 10:4 Zvino kutinhira kunomwe kwakati kwareva manzwi ako, ndakange ndododa kunyora; ndokunzwa inzwi kubva kudenga richiti kwandiri: Zarira nemucherechedzo kutinhira kunomwe zvakwareva, uye usanyora zvinhu izvi.
Revelation of John 10:5 Zvino mutumwa wandakaona amire pamusoro pegungwa nepamusoro penyika wakasimudzira ruoko rwake kudenga,
Revelation of John 10:6 ndokupika naiye anorarama kusvikira rinhi narinhi, wakasika denga nezviri mariri, nenyika nezviri mairi, negungwa nezviri mariri, kuti nguva haichazovipo.
Revelation of John 10:7 Asi pamazuva enzwi remutumwa wechinomwe, kana woda kuridza, ipapo chakavanzika chaMwari chapedziswa, sezvaakaparidzira varanda vake vaporofita.
Revelation of John 10:8 Zvino inzwi randakanzwa kubva kudenga, rakataura kwandirizve, ndokuti: Enda, tora bhuku diki rakazaruka riri muruoko rwemutumwa amire pamusoro pegungwa nepamusoro penyika.
Revelation of John 10:9 Zvino ndakaenda kumutumwa, ndichiti kwaari: Ndipe bhuku diki. Zvino akati kwandiri: Tora ugoridya uripedze; zvino richavavisa dumbu rako, asi mumuromo mako richatapira seuchi.
Revelation of John 10:10 Zvino ndakatora bhuku diki kubva muruoko rwemutumwa, ndokuridya rikapera; ndokuva mumuromo mangu seuchi, kutapira; asi ndaridya, dumbu rangu rakavava.
Revelation of John 10:11 Zvino akati kwandiri: Iwe unofanira kuporofitazve pamberi pevanhu nendudzi nendimi nemadzimambo mazhinji. <chapter eID="Rev.10"/><div eID="gen1804" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1803" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 11:0 <div sID="gen1805" type="section"/> <chapter n="11" osisID="Rev.11" sID="Rev.11"/>  <div sID="gen1806" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 11:1 Zvino kwakapiwa kwandiri rutsanga rwakaita semudonzvo, mutumwa ndokumira achiti: Simuka, zvino yera tembere yaMwari, nearitari, nevanonamata mairi.
Revelation of John 11:2 Asi chivanze chiri kunze kwetembere urasire panze, uye usachiyera; nokuti chakapiwa kuvechirudzi; uye vachatsikira guta dzvene pasi mwedzi makumi mana nemiviri.
Revelation of John 11:3 Zvino ndichapa <transChange type="added">simba</transChange> kuzvapupu zvangu zviviri, zvino zvichaporofita mazuva churu nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu, zvakapfeka masaga.
Revelation of John 11:4 Ava miti miviri yemiorivhi, nezvigadziko zvemwenje zviviri zvimire pamberi paMwari wenyika.
Revelation of John 11:5 Zvino kana kune anoshuva kuvakuvadza, moto unobuda mumuromo wavo uchiparadza vavengi vavo; uye kana umwe achishuva kuvakuvadza, anofanira kuurawa saizvozvo.
Revelation of John 11:6 Ava vane simba rekupfiga denga, kuti kusanaya mvura pamazuva ekuporofita kwavo, uye vane simba pamusoro pemvura, kuti vaishandure ive ropa, nekurova nyika nematambudziko ese nguva dzese dzavanoda.
Revelation of John 11:7 Uye kana vapedza uchapupu hwavo, chikara chinokwira kubva mugomba risina chigadziko chichaita hondo navo, ndokuvakunda nekuvauraya.
Revelation of John 11:8 Uye zvitunha zvavo <transChange type="added">zvichava</transChange> panzira dzemuguta guru, rinonzi pamweya Sodhoma neEgipita, pakarovererwawo Ishe wedu.
Revelation of John 11:9 Zvino vanobva kuvanhu nevemarudzi nevendimi nevendudzi vachaona zvitunha zvavo mazuva matatu nehafu, uye havangatenderi zvitunha zvavo kuti zviiswe mumakuva.
Revelation of John 11:10 Neavo vanogara panyika vachafara pamusoro pavo nekupembera, uye vachatumirana zvipo, nokuti vaporofita ava vaviri vakatambudza vanogara panyika.
Revelation of John 11:11 Zvino shure kwemazuva matatu nehafu, mweya weupenyu kubva kuna Mwari wakapinda mavari, vakamira netsoka dzavo, uye kutya kukuru kukawira vakavaona.
Revelation of John 11:12 Zvino vakanzwa inzwi guru richibva kudenga, richiti kwavari: Kwirai pano. Zvino vakakwira kudenga vari mugore, vavengi vavo ndokuvaona.
Revelation of John 11:13 Zvino nenguva iyoyo kwakava nekudengenyeka kwenyika kukuru, chegumi cheguta ndokuwa, nemazita evanhu zvuru zvinomwe vakaurawa mukudengenyeka kwenyika; vakasara ndokuvhunduswa, vakapa rumbidzo kuna Mwari wekudenga.
Revelation of John 11:14 Nhamo yechipiri yapfuura; zvino tarira, nhamo yechitatu inokurumidza kuuya. <div eID="gen1806" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1805" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 11:15 Zvino mutumwa wechinomwe wakaridza; manzwi makuru ndokuva kudenga, achiti: Ushe hwenyika hwava hwaIshe wedu, nehwaKristu wake; uye achatonga kusvika rinhi narinhi.
Revelation of John 11:16 Uye vakuru makumi maviri nevana vagere pamberi paMwari pazvigaro zvavo zveushe vakawa nezviso zvavo vakanamata Mwari,
Revelation of John 11:17 vachiti: Tinokuvongai, Ishe Mwari Wemasimbaose, aripo, wakange aripo, neachauya, nokuti makatora simba renyu guru, uye makatonga.
Revelation of John 11:18 Zvino marudzi akatsamwa, uye kutsamwa kwenyu kwasvika, nenguva yevakafa kuti vatongwe, uye kuti mupe mubairo kuvaranda venyu vaporofita, nekuvatsvene, nevanotya zita renyu, vadiki nevakuru, uye yekuparadza vanoparadza nyika.
Revelation of John 11:19 Zvino kwakazarurwa tembere yaMwari kudenga; kukaonekwa areka yesungano yake mutembere yake; ndokuvapo mheni nemanzwi nekutinhira nekudengenyeka kwenyika nechimvuramabwe chikuru. <chapter eID="Rev.11"/><div eID="gen1808" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1807" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 12:0 <div sID="gen1809" type="section"/> <chapter n="12" osisID="Rev.12" sID="Rev.12"/>  <div sID="gen1810" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 12:1 Zvino kwakaonekwa chiratidzo chikuru kudenga, mukadzi akapfeka zuva, nemwedzi uri pasi petsoka dzake, nepamusoro wake korona yenyeredzi gumi nembiri;
Revelation of John 12:2 uye wakange ane pamuviri, akadanidzira achirwadziwa nemimba, uye achitambudzwa kupona.
Revelation of John 12:3 Zvino kwakaonekwa chimwe chiratidzo kudenga, tarirawo, zibukanana ziguru zidzvuku, rine misoro minomwe nenyanga gumi, nepamisoro yaro korona nomwe.
Revelation of John 12:4 Zvino muswe waro wakakweva chetatu chenyeredzi dzekudenga, ndokudzikandira panyika; zibukanana ndokumira pamberi pemukadzi wakange oda kupona, kuti kana apona, agoparadza mwana wake.
Revelation of John 12:5 Zvino wakapona mwana mukomana, wakange oda kufudza marudzi ese netsvimbo yedare; mwana wake ndokubvutirwa kuna Mwari nekuchigaro chake cheushe.
Revelation of John 12:6 Zvino mukadzi akatizira kurenje, kwaakange ane nzvimbo yakagadzirwa kubva kuna Mwari, kuti vamuriritira ipapo mazuva churu nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu.
Revelation of John 12:7 Zvino kukava nehondo kudenga; Mikaeri nevatumwa vake vakarwa nezibukanana, zibukanana ndokurwa rine vatumwa varo;
Revelation of John 12:8 asi havana kukunda, uye nzvimbo yaro haina kuzowanikwa zvekare kudenga.
Revelation of John 12:9 Zvino zibukanana ziguru rakakandwa, nyoka yekare, inonzi Dhiabhorosi uye Satani, anonyengera nyika yese; wakakandirwa panyika, nevatumwa vake vakakandwa pamwe naye.
Revelation of John 12:10 Zvino ndakanzwa inzwi guru richiti kudenga: Ikozvino ruponeso rwasvika, nesimba, neushe hwaMwari wedu, neumambo hwaKristu wake; nokuti mupomeri wehama dzedu wakandirwa pasi, anovapomera pamberi paMwari wedu masikati neusiku.
Revelation of John 12:11 Zvino ivo vakamukunda neropa reGwayana, uye neshoko reuchapupu hwavo, uye havana kuda upenyu hwavo kusvikira parufu.
Revelation of John 12:12 Naizvozvi farai, matenga nemwi munogara maari. Mune nhamo vagari venyika negungwa, nokuti dhiabhorosi wakaburukira kwamuri ane kutsamwa kukuru, nokuti anoziva kuti ane nguva diki.
Revelation of John 12:13 Zvino zibukanana rakati raona kuti rakandirwa panyika, rakashusha mukadzi wakapona murume.
Revelation of John 12:14 Zvino kumukadzi kwakapiwa mapapiro maviri egondo guru, kuti abhururukire kurenje kunzvimbo yake, kwaanonoriritirwa kwenguva ne<transChange type="added">dzimwe</transChange> nguva nehafu yenguva, abve pauso hwenyoka.
Revelation of John 12:15 Zvino nyoka yakabudisa mvura mumuromo mayo yakaita serwizi shure kwemukadzi kuti imukonzerese kukukurwa nerwizi.
Revelation of John 12:16 Zvino nyika yakabatsira mukadzi, nyika ndokushamisa muromo wayo, ikamedza rwizi zibukanana rwarakabudisa mumuromo maro.
Revelation of John 12:17 Zvino zibukanana rakatsamwira mukadzi, rikaenda kunoita hondo nevakasara vembeu yake, vanochengeta mirairo yaMwari, vane uchapupu hwaJesu Kristu.  <chapter eID="Rev.12"/><div eID="gen1810" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1809" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 13:0 <div sID="gen1811" type="section"/> <chapter n="13" osisID="Rev.13" sID="Rev.13"/>  <div sID="gen1812" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 13:1 Zvino ndakamira pamusoro pejecha regungwa, ndokuona chikara chichibuda mugungwa, chine misoro minomwe nenyanga gumi, nepamusoro penyanga dzacho korona gumi, nepamusoro pemisoro yacho zita rekunyomba.
Revelation of John 13:2 Zvino chikara ichi chandakaona chakange chakaita sengwe, netsoka dzacho sedzebheya*, nemuromo wacho semuromo weshumba. Zibukanana rikapa kwachiri simba raro, nechigaro charo cheushe, nemasimba makuru.
Revelation of John 13:3 Zvino ndakaona umwe wemisoro yacho wakaita sewakaurawa kusvika parufu; asi vanga racho rekufa rakange rapodzwa; nyika yese ikashamisika shure kwechikara.
Revelation of John 13:4 Vakanamata zibukanana rakapa simba kuchikara, vakanamata chikara, vachiti: Ndiani wakafanana nechikara? Ndiani anogona kuita hondo nacho?
Revelation of John 13:5 Zvino kukapiwa kwachiri muromo unotaura zvinhu zvikuru nekunyomba; kukapiwawo kwachiri simba rekubata mwedzi makumi mana nemiviri.
Revelation of John 13:6 Ndokushamisa muromo wacho kuti chinyombe Mwari, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>kunyomba zita rake, netabhenakeri yake, neavo vanogara kudenga.
Revelation of John 13:7 Zvino kwakapiwa kwachiri kuita hondo nevatsvene, nekuvakunda; kukapiwawo kwachiri masimba pamusoro perudzi rwese nerurimi nerudzi.
