Revelation of John 13:8 Uye vese vanogara panyika vachachinamata, vane mazita asina kunyorwa mubhuku reupenyu reGwayana rakabaiwa kubva pakuvambwa kwenyika.
Revelation of John 13:9 Kana umwe ane nzeve, ngaanzwe.
Revelation of John 13:10 Kana umwe achiunganidza muutapwa, anoenda muutapwa; kana umwe achiuraya nemunondo, zvakamufanira kuurawa nemunondo. Ndipo pane kutsungirira nerutendo rwevatsvene. <div eID="gen1812" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1811" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 13:11 Zvino ndakaona chimwe chikara chichikwira kubva panyika; uye chakange chine nyanga mbiri segwayana, ndokutaura sezibukanana.
Revelation of John 13:12 Uye chakashandisa simba rese rechikara chekutanga pamberi pacho uye chinoita kuti nyika nevagere mukati mayo kuti vanamate chikara chekutanga, <transChange type="added">chiya</transChange> chine vanga rinouraya rakaporeswa.
Revelation of John 13:13 Chinoitawo zviratidzo zvikuru, kuti nemoto chinoita kuti uburuke kubva kudenga kuuya panyika pamberi pevanhu.
Revelation of John 13:14 Zvino chinonyengera avo vanogara panyika nezviratidzo zvakapiwa kwachiri kuti chiite pamberi pechikara, chichiti kune vanogara panyika, ngavaitire mufananidzo chikara chakange chine vanga remunondo, chikararama.
Revelation of John 13:15 Zvino kwakapiwa kwachiri kupa mweya kumufananidzo wechikara, kutiwo mufananidzo wechikara utaure, chigoita kuti vese vasinganamati mufananidzo wechikara vaurawe.
Revelation of John 13:16 Chinoitawo vese, vadiki nevakuru, uye vafumi nevarombo, uye vakasununguka nevaranda, kuti vapiwe mucherechedzo muruoko rwavo rwerudyi, kana pahuma dzavo,
Revelation of John 13:17 uye kuti kusava neumwe anogona kutenga kana kutengesa, kunze kwaiye ane mucherechedzo, kana zita rechikara kana nhamba yezita racho.
Revelation of John 13:18 Hehuno uchenjeri. Ane kunzwisisa ngaaverenge nhamba yechikara; nokuti inhamba yemunhu; uye nhamba yacho ndimazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nenhanhatu.  <chapter eID="Rev.13"/><div eID="gen1814" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1813" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 14:0 <div sID="gen1815" type="section"/> <chapter n="14" osisID="Rev.14" sID="Rev.14"/>  <div sID="gen1816" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 14:1 Zvino ndakaona, uye tarira, Gwayana ramira pagomo Ziyoni, uye rine zvuru zana nemakumi mana nevana, vane zita raBaba varo rakanyorwa pahuma dzavo.
Revelation of John 14:2 Zvino ndakanzwa inzwi richibva kudenga, senzwi remvura zhinji, uye senzwi remutinhiro mukuru; ndikanzwawo inzwi revaridzi veudimbwa vachiridza udimbwa hwavo.
Revelation of John 14:3 Zvino vakaimba serwiyo rutsva pamberi pechigaro cheushe, nepamberi pezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina, nevakuru; uye hakuna wakagona kudzidza rwiyo, kunze kwezvuru zana nemakumi mana nevana, vakatengwa munyika.
Revelation of John 14:4 Ava ndivo vasina kusvibiswa nevakadzi; nokuti imhandara. Ava ndivo vanotevera Gwayana kupi zvako kwarinoenda. Ava vakatengwa kubva pavanhu, zvibereko zvekutanga kuna Mwari nekuGwayana.
Revelation of John 14:5 Uye mumuromo wavo hamuna kuwanikwa kunyengera, nokuti havana chavanopomerwa pamberi pechigaro cheushe chaMwari. <div eID="gen1816" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1815" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 14:6 Zvino ndakaona umwe mutumwa achibhururuka pakati pedenga, ane evhangeri yekusingaperi, kuparidzira vanogara panyika, nekurudzi rwese, nedzinza, nerurimi, nevanhu.
Revelation of John 14:7 Achiti nenzwi guru: Ityai Mwari, uye mupe rumbidzo kwaari, nokuti nguva yemutongo wake yasvika; uye namatai iye wakaita denga nenyika negungwa nezvitubu zvemvura.
Revelation of John 14:8 Zvino umwe mutumwa wakatevera achiti: Rawa, rawa, Bhabhironi, guta guru, nokuti rakapa marudzi ese kunwa zvewaini yekutsamwa kweupombwe hwaro.
Revelation of John 14:9 Zvino mutumwa wechitatu wakavatevera, achiti nenzwi guru: Kana pane umwe anonamata chikara nemufananidzo wacho, nekugamuchira mucherechedzo pahuma yake, kana paruoko rwake,
Revelation of John 14:10 ndiyewo achanwa zvewaini yekutsamwa kwaMwari, yakadururwa mumukombe wekutsamwa kwake, isina kuvhenganiswa; uye acharwadziswa mumoto uye sarufa pamberi pevatumwa vatsvene, nepamberi peGwayana.
Revelation of John 14:11 Zvino utsi hwekurwadziwa kwavo hunokwira kusvikira rinhi narinhi; uye havana zororo masikati neusiku ivo vanonamata chikara nemufananidzo wacho, uye kana pane anogamuchira mucherechedzo wezita racho.
Revelation of John 14:12 Hekuno kutsungirira kwevatsvene, hevano vanochengeta mirairo yaMwari nerutendo rwaJesu.
Revelation of John 14:13 Zvino ndakanzwa inzwi richibva kudenga richiti kwandiri: Nyora, <transChange type="added">uti</transChange>: Vakaropafadzwa vakafa vanofira muna Ishe kubva ikozvino. Hongu, anoreva Mweya, kuti vazorore pakushingaira kwavo; nemabasa avo anotevera pamwe navo.
Revelation of John 14:14 Zvino ndakaona, uye tarira, gore jena, nepamusoro pegore pakagara wakaita seMwanakomana wemunhu, ane korona yegoridhe pamusoro wake, neparuoko rwake jeko rinopinza.
Revelation of John 14:15 Zvino umwe mutumwa wakabuda mutembere, achidanidzira nenzwi guru kuna iye wakange agere pamusoro pegore, <transChange type="added">achiti</transChange>: Pinza jeko rako ugokohwa; nokuti nguva yekukohwa yakusvikira, nokuti kukohwa kwenyika kwaibva.
Revelation of John 14:16 Zvino wakange agere pamusoro pegore akakandira jeko rake panyika, nyika ndokukohwewa.
Revelation of John 14:17 Zvino umwe mutumwa wakabuda mutembere iri kudenga, iyewo ane jeko rinopinza.
Revelation of John 14:18 Neumwe mutumwa akabuda muaritari, ane simba pamusoro pemoto, akadanidzira nekudana kukuru kuna iye wakange ane jeko rinopinza, achiti: Tuma jeko rako rinopinza, ugounganidza masumbu emuzambiringa wenyika, nokuti mazambiringa awo aibva.
Revelation of John 14:19 Zvino mutumwa wakakandira jeko rake panyika, ndokuunganidza mazambiringa enyika, akakandira muchisviniro chewaini chikuru chekutsamwa kwaMwari.
Revelation of John 14:20 Uye chisviniro chewaini chakatsikwa-tsikwa kunze kweguta, ropa rikabuda muchisviniro chewaini kusvikira pamatomu amabhiza, kubva kumastadhia* churu mazana matanhatu. <chapter eID="Rev.14"/><div eID="gen1818" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1817" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 15:0 <div sID="gen1819" type="section"/> <chapter n="15" osisID="Rev.15" sID="Rev.15"/>  <div sID="gen1820" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 15:1 Zvino ndakaona chimwe chiratidzo kudenga chikuru uye chinoshamisa, vatumwa vanomwe vane matambudziko manomwe ekupedzisira, nokuti mune awa kutsamwa kwaMwari kwakapedzeredzwa.
Revelation of John 15:2 Ndikaona segungwa regirazi rakavhenganiswa nemoto, neavo vakakunda chikara nemufananidzo wacho nemucherechedzo wacho, <transChange type="added">ne</transChange>nhamba* yezita racho, vamire pagungwa regirazi, vane udimbwa hwaMwari.
Revelation of John 15:3 Vakaimba rwiyo rwaMozisi muranda waMwari nerwiyo rweGwayana, vachiti: Makuru uye anoshamisa mabasa enyu, Ishe Mwari Wemasimbaose; dzakarurama uye ndedzechokwadi nzira dzenyu, Mambo wevatsvene.
Revelation of John 15:4 Ndiani angatongorega kukutyai, Ishe, nekukudza zita renyu? Nokuti ndimwi mega mutsvene; nokuti marudzi ese achauya uye achanamata pamberi penyu; nokuti zviito zvenyu zvakarurama zvakaratidzwa.
Revelation of John 15:5 Zvino shure kweizvozvo ndakaona, zvino tarira, yakazarurwa tembere yetabhenakeri yeuchapupu mukudenga;
Revelation of John 15:6 zvino kwakabuda vatumwa vanomwe vane matambudziko manomwe mutembere, vakapfeka mucheka wakachena unopenya, uye vakamonerwa pazvifuva nemabhanhire egoridhe.
Revelation of John 15:7 Uye chimwe chezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina chakapa vatumwa vanomwe ndiro nomwe dzegoridhe dzizere nehasha dzaMwari, anorarama kusvikira rinhi narinhi.
Revelation of John 15:8 Tembere ndokuzadzwa neutsi hunobva pakubwinya kwaMwari nepasimba rake; kukasava newakagona kupinda mutembere, kusvikira matambudziko manomwe evatumwa vanomwe apera. <chapter eID="Rev.15"/>
Revelation of John 16:0 <chapter n="16" osisID="Rev.16" sID="Rev.16"/>
Revelation of John 16:1 Zvino ndakanzwa inzwi guru kubva mutembere richiti kuvatumwa vanomwe: Endai, munodurura ndiro dzehasha dzaMwari panyika.
Revelation of John 16:2 Zvino wekutanga wakaenda, akadurura ndiro yake panyika; ndokuuya ronda rakaipa rinorwadza pavanhu vakange vane mucherechedzo wechikara, nevakanamata mufananidzo wacho.
Revelation of John 16:3 Zvino mutumwa wechipiri akadurura ndiro yake mugungwa; ndokuva ropa serewakafa; uye mweya mupenyu wega-wega ukafa mugungwa.
Revelation of John 16:4 Zvino mutumwa wechitatu akadurura ndiro yake munzizi nemuzvitubu zvemvura; ndokuva ropa.
Revelation of John 16:5 Zvino ndakanzwa mutumwa wemvura achiti: Makarurama, Ishe, aripo, newakange aripo, neachazovapo, nokuti makatonga izvi.
Revelation of John 16:6 Nokuti vakadurura ropa revatsvene nevaporofita, uye ropa makavapa kuti vanwe; nokuti vakafanira.
Revelation of John 16:7 Zvino ndakanzwa umwe kubva muaritari achiti: Hongu, Ishe Mwari Wemasimbaose, kutonga kwenyu ndekwechokwadi uye kwakarurama.
Revelation of John 16:8 Zvino mutumwa wechina akadurura ndiro yake pamusoro pezuva; kukapiwa kwariri kupisa vanhu nemoto.
Revelation of John 16:9 Vanhu ndokupiswa nekupisa kukuru, ndokunyomba zita raMwari ane simba pamusoro pematambudziko awa, vakasatendeukawo kuti vamupe rukudzo.
Revelation of John 16:10 Zvino mutumwa wechishanu wakadurura ndiro yake pamusoro pechigaro cheushe chechikara; ushe hwacho ndokuva rima, ndokutsenga marimi avo nekurwadzwa.
Revelation of John 16:11 Zvino vakanyomba Mwari wekudenga nekuda kwemarwadzo avo uye nekuda kwemaronda avo; asi havana kutendeuka pamabasa avo.
Revelation of John 16:12 Zvino mutumwa wechitanhatu akadurura ndiro yake pamusoro perwizi rukuru Yufuratesi; mvura yarwo ndokupwa, kuti nzira yemadzimambo anobva kumabvazuva igadzirwe.
Revelation of John 16:13 Zvino ndakaona kubva mumuromo wezibukanana, nekubva mumuromo wechikara, nekubva mumuromo wemuporofita wenhema, mweya yetsvina mitatu sematafi;
Revelation of John 16:14 nokuti ndiyo mweya yemadhimoni inoita zviratidzo, inobudira pamadzimambo epasi neenyika yese, kuvaunganidzira kuhondo yezuva iro guru raMwari Wemasimbaose.
Revelation of John 16:15 Tarira, ndinouya sembavha. Wakaropafadzwa anorinda, nekuchengeta nguvo dzake, kuti arege kufamba akashama, vaone nyadzi dzake.
Revelation of John 16:16 Zvino wakavaunganidzira kunzvimbo inonzi nechiHebheru Arimagedhoni.
Revelation of John 16:17 Zvino mutumwa wechinomwe akadurura ndiro yake mudenga; kukabuda inzwi guru kubva mutembere yekudenga, kubva pachigaro cheushe, richiti: Zvaitika!
Revelation of John 16:18 Zvino kwakava nemanzwi nemitinhiro nemheni, ndokuva nekudengenyeka kwenyika kukuru, kwakadaro kusina kumbovapo kubva pakuvapo kwevanhu panyika, kudengenyeka kwenyika kune simba rakadai, kwakakura zvakadai.
Revelation of John 16:19 Zvino guta guru rakava zvikamu zvitatu, maguta emarudzi ndokuwa; Bhabhironi guru ndokurangarirwa pamberi paMwari, kuti aripe mukombe wewaini yekutsamwa kwehasha dzake.
Revelation of John 16:20 Zvino chiwi chega-chega chikatiza, nemakomo akasawanikwa.
Revelation of John 16:21 Zvino chimvuramabwe chikuru chinorema setarenda* chikawira pamusoro pevanhu kubva kudenga; vanhu vakanyomba Mwari nekuda kwedambudziko rechimvuramambwe, nokuti dambudziko racho raiva guru kwazvo. <chapter eID="Rev.16"/><div eID="gen1820" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1819" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 17:0 <div sID="gen1821" type="section"/> <chapter n="17" osisID="Rev.17" sID="Rev.17"/>  <div sID="gen1822" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 17:1 Zvino kwakauya umwe wevatumwa vanomwe vakange vane ndiro nomwe, ndokutaura neni, achiti kwandiri: Uya pano, ndicharatidza kwauri mutongo wemhombwe huru igere pamusoro pemvura zhinji;
Revelation of John 17:2 madzimambo enyika aakaita upombwe nayo, nevagari vepanyika vakadhakiswa newaini yeupombwe hwayo.
Revelation of John 17:3 Zvino wakandisengera kurenje mumweya, uye ndakaona mukadzi akatasva chikara chitsvuku, chizere nemazita ekunyomba, chine misoro minomwe nenyanga gumi.
Revelation of John 17:4 Zvino mukadzi wakange akamonera zvine ruvara rwehute nezvitsvuku, uye akashonga goridhe nemabwe anokosha nemaparera*, ane mukombe wegoridhe muruoko rwake uzere nezvinosemesa netsvina yeupombwe hwake.
Revelation of John 17:5 Nepahuma yake pakange pakanyorwa zita <transChange type="added">rekuti</transChange>: CHAKAVANZIKA, BHABHIRONI GURU, MAI VEMHOMBWE NEZVINOSEMESA ZVENYIKA.
Revelation of John 17:6 Zvino ndakaona mukadzi akararadza neropa revatsvene, uye neropa rezvapupu zvaJesu. Zvino ndakati ndamuona ndikashamisika nekushamisika kukuru.
Revelation of John 17:7 Zvino mutumwa akati kwandiri: Washamisika nei? Ini ndichakuudza chakavanzika chemukadzi, nechechikara chinomutakura, chine misoro minomwe nenyanga gumi.
Revelation of John 17:8 Chikara chawakaona, chaivapo, uye chisipo; uye choda kukwira chichibva mugomba risina chigadziko, chichienda mukuparadzwa; uye vanogara panyika vasina kunyorwa mazita avo mubhuku reupenyu kubva pakuvambwa kwenyika vachashamisika vachiona chikara chaivapo uye chisipo, kunyange chiripo.
Revelation of John 17:9 Zvino heino fungwa ine njere. Misoro minomwe ndiwo makomo manomwe mukadzi paagere pamusoro pawo,
Revelation of John 17:10 uye ndiwo madzimambo manomwe; vashanu vawa, uye umwe aripo, umwe haasati asvika; uye kana achisvika, anofanira kugara chinguvana.
Revelation of John 17:11 Uye chikara chaivapo, uye chisipo, ndiyewo werusere, uye anobva pavanomwe, uye anoenda mukuparadzwa.
Revelation of John 17:12 Nenyanga gumi dzawaona, ndiwo madzimambo gumi, asati agamuchira ushe, asi achagamuchira simba semadzimambo pamwe nechikara awa rimwe.
Revelation of John 17:13 Ava vane fungwa imwe, uye vanopa simba neutongi hwavo kuchikara.
Revelation of John 17:14 Ava vacharwa neGwayana, uye Gwayana richavakunda, nokuti ndiIshe wemadzishe naMambo wemadzimambo; nevanaro ndevakadanwa nevakasarudzwa nevakatendeka.
Revelation of John 17:15 Zvino akati kwandiri: Mvura yawaona, pagere mhombwe, ndivo vanhu nezvaunga nemarudzi nendimi.
Revelation of John 17:16 Uye nyanga gumi dzawaona pamusoro pechikara, avo vachavenga mhombwe, uye vachaiparadza nekuifukura, uye vachadya nyama yayo, nekuipisa nemoto.
Revelation of John 17:17 Nokuti Mwari wakaisa mumoyo yavo kuti vaite fungwa yake, vaite fungwa imwe, nekupa chikara ushe hwavo, kusvikira mashoko aMwari apedzeredzwa.
Revelation of John 17:18 Zvino mukadzi wawaona ndiro guta guru, rine umambo pamusoro pemadzimambo enyika. <chapter eID="Rev.17"/><div eID="gen1822" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1821" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 18:0 <div sID="gen1823" type="section"/> <chapter n="18" osisID="Rev.18" sID="Rev.18"/>  <div sID="gen1824" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 18:1 Zvino shure kwezvinhu izvi ndakaona umwe mutumwa achiburuka kubva kudenga, ane simba guru, nyika ndokuvhenekerwa nokubwinya kwake.
Revelation of John 18:2 Akadanidzira nesimba nenzwi guru, achiti: Rawa, rawa Bhabhironi guru, uye rava ugaro hwemadhimoni, nejere remweya yese yetsvina, nedendere reshiri dzese dzetsvina dzinovengwa.
Revelation of John 18:3 Nokuti marudzi ese akanwa zvewaini yehasha dzeupombwe hwaro, nemadzimambo enyika akaita upombwe naro, nevashambadzi venyika vakafuma nesimba reumbozha hwaro.
Revelation of John 18:4 Zvino ndakanzwa rimwe inzwi kubva kudenga richiti: Budai kubva mariri vanhu vangu, kuti murege kuva vagovani vezvivi zvaro, uye kuti murege kugamuchira zvematambudziko aro;
Revelation of John 18:5 nokuti zvivi zvaro zvasungana kusvika kudenga, naMwari warangarira zvisakarurama zvaro.
Revelation of John 18:6 Muritsive sezvarakakutsivaiwo imwi, muchiripamhidzira kupamhidzira kunoenderana nemabasa aro; mumukombe iwoyo marakasanganisa iro, murisanganisire kakapamhidzirwa.
Revelation of John 18:7 Separakazvikudza kudai napo nekurarama muumbozha, murirwadzise nekurishungurudza saizvozvo; nokuti rinoti mumoyo maro: Ndinogara ndiri mambokadzi, uye handisi chirikadzi, uye handingatongooni kuchema.
Revelation of John 18:8 Naizvozvo achasvika nezuva rimwe matambudziko aro, rufu nekuchema nenzara; uye richapiswa kwazvo nemoto; nokuti ane simba Ishe Mwari anoritonga.
Revelation of John 18:9 Nemadzimambo enyika akaita upombwe nekurarama paumbozha naro acharira pamusoro paro nekuchema pamusoro paro, pavachaona utsi hwekupiswa kwaro;
Revelation of John 18:10 vamire kure nekutya kurwadziwa kwaro, vachiti: Nhamo, nhamo, guta guru Bhabhironi, guta rakasimba, nokuti kutongwa kwako kwasvika neawa rimwe.
Revelation of John 18:11 Uye vashambadzi venyika vacharira nekuchema pamusoro paro, nokuti hakuchina munhu achatenga zvitengeswa zvavozve;
Revelation of John 18:12 zvitengeswa zvegoridhe, nezvesirivheri, nezveibwe rinokosha, nezvemaparera* nezvemucheka wakaisvonaka, nezvine ruvara rwehute, nezvesiriki*, nezvezvitsvuku, nemuti umwe neumwe unonhuhwira, nemarudzi ese emidziyo yenyanga dzenzou, nemarudzi ese emidziyo yematanda anokoshesesa, nezvendarira, nezvedare, nezvemabwe machena;
Revelation of John 18:13 nekinamoni*, nezvinonhuhwira, namafuta ekuzora, nezvipfungaidzo zvinonhuhwira, newaini, nemafuta, neupfu hwakatsetseka, nezviyo, nemombe, nemakwai, nezvemabhiza, nengoro, nenhapwa, nemweya yevanhu.
Revelation of John 18:14 Zvino michero yaichiviwa nemoyo wako yakabva kwauri, nezvinhu zvese zvinobwinya nezvinopenya zvabva kwauri, haungatongozviwanizve.
Revelation of John 18:15 Vashambadzi vezvinhu izvi, vakafumiswa naro, vachamira kure nekutya kurwadziwa kwaro, vachichema nekurira,
Revelation of John 18:16 uye vachiti: Nhamo, nhamo, guta guru, rakange rakapfeka mucheka wakaisvonaka nezvine ruvara rwehute nezvitsvuku, uye rakashongedzwa negoridhe nebwe rinokosha nemaparera!
Revelation of John 18:17 Nokuti neawa rimwe fuma huru yakadai yaparadzwa. Uye mufambisi wezvikepe umwe neumwe, nevese vanofamba pamwe muzvikepe, nevafambi vemuchikepe, nevabati vese vepagungwa vakamira kure,
Revelation of John 18:18 ndokudanidzira vachiona utsi hwekutsva kwaro, vachiti: Nderipi rakafanana naro guta guru?
Revelation of John 18:19 Zvino vakadira guruva pamisoro yavo, ndokudanidzira vachirira nekuchema, vachiti: Nhamo, nhamo, guta guru, maifumiswa nezvinokosha zvaro vese vaiva nezvikepe pagungwa; nokuti rakaparadzwa neawa rimwe.
Revelation of John 18:20 Fara pamusoro paro, iwe denga, nemwi vaapositori vatsvene, nevaporofita, nokuti Mwari wakatonga mutongo wenyu kwariri.
Revelation of John 18:21 Zvino mutumwa umwe ane simba wakasimudza ibwe rakaita seguyo guru, akaposhera mugungwa, achiti: Saizvozvo nechisimba Bhabhironi guta guru richaposherwa uye harichazotongowanikwizve.
Revelation of John 18:22 Nenzwi revaridzi veudimbwa nerevaimbi nerevaridzi venyere nerevaridzi vehwamanda, harichatongonzwikwizve mauri, nemhizha yeumhizha hupi nehupi haichatongowanikwizve mauri, nenzwi reguyo harichatongonzwikwizve mauri;
Revelation of John 18:23 uye chiedza chemwenje hachichatongovhenekerizve mauri, nenzwi remuwani neremwenga harichatongonzwikwizve mauri; nokuti vashambadzi vako vaiva vakuru venyika; nokuti neuroyi hwako marudzi ese akatsauswa.
Revelation of John 18:24 Zvino mariri makawanikwa ropa revaporofita nerevatsvene, nerevese vakauraiwa panyika. <chapter eID="Rev.18"/><div eID="gen1824" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1823" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 19:0 <div sID="gen1825" type="section"/> <chapter n="19" osisID="Rev.19" sID="Rev.19"/>  <div sID="gen1826" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 19:1 Zvino shure kweizvi ndakanzwa inzwi guru rechaunga chikuru kudenga, richiti: Hareruya! Ruponeso nekubwinya nerukudzo nesimba kuna Ishe Mwari wedu;
Revelation of John 19:2 nokuti mitongo yake ndeyechokwadi uye yakarurama; nokuti wakatonga mhombwe huru yakaodza nyika neupombwe hwayo, uye wakatsiva ropa revaranda vake paruoko rwayo.
Revelation of John 19:3 Zvino vakati rwechipiri: Hareruya! Neutsi hwaro hunokwira kusvikira rinhi narinhi.
Revelation of John 19:4 Zvino vakuru makumi maviri nevana nezvisikwa zvipenyu zvina vakawa vakanamata Mwari wakange agere pachigaro cheushe, vachiti: Ameni, Hareruya!
Revelation of John 19:5 Inzwi ndokubuda pachigaro cheushe, richiti: Rumbidzai Mwari wedu, imwi mese varanda vake, nevanomutya, zvese vadiki nevakuru.
Revelation of John 19:6 Zvino ndakanzwa senzwi rechaunga chikuru, uye senzwi remvura zhinji, uye senzwi rekutinhira kune simba richiti: Hareruya! Nokuti anotonga Ishe Mwari Wemasimbaose.
Revelation of John 19:7 Ngatifare, tipembere, nekupa rukudzo kwaari; nokuti muchato weGwayana wasvika, uye mukadzi waro wazvigadzirira.
Revelation of John 19:8 Kwaari kwakapiwa kuti amonere mucheka wakaisvonaka wakachena uye unopenya; nokuti mucheka wakaisvonaka ndiwo kururama kwevatsvene.
Revelation of John 19:9 Zvino wakati kwandiri: Nyora, <transChange type="added">uti</transChange>: Vakaropafadzwa vakakokwa kuchirairo chemuchato weGwayana. Ndokuti kwandiri: Awa mashoko echokwadi aMwari.
Revelation of John 19:10 Zvino ndakawira pamberi petsoka dzake kuti ndimunamate; ndokuti kwandiri: Rega <transChange type="added">kudaro</transChange>; ndiri muranda pamwe newe nehama dzako dzine uchapupu hwaJesu; namata Mwari, nokuti ndihwo uchapupu hwaJesu mweya wechiporofita. <div eID="gen1826" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1825" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 19:11 Zvino ndakaona denga rakazarurwa, zvino tarira, bhiza jena, newakange agere pamusoro paro anonzi Wakatendeka neWechokwadi, uye pakururama anotonga nekurwa.
Revelation of John 19:12 Zvino meso ake akaita semurazvo wemoto; nepamusoro wake pane korona zhinji, ane zita rakanyorwa risina munhu wakariziva kunze kwake.
Revelation of John 19:13 Zvino wakamonera nguvo yakanyikwa muropa; uye zita rake rinonzi shoko raMwari.
Revelation of John 19:14 Uye hondo <transChange type="added">dzaiva</transChange> kudenga dzakamutevera dzakatasva mabhizha machena, dzakapfeka mucheka wakaisvonaka muchena wakashambidzika.
Revelation of John 19:15 Zvino mumuromo make makabuda munondo unopinza, kuti nawo arove marudzi; uye iye achaatonga netsvimbo yedare; uye iye anotsika chisviniro chewaini chehasha uye chekutsamwa kwaMwari Wemasimbaose.
Revelation of John 19:16 Uye panguvo nepachidzva chake pakange pakanyorwa zita <transChange type="added">rinoti</transChange>: MAMBO WEMADZIMAMBO NAISHE WEMADZISHE.
Revelation of John 19:17 Zvino ndakaona mutumwa umwe amire muzuva; akadanidzira nenzwi guru, achiti kushiri dzese dzinobhururuka pakati pedenga: Uyai muungane pamwe pachirairo chaMwari mukuru,
Revelation of John 19:18 kuti mudye nyama yemadzimambo, nenyama yevakuru vezvuru zvemazana, nenyama yevanhu vane simba, nenyama yemabhiza neyevatasvi vawo, nenyama yezvese, zvese yevakasununguka neyevakasungwa, zvese yevadiki neyevakuru.
Revelation of John 19:19 Zvino ndakaona chikara, nemadzimambo enyika nehondo dzavo vakaungana pamwe kuti vaite hondo newakange akatasva bhiza, uye nehondo yake.
Revelation of John 19:20 Zvino chikara chakabatwa, uye pamwe nacho muporofita wenhema wakaita zviratidzo pamberi pacho, zvaakanyengera nazvo vaya vakagamuchira mucherechedzo wechikara, nevakanamata mufananidzo wacho. Ava vese vakakandirwa vari vapenyu mudziva remoto unotsva nesarufa.
Revelation of John 19:21 Uye vakasara vakaurawa nemunondo wewakange akatasva bhizha, wakabuda mumuromo make; neshiri dzese dzikagutiswa nenyama yavo.  <chapter eID="Rev.19"/><div eID="gen1828" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1827" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 20:0 <div sID="gen1829" type="section"/> <chapter n="20" osisID="Rev.20" sID="Rev.20"/>  <div sID="gen1830" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 20:1 Zvino ndakaona mutumwa achiburuka kubva kudenga, ane kiyi yegomba risina chigadziko, neketani huru muruoko rwake.
Revelation of John 20:2 Zvino akabata zibukanana, nyoka yakare, ndiye Dhiabhorosi naSatani, akamusunga makore churu,
Revelation of John 20:3 ndokumukandira mugomba risina chigadziko, ndokumupfigira, ndokuisa mucherechedzo pamusoro pake kuti arege kuzonyengerazve marudzi, kusvikira makore churu apera; zvino shure kweizvozvo anofanira kusunungurwa chinguva chidiki.
Revelation of John 20:4 Zvino ndakaona zvigaro zveushe, uye vakagara pamusoro pazvo, kutonga ndokupiwa kwavari; <transChange type="added">ndikaona</transChange> nemweya yevakange vagurwa misoro nekuda kweuchapupu hwaJesu, uye nekuda kweshoko raMwari, nevasina kunamata chikara kana mufananidzo wacho, kana kugamuchira mucherechedzo pahuma yavo, neparuoko rwavo; zvino vakararama vakabata ushe pamwe naKristu makore churu.
Revelation of John 20:5 Asi vakasara vevakafa havana kuraramazve kusvikira makore churu apera. Uku kumuka kwekutanga.
Revelation of John 20:6 Wakaropafadzwa uye mutsvene ane mugove pakumuka kwekutanga; pane ava rufu rwechipiri harwuna simba; asi vachava vapristi vaMwari nevaKristu, uye vachabata ushe pamwe naye makore churu. <div eID="gen1830" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1829" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 20:7 Zvino panopera makore churu, Satani achasunungurwa kubva mutirongo rake,
Revelation of John 20:8 zvino uchabuda kutsausa marudzi ari kumativi mana enyika, <transChange type="added">ivo</transChange> Gogi naMagogi, avaunganidzire hondo; uwandu hwavo hwakaita sejecha regungwa.
Revelation of John 20:9 Vakakwira pakufara kwenyika, vakakomba musasa wevatsvene neguta rinodikanwa; moto ndokuburuka kubva kuna Mwari uchibva kudenga ndokuvamedza.
Revelation of John 20:10 Zvino dhiabhorosi wakavatsausa akakandwa mudziva remoto nesarufa, pane chikara nemuporofita wenhema, uye vacharwadziwa masikati neusiku kusvikira rinhi narinhi. <div eID="gen1832" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1831" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 20:11 Zvino ndakaona chigaro cheushe chikuru chichena, newakange agere pamusoro pacho, iye nyika nedenga zvakatiza pachiso chake, zvikasawanirwa nzvimbo.
Revelation of John 20:12 Uye ndakaona vakafa, vadiki nevakuru, vamire pamberi paMwari, mabhuku ndokuzarurwa, nerimwe bhuku rikazarurwa, rinova reupenyu; vakafa vakatongwa kubva pane zvakange zvakanyorwa mumabhuku, zvichienderana nemabasa avo.
Revelation of John 20:13 Zvino gungwa rakapa vakafa vakange vari mariri; nerufu negehena zvikapa vakafa vakange vari mazviri; umwe neumwe akatongwa zvichienderana nemabasa avo.
Revelation of John 20:14 Zvino rufu negehena zvakakandirwa mudziva remoto; urwu rufu rwechipiri.
Revelation of John 20:15 Zvino kana aripo asina kuwanikwa akanyorwa mubhuku reupenyu, wakakandirwa mudziva remoto. <chapter eID="Rev.20"/><div eID="gen1834" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1833" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 21:0 <div sID="gen1835" type="section"/> <chapter n="21" osisID="Rev.21" sID="Rev.21"/>  <div sID="gen1836" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 21:1 Zvino ndakaona denga idzva nenyika itsva, nokuti denga rekutanga nenyika yekutanga zvakange zvapfuura, uye gungwa rakange risisipo.
Revelation of John 21:2 Zvino ini Johwani ndakaona guta dzvene, Jerusarema idzva, richiburuka kubva kuna Mwari kubva kudenga, rakagadzirirwa semwenga wakashongedzerwa murume wake.
Revelation of John 21:3 Zvino ndakanzwa inzwi guru kubva kudenga, richiti: Tarira, tabhenakeri yaMwari iri pavanhu, iye achagara navo, uye ivo vachava vanhu vake; naMwari amene achava navo, <transChange type="added">ari</transChange> Mwari wavo.
Revelation of John 21:4 Zvino Mwari achapusika misodzi yese kubva pameso avo, nerufu haruchazovipo, kana kushungurudzika, kana kurira, kana kurwadziwa hakungachavipo; nokuti zvinhu zvekutanga zvapfuura.
Revelation of John 21:5 Zvino agere pachigaro cheushe wakati: Tarira, ndinoita zvinhu zvese zvive zvitsva. Ndokuti kwandiri: Nyora; nokuti mashoko awa ndeechokwadi uye akatendeka.
Revelation of John 21:6 Zvino akati kwandiri: Zvaitika. Ndini Arifa naOmega, Kutanga neKupedzisira. Ini ndichapa kuna iye ane nyota zvinobva pachitubu chemvura yeupenyu pachena.
Revelation of John 21:7 Anokunda achagara nhaka yezvinhu zvese; uye ndichava Mwari wake, naiye achava mwanakomana wangu.
Revelation of John 21:8 Asi vanotya, nevasingatendi, nevanyangadzi, nemhondi, nemhombwe, nevaroyi, nevanonamata zvifananidzo, nevese varevi venhema, vachava nemugove wavo mudziva rinopfuta nemoto nesarufa; rwunova rufu rwechipiri. <div eID="gen1836" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1835" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 21:9 Zvino kwakauya kwandiri umwe wevatumwa vanomwe vakange vane ndiro nomwe dzizere nematambudziko manomwe ekupedzisira, akataura neni, achiti: Uya pano ndigokuratidza mwenga, mukadzi weGwayana.
Revelation of John 21:10 Zvino wakanditakurira muMweya kugomo guru uye refu, akandiratidza guta guru, Jerusarema dzvene, richiburuka kubva kudenga kubva kuna Mwari,
Revelation of John 21:11 rine kubwinya kwaMwari; uye chiedza charo chakaita sebwe rinokoshesesa, sebwe rejasipisi*, rinonjenjemera sekrisitaro*;
Revelation of John 21:12 uye rakange rine rusvingo rukuru uye rurefu, rine masuwo gumi nemaviri, nevatumwa gumi nevaviri pamusuwo, nemazita akanyorwa pamusoro, ari emarudzi gumi nemaviri evana vaIsraeri.
Revelation of John 21:13 Kumabvazuva masuwo matatu; kumaodzanyemba masuwo matatu; kuchamhembe masuwo matatu; nekumavirira masuwo matatu;
Revelation of John 21:14 zvino rusvingo rweguta rwakange rwune nheyo gumi nembiri, nepadziri mazita evaapositori gumi nevaviri veGwayana.
Revelation of John 21:15 Zvino wakataura neni wakange ane rutsanga rwegoridhe, kuti ayere guta, namasuwo aro, nerusingo rwaro.
Revelation of John 21:16 Zvino guta rakange rakamiswa rakaenzana mativi mana, nekureba kwaro kwakakura kudai sekufara; ndokuyera guta nerutsanga, <transChange type="added">rikasvika</transChange> pamastadhia* zvuru gumi nezviviri; kureba nekufara nekukwirira kwaro zvakaenzana.
Revelation of John 21:17 Zvino wakayera rusvingo rwaro, mbimbi zana nemakumi mana nemana, chiyero chemunhu, chinova chemutumwa.
Revelation of John 21:18 Uye maiva nechivakwa cherusvingo rwaro, jasipisi, uye guta <transChange type="added">riri</transChange> goridhe rakakwana, rakafanana negirazi rakachenesesa.
Revelation of John 21:19 Nenheyo dzerusvingo rweguta dzakashongedzwa nebwe rimwe nerimwe rinokosha. Nheyo yekutanga ijasipisi, yepiri isafiri*, yetatu ikarikidhoni*, yechina iemaradhi*,
Revelation of John 21:20 yeshanu isaridhonikisi*, yetanhatu isaridhio*, yechinomwe ikrisoriti*, yerusere bheriri*, yepfumbamwe topasi*, yegumi kirisopirasi*, yegumi neimwe hiasindi*, yegumi nembiri ametesiti*.
Revelation of John 21:21 Zvino masuwo gumi nemaviri maparera gumi nemaviri; rimwe nerimwe remasuwo rakange riri reparera rimwe; uye nzira yemuguta igoridhe rakakwana segirazi rinonjenjemera.
Revelation of John 21:22 Zvino handina kuona tembere mukati marwo, nokuti Ishe Mwari Wemasimbaose itembere yarwo, neGwayana.
Revelation of John 21:23 Zvino guta harishaiwi zuva kana mwedzi kuvhenekera mariri; nokuti kubwinya kwaMwari kunorivhenekera, nemwenje waro iGwayana;
Revelation of John 21:24 zvino marudzi evanoponeswa achafamba muchiedza charo, nemadzimambo enyika achauisa kubwinya nerukudzo rwawo mariri.
Revelation of John 21:25 Zvino masuwo aro haangatongopfigwi masikati, nokuti usiku hahuchazovipo.
Revelation of John 21:26 Uye vachauisa kubwinya nerukudzo rwendudzi mariri.
Revelation of John 21:27 Uye hamungatongopindi chero chinhu chinosvibisa mariri, uye chinosemesa, uye nhema; asi vakanyorwa mubhuku reupenyu reGwayana.  <chapter eID="Rev.21"/><div eID="gen1838" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1837" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 22:0 <div sID="gen1839" type="section"/> <chapter n="22" osisID="Rev.22" sID="Rev.22"/>  <div sID="gen1840" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 22:1 Zvino wakandiratidza rwizi rwemvura yeupenyu rwakachena, yakapenya sekrisitaro*, ichibuda pachigaro cheushe chaMwari, necheGwayana.
Revelation of John 22:2 Pakati penzira yaro uye kurutivi urwu neurwu rwerwizi kune muti weupenyu unoita zvibereko gumi nezviviri, uchibereka zvibereko zvawo mwedzi umwe neumwe; nemashizha emuti <transChange type="added">aiva</transChange> ekuporesa ndudzi.
Revelation of John 22:3 Zvino hakuchavizve nekutuka kwese; asi chigaro cheushe chaMwari necheGwayana zvichava mariri; uye varanda vake vachamushumira,
Revelation of John 22:4 zvino vachaona chiso chake; nezita rake richava pahuma dzavo.
Revelation of John 22:5 Zvino usiku hahuchazovipo ipapo, uye havatsvaki mwenje kana chiedza chezuva, nokuti Ishe Mwari anovapa chiedza; uye vachatonga kusvikira rinhi narinhi. <div eID="gen1840" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1839" type="section"/>
Revelation of John 22:6 Zvino akati kwandiri: Mashoko awa akatendeka uye ndeechokwadi; uye Ishe, Mwari wevaporofita vatsvene, wakatuma mutumwa wake kuti aratidze kuvaranda vake zvinhu zvinofanira kukurumidza kuitika. <div eID="gen1842" type="x-p"/>
Revelation of John 22:7 Tarira, ndinokurumidza kuuya. Wakaropafadzwa anochengeta mashoko echiporofita chebhuku iri.
Revelation of John 22:8 Zvino ini Johwani, ndini ndakaona zvinhu izvi uye ndakanzwa. Zvino ndakati ndanzwa nekuona, ndakawira pasi kuti ndinamate pamberi petsoka dzemutumwa wakandiratidza zvinhu izvi.
Revelation of John 22:9 Zvino akati kwandiri: Rega <transChange type="added">kudaro</transChange>; nokuti ndiri muranda pamwe newe, newehama dzako vaporofita, newevanochengeta mashoko ebhuku iri; namata Mwari.
Revelation of John 22:10 Zvino akati kwandiri: Usavharira nemucherechedzo mashoko echiporofita chebhuku iri, nokuti nguva yava pedo.
Revelation of John 22:11 Anoita zvisakarurama ngaagare achiita zvisakarurama; neane tsvina ngaagare ane tsvina; newakarurama ngaagare achiruramiswa; mutsvenewo ngaagare achiitwa mutsvene.
Revelation of John 22:12 Zvino tarira, ndinouya nekukurumidza; uye mubairo wangu uneni, kuti ndiripire umwe neumwe sezvichava mabasa ake.
Revelation of John 22:13 Ini ndiri Arifa naOmega, Kutanga neKupedzisira, Wekutanga neWekupedzisira.
Revelation of John 22:14 Vakaropafadzwa vanoita mirairo yake, kuti vave nekodzero yemuti weupenyu, vagopinda nepamasuwo muguta.
Revelation of John 22:15 Asi kunze <transChange type="added">kune</transChange> imbwa, nevaroyi, nemhombwe, nemhondi, nevanamati vezvifananidzo, nevese vanoda nhema vachidziita.
Revelation of John 22:16 Ini Jesu ndakatuma mutumwa wangu kukupupurirai zvinhu izvozvi pamakereke. Ini ndiri mudzi nechizvarwa chaDhavhidhi, nyeredzi inopenya uye yemangwanani.
Revelation of John 22:17 Zvino Mweya nemwenga vanoti: Uya! Naiye anonzwa ngaati: Uya! Uye ane nyota ngaauye; neanoda ngaatore mvura yeupenyu pachena.
Revelation of John 22:18 Nokuti ndinopupura kune wese anonzwa mashoko echiporofita chebhuku iri, <transChange type="added">ndichiti</transChange>: Kana munhu akawedzera pazvinhu izvi, Mwari achawedzera kwaari matambudziko akanyorwa mubhuku iri;
Revelation of John 22:19 uye kana munhu akabvisa pamashoko ebhuku rechiporofita ichi, Mwari achabvisa mugove wake pabhuku reupenyu, nepaguta dzvene, nezvinhu zvakanyorwa mubhuku iri.
Revelation of John 22:20 Anopupura zvinhu izvi anoti: Hongu, ndinouya nekukurumidza. Ameni. Hongu uyai, Ishe Jesu.
Revelation of John 22:21 Nyasha dzaIshe wedu Jesu Kristu <transChange type="added">ngadzive</transChange> nemwi mese. Ameni. <div eID="gen1843" type="x-p"/> <div eID="gen1841" type="section"/> <chapter eID="Rev.22"/> <div canonical="true" eID="gen1763" osisID="Rev" type="book"/>
